translation.en: #FreeAmade: Journalist arrested and tortured after reporting on violence in northern Mozambique
translation.ha: #FreeAmade: ɗan siyasar da aka kama kuma aka azabtar a bayan rahoto game da tashin hankalin arewacin Mozambiƙue

translation.en: Survivors who lost relatives and houses rest outside following the June 5 attack in the village of Naunde in Cabo Delgado, Mozambique.
translation.ha: Waɗanda suka tsira waɗanda suka rasa 'yan'uwansu da gidajensu suna zaune a waje bayan harin 5 ga Yuni a ƙauyen Naunde a Cabo Delgado, a Mozambiƙue.

translation.en: Photo by Borges Nhamire, used with permission.
translation.ha: Hoto daga Borges Nhamire, an samu izinin amfani da shi.

translation.en: Mozambican journalist Amade Abubacar was arrested on January 5, while reporting on a trend of violent attacks on small villages in Mozambique's province of Cabo Delgado.
translation.ha: An kama ɗan jaridar Mozambiƙue, Amade Abubacar ranar 5 ga Janairu, a lokacin da yake rahoto a kan hare-haren tashin hankali a kan wasu ƙananan ƙauyuka a lardin Mozambiƙue na Cabo Delgado.

translation.en: Located in northern Mozambique, Cabo Delgado is rich with natural resources, such as ruby, charcoal and natural gas, found in the Rovuma Basin.
translation.ha: Cabo Delgado da yake a arewacin Mozambiƙue, yana da arziƙin ma'adanai kamar jajayen duwatsu da gawayi da gas, waɗanda ake samu a kwarin Roɓuma.

translation.en: Some observers say the group coordinating the attacks intends to begin trafficking these resources.
translation.ha: Wasu daga cikin masu sa ido sun bayyana cewa ƙungiyar da take kai hare-haren suna da niyyar su fara jigilar waɗannan ma'adanan ne.

translation.en: Since October 2017, multiple attacks have been carried out in different districts of Cabo Delgado by what appears to be the same rogue group.
translation.ha: Tun Oktoban 2017, an kai hare-hare masu yawa a yankuna daban-daban na Cabo Delgado daga abin da ake ganin ƙungiya ɗaya ce.

translation.en: Many media have reported on the attacks, but state officials have been unwilling to comment on or confirm evidence in these cases.
translation.ha: Kafafen yaɗa labarai da yawa sun yi rahoton hare-haren, amma jami'an gwamnati ba su da niyyar yin magana ko tabbatar da faruwar lamuran.

translation.en: In 2018, more than one hundred people were prosecuted together in relation to these crimes. Their trial is expected to end this year.
translation.ha: A 2018, an yanke wa sama da mutane ɗari hukuncin da suke da alaƙa da waɗannan laifukan. Ana sa ran za a gama shari'arsu a wannan shekarar.

translation.en: #FreeAmade: campaign to release Mozambican journalist
translation.ha: #FreeAmade: gangamin sakin ɗan jaridar Mozambiƙue

translation.en: Amade Aoubacar works with the Mozambican Social Communication Institute and as a journalist with news site Zitamar and the local radio station, Nacedje.
translation.ha: Amade Aoubacar yana aiki da Cibiyar Sadarwar Al'umma ta Mozambiƙue kuma a matsayin ɗan jarida a sashen labarai na Zitamar da kuma wani gidan rediyo na Nacedje.

translation.en: The journalist was arrested and detained by Mozambican federal police on January 5, while photographing survivors of an attack in Cabo Delgado.
translation.ha: Yan sandan tarayya na Mozambiƙue ne suka kama ɗan jaridar a 5 ga Janairu, a lokacin da yake ɗaukar hoton waɗanda suka tsira daga wani hari a Cabo Delgado.

translation.en: Amade was then taken to a military quarter of the Defense Forces of Mozambique in the district of Mueda, despite not being a member of the armed forces.
translation.ha: Daga nan sai aka tafi da Amade zuwa ga sansanin soji na hukumar tsaro ta Mozambiƙue a lardin Mueda, duk da cewa shi ba mamba hukumar soji ba ne.

translation.en: After a few weeks, he was transferred to a civilian prison to legalize his detention in Pemba, capital of Cabo Delgado .
translation.ha: Bayan 'yan makwanni, sai aka mayar da shi zuwa ga gidan yarin farar hula domin a sami halaccin tsare shi a Pemba, babban birnin Cabo Delgado.

translation.en: After he arrived at the civilian prison, Amade contacted the Mozambican Order of Lawyers and reported having experienced torture at the hands of Mozambican armed forces, who he says beat him and deprived him of food.
translation.ha: Bayan ya isa gidan yarin farar hula, sai Amade ya nemi ƙungiyar Lauyoyi ta Mozambiƙue ya bayar da labarin cewa an azabtar da shi a hannun sojojin Mozambiƙue, waɗanda ya ce sun doke shi kuma sun hana shi abinci.

translation.en: Many individuals and media freedom groups have spoken out in his Abubacar's defense, saying that his arrest and detention have threatened the exercise of free expression.
translation.ha: Mutane da yawa da ƙungiyoyin 'yancin kafafen yaɗa labarai sun yi maganganu na kariya ga Abubacar, suna nuna cewa kama shi da tsare shi da aka yi suna kawo barazana ga 'yancin faɗin albarkacin baki.

translation.en: The Media Institute of Southern Africa, which monitors media rights and activities in the region, spoke out strongly against Amade's detention:
translation.ha: Cibiyar Yaɗa Labarai ta Kudancin Afirka, wadda take kula da haƙƙoƙin 'yan jaridu da aikace-aikacensu a yankin, sun yi magana da kakkausar murya don nuna ƙin amincewa da tsare Amade:

translation.en: Abubacar’s prolonged detention by the military is a violation of his rights as well as his arrest under unconfirmed charges.
translation.ha: Daɗewar tsarewar da sojoji suka yi wa Abubakar danne haƙƙinsa ne, sannan da kuma tsarewar da aka yi masa a kan tuhume-tuhumen da ba a tabbatar ba.

translation.en: The Mozambican government is setting a bad precedent in the violation of free expression and access to information in the region.
translation.ha: Gwamnatin Mozambiƙue tana barin mummunar tarihi ta wajen danne 'yancin faɗin albarkacin baki da kuma damar samun bayanai a yankin.

translation.en: Amnesty International also released a statement:
translation.ha: Ita ma ƙungiyar Zaman Lafiya ta Duniya ta yi bayani:

translation.en: Translation Original Quote
translation.ha: Fassara Abin da aka faɗa na ainihi

translation.en: Amade Abubacar is a respected journalist who was recording testimony from people who fled deadly attacks in Cabo Delgado when he was arrested by police.
translation.ha: Amade Abubacar ɗan jarida ne mai mutumci wanda yake ɗaukar rahoto game da abin da mutanen da suka gudu da harin Cabo Delgado suke faɗa a lokacin da 'yan sanda suka kama shi.

translation.en: This is the latest demonstration of contempt coming from Mozambican authorities and directed at freedom of expression and freedom of the press...[authorities] view journalists as a threat and [thus they] are treated as criminals.
translation.ha: Wannan shi ne nuna rashin gamsuwa na baya-bayan nan daga mahukuntan Mozambiƙue wanda suke hanƙoron 'yan faɗin albarkacin baki da 'yancin yaɗa labarai da shi [mahunkunta] suna ganin 'yan jarida a matsayin barazana... [don haka su] ana ɗaukar su a matsayin masu laifi.

translation.en: The campaign has also spread on Twitter, with the creation of hashtags like #FreeAmade to advocate for the liberation of Amade.
translation.ha: Wannan kamfen ɗin ya kuma watsu a Tuwita, tare da martani na hashtag kamar #FreeAmade domin goyon bayan samun 'yancin Amade

translation.en: For the first time in Brazil's history, there is an indigenous woman in the National Congress
translation.ha: A karon fari a tarihin Barazil, akwai mace 'yar asalin ƙasa a majalisar ƙasa.

translation.en: Joenia was the first indigenous woman to have a Law degree in Brazil.
translation.ha: Joenia ita ce mace ta farko da ta fara samun digirin Shari'a a Barazil.

translation.en: Image: Screenshot of video by United Nations Web TV.
translation.ha: Hoto: hoton kan waya na bidiyon wadda tashar intanet ta Majalisar ɗinkin Duniya.

translation.en: In 1997, Joenia Wapichana became the first indigenous woman in Brazil to obtain a law degree.
translation.ha: A 1997, Joenia Wapichana ta zama mace ta farko 'yan asalin yankin a Barazil wadda ta fara samun digiri a Shari'a.

translation.en: Eleven years later, she was the first indigenous person ever to defend a case in the Supreme Court.
translation.ha: Bayan shekaru sha ɗaya, ita ce 'yar asalin yankin ta farko da ta fara kare ƙara a kotun ƙoli.

translation.en: And in October 2018 Joenia earned yet another distinction, becoming the first indigenous woman elected to the National Congress.
translation.ha: Kuma a Oktoban 2018, Joenia ta ƙara samun wani tagomashin, ta zama mace 'yar asalin yankin ta farko da aka zaɓa a majalisar ƙasa.

translation.en: Her 8,491 votes elected her to one of the eight seats destined to her home state, Roraima.
translation.ha: ƙuri'unta guda 8,491 su ne suka ba ta damar samun lashe kujera ɗaya daga cikin takwas ɗin da jiharta ta samu ta Roraima.

translation.en: The only time Brazil had an indigenous congressman was in 1986 — Mario Juruna, of Xavante ethnicity, was elected in 1983.
translation.ha: Lokaci ɗaya da Barazil ta samu ɗan majalisa nata na kanta shi ne a 1986 - Mario Juruna, na ƙabilar ɗaɓante, wanda aka zaɓe a 1983.

translation.en: Born in a Wapichana tribe, Joenia moved to Boa Vista, Roraima's state capital, when she was eight years old.
translation.ha: Joenia wadda aka haifa daga ƙabilar Wapchana, ta koma Boa ɓista, babban birnin jihar Roraima, a lokacin tana da shekaru takwas.

translation.en: She juggled her law degree with a job at an accountant’s office and, she said in a recent interview, graduated a year earlier than expected, fifth in her class, and amongst the children of Roraima's oligarchy.
translation.ha: Ta haɗa digirinta na lauyanci da wani aikin a ofishin akawu, kuma ta bayyana a wata ganawa ta baya-bayan nan, ta kammala karatu shekara ɗaya kafin wa'adin kammalawarta, ita ce ta biyar a ajinsu, kuma tana cikin 'ya'yan gidan mulkin Roraima.

translation.en: In December 2018, already as an elected congresswoman, Joenia won a UN human rights prize for her outstanding achievement in promoting indigenous peoples’ rights.
translation.ha: A Disambar 2018, a lokacin har an zaɓe ta a matsayin 'yar majalisa, Joenia ta sami kyautar Majalisar ɗinkin Duniya ta kare haƙƙin al'umma, saboda matuƙar ƙoƙarinta wajen samuwar cigaban haƙƙoƙin mutane 'yan ƙasa.

translation.en: The same recognition has been given to Nelson Mandela and Malala.
translation.ha: An bayar da irin wannan tagomashi ga Nelson Mandela da Malala.

translation.en: Joenia Wapichana defending an indigenous cause at the Supreme Court.
translation.ha: Joenia Wapichana tana kare muradun 'yan ƙasa a Babbar Kotu.

translation.en: Image: Screenshot of YouTube video/Brazil's Supreme Court.
translation.ha: Hote: Hoton waya na bidiyon Youtube/Babban Kotun Barazil.

translation.en: Crossroads
translation.ha: Tsallaka titi

translation.en: Joênia made history in 2008 when she argued a case brought by five indigenous groups to have their land officially demarcated as an Indigenous Territory, a type of tenure that confers indigenous peoples inalienable rights over their traditional homelands.
translation.ha: Joenia ta kafa tarihi a 2008 a lokacin da ta ƙalubalanci wata rigima da wasu ƙungiyoyin 'yan ƙasa biyar suka kawo, domin a shata musu ƙasarsu a hukumanci a matsayin ƙasarsu, irin ƙudurin da yake ba wa 'yan ƙasa babbar dama a kan garuruwansu na asali.

translation.en: The court ruled in favor of the indigenous groups, who now are permanent possessors of the largest Indigenous Territory in Brazil — the lands of Raposa Terra do Sol, located in the state of Roraima.
translation.ha: Kotun ta yanke hukuncin da ya goyi bayan 'yan ƙasa, waɗanda a yanzu su ne mamallaka na dindindin na mafi yawan yankunan Barazil - yankunan Raposa Terra do Sol, waɗanda suke a jihar Roraima.

translation.en: Meanwhile, Jair Bolsonaro, still a congressman at that time, insulted an indigenous activist who had attended a public hearing at the Chamber of Deputies about the Raposa Terra do Sol demarcation.
translation.ha: Haka kuma, Jair Bolsonaro, wanda yake a matsayin ɗan majalisa a wannan lokaci, ya zagi wani ɗan gwagwarmaya ɗan ƙasa wanda ya zo wajen sauraren ra'ayoyin jama'a na ƙungiyar mataimakan shugabanni game da shata iyakar Raposa Terra do Sol.

translation.en: "You should go outside and eat grass to keep with your origins," Bolsonaro said on the occasion.
translation.ha: "Sai ku je waje ku ci ciyawa don ku cigaba da riƙe asalinku," Bolsonaro ya faɗa a yayin taron.

translation.en: Shortly after his electoral victory in 2018, Bolsonaro brought up Raposa Terra do Sol again as an example of an indigenous territory whose economic potential should be exploited.
translation.ha: Jim kaɗan bayan samun nasararsa ta zaɓe a 2018, sai Bolsorano ya kuma kawo maganar Raposa Terra do Sol a matsayin misalin yankin 'yan ƙasa wanda ya kamata a amfana daga abubuwan tattalin arziƙinsu.

translation.en: He told reporters:
translation.ha: Ya gaya wa 'yan jaridu:

translation.en: Translation Original Quote
translation.ha: Fassara Abin da aka faɗa na ainihi

translation.en: It’s the richest area in the world. You can exploit it in a rational manner.
translation.ha: Ita ce mafi arziƙin ɓangarori a duniya. Za ka iya amfanuwa da ita ta hanyar da ta dace.

translation.en: And, from the indigenous’ side, giving them royalties and integrating them to society.
translation.ha: Kuma, daga yankin 'yan ƙasa, ba su hasafi da kuma sanya su a cikin al'umma.

translation.en: Ten years ago, with red painting on her face, in the tradition of her ethnicity, Joenia mixed Portuguese and her native language to remind the Justices that around three million US dollars circulated within those lands every year without that counting towards the Brazil's economy.
translation.ha: Shekaru goma da suka shuɗe, tare da wani launin ja a fuskarta, a al'adar ƙabilarta, Joenia ta haɗa harshen Portugues da harshenta na asali domin ta tunatar da masu shari'ar cewa kusan dalar Amurka miliyan uku da suke jujjuyawa a waɗancan ƙasashe a duk shekara ba tare da wannan yana da wani tasiri a tattalin arziƙin Barazil ba.

translation.en: "We are slandered and discriminated inside our own land", she said.
translation.ha: "Ana ci mana mutunci ana ƙyamarmu a cikin garinmu", ta faɗa.

translation.en: Image: The Institute for Inclusive Security, CC 2.0
translation.ha: Hoto: Cibiyar Shigo da kowa cikin harkar Tsaro, CC 2.0

translation.en: A formidable opponent
translation.ha: Wani shiryayyen abokin adawa

translation.en: While she prepared to take her congressional seat as an opponent of Bolsonaro’s government, she told reporters at Folha de São Paulo, a national newspaper:
translation.ha: Duk da cewa ta shirya karɓar kujerarta ta majalisa a matsayin mai adawa da gwamanatin Bolsonaro, ta gayawa 'yan jarida a Folha de Sao Paulo, a jaridar ƙasa:

translation.en: Translation Original Quote
translation.ha: Fassara Abin da aka faɗa na ainihi

translation.en: Why does he [Bolsonaro] persecute indigenous people so much?
translation.ha: Me ya sa shi [Bolsonaro] yake zaluntar 'yan ƙasa sosai?

translation.en: What is the reason for such hate and appetite for retreat?
translation.ha: Me ye dalilin wannan irin tsanar da son zalunci?

translation.en: We have tourism, traditional medicine, a vast biodiversity in the Amazon.
translation.ha: Muna da yankunan ziyara da maganin gargajiya da abubuwan halittu daban-daban a dajin.

translation.en: We need to change this belief that we are a hindrance to development, that we are hurting A or B.
translation.ha: Muna buƙatar mu sauya wannan fahimtar cewa mu matsala ne ga cigaba ko kuma muna illata A ko B.

translation.en: We must become protagonists ourselves as well.
translation.ha: Dole mu zamanto masu kare gaskiya da kanmu kuma.

translation.en: Hitting the ground running
translation.ha: Farawa

translation.en: Brazil's Congress took office in February 2019 and Joênia began her term as the leader of her party, Rede Sustentabilidade (or Sustainability Network in Portuguese), in the Chamber of Deputies, the federal legislature's lower house.
translation.ha: Majalisar Barazil ta kama aiki a Fabarairun 2019 kuma Joenia ta fara wa'adinta a matsayin shugabar jam'iyyarta, Rede Sustentabilidade (ko Haɗaka Mai ɗorewa da Portuguese), a majalisar mataimakan shugabanni, a ƙaramar majalisar zartarwa ta tarayya.

translation.en: Rede was founded by former Environment Minister Marina Silva, who despite losing three consecutive presidential elections is a household name in Brazil's environmental activism.
translation.ha: Tsohon ministan muhalli Marina Silɓa ne ya kafa Rede, wanda duk da cewa ya faɗi a takarar shugabancin ƙasa har sau uku a jere, amma sunansa ya ratsa ko'ina a harkar gwagwarmayar al'umma a Barazil.

translation.en: Following the dam disaster in Brumadinho, a tragedy that killed over 160 people and destroyed all life at the Paraopeba River, Joenia presented her first bill proposal, which renders environmental crimes that seriously affect ecosystems, human health, and lives, "heinous crimes", a type of offense that incurs in more severe penalties.
translation.ha: Bayan wannan annobar ta dam a Brumadinho, mummunan lamarin ya yi sanadiyyar sama da mutane 160 kuma ya halaka duk wata rayuwa a ruwan Paraopeba, Joenia ta fara gabatar da ƙudurinta na farko, lafiyar mutane da rayuwa, "muggan laifuka" nau'in laifin da yake jawo hukunci mai tsanani.

translation.en: A day before taking office, the congresswoman told Folha de Boa Vista, a local newspaper from her home state, that the bill addresses private corporations’ carelessness with the environment:
translation.ha: Kwana ɗaya kafin fara aiki, 'yar majalisar ta gaya wa Folha de Boa ɓista, wata jarida a jiharta, ƙudurin ya yi magana ne game da sakaci da muhalli na ma'aikatu masu zaman kansu:

translation.en: Translation Original Quote
translation.ha: Fassara Abin da aka faɗa na ainihi

translation.en: We are concerned with the government's policies of weakening mechanisms that were created to protect a healthy environment, as foreseen in our Constitution, and the associated social impacts.
translation.ha: Mun damu da shirye-shiryen gwamnati na salon rashin karsashi waɗanda aka ƙirƙiro domin a kare muhalli mai lafiya, kamar yadda aka kirdada a kundin tsarin mulkinmu, da kuma sauran sakamakon muhalli da suke da alaƙa.

translation.en: [Among those mechanisms], for instance, there is the environmental licensing process, [which helps curb] the lack of accountability by companies and the low power of control by the State.
translation.ha: [A cikin irin waɗannan dabarun], alal misali, akwai hanyar yi wa muhalli lasisi, [wadda take taimakawa wajen daƙile] rashin adalci daga kamfanoni da rashin ƙarfin kulawa daga gwamnati.

translation.en: Speaking with the BBC, Joenia says her top priority in Congress will be the demarcation of indigenous lands:
translation.ha: A yayin da take magana da BBC, Joenia ta ce babban abin da za ta ba wa muhimmanci a majalisa shi ne shata iyakar filayen 'yan ƙasa:

translation.en: Translation Original Quote
translation.ha: Fassara Abin da aka faɗa na ainihi

translation.en: If on one hand you have half a dozen ruralists, on the other there is a whole population of minorities that see themselves represented by me in there.
translation.ha: Idan a ɗaya hannun kana da rashin dozin na ƙauyawa, a ɗayan kuma akwai gabaɗaya al'ummar ƙananan ƙabilu waɗanda suke ganin kansu ni nake wakiltar su a can.

translation.en: It’s a group that needs representation. The old politics is made out of people who only think about individual gains. I will bring collective values.
translation.ha: Rukuni ne da yake buƙatar wakilci. Tsohuwar siyasa ta kafu da mutane waɗanda su kullum tunaninsu mai za su samu. Zan kawo abin da ya shafi kowa.

translation.en: Burundi: Scribble on the president's picture — go to jail
translation.ha: Burundi: A rubuce a kan hoton shugaban ƙasa - tafi kurkuku

translation.en: Scribblers in solidarity
translation.ha: Masu rubutu a goyon baya

translation.en: President Jacob Zuma visits Burundi on February 25, 2016.
translation.ha: Shugaba Jacob Zuma ya kai ziyara Burundi a 25 ga Fabarairu, 2016.

translation.en: Photo Credit: Government ZA. Flickr, CC licence.
translation.ha: Asalin hoto: ZA na gwamnati. Flickr, lasisin CC.

translation.en: Six students were detained on Tuesday, March 12, in Kirundo province in northeast Burundi for scribbling on pictures of President Pierre Nkurunziza in five textbooks.
translation.ha: An kama ɗalibai shida ranar Talata, 12 ga Maris a lardin Kirundo a arewa masu gabashin Burundi a kan laifin yin zane a kan hoton shugaba Pierre Nkurunziza a littattafan karatu biyar.

translation.en: The students were accused of "insulting the head of state."
translation.ha: An zargi ɗaliban da "shugaban ƙasa."

translation.en: The National Federation of Associations Engaged in Children's Welfare in Burundi (FENADEB) reported that another student, 13, had been immediately released because he was a minor under the age of 15.
translation.ha: Haɗakar ƙungiyoyin da suka shafi walwalar yara ta ƙasa a Burundi (FENADEB) ta bayar da rahoton cewa wani ɗalibin ɗan shekaru 13, an sallame shi da wurwuri saboda cewa shi ƙarami ne bai kai shekaru 15 ba.

translation.en: Three students were reportedly provisionally released on Friday, March 15, but, the remaining three were kept in custody.
translation.ha: An bayar da rahoton sakin ɗaliban a kan wasu sharuɗa a ranar Juma'a 15 ga Maris, amma ragowar ukun suna hannu.

translation.en: The girls, aged 15 to 17, if found guilty, risk up to five years in prison for insulting the president.
translation.ha: Yan mata, masu shekaru 15 zuwa 17, in an kama su da laifi, za su iya fuskantar har shekaru biyar a kurkuku saboda zagin shugaban ƙasa.

translation.en: Iwacu newspaper reported that families affected were deeply distressed.
translation.ha: Jaridar Iwacu ta bayar da rahoton cewa iyalan da abin da ya shafa suna cikin tsananin damuwa.

translation.en: Scribbling [on the president’s picture] is a punishable offense under the Burundian law, according to a Reuters report.
translation.ha: Yin zane [a kan hoton shugaban ƙasa] laifi ne da yake da hukunci a ƙarƙashin dokar Burundi, kamar yadda rahoton Reuters ya nuna.

translation.en: However, the age of the offenders may serve as a “mitigating circumstance” in these students’ trial.
translation.ha: Sai dai shekarun masu laifin za su iya zama "dalilin sassauci" a shari'ar waɗannan ɗaliban.

translation.en: As a teacher anonymously noted, the textbooks had not been checked for several years and are often shared by students, so it is difficult to know who marked them.
translation.ha: Kamar yadda wani malami ya faɗa a asirce, ba a duba littattafan karatun ba tsawon shekaru kuma ana yaɗa su ga ɗalibai, don haka akwai wahala a gane wanda ya yi musu alama.

translation.en: A similar episode occurred in 2016, following the controversy over the president’s third term, where high school students scribbled on textbook pictures of Nkurunziza.
translation.ha: Irin wannan abin ya taɓa faruwa a 2016, wanda ya biyo bayan taƙaddamar zango na uku na shugaban, a lokacin da ɗaliban manyan makarantu suka yi rubutu a kan hotunan Nkurunziza na littattafan karatu.

translation.en: Authorities took this as a serious insult and expelled hundreds of students from various schools across the country.
translation.ha: Mahukunta sun ɗauki wannan a matsayin wani babban zagi kuma suka kori ɗaruruwan ɗalibai daga makarantu daban-daban a faɗin ƙasar.

translation.en: Eleven students were charged with "insulting the head of state" and "threatening state security", although they were reportedly later cleared.
translation.ha: An kama ɗalibai goma sha ɗaya da laifin "zagin shugaban ƙasa" da kuma "barazana ga tsaron ƙasa" duk da cewa daga baya an sami rahoton wanke su.

translation.en: These actions were highly criticized.
translation.ha: An soki waɗannan abubuwan sosai.

translation.en: Zeid Ra'ad Al Hussein, United Nations High Commissioner for Human Rights, issued a statement on June 29, 2016:
translation.ha: Babban kwamishinan Majalisar ɗinkin Duniya a kan haƙƙin al'mma, Zeid Ra'ad Al Hussein ya fitar da bayani a 29 ga Yuni, 2016:

translation.en: I am dismayed by continuing reports of the suspension and arrest of schoolchildren and students for having scribbled on pictures of the president in textbooks.
translation.ha: Na yi baƙin ciki game da rahotannin cigaba da dakatarwa da kama ɗalibai 'yan makaranta don sun yi zane a kan hotunan shugaban ƙasa a littattafan karatu.

translation.en: Nkurunziza, the ‘eternal supreme guide’
translation.ha: Nkurunziza, 'babban jagora na gabaɗaya'

translation.en: Pierre Nkurunziza has been president of Burundi since 2005.
translation.ha: Pierre Nkurunzia ya kasance shugaban ƙasar Burundi tun 2005.

translation.en: In 2015, he was controversially nominated by his party for a third term in office.
translation.ha: A 2015, jam'iyyarsa ta zaɓe shi a wani lamari na hargitsi domin yin zango na uku a mulki.

translation.en: In March last year, Nkurunziza was named "eternal supreme guide" by his political party, the National Council for the Defense of Democracy-Forces for the Defense of Democracy (CNDD-FDD).
translation.ha: A Maris ɗin bara, an sanya wa Nkurunziza sunan "baban jagora na gabaɗaya" daga jam'iyyarsa, Hukumar ƙasa ta Kula da Dakarun Dimukuraɗiyya domin kare Dimukuraɗiyya (CNDD-FDD).

translation.en: Evariste Ndayishimiye, CNDD-FDD’s secretary general explained why that title was conferred on Nkurunziza:
translation.ha: Babban sakataren CNDD-FDD, Eɓariste Ndayishimiye, ya yi bayanin dalilin da ya sa aka ba wa Nkurunziza wannan laƙabin:

translation.en: He is our leader, therefore in our party, no one is comparable to him.
translation.ha: Shi ne shugabanmu, don haka a jam'iyyarmu ba kwatankwacinsa.

translation.en: He is our parent, he is the one who advises us.
translation.ha: Shi ne iyayenmu, shi ne wanda yake ba mu shawara.

translation.en: That is why I ask all our members to respect that because a home without the man (its head) can be overlooked by anybody.
translation.ha: Wannan shi ne dalilin da ya sa na nemi dukkanin mambobinmu su mutunta haka domin gida idan ba maigida (shugabansa) kowa ma zai iya wulaƙanta shi.

translation.en: For us, we have the best.
translation.ha: A wajenmu, muna da nagari.

translation.en: While the CNDD-FDD downplayed the title, Nkurunziza’s reinforced status as the "eternal supreme guide" has made it difficult for anyone to disagree with his choices, including his move to change the two-term limit enshrined in the country’s constitution.
translation.ha: A lokacin da CNDD-FDD ta raina laƙabi, Nkurunziza ya ƙara ƙarfafa matsayin cewa "babban jagora na gabaɗaya" ya sanya da wahala wani ya iya ƙin amincewa da zaɓuɓɓukansa, wanda ya haɗa da yunƙurinsa na sauya tsarin zango biyu wanda yake rubuce a kundin tsarin mulkin ƙasar.

translation.en: This reflects a centralization of power in the ruling party around Nkurunziza and supporters, and of the party’s control of state institutions.
translation.ha: Wannan ya nuna yadda aka mayar da iko a cikin jam'iyyar zuwa ga Nkurunziza da masu goyon baya, da yadda jam'iyyar take riƙe da manufofin ƙasa.

translation.en: Scribblers in solidarity
translation.ha: Masu rubutu a goyon baya

translation.en: Netizens have taken to scribbling on pictures of President Nkurunziza in protest through two hashtags: #Nkurunziza and #Burundi:
translation.ha: Masu mu'amala da intanet sun koma yin zane-zane a kan hotunan Shugban Nkurunziza don nuna ƙin amincewa ta hanyar hashtag guda biyu: #Nkurunziza da #Burundi:

translation.en: Crackdown on criticism
translation.ha: Murƙushe suka

translation.en: Burundi's government has become increasingly sensitive to criticism since 2015, after a failed coup, clashes with rebel groups, criticisms of rights abuses, sanctions, economic hardships and a refugee crisis.
translation.ha: Gwamnatin Burundi ta ƙara zama mai kula da suka tun 2015, bayan juyin mulkin da bai yi nasara ba dafaɗace-faɗace da 'yan tawaye da sukar danne haƙƙin al'umma da matsanancin halin tattalin arziƙi da kuma matsalolin 'yan gudun hijira.

translation.en: Nkurunziza’s third term bid was opposed by the European Union, and the United Nations, who demanded a restoration of stability before elections.
translation.ha: ƙungiyar haɗakar ƙasashen Turai sun ƙalubalanci yunƙurin zango na uku na Nkurunziza, inda suka nemi dawo da zaman lafiya kafin yin zaɓuɓɓuka.

translation.en: Faced with these challenges, a siege mentality hardened, and authorities clamped down more harshly on perceived threats.
translation.ha: A lokacin da suke fuskantar waɗannan matsalolin, sai yanayin danne al'umma ya ƙara ta'azzara, kuma mahukunta suka ƙara tsananta farautar duk wani abu da suke gani a matsayin barazana.

translation.en: The Human Rights Watch May 2018 special report discovered that Burundian state security forces, intelligence services, and members of the ruling party’s youth league, the Imbonerakure, carried out brutal, targeted attacks on opponents or suspected opponents, human rights activists, and journalists.
translation.ha: Rahoto na musamman na Human Right Watch na Mayun 2018 ya binciko cewa jami'an tsaron Burundi da jami'an asiri da mambobin jam'iyya mai ci ɓangaren matasa, Imbonerakure, sun kai munanan hare-hare a kan 'yan adawa ko waɗanda ake zargin 'yan adawa ne da masu rajin kare haƙƙin al'umma da 'yan jaridu.

translation.en: "Killing an estimated 1,700 people and forcibly disappearing, raping, torturing, beating, arbitrarily detaining, and intimidating countless others."
translation.ha: "An kashe kusan kimanin mutane 1,700 sannan da ɓatarwa da fyaɗe da azabtarwa da duka da kama da tsoratar da wasu da yawa."

translation.en: This has led to a refugee crisis that has seen Burundians fleeing particularly to Tanzania, Rwanda, the Democratic Republic of Congo (DRC) and Uganda.
translation.ha: Wannan ya jawo matsalar 'yan gudun hijira wanda ya jawo mutanen Burundi suka dinga guduwa zuwa Tanzaniya da Rwanda da Republic of Congo (DRC) da kuma Uganda.

translation.en: While thousands have returned, the United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees recorded over 347,000 total Burundian refugees in February 2019 UNHCR asserts:
translation.ha: Duk da cewa da yawa sun dawo, babban kwamishin 'yan gudun hijira na Majalisar ɗinkin Duniya ya samar da ƙididdigar sama da mutanen Burundi 'yan gudun hijira 347,000 a Fabarairun 2019 UNHCR ya nuna:

translation.en: ...Political unrest in Burundi took a deadly turn in 2015 after the president announced plans to seek a third term.
translation.ha: … Rashin zaman lafiya na siyasa a Burundi ya ta'azzara a 2015 bayan shugaban ƙasa ya bayyana shirin sake neman wa'adi na uku.

translation.en: Street protests led to violent clashes, and hundreds of thousands fled to nearby countries in search of safety.”
translation.ha: Zanga-zangar kan tituna ta jawo munanan faɗace-faɗace, kuma ɗaruruwan dubunnan mutane suka gudu zuwa maƙotan ƙasashe na kusa domin neman mafaka."

translation.en: Earlier this month, Burundi closed the United Nations human rights office after 23 years, saying it was no longer needed.
translation.ha: A farkon wannna watan, Burundi ta rufe ofishin kare haƙƙin al'umma na Majalisar ɗinkin Duniya bayan shekaru 23, inda suka bayyana ba a buƙatarsa.

translation.en: The government was incensed with former United Nations High Commissioner for Human Rights, Zeid Ra'ad Al Hussein, who described Nkurunziza’s Burundi as one of the "most prolific slaughterhouses of humans in recent times" in February 2018.
translation.ha: Gwamnatin ta kufula da tsohon babban kwamishinan Majalisar ɗinkin Duniya na haƙƙin al'umma, Zeid Ra'ad Al Hussein, wanda ya bayyana Burundi a ƙarƙashin Nkurunziza a matsayin "mafi girman mayanka ta mutane a wannan lokacin" a Fabarairun 2018.

translation.en: Media outlet closures, harassment of opponents, and clampdowns on NGOs and restrictions in political space for alternative narratives and arguments.
translation.ha: Rufe kafafen yaɗa labarai da muzgunawa 'yan adawa da murƙushe ƙungiyoyi masu zaman kansu da takura damar 'yan siyasa wajen bayyana wani matsayi ko mayar da martani.

translation.en: For example, rights activist Germain Rukiki who documented acts of torture committed by Nkurunziza’s regime was sentenced to 32 years in jail in 2018 for participation in an insurrectional movement, undermining state security and rebellion.
translation.ha: A misali, an yake wa ɗan gwagwarmaya Germain Rukiki wanda ya taskace ayyukan azabtarwar da gwamnatin Nkurunziza ta yi, shekaru 32 a kurkuku a 2018 don ya shiga wani gangami na tunzurawa da cin dunduniyar ƙasa da tsaro da kuma tawaye.

translation.en: Rukiki's trial was also marred by irregularities and came weeks before the controversial constitutional referendum.
translation.ha: Shari'ar Rukiki ta fuskanci tangarɗar rashin daidaito kuma an yi ta ne 'yan makwanni kafin jin ra'ayi don gyaran kundin tsarin mulki wanda ake cece-kuce a kai.

translation.en: The "scribbling affair" is also indicative of the government’s increasingly conservative, moralizing approach, including mandatory marriages for cohabiting non-married couples in 2017, clampdowns on prostitution and begging.
translation.ha: Lamarin "zane-zane" wani abu ne da ya nuna yadda gwamnatin take da ra'ayin riƙau da tunkarar lamura, wanda ya haɗa da auren dole ga mutanen da suke zaman dadiro a shekarar 2017 da hana karuwanci da bara.

translation.en: CEO of carpooling service disinvited from interview on Russian state media after producer found out she was a woman
translation.ha: An fasa gayyatar shugabar ayyukan tafiyar haɗaka don yin ganawa a kafar yaɗa labarai ta Rasha, bayan mai shirya shirin ya gano cewa mace ce

translation.en: The channel said their audience had "certain stereotypes"
translation.ha: Tashar ta ce masu sauraron su suna da "wani irin ƙyama"

translation.en: Cardboard cutout of CEO Irina Reyder's photograph in BlaBlaCar's Russian office. Photo Irina Reyder's Facebook page
translation.ha: Hoton da ake yanke daga kwali na shugaba Iirina Reyder a BlaBlaBlaCar ofishin Rasha. Hoto daga shafin Fesbuk na Irina Reyder.

translation.en: Irina Reyder, the CEO of the Russian affiliate of carpooling service BlaBlaCar, says she was disinvited from an interview with state-owned Channel One when the program’s editor realized she was a woman.
translation.ha: Irina Reyder, shugaban wani kamfanin Rasha na tafiyar haɗaka a mota na BlaBlaCar, ta ce an fasa gayyatar ta ganawa da wata tashar Channel One ta ƙasa a yayin da editan shirin ya gane ita mace ce.

translation.en: Reyder wrote on her Facebook page about the incident. She says she was listening in on the call between Channel One’s producer and BlaBlaCar’s PR officer and recorded the exchange between them:
translation.ha: Reyder ta rubuta a shafinta na Fesbuk game da faruwar lamarin. Ta ce tana sauraron kiran waya da aka yi tsakanin mai shirin na Channel One da kakakin BlaBlaCar kuma ta naɗi sautin bayanan da aka yi tsakaninsu:

translation.en: Translation Original Quote
translation.ha: Fassara Abin da aka faɗa na ainihi

translation.en: E (an editor for Good Morning show): Here’s the format: our reporter is driving a car while interviewing your expert.
translation.ha: E (editan shirin Barka da Hantsi): Wannan shi ne tsarin: mai kawo rahotonmu yana tuƙa mota a yayin da yake ganawa da ƙwararren ku.

translation.en: PR (PR officer for BlaBlaCar): Yes, great.
translation.ha: PR (Kakakin BlaBlaCar): E, ya yi.

translation.en: E: And who will be the expert?
translation.ha: E: Kuma waye zai zama ƙwararren?

translation.en: PR: Our CEO Irina Reyder.
translation.ha: PR: Shugabarmu Irina Reyder.

translation.en: E: Oh... you had a great guy once, didn’t you?
translation.ha: E: Oh… kuna da wani mutum a da, haka ne?

translation.en: PR: Yes, we had Alexey Lazorenko as CEO, now it’s Irina Reyder.
translation.ha: PR: E, muna da Aleɗey Lazorenko a matsayin shugaba, yanzu kuma Irina Reyder ce.

translation.en: E: Yes, I know about the changes in your leadership last year.
translation.ha: E: E, na san sauyin da kuka yi a shugabancinku shekarar bara.

translation.en: But Irina won’t work as an expert.
translation.ha: Amma Irina ba za ta yi aiki a matsayin ƙwararriya ba.

translation.en: You see, our audience has certain stereotypes...
translation.ha: Ka ga, masu sauraronmu suna da wata irin ƙyama…

translation.en: You know, like when there’s a good lawyer.
translation.ha: Ka sani, kamar a lokacin da ake da ƙwararren lauya.

translation.en: It’s usually a man.
translation.ha: Yawanci namiji ne.

translation.en: Or someone who knows a lot about cars — a man, but not a woman.
translation.ha: Ko kuma wani wanda yake da masaniya da yawa game da motoci.

translation.en: Maybe you, Sergey, can give us an interview?
translation.ha: Wataƙila ko kai, Sergey, za ka iya ganawa da mu?

translation.en: When Reyder’s PR officer Sergey told the editor that there weren’t any male experts in the company, she says, the latter promised to come back later after consulting with their producer.
translation.ha: A lokacin da kakakin Reyder, Sergey, ya gaya wa editan cewa ba su da wani ƙwararren namiji a kamfanin, sai ta ce, na bayan ta yi alƙawarin dawowa bayan sun tattauna da mai gabatar da shirin nasu.

translation.en: On a call later, they told BlaBlaCar’s representative that the story's format had changed and they would be interviewing the service’s users instead.
translation.ha: A wani kiran waya daga baya, sun gaya wa BlaBlaCar cewa tsarin labarin ya sauya kuma za su gana ne da masu amfani da motoci a maimakon haka.

translation.en: “What do you think?
translation.ha: "Yaya kake gani?

translation.en: Will the new experts be expertly enough?
translation.ha: Shin sabon ƙwararren zai zama ƙwararre yadda ake so?

translation.en: Reyder asked her followers sarcastically.
translation.ha: Reyder ta tambayi mabiyanta a cikin gatse.

translation.en: In a comment to TJournal, a tech and social media news outlet.
translation.ha: A wani martani a mujallar T, wata kafar fasaha da dandalin sadarwa.

translation.en: Channel One’s own press office didn’t deny the veracity of the exchange, but insisted the approach was not sexist in nature.
translation.ha: Kafar yaɗa labaran Channel One ba su kore gaskiyar faruwar tattaunawar ba, amma sun dage a kan cewa hakan ba wai nuna wariya ba ne.

translation.en: However, their explanation didn’t offer solid support to that claim:
translation.ha: Sai dai, bayaninsu bai bayar da wani goyon baya mai ƙarfi ga abin ba:

translation.en: Translation Original Quote
translation.ha: Fassara Abin da aka faɗa na ainihi

translation.en: Two reporters, a young man and a woman, intend to demonstrate the difference between male and female approach to savings.
translation.ha: Masu ɗaukar rahotannin biyu, wani matashi wa matashiya, sun yi niyyar nuna bambanci tsakanin halayyar namiji da mace a wajen tanadi.

translation.en: The young woman reporter will be interviewing male experts, while the young man will be interviewing women.
translation.ha: Matashiyar mai rahoton za ta gana da wani ƙwararre, shi kuma matashin zai gana da mata.

translation.en: Because the woman reporter’s goal is to save on car rides, she will be speaking to a representative of a carpooling service (yes, because of the show’s structure, not gender inequality, that has to be a man.)
translation.ha: Saboda burin macen mai rahoton shi ne ta yi tanadi don hawa mota, za ta yi magana da wakilin kamfanin haɗakar tafiya a mota (e, saboda tsarin shirin, ba wai wariyar jinsi ba, dole ya zama namiji.)

translation.en: How a woman’s approach to savings is different from that of a man, Channel One didn’t elaborate.
translation.ha: Yadda mace take tsara tanadi ya sha bamban da na namiji, Channel One ba su yi ƙarin bayani ba.

translation.en: But the public wasn’t convinced either way, and the TV network's approach was met with criticism.
translation.ha: Amma al'umma ba su gamsu ba ta kowace hanya, kuma tsarin gidan Tɓn ya gamu da suka.

translation.en: BlaBlaCar’s CEO Irina Reyder said she was disinvited from the Good Morning show on Channel One by the editor when they found out she was a woman.
translation.ha: Shugabar BlaBlaCar, Irina Reyder ta ce editan ya fasa gayyatar ta shirin Barka da Hantsi ne a Channel One a lokacin da suka gano cewa ita mace ce.

translation.en: It’s quite surprising that there are still aspects to Channel One’s madness we haven’t known about.
translation.ha: Abin mamaki ne a ce akwai wasu ɓangarori na haukan Channel One wanda ba mu san da shi ba.

translation.en: Despite the significant backlash that Channel One faced online, Russia still has a long way to go in terms of gender equality.
translation.ha: Duk da ƙalubale mai yawa da Channel One ta fuskanta a intanet, ƙasar Rasha tana da sauran aiki sosai a ɓangaren daidaita jinsi.

translation.en: Russia ranks 75th among 149 countries surveyed by the World Economic Forum's 2018 Global Gender Gap Report, scoring good points for equal access to healthcare and education for women, but lacking in legislation protecting their rights.
translation.ha: Rasha ita ce ƙasa ta 75 a cikin ƙasashen da Cibiyar Tattalin Arziƙi ta Duniya ta yi bincike da suke da bambancin jinsi, sun samu maki masu kyau a ɓangaren damar samun lafiya da ilimin mata, amma suna ƙamfar dokokin da za su kare haƙƙoƙinsu.

translation.en: Russian feminists and their supporters often use social media and satire to shine a light on sexist customs and practices.
translation.ha: Masu rajin kare haƙƙin mata na Rasha da masu goyon bayansu sukan yi amfani da dandalin sadarwa da gatse domin haska al'adun da ayyukan wariyar jinsi.

translation.en: China's campaign against Christmas makes celebrating a difficult choice for citizens
translation.ha: Kamfen ɗin ƙasar Sin wajen ƙin Kirsimeti ya jawo yin bikin ya yi wahala ga 'yan ƙasa

translation.en: Written on the classroom boards: "Act and reject Western festival" and "Promote traditional culture, reject Western festival".
translation.ha: A rubuce a kan allunan ajujuwa: "Yi aiki kuma a guji Bukukuwan Yamma" kuma "A fifita al'adun gargajiya, a yi watsi da Bukukuwan Yamma".

translation.en: Images from Weibo.
translation.ha: Hoto daga Weibo.

translation.en: Christmas is approaching but instead of feeling joyful, many in mainland China have expressed frustration over China's ideological campaign against Christmas as a Western festival.
translation.ha: Kirsimeti tana ƙaratowa amma a maimakon murna, da yawa a cikin ƙasar Sin suna nuna damuwa da kamfen ɗin da ƙasar take yi na ƙyamar Kirsimeti a matsayin bikin Yammacin duniya.

translation.en: In 2017, the Communist Party of China's central committee and state council issued an official document entitled "Suggestions on the implementation of projects to promote and develop traditional Chinese culture excellence".
translation.ha: A 2017, babban kwamitin Jam'iyyar 'Yan Gurguzu ta Sin da majalisar ƙasa sun fitar da wasu bayanai na gwamnati da aka yi wa take da "shawarwari wajen tabbatar da shirye-shirye da bunƙasa kyawawan al'adun gargajiya na ƙasar Sin".

translation.en: They outlined a cultural revival project that lists Chinese festivals like the Lunar New Year and the Lantern Festival, among others, as cultural conventions worthy of celebration.
translation.ha: Sun jero wani shiri na bunƙasa al'adu wanda ya jero bukuwan ƙasar Sin kamar bikin shekara da bikin Lantern, da wasu, a matsayin wasu bukukuwan al'ada da ya kamata a dinga yi.

translation.en: To implement this policy, Chinese authorities have launched a series of ideological campaigns to crack down on non-Chinese celebrations.
translation.ha: Domin tabbatar da wannan ƙuduri, mahukunta ƙasar Sin sun fito da wasu dabaru da hanyoyin daƙile bukukuwan da ba na ƙasar ba.

translation.en: This year, just before Christmas, authorities in some cities such as Langfang, in Hebei province, have demanded shops to remove Christmas decorations on the streets and in window displays.
translation.ha: A wannan shekarar, kafin Kirsimeti da kaɗan, mahukunta a was garuruwan kamar Llangfng, a lardin Hebei, sun nemi kantuna da su cire kwalliyar Kirsimeti daga kan tituna da kuma nuna a kan tagogi.

translation.en: Anti-Western festival commentaries have flooded Chinese social media, making Christmas celebrations a difficult choice for some who feel they must keep their joy a secret.
translation.ha: Kalaman ƙin bukukuwan Yammacin duniya sun cika dandulan sadarwa na ƙasar Sin, wanda hakan ya sanya yin bikin Kirsimeti ya zama wani zaɓi mai wahala ga wasu da suke jin dole su yi farin cikinsu a sirrance.

translation.en: Weibo user Long Zhigao screen captured his WeChat newsfeed on Weibo to reveal aspects of the debate.
translation.ha: Wani mai amfani da Weibo LongZhigao ya ɗauki hoton hirarsa a dandalin hira na WeChat a Weibo domin ya bayyana wasu ɓangarorin muhawarar.

translation.en: The headlines on the feed are
translation.ha: Kanun bayanan da ke kan labarin su ne

translation.en: 1. Western festival is approaching.
translation.ha: 1. Bikin Yammacin duniya yana tahowa.

translation.en: To celebrate or not, that’s the question.
translation.ha: A yi murna ko kar a yi, wannan ita ce tambayar.

translation.en: 2. I am Chinese and I don’t celebrate Western festivals.
translation.ha: 2. Ni Basine ne kuma ba na murnar bukukuwan Yammacin duniya.

translation.en: 3. Say no to the celebration of Western festivals on the school campus.
translation.ha: 3. Ku kuji murnar bukukuwan Yammacin duniya a cikin makaranta.

translation.en: 4. The party-state has banned Western festivals.
translation.ha: 4. ƙasa ta haramta bukukuwan Yammacin duniya.

translation.en: The celebration of festivals is now a political issue.
translation.ha: Murnar bukukuwa yanzu ya zama siyasa.

translation.en: In addition to Christmas, the list of Western festivals also includes Valentine’s Day, Easter and Halloween, among others.
translation.ha: ƙari a kan Kirsimeti, jerin bukukuwan Yammacin sun haɗa da ranar Masoya da Ista da Halowin, da sauransu.

translation.en: A majority of the commentaries define Western festivals as "cultural invasion" or "national humiliation".
translation.ha: Da yawa daga cikin kalaman sun bayyana bukukuwan Yammacin duniya a matsayin "mamayar al'adu" ko "cin mutuncin ƙasa".

translation.en: For example, a widely circulated one said:
translation.ha: Misali, wani wanda aka yaɗa da yawa ya ce:

translation.en: Translation Original Quote
translation.ha: Fassara Abin da aka faɗa na ainihi

translation.en: If people of a nation are too enthusiastic in celebrating other nations’ festivals, it indicates that the country is suffered from extremely serious cultural invasion.
translation.ha: Idan mutanen wata ƙasa suna ta hanƙoron murnar bukukuwan wasu ƙasashe, wannan yana nuna lallai ƙasar tana fama da babban mamayar al'adu.

translation.en: If party members and government officials are not aware of this, it means that they are not politically sensitive and have lost their progressiveness.
translation.ha: Idan 'yan jam'iyya da mahukuntan gwamnati ba su san da wannan ba, ya nuna ba su da wayewar siyasa kuma sun rasa halinsu na son cigaba.

translation.en: The commentary references the history of the Eight-Nation Alliance, a coalition formed in response to the Boxer Rebellion in China between 1899 and 1901 when Chinese peasants rose up against foreign, colonial, Christian rule and culture.
translation.ha: Kalaman sun yi nuni ga wani tarihi na Haɗakar ƙasashe Takwas, wani ƙawance da aka yi domin yaƙar Tawayen Boɗer a ƙasar Sin, a tsakanin 1899 da 1901, a lokacin da talakawan manoman ƙasar Sin suka taso don ƙalubalantar al'adu da mulkin Kiristoci baƙi 'yan mulkin mallaka.

translation.en: It further argues that the birthday of Mao Zedong, the founding father of the People's Republic of China, should be treated as China’s Christmas:
translation.ha: Sun kuma tabbatar da cewa ranar haihuwar Mao Zedong, wanda ya samar da ƙasar Sin, ita ya kamata ta zama Kirsimetin ƙasar Sin.

translation.en: Translation Original Quote
translation.ha: Fassara Abin da aka faɗa na ainihi

translation.en: The first Chairman of the Republic of China Mao Zedong had saved people from misery.
translation.ha: Shugaban farko na ƙasar Sin, Mao Zedong ya tseratar da mutane daga bala'i.

translation.en: We should make his birthday Chinese Christmas.
translation.ha: Ya kamata mu mayar da ranar haihuwarsa Kirsimetin ƙasar Sin.

translation.en: Act and reject Western festivals.
translation.ha: A yi aiki a yi watsi da bukukuwan Yammacin Duniya.

translation.en: But many on Weibo found these arguments illogical.
translation.ha: Amma wasu da yawa a Weibo sun ga waɗannan bayanai a matsayin marasa kan gado.

translation.en: One commentator said:
translation.ha: Wani mai mayar da martani ya ce:

translation.en: Translation Original Quote
translation.ha: Fassara Abin da aka faɗa na ainihi

translation.en: When Westerners celebrate the Chinese Lunar New Year, Chinese people are so proud and see the phenomena as the revival of Chinese traditional culture...
translation.ha: A lokacin da Turawa suke murnar Sabuwar Shekarar ƙasar Sin, mutanen ƙasar Sin suna matuƙar farin ciki kuma suna ganin hakan a matsayin ƙara haɓaka al'adun gargajiya na ƙasar Sin…

translation.en: When Chinese people celebrate Western festivals, what's the point of labeling them as culture invasion?
translation.ha: Idan mutanen ƙasar Sin suka yi murnar bukukuwan Turawa, me ye hikimar laƙaba musu sunan mamayar al'adu?

translation.en: Young people celebrate Western festivals for fun and joy.
translation.ha: Matasa suna murnar bukukuwan Turawa ne saboda raha da jin daɗi.

translation.en: The festivals can boost consumption, what’s wrong with that?
translation.ha: Bukukuwan za su inganta alaƙa, me ye matsalar hakan?

translation.en: Some people try to draw connection between celebrating Christmas and the national humiliation that happened 160 years ago.
translation.ha: Wasu mutane suna so su alaƙanta tsakanin murnar Kirsimeti da wani rashin mutuncin da ya shafi ƙasa shekaru 160 da suka shuɗe.

translation.en: For what?
translation.ha: Saboda me?

translation.en: Social pressure, self-censorship
translation.ha: Matsin al'umma, yi wa kai bin diddigi

translation.en: The flood of anti-Christmas comments on social media has generated pressure for some social media users to self-censor.
translation.ha: Kwararowar kalaman ƙin Kirsimeti a dandulan sadarwa ya jawo matsi ga wasu masu amfani da dandulan su duba yanayinsu.

translation.en: A Weibo user expressed frustration:
translation.ha: Wani mai amfani da Weibo ya nuna damuwarsa:

translation.en: Translation Original Quote
translation.ha: Fassara Abin da aka faɗa na ainihi

translation.en: Christmas is approaching.
translation.ha: Kirsimeti yana ƙaratowa.

translation.en: In my friend circle, anti-Western festival camps and anti-anti Western festival camps are debating.
translation.ha: A cikin abokaina, gungun masu ƙin bukukuwan Turawa da gungun masu son bukukuwan Turawa suna muhawara.

translation.en: Whether one likes to celebrate or not is none of others’ business, why do people just have to force others to agree with their view?
translation.ha: Ko da mutum yana son ya yi murnar ko a'a ba abin da ya dami wani ba, me ya sa ku mutane kuke son ku tursasawa wasu su amince da ra'ayinku?

translation.en: Everyone standing on one side is too crowded.
translation.ha: Kowa yana tsaye a ɓangare ɗaya wajen ya yi jama'a da yawa.

translation.en: For those of us who are in the middle, in order to create a balance, we have to stand on the other side.
translation.ha: A wajen irinmu da muke a tsakiya, domin a yi adalci, dole mu koma ɓangare ɗaya.

translation.en: School notice against the celebration of Western festivals on campus.
translation.ha: Sanarwar makaranta don ƙyamar bukukuwan Turawa a makaranta.

translation.en: Pressure goes beyond social media platforms, extending to institutions such as schools and corporations.
translation.ha: Matsin ya wuce dandalin sadarwa, ya kai har zuwa cibiyoyi kamar makarantu da ma'aikatu.

translation.en: Some Weibo users have shared school notices that were distributed to students.
translation.ha: Wasu masu amfani da Weibo sun yaɗa sanarwar makarantu da aka rarrabawa ɗalibai.

translation.en: One of the notices (right) refers to the "Suggestions" mandate and urges teachers and students to resist Western style celebrations.
translation.ha: Wani daga cikin sanarwar (dama) ya nuna "Shawarwari" suna umarni da neman malamai da ɗalibai su ƙyamaci murnar bukukuwan Yammacin duniya.

translation.en: It also demands students to spread anti-Western messages to friends and family members on Wechat and other mobile messaging applications.
translation.ha: Sun kuma nemi ɗalibai da su yaɗa saƙonnin ƙyamar Yammacin duniya zuwa ga abokai da iyalai a Wechat da sauran manhajojin tura saƙonni.

translation.en: One mother was surprised to find her child rejecting her offer of a Christmas gift. She wrote on Weibo:
translation.ha: Wata uwa ta yi mamaki da ta ga ɗanta ya ƙi karɓar kyautar Kirsimeti. Ta rubuta a Weibo:

translation.en: Translation Original Quote
translation.ha: Fassara Abin da aka faɗa na ainihi

translation.en: Mother: Baby, what do you want for Christmas gift?
translation.ha: Uwa: ɗana, me kake so a matsayin kyautar Kirsimeti?

translation.en: Child: I will not celebrate Western festivals Christmas is not a Chinese people’s festival.
translation.ha: ɗa: Ba zan yi murnar bukuwan Turawa ba, Kirsimeti ba bikin mutanen ƙasar Sin ba ne.

translation.en: OK, you are definitely an obedient baby of the Party and the People.
translation.ha: Ya yi, lallai kai ɗa ne mai biyayya ga ƙasa da al'umma.

translation.en: However, high school and college students were more critical.
translation.ha: Amma ɗalibai manyan makarantu sun fi nuna adawa.

translation.en: One student questioned school policy on Weibo:
translation.ha: Wani ɗalibi ya ƙalubalanci dokar makarata a Weibo:

translation.en: Translation Original Quote
translation.ha: Fassara Abin da aka faɗa na ainihi

translation.en: The school has banned Christmas decorations on campus and forbidden students to exchange gifts so as to campaign against Western festivals.
translation.ha: Makaranta ta hana kwalliyar Kirsimeti a makaranta kuma sun haramta wa ɗalibai musayar kyaututtuka domin yin kamfen ɗin ƙyamar bukukuwan yammacin duniy.

translation.en: Are all these measures to enhance and promote Chinese culture or a sign of losing confidence on one’s own culture?
translation.ha: Duk waɗannan dabaru ne na haɓaka al'adun ƙasar Sin ko kuma alamu ne na rashin tabbaci a kan al'adun mutum?

translation.en: Some have chosen to celebrate the festival in secret. A Weibo user said:
translation.ha: Wasu sun zaɓi su yi murnar bukukuwan a asirce. Wani mai amfani da Weibo y faɗa:

translation.en: Translation Original Quote
translation.ha: Fassara Abin da aka faɗa na ainihi

translation.en: The company has forbidden the celebration of Western festivals. But the secretary in the personnel department has handed out a Christmas apple [common Christmas gift] to the staff members in secret.
translation.ha: Kamfanin ya haramta murnar bukukuwan Turawa. Amma sakataren sashen ma'aikata ya bayar da tufar Kirsimeti [mafi shaharar kyautar Kirsimeti] ga ma'aikata a asirce.

translation.en: Let’s wish for peace.
translation.ha: Bari mu yi fatan zaman lafiya.

translation.en: Another Weibo user expressed his view with a Christmas wish:
translation.ha: Wani mai amfani da Weibo ya bayyana ra'ayinsa ta hanyar fatan Kirsimeti:

translation.en: Translation Original Quote
translation.ha: Fassara Abin da aka faɗa na ainihi

translation.en: Merry Christmas!
translation.ha: Murnar Kirsimeti!

translation.en: I love you god!
translation.ha: Ina son ka abin bauta!

translation.en: Santa Claus, pls give me a big big sock with freedom in it.
translation.ha: Santa Claus, don Allah ka ba ni babbar babbar safa da 'yanci a cikinta.

translation.en: An all-female flight crew makes history in Mozambique
translation.ha: Jirgin sama na matuƙa mata zalla ya kafa tarihi a Mozambiƙue

translation.en: Mozambique's first all-female crew | Photo used with permission from Meck Antonio.
translation.ha: Tawagar mata zalla ta matuƙa jirgi ta farko ta Mozambiƙue An yi amfani da hoton da izini daga Meck Antonio.

translation.en: It is a historic day: that is how many Mozambicans regard December 14, 2018 when, for the first time in the country's civil aviation history, an airplane was operated solely by women.
translation.ha: Ranar ce ta tarihi: haka da yawa daga 'yan Mozambiƙue suka ɗauki 14 ga Disamba 2018, a yayin da, a karon fari a tarihin harkar sufurin jirage na ƙasar, mata zalla sun tuƙa jirgin sama.

translation.en: The crew for flight TM112/3, which traveled between the capital, Maputo, and Manica — an air distance of 442 miles — was captain Admira António, co-pilot Elsa Balate, cabin chief Maria da Luz Aurélio, and flight attendant Débora Madeleine.
translation.ha: Matuƙan jirgi mai lamba TM112/3, wanda ya yi tafiya tsakanin babban birnin Maputo, da Manica - da nisan a sama na mil 442 - tare da Kaptin Admira Antonio da mai taimaka mata Elsa Balate, da shugaban kulawa Maria da Luz Aurelio da mai kula da fasinja Debora Mdeleine.

translation.en: The women are members of MEX, an entity originally created as the Special Operations Department of LAM — Linhas Aéreas de Moçambique.
translation.ha: Matan mambobin MEɗ ne, wani yanki da aka ƙirƙira don Sashen Ayyukan na Musamman na LAM - Linhas Aereas de Mocambiƙue.

translation.en: In 1995, it began operations as an independent airline, Mozambique Express.
translation.ha: A 1995, sun fara aiki a matsayin kamfanin jirgi mai zaman kansa, Mozambiƙue Eɗpress.

translation.en: A congratulatory Facebook status update posted by feminist activist Eliana Nzualo, has so far attracted nearly 450 comments, been shared more than 460 times, and garnered close to 2,000 reactions:
translation.ha: Wani saƙon murna da 'yar rajin kare haƙƙin mata Eliana Nzualo ta rubuta a Fesbuk, ya zuw yanzu ya samu martani 450, wanda aka yaɗa sama da sau 460, kuma ya samu martani kusan 2,000:

translation.en: Translation Original Quote
translation.ha: Fassara Abin da aka faɗa na ainihi

translation.en: A HISTORIC DAY – All-female crew
translation.ha: RANAR TARIHI - Duk matuƙa jirgi mata

translation.en: Congratulations MEX!
translation.ha: Taya murna MEɗ!

translation.en: Congratulations crew!
translation.ha: Taya murna abokan aiki

translation.en: Congratulations, Mozambique!
translation.ha: Taya murna, Mozambiƙue

translation.en: For more women in all sectors.
translation.ha: Domin mata da yawa a kowane ɓangare.

translation.en: Social activist Mauro Brito added that women should be proud "when [they] are represented in various sectors":
translation.ha: Yar gwagwarmayar haƙƙin al'umma, Mauro Brito, ta ƙara da cewa ya kamata mata su yi alfahari "a lokacin da (su) ake wakiltarsu a ɓangarori daban-daban":

translation.en: Translation Original Quote
translation.ha: Fassara Abin da aka faɗa na ainihi

translation.en: In aviation there are few women, very few, this is not only here but in the whole world.
translation.ha: A harkar tuƙin jirgi akwai mata 'yan kaɗan, 'yan kaɗan, wannan ba a nan kawai ba, a duk faɗin duniya.

translation.en: I imagine the women who thought this profession was for men only, should feel proud.
translation.ha: Ina mamakin matan da suke ganin wannan aikin don maza ne kawai, sai su yi alfahari.

translation.en: Mozambique is not alone.
translation.ha: Ba Mozambiƙue ba ce kawai.

translation.en: In August 2018, in a first for South Africa's national carrier SAA, an intercontinental flight with an all-female crew took to the skies to transport passengers from Johannesburg to Sao Paulo, Brazil.
translation.ha: A Agustan 2018, a wani farkon jirgin Afirka ta Kudu SAA, wani jirgi mai dogon zango na mata zalla ya shilla sama domin jigilar fasinjoji daga Johnnesburg zuwa Sao Paulo, Barazil.

translation.en: Eight months earlier, in December 2017, Ethiopian Airlines operated its first ever flight staffed by an all-female crew.
translation.ha: Kafin wata takwas a Disamba 2017, jirgin ƙasar Habasha shi ma ya yi jirginsa na mata zalla a karon fari.

translation.en: From pilots to cabin crew, check-in staff to flight dispatchers, the flight — from Addis Ababa in Ethiopia to Lagos in Nigeria — was (wo)manned entirely by women.
translation.ha: Daga matuƙa jirgin zuwa masu kula da jama'a na jirgin da masu lura da shigowa da masu rarraba mutane, jirgin - daga Addis Ababa a Habasha zuwa Legas a Najeriya - mata ne suka jagorance shi gabaɗaya.

translation.en: Why are African governments criminalising online speech? Because they fear its power.
translation.ha: Me ya sa gwamnatocin Afirka suke mayar da maganganun intanet wani laifi? Saboda suna tsoron ƙarfinta.

translation.en: Students at Haromaya University in Ethiopia displaying a quasi-official anti-government gesture.
translation.ha: ɗalibai a jami'ar Haromaya a Habasha suna nuna wani shaguɓe na ƙin jinin gwamnati.

translation.en: Photo shared widely on social media.
translation.ha: An yaɗa hoton sosai a dandulan sadarwa.

translation.en: Africa’s landscape of online free speech and dissent is gradually, but consistently, being tightened.
translation.ha: Tsarin Afirka na albarkacin faɗar ra'ayi a intanet yana ƙara tsukewa a hankali a hankali.

translation.en: In legal and economic terms, the cost of speaking out is rapidly rising across the continent.
translation.ha: Bayanan shari'a da tattalin arziƙi, tsadar yin magana tana ƙara bayyana a yankin.

translation.en: While most governments are considered democratic in that they hold elections with multi-party candidates and profess participatory ideals, in practice, many operate much closer dictatorships — and they appear to be asserting more control over digital space with each passing day.
translation.ha: A lokacin da ake ganin da yawa daga cikin gwamnatoci a matsayin na dimukuraɗiyya saboda suna yin zaɓe tare da kafa jam'iyyu don a shiga, amma a zahiri, wasu sun fi kusa da kama-karya - kuma suna ƙara bayyanar da yadda suke takure intanet a kullum.

translation.en: Cameroon, Tanzania, Uganda, Ethiopia, Nigeria, and Benin have in the recent past witnessed internet shutdowns, the imposition of taxes on blogging and social media use, and the arrest of journalists.
translation.ha: Kamaru da Tanzaniya da Uganda da Habasha da Najeriya da kuma Benin duk sun fuskanci rufe intanet a baya-bayan nan, tare da sanya haraji a kan mu'amala da dandalin sadarwa da kuma kama 'yan jaridu.

translation.en: Media workers and citizens have been jailed on charges ranging from publishing “false information” to exposing state secrets to terrorism.
translation.ha: An tsare ma'aikatan yaɗa labarai a kan laifukan da suka haɗa da buga "bayanan ƙarya" zuwa bayyana sirrukan ƙasa ga ta'addanci.

translation.en: At the recent Forum of Internet Freedom in Africa (FIFA) held in Accra, Ghana, a group of panelists from various African countries all said they feared African governments were interested in controlling digital space to keep citizens in check.
translation.ha: A taron baya-bayan nan na ƙungiyar 'yancin yanar gizo a Afirka (FIFA) wanda aka yi a Accra, Ghana, rukunin masu bayar da gudummawa daga ƙasashen Afirka da yawa duk sun ce suna tsoron gwamnatocin Afirka suna da sha'awar mallake intanet sannan su dinga lura da kai-kawon 'yan ƙasa.

translation.en: Many countries have statutes and laws which guarantee the right to free expression.
translation.ha: ƙasashe da yawa suna da dokoki da ƙudurori da suka bayar da damar 'yan faɗin albarkacin baki.

translation.en: In Nigeria, for example, the Freedom of Information Act grants citizens the right to demand information from any government agency.
translation.ha: Misali, a Najeriya, Dokar 'Yancin Bayanai ta ba wa 'yan ƙasa damar su nemi bayanai daga kowace ma'aikatar gwamnati.

translation.en: Section 22 of the 1999 Constitution provides for freedom of the press and Section 39 maintains that "every person shall be entitled to freedom of expression, including the freedom to hold and to receive and impart ideas and information without interference..."
translation.ha: Sashe na 22 na kundin tsarin mulkin 1999 ya bayar da damar 'yancin 'yan jarida kuma Sashe na 39 ya bayyana cewa "kowane mutum yana da haƙƙin 'yancin magana, wanda ya haɗa da 'yancin samo ko karɓar ko yaɗa wasu dabaru da bayanai ba tare da katsalandan ba..."

translation.en: Yet, Nigeria has issued other laws that authorities use to deny these aforementioned rights.
translation.ha: Amma duk da haka, Najeriya ta fitar da wasu dokokin waɗanda mahukunta suke amfani da su domin hana waɗannan damarmakin da aka zayyana.

translation.en: Section 24 of Nigeria’s Cybercrime Act criminalises "anyone who spreads messages he knows to be false, for the purpose of causing annoyance, inconvenience, danger, obstruction, insult, injury, criminal intimidation, enmity, hatred, ill will or needless anxiety to another or causes such a message to be sent."
translation.ha: Sashe na 24 na Dokar Laifuffukan Yanar gizo ya nuna laifin "duk wani mutum da ya yaɗa wasu saƙonni kuma ya san cewa ƙarya ne, domin ya sanya damuwa ko rashin sukuni ko cutarwa ko daƙilewa ko zagi ko cutarwa ko barazana ko hassada ko ƙiyayya ko mugun nufi ko sanya damuwar ba gaira ba dalili ga wani ko kuma ya sanya aka tura irin wannan saƙon."

translation.en: Making laws with ambiguous and subjective terms like "inconvenience" or "insult" calls for concern.
translation.ha: Yin dokoki da wasu irin lafuza masu sarƙaƙiya ko kuma iya ɗaukar wasu ma'anoni kamar "rashin sukuni" ko "zagi" suna buƙatar a duba.

translation.en: Governments and their agents often use this as a cover to suppress freedom of expression.
translation.ha: Gwamnati da 'yan kanzaginta sau da yawa sukan yi amfani da wannan domin danne 'yancin faɗin albarkacin baki.

translation.en: Who determines the definition of an insult?
translation.ha: Waye zai bayyana ma'anar zagi?

translation.en: Should public officials expect to develop a thick skin?
translation.ha: Shin dole ne ma'aikata su kauda kunnuwansu?

translation.en: In many parts of the world, citizens have the right to criticise public officials.
translation.ha: A ɓangarorin duniya da yawa, 'yan ƙasa suna da damar su caccaki ma'aikatan gwamnati.

translation.en: Why don't Africans have the right to offend as an essential part of free expression?
translation.ha: Me ya sa 'yan Afirka ba su da damar nuna fushinsu a matsayin wani ɓangare na 'yancin magana?

translation.en: In 2017 and 2016, Nigerian online journalists and bloggers Abubakar Sidiq Usman and Kemi Olunloyo were each booked on spurious charges of cyber-stalking in connection with journalistic investigations on the basis of the Cybercrime Act.
translation.ha: A shekarun 2017 da 2016, wasu 'yan jaridar intanet kuma marubuta a yanar gizo, Abubakar Sidiƙ Usman da Kemi Olunloyo duk an kama kowannensu da wasu irin laifuka na yarfe a intanet wanda yake da alaƙa da binciken 'yan jarida a ƙarƙashin ƙudurin dokar laifukan intanet.

translation.en: Don’t suffer in silence — keep talking
translation.ha: Kar ku sha wahala a asirci - ku ci gaba da magana

translation.en: The very existence of these legal challenges tells citizens that their voices matter.
translation.ha: Tabbatuwar samuwar waɗannan matsalolin suna tattabarwa da 'yan ƙasa cewa lallai muryarsu tana da ma'ana.

translation.en: From Tanzania’s prohibition on spreading "false, deceptive, misleading or inaccurate" information online to Uganda’s tax on social media that is intended to curb "gossip", the noise made on digital platforms scares oppressive regimes. In some cases, it may even lead to them to rescind their actions.
translation.ha: Daga hanin da Tanzaniya ta yi na yaɗa "ƙarya da yaudara da mai ɓatarwa ko wadda ba daidaiba" na bayanai ta intanet zuwa harajin da Uganda ta sa a kan dandulan sadarwa wanda aka yi domin a dakushe "gulma", surutun da ake yi a intanet yana tsorata gwamnatocin azzalumai. A wasu lokutan ma sukan sa su su janye abubuwan da suka so yi.

translation.en: The experience of the Zone9 bloggers of Ethiopia provides a powerful example.
translation.ha: Abin da marubutan intanet na Zone9 suka yi fama da shi ya samar da misali mai ƙarfi.

translation.en: In 2014, nine Ethiopian writers were jailed and tortured over a collective blogging project in which they wrote about human rights violations by Ethiopia’s former government, daring to speak truth to power.
translation.ha: A 2014, an ɗaure gami da azabtar da marubutan Habasha tara saboda wani shirin haɗaka da suka yi na rubutu a intanet wanda a cikinsa suka yi rubutu game da danne haƙƙin ɗan'adam da gwamnatin da ta shuɗe ta Habasha ta yi, ƙarfin halin gaya wa gwamnati gaskiya.

translation.en: The state labeled the group "terrorists" for their online activity and incarcerated them for almost 18 months.
translation.ha: ƙasar ta kira 'yan ƙungiyar da "'yan ta'adda" saboda ayyukan da suke yi a kan intanet kuma aka ɗaure su har kusan watanni 18.

translation.en: Zone9 members Mahlet (left) and Zelalem (right) rejoiced at the release of Befeqadu Hailu (second from left, in scarf) in October 2015.
translation.ha: Mambobin Zone9, Mahlet (hagu) da Zelalam (dama) sun yi murna a wajen sakin Befeƙadu Hailu (na biyu daga hagu, da ɗankwali) a Oktoban 2015.

translation.en: Photo shared on Twitter by Zelalem Kiberet.
translation.ha: Zelalem Kiberet ne ya yaɗa hoton a Tuwita.

translation.en: Six members of the now liberated group made their premier international engagement in Ghana during FIFA conference: Atnaf Berhane, Befeqadu Hailu Techane, Zelalem Kibret, Natnael Feleke Aberra, and Abel Wabella were all in attendance.
translation.ha: Shida daga cikin 'yan ƙungiyar da ta samu 'yanci sun yi babbar ganawarsu a Ghana a lokacin taron FIFA: Atnaf Berhane da Befeƙadu Hailu Techane da Zelalem Kibret da Natnael Feleke Aberra da kuma Abel Wabella duk sun hallara.

translation.en: Jomanex Kasaye, who had worked with the group prior to the arrests (but was not arrested) also attended.
translation.ha: Jomaneɗ Kasaye, wanda ya yi aiki da ƙungiyar kafin a kama su (amma ba a kama shi ba) shi ma ya je.

translation.en: Several members had collaborated with Global Voices to write and translate stories into the Amharic.
translation.ha: Mambobi da yawa sun haɗa kai da Sautin Duniya domin su rubuta labarai kuma su fassara zuwa harshen Amharic.

translation.en: As members of the community, Global Voices campaigned and mobilised the global human rights community to speak out about their case from the very first night they were arrested.
translation.ha: A matsayinsu na mutanen cikin al'umma, Sautukan Duniya sun yi kamfe kuma sun nemo goyon bayan 'yan rajin kare haƙƙin al'umma don su yi magana a kan lamarinsu tun a daren farko da aka kama su.

translation.en: After months of writing stories and promoting their case on Twitter, international condemnation of their arrest and imprisonment began to flow from governments and prominent human rights leaders, alongside hundreds of thousands of online supporters.
translation.ha: Bayan watanni da rubuce-rubucen labarai da kuma yayata lamarinsu a Tuwita, sai aka fara samun tir da allawadai da kama sun da aka yi daga wajen gwamnatoci da sauran shugabannin 'yan gwagwarmaya sanannu na duniya, tare da samun ɗaruruwan magoya baya a intanet.

translation.en: From the four-compass points of the world, a mighty cry arose demanding the Ethiopian government to free the Zone9 bloggers.
translation.ha: Daga kusurwoyi huɗu na duniya, sai ga wani babban ƙaraji ya tashi ana neman gwamnatin Habasha ta saki marubutan intanet ɗin Zone9.

translation.en: In their remarks at FIFA, the bloggers said that their membership in the Global Voices community was key to visibility during their time in prison.
translation.ha: A bayanin da suka yi a FIFA, marubutan intanet ɗin sun ce kasancewarsu mambobi a Sautukan Duniya ya taka rawa a wajen gano su a lokacin da suke kurkuku.

translation.en: In their panel session, they credited Global Voices’ campaign for keeping them alive.
translation.ha: A lokacin tattaunawarsu, sun damƙa damar kasancewarsu a raye a kan fafutukar Sautukan Duniya.

translation.en: Berhan Taye, the panel moderator, asked the group to recount their prison experiences.
translation.ha: Berhan Taye, wanda shi ne mai lura da tattaunawar, ya tambayi 'yan ƙungiyar su tuno yanayin zamansu a kurkuku.

translation.en: As they spoke, the lights on the stage dimmed.
translation.ha: A lokacin da suke magana, hasken kan dandalin ya yi ƙasa-ƙasa.

translation.en: Their voices filled the room with a quiet power.
translation.ha: Sautukansu sun cika ɗakin da wani irin yanayi.

translation.en: Abel Wabella, who ran Global Voices’ Amharic site, lost hearing in one ear due to the torture he endured after refusing to sign a false confession.
translation.ha: Abel Wabella, wanda yake kula da sashen Amharic na Sautukan Duniya, ya rasa ji a kunne ɗaya saboda azabtarwar da ya sha bayan ya ƙi ya sa hannu a wata takardar ƙarya.

translation.en: Atnaf Berhane recalled that one of his torture sessions lasted until 2 a.m. and then continued after he had a few hours of sleep.
translation.ha: Atnaf Berhane ya faɗi cewa ɗaya daga cikin lokutan da aka dinga azabtar da shi ya kai har 2 na dare, sannan aka cigaba bayan ya ɗan yi barcin 'yan awanni.

translation.en: One of the security agents who arrested Zelalem Kibret had once been Kibret's student at the university where he taught.
translation.ha: ɗaya daga cikin jami'an tsaron da suka kama Zelalem Kibret ya taɓa zama ɗalibin Kibret a jami'ar da ya taɓa koyarwa.

translation.en: Jomanex Kasaye recounted the mental agony of leaving Ethiopia before his friends were arrested — the anguish of powerlessness — the unending suspense and fear that his friends would not make it out alive.
translation.ha: Jomaneɗ Kasaye ya tuno yadda ya shiga damuwar barin ƙasar Habasha kafin a kama abokansa - matsalar rashin ƙarfi - tsananin zargi da tsoron cewa abokansa ba za su fito da rai ba.

translation.en: Zone9 bloggers together in Addis Ababa, 2012. From left: Endalk, Soleyana, Natnael, Abel, Befeqadu, Mahlet, Zelalem, Atnaf, Jomanex.
translation.ha: Marubutan intanet na Zone9 tare a Addis Ababa, a 2012. Daga hagu: Endalk da Soleyana da Natnael da Abel da Befeƙadu da Mahlet da Zelalem da Atnaf da kuma Jomaneɗ.

translation.en: Photo courtesy of Endalk Chala.
translation.ha: An samu hoto daga Endalk Chala.

translation.en: With modesty, the Zone9 bloggers said:
translation.ha: A cikin kunya, marubutan Zone9 sun ce:

translation.en: We are not strong or courageous people... we are only glad we inspired others.
translation.ha: Mu ba mutane ba ne masu ƙarfi ko jarumta… muna farin cikin kawai don mun yi tasiri a kan wasu.

translation.en: Yet, the Zone9 bloggers redefined patriotism with both their words and actions.
translation.ha: Duk da haka, marubutan intanet na Zone9 sun sake sauya fasalin son ƙasa ta fuskar kalamansu da ayyukansu.

translation.en: It takes immense courage to love one's country even after suffering at its hands for speaking out.
translation.ha: Ba ƙaramar jarumta ba ce mutum ya so ƙasarsa duk da cewa ya sha wahala a hannuwanta don ya yi magana.

translation.en: Ugandan journalist Charles Onyango-Obbo, also in attendance at FIFA, shared an Igbo proverb popularised by Nigerian writer Chinua Achebe which says:
translation.ha: ɗan jaridan Uganda, Charles Onyango-Obbo shi ma ya je taron FIFA, ya faɗi wani karin karin magana na harshen Ibo wanda marubucin Najeriya Chinua Achebe ya yayata, wanda ya ce:

translation.en: Since the hunter has learned to shoot without missing, Eneke the bird has also learnt to fly without perching.
translation.ha: Tun da maharbi ya koyi ya yi harbi ba tare da rasawa ba, shi ma tsuntsu Eneke ya koyi tashi ba tare da kwanciya ba.

translation.en: In essence, he meant that in order to keep digital spaces free and safe, those involved in this struggle must devise new methods.
translation.ha: A zahiri, yana nufin cewa in ana so a samar da harkar intanet cikin aminci, to duk waɗanda suke wannan fafutukar dole su sake sabon salo.

translation.en: Activists on the front lines of free speech in sub-Saharan Africa and across the globe cannot afford to work in silos or go silent in frustration and defeat.
translation.ha: Yan gwagwarmayar da ke kan gaba wajen kare damar magana a yankin Afirka da sauran sassan duniya ba za su iya yin aikin a ɓoye ba ko kuma su yi shiru cikin damuwa da danniya.

translation.en: With our strength and unity, online spaces will remain free to deepen democracy through vibrant dissent.
translation.ha: Tare da ƙarfinmu da haɗin kai, harkar intanet za ta samu 'yanci domin tabbatar da dimukuraɗiyya ta hanyar maganganun da suka saɓawa gwamnati.

translation.en: The untold tragedy of 28 Mauritanian soldiers executed on Independence Day
translation.ha: Mummunan labarin sojojin Mauritaniya 28 da aka yankewa hukunci a Ranar Murnar 'Yancin Kai.

translation.en: Screenshot of the 28 soldiers executed on Independence day – Video posted by Ibrahima Sow.
translation.ha: Hoton waya na sojoji 28 waɗanda aka zartarwa da hukunci a Ranar Murnar Samun 'Yanci - Ibrahima Sow ne ya sa bidiyon.

translation.en: On November 28, 1990, 28 men in Inal, Mauritania, were hanged by fellow soldiers in a prison the middle of the night, meticulously selected one by one to be killed, after being accused of plotting a coup against the government.
translation.ha: A ranar 28 ga Nuwamban 1990 a Inal, Mauritaniya, wasu sojoji sun rataye wasu mutane a wata kurkuku a tsakiyar dare, an zaɓe su a tsanake ɗaya bayan ɗaya domin a kashe su, bayan an zarge su da kitsa yi wa gwamnati juyin mulki.

translation.en: The date, which also marks Mauritania's independence from France in 1960, continues to haunt some Mauritanians who seek justice for the brutal killings of these 28 men, all of whom were black.
translation.ha: Kwanan watan, wanda ya yi daidai da ranar samun 'yancin Mauritaniya daga Faransa a 1960, ya cigaba da damun wasu 'yan Mauritaniyar da suke neman a yi adalci game da kisan gillar da aka yi wa waɗannan mutane 28 ɗin, waɗanda dukkaninsu baƙaƙe ne.

translation.en: The West African nation of Mauritania is a mix of Arab-Berber and black Africans and human rights groups say black Africans have long suffered discrimination and exploitation.
translation.ha: Mauritaniya wadda take a Afirka ta yamma tana da haɗakar Larabawa da Buzaye da kuma 'yan Afrika baƙaƙen fata, kuma sai 'yan fafutukar kare haƙƙin al'umma suka ce baƙar fatan Afirka sun daɗe suna fama da wariya da danniya.

translation.en: The president of the Inal-France Committee, Youba Dianka, explains:
translation.ha: Shugaban kwamitin Inal-Faransa, Youba Dianka, ya yi bayani:

translation.en: Translation Original Quote
translation.ha: Fassara Abin da aka faɗa na ainihi

translation.en: I want to make it clear that Inal is just an example; there were many ‘Inals’ in Mauritania.
translation.ha: Ina so in bayyana ƙarara cewa Inal misali ne kawai; akwai 'Inal-inal' da yawa a Mauritaniya.

translation.en: Horrific events happened in Azlatt, Sory Malé, Wothie, Walata, Jreida and in the valley.
translation.ha: Munanan abubuwan sun faru ne a Azlatt da Sory Male da Wothie da Walata da Jreida da kuma cikin kurmin.

translation.en: Inside the military compound in Inal and its surroundings, soldiers were quartered, buried alive, shot, and hung in celebration of the country's independence in 1990.
translation.ha: A wani sansanin soji a Inal da kewayenta, an tsare sojoji an binne su da ransu, an harbe kuma an rataye domin murnar ranar samun 'yancin ƙasar a 1990.
