translation.en: On Independence Day this year, Mauritanians paid more attention to the nomination of their national football team to the Africa Cup of Nations (CAF) finals than they did to the forgotten “soldiers [who] lay in solitude in anonymous pits ...
translation.ha: A ranar samun 'yanci na wannan shekarar, 'yan Mauritaniya sun mayar da hankali wajen zaɓen 'yan ƙungiyar wasa ƙwallon ƙafa ta ƙasa zuwa zagayen ƙarshe na gasar cin kofin nahiyar Afirka (CAF) sama da yadda suka yi ga "sojojin da aka manta da su [waɗanda] suke kwance cikin kaɗaici a wasu ɓoyayyun ramuka...

translation.en: still waiting for a decent burial,” writes Kaaw Elimane Bilbassi Touré, news editor of the Mauritanian news site Le Flambeau.
translation.ha: suna jiran a binne su yadda ya kamata" Kaaw Elimane Bilbassi Toure wanda shi ne editan labarai sashen Labaran Mauritaniya na Le Flambeau, ya rubuta.

translation.en: Kiné-Fatim Diop, campaign director for Western Africa at Amnesty International, remarked this year on the contradictions between what should be a celebratory day and what most victims’ families actually feel:
translation.ha: Kine-Fatim Diop, wanda shi ne shugaban kamfen na hukumar kare haƙƙin ɗan'adam ta duniya reshen Yammacin Afirka, ya yi bayani a wannan shekarar game da tufka-da-warwara tsakanin abin da ya kamata ya zama ranar murna da kuma abin da yawancin iyalan waɗanda aka kashe za su ji:

translation.en: Translation Original Quote
translation.ha: Fassara Abin da aka faɗa na ainihi

translation.en: Each year, while the officials celebrate the ascension to sovereignty with joy, the victims’ families cry and protest in sadness for justice and reparations.
translation.ha: Kowace shekara, a lokacin da mahukunta suke murnar samun 'yanci cikin farin ciki, iyalan waɗanda lamarin ya rutsa da su suna kuka da nuna ƙyama cikin baƙin ciki don a yi adalci

translation.en: The authorities are only trying to bury this hideous side of independence, just like when they secretly voted an amnesty law in 1993 affirming the state's amnesia concerning the soldiers’ killings 30 years ago.
translation.ha: Mahukuntan suna ƙoƙari ne kawai domin su ɓoye wannan ɓangaren na ranar 'yanci, kamar dai yadda suka zaɓi wata dokar zaman lafiya a 1993 a asirce, wadda take tabbatar da rashin sanin gwamnati game da kisan sojojin da aka yi shekaru 30 da suka shuɗe.

translation.en: The Forum Against Impunity and Injustice in Mauritania expressed sorrow over the tragedy of two brothers in particular who were hanged on that tragic night:
translation.ha: ƙungiyar da ke nuna ƙin jinin rashin adalci da zalunci a Mauritaniya ta nuna damuwa game da abin baƙin cikin da wasu 'yan biyu suka shiga waɗanda aka rataye su a wannan mummunar ranar:

translation.en: Translation Original Quote
translation.ha: Fassara Abin da aka faɗa na ainihi

translation.en: Absolutely, a curse fell on the 28 soldiers that night. Like the two brothers, Diallo Oumar Demba and his brother Diallo Ibrahima, who were hanged wearing consecutive numbers written on them with a pen.
translation.ha: Tabbas, wata masifa ce ta faɗawa waɗannan sojoji 28 ɗin a wannan ranar. Kamar 'yan'uwan biyu, Diallo Oumar Demba da ɗan'uwansa Diallo Ibrahima, waɗanda aka rataye su alhali suna rataye da lambobi a jere waɗanda aka rubuta a kansu da alƙalami.

translation.en: What makes this sadder is having to witness your older brother's death.
translation.ha: Abin da yake ƙara baƙin cikin wannan shi ne, yadda za ka mutuwar yayanka.

translation.en: The executioners did their work with accuracy, and were actually not stopping at the hanging part, but also dragging the dead and sitting on their corpses.
translation.ha: Waɗanda suka yi kisan sun yi aikinsu daidai, kuma ba su tsaya a ɓangaren ratayewar ba, sun ƙara da jan matattun da kuma zama a kan gawarwakinsu.

translation.en: Survivors speak out
translation.ha: Waɗanda suka tsira sun magantu

translation.en: Testimonies from survivors continue to pour in after 30 years.
translation.ha: Shedun waɗanda suka tsira sun cigaba da kwararowa shekaru 30 bayan faruwar lamarin.

translation.en: Mamadou Sy was a squadron commander in the Mauritanian army, then a deputy commander and finally a base commander before he was arrested that night.
translation.ha: Mamadou Sy kwamandan rundunar ne a sojojin Mauritaniya, a lokacin yana mataimakin kwamanda, a ƙarshe kuma ya zama kwamandan sansani kafin a kama shi a wannan daren.

translation.en: In his book “Hell in Inal“, published in 2000, he describes the torture he suffered, when military commanders blindfolded him, tied him up, and threw him in dirty, stinking water.
translation.ha: A littafinsa "Jahannama a Inal" wanda aka buga a 2000, ya bayyana azabtarwa da ya sha, a lokacin da kwamandojin sojoji suka rufe masa idanu, suka ɗaure shi, kuma suka wulla shi a cikin ruwa mai datti mai wari.

translation.en: Another soldier who survived that dreadful night managed to go to France for treatment after his time in prison with the help of the Christian Association Against Torture (ACAT in French).
translation.ha: Wani sojan da ya kuɓuta daga wannan mummunan daren ya samu damar zuwa Faransa domin neman magani bayan lokacin da ya shafe a kurkuku tare da taimakon ƙungiyar Kiristoci masu ƙyamar Azabtarwa (ACAT da Faransanci).

translation.en: He testifies on the condition of anonymity on the racism he experienced in his 24 years of military service:
translation.ha: Ya bayyana da sharaɗin za a ɓoye sunansa gami da wariyar launin fatar da ya sha a shekarunsa 24 na aikin soja:

translation.en: Translation Original Quote
translation.ha: Fassara Abin da aka faɗa na ainihi

translation.en: As far as I can remember, since I have started to understand, I have always noticed that black people never had any rights, and that the white Mauritanians were privileged.
translation.ha: A yadda zan iya tunawa, tun lokacin da na fara ganewa, a kowace ina lura cewa baƙaƙe ba su da wani 'yanci, kuma fararen 'yan Mauritaniya sun fi samu damarmaki.

translation.en: Here, out of twenty ministers in the government, only a quarter are black and in the army, there is only one black person out of ten officers.
translation.ha: A nan, a cikin ministoci ashirin da suke a gwamnati, ɗaya bisa huɗu ne kacal baƙaƙe, kuma a cikin sojoji baƙi ɗaya ne a cikin sojoji goma.

translation.en: During an internship, if a white Mauritanian wouldn't perform well, they would still win over any other black person. And don't even dare protesting ...
translation.ha: A lokacin wani koyon aiki, idan ɗan Mauritaniya farar fata ya kasa yin abin da ake so sosai, to dole dai sai sun yi nasara a kan duk wani baƙi. Kuma kar ma ka kuskura ka musa…

translation.en: He describes the methods of torture he and other soldiers experienced:
translation.ha: Ya bayyana hanyar azabtarwar da shi da wasu sojojin suka sha:

translation.en: Translation Original Quote
translation.ha: Fassara Abin da aka faɗa na ainihi

translation.en: For example, they dug holes in the sand, buried us up to the neck, with the head fixed, our naked face turned toward the sun.
translation.ha: Misali, sukan gina ramuka a cikin yashi, su binne mu har zuwa wuya, su tsayar da kanmu, a juya fuskarmu ta kalli rana.

translation.en: If we ever tried to close our eyes, the guards would throw sand. And then put the blindfolds back on.
translation.ha: Idan muka yi yunƙurin rufe idanunmu, sai masu gadi su cillo ƙasa. Kuma sai su sake sa mana abin rufe ido.

translation.en: Maimouna Alpha Sy, general secretary of the Widow and Humanitarian Issues Association, was once married to Ba Baïdy Alassane, a former customs controller.
translation.ha: Maimouna Alpha Sy, babban sakataren ƙungiyar taimakon al'umma ta Window, an taɓa yi mata aure ga Ba Baidy Alassane, wani tsohon kwanturolan kwastan.

translation.en: Alpha Sy says her late husband was among the victims killed in 1990.
translation.ha: Alpha Sy ta ce marigayi mijin nata yana cikin waɗanda aka kashe a 1990.

translation.en: Translation Original Quote
translation.ha: Fassara Abin da aka faɗa na ainihi

translation.en: We spent three months and ten days looking for my husband, but in vain ...
translation.ha: Mun shafe watanni uku da kwanaki goma muna neman mijina, amma duk a banza …

translation.en: Customs told us he died from a cardiac arrest, which is not true.
translation.ha: Kwastan suka gaya mana ya mutu a sakamakon buguwar zuciya, wanda ba gaskiya ba ne.

translation.en: Witnesses were arrested, tied and tortured with him.
translation.ha: An kama shaidu, an ɗaure su an azabtar da su tare da shi.

translation.en: He was killed in front of them.
translation.ha: An kashe shi a gabansu.

translation.en: ‘Never again’
translation.ha: Ba zai sake faruwa ba'

translation.en: This year on November 28, Mauritanian immigrants protested in front of the Mauritanian embassy in Paris, France, against the state's disregard for this tragic episode.
translation.ha: Wannan shekarar a 28 ga Nuwamba, 'yan gudun hijirar Mauritaniya sun yi zanga-zanga a embasin Mauritaniya da ke Paris, a Faransa, suna nuna ƙyamar yadda ƙasar take nuna ko-in-kula da wannan mummunan lamarin.

translation.en: Kardiata Malick Diallo, a deputy, gave a remarkable speech at the Mauritanian parliament to prevent people from forgetting, accusing the current prime minister of protecting the perpetrators, who still hold high offices in the state while victims rights’ have not been properly addressed:
translation.ha: Kardiata Malick Diallo, mataimaki, ya yi wata magana mai muhimmanci a majalisaar Mauritaniya domin ya hana mutane mantawa, yana zargin Firaminista mai ci da kare waɗanda suka yi zaluncin, waɗanda har yanzu suna riƙe da manyan ofisoshi a ƙasar, a yayin da ba a nemarwa waɗanda abin ya faru da su haƙƙinsu ba:

translation.en: Translation Original Quote
translation.ha: Fassara Abin da aka faɗa na ainihi

translation.en: Even if you are not directly responsible for the action that definitely stained every November 28, you still however were responsible for finding an adequate solution for the victims’ rights to the truth and justice ...
translation.ha: Ko da kai tsaye ba kai ne da alhakin abin da tabbas ya ɓata dukkanin wata ranar 28 ga Nuwamba ba, duk da haka kana da alhakin samar da mafitar da ta dace domin haƙƙin waɗanda abin ya rutsa da su na gaskiya da adalci …

translation.en: Great nations and great people never try to erase a dark episode out of their history but instead they show it to the world for everyone to remember and say "NEVER AGAIN".
translation.ha: Manyan ƙasashe da manyan mutane ba sa taɓa ƙoƙarin goge wani mummunan lamari daga cikin tarihinsu amma maimakon haka sai su nuna shi ga duniya domin kowa ya tuna ya ce "ba zai sake faruwa ba".

translation.en: Mister prime minister, your power has preferred policies of marginalization and exclusion.
translation.ha: Firanminista, gwamnatinka ta fi son dokokin wariya da danniya.

translation.en: As of October 2018, out of 24 ministerial functions, only five are occupied by black or mixed people, who represent up to 70 percent of society.
translation.ha: Har zuwa Oktoban 2018, a cikin ayyukan ministoci 24, biyar ne kawai suke da alaƙa da baƙaƙe da masu ruwa biyu, waɗanda su suke wakiltar kusan kaso 70 na al'umma.

translation.en: The majority of the population are still under-represented among the elected representatives, members of the security forces, officials and local administrators.
translation.ha: Mafi yawancin al'ummar har yanzu suna da ƙarancin wakilci a cikin zaɓaɓɓun wakilai da jami'an tsaro da ma'aikata da shugabanni.

translation.en: Mauritania is the last country in the world to officially abolish slavery in 1981 but it wasn't enforced until 2007 and an estimated 20 percent still live in some form of enslaved servitude, most of whom are black or mixed.
translation.ha: Mauritaniya ita ce ƙasa ta ƙarshe a duniya da a hukumance ta haramta cinikin bayi a 1981, amma ba a tabbatar da hakan ba sai a 2007 kuma kusa kimanin kashi 20 har yanzu suna zaune a wani yanayi na bauta, yawancinsu baƙaƙe ko masu ruwa biyu.

translation.en: Because this historic racism persists in present-day Mauritania, justice for the survivors and their families remains out of reach.
translation.ha: Saboda wannan wariyar launin fatar da ke da tsohon tarihi ta cigaba har zuwa yau a Mauritaniya, an rasa adalci ga waɗanda suka tsira da iyalansu.

translation.en: 100 days for Alaa: Family of Egyptian activist counts the days until his release from prison
translation.ha: Kwanaki 100 n Alaa: Iyalin wani ɗan gwagwarmayar Masar da suke ƙidaya kwanaki har zuwa sakinsa daga kurkuku.

translation.en: Alaa Abd El Fattah, photo by Nariman El-Mofty.
translation.ha: Alaa Abd El Fattah, asalin hoto daga Nariman El-Mofty.

translation.en: After spending five years in prison, the Egyptian blogger and activist Alaa Abd El Fattah is scheduled to be released from prison on March 17, 2019.
translation.ha: Bayan ya shafe shekaru biyar a kurkuku, an tsara za a saki marubucin intanet na Masar kuma ɗan gwagwarmaya, Abd El Fattah daga kurkuku a ranar 17 ga Maris, 2019.

translation.en: On December 8, his family launched a campaign — "100 days for Alaa" — to ensure his prison term ends on time.
translation.ha: A 8 ga Disamba, iyalinsa sun fara wani gangami - "kwanaki 100 na Alaa" - domin tabbatar da cewa kwanakinsa na kurkuku sun ƙare a kan lokaci.

translation.en: The March release date does not mark the end of Alaa's time served, but rather a transition to the final phase of his sentence.
translation.ha: Kwanan watan sakinsa na Maris bai nuna ƙarshen lokacin zaman Alaa ba, maimakon haka, sai ya zama sauyi ne zuwa zagayen ƙarshe na hukuncin da aka yanke masa.

translation.en: After his release, Alaa will be made to spend every night in his local police station for an additional five years.
translation.ha: Bayan an sake shi, za a sanya Alaa ya riƙa kwana a kullum a ofishin 'yan sanda har na tsawon ƙarin shekaru biyar.

translation.en: He will be under police surveillance throughout this period.
translation.ha: Zai kasance a ƙarƙashin kulawar 'yan sanda a duk tsawon wannan lokacin.

translation.en: Alaa was arrested and taken from his family’s home in November 2013.
translation.ha: An kama Alaa kuma aka ɗauke shi daga gidansu a Nuwambar 2013.

translation.en: More than one year later, in February 2015, he was finally tried and sentenced to five years in prison for "organising" a protest under a 2013 protest law that prohibits unauthorised demonstrations.
translation.ha: Sama da shekara ɗaya bayan hakan, a Fabarairun 2015, a ƙarshe sai aka yi masa hukunci aka ɗaure shi tsawon shekaru biyar a kurkuku a dalilin ya "haɗa" zanga-zanga a ƙarƙashin wata dokar zanga-zanga ta 2013 wadda ta hana zanga-zangar da ba a bayar da dama ba.

translation.en: While he did take part in a protest against military trials for civilians on 26 November 2013, Alaa had no role in organising it.
translation.ha: Duk da cewa ya shiga cikin zanga-zanga domin nuna ƙin goyon bayan yi wa fararen hula hukunci daga sojoji ranar 26 ga Nuwamban 2013, Alaa ba shi da hannu a haɗa ta.

translation.en: His sentence was confirmed by Egypt’s Court of Cassation in November 2017.
translation.ha: Kotun hukunta masu laifuka ta Masar ta tabbatar da hukuncin nasa a Nuwamban 2017.

translation.en: Omar Robert Hamilton, a cousin of Alaa, outlined the goals of the campaign on Twitter:
translation.ha: Omar Robert Hamilton, ɗan'uwan Alaa, ya zayyano burin gangamin a Tuwita:

translation.en: To re-focus local and international attention on his case to ensure that Alaa is actually released on March 17th.
translation.ha: Domin a ƙara dawo da hankali 'yan ƙasa da duniya a kan lamarinsa domin tabbatar da cewa an saki Alaa a 17 ga Maris.

translation.en: To enter the concept of المراقبة (‘surveillance’ or ‘parole’) into the public consciousness.
translation.ha: Domin shigar da tsarin ('kulawa') zuwa cikin tunanin mutane.

translation.en: After release, Alaa is still sentenced to spend every night in his local police station for "five years".
translation.ha: Bayan saki, an ƙara yi wa Alaa hukuncin kwana a kowane dare a ofishin 'yan sanda har tsawon "shekaru biyar".

translation.en: We need to lay the groundwork for pressure against this.
translation.ha: Muna buƙatar sanya ɗan-ba na tursasawa don ƙin hakan.

translation.en: Alaa has been jailed or investigated under every Egyptian head of state who has served during his lifetime.
translation.ha: An ta ɗaure Alaa ko kuma bincikarsa a ƙarƙashin dukkanin shugabannin Masar da suka yi mulki a zamanin rayuwarsa.

translation.en: In 2006, he was arrested for taking part in a peaceful protest.
translation.ha: A 2006, an kama shi saboda ya shiga wata zanga-zangar zaman lafiya.

translation.en: In 2011, he spent two months in prison, missing the birth of his first child, Khaled.
translation.ha: a 2011, ya shafe watanni biyu a kurkuku, bai ga haihuwar ɗansa na fari ba, Khaled.

translation.en: In 2013, he was arrested and detained for 115 days without trial.
translation.ha: A 2013, an kama shi an garƙame tsawon kwanaki 115 ba tare da yanke hukunci ba.

translation.en: Alaa has long worked on technology and political activism projects with his wife, Manal Hassan.
translation.ha: Alaa ya daɗe yana aiki a kan ayyukan fasaha da gwagwarmayar siyasa tare da matarsa, Manal Hassan.

translation.en: He comes from a family of prominent human rights advocates, including human rights lawyer Ahmed Seif El Islam, Alaa's father, who was jailed multiple times under the regime of Hosni Mubarak.
translation.ha: Ya fito daga gidan mashahuran 'yan rajin kare haƙƙin al'umma, waɗanda suka haɗa da lauya ɗan rajin kare haƙƙin al'umma Ahmed Seif El Islam, wanda shi ne mahaifin Alaa, wanda aka ɗaure shi a lokuta da yawa a ƙarƙashin mulkin Hosni Mubarak.

translation.en: Abd El Fattah’s sisters, Mona and Sanaa Seif, are also human rights defenders who have long campaigned against the military trials of civilians in the country.
translation.ha: Yan'uwan Adb Eel Fattah, Mona da Sanaa Seif, su ma 'yan gwagwarmayar kare haƙƙin al'umma ne waɗanda suka daɗe suna kamfe don nuna ƙin yadda sojoji suke yi wa fararen hula hukunci a ƙasar.

translation.en: In 2016, Sanaa served a six-month jail sentence for insulting a public official.
translation.ha: A 2016, Sanaa ta shafe zaman kurkuku na watanni shida saboda ta zagi wani jami'in al'umma.

translation.en: Alaa's ordeal is similar to many other Egyptians who are behind bars because of their activism.
translation.ha: Masifar da Alaa ya shiga, irin ɗaya ce da ta da yawa daga cikin 'yan Masar waɗanda suke a ɗaure saboda gwagwarmaya.

translation.en: There are as many as 60,000 political prisoners in Egypt, human rights groups say.
translation.ha: Akwai kusan mazauna kurkuku 60,000 a sakamakon siyasa, kamar yadda ƙungiyar 'yan kare haƙƙin ɗan'adam suka faɗa.

translation.en: Those arrested on politically-motivated charges in Egypt are often subjected to enforced disappearances, torture, prolonged pre-trial detention and solitary confinement.
translation.ha: Waɗanda aka kama a kan laifukan da suka shafi siyasa a Masar a kan iya ɓatar da su ko azabtarwa ko a tsawaita zamansu ba tare da shari'a ba ko a ɓoye su.

translation.en: Joining the #FreeAlaa campaign
translation.ha: Shiga cikin gangamin #FreeAlaa

translation.en: In a letter to the attendees of RightsCon, a digital rights conference held in Toronto in May 2018, Alaa urged supporters to ”fix [their] own democracies”.
translation.ha: A wata wasiƙa ga mahalarta taron Rightcon, wani taro da ake yi a Toronto a Mayu, 2018, Alaa ya yi kira ga magoya baya da su "kafa [tasu] dimukuraɗiyyar".

translation.en: This has always been my answer to the question "how can we help?" I still believe [fixing democracy] is the only possible answer.
translation.ha: Wannan ita ce amsata a kulluma ga tambayar "ta yaya za mu taimaka?" Har yanzu na yarda [kafa dimukraɗiyya] shi ne kaɗai amsar da ta dace.

translation.en: Not only is where you live, work, vote, pay tax and organize the place where you have more influence, but a setback for human rights in a place where democracy has deep roots is certain to be used as an excuse for even worse violations in societies where rights are more fragile.
translation.ha: Ba kawai inda kake zama ko aiki ko jefa ƙuria ko biyan haraji da kuma shirya wurin da ka fi tasiri, sai dai cibaya ga gwagwarmayar kare haƙƙin al'umma a wurin da dimukraɗiyya ta kama ƙasa to tabbas ne za a yi amfani da ita a matsayin uzuri na danniya mai muni a cikin al'ummar da haƙƙin yake da rauni.

translation.en: I trust recent events made it evident that there is much that needs fixing.
translation.ha: Na amince cewa abubuwan da suka faru a baya-bayan nan sun ƙara nuna cewa lallai akwia abubuwa da yawa da ake so a gyara.

translation.en: I look forward to being inspired by how you go about fixing it.
translation.ha: Ina sa ran zan ji daɗin yadda za ku yi ƙoƙarin gyara ta.

translation.en: Those looking to join the "100 days for Alaa" campaign are encouraged to send "essays, photos or acts of solidarity" that will be republished on the campaign's website:
translation.ha: An ƙarfafawa waɗanda suke so su shiga cikin gangamin "kwanaki 100 na Alaa" da su turo "rubutu da hotuna ko wani abu na nuna goyon baya" wanda za a buga a shafin gangamin na intanet.

translation.en: This is an open-source campaign – we'll be putting out some new ideas, but need new thoughts and new energy coming in too.
translation.ha: Wannan wani gangami wanda yake a buɗe - za mu cigaba da saka sababbin dabaru, amma muna son sababbin tunani da sabon ƙarfi ya dinga shigowa.

translation.en: So get thinking with us!
translation.ha: Don haka ku cigaba da tunani tare da mu!

translation.en: The hashtag, as always, is #FreeAlaa – please join us in preparing the ground for Alaa's release.
translation.ha: Hashtag ɗin a koyaushe, shi ne #AsakiAlaa - don Allah ku shigo cikinmu domin shirya yadda za a saki Alaa.

translation.en: First transgender pride march hopes to shatter stereotypes in Pakistan
translation.ha: Gangamin farkon na sauya tsarin halitta yana shirin kawar da duk wata wariya a Pakistan

translation.en: Jannat Ali with the organizers from Sathi organization and Track-T.
translation.ha: Jannat Ali tare da masu haɗawa daga ƙungiyoyin Sathi da Tract-T.

translation.en: Photo credit Syed Noman. Used with permission.
translation.ha: Asalin hoto daga Syed Noman. an samu izinin amfani da shi.

translation.en: To assert their rights and demand implementation of the law, a Transgender Pride March took place in Lahore, Pakistan, on 29 December 2018.
translation.ha: Domin tabbatar da haƙƙoƙinsu da neman tabbatar da dokar, an yi gangamin sauya tsarin halitta a Lahore, Pakistan, a 29 ga Disamban 2018.

translation.en: For the first time in the country's history, Transgender people dared to step out of their seclusion and demanded that the Government implement The Transgender Persons (Protection of Rights) Act, of May 24, 2018.
translation.ha: A karon fari a tarihin ƙasar, mutanen da ke sauya tsarin halitta sun sami ƙarfin guiwar fitowa waje daga maɓoyarsu kuma sun nemi gwamnati ta tabbatar da Dokar(Kare Haƙƙoƙin) Mutane masu Sauya Tsarin Halitta ta 24 ga Mayu, 2018.

translation.en: Transgender Pride march takes place in Pakistan
translation.ha: An yi gangamin sauya tsarin halitta a Pakistan

translation.en: Trans people in Pakistan staged the country's first Transgender Pride march.
translation.ha: Masu sauya tsarin halitta sun yin gangamin farko a sauya tsarin halitta a ƙasar.

translation.en: The Constitution of Pakistan says that "No person shall be deprived of life or liberty save in accordance with law," which is covered under the Fundamental Rights of citizens.
translation.ha: Kundin tsarin mulkin Pakistan ya ce "ba wani mutum da za a hana rayuwa ko 'yanci sai dai kamar yadda doka ta tanada," wanda yana ƙarƙashin Muhimman Haƙƙoƙin 'Yan ƙasa.

translation.en: However, Transgender persons have a different story to tell when it comes to their rights and life; they have faced torture, rape, been burnt alive, beheaded and even shot dead, yet the state did not help them despite the passing of the Transgender Persons (Protection of Rights) Act by the Government in March 2018.
translation.ha: Sai dai masu sauya tsarin halitta suna da wani labarin daban idan ana maganar haƙƙoƙinsu da rayuwa; suna fuskantar azabtarwa da fyaɗe da ƙonawa da rai da fille kai da ma harbewa, duk da haka ƙasar ba ta taimake su ba duk da gwamnati ta yi Dokar (Kare Haƙƙoƙin) Mutane masu Sauya Tsarin Halitta a Maris, 2018.

translation.en: Jannat Ali, nicknamed Lahore's Trans Diva, is the founder of Track Transgender and Program Director of Sathi Foundation which organized the Pride March.
translation.ha: Jannat Ali, wadda aka sa wa sunan garkuwar 'yan sauya tsarin halitta ta Lahore, ita ce ta ƙirƙiro ƙungiyar sauya tsarin halitta ta Track kuma ita ce Daraktan Cibiyar Sathi wadda ta tsari gangamin.

translation.en: Other transgender people and non-transgender supportive members also played their role in the execution of the march and its success.
translation.ha: Sauran masu sauya tsarin halitta da mambobin da ba sa sauya tsarin halitta duk sun taka rawarsu wajen tabbatuwar gangamin da cin nasararsa.

translation.en: Sathi Foundation is a transgender-led organization working for the welfare of the transgender community in Pakistan.
translation.ha: Cibiyar Sathi wata ƙungiya ce da masu sauya tsarin halitta suke jagoranta, wadda take aiki domin walwalar al'ummar sauya tsarin halitta a Pakistan.

translation.en: Transgender Pride March in Lahore, December 29, 2018.
translation.ha: Gangamin Sauya Tsarin Halitta a Lahore, 29 ga Disamba, 2018.

translation.en: Image credit Syed Noman.
translation.ha: Asalin hoto daga Syed Noman.

translation.en: Used with permission.
translation.ha: an samu izinin amfani da shi.

translation.en: The march was attended by nearly 250 transgender people from all provinces of Pakistan.
translation.ha: Gangamin ya sami halartar kusan masu sauya tsarin halitta 250 daga dukkanin lardunan Pakistan.

translation.en: Prominent among them were Kami Sid, Bebo from Sindh, Nadra from KPK, Anmol from Sahiwal District, Nayab from Okara, Sunaina Khan (Classical Dancer), Naghma & Lucky (Coke Studio Singers), Laila Naz and Neeli Rana.
translation.ha: Fitattu daga cikinsu su ne Kami Sid da Bebo daga Sindh da Nadra daga KPK da Anmol daga lardin Sahiwal da Nayab daga Okara da Sunaina Khan (Marayin Gargajiya), Naghma da Lucky (Mawaƙan Coke Studio) da Laila Naz da Neeli Rana.

translation.en: The event started with a Press Conference at the Lahore Press Club where the demands of the community were presented; after which they marched to Al Hamra Cultural Complex on the Mall dancing and singing songs on the way, where they dispersed after food.
translation.ha: Shirin ya fara da ganawa da 'yan jaridu a ɗakin 'Yan Jaridu na Lahore, a inda aka bayyana abin da jama'ar suke so; bayan nan suka yi tattaki zuwa Dandalin Al'adu na Al Hamra a cikin ginin suna rawa suna waƙoƙi a kan hanya, a inda suka tarwatse bayan abinci.

translation.en: Even though the press conference was held in the Lahore Press Club the Pride March was not covered by mainstream media.
translation.ha: Duk da cewa an yi taron ganawa da manema labaran a ɗakin 'Yan Jaridu na Lahore, yawancin sanannun kafafen yaɗa labarai ba su nuna gangamin ba.

translation.en: Although organizers invited officials, like Punjab MNA Saadia Sohail from Pakistan Tehreek e Insaf, government officials didn't attend the event.
translation.ha: Duk da cewa masu haɗa taron sun gayyaci mahukunta, kamar Punjab MNA Saadia Sohail daga Pakistan Tehreek e Insaf, jami'an gwamnati ba su halarci taron ba.

translation.en: The march did generate some attention on social media where people appreciated the parade while some questioned the reason for its non-coverage by mainstream media.
translation.ha: Tattakin ya jawo hankali a dandulan sadarwa a inda wasu mutane suka yabawa gangamin wasu kuma suke tuhumar dalilin da ya sa fitattun kafafen yaɗa labarai ba su kawo shi ba.

translation.en: According to organizer Jannat Ali:
translation.ha: Kamar yadda wadda ta haɗa Jannat Ali ta ce:

translation.en: The aim was to show positive and progressive image of Pakistan and how the country is slowly accepting us and we are gaining more space in the society.
translation.ha: Dalilin shi ne domin a nuna ƙimar Pakistan da kuma yadda ƙasar take karɓarmu da yadda muke ƙara samun wurin zama a cikin al'umma.

translation.en: Pakistan is not only about terrorism and a conservative society there is more to us.
translation.ha: Pakistan ba kawai ta tsaya ba ne a ta'addanci da al'ummar gargajiya, mu ma muna da abin cewa.

translation.en: We promoted our march along with our KhawajaSara (transgender) culture and traditions it was not the same type of march as it is held in US.
translation.ha: Mun tallata gangaminu tare da al'adarmu ta KhawajaSara (sauya tsarin halitta) ba wai irin gangamin da ake yi a Amurka ba ne.

translation.en: The march also emphasized a positive and progressive image of the transgender community; it also called attention to the discrimination and violence.
translation.ha: Gangamin ta sake ƙarfafa ƙimar al'ummar sauya tsarin halitta; kuma abin ya jawo hankali wajen wariya da rigima.

translation.en: Due to limited options in mainstream jobs, transgender people are forced to turn to the sex trade to earn a living.
translation.ha: Saboda ƙarancin zaɓi a wajen ayyuka, akan tursasa masu sauya tsarin halitta su koma karuwanci domin samun abin da za su rayu.

translation.en: Due to unsafe sex practices, many have HIV and AIDS.
translation.ha: Saboda jima'i barkatai, da yawansu suna da HIɓ da ƙanjamau.

translation.en: The police and doctors also need to be sensitized as they are often making life difficult for Transgender people who reach out for help or medical assistance.
translation.ha: Ya kamata a ƙara wayar da kan 'yan sanda da likitoci domin suna yawan takura rayuwar masu sauya tsarin halitta waɗanda suka zo neman taimako ko magani.

translation.en: Despite the legislation, transgender people continue to face extreme hostility.
translation.ha: Duk da doka, masu sauya tsarin halitta suna cigaba da fuskantar tsananin ƙiyayya.

translation.en: Since 2015, at least 500 transgender people have been killed in Pakistan, while Jannat Ali says that more than 60 transgender individuals have been killed in the last year alone.
translation.ha: Tun 2015, an kashe mafi ƙaranci mutum 500 daga masu sauya tsarin halitta a Pakistan, a yayin da Jannat Ali ta ce an kashe sama da masu sauya tsarin halitta 60 a shekarar da ta shuɗe kawai.

translation.en: Asad Zaidi tweeted about the general impression of Pakistanis towards the transgender community:
translation.ha: Asad Zaidi ya rubuta a Tuwita yadda 'yan Pakistan suke ɗaukar masu sauya tsarin halitta:

translation.en: In a talk at TEDxLahore in 2017, Jannat Ali shared her painful journey about being a transgender person in Pakistan after coming out to not just her family but to society at large as well.
translation.ha: A yayin hirar TEDɗLahore a 2017, Jannat Ali ta bayyana wahalar da ta sha a matsayin mai sauya tsarin halitta a Pakistan bayan ta bayyana, ba kawai a wajen iyalinta ba, har ma da al'umma bakiɗaya.

translation.en: The Transgender Person (Protection of Rights) Act 2018 passed by majority votes in the National Assembly ensured that the community could obtain a driver's license, passport, have the right to get their gender changed in National Database and Registration Authority (NADRA) records, stopping of harassment, access to educational, employment in trade and health services without discrimination.
translation.ha: Dokar (Kare Haƙƙoƙin) masu sauya tsarin halitta ta 2018 wadda aka tabbatar ta hanyar ƙuri'un majalisar ƙasa mafiya rinjaye, ta tabbatar da cewa mutanen za su iya samun lasisin tuƙi da fasfo, suna da damar da za a sauya musu jinsinsu a Hukumar Adana Bayanan 'Yan ƙasa (NADRA), daina musgunawa da damar samun ilimi da samun aiki a kasuwanci da ayyukan lafiya ba tare da wata wariya ba.

translation.en: It also mentions that safe houses for transgender people, medical and educational facilities and psychological counseling will be provided to them by the government.
translation.ha: Ta kuma bayyana cewa gwamnati za ta samarwa da masu sauya tsarin halitta gidaje masu tsaro da kayayyakin ilmantarwa da shawarwari

translation.en: They will be entitled to inherit property and will also have the right to vote in elections.
translation.ha: Suna da damar da su gaji duk wata kadara kuma za su sami 'yancin yin zaɓe a zaɓuɓɓuka.

translation.en: Nayaab Ali (standing), the first transgender to contest in the Pakistan general elections 2018, and Neeli Rana, another renowned transgender person.
translation.ha: Nayaab Ali (a tsaye), mai sauya jinsi na farko da ya tsaya takara a babban zaɓen Pakistan a 2008, da kuma Neeli Rana, wata shahararriya mai sauya jinsi.

translation.en: Image by Trans Pride Photography Team, used with permission.
translation.ha: Hoto daga ƙungiyar Hoto ta Trans Pride, an samu izinin amfani da shi.

translation.en: Pakistan is slowly starting to make strides when it comes to transgender visibility.
translation.ha: A hankali a hankali, Pakistan tana samun cigaba idan an zo maganar walwalar masu sauya jinsi.

translation.en: A few Transgender people contested the General Elections 2018 for National and Provincial Assembly seats for the first time.
translation.ha: Kaɗan daga cikin masu sauya jinsi sun tsaya takara a babban zaɓen ƙasa don kujerun majalisar ƙasa da ta lardi a karon fari.

translation.en: A local TV channel hired its first transgender anchor; Coke studio, a music program, featured two transgender people in an episode.
translation.ha: Wani gidan talabijin sun ɗauki hayar mai yi musu shirye-shirye na farko mai sauyin jinsi; wani shirin kiɗa na Coke Studio, ya zo da masu sauya jinsi biyu a wani shiri.

translation.en: While things are changing for the transgender community and they are slowly being accepted, the process is slow.
translation.ha: A yayin da abubuwa suke sauyawa masu sauyin jinsi, kuma a hankali ana karɓar su, hanyar dai a hankali take tafiya.

translation.en: However, many are optimistic that things will soon change for the better and these people will get their place in society with the rights and privileges of citizens equal in the eyes of society and the law.
translation.ha: Amma dai wasu suna ganin abubuwan za su yi kyau su sauya zuwa mafi kyau kuma waɗannan mutanen za su shigo cikin jama'a tare da damarmaki da 'yanci na kowane ɗan ƙasa, daidai a idanun al'umma da shari'a.

translation.en: ‘Stop killing women’ — a new campaign against domestic violence in Angola
translation.ha: "A daina kashe mata" - wani sabon gangamin nuna ƙyamar rigingimun gida a Angola.

translation.en: Manifestação em Luanda: #Paremdematarasmulheres | foto Simão Hossi
translation.ha: Manifestação em Luanda: #Paremdematarasmulheres | foto Simão Hossi

translation.en: Demonstration in Luanda, Angola, using the hashtag #Paremdematarasmulheres in Portuguese, or ‘stop killing women’, Photo by Simão Hossi, used with permission.
translation.ha: Zanga-zanga a Luanda, Angola, ana amfani da hashtag na #Paremdematarasmulheres da harshen Portugues, ko a ce 'a daina kashe mata', Hoto daga Simao Hossi, an samu izinin amfani da shi.

translation.en: When 26-year-old lawyer Carolina Joaquim de Sousa da Silva was found dead in her home on December 3, 2018, her husband confessed to the crime and was detained by Angola's criminal investigation department known as SIC.
translation.ha: A lokacin da aka sami lauya 'yar shekaru 26 da haihuwa mai suna Carolina Joaƙuim de Sousa da Silɓa a mace a gidanta ranar 3 ga Disamba 2018, mijinta ya tabbatar da cewa shi ne mai laifin kuma 'yan sanda masu binciken laifuka na Angola da aka sani da SIC sun kama shi.

translation.en: In the same week, another murder of a woman was reported by Angola Public Television who said the young woman was allegedly stabbed by her ex-boyfriend.
translation.ha: A wannan satin dai, gidan talabijin na al'umma na Angola ya sake kawo rahoton kisan wata mata, inda suka bayyana cewa ana zargin saurayin matashiyar matar ne ya caka mata wuƙa.

translation.en: These cases of violent crime have put many Angolan women on guard and led to a new campaign against domestic violence called "Stop Killing Women," organized by Association Ondjango, a feminist nongovernmental organization.
translation.ha: Waɗannan kyasakyasan na faruwar muggan ayyukan ta'addanci ya sa matan Angola sun farka kuma ya jawo samuwar wani gangami da yake yaƙi da gallazawa mata wanda ake kira "A daina kashe mata," wanda ƙungiyar Ondjango, wata ƙungiyar kare haƙƙin mata mai zaman kanta ta shirya.

translation.en: Using Facebook as their main mobilizing tool, their objective is to raise awareness about crimes against women in Angola:
translation.ha: Ta hanyar amfani da Fesbuk a matsayin babbar hanyarsu ta haɗa kan jama'a, burinsu shi ne su wayar da kan mutane game da ta'addancin gallazawa mata a Angola.

translation.en: Translation Original Quote
translation.ha: Fassara Abin da aka faɗa na ainihi

translation.en: These have been difficult days.
translation.ha: Waɗannan sun zama kwanaki ne masu wahala.

translation.en: In truth, for us women, many days are difficult and painful because we still live in a context where, in one way or another, all types of violence against us are always excused.
translation.ha: A zahirin gaskiya, a wajenmu mata, yawancin kwanaki suna da wahala da ciwo a gare mu saboda har yanzu muna zaune a wani matsayi wanda, ta kowace irin hanya, duk wani ta'addancin da ake yi mana ana ƙyale wa ne kawai.

translation.en: And in recent days, in particular, it was even more painful for having to deal with the reactions which came after the case of Carolina...
translation.ha: Kuma a 'yan kwanakin nan musamman, abin ya ma fi ciwo domin yadda za a tunkari martanin da ya faru bayan faruwar lamarin Carolina…

translation.en: Violence against women is real, it really is.
translation.ha: Gallazawa mata abu ne na zahiri, tabbas akwai shi.

translation.en: It is not something in the heads of feminists, it is not an invention or empty speech: IT IS REAL!
translation.ha: Ba wai abu ne da yake a kan 'yan rajin kare haƙƙin mata ba, ba wai ƙirƙirarren abu ba ne ko maganganun kawai: GASKE NE!

translation.en: Carolina, unfortunately, only adds to the statistics, there were many other cases before her which came to public attention and there are thousands of other cases that do not come to public attention.
translation.ha: A rashin sa'a, Carolina kawai ta ƙara yawan ƙididdigar ne, akwai ire-iren waɗannan lamura da yawa kafin ta waɗanda suka ja hankulan mutane kuma akwai dubunnan waɗannan matsalolin waɗanda ba su fito fili ba.

translation.en: It is a problem which is right there at the doorstep, before our eyes.
translation.ha: Matsala ce wadda take a bakin ƙofa, a gaban idanuwanmu.

translation.en: There is a structure that dictates and relegates women to roles of subordination which turns them into potential targets of violence of all kinds and at all levels.
translation.ha: Akwai tsarin da yake nuna mayar da mata baya zuwa taka rawar mabiya wanda hakan yake mayar da su abun duk wata irin gallazawa a kowane mataki.

translation.en: This structure of masculine supremacy which hangs over us and which many deny the existence of — and that is not invisible — does this: it mutilates and destroys the lives of women and KILLS!
translation.ha: Tsarin fifikon maza da yake a rataye a kanmu wanda kuma wasu suke kore faruwarsa - wanda kuma ba a ɓoye yake ba - shi yake aiwatar da haka: yana lalata gami da tarwatsa rayuwar mata kuma yana KASHEWA!

translation.en: We, individual women, and also as a collective, will continue to shout "stop killing us" and "hurting our being".
translation.ha: Mu, ɗaiɗaikun mata, da kuma a dunƙule, za mu cigaba da yayata "ku daina kashe mu" da "illata mu".

translation.en: We want laws that protect us and are really applicable, we want public policies that bring respect of our humanity to debates and institutions.
translation.ha: Muna son dokoki da za su kare mu kuma waɗanda ake amfani da su, muna son dokokin al'umma da za su kawo girmama mutuntakarmu wajen samar da ra'ayi da jagoranci.

translation.en: We want a society where we are not afraid of going out in the street!
translation.ha: Muna buƙatar al'ummar da ba za mu ji tsoron fita waje ba!

translation.en: We will continue demanding a society where we have our freedom of being, of feeling, of walking and thinking how we want.
translation.ha: Za mu cigaba da neman wurin da muke da 'yancin rayuwa da na tunani da na zirga-zirga da yin tunani yadda muke so.

translation.en: We will continue to demand a society where we can live in security.
translation.ha: Za mu cigaba da neman wurin da da za mu zauna a cikin tsaro.

translation.en: Meanwhile, this campaign sparked opposing reactions from some men who found justifications for the wave of violence against women.
translation.ha: A halin yanzu, wannan gangami ya jawo cece-kuce daga wasu mazajen waɗanda suke ganin kamar akwai ƙanshin gaskiya a cikin gallazawa matan.

translation.en: Their campaign is called "Stop Betraying Us" and believe that betrayal is a valid reason for domestic violence against women.
translation.ha: Nasu gangamin shi ne "Ku Daina Yaudarar Mu" kuma sun amince cewa yaudara karɓaɓɓen dalili ne da zai jawo gallazawa mata.

translation.en: Though their movement has not gained much traction, Angolan rapper Gil Slows Allen Russel even said:
translation.ha: Duk da cewa gangamin nasu bai samu karɓuwa ba sosai, mawaƙin Angola, Gil Slows Allen Russel ya ce:

translation.en: Translation Original Quote
translation.ha: Fassara Abin da aka faɗa na ainihi

translation.en: Stop betraying others, please no more cuckolds.
translation.ha: A daina butulcewa wasu, don Allah a daina butulci.

translation.en: It is a loud cry, women if you no longer love us ask for a divorce before betraying us, go away.
translation.ha: Kuka ne mai ƙaraji, mata in har ba kwa son mu to ku nemi saki kafin ku yaudare mu, ku tafi kawai.

translation.en: Sociologist Mbangula Kemba criticized this point of view, asserting that conjugal problems must not be resolved with violence.
translation.ha: Masanin halayyar zamantakewar ɗan'adam, Mbangula Kemba ya caccaki wannan fahimtar ya nuna cewa ba za a gyara zamantakewar aure ta hanyar gallazawa ba.

translation.en: Angola approved a domestic violence law known as 25/11 in 2011 which criminalizes all acts of domestic violence as a public crime.
translation.ha: ƙasar Angola ta amince da wata dokar matsalolin cikin gida wadd aka fi sani da 25/11 a 2011 wadda ta haramta duk wasu ayyukan cin zarafin iyali a matsayin wani babban laifi.

translation.en: However, this law has insufficiently light sentences, which vary from two to eight years.
translation.ha: Amma ita wannan doka tana da sassaƙan hukunci, wanda ya bambanta daga shekaru biyu zuwa takwas.

translation.en: Sizaltina Cutaia, an activist and feminist in Angola well-known for working on women’s rights, called for a better application of the law on social media:
translation.ha: Sizaltina Cutaia, wata 'yar gwargwarmaya kuma mai kare haƙƙin mata a Angola, wadda aka san ta sosai a kan ayyukan kare haƙƙin mata, ta yi kira ga samar da kyakkyawar hanyar tabbtar da dokar a dandulan sadarwa:

translation.en: Translation Original Quote
translation.ha: Fassara Abin da aka faɗa na ainihi

translation.en: It is not enough to increase sentences, Mrs. vice president of the MPLA [People's Movement for the Liberation of Angola], it is necessary that the state creates structural conditions to combat violence — the commitments taken in 2007 through the ratification of the protocol of Maputo need to be implemented.
translation.ha: Bai isa ba kawai a ce a ƙara hukuncin, mataimakin shugabn MPLA [Yunƙurin Mutane don 'Yantar da Angola], dole ne ƙasar ta samar da wani tsari d zai yaƙi rigingimu - ya kamata a tabbatar da irin yunƙurin da aka yi a 2007 wajen gyara tsarin Maputo.

translation.en: As well as this, it is necessary to create structures to attend to the victims and enact complementary legislation that guarantees de facto realization of women’s rights.
translation.ha: Kamar wannan, dole kuma a samar da tsarin da zai tallafi wadda abin ya ritsa da su kuma a samar da dokar da za ta tabbatar da 'yanci mata.

translation.en: This includes all the legislation around women’s sexual and reproductive rights.
translation.ha: Wannan ya haɗar da duk dokokin da suka shafi haƙƙoƙin jima'i da haihuwa na mata.

translation.en: It is no use making speeches against domestic violence and afterward supporting policies that authorize inspectors and police officers to assault women daily in the streets, it’s contradictory!
translation.ha: Ba wani amfani a yi ta maganganu a kan ƙin cin zarafin mata kuma daga baya a dinga goyon bayan dokokin da za su dinga ba wa 'yan sanda damar cin zarafin mata a kullum a kan tituna, wannan tufka da warwara ne!

translation.en: It is no use making speeches against domestic violence and supporting a state budget which does not safeguard social services, the underfinancing of which we all know negatively impacts the lives of women.
translation.ha: Ba wani amfani a yi ta gabatar da maganganu a kan cin zaarafin mata kuma ana goyon bayan kasafin kuɗin ƙasa wanda ba ya kula da rayuwar al'umma, rashin isassun kuɗin da duk mun san cewa yana mummunan tasiri a kan rayuwar mata.

translation.en: It is necessary to give sense to the speeches with concrete actions.
translation.ha: Ya zama dole a ba wa maganganun ma'ana tare da aiki a fili.

translation.en: Put your money where your mouth is.
translation.ha: Ka sa kuɗinka a inda bakinka yake.

translation.en: # stop killing women
translation.ha: # a daina kashe mata

translation.en: Feminist Cecília Kitombé reacted to those who continue to encourage violent relationships:
translation.ha: Yar gwagwarmayar kare haƙƙin mata Cecilia Kitombe ta mayar da martani a kan waɗanda suke cigaba da goyon bayan mu'amalolin zalunci:

translation.ha: Wasu daga cikin waɗanda suke … nuna cewa an fiye [magana a kan cin zarafin iyali], su ne dai waɗanda suke ba wa 'ya'ya mata da 'yan'uwa mata shawarar su dinga zama a cikin irin wannan cin zarafi, suna fakewa da cewa ai tsakanin miji da mata ba mai shiga, wasu kuma suna gaya ma ka cigaba, rayuwar aure ai dama haka take...

translation.en: How preserving folktales and legends help raise environment awareness in the Mekong
translation.ha: Ta yaya taskace tatsuniyoyi da labarai suke taimakawa wjen samar da wayewa a cikin al'umma a Mekong

translation.en: The Mekong Basin. Photo from the website of The People's Stories project.
translation.ha: Mahaɗar ruwan Mekong. Asalin hoto daga shafin intanet na "shirin Labaran mutane".

translation.en: Used with permission
translation.ha: An samu izinin amfani da shi.

translation.en: In 2014, several indigenous communities in the Mekong started recording their stories and legends with the help of a group of researchers who are exploring how these narratives can help exposing the destructive impact of large-scale projects in the region.
translation.ha: A 2014, da yawa daga cikin al'ummomin 'yan ƙasa a Mekon sun fara naɗar labaransu ta hanyar taimakon wasu ƙunƙiyar masu bincike waɗanda suke bincike a kan yadda waɗannan labaran za su taimaka wajen fito da tasirin ɓarnar manyan shirye-shirye a yankin.

translation.en: The Mekong is one of Asia’s great river systems which flows through six countries: China, Myanmar, Thailand, Laos, Cambodia, and Vietnam.
translation.ha: Mekong ɗaya ne daga cikin tsarin ruwa masu muhimmanci a Asiya waɗanda ya bi ta ƙasashe shida: Sin da Myanmar da Thailand da Laos da Cambodiya da kuma ɓietnam.

translation.en: It is rich in biodiversity and a vital source of livelihood for millions of farmers and fisherfolk.
translation.ha: Yana da arziƙin halittu kuma wani wajen samun masarufin rayuwa ne ga miliyoyin manoma da masunta.

translation.en: In recent years, several large-scale projects such as hydropower dams have displaced residents while threatening the river basin's ecosystem.
translation.ha: A 'yan shekarun bayan nan, akwai manyan shirye-shirye kamar dam-dam na lantarki da suka kori mazauna wurin tare da yin barazana ga tsarin yanayin ruwan.

translation.en: Despite protests, the construction of dams has continued, especially in Laos and Thailand.
translation.ha: Duk da nuna ƙyamar hakan, gine-ginen dam-dam ɗin nan ya ci gaba, musamman a Laos da Thailand.

translation.en: In partnership with Mekong Watch, a Japan-based group advocating sustainable development in the region, several community elders in the Mekong began recording some of their stories and legends in 2014 that revolve around nature.
translation.ha: Tare da haɗin guiwar Mekong Watch, wata ƙungiyar Japan mai rajin kawo cigaba a yankin, da dattawan unguwa da yawa a Mekong sun fara naɗar labaransu a 2014 waɗanda suke da alaƙa da yanayi.

translation.en: Mekong Watch believes that these stories "have played an important role in protecting nature by avoiding the over-exploitation of natural resources."
translation.ha: Mekon Watch sun aminta da cewa waɗannan labaran "sun taka muhimmiyar rawa wajen kare yanayi ta hanyar hana yawan ɓarnatar da ma'adanan wurin."

translation.en: Mekong Watch asserts that part of the commons that need to be protected are not just natural resources but also "intangible heritages" that can be shared and accessed by the local community.
translation.ha: Mekong Watch ta nuna cewa daga cikin abubuwan da ake so a kare ba wai ma'adanan ne ba kawai, har ma da "wasu ƙananan abubuwan tarihi" waɗanda al'ummar wurin za su iya rabawa su amfana da su.

translation.en: Toshiyuki Doi, senior adviser of Mekong watch, adds:
translation.ha: Toshiyuki Doi, babban mai bayar da shawara ga Mekong Watch, ya ƙara da cewa:

translation.en: People’s stories should be regarded, recognized, and respected as Mekong’s commons, especially these days when they are losing their place in local communities to more modern media, and are not passed on to next generations.
translation.ha: Dole a lura a kuma girmama labaran mutane, a matsayinsu na 'yan Mekong, musamman ma a waɗannan 'yan kwanakin da suke rasa wurinsu a garuruwansu zuwa ga ƙarin sababbin kafafen yaɗa labarai, kuma ba a miƙa su zuwa ga 'yan gaba.

translation.en: Areas in the Mekong where researchers conducted fieldwork. 1. Kmhmu’ in northern and central Laos; 2. Siphandon in southern Laos; 3. Akha in northern Thailand; 4. Thai So and Isan in northeastern Thailand; 5. Bunong in northeastern Cambodia.
translation.ha: Wurare a Mekong inda masu bincike suka yi bincike. 1. Kmhmu’ a Arewaci da kuma tsakiyar Laos; 2. Siphandon a Kudancin Laos; 3. Akha a Arewacin Thailand; 4. Thai So da Isan Arewa masu gabashin Thailand; 5. Bunong Arewa maso gabashin Cambodiya.

translation.en: Used with permission.
translation.ha: an samu izinin amfani da shi.

translation.en: The group was able to collect a total of 102 stories in Cambodia, Laos, and Thailand.
translation.ha: ƙungiyar ta sami damar karɓar jimillar labarai 102 a Cambodiyo da Laso da kuma Thailand.

translation.en: Stories were recorded, transcribed, and translated into the national languages of Thailand, Laos, and Cambodia before an English version was made.
translation.ha: An naɗi labarai, an rubuta su an fassara su zuwa harsunan ƙasar Thailand da Laos da Cambodiya kafin a samar da na Ingilishi.

translation.en: Mekong Watch published these stories as pamphlets in both printed and digital formats, and used them during environment workshops they conducted at the communities.
translation.ha: Mekong Watch ta buga waɗannan labarai a matsayin 'yan ƙananan takardu a takardu da kuma intanet, kuma sun yi amfani da su a wajen ayyukan unguwanni waɗanda suke yi a cikin al'umma.

translation.en: Since late 2016, we have used people’s stories to provide environmental education to children in rural Laos and Thailand.
translation.ha: Tun ƙarshen shekarar 2016, mun yi amfani da labaran mutane domin samar da ilimin zamantakewa ga yara a yankunan karkara na Laos da Thailand.

translation.en: We have hosted workshops in schools and local communities to guide children, and sometimes adults, to collect stories from elderly people, learn from the stories, and turn them into reading materials.
translation.ha: Mun yi tarurrukan ƙarawa juna sani a makarantu da unguwanni domin yi wa yara jagora, wasu lokutan har da manya, domin karɓar labarai daga manya, a koyi wani abu daga labaran, sannan a mayar da su abubuwan karanta.

translation.en: An example of a workshop involves the retelling of the story of "The Owl and the Deer" from Kmhmu’ people in central and northern Laos.
translation.ha: Misalin wani taron ya ƙunshi sake karanta labarin "Mujiya da Dila" daga mutanen Kmhmu a tsakiya da arewacin Laos.

translation.en: The story is about an owl who lost his ability to see during the day after cheating a deer.
translation.ha: Labarin ya ƙunshi wata mujiya da ta rasa gani da rana bayan ta cuci wani dila.

translation.en: During a workshop, young participants are asked:
translation.ha: A lokacin taron, akan tambayi matasan da shiga taron:

translation.en: "What kinds of animals appear in the story?",
translation.ha: "Wwaɗannan irin dabbobi ne suka fito a labarin?",

translation.en: "Can you see these animals in your village?", and
translation.ha: "Kuna ganin irin waɗannan dabbobin a ƙauyukanku?", kuma

translation.en: "If there are fewer of these animals in your village than before, why do you think this has happened?"
translation.ha: "In akwai 'yan kaɗan daga cikin irin waɗannan dabbobin a ƙauyukanku ba kamar da ba, me ya sa kuke tunanin hakan ta faru?"

translation.en: After this, participants are encouraged to connect the story to the deterioration of the environment in their communities.
translation.ha: Bayan wannan, akan ƙarfafi guiwar mahalarta taron da su alaƙanta labarin da taɓarɓarewar muhalli a unguwanninsu.

translation.en: In Champasak Province, south Laos, the legend of the endangered Irrawaddy dolphin and the Sida bird is used to highlight how a dam project is disrupting the seasonal migration of Mekong River fisheries.
translation.ha: A lardin Champasak, kudancin Laos, an yi amfani da labarin kifayen Irrawaddy waɗanda suka kusa ƙarewa da tsuntsun Sida domin nuna yadda aikin dam yake illata yadda kifaye suke kai-kawo a ruwan Mekong lokaci-lokaci.

translation.en: Another story also from southern Laos is instructive on the value of resource management:
translation.ha: Wani labarin shi ma daga kudancin Laos ya yi nuni ga muhimmancin kula da ma'adanai:

translation.en: The story about the Rhino Head was recorded on November 16, 2014, at the Songkram River bank in northeast Thailand.
translation.ha: An naɗi labarin da yake magana a kan kan mugun dawa a 16 ga Nuwamba, 2014 a gaɓar ruwan Songkram a arewa maso gabashin Thailand.

translation.en: The narrator was Mun Kimprasert, aged 68, photo by Mekong Watch, used with permission.
translation.ha: Mai ba da labarin shi ne Mun Kimprasert, ɗan shekaru 68, Hoto daga Mekong Watch, an samu izinin amfani da shi.

translation.en: Once, a soldier stepped into a spirit forest.
translation.ha: Sau ɗaya, wani soja ya shiga dajin aljanu.

translation.en: He discovered a lot of tobacco leaves there and collected them.
translation.ha: Ya sami ganyayen taba da yawa kuma ya kwaso su.

translation.en: However, when trying to leave the forest, he could not find an exit.
translation.ha: Amma a lokacin da yake ƙoƙarin barin dajin, sai ya kasa samun hanya.

translation.en: It was because he took more tobacco leaves than he could possibly consume for himself.
translation.ha: Saboda ya ɗebo ganyayen taɓa da yawa ne yake so ya halaka kansa.

translation.en: No matter how hard he searched, he could not find a way.
translation.ha: Duk yadda ya duba, ya kasa samun hanya.

translation.en: Realizing what might have been the problem, he finally decided to return the tobacco leaves to the forest.
translation.ha: Bayan ya gane abin da shi ne matsalar, a ƙarshe sai ya yanke shawarar mayar da ganyayen tabar zuwa dajin.

translation.en: The moment he dropped them on the ground, he was able to see an exit in front of him.
translation.ha: Yana ajiye su a ƙasa, sai ya ga ƙofa a gabansa.

translation.en: In northern Thailand, a story by the Akha people about the origin of the swing teaches self-sacrifice through a heroic episode of a brother and a sister who put the world in order.
translation.ha: A arewacin Thailand, akwai labari daga mutanen Akha game da asalin lilo yana koyar da sadaukarwa ta hanyar wata gwarzantakar wani ɗan'uwa da 'yar'uwa waɗanda suka gyara duniya.

translation.en: In northeast Thailand, a folktale about Ta Sorn narrated by Tongsin Tanakanya promotes unity among neighbors in a farming community.
translation.ha: A arewa masu gabashin Thailand, akwai wata tatsuniya a kan Ta Sorn wadda Tongsin Tanakanya ya bayar, tana ƙara haɗin kai a tsakanin manoma maƙota.

translation.en: Another story recalls how the hunting of a rhinoceros led to the formation of salt trading in this part of the country.
translation.ha: Wani labarin ya bayyana yadda farautar mugun dawa ta jawo samuwar kasuwancin gishiri a wannan ɓangare na ƙasar.

translation.en: In Bunong, located in northeast Cambodia, there are stories about rituals to fix bad marriages and planting and harvest ceremonies narrated by Khoeuk Keosineam.
translation.ha: A Bunong, wadda take a arewa maso gabashin Cambodiya, akwai labarai a kan wasu tsubbace-tsubbace domin a gyara wasu auratayyar da suka lalace da kuma bukukuwan noma da girbi, waɗanda Khoeuk Keosineam ya bayar.

translation.en: There is also the legend of the elephant as retold by Chhot Pich which reveals how villagers who once poisoned a river were punished by the gods and turned into elephants.
translation.ha: Akwai kuma labarin giwa kamar yadda Chhot Pich ya ƙara bayarwa wanda yake nuna yadda ƙauyawa waɗanda suka taɓa zuwa guba a ruwa alloli suka yi musu hukunci aka mayar da su giwaye.

translation.en: It explains why elephants were comfortable living with humans but, after several generations, they forgot their origins and went to live in the forest.
translation.ha: Ya yi bayanin dalilin da ya sa giwaye suke iya zama da mutane amma, bayan zamani da yawa, sai suka manta asalinsu suka koma zama a daji.

translation.en: Hea Phoeun from the Laoka Village, Senmonorom, Mondulkiri Province in Cambodia shares a village ritual on how to fix an unfit marriage.
translation.ha: Hea Phoeun daga ƙauyen Laoka, Semonorom, a lardin Mondulkiri a Cambodiya suna da wasu tadoji na ƙauye game da yadda za a gyara auren da ya lalace.

translation.en: Photo by Mekong Watch, used with permission.
translation.ha: Hoto daga Mekong Watch, an samu izinin amfani da shi.

translation.en: For Mekong Watch and the threatened communities in the region, preserving these stories is integral in the campaign to resist projects that would displace thousands of people living in the Mekong:
translation.ha: Game da Mekong Watch da kuma al'ummomin da suke fuskantar barazana a ɓangaren, adana waɗannan labaran yana daga cikin hanyoyin wayar da kai domin ƙin shirye-shiryen da za su tarwatsa dubunnan mutanen da ke zaune a Mekong:

translation.en: These stories can help form their identity as a community member and identify with the environment.
translation.ha: Waɗannan labaran za su taimaka wajen fito da su waye su a matsayinsu na 'yan wannan al'umma kuma a gane daga inda suke.

translation.en: By means of stories, the communities search for ways to accommodate and/or resist changes that are taking place in the Mekong river basin.
translation.ha: Ta hanyar labaran, al'ummomin suna neman hanyoyin da za su zauna da ko nuna ƙiyayya ga wasu sauye-sauyen da suke faruwa a gaɓar ruwan Mekong.

translation.en: Meet Nigeria's presidential candidates of 2019
translation.ha: Ga 'yan takarar shugabancin ƙasar Najeriya a 2019

translation.en: The 2019 Nigerian presidential candidates [Collage by Nwachukwu Egbunike].
translation.ha: Yan takarar shugabancin Najeriya a 2019 [Tattarawa daga Nwachukwu Egbunike].

translation.en: Nigeria, Africa's most populous nation, will hold presidential elections on February 16, 2019.
translation.ha: Najeriya, ƙasar da ta fi kowacce yawan jama'a a Afirka, za ta yi zaɓuɓɓukan shugaban ƙasa a 16, Fabarairun 2019.

translation.en: Although there are 73 presidential candidates, the race for Aso Rock — the seat of Nigeria's presidency — will be between two major contenders and candidates from the so-called "third force", a group of hopefuls who are relatively new to Nigerian politics.
translation.ha: Duk da cewa akwai 'yan takarar shugaban ƙasa guda 73, fatan zuwa Aso Rock - mazaunin fadar shugabancin Najeriya - zai zama tsakanin manyan 'yan takara biyu da kuma wasu 'yan takara daga wannan "raba gardama", wata haɗakar masu sa-rai waɗanda sababbi-sababbi ne a siyasar Najeriya.

translation.en: Muhammad Buhari, president of Nigeria. Creative Commons.
translation.ha: Muhammad Buhari, shugaban Najeriya. Creatiɓe Commons.

translation.en: The two major Nigerian parties, All Progressive Congress and Peoples Democratic Party, will, of course, be fielding their candidates:
translation.ha: Manyan jam'iyyun Najeriya guda biyu, APC da PDP, tabbas za su fitar da 'yan takararsu:

translation.en: Muhammadu Buhari
translation.ha: Muhammadu Buhari

translation.en: The incumbent candidate of the All Progressive Congress, Buhari won the 2011 presidential election after defeating former president Goodluck Jonathan.
translation.ha: ɗan takarar 'yanzu na APC, Buhari, ya ci zaɓen shugabancin ƙasa a 2011 bayan ya kayar da tsohon shugaban ƙasa Goodluck Jonathan.

translation.en: Buhari's ascendance to power was based on his integrity and perceived ability to curb corruption and the Boko Haram militancy.
translation.ha: ɗarewar Buhari kan karagar mulki yana da alaƙa da gaskiyarsa da yadda ake tunanin zai kori cin-hanci da kuma hare-haren Boko Haram.

translation.en: However, under his watch, Nigeria has witnessed continued insecurity with pastoral conflicts between herders and farmers as herders from the north move further south in search of arable lands.
translation.ha: Amma a saɓanin haka, a ƙarƙashin mulkinsa, Najeriya ta cigaba da ganin rashin kwanciyar hankali na faɗace-faɗacen kiwo tsakanin manoma da makiyaya a yayin da makiyaya daga arewa suke nausawa kudu domin neman ƙasar kiwo.

translation.en: Also, human rights have taken a nose drive in his administration, with impunity and corruption at the highest levels of government.
translation.ha: Haka kuma, harkokin kare haƙƙin ɗan'adam sun samu cibaya a mulkinsa, ga zalunci da cin hanci a manyan madafun gwamnati.

translation.en: Atiku Abubakar [Image from Campaign Organisation Website].
translation.ha: Atiku Abubakar [Hoto daga Shafin Intanen na ƙungiyar Kamfe].

translation.en: Atiku Abubakar
translation.ha: Atiku Abubakar [Hoto daga Shafin Intanen na ƙungiyar Kamfe].

translation.en: Abubakar is the former vice president and candidate of the Peoples Democratic Party.
translation.ha: Abubakar tsohon mataimakin shugaban ƙasa ne kuma shi ne ɗan takarar PDP.

translation.en: He has tried in the past to win presidential elections but has not been successful.
translation.ha: Ya yi ƙoƙari a baya don ya ci zaɓuɓɓukan shugaban ƙasa amma bai yi nasara ba.

translation.en: However, his campaign received a major boost with the reconciliation with his boss, former President Olusegun Obasanjo — who had described Buhari's administration as a failed government.
translation.ha: Amma kamfen ɗinsa ya samu muhimmin tagomashi bayan ya shirya da tsohon mai gidansa, tsohon shugaban ƙasa Olusgun Obasanjo - wanda ya bayyana gwamnati Buhari da gwamnatin da ta gaza.

translation.en: As vice president, Abubakar oversaw the privatization and sale of hundreds of loss-making and poorly managed public enterprises.
translation.ha: A matsayin mataimakin shugaban ƙasa, Atiku Abubakar shi ne ya jagoranci siyar da ɗaruruwan kadarorin gwamnati da suke jawo asara kuma ba a tafiyar da su yadda ya kamata.

translation.en: A few other presidential hopefuls to watch are:
translation.ha: Wasu ƙarin masu son shugabancin ƙasar da za a lura da su su ne:

translation.en: Oby Ezekwesili [Image released by campaign organizers as media resource]
translation.ha: Oby Ezekwesili [ƙungiyar kamfe ce ta saki hoton a matsayin na intanet]

translation.en: Obiageli [Oby] Ezekwesili
translation.ha: Obiageli [Oby] Ezekwesili

translation.en: Ezekwesili, the only major female candidate in this year's race, served as the minister of solid minerals and later education during the presidency of Olusegun Obasanjo between 1999 to 2007.
translation.ha: Ezekwesili, wadda ita kaɗai ce mace 'yar takara a takarar wannan shekarar, ta yi aikin ministar daskararrun ma'adanai daga baya kuma ilimi a lokacin shugabancin ƙasar Olusegun Obasanjo daga 1999 zuwa 2007.

translation.en: She was also former vice president of the Africa division of the World Bank from May 2007 to May 2012.
translation.ha: Kuma ita tsohuwar mataimakiyar shugaban ƙasa ta ɓangaren Afirka na Bankin Duniya daga Mayun 2007 zuwa Mayu 2012.

translation.en: Ezekwesili has been at the forefront of the call to rescue about 200 school girls who were abducted by the Boko Haram militant Islamic group in 2014.
translation.ha: Ezekwesili ta zamanto a kan gaba wajen kira domin a ceto ɗalibai 'yan mata 200 waɗanda Boko Haram ƙungiyar 'yan ta'adda suka sace a 2014.

translation.en: She is a co-founder of the #BringBackOurGirls (BBOG) Movement.
translation.ha: Tana cikin waɗanda suka ƙirƙiro tafiyar #BringBackOurGirls (a dawo mana da 'yan matanmu) (BBOG).

translation.en: She is also the presidential flag-bearer of the Allied Congress Party of Nigeria.
translation.ha: Kuma ita ce wadda za ta yi takarar shugabancin ƙasa a jam'iyyar ACPN

translation.en: Kingsley Moghalu [Image from campaign website].
translation.ha: Kingsley Moghalu [Hoto daga shafin kamfe na intanet].

translation.en: Kingsley Moghalu
translation.ha: Kingsley Moghalu

translation.en: Moghalu is a professor of international business and public policy at the Fletcher School of Law and Diplomacy at Tufts University in Massachusetts, USA.
translation.ha: Moghalu farfesa ne a harkokin kasuwanci na ƙasa da ƙasa da kuma tsara dokokin al'umma a jami'ar Shari'a da Diplomasiyya ta Fletcher da Jami'ar Tufts a Massachesetts, Amurka.

translation.en: Moghalu had previously worked in the United Nations from 1992 to 2008.
translation.ha: Moghalu ya taɓa aiki a Majalisar ɗinkin Duniya daga 1992 zuwa 2008.

translation.en: He was deputy governor of the Central Bank of Nigeria from 2009 to 2014, where "he led extensive reforms in the Nigerian banking system after the global financial crisis."
translation.ha: Ya yi mataimakin gwamnan Babban Bankin Najeriya daga 2009 zuwa 2014, inda "ya yi shugabanci da kawo sauye-sauye masu yawa a tsarin bankin Najeriya bayan matsalolin tattalin arziƙin duniya."

translation.en: He is the candidate of the Young Progressive Party.
translation.ha: Shi ne ɗan takarar YPP.

translation.en: Omoyele Sowore [Screen shot from CNBCAfrica interview, Dec 13, 2018].
translation.ha: Omoyele Sowore [Hoton waya daga ganawar CNɓCAfrica, 13 ga Dis, 2018].

translation.en: Omoyole Sowore
translation.ha: Omoyole Sowore

translation.en: Sowore is the founder and publisher of SaharaReporters (SR), an investigative online newspaper.
translation.ha: Sowore shi ne wanda ya kafa kuma yake buga jaridar SaharaReporters (SR) wata jaridar binciken diddigi ta intanet.

translation.en: SR has been described as Africa's Wikileaks.
translation.ha: An bayyana SR a matsayin Wikileaks ta Afirka.

translation.en: This human rights activist is running under the banner of African Action Congress.
translation.ha: Wannan ɗan gwagwarmayar kare haƙƙin ɗan'adam ɗin yana takara ne a ƙarƙashin jam'iyyar AAC.

translation.en: The race is on for Nigeria's future
translation.ha: Takarar ta fara domin gobe Najeriya

translation.en: Buhari and Abubakar are the major contenders in this race.
translation.ha: Buhari da Abubakar su ne manyan 'yan takara a wannan zaɓen.

translation.en: Both men have been constants in the political arena in Nigeria.
translation.ha: Duk su biyun sun daɗe a harkar siyasarsu a Najeriya.

translation.en: On the other hand, Ezekwesili, Moghalu, Sowore, the "third force", are a group making their first entry into the partisan political space.
translation.ha: A ɗaya ɓangaren, Ezekwesili da Moghalu da Sowore 'yan "raba-gardama" wata tawaga ce da suke farin shiga zuwa sansanin siyasar jam'iyya.

translation.en: Buhari will be running on the gains of his administration over the past three years and must contend with the fact that Nigeria was recently ranked as the poverty capital of the world.
translation.ha: Buhari zai yi takara ne a kan ribar da mulkinsa ya samu a shekaru uku da suka shuɗe kuma dole ya tafi a kan haƙiƙanin cewa an lissafa Najeriya a matsayin hedikwatar talauci ta duniya.

translation.en: The Punch newspaper described Buhari’s "parochial appointments" as "unprecedented" and has left the country deeply divided.
translation.ha: Jaridar Punch ta bayyana "naɗe-naɗen son rai" na gwamnatin Buhari a matsayin waɗanda "ba a taɓa ganin irinsu ba" kuma sun bar ƙasar a rabe sosai.

translation.en: His fight against corruption appears selective and punitive.
translation.ha: Yaƙinsa da yake yi wa cin hanci ta bayyana na zaɓa ne kuma don a hukunta wasu ne kawai.

translation.en: The recent move to try the Chief Justice of the Federation — so close to the presidential election — was described by the Nigerian Bar Association as "a pattern of consistent assault on the heads of the two independent arms of government" by the Buhari administration.
translation.ha: Yunƙurin baya-bayan nan don a hukunta babban jojin ƙasar - a kurkusa da zaɓen shugaban ƙasa - ƙungiyar lauyoyi ta ƙasa ta bayyana hakan da cewa "wani salo ne na cin zarafin shugabannin biyu daga cikin sassan gwamnati masu cin gashin kansu" wanda gwamnatin Buharin take yi.

translation.en: Abubakar, on the other hand, is riding on the "gains" of "multiple lucrative business interests".
translation.ha: Abubakar kuwa, a ɗaya ɓangaren, ya dogara ne a kan "sa'ar" "abubuwan kasuwanci da yawa" da yake da su.

translation.en: However, he has an uphill task considering the power of incumbency of his major opponent.
translation.ha: Amma yana da babban aiki idan aka yi duba da ƙarfin mulki da babban abokin karawarsa yake da shi.

translation.en: Whoever wins the 2019 elections will face enormous challenges like the strengthening the economy, internal security, restructuring power and power devolution, and ethnoreligious politics.
translation.ha: Duk wanda ya zaɓen 2019 zai fuskance manyan matsaloli kamar ƙamar ƙara ƙarfafa tattalin arziƙi da tsaron cikin gida da sauya tsarin mulki da rage ƙarfin tsakiya da kuma siyasar ɓangaranci da kuma addini.

translation.en: Singled out for search at a Serbian supermarket, Roma opera superstar accuses the store of racism
translation.ha: Bayan an ware shi shi kaɗai don bincike a wani babban kantin Serbia, shahararren ɗan wasan dandali na Roma ya zargi kantin da wariyar launin fata.

translation.en: Nataša Tasić Knežević, photo by Dzenet Koko, used with permission.
translation.ha: Natasa Tasic Knezeɓic, hoto daga Dzenet Koko, an samu izinin amfani da shi.

translation.en: Serbian opera star Nataša Tasić Knežević, photo by Dzenet Koko, used with permission.
translation.ha: Mashahuriyar 'yar wasan kwaikwayon nan ta Serbia Natasa Tsic Knezeɓic, hoto daga Dzenet Koko, an samu izinin amfani da shi.

translation.en: Serbian social networks were set ablaze after opera singer and local superstar Nataša Tasić Knežević, who is of Roma origin, accused a supermarket in the city of Novi Sad of racial profiling on a live broadcast on Facebook.
translation.ha: An cika dandulan sadarwar Serbia bayan mawaƙin dandali kuma shahararren ɗan wasa Natasa Tasic Knezeɓic, wanda ɗan asalin Roma ne, ya zargi babban kanti a garin Noɓi Sad da wariyar launiya fata a wani shirin kai tsaye a shafin Fesbuk.

translation.en: In the video, broadcast on December 29 right after the incident, Ms. Tasić Knežević explained that as she exited the Maxi supermarket store along with several other shoppers, the anti-theft sensor beeped.
translation.ha: A bidiyon, wanda aka yaɗa a 29 ga Disamba jin kaɗan bayan faruwar lamarin, Ms. Tasic Knezeɓic ta bayyana cewa ta fita daga babban kantin Maɗi tare da wasu masu siyayya da yawa, sai ƙararrawar kama ɓarayi ta yi motsi.

translation.en: While everyone else was allowed to leave, the store's security officers told her to stay and proceeded to search her in public while onlookers heckled her.
translation.ha: A yayin da aka bar kowa ya fita, sai jami'an tsaron kantin suka ce mata ta tsaya kuma suka cigaba da bincike ta a gaban mutane wasu masu kallo suna yi mata dariya.

translation.en: In her backpack, they only found sheet music, books, and a wallet.
translation.ha: A jakarta ta baya, sun samu takardar waƙa da littattafai da kuma walet kawai.

translation.en: In the first days of January 2019, the video suddenly vanished from the platform along with Ms. Knežević's profile.
translation.ha: A kwanakin farko na Janairun 2019, sai bidiyon ya ɓace kawai daga kan manhajar tare da shafin Ms. Knezeɓic.

translation.en: Although she hasn't publicly explained what happened, many speculate that she has removed them herself to de-escalate the turmoil.
translation.ha: Duk da cewa ba ta yi bayanin abin da ya faru a fili ba, da yawa suna hasashen cewa ta cire su ne da kanta domin ta sassauta rikicin.

translation.en: In just a few days, her video amassed over 60 thousand views, was shared around 350 times and received around 700 reactions.
translation.ha: A 'yan kwaki kaɗan, bidiyon ya samu masu kallo da duby 60, kuma na yaɗa shi wajen sau 350 kuma ya samu waje martani 700.

translation.en: Independent news portal Buka was the first to report the incident, followed by other Balkan media.
translation.ha: Kafar yaɗa labarai mai zaman kanta ta Buka ita ta fara yin rahoton lamarin, sannan wasu kafafen yaɗa labaran Balkan suna biyo baya.

translation.en: Ms. Tasić Knežević is a soprano at the Serbian National Theatre, located in Novi Sad, the country's second largest city.
translation.ha: Ms. Tasic Knezeɓic makaɗin ne a Dandalin Serbia na ƙasa, wanda yake a Noɓi Sad, babban birni na biyu a ƙasar.

translation.en: Previously, she worked in the Belgrade theater Atelje 212.
translation.ha: A baya, ta yi aiki a dandalin Belgrade, Atelje 212.

translation.en: She is also a choir performer and a soloist of popular music and often sings of her own Roma heritage.
translation.ha: Haka kuma ita 'yar amshi ce kuma tana yin shahararriyar waƙa ita kaɗai, takan yi waƙa a kan abubuwan al'adunta na Roma.

translation.en: In the video, Ms Knežević says the store manager apologized to her after she complained about the maltreatment, but that she was still hurt by the mob's harassment.
translation.ha: A bidiyon, Ms Knezeɓic tana cewa manajan kantin ya ba ta haƙuri bayan ta yi ƙorafin rashin mutuncin, amma kuma har yanzu tana jin ciwon yadda taron mutane suka ci zarafinta.

translation.en: She says one older man shouted that they "should pack that garbage out", meaning that employees should throw her out of the store, supposedly for her being Roma.
translation.ha: Ta ce wani dattijon mutum ya furta cewa "su tarkata wannan dattin zuwa waje", yana nufin wai 'yan aiki su wurga ta wajen kantin, wataƙila don ita 'yar asalin Roma ce.

translation.en: "It is known who likes to steal around here!" is a sentence from the movie "Who's Singin’ Over There?" about events taking place on 5 April 1941.
translation.ha: "An san waɗanda suke son yin sata nan!" wata jimla ce daga wani shirin fim "Wa yake waƙa a nan wajen?" a kan abubuwan da suke faruwa ranar 5 ga Aprilun 1941.

translation.en: 77 years later this [discriminatory stereotype] is not rooted out from our mentality.
translation.ha: Shekaru 77 da suka shuɗe wannan [irin rashin mutuncin nuna wariya] ba a cire shi daga tunaninmu ba.

translation.en: The company [owning Maxi markets] is Dutch-Belgian but the employees are our people! For shame!
translation.ha: Kamfanin [da ya mallaki kasuwannin Maɗi] na Baljiyam da Jamus ne amma masu aikin mutanenmu ne! Abin kunya!

translation.en: Support for the wonderful woman and artist @NatasaTasicKnez.
translation.ha: Goyon bayan haziƙar matar kuma 'yar wasa @NatasaTasicKnez.

translation.en: "Who's Singin’ Over There?" is a 1980s Yugoslavian movie that has achieved cult status in the Balkans.
translation.ha: "Wa yake Waƙa A nan?" wani fim ne na shekarun 1980 na Yugolabiya wanda yake da muhimmanci a wajen mutanen Balkan.

translation.en: In the story, two Roma musicians are wrongfully accused of theft and barely manage to escape alive from a lynching attempt.
translation.ha: A cikin labarin, an tuhumi mawaƙan Roma biyu da sata a cikin kuskure kuma da ƙyar suka sha a raye daga ƙoƙarin kashe su.

translation.en: The parent company of Maxi supermarkets, Delez Srbija, issued an official apology on the same day.
translation.ha: Babban kamfani kasuwannin Maɗi, Delez Srbija, ya fitar da takardar neman afuwa a ranar.

translation.en: It stated that it "believes that this would remain an isolated incident of inappropriate individual reaction and that there won't be similar situations in the future".
translation.ha: Sun bayyana cewa sun "wannan zai zama shi ne irinsa na farko wanda aka mayar da martanin da bai kamata ba kuma irin hakan ba za ta sake faruwa a gaba ba".

translation.en: The company has added that it will conduct formal training of their employees on appropriate conduct upon suspicion of theft.
translation.ha: Kamfanin ya ƙara da cewa kuma za su yi horo na musamman ga ma'aikatansu game da hanyoyin da suka dace idan suna zargin sata.

translation.en: The next day, Miloš Nikolić, the Director of Office for Roma Inclusion of Novi Sad, officially condemned the incident.
translation.ha: Washegari, Milos Nikolic, daraktan ofishin Roma na shigarwa a Noɓi Sad, sun yi allawadai da lamarin a hukumance.

translation.en: He said: All available research shows that Roma men and women are the most discriminated groups in our country.
translation.ha: Ya ce: Dukkanin bincike ya nuna cewa an fi cin mutum mazan Roma da matansu a ƙasarmu.

translation.en: We have to work together to change it!
translation.ha: Dole mu yi aiki tare don mu sauya hakan!

translation.en: On December 31, Serbian Deputy Prime Minister and President of the Gender Equality Coordination Body, Zorana Mihajlović, also decried the behavior of Maxi store employees as “scandalous and for condemnation.
translation.ha: Ranar 31 ga Disamba, mataimakin firanminista kuma shugaban Haɗaɗɗiyar ƙungiyar Daidaton Jinsi na Serbiya, Zorana Mihajloɓic, ya nuna takaici game da halayyar ma'aikatan kantin Maɗi a matsayin "mafi muni kuma wadda za a yi allawadai.

translation.en: She did not announce any concrete measures to address the broader issue of discrimination against people of Roma descent in Serbia.
translation.ha: Ba ta yi bayanin wasu ƙwararan hanyoyin da za a magance wannan babbar matsalar nuna bambanci ga mutane 'yan asalin Roma a Serbiya ba.

translation.en: While Ms. Knežević seems to have removed her profile from Facebook, possibly to de-escalate the turmoil, she has retained her Twitter profile.
