translation.ha: Duk da cewa Ms. Knezeɓic kamar ta cire shafinta daga Fesbuk, wataƙila domin ta rage yaɗuwar lamarin, amma ta bar shafinta na Tuwita.

translation.en: On New Year's Eve, she posted a short message referring to the incident.
translation.ha: A jajiberin sabuwar shekara, ta rubuta wani ɗan ƙaramin saƙo da yake da alaƙa da lamarin.

translation.en: Dear friends, a very unpleasant situation took place few days ago, but I hope all such situations will remain in 2018 and that similar event won't occur any more.
translation.ha: Zuwa ga abokai, wani mummunar lamari ya faru 'yan kwanaki kaɗan da suka shuɗe, amma ina fata duk irin waɗannan abubuwa za su tsaya a 2018 kuma kwatankwacin irin abubuwan ba za su sake faruwa ba.

translation.en: Let us all be human beings, that is the only good thing on this world. <3
translation.ha: Ya kamata duk mu zama mutane, shi ne abu mai kyau kaɗai a wannan duniyar. <3

translation.en: The beef between two Trinidad and Tobago soca stars is a nod to age-old musical traditions
translation.ha: Yar hatsaniyar da ke tsakanin biyu daga cikin 'yan wasan soca na Trinidad da Tobago ɗan kuskure na wani tsohuwar waƙar gargajiya

translation.en: Trinidadian soca star Machel Montano performing at OVO Fest in Toronto in 2016. PHOTO: The Come Up Show (CC BY-ND 2.0)
translation.ha: ɗan wasan Trinidad Machel Montano wanda yake wasa a taron OɓO a Toronto a 2016. HOTO: Shirin a taso (CC BY-ND 2.0)

translation.en: Private grouses have a funny way of becoming public feuds — especially in the music industry.
translation.ha: Yan ƙananan matsalolin gida suna da ban mamaki wajen zama manyan matsaloli - musamman a wajen masana'antun kiɗa.

translation.en: From high-profile beefs like the ones between Kanye West and Taylor Swift and Jamaica's Mavado and Vybz Kartel, to the more local but equally infamous 2004 fight between Trinidadian soca stars Destra and Denise Belfon, celebrity quarrels often end up bringing attention to the artists and drawing new audiences to their music.
translation.ha: Daga manyan matsaloli kamar wanda yake tsakanin Kanye West da Taylor Swift da na 'yan Jamaica Maɓado da ɓybz Kartel, zuwa na cikin gida kuma faɗan rashin mutunci 2004 da ke tsakanin 'yan wasan ƙwallon Trinidad Dstra da Denise Belfon, faɗan shahararru sau da yawa yana jawo hankulan mutane zuwa gare su kuma yana jawo sababbin 'yan kallo zuwa ga waƙa.

translation.en: Now, thanks to a burgeoning battle between Trinidad and Tobago entertainers Machel Montano and Neil “Iwer” George, soca music officially has its first spat of 2019.
translation.ha: Yanzu, godiya ga faɗan da yake ƙara haɓaka tsakanin 'yan wasan raha na Trinidad da Tobago, Machel Montano da Neil “Iwer” George, kiɗan soca ya sami nasa rabon a karon fari a 2019.

translation.en: Trinidad and Tobago's annual Carnival celebrations take place this year on March 4 and 5, and the lead up is peak time for soca music.
translation.ha: Za a yi bikin shagalin Trinidad da Tobago na shekara za a 4 da 5 ga Maris, kuma babban abin da za a yi shi ne kiɗan soca.

translation.en: Popular soca performers like Montano and George are booked for Carnival events months in advance.
translation.ha: An tanadi shahararrun masu wasan soca kamar Montano da George domin shagalin tun watannin baya.

translation.en: They're releasing new music in a bid to win the coveted Road March title, which offers a substantial monetary prize to the artist whose song plays the most during Carnival.
translation.ha: Za su saki sabuwar waƙa a yunƙurin cin wannan kyautar da ake fafutukar so ta Road March wanda yake bayar da damar samun kyautar wasu kuɗaɗe ga ɗan wasan da waƙarsa ta fi yaɗuwa a lokacin bikin.

translation.en: Screenshot from a Vimeo video of Trinidadian soca star Iwer George performing at Return Fête in Toronto in 2018.
translation.ha: Hoton waya daga bidiyon ɓimeo na ɗan wasan soca na Trinidad Iwer George, yana wasa a Return Fete a Toronto a 2018.

translation.en: Soca music lovers first noticed tension between the two musicians when George released his first song of 2019, "Road March Bacchanal 2".
translation.ha: Masoya kiɗan soca da farkon sun fara gano matsala a tsakanin mawaƙan biyu a lokacin da George ya saki waƙarsa ta farko a 2019, "Road March Bacchanal 2".

translation.en: The song's lyrics makes it clear that George holds a grudge after losing the 2018 Road March battle to Montano.
translation.ha: Baitukan waƙar sun nuna kai tsaye cewa George yana da wata matsala bayan ya rasa gasar Road March a 2018 a hannun Montano.

translation.en: His composition, "Savannah", was a strong contender, but Montano had teamed up with soca veteran Superblue to release "Soca Kingdom", which copped the coveted 2018 Road March title.
translation.ha: Aikinsa na "Saɓannah" yana cikin muhimman 'yan takara, amma Montano ya haɗa kai da tsofaffin ƙwararrun soca na Superblue domin sakin "Duniya Soca", wadda ta wawure babban kyautar 2018 ta Road March.

translation.en: "Soca Kingdom" was played 336 times, and "Savannah" 140.
translation.ha: An ji waƙar "Duniyar Soca" sau 336, ita kuma "Saɓannah" 140.

translation.en: Bringing his personal disappointment into the public domain, George's lyrics accused the "soca mafia" — ostensibly a group of deejays and radio station owners — of conspiring to play "Soca Kingdom" at the all judging points.
translation.ha: Kawo rashin jin daɗinsa zuwa gaban jama'a, baitukan waƙar George sun zargi "soca mafia" - a bayyana haɗakar wasu masu gabatar da shirye-shirye da masu gidajen rediyo - da haɗa baki don a sa "Soca Kingdom" a duk lokacin da ake alƙalanci.

translation.en: He sings:
translation.ha: Ya yi waƙa:

translation.en: On the stage was a next set of drama, the DJs and them playing "Savannah"
translation.ha: A kan dandalin akwai wani wasan kwaikwayo, masu gabatar da shirye-shirye suna jin "Saɓannah"

translation.en: But when the mafia come, they switching from "Savannah" to ‘Kingdom’
translation.ha: Amma a lokacin da 'yan ƙungiyar suka so, sai aka sauya daga "Saɓannah" zuwa "Kingdom"

translation.en: They join forces to win the big fight... this year you have to team up with Jesus Christ
translation.ha: Sun haɗa kai domin su ci nasarar babban faɗan… wannan shekarar sai dai kuka haɗa kai da Yesu

translation.en: In another version of the song, George accuses Montano of "bad talking" him, and belittles the honorary doctorate Montano recently received from the University of Trinidad and Tobago for his contribution to soca music.
translation.ha: A wani salon waƙar, George ya zargi Montano da "gulmar" sa kuma ya raina digirin girmamawa da Montane ya karɓa a baya-bayan nan daga jami'ar Trinidad da Tobago domin gudummawarsa ga kiɗan soca.

translation.en: Soon after George’s song was released, Montano responded with "Dr. Mashup", in which he directly addressed allegations of rigging the Road March contest:
translation.ha: Jim kaɗan bayan sakin waƙar George, sai Montano ya mayar da martani da "Dr. Mashup", wadda a cikinta kai tsaya ya mayar da martani game da zargin maguɗi gasar Road March:

translation.en: That was not the end of it: at a new Carnival party, "Hydrate", on January 13, both artists performed. George included his new verse and Montano supposedly had the last word:
translation.ha: Wannan ba shi ne ƙarshe abin ba: a wajen wani sabon shagalin biki, "Hydrate", a 13 ga Janairu, duk 'yan wasan biyu sun yi wasa. George ya shigar da sabon baitinsa kuma Montano ne yake da maganar ƙarshe:

translation.en: After their performances, Montano’s manager, Anthony Chow Lin On, posted a photo to Instagram in which he comically holds the two apart:
translation.ha: Bayan wasan nasu, manajan Montano, Anthony Chow Lin On, ya sanya wani hoto a Instagiram wanda a cikinsa ya raba tsakanin biyun a wayance:

translation.en: The post left fans to wonder if the feud was real or simply a publicity stunt:
translation.ha: Rubutun ya bar masoya suna mamakin ko dai rigimar ta gaske ce ko kuma kawai wasa da hankali:

translation.en: Stunt or not, many social media users following the feud have pointed out that this type of lyrical sparring (known as a "sound clash") is not new; in fact, it is intricately woven into the origins of calypso music, and its modern-day hybrid, soca.
translation.ha: Ko wasa ko a'a, da yawa daga cikin masu amfani da dandulan sadarwa sun nuna cewa irin wannan nau'in faɗan na baitoci (wanda aka sani da "faɗan baka") ba sabo ba ne; a taƙaice ma dai, yana nan ɗamfare da asalin kiɗan calypso, kuma abu ne na zamani a kiɗan soca.

translation.en: In a recent interview, George himself addressed the fact that he was just "documenting the history" as he "always does", following the path of legendary calypsonians who did the same.
translation.ha: A wata ganawar baya-bayan nan, shi kansa George ya yi bayanin cewa kawai shi ne yana "adana tarihi" ne kamar yadda ya saba "a koyaushe" yana biyo hanyar shahararrun mawaƙan calypso waɗanda suka yi irin hakan.

translation.en: While calypso music is well known for its social and political commentary, an early form of the music involved verbal dueling similar to the war of words taking place between George and Montano.
translation.ha: A yayin da aka san kiɗan calypso saboda sharhin lamarun zamantakewa da na siyasa, nau'in waƙoƙin na farko ya ƙunshi sa'insa mai kamar yaƙin kalmomi wanda yake faruwa tsakanin George da Montano.

translation.en: Calypso tents, where calypsonians perform during the Carnival season, were hugely popular for their "extempo wars", live contests in which singers would improvise lyrics on the spot mocking each other, or on a specific theme.
translation.ha: Yan rukunin Calypso, a inda mawaƙan Calypso suka yi wasa a lokacin bikin, sun fi shahara saboda "zafin yaƙin" su, wanda ake yi kai tsaye a inda mawaƙi zai ƙirƙiri baituka yana suna yi tsokanar juna, ko kuma a kan wani jigo na musamman.

translation.en: The banter between the performers is locally referred to as "picong".
translation.ha: Irin wannan 'yar tsamar da ake yi a tsakanin 'yan wasan ana kiran sa "picong".

translation.en: Such performances are typically interactive, with audiences echoing one of several refrains, the most common of which is "Santimanitay!", a derivative of the French phrase “sans humanité”, or “without pity”.
translation.ha: Irin waɗannan wasannan galibi sukan ƙunshi kowa, a wani lokacin 'yan kallo suna shigo da kalamansu da yawa, wanda aka fi faɗa shi ne "Santimanitay!" kalmar da aka samo daga Faransancin "sans humanite", ko "ba tare da tausayawa ba".

translation.en: But audiences have rarely witnessed a back-and-forth like this in recorded soca music.
translation.ha: Amma masu kallo da wahala suke ganin irin wanan kwan-gaba-kwan-baya irin wannan a kiɗa socar da aka naɗa.

translation.en: And real or not, the George/Montano feud has listeners as engaged as any extempo wars audience, both at Carnival events and online.
translation.ha: Gaske ko a'a, faɗan George/Montano yana da masu sauraro kamar duk wani irin wannan faɗan, a wurin bikin da kuma a intanet.

translation.en: George and Montano will, very likely, both in the running for the 2019 Road March title and at the very least, the added drama makes for good entertainment and more music.
translation.ha: George da Montano za su, zai iya faruwa, dukkansu a wajen gasar 2019 ta matsayin Road March, sannan ɗan abin da ya faru ya ƙara armashi da ƙarin waƙoƙi.

translation.en: Soca lovers could ask for nothing more.
translation.ha: Masoyan kiɗan soca ba za su tambayi wani abu ƙari ba.

translation.en: The Spiny Babbler, Nepal's only endemic bird, fascinates ornithologists and bird lovers alike
translation.ha: Tsuntsun Spiny Babbler, tsuntsun Nepal tilo na al'ada, yana bai wa masu nazarin halayyar tsuntsaye da masu son tsuntsu sha'awa gabaɗaya.

translation.en: Spiny Babbler
translation.ha: Spiny Babbler

translation.en: Spiny Babbler, the bird found only in Nepal. Photo by Sagar Giri. Used with permission.
translation.ha: Spiny Babbler, tsuntsun da ake samu a Nepal kawai. Hoto daga Sagar Giri. an samu izinin amfani da shi.

translation.en: Although more than 800 bird species are found in Nepal, the Spiny Babbler (Turdoides nipalensis) is the only bird that is endemic to the country.
translation.ha: Duk da cewa ana samun sama da dangin tsuntsaye 800 a Nepal, tsuntsun Spiny Babbler (Turdoides nipalensis) shi ne tsuntsu guɗa ɗaya tilo na al'ada a ƙasar.

translation.en: The greyish-brown bird, called Kaande Bhyakur in Nepali, lives in dense scrub and can be spotted more easily at elevations ranging from 500 meters to 2135 meters.
translation.ha: Tsuntsun mai launin toka da ruwan ƙasa-ƙasa, wanda ake kira da Kaande Bhyakur a Nepali, yana zama a wuri mai sarƙaƙiya kuma za a iya ganin sa cikin sauƙi idan aka hau tudu da ya kai tsawo mita 500 zuwa 2135.

translation.en: Although the Spiny Babbler has been fascinating ornithologists the world around for years, environmental degradation is threatening this unique, much-loved bird.
translation.ha: Duk da cewa tsuntsun Spiny Blabber yana ba wa masu nazarin tsuntsaye sha'awa a faɗin duniya tsawon shekaru, taɓarɓarewar muhalli tana shafar wannan tsuntsun na musamman da ake so sosai.

translation.en: The book The Status of Nepal’s Birds: The National Red List Series states:
translation.ha: Littafin Matsayin Tsuntsayen Nepali: Mujalladan Jan Jeri Na ƙasa ya bayyana cewa:

translation.en: It seeks insects almost entirely on the ground among low bushes, appearing only occasionally.
translation.ha: Yana neman ƙwaro kusan kowane lokaci daga cikin ƙananan ciyayi, yana fitowa sa'i da sa'i kawai.

translation.en: Spiny Babbler mounts branches of bushes or small trees to sing, bill pointed upward and tail down. It is a good mimic, with squeaks, chuckles and chirps.
translation.ha: Tsuntsun Spiny Babbler yakan hau rassan ciyayi ko ƙananan bishiyoyi domin ya yi waƙa, yakan tura bakinsa sama jela kuma ƙasa, kwaikwayo ne mai kyau, yakan yi ƙara, ya yi sarewa da ƙara.

translation.en: It is most easily located by its song and occasionally sings as late as September and October. The species is subject to seasonal altitudinal movements.
translation.ha: Ana samunsa ne cikin sauƙi ta hanyar waƙarsa kuma wani lokacin yakan cigaba da waƙa har zuwa Satumba da Oktoba. Wannan irin tsuntsun yakan danganci yanayin sauyin yanayi.

translation.en: The Spiny Babbler, found only in Nepal, has fascinated ornithologists and bird lovers from around the world. Don Messerschmidt writes about ornithologist S. Dillon Ripley’s account of the bird in his book Search for the Spiny Babbler:
translation.ha: Tsuntsun Spiny Babbler da ake samu a Nepal kawai, yana ba wa masu nazarin tsuntsuya da masu son tsuntsusaya sha'awa a duk faɗin duniya. Don Messerschmidt ya rubuta game da labarin mai nazarin tsuntsaye S. Dillon Ripley a littafinsa Neman Tsuntsun Spiny Babbler.

translation.en: It was a species that had defied scientists for years, since 1843 or 1844.
translation.ha: Wani nau'i da ya gagari masu kimiyya tsawon shekaru, tun 1843 ko 1844.

translation.en: At that time Brian Hodgson’s Nepali collectors working for him in the unknown vastnesses of Nepal had secured several specimens, he writes.
translation.ha: A wannan lokacin Brian Hodgson na masu kwasowa a Nepali sun yi masa aiki a wannan filin da ba a sani ba na Nepal sun sami nau'ika da yawa, ya rubuta.

translation.en: The Spiny Babbler had remained a mystery ever since, one of the five species of Indian birds, which, along with the Mountain Quail, had apparently vanished from the face of the earth.
translation.ha: Tsuntsun Spiny Babbler ya zama wani irin asararu tun da can, ɗaya daga cikin nau'ika biyar na tsuntsayen Indiya, wanda, tare da tsuntsun Mountain ƙuail, tabbas a zahirin sun ɓace daga doron duniya.

translation.en: But not quite, for if my guess was right, here it was hopping about large as life on the wooded slopes above Rekcha.
translation.ha: Amma ba haka ba, in hasashena daidai ne, ga shi a nan yana tsalle-tsalle a fili on kwazazzaban saman Rekcha.

translation.en: Likewise, former-American ambassador to Nepal Scott DeLisi spent years trying to spot and photograph this bird.
translation.ha: Haka kuma, tsohon ambasadan Amurka a Nepal, Scott DeLisi ya shafe shekaru yana ƙoƙarin ya ga wannan tsuntsu ya ɗau hotonsa.

translation.en: The bird is threatened by the clearance of scrub for agriculture and expansion of urban areas.
translation.ha: Barazanar share dazuka domin noma da kuma faɗaɗa gari ne suke damun tsuntsun.

translation.en: Outside protected areas, it is sometimes threatened by hunting, and the hills surrounding the Kathmandu Valley have seen a decline in Spiny Babbler numbers.
translation.ha: A wajen wuraren da aka killace, wani lokacin farauta ce take yi masa barazana, kuma tsaunukan da ke kewaye da kwarin Kathmandu suna ganin rashin adadin Spiny Babbler.

translation.en: However, the same habitat loss that is destroying the Spiny Babbler's habitat in some areas might actually be creating more in others.
translation.ha: Amma dalilan da suke sa ɓata wurin zaman Spiny Babbler a wasu wuraren za su iya samar da wasu da yawa.

translation.en: As the forest continues to thin due to deforestation throughout the country, the scrub-dominated habitat that they call home is being created in its wake.
translation.ha: A lokacin da daji yake ƙara ƙanƙancewa saboda sare itatuwa a duk faɗin ƙasar, wuraren da suke da sarƙaƙiya inda suke ɗauka gida sukan ƙara samuwa a lokacin.

translation.en: But only time will tell what is in store for the population of Nepal's only endemic bird.
translation.ha: Amma lokaci ne kawai zai iya bayyana abin da zai iya faruwa ga adadin wannan tilon tsuntsun al'ada na Nepal.

translation.en: Nigeria's retired military generals battle for influence in 2019 presidential elections
translation.ha: Tsofaffin janar-janar ɗin soji masu ritaya a Najeriya suna fafutukar samun tasiri a zaɓuɓɓukan shugabannin ƙasa na 2019

translation.en: Olusegun Obasanjo, former President of Nigeria.
translation.ha: Olusegun Obasanjo, tsohon shugaban ƙasar Najeriya.

translation.en: As Nigeria prepares for another presidential election in February, retired military generals turned politicians are key to understanding Nigeria's political space.
translation.ha: A lokacin da Najeriya take shirin wani zaɓen shugaban ƙasa a Fabarairu, tsofaffin janar-janar ɗin soji na Najeriya da suka zama 'yan siyasa suna taka rawar gani wajen gane yanayin siyasar Najeriya.

translation.en: Nigeria has been ruled by either former generals or those who have their support since 1999 when democratic governance returned.
translation.ha: Ko dai tsofaffin sojoji ko kuma waɗanda suke goyawa baya ne suke mulkar Najeriya tun 1999 a lokacin da mulkin dimukuraɗiyya ya dawo.

translation.en: The recent public feud between former President Olusegun Obasanjo and the incumbent President Muhammadu Buhari — both retired military dictators — has a great impact on next month's elections.
translation.ha: Rashin jituwa na baya-bayan nan da tsakanin tsohon shugaban Najeriya Olusegun Obasanjo da shugaban ƙasa mai ci a yanzu Muhammadu Buhari - dukkansu tsofaffin shugabannin soji - yana da babban tasiri a kan zaɓuɓɓukan wata mai zuwa.

translation.en: In a rare open letter to Buhari, Obasanjo has accused him of plans to rig the 2019 elections. He wrote:
translation.ha: A wata wasiƙa wadda ba a saba gani ba zuwa ga Buhari, Obasanjo ya zarge shi da shirin yin maguɗin zaɓe a zaɓuɓɓukan 2019. Ya rubuta:

translation.en: Democracy becomes a sham if elections are carried out by people who should be impartial and neutral umpires, but who show no integrity, acting with blatant partiality, duplicity and imbecility.
translation.ha: Dimukuraɗiyya ta zama gangan in har mutanen da ya kamata su zama ba su da ɓangare da ya kamata a ce sun jagorance ta suka zamo ba adalci, ga su da rashin adalci ƙarara ga kuma rashin gogewa.

translation.en: Obasanjo insisted that Buhari would not deliver "free, fair, credible and peaceful elections" and warned that what "is happening under Buhari’s watch can be likened to what we witnessed under Gen. Sani Abacha.
translation.ha: Obasanjo yana dage a kan cewa Buhari ba zai yi zaɓe "'yantacce na adalci kuma cikin zama lafiya" ba, kuma ya yi gargaɗin cewa abin da yake "faruwa a gaban idon Buhari, za a iya kwatanta shi da abin da yake faruwa a ƙarƙashin Janar Sani Abacha.

translation.en: In 1998, Sani Abacha, a military dictator, had called for general elections but it became obvious that Abacha had no intention of handing power over to civilians.
translation.ha: A 1998, Sani Abacha, a mulkin soja, ya yi kira don a yi zaɓe, to amma sai ya zama fili cewa Abacha ba shi da niyyar miƙa mulki ga farar hula.

translation.en: The five political parties at the time endorsed Abacha as their sole presidential candidate.
translation.ha: Jam'iyyun siyasa biyar na lokacin duk sai suka tabbatar da Abacha a matsayin ɗan takararsu na shugabancin ƙasa.

translation.en: Now deceased, Abacha became infamous for his repression of human rights and corruption.
translation.ha: A yanzu ya rasu, Abacha ya yi ƙaurin suna wajen take haƙƙin ɗan'adam da kuma cin hanci.

translation.en: Obasanjo alleged that Buhari was towing the "same path" as Abacha "in mad desperation".
translation.ha: Obasanjo ya yi zargin cewa Buhari ma yana tafiya ne a kan "hanya ɗaya" kamar Abacha "a muguwar zaƙuwa".

translation.en: Shehu Garba, the media assistant to President Buhari, dismissed Obasanjo's letter:
translation.ha: Shehu Garba, mai taimakawa shugaba Buhari, ya yi watsi da wasiƙar Obasanjo:

translation.en: The elections starting in February will be free and fair as promised the nation and the international community by President Buhari.
translation.ha: Zaɓuɓɓukan da za su fara a Fabarairu za su zama cike da adalci kamar yadda shugaba Buhari ya yi ƙasa da duniya alƙawari.

translation.en: Obasanjo, the letter writer?
translation.ha: Obasanjo, marubucin wasiƙa?

translation.en: Olusegun Obasanjo, former military head of state (1976-1979) and later Nigeria’s democratically elected president (1999-2007), has consistently criticized successive governments in Nigeria.
translation.ha: Olusegun Obasanjo, tsohon shugaban ƙasar soja na Najeriya (1976-1979) daga baya kuma zaɓaɓɓen shugaban ƙasa a mulkin dimukuraɗiyya (1999-2007) ya saba sukar dukkanin gwamnatoci a Najeriya.

translation.en: Last year, Obasanjo had advised Buhari not to seek re-election as president but to "consider a deserved rest at this point in time and at this age".
translation.ha: A shekarar bara, Obasanjo ya ba wa Buhari shawarar kar ya nemi ƙarin zango a matsayin shugaban ƙasa, sai dai ya "ya duba yiwuwar hutawa a wannan lokaci da kuma waɗannan shekaru".

translation.en: This advice caused ripples in Nigeria because Obasanjo was a strong supporter of the Buhari’s candidacy during the 2015 presidential elections.
translation.ha: Shawarar ta yamutsa hazo a Najeriya saboda Obasanjo babban mai goyon bayan takarar Buhari ne a lokutan zaɓuɓɓukan shugaban ƙasa na 2015.

translation.en: Prior, Obasanjo had scolded Goodluck Jonathan in a public letter written in 2013, Obasanjo accused Jonathan of driving the country to the precipice and allowing deceit, corruption and mutual distrust to tear at the fabric of the nation.
translation.ha: Kafin haka, Obasanjo ya caccaki Goodluck Jonathan a wata buɗaɗɗiyar wasiƙa a 2013, Obasanjo ya zargi Jonathan da jan ƙasar zuwa mawuyacin hali kuma ya bar yaudara da cin hanci da rashin aminci sun fatattaka rigar ƙasar.

translation.en: Ironically, Obasanjo had also supported Jonathan's election in 2011. And in 2007, he promoted the election of Jonathan Goodluck's predecessor, Umaru Musa Yar’Adua.
translation.ha: Abin mamaki, Obasanjo kuma ya goyi bayan takarar Jonathan a 2011. Kuma a 2007, ya goyi bayan zaɓen wanda Jonathan Goodluck ya gaba, Umaru Musa 'Yar'aduwa.

translation.en: However, Obasanjo went against Yar’Adua when the latter became sick and did not hand properly hand over power to Jonathan, his then deputy.
translation.ha: Amma daga baya sai Obasanjo ya juya wa 'Yar'aduwa baya a lokacin da ya kamu da rashin lafiya kuma bai mayar da mulki yadda ya kamata zuwa Jonathan ba, wanda yake mataimakinsa a lokacin.

translation.en: Former Nigerian President Goodluck Jonathan with newly sworn-in President Muhammadu Buhari during his inauguration ceremony on May 29, 2015.
translation.ha: Tsohon shugaban ƙasar Najeriya, Goodluck Jonathan da sabon shugaban da aka rantsar Muhammadu Buhari a lokacin bikin karɓar mulki ranar 29 ga Mayu, 2015.

translation.en: Public Domain photo from the US State Department.
translation.ha: Hoton dandalin al'umma daga sashen kulawar Amurka.

translation.en: Retired generals never rest in Nigeria
translation.ha: Tsofaffin janar-janar ba sa hutawa a Najeriya

translation.en: Nigeria’s political landscape is held by retired generals or their cronies. Obasanjo, for instance, has been instrumental in the emergence of Nigerian presidents from 2007 to 2015.
translation.ha: ɓangaren siyasar Najeriya yana riƙe a hannun tsofaffin janar-janar ko yaransu. Misali, Obasanjo, yana da hannu a samuwar shugabannin ƙasar Najeriya daga 2007 zuwa 2015.

translation.en: However, unlike civilians – Yar’Adua and Jonathan – who he promoted and also criticized, Buhari is somewhat different.
translation.ha: Amma ba kamar fararen hula - 'Yar'aduwa da Jonathan - ba, waɗanda ya ɗaga kuma ya soka, Buhari shi daban yake.

translation.en: Although Obasanjo supported Buhari’s election in 2015, he cannot fully take the praise alone.
translation.ha: Duk da cewa Obasanjo ya goyi bayan takarar Buhari a 2015, amma ba zai ɗauki yabo shi kaɗai ba.

translation.en: This is because Buhari’s ascendance to power was made possible by his allegiance with Bola Tinubu’s defunct Action Congress of Nigeria (ACN).
translation.ha: Wannan kuwa domin hawan mulkin Buhari ya samu ne a sakamakon haɗin kai da rusasshiyar jam'iyyar Bola Tinubu ta (ACN).

translation.en: Buhari’s Congress for Progressive Change (CPC) later merged with ACN, in February 2013, to form the All Progressive Congress (APC) .
translation.ha: Jam'iyyar Buhari ta CPC daga baya ta yi maja da ACN, a Fabarairun 2013, domin samar da APC.

translation.en: In addition, Buhari a former military head of state (1983-1985) is a member of the ‘club’ of retired generals who have dominated Nigeria’s political space.
translation.ha: Daɗin-daɗawa, Buhari, tsohon shugaban mulkin soji (1983-1985) mamba ne na ƙungiyar tsofaffin janar-janar masu ritaya waɗanda suka mamaye siyasar Najeriya.

translation.en: Therefore, as harsh as Obasanjo’s reprimand might sound, a lot depends on the dynamics of the power block to which they both belong.
translation.ha: Saboda duk yadda ƙiyayyar Obasanjo za ta yi zafi, abubuwa da yawa sun dogara ne da ƙarfin ikon wuraren da kowannensu ya fito.

translation.en: Obasanjo is not alone, however, in his criticism of Buhari.
translation.ha: Haka kuma Obasanjo ba shi kaɗai ba ne a wurin sukar Buhari.

translation.en: Theophilus Danjuma, a retired general, had in March last year accused "the Nigerian armed forces of aiding the ongoing killings in Nigeria".
translation.ha: Wani janar mai ritaya, Theophilus ɗanjuma, a Maris ɗin shekarar bara ya zargi "sojojin Najeriya da taimakawa kashe-kashen da ake yi a yau a Najeriya".

translation.en: Danjuma, a former chief of army staff and later minister of defense, chastised the military for taking sides in the pastoral/farmer crisis in the country, but especially in his home state of Taraba.
translation.ha: ɗanjuma, wanda tsohon shugaban sojojin ƙasa ne, daga baya kuma ya zama ministan tsaro, ya zargi sojojin da nuna wariya a rikicin makiyaya da manoma a ƙasar, amma musamman a jiharsa ta asali ta Taraba.

translation.en: Similarly, Danjuma recently raised an alarm about plans to use “the police and soldiers” to manipulate the 2019 elections.
translation.ha: Haka kuma, a baya-bayan nan ɗanjuma ya fallasa ƙorafin cewa akwai shirin yi amfani da "'yan sanda da sojoji" domin a juya zaɓuɓɓukan 2019.

translation.en: Similarly, in February last year, former military head of state Ibrahim Babangida publicly advised President Buhari not to stand for re-election, arguing that 21st century Nigeria needs to tap younger generations.
translation.ha: Haka kuma, a Fabarairun shekarar da ta shuɗe, tsohon shugaban soja, Ibrahim Babangida a fili ya ba wa shugaba Buhari shawarar kar ya ƙara tsayawa takara, yana mai nuna cewa ƙarni na 21 yana buƙatar a koma ga matasa.

translation.en: He believes that there "comes a time in the life of a nation when personal ambition should not override national interest".
translation.ha: Ya nuna cewa akwai "wani lokaci a tarihin ƙasa a lokacin da buƙatar ƙashin kai bai kamata ta take buƙatar ƙasa ba".

translation.en: But it may be a while before Nigeria gets a civilian president who has no links or backing from the retired generals "club".
translation.ha: Amma za a ɗauki lokaci kafin Najeriya ta sami shugaban farar hula wanda ba shi da alaƙa ko goyon bayan "ƙungiyar" janar-janar masu ritaya ba.

translation.en: With tensions rising ahead of 2019 presidential elections, Nigerians fear internet shutdown
translation.ha: Wannan yana nuna ba mu da wani abu da za mu da shi don kasancewarta.

translation.en: Fears of an internet shutdown in Nigeria looms as tensions continue to rise ahead of 2019 presidential elections.
translation.ha: Ga masu nazari, ba wani sabon abu game da sabon ƙudurin.

translation.en: Fear has spread across Nigeria that the government may switch off the internet during the presidential elections in February 2019.
translation.ha: A lokacin da tashin hankalin yake ƙaruwa a gabanin zaɓuɓɓukan shugaban ƙasa na 2019, 'yan Najeriya suna jin tsoron rufe intanet.

translation.en: What started as mere speculation has morphed into intense worry as election day approaches. Yomi Kamez of Quartz Africa explains:
translation.ha: Tsoron rufe intanet a Najeriya yana ƙara saɗaɗowa a lokacin da ake ƙara samun ƙaruwar fargaba a gabanin zaɓuɓɓukan shugaban ƙasa na 2019.

translation.en: You can tell fears of an internet shutdown are running high in a country when citizens are looking into methods of staying online in case of a blockage.
translation.ha: Tsoro ya yaɗu a tsakanin al'ummar Najeriya cewa gwamnati za ta iya rufe intanet a lokutan zaɓuɓɓukan shugaban ƙasa a Fabarairun 2019.

translation.en: This past weekend, Quartz Africa’s guide to staying online during internet or social media blockages was our most read story, driven entirely by traffic from Nigeria.
translation.ha: Abin da ya fara a matsayin hasashe ya rikiɗe zuwa babbar damuwa a daidai lokaicn da ranar zaɓe take ƙara matsowa. Yomi Kamez na ƙuartz Africa ya bayyana:

translation.en: Scores of people shared concerns on social media at the possibility Nigeria might follow other African countries [like Sudan, Zimbabwe] that have taken to blocking social media or shut down the internet altogether under the guise of security concerns.
translation.ha: Za ka iya cewa tsoron rufe intanet yana ƙara gudana a cikin ƙasar a lokacin da 'yan ƙasa suke kallon dabarun zama a kan intanet ko da za a toshe.

translation.en: Recent events related to social media, hate speech, an unjust judiciary firing and replacement, and the breaking down of trust in the media have all contributed to the growing collective concern.
translation.ha: Wannan ƙarshen makon da ya wuce, hanyoyin zama a kan intanet na ƙuartz Africa a lokutan da za a toshe intanet ko soshiyal midiya shi ne labarinmu da aka fi karantaw, wanda ya samu rubdugun jama'a daga Najeriya.

translation.en: De-fanging the judiciary and rule of law
translation.ha: Da yawan mutane sun nuna damuwa a kan soshiyal midiya game da yiwuwar cewa Najeriya za ta iya biyo bayan wasu ƙasashen Afirka [kamar Sudan da Zimbabwe] waɗanda suke toshe dandulan sadarwa ko suka rufe intanet gabaɗaya a ƙarƙashin sunan matsalar tsaro.

translation.en: On January 25, 2019, Nigerians were shocked by President Muhammadu Buhari’s unilateral suspension of the Chief Justice of Nigeria Justice Walter Onnoghen, and the immediate appointment and swearing in of Justice Ibrahim Tanko Muhammad, as the acting Chief Justice of Nigeria (CJN).
translation.ha: Wasu abubuwan da suka faru a baya-bayan da suke da alaƙa da soshiyal midiya da maganganun ƙage da kuma kora da sauya ɓangaren shari'a a cikin rashin adalci da kuma rushewar gaskiya a kafafen yaɗa labarai duk sun bayar da gudummawa wajen ƙara damuwar kowa.

translation.en: Onnoghen had been charged with financial negligence and fraud.
translation.ha: Karya ƙarfin kotuna da tsarin doka

translation.en: However, many critics say these charges were a ploy to gag the judiciary ahead of the elections and intimidate other arms of government.
translation.ha: A ranar 25 ga Janairun 2019, 'yan Najeriya sun kaɗu da dakatarwar da shugaban Buhari shi kaɗai, ya yi babban joji na Najeriya, mai shari'a Walter Onnoghen, da naɗa gami da rantsar mai shari'a Ibrahim Tanko Muhammad cikin sauri, a matsayin baban jojin ƙasa na riƙo.

translation.en: The suspension of Onnoghen contradicts the provisions of the 1999 Constitution of the Federal Republic of Nigeria for the removal of judicial officers.
translation.ha: An zargi Onnoghen da halin sakaci da kuɗaɗe da kuma zamba.

translation.en: The Third Schedule, Part 1 of the 1999 Constitution states that only the National Judicial Council (NJC) has the power to recommend removals from office. Part IV of the Constitution further reiterates this law.
translation.ha: Amma da yawa daga cikin masu suka sun kalli waɗannan tuhume-tuhumen a matsayin wata dabara ta rufe bakin ɓangaren shari'a kafin zaɓuɓɓukan da kuma tsorata ɓangaren gwamnati.

translation.en: Nigerian President Muhammadu Buhari did not apply these principles.
translation.ha: Dakatar da Onnoghen ya saɓa wa kundin tsarin mulkin 1999 na Tarayyar Najeriya na cire ma'aikatan shari'a.

translation.en: He usurped the powers of the NJC which is constitutionally mandated to recommend such removals from the judiciary or Senate (upper house of parliament) which must then ratify such decisions.
translation.ha: Kaso na Uku, ɓangare na 1 na kundin tsarin 1999 ya bayyana cewa Majalisar Shari'a ta ƙasa ce kaɗai take da ikon bayar da shawarar cirewa daga ofis. ɓangare na Iɓ na kundin tsarin mulki ya ƙara bayyana wannan dokar.

translation.en: The president's action was both tyrannical and lawless.
translation.ha: Shugaban Najeriya Muhammadu Buhari bai yi amfani da waɗannan dokokin ba.

translation.en: An editorial in Punch newspaper described Buhari's action as dictatorial and capable of precipitating a constitutional crisis:
translation.ha: Ya ƙwace ikon Majalisar Shari'a ta ƙasa wadda ita kundin tsarin mulki ya ba wa damar bayar da shawarar irin wannan cirewar daga ɓangaren shari'a ko majalisar dattijai (babbar majalisar ƙasa) wadda za ta sanya wa irin waɗannan matakan hannu.

translation.en: Buhari’s action is vile, perfidious and indefensible.
translation.ha: Aikin shugaban kama-karya ne da ƙetare doka.

translation.en: It is an action only fit for jackboot regimes, where the constitution could easily be suspended...
translation.ha: Wani labarin gidan jaridar Punch ya bayyana abin da Buhari ya yi a matsayin kama-karya kuma zai iya jawo hargitsin kundin tsarin mulki:

translation.en: Needless to say, the president’s singular and misguided action has the tendency to plunge the country into an unnecessary constitutional crisis and, perhaps, derail 20 unbroken years of democratic governance.
translation.ha: Abin da Buhari ya yi rashin imani ne, shirme ne wanda ba za a iya kare shi ba.

translation.en: This is not unlike other despotic and undemocratic acts that the government has been associated with in the past, even if it might be considered more audacious, far-reaching and probably unexpected.
translation.ha: Abu ne da ya dace da mulkin sokwayen sojoji kawai, wurin da za a iya dakatar da kundin tsarin mulki cikin sauƙi…

translation.en: The governments of the United States and the United Kingdom also condemned the attack on the judiciary.
translation.ha: Ba sai an faɗa ba, wannan aikin da shugaban ƙasa ya yi shi kaɗai wanda yake ba daidai ba zai iya jefa ƙasar ƙasar cikin rikicin kundin tsarin mulki kuma, wataƙila, zai iya kautar da shekaru 20 a jere na mulkin dimukuraɗiyya.

translation.en: On Twitter, netizens echoed the message.
translation.ha: Wannan ya yi kama da kama-karya ko kuma abubuwan da suka kauce wa tsarin dimukuraɗiyya waɗanda ake alaƙanta gwamnati da su a baya, ko da za ɗauke su a matsayin rashin kan gado, kuma waɗanda ba a yi zato ba.

translation.en: Tackling hate speech is the new ‘national security’ mantra
translation.ha: Gwamnatocin Amurka da na Birtaniya ma sun yi allawadai da wannan harin da aka kai wa ɓangaren shari'a.

translation.en: Another sign of a possible internet shut down is the government’s tendency to control free speech online on the basis of concerns for national security.
translation.ha: A Tuwita, ma'abota intanet sun ƙara yayata saƙon.

translation.en: Recently, the government directed security agencies to "tackle the propagation of hate speech, especially through social media".
translation.ha: Tunkarar maganganun ɓatanci wani sabon take ne na tsaron ƙasa

translation.en: This, according to reports by the Cable, will be achieved by monitoring social media accounts of "prominent Nigerians".
translation.ha: Wata alamar da ke nuna yiwuwar rufe intanet shi ne yunƙurin gwamnati na lura da 'yancin magana a intanet da sunan damuwa da halin tsaron ƙasa.

translation.en: In July last year, Nigerian Minister of Information Lai Mohammed described the growing level of fake news and hate speech in the country as a threat to national security.
translation.ha: A baya-bayan nan, gwamnati ta yi umarni ga jami'an tsaro da su "tunkari yaɗa maganganun ɓatanci, musamman a soshiyal midiya".

translation.en: A year earlier, Nasir El-Rufai, governor of Kaduna State, described fake news and hate speech as the "biggest threat" to national security.
translation.ha: Wannan, kamar yadda rahotannin Cable suka nuna, za a iya cim musu ne ta hanyar sanya ido a kan shafukan soshiyal midiya na "wasu fitattun 'yan Najeriya".

translation.en: However, it is ironic that both Lai and El-Rufai are now concerned about fake news and hate speech as a national security threat.
translation.ha: A Yulin shekarar da ta shuɗe, ministan yaɗa labarai na Najeriya, Lai Mohammed, ya bayyana ƙaruwar labaran ƙarya da maganganun ɓatanci a ƙasar a matsayin barazana ga tsaron ƙasa.

translation.en: As opposition politicians, they both made unsubstantiated accusations to the former government.
translation.ha: Shekara ɗaya kafin haka, Nasir El-Rufa'I, gwamnan jihar Kaduna, ya bayyana labaran ƙarya da maganganun ɓatanci a matsayin "mafi girman barazana" ga tsaron ƙasa.

translation.en: For instance, Nassir El-Rufai, current governor of Kaduna State alleged in 2014 — without evidence — that he was “number 7 on [President Jonathan Goodluck’s] sniper’s list”.
translation.ha: Amma, abu ne mai ban mamaki cewa da Lai da El-Rufa'i sun damu yanzu da labaran ƙarya da maganganun ɓatanci a matsayin barazana ga tsaron ƙasa.

translation.en: El-Rufai also claimed that Goodluck, then president, was a sponsor of the Boko Haram militant group. Similar claims were made by Lai Mohammed, who was then the National Publicity Secretary of APC.
translation.ha: A matsayin 'yan siyasar adawa, dukkaninsu sun yi maganganun da ba su da tabbas ga gwamnatin da ta shuɗe.

translation.en: As opposition politicians, these officials have in fact been proven to be purveyors of fake news and hate speech, using social media to devastating effects.
translation.ha: Misali, Nasir El-Rufa'i, gwamnan jihar Kaduna mai ci a yanzu ya yi zargi a 2014 - ba tare da hujja ba - cewa shi ne "na 7 a jerin sunayen waɗanda [shugaban ƙasa Jonathan Goodluck] zai sa a harbe.

translation.en: But their actions were never considered a threat to national security; they were neither arrested nor was the internet shut down for this reason.
translation.ha: El-Rufa'i kuma ya yi zargin cewa Goodluck, shugaban wancan lokaci, shi ne yake ɗaukar nauyin ƙungiyar 'yan ta'addan Boko Haram. Lai Mohammed, ya yi irin waɗannan zarge-zargen, wanda shi ne sakataren yaɗa labarai na jam'iyyar APC a lokacin.

translation.en: Social media and elections in Nigeria
translation.ha: A matsayin 'yan siyasar adawa, waɗannan mutanen sun tabbatar a zahiri cewa su masu yayata labaran ƙarya ne da maganganun ɓatanci, ta hanyar amfani da shafukan soshiyal midiya domin su lalata wani.

translation.en: Movements like the 2012 #OccupyNigeria and the 2014 #BringBackOurGirls gained global acclaim due to social media usage in Nigeria.
translation.ha: Amma ba a taɓa ɗaukar abin da suka yi a matsayin barazana ga tsaron ƙasa ba; ba a kama su ba kuma ba a rufe intanet ba don wannan dalilin.

translation.en: In 2015, social media played an important role in Nigeria's elections when Twitter became a bitter and divisive battleground during campaign season and was used to propagate hate speech and disinformation.
translation.ha: Soshiyal midiya da zaɓuɓɓuka a Najeriya

translation.en: This year, it has already played a major role as the medium of choice for political participation by Nigeria’s energetic youth population.
translation.ha: Gangami irin na 2012 na #OccupyNigeria (mamaye Najeriya) da na 2014 na #BringBackOurGirls (ADawoManaDa'Yanmatanmu) sun sami karɓuwa a duniya saboda amfani da soshiyal midiya a Najeriya.

translation.en: Netizens have used social media to call attention to despotic government actions like the sacking of the CJN, that otherwise would have gone unnoticed by the general public.
translation.ha: A 2015, intanet ta taka muhimmiyar rawa a zaɓuɓɓukan Najeriya a lokacin da Tuwita ta zama wani zazzafan fagen fma a lokutan kamfen kuma an yi amfani da ita domin yayata maganganun ɓatanci da kuma maganganun ƙarya.

translation.en: Nigerians took to social media to note their displeasure, mount pressure on the government to rescind its action and mobilize protests:
translation.ha: A wannan shekarar, tun ta ƙara taka rawa a matsayin zaɓaɓɓiyar hanyar shiga harkokin siyasa a wajen matasan Najeriya masu jini a jika.

translation.en: Whether or not the internet holds steady during elections, there is strong reason to believe that political speech online and on the street will be a target of government scrutiny.
translation.ha: Masu amfani da intanet sun yi amfani da soshiyal midiya domin ƙalubalantar ayyukan kama-karya na gwamnati kamar korar babban alƙalin ƙasa, wanda wataƙila da mutane ba ma za su gano ba.

translation.en: Who will win Trinidad & Tobago Carnival's 2019 Road March?
translation.ha: Yan Najeriya sun hau kan intanet domin nuna rashin jin daɗinsu, da kuma takurawa gwamnati domin ta janye abin da ta yi da kuma haɗa zanga-zanga:

translation.en: A carnival masquerader “jumps up” to soca music on stage at the Queen's Park Savannah, on Carnival Tuesday, 2009.
translation.ha: Ko da dai intanet ta zauna daidai ko a'a a lokacin zaɓuɓɓuka, akwai ƙarfafan dalilan da za su sa a yarda cewa lallai gwamnati za ta lura da maganganun ɓatanci a kan intanet da kuma cikin gari.

translation.en: Photo by Georgia Popplewell, used with permission.
translation.ha: Waye zai lashe gasar Trinidad da Tobago ta 2019, ta Road March?

translation.en: When revelers take to the streets each year for Trinidad and Tobago Carnival, they do so with a soundtrack.
translation.ha: Wani ɗan wasa a gasar, "ya yi tsalle" ga kiɗan soca a kan dandali a dandalin ƙueen's Park Saɓannah, a wurin gasar, ran Talata, 2009.

translation.en: Their playlist is always an energetic mix of that year's hottest soca music hits, but the Road March — the song that is played the most at specified judging points along the parade route — is a title that comes with both a valuable prize package and the prestige of being part of a proud history.
translation.ha: Hoto daga Georgia Popplewell, an samu izinin amfani da shi.

translation.en: Claims in the last decade or so of the competition being rigged — ostensibly by a group of powerful radio station owners, DJs and music industry executives known as the "soca mafia" — have not eroded the belief that the Road March represents the voice of the people.
translation.ha: Zaɓin waƙarsu a koyaushe shi ne wani zazzafan haɗin kiɗan soca, amma Road March - waƙar da aka fi ji a lokacin yake hukuncin gasar - wani suna ne da ya zo tare da wani ƙunshin kyauta mai muhimmanci da alfaharin kasancewa wani ɓangare na wannan tarihi.

translation.en: Soca star Machel Montano, who has won the coveted Road March title a whopping nine times thus far, describes it as "the song that make[s] the people feel the most vibes and come out of themselves" — and which artist wouldn't want to lay claim to that?
translation.ha: A wajen mafiya yawan masu wasan soca, son cin gasar Road March abu ne d a zahiri suke da matuƙar muradinsa.

translation.en: But don't be fooled into thinking that the road to the Road March is solely based on creative merit.
translation.ha: Zarge-zargen da ake yi a wajejen shekaru goma da suka wuce ko wani abu makamancin haka cewa ana maguɗi a gasar - a fili ƙarara daga wasu manyan masu gidajen redio da manyan Dije-dije da masu faɗa a ji a harkar kiɗan soca waɗanda aka fi sani da "soca mafi" - bai hana amincewa da cewa gasar Road March tana wakiltar sautin al'umma.

translation.en: A Road March song must have certain key ingredients to even be in the running:
translation.ha: Fitaccen jarumin Soca, Machel Montano, wanda ya ci wannan babban gasar ta Road March har sau tara zuwa yanzu, ya bayyana ta da cewa "waƙa ce da take sanya mutane su ji nishaɗi har su fito don kansu" - kuma wane mawaƙi ne ba zai so ya ce tasa ba ce?

translation.en: 1. A danceable, yet powerful melody that makes people want to “break away” on stage, with lyrics that capture the feelings of joyful release and abandon that Carnival represents.
translation.ha: Amma kar a raina ka har ka yi tunanin cewa hanyar samun gasar Road March kawai an gina ta ne a kan cancanta.

translation.en: 2. A refrain that the audience can echo, in the call and response tradition of the calinda, from which calypso — and its modern-day hybrid, soca — originated.
translation.ha: Waƙar gasar Road March dole ta ƙunshi wasu muhimman abubuwa domin ta shiga cikin jerin:

translation.en: 3. A well-timed release.
translation.ha: 1. Wani zazzafan kiɗa mai sa rawa wanda zai sa mutane su ji kamar "su ruga" a kan dandamali, da baituka waɗanda za su dace da nishaɗi waɗanda baje-kolin yake wakilta.

translation.en: If a song peaks too early in the season and doesn't have staying power, competing tunes can usurp its position.
translation.ha: Amshin da 'yan kallo za su karɓa, a hanyar amsawa da martani ga "calinda", daga inda waƙar "calypso" - da sabon tsarinta na zamani, na soca - suka samo asali.

translation.en: Conversely, if a great tune is released too late, masqueraders may not have enough time to get familiar with it during pre-Carnival events.
translation.ha: 3. Saki a kan lokacin da ya dace.

translation.en: Sometimes, the Road March contest has a clear favourite that never gets challenged; at others, the competition is so stiff that it's simply too close to call.
translation.ha: Idan waƙa ta yi tashe a wani lokaci amma kuma ba ta da ƙarfin daɗewa, wasu waƙoƙin masu gasa da ita za su iya ƙwace gurbinta.

translation.en: In no particular order, here are some the songs that we think are the biggest contenders for Trinidad and Tobago Carnival's 2019 Road March...
translation.ha: Haka kuma, in aka yi jinkirin sakin wata kyakkyawar waƙa, masu zuzutawa ba za su sami damar sanin ta ba, a lokacin bukukuwan kafin baje-kolin.

translation.en: 1. "Savannah Grass" by Kes
translation.ha: A wasu lokutan gasar Road March tana da wani wanda ta fi so wanda ba a ƙalubalantarsa; ga wasu kuma, gasar tana da tsauri sosai wanda da wahala a sha.

translation.en: The Queen's Park Savannah, an oasis of green space in the middle of Trinidad's capital, is the hub of the country's Carnival celebrations and home to the festival's main stage.
translation.ha: Ba wani tartibin jeri ba, a nan ga wasu waƙoƙi da muke tunanin su ne 'yan takara mafiya girma a baje-kolin Trinidad da Tobago na 2019 na Road March…

translation.en: This song perfectly captures the significance of the space, and the memories it has helped create for masqueraders through the years.
translation.ha: 1. "Waƙar Saɓannah Grass" daga Kes

translation.en: There is a reverence about the tune: as if the Savannah is the sun at the centre of the Carnival universe and everything else just has the privilege of revolving around it.
translation.ha: Waƙar The ƙueen's Park Saɓannah, wani dausayin koren wuri a tsakiyar babban birnin Trinidad, shi ne babban wurin casun baje-kolin ƙasar kuma gidan babban dandalin gasar.

translation.en: "Savannah Grass" is an invitation to experience this magical world.
translation.ha: Wannan waƙar ta kawo muhimmancin wannan wurin daidai, da kuma tunanin da ta yi taimakon samarwa ga masu son gasar a cikin shekaru.

translation.en: Oxymoronically, the loose steadiness of the percussion is a nod to both the regimented dedication of Carnival lovers and their easygoing way of enjoying themselves.
translation.ha: Akwai wani girma game da waƙar: kamar ita Saɓannah ita ce ranar da take a tsakiyar wurin baje-kolin, kuma kowane abu kawai yana kai kawo ne a kewayenta.

translation.en: The tune is both melodious and energetic, with a pace that makes it a good song for "chipping" (the light shuffle step with which masqueraders walk/dance down the road).
translation.ha: Waƙar "Saɓannah Grass" wata gayyata ce domin fuskantar wannan duniyar mai ban mamaki.

translation.en: By its clever incorporation of archival Carnival footage, the official video further elevates the genius of the song by showing how it seamlessly spans generations and builds on the foundation blocks of calypso to produce a fresh soca offering.
translation.ha: A hanyar rashin daidaito, yanayin yadda kiɗan yake yakan ba wa masu baje-kolin da masoya hanya mai sauƙi da za su ji daɗinsu.

translation.en: Even if it does not win Road March (though it has a very good chance!), "Savannah Grass" will go down in the annals of soca music as one of the timeless tunes that stir the emotions of Carnival lovers everywhere.
translation.ha: Kiɗan yana da daɗi da armashi, da 'yar tazara da take ƙara masa daɗi (wurin wucewar da aka haska wanda yake sa 'yan wasan sun wuce/yi rawa a kan titin).

translation.en: 2. "Rag Storm" by Super Blue, featuring 3 Canal
translation.ha: Yanayin bidiyon bikin gasar ta hanyar yadda aka yi shi, yakan ƙasa yadda abin yake tsallakawa daga ƙarni zuwa ƙarni wanda yake samar da sabuwar hanyar yin waƙar soca.

translation.en: An interesting idiosyncrasy of "playing mas'" and dancing to soca music is that somehow, people's hands go up in the air, usually with whatever they are holding at the moment, from drinks to facecloths.
translation.ha: Ko da ba ta samu nasarar cin gasar Road March ba (duk da cewa tana da dama!), waƙar "Saɓannah Grass" za ta kasance a tarihin kiɗan soɗa a matsayin ɗaya daga cikin kaɗe-kaɗe waɗanda suke sa shauƙin masoya a ko'ina.

translation.en: Colloquially called "rags", these come in handy for soaking up the sweat while "jumping up". The practice was not lost on Super Blue, who wrote a song called "Get Something and Wave", that won the 1991 Road March.
translation.ha: 2. "Rag Storm" daga Super Blue, wadda ta nuna Canal 3.

translation.en: He echoed the concept a few years later with "Bacchanal Time", in which he commanded masqueraders to "start to wave" as the brass section played the familiar "F-jam" or "tantana" melody in the background.
translation.ha: Wata ɗabi'a ta musamman ta "playing mas" da rawa ta waƙar soca shi ne, hannuwan mutane suna sama, kusan koyaushe da ko ma me suke riƙe a lokacin, daga abubuwan sha zuwa abubuwan rufe fuska.

translation.en: Super Blue had come up with a formula for the type of song that worked on the road: he won again in 1995 with his ode to cricketer Brian Lara, in which he directed his audience to "raise yuh bat and party".
translation.ha: A wani harshen ana kiransu "tsummokara" waɗannan suna amfani a lokacin goge gumi a lokacin "tsalle sama". Ba a rasa wannan abin ba a "Super Blue, wanda ya rubuta wata waƙa da ake kira "Get Something and Waɓe", wadda a ci gasar Road March na 1991.

translation.en: "Rag Storm" has many of those same elements — the lavway-type call-and-response, with a wild aerobic pace that encourages frenzied rag-waving.
translation.ha: Ya amsa manufar a 'yan shekaru da "Bacchanal Time", a cikin wadda ya ba wa masu wasa umarnin su "fara motsawa" a lokacin da ɓangaren kiɗan ya yi daidai da kiɗan "F-jam" ko "tantana" daga ƙasa-ƙasa.

translation.en: It's a great song for the stage as masqueraders break loose and “play themselves”, and may very well prove to be one to beat in this year's Road March race.
translation.ha: Super Blue ta zo da wani tsari wa irin waƙar da take aiki a kan titi: he sake cin gasar a 1995 da waƙarsa da mai masa kiɗa Brian Lara, a inda ya umarci masu sauraronsa da su "ɗaga hannayensu a cashe".

translation.en: 3. "Famalay" by Machel Montano, Bunji Garlin and Skinny Fabulous
translation.ha: Waƙar "Rag Storm" tana da da yawa daga cikin irin waɗannan abubuwan - irin waƙar da martanin, da wani irin kiɗan mai armashi.

translation.en: If there's one song that's aggressively going after the Road March title this year, it's this big tune that has several winning ingredients:
translation.ha: Waƙa ce mai muhimmanci sosai ga dandalin a daidai lokacin da 'yan kallon suke cashewar kuma suna "yin waƙar da kansu", kuma za su zama waɗanda za su yi nasara a gasar wannan shekarar ta Road March.

translation.en: a driving "power soca" beat, strong lyrics that capture the essence of the unity of the festival, and a clever hook that appeals to the tribal facet of Carnival — going everywhere with your crew, or as Trinbagonians say, your "famalay" (not to be confused with "family"):
translation.ha: 3. "Famalay" daga Machel Montano da Bunji Grlin da kuma Skinny Fabulous

translation.en: Well, let me tell you one time, famalay is famalay and that different from bloodline
translation.ha: In har akwai wata waƙa tilo da ta fito da ƙarfinta don neman cinye gasar wannan shekarar ta Road March, to wannan waƙar ce da take da abubuwa d yawa na yin nasara:

translation.en: Some say them is blood but them don't want to see the sunshine
translation.ha: armashi mai "ƙarfi na waƙar soca" da tsarin waƙar wanda ya dace da dalilin haɗin kai a shirin da wani abu da yake riƙe masu sauraro - tafiya ko'ina da abokan aikinka, ko kuma kamar yadda mutanen Tirinbagoniya suke faɗa, "famalay" ɗinka (don kar a haɗa shi da "iyali"):

translation.en: Famalay doh ever ‘fraid to have your back at all time...
translation.ha: To, bari in gaya ma a karo ɗaya, "famalay" ita ce "famalay" da kuma wannan bambancin tun asali

translation.en: Without giving instructions (with the exception of one verse in which Skinny sings "show me yuh hand" and "come follow me"), the song achieves an almost militaristic sense of purpose.
translation.ha: Wasu sun ce jini ne amma su ba sa son su ga hasken rana

translation.en: Its sweet soca hook, peppered with the occasional dancehall-inspired lyrical improvisation, has been driving crowds wild at Carnival fetes.
translation.ha: Famalay kar ka ji tsoron samun bayanka a kowane lokaci…

translation.en: Though there was some discussion as to whether or not "Famalay" would even qualify for the Road March contest because Skinny hails from St. Vincent and the Grenadines, the rules say that once "the majority of the lead vocal performance" is "undertaken and carried out by nationals of Trinidad and Tobago", the song can be a contender — and this one definitely is.
translation.ha: Ba tare da bayar da dokoki ba (ba tare da baiti ɗaya ba a inda Skinny ya yi waƙa "nuna min hannunka" da "zo biyo ni"), waƙar ta yi nasarar samun wani ƙarfi na musamman.

translation.en: This is not to say that it's a three-song race. With just about three weeks to go before Carnival, there other tunes — including two wicked ones by female artists Destra Garcia and Patrice Roberts — that may just give our picks a run for their money, and with soca performers still dropping new tracks, the battle for Road March 2019 is still being fought.
translation.ha: ƙarfin yadda waƙar soca take kamu, wanda hakan yake haɗe da yadda 'yan kallo masu rawa suke ƙara mata armashi, yakan sa taron mutanen su ji shauƙi a wajen gasar.

translation.en: Let the dead tell their stories about Hong Kong
translation.ha: Duk da cewa akwai bayanai game da cewa ko ma "Famalay" za ta iya samun damar shiga gasar Road March ko a'a, saboda Skinny ɗan St. ɓincent ne da Grenadines, dokar ta ce a duk lokcin da 'yan Trinidad da Tobago suka karɓi yadda yanayin waƙar yake, to waƙar za ta iya shiga gasar - kuma wannan ɗayar tabbas ita ce.

translation.en: Temple Street, Yau Ma Tei, Hong Kong. PHOTO: David Yan (CC BY 2.0)
translation.ha: Wannan ba wai ana cewa gasar waƙoƙi uku ba ce. Ana saura sati uku a fara gsar, akwai wasu waƙoƙin - waɗanda suka haɗa da wasu gagararru biyu waɗanda wasu 'yan wasa mata Destra Garcia da Patrice Roberts - waɗanda za su iya ba waɗanda muka zaɓa mamaki, sannan kuma ga masu waƙoƙin soca suna ta ƙaro sababbin waƙoƙi, wannan gasar ta Road March ana cigaba da fafata ta.

translation.en: Warning: this story includes graphic descriptions of death and violence. A version of this story was previously published on Medium.
translation.ha: A bar matattu su faɗi labaransu game da Hong Kong

translation.en: If you have traveled to Hong Kong, you have probably visited Yau Ma Tei, a popular night market district where people go to enjoy shopping and street food.
translation.ha: Titin wajen bauta, Yau Ma Tei, Hong Kong. Hoto: Daɓid Yan (CC BY 2.0)

translation.en: Yau Ma Tei is one of the most densely populated areas in Hong Kong.
translation.ha: Gargaɗi: wannan labarin ya ƙunshi hotuna masu muni na mutuwa ba rikici: An buga wani irin wannan labarin a baya a Medium.

translation.en: Since 2016, the district has been the site of "20,000 ways to die in Yau Ma Tei", a guided "homicide tour" founded by Melody Chan and myself, who have lived in the area for many years.
translation.ha: Idan ka taɓa zuwa Hong Kong, to wataƙila ka kai Yau Ma Tei ziyara, wata shahararren yankin kasuwar dare inda mutane suke zuwa domin jin daɗin siyayya da abinci kan titin.

translation.en: Through the tour, we seek to address the meaning of life and living conditions in Hong Kong.
translation.ha: Yau Ma Tei na ɗaya daga cikin wuraren da suke da yawan mutane a Hong Kong.

translation.en: The 1.5-kilometer tour route runs north and south of Yau Ma Tei and visits 12 murder scenes over two hours.
translation.ha: Tun 2016, lardin ya kasance shi ne yankin "hanyoyi 20,000 da za a mutu a Yu Ma Tei", wani jagorar "tafiyar kisan ƙare dangi" wanda Melody Chan da ni kaina muka samar, waɗanda muka zauna a wurin tsaro shekaru masu yawa.

translation.en: We started it originally as a Halloween activity to raise funds for a local organization.
translation.ha: Ta hanyar rangadin, muna so mu san ma'anar rayuwa da kuma yanayin rayuwa a Hong Kong.

translation.en: As the feedback was excellent, we continued organizing tours at night during the winter months when the weather is cooler.
translation.ha: Hanyar rangadin mai tsawon kilomita 1.5 ta bi ta arewa da kudu da Yau Mma Tei kuma tana

translation.en: The tour guides are social workers, teachers, medical doctors and other professionals.
translation.ha: Mun fara shi ne asali a matsayin wani abu na bikin Halloween domin haɗa kuɗaɗe domin wata ƙaramar ƙungiya.

translation.en: Thus far, about 500 people have taken the tour.
translation.ha: Kamar yadda muka samu kyakkyawan sakamako, mun cigaba da haɗa tattaki da daddare a lokacin watannin sanyi, a lokacin da yanayi yake da sanyi.

translation.en: The homicide cases we selected date mostly from 2012 to 2016. Details of the cases were compiled from newspaper reports and records from the Coroner's Court.
translation.ha: Masu jagorancin tattakin ma'aikatan al'umma ne da malamai da likitoci da sauran ƙwararru.

translation.en: Below is a trailer of the tour's 2017 edition on YouTube:
translation.ha: Zuwa yanzu, kusan mutane 500 sun yi wannan rangadin.

translation.en: So close, yet so isolated
translation.ha: Kwanakin watan matsalolin kisan dangin da muka zaɓa duk kusan daga 2012 ne zuwa 2016. An taskace cikakkun bayanan matsalolin daga rahotannin jaridu da taskatattun bayanai daga kotun Coroner.

translation.en: The population density in downtown Kowloon peninsula is about 44,000 people per square kilometer, and about 20,000 people live in Yau Ma Tei.
translation.ha: A ƙasa ga wani yankin bidiyo na taiye-tafiyen na 2017 a Youtube:

translation.en: Many apartments are sub-divided into smaller units. People live so closely together, but at the same time, they are quite isolated.
translation.ha: Sun yi kusa, amma a keɓance

translation.en: Quite a number of the cases featured on the tour involve elderly people.
translation.ha: Cunkushewar al'ummar da ke cikin garin Kowloon ya kai adadin mutane 44,000 a murabba'in kilomita, da kuma kusan mutane 20,000 da suke zaune a Yau Ma Tei.

translation.en: In one case, an old man committed suicide by jumping out of the fourth-floor window of a building with a rope tied around his neck.
translation.ha: Da yawan gidaje an ƙara rarraba su zuwa ƙananan sassa. Mutane suna zaune a kurkusa sosai a tare, amma kuma a lokaci guda, suna keɓance.

translation.en: The body dangled on the outer wall of the building above the street all night, but no one noticed it until the next morning when the residents of a building across the street opened their window.
translation.ha: Da yawa daga cikin abubuwan da suka faru sun haɗa da tsofaffin mutane.

translation.en: Another case involves two elderly people who were found dead at home, one starved to death.
translation.ha: A wani abu da ya faru, wani tsoho ya kashe kansa ta hanyar tsalle ya faɗo daga tagar hawa na huɗu na wani gini da igiya a ɗaure a kewayen wuyansa.

translation.en: It was later revealed that the husband was the caretaker of the wife, who was suffering from dementia.
translation.ha: Gangar jikin tana reto a katangar waje ta ginin a saman titin duk tsawon dare, amma ba wanda ya kula da ita har sai da safiya a lokacin da mazaunan wani gini a tsallaken titi suka buɗe tagoginsu.

translation.en: The husband had a fall in the living room and died, and the wife slowly starved to death in bed.
translation.ha: Wata matsalar kuma ta haɗa da wasu tsofaffi guda biyu waɗanda aka same su a mace a gida, ɗayan ya mutu saboda yunwa.

translation.en: It is difficult to imagine that no one had taken notice of the somewhat desperate living conditions of two elderly people.
translation.ha: Daga baya aka bayyana cewa shi mijin shi ne mai kula da matar, wadda take fama da cutar mantuwa.

translation.en: According to the 2016 population census, there were about 1.16 million people aged 65 and over in Hong Kong—about 15.9 per cent of the total population.
translation.ha: Mijin ya faɗi a ɗakin kwanciya ya mutu, ita kuma matar a hankali yunwa ta kashe ta a kan gado.

translation.en: About 150 thousand of those people lived alone.
translation.ha: Abu ne mai wahala a yi tunanin ba wanda ya kula da irin wannan yanayin zama mai buƙatar kulawa na waɗannan tsofaffin mutane biyu.

translation.en: The average monthly income of retired elderly people in 2016—including pension and family and government support—was HK$5,780 (US$720).
translation.ha: Kamar yadda ƙidayar al'umma ta 2016 ta bayyana, akwai kusan mutane miliyan 1.16 waɗanda suke da shekaru 65 zuwa sama a Hong Kong - kusan kashi 15.9 cikin ɗari na yawan adadin mutanen.

translation.en: The current individual median income is about HK$16,800 (US$2,200) dollars.
translation.ha: Kusan mutane dubu 150 suna zaune su kaɗai.

translation.en: But living with family or others does not guarantee support. There are many family tragedies in the city, among the working classes, in particular.
translation.ha: Matsakaicin kuɗin shigar tsofaffin da suka yi ritaya a wata a 2016 - wanda ya haɗa da fansho da taimakon iyalai da na gwamnati - shi ne HK$5,780 (Dalar Amurka 7320).

translation.en: In one case, the deceased was a 15-year-old girl who was into cosplay. She performed well in her studies but quarrelled with her family because of her hobby.
translation.ha: Albashin da yake ɗan tsakiya kuma shi ne kusan HK$16,800 (Dalar Amurka 2,200).

translation.en: Eventually, she dropped out of school and became a photo model to earn a living.
translation.ha: Amma zama da iyalai ko wasu ba ya tabbatar da tallafi. Akwai baƙƙan cikin iyalai da yawa a cikin gari, musamman a tsakanin masu yi aiki.

translation.en: She was murdered by a client who had paid her HK$500 dollars (US$65) to take pictures of her.
translation.ha: A wata matsalar, mamaciyar wata yarinya ce 'yar shekaru 15 wadda take cosplay. Ta yi ƙoƙari sosai a karatunta amma sun yi rikici da 'yan'uwanta a kan abin da take so.

translation.en: In another case, a dead baby with its umbilical cord intact was found in a bag in Yau Ma Tei subway station by a cleaning lady.
translation.ha: A dalilin haka, ta bar makaranta ta koma harkar hoto domin samun na kanta.

translation.en: Upon investigation, the police found out that the mother was a foreign domestic helper who became pregnant and was afraid that her employers would dismiss her. The woman was arrested and jailed.
translation.ha: Wani abokin aikinta ne ya kashe ta, bayan ya biya ta Dala HK$500 (Dalar Amurka 65) don ya ɗauki hotunanta.

translation.en: During this segment of the tour, the guide raises the question: aren't the woman's employers also guilty?
translation.ha: A wata matsalar kuma, an sami wata gawar ɗan jariri da cibiya ko yankewa ba a yi ba a cikin wata jaka a titin ƙarƙashin ƙasa na Yau Ma Tei wadda wata mai shara ta gani.

translation.en: It is difficult to imagine not noticing that the person who served you daily is pregnant.
translation.ha: Da aka bincika, 'yan sanda sun gano cewa mahaifiyar wata 'yar aiki ce 'yar ƙasar waje wadda ta yi ciki kuma take tsoron waɗanda suka ɗauke ta aiki za su kore ta. An kama matar an ɗaure ta.

translation.en: There are more than 370,000 helpers in Hong Kong and the law requires them to live in their employers’ homes.
translation.ha: A wannan ɓangaren na tafiyar, mai yi jagorar tafiyar ya yi tambaya: su ma waɗanda suka ba ta aiki ba su da laifi?

translation.en: This arrangement makes them vulnerable to abuse in the form of long working hours, poor diet, etc.
translation.ha: Abu ne mai wahala a iya kasa gane matar da take yi muku aiki a kullum tana da ciki.

translation.en: About a year after that case, another foreign domestic helper was fired for getting pregnant.
translation.ha: Akwai 'yan aiki sama da 370,000 a Hong Kong kuma doka ta nemi su zauna a gidajen waɗanda suka ɗauke su aiki.

translation.en: It took two years for the woman to successfully appeal the illegal termination of the contract in court.
translation.ha: Wannan tsarin ya sanya suna cikin sauƙin cin zarafi ta hanyar ɗaukar awoyi masu tsayi wajen aiki da rashin abinci, d.s.

translation.en: Grassroots murderers
translation.ha: Kamar shekara ɗaya bayan waccan matsalar, an kori wata 'yar aiki 'yan ƙasar waje don ta yi ciki.

translation.en: Many of the murders in Yau Ma Tei are crimes of passion committed by ordinary people, and as is typical when the crime is not premeditated, the perpetrators make many mistakes.
translation.ha: Sai da aka yi shekaru biyu kafin matar ta iya ɗaukaka ƙarar yadda aka kore ta daga aiki ba bisa ƙa'ida ba a kotu.

translation.en: There is the case in which a man killed his older brother in an open street with a nine-inch fish knife that penetrated the brother's lungs.
translation.ha: Makasa daga tushe

translation.en: The knife was supposed to be a gift for the brother.
translation.ha: Da yawan kashe-kashen da ake yi a Yau Ma Tei laifuka ne na son rai da mutanen gari suke aikatawa, kuma kamar yadda yake in ba shirin aiwatarwa aka yi ba, masu laifin suna yin kurakurai da yawa.

translation.en: One killer stayed at the crime scene after the murder; another used his ID card to book a hotel room to hide the body.
translation.ha: Akwai wani laifin inda wani mutum ya kashe yayansa a kan titi da wuta wuƙar aikin kifi inci tara wadda ta huda huhun ɗan'uwan.

translation.en: Another murder took place in a convenience store.
translation.ha: Wuƙar ya kamata ta zama kyauta ce ga ɗan'uwan.

translation.en: The incident was recorded by closed-circuit TV.
translation.ha: Wani makashi ya tsaya a wurin da aka yi kisan bayan yin kisan; wani kuma ya yi amfani da ID card ɗinsa domin ya kamata otal don ya ɓoye gawar.

translation.en: The murderer was a tourist holding a Canadian passport, who stabbed the storekeeper after the latter questioned him for taking items from the shop without paying.
translation.ha: An yi wani kisan an wani shagon sayar da kaya.

translation.en: An encounter with souls and their shadows
translation.ha: Talabijin ɗin sirri ta ɗauki duk abin da ya faru.

translation.en: The majority of tour patrons are college students.
translation.ha: Makashin ɗan yawon buɗe ido ne da yake riƙe da fasfo ɗin Kanada, wanda ya soka wa mai tsaron shagon wuƙa bayan ya tambaye shi don yana ɗaukan kaya daga shagon ba tare da biya ba.

translation.en: Some join out of curiosity; others consider it a way to educate themselves.
translation.ha: Haɗuwa da rayuka da inuwarsu

translation.en: A doctor who was part of a team of medical workers who took the tour said this of one case:
translation.ha: Yawancin masu kula da rangadin ɗaliban kwaleji ne.

translation.en: The protagonist of the case is very similar to the patients we often encounter in the accident and emergency wards – drug addicts, street sleepers, refugees.
translation.ha: Wasu suna shiga ne saboda son jin labari; wasu kuma suna ɗaukar hakan a wata hanya ta ilmantar da kawunansu.

translation.en: We all have to rescue them in the emergency room.
translation.ha: Wani likita wanda yana cikin rukunin ma'aikatan lafiya da suka yi tafiyar ya fai wannan a game da wani lamari:

translation.en: But usually they are quite hostile in their attitudes.
translation.ha: Tauraron lamarin yana kama matuƙa da irin marasa lafiyar da muke haɗuwa da su a ɓangarorin sashen gaggawa na hatsari - masu shan ƙwaya ko masu kwana a kwararo ko kuma 'yan gudun hijira.

translation.en: It’s very difficult to deal with them and we tend to lose patience over time.
translation.ha: Dole duk mu ceto su a ɗakin gaggawa.

translation.en: This guided tours remind us that we must be patient and should not become indifferent.
translation.ha: Amma a mafi yawan lokuta suna da kaushi a mu'amalolinsu.

translation.en: And their lives are very miserable and they struggle hard to survive.
translation.ha: Yana da matuƙar wahala a yi mu'amala da su amma mukan rasa haƙurinmu in abin ya yi yawa.

translation.en: Yau Ma Tei's 20,000 residents will all eventually die in different ways.
translation.ha: Irin wannan tattakin da ake yi wa jagora suna tuna mana dole mu yi haƙuri kuma kar mu dinga halin ko-in-kula.

translation.en: We believe that upon their death, their souls will become part of the fabric of the city and continue to linger in the alleys and streets, reminding people of the meaning of existence.
translation.ha: Kuma rayuwarsu tana cikin firgici kuma suna ƙoƙari sosai don su rayu.

translation.en: The tour aims to create a space for these shadows to reveal their stories.
translation.ha: Mazauna 20,000 na Yau Ma Tei duk a ƙarshe dai za su mutu ta hanyoyi daban-daban.

translation.en: The number one cause of suicide is untreated depression.
translation.ha: Mun yarda cewa da zarar sun mutu, rayukansu za su zama wani ɓangare na garin kuma za su cigaba da yawatawa a kwararo-kwararo da tituna, suna tunawa mutane ma'anar rayuwa.

translation.en: Depression is treatable and suicide is preventable.
translation.ha: Tafiyar tana da muradin samar da dama ga waɗannan inuwoyin domin su bayar da labaransu.

translation.en: You can get help from confidential support lines for the suicidal and those in emotional crisis.
translation.ha: Dalilin farko na kashe kai ita ce damuwar da ba a magance ta ba.

translation.en: Visit Befrienders.org to find a suicide prevention helpline in your country.
translation.ha: Ana iya magance damuwa kuma ana iya kare kisan kai.

translation.en: The landmark building was demolished despite a High Court Directive
translation.ha: An rushe babban ginin duk da umarnin kotu

translation.en: The dilapidated state of “Jahaj Bari” before being demolished.
translation.ha: Halin tagayyara na "Jahaj Bari" kafin a rushe.

translation.en: It was the first commercial house in the Bangladeshi capital, Dhaka, built in 1870. Image by Shakil Ahmed, used with permission.
translation.ha: Shi ne gida na farko na haya a babban birnin Bangaladesh, an gina Dhaka a 1870. Hoto daga Shakil Ahmed, an samu izinin amfani da shi.

translation.en: In Dhaka, a century-old heritage building was demolished clandestinely on the night of Eid-ul-Fitr on June 5, 2019.
translation.ha: A Dhaka, an rushe tsohon gini mai tarihin kusan ƙarni guda a asirce a daren ƙaramar salla a 5 ga Yuni, 2019.

translation.en: The ship-like structure, known locally as "Jahaj Bari", was built around 1870 and considered to be the first commercial building in Bangladesh's capital.
translation.ha: Ginin da yake da sifar jirgin ruwa wanda mutanen gari suke kira da "Jahaj Bari" an gina shi ne a wajejen 1870 kuma ana ɗaukarsa a matsayin gini na haya na farko a babban birnin Bangaladesh.

translation.en: Its demolition has caused many to speak out against the neglect of Dhaka's architectural treasures.
translation.ha: Rushe shi ya jawo da yawa sun magantu wajen nuna ƙiyayyarsu ga yadda aka yi watsi da gine-ginen gargajiya na Dhaka.

translation.en: Media reports alleged that supporters of the ruling Awami League (AL) party brought three bulldozers to the location and demolished the building.
translation.ha: Rahotanni sun yi zargin cewa magoya bayan Jam'iyyar Awami (AL) ne suka kawo buldoza guda uku zuwa wajen suka rushe ginin.

translation.en: The supporters claim that their leader, local member of parliament (Dhaka-7) Haji Md. Salim, bought the property to build a multi-story building on the site.
translation.ha: Magoya bayan sun nuna cewa shugabansu, wani mamba na majalisa (Dhaka-7) Haji Md. Salim, shi ne ya sayi ginin domin gina wani gine mai benaye da yawa a wajen.

translation.en: The AL supporters also claimed that the building was not included on any heritage list.
translation.ha: Magoya bayan AL sun yi zargin cewa ba a sanya ginin a cikin jerin wasu kayan gargajiya na musamman ba.

translation.en: On August 13, 2018, the Dhaka High Court issued a directive to the government agency responsible for coordinating urban development in Dhaka to not approve or allow the demolition or modification of 2,200 archaeologically significant buildings around the capital city.
translation.ha: A 13 ga Agustan 2018, kotun Dhaka ta bayar da umarni ga hukumar gwamnati da take da alhakin tsara cigaban birane a Dhaka da kada ta amince ko ta bari a rushe ko a sauya fasalin wasu gine-gine masu muhimmanci a tarihi guda 2,200 a kewayen babban birnin.

translation.en: Jahaj Bari is also part of a Waqf (mortmain) estate that, as part of a charitable donation, could not be sold.
translation.ha: Jahaj Bari shi ma wani ɓangare ne na ginin waƙafi (sadakar dindindin), wanda a matsayin sadaka, ba za a siyar da shi ba.

translation.en: According to the administrator of Bangladesh's Waqf Administration, it is mandatory to have permission in order to hand over, sell or develop any Waqf property.
translation.ha: A ta bakin mai kula da harkokin waƙafi na Hukumar kula da Waƙafi ta Bangaladesh, dole ne a nemi izini domin a bayar ko sayar ko gina duk wani gini na waƙafi.

translation.en: Contrary to the claims of the AL activists, no such permission was requested for the sale or demolition of the building in question.
translation.ha: Saɓanin yadda 'yan gwagwarmayar AL suka raya, ba a nemi irin wannan izinin ba domin sayarwa ko rushe wannan ginin da ake magana a kai.

translation.en: In March 2019, an attempt was made to demolish the building.
translation.ha: A Maris na 2019, an yi yunƙurin rushe ginin.

translation.en: Urban Study Group, a volunteer-run nonprofit group dedicated to protecting the historical urban fabric of Old Dhaka, filed a complaint to stop the demolition, citing the above mentioned High Court order.
translation.ha: ƙungiyar Nazarin Birane, wata ƙungiyar sa-kai mai zaman kanta da take ƙoƙarin kare asalin tarihin birnin Tsohon garin Dhaka, sun shigar da ƙara don a tsayar da rushewar, suna masu nuni ga wannan dokar kotun da aka ambata a sama.

translation.en: However, according to newspaper reports, some locals are happy that the building was demolished.
translation.ha: Duk da haka, kamar yadda rahotannin wata jarida suka nuna, wasu daga cikin mazauna yankin sun yi farin cikin rushe ginin.

translation.en: They felt that it was in a dilapidated state and feared that it would fall down on them—an indication of the lack of awareness of historical preservation and support for the restoration of heritage buildings in Bangladesh.
translation.ha: Suna ganin cewa ginin yana cikin halin tagayyara kuma suna tsoron zai iya faɗo musu - alamun da suke nuna rashin samun wayewar kai game da yadda za a alkinta da tsare martabar gine-ginen tarihi a Bangaladesh.

translation.en: Heritage history—just empty words
translation.ha: Tarihin abin da aka gada daga iyaye da kakanni - kawai kalmomin baka

translation.en: Many expressed their anger on hearing about the destruction of the building.
translation.ha: Da yawa sun nuna fushinsa da suka ji labari game da rushe ginin.

translation.en: Shuvra Kar wrote on Facebook:
translation.ha: Shuɓra Kar ya rubuta a Fesbuk:

translation.en: Translation Original Quote
translation.ha: Fassara Abin da aka faɗa na ainihi

translation.en: Heritage, history, culture these are just empty words in this country!
translation.ha: Abin da aka gada daga iyaye da kakanni da tarihi da al'adu, waɗannan kawai maganganun fatar baka ne a wannan ƙasa!

translation.en: Writer Tania Kamrun Nahar explained why this heritage building needed to be saved:
translation.ha: Marubuciya Tania Kamrun Nahar ta yi bayanin dalilan da suka sa akwai buƙatar a kawwame wannan ginin:

translation.en: Translation Original Quote
translation.ha: Fassara Abin da aka faɗa na ainihi

translation.en: The three-storied "Jahaj Bari" had beautiful motifs on the railings.
translation.ha: Ginin na "Jahaj Bari" mai hawa uku, yana da wata kwalliya mai kyau a jikin relarsa.

translation.en: The long verandah had designed roofs.
translation.ha: Doguwar barandar tana da rufi mai kwalliya.

translation.en: The whole building had many beautiful designs — pointed arches, decorated cornices.
translation.ha: Duk ginin yana da wata kwalliya mai kyau - wata irin lanƙwasa da indararai masu kwalliya.

translation.en: The columns had ionic and Corinthian capital designs.
translation.ha: Layukan ginin an yi su da wani irin ƙarfe irin kwalliyar Corinthian.

translation.en: The building had such remarkable designs which were rare to find in other buildings in the old parts of Dhaka.
