translation.ha: Ginin yana da wani irin tsari mai ban sha'awa wanda da wahala a same shi a wasu gine-ginen da suke a daɗaɗɗun sassan Dhaka.

translation.en: So, the building needed to be saved.
translation.ha: Don haka, ginin yana buƙatar a kare shi.

translation.en: Dhaka was established as the capital of Bengal in 1610, more than four centuries ago.
translation.ha: An kafa Dhaka a matsayin babban birnin Bengal a 1610, sama da ƙarni huɗu da suka shuɗe.

translation.en: During the years of Mughal rule and British colonial rule, many buildings were built that form part of the history and heritage of the city.
translation.ha: A lokacin shekarun mulkin Mughal da mulkin mallaka na Birtaniya, an gina gine-gine da yawa waɗanda suka zama su ne gine-gine na tarihin birnin.

translation.en: But most of these buildings are long gone.
translation.ha: Amma da yawa daga cikin waɗannan gine-gine tuni sun tafi.

translation.en: The ones that remain are in a dilapidated state and are destined to be grabbed by occupants claiming ownership of the buildings (often by forging documents).
translation.ha: ɗaiɗaikun da suka rage suna cikin mayuwacin hali kuma sun zamanto mazauna wurin za su iya iƙirarin karɓe mallakinsu (mafi yawanci ta hanyar yin takardun bogi).

translation.en: One example is Bara Katra, a historical and architectural monument built between 1644 and 1646 AD by Mir Abul Qasim, the Diwan (chief revenue official) of the Mughal prince Shah Shuja.
translation.ha: Misali ɗaya shi ne Bara Katra, wani katafaren gini na tarihi da aka gina a tsakanin 1644 da 1646 AD wanda Mir Abul ƙasim, ma'ajin (babban ma'ajin haraji) yariman Mughal Shah Shuja.

translation.en: The building is on the verge of collapsee due to the lack of maintenance, preservation efforts, and damage caused by illegal occupants.
translation.ha: Ginin yana daf da rugujewa saboda rashin kulawa da ƙoƙarin gyarawa da kuma yadda mazauna ba bisa ƙa'ida ba suka illata shi.

translation.en: Bara Katra, the structure was built according to the traditional pattern of Central Asian caravanserais and is embellished in the style of Mughal architecture.
translation.ha: An gina ginin Bara Katra a kan tsarin gine-ginen alfarma na hutu na Central Asiya kuma an yi kwalliya da tsarin ginin Mughal.

translation.en: Image by Ragib Hassan via Wikipedia. CC BY 2.5
translation.ha: Hoto daga Ragib Hassan, ta hanyar Wikipidiya. CC zuwa 2.5

translation.en: Muntasir Mamun has written many books on the history and heritage of Dhaka city.
translation.ha: Muntasir Mamu ya rubuta littattafai da yawa a kan tarihi da kayan tarihi na birnin Dhaka.

translation.en: He wrote in a local newspaper Bhorer Kagoj:
translation.ha: Ya rubuta a wata jaridar cikin gida mai suna Bhorer Kagoj:

translation.en: Translation Original Quote
translation.ha: Fassara Abin da aka faɗa na ainihi

translation.en: I have pleaded to the authorities in the past four decades to save the heritage buildings like Bara Katra and Choto Katra.
translation.ha: Na roƙi mahukunta a kusan shekaru arba'in da suka wuce domin su ceto gine-ginen tarihi kamar Bara Katra da Choto Katra.

translation.en: But nobody listened.
translation.ha: Amma ba wanda ya saurara.

translation.en: When the philatelic department demolished part of the old walls of the famous Lalbagh Fort to make a car park, what can you say?
translation.ha: A lokacin da ofishin kula da haraji suka rushe wani ɓangare na tsofaffin katangun shahararren Lalbagh Fort domin yin wajen pakin ɗin motoci, me za ka ce?

translation.en: How can you fight against stupidity?
translation.ha: Ta yaya za ka yaƙi shirme?

translation.en: An online news portal has published an in-depth report about government negligence of these heritage buildings and the influential people trying to demolish existing buildings:
translation.ha: Wata kafar yaɗa labarai ta intanet ta bayar da cikakken rahoto game da sakacin gwamnati ga waɗannan gine-gine na tarihi da wasu manyan mutane da suke ƙoƙari rushe gine-ginen da ake da su yanzu:

translation.en: Translation Original Quote
translation.ha: Fassara Abin da aka faɗa na ainihi

translation.en: The no. 14 house in the heritage list has already been taken down.
translation.ha: Tuni an yi awon gaba da gida mai lamba 14 a jerin gine-ginen tarihi.

translation.en: Most parts of the famous big house in Sutrapur has been destroyed.
translation.ha: Yawancin ɓangarorin shahararren babban gidan nan a Sutrapur an rushe su.

translation.en: The relics of the Mughal era in Bangshal Mukim Bazar Jam-e Mosque and Siddique Bazar Jam-e Mosque are gone with a new structure in place in the name of renovation.
translation.ha: Ragowar abubuwan tarihi na zamanin Mughal a masallacin Bangshal Mukim Baza Jam-e da masallacin Siddiƙue Bazar Jam-e duk sun tafi, tare da yin sabon gini a wajen da sunan gyarawa.

translation.en: Although there is a government directive to protect heritage buildings, the officials of Rajdhani Unnayan Kartripakkha and Dhaka City Corporation are not doing anything.
translation.ha: Duk da cewa akwai dokar gwamnati da ta nuna a kare tsofaffin gine-gine, ma'aikatan Rajdhani Uunnayan Kartripakkha da Hukumar Birnin Dhaka ba sa yin komai.

translation.en: Their inaction is encouraging greedy parties to grab the old properties and destroy them.
translation.ha: Rashin taɓuka komai daga gare su ya sa masu haɗama suna ta wawurar tsofaffin gine-ginen suna lalata su.

translation.en: The Urban Study Group has organized rallies and human chains to protest these demolitions.
translation.ha: ƙungiyar Nazarin Birane ta shirya gangami na mutane domin a yi alla-wadai da wannan rushe-rushen.

translation.en: They are also keen to create awareness to protect other endangered heritage buildings.
translation.ha: Kuma suna da himmar wayar da kai domin a kare sauran gine-gine tarihi da suka fuskantar barazana.

translation.en: Here are some more images of Bangladeshi heritage buildings in peril:
translation.ha: Nan ma ga wasu ƙarin hotuna na tsofaffin gine-ginen Bangaladesh da suke a ɓalɓalce:

translation.en: An old Zamindar house in Nazira Bazar of Old Dhaka is being demolished. Image by Shakil Ahmed. Used with permission.
translation.ha: Wani tsohon gidan Zamidar a Nazira Bazar na tsohuwar Dhaka ana rushe shi. Hoto daga Shakil Ahmed. An samu izinin amfani da shi.

translation.en: Nimtali Palace, it was the residence of the Deputy Governor of Dhaka during the Mughal rule.
translation.ha: Fadar Nimtali, ita ce muhallin mataimakin gwamnan Dhaka a lokacin mulkin Mughal.

translation.en: Only the west gate of the palace still survives.
translation.ha: ƙofar yamma ce kawai ta fadar ta tsira zuwa yanzu.

translation.en: Image by Shakil Ahmed, used with permission.
translation.ha: Hoto daga Shakil Ahmed, an samu izinin amfani da shi.

translation.en: ShankhaNidhi House This is another century-old building in Dhaka.
translation.ha: Gidan ShakhaNidhi Wannan ma wani tsohon gini ne mai shekaru ɗari a Dhaka.

translation.en: Without preservation, this building is barely surviving.
translation.ha: Ba tare da alkintawa ba, wannan gini da ƙyar yake rayuwa.

translation.en: Image by Shakil Ahmed, used with permission.
translation.ha: Hoto daga Shakil Ahmed, an samu izinin amfani da shi.

translation.en: Northbrook Hall or Lal Kuthi – photographed in 1904 by Fritz Kapp.
translation.ha: ɗakin taron Northbrook ko Lal Kuthi - an ɗaukin hoton a 1904 daga Fritz Kapp.

translation.en: This building is barely surviving now.
translation.ha: Da ƙyar wannan ginin yake rayuwa a yanzu.

translation.en: Image via Wikipedia. Public Domain
translation.ha: Hoto ta hanyar Wikipidiya. Wurin jama'a

translation.en: [Update] As members of SEBIN searched Diaz's and Soto's home, Luz Mely Reyes reported live from the scene.
translation.ha: [Cigaba] As lokacin da mambobin SEBIN suke duba gidan Diaz da Soto, Luz Mely Reyes ya kawo rahoto kai tsaye daga wajen.

translation.en: The SNTP also reported the incident:
translation.ha: SNTP ma sun kawo rahoton lamarin:

translation.en: URGENT At this time, 3:30 am, a commission from the Intelligence Forces arrives to journalist and human rights activist Luis Carlos Díaz's home, missing since 5:30 pm #WhereIsLuisCarlos
translation.ha: TSANANIN BUƙATA a wannan lokaci, 3:30 na safe, wasu daga jami'an tsaron sirri sun je gidan ɗan jaridar kuma ɗan gwagwarmayar kare haƙƙin al'umma Luis Carlos Diaz, wanda ya ɓata tun 5:30 na yamma #WhereIs LuisCarlos (Ina Luis Carlos)

translation.en: Other human rights and freedom of speech organizations joined the campaign through #DondeEstaLuisCarlos (Where is Luis Carlos?) which is, at the moment, a trending topic in Venezuela's twittosphere.
translation.ha: Wasu ƙungiyoyin kare haƙƙin ɗan'adam da kuma rajin 'yan magana sun shiga cikin gangamin ta #DondeEstaLuisCarlos (Ina Luis Carlos?) wanda a yanzu, shi ne babban labari a shafukan Tuwita na ɓenezuela.

translation.en: Díaz is a journalist and a human rights and freedom of speech advocate who is well known and highly appreciated in Venezuela and abroad for his commentary and criticism of the government of Nicolas Maduro.
translation.ha: Diaz ɗan jarida ne kuma ɗan gwagwarmayar kare haƙƙin ɗan'adam kuma mai rajin kare 'yan faɗar ra'ayi wanda aka sani sosai kuma ake yabawa a ɓenezuela da sauran ƙasashen waje saboda bayanansa da sukar gwamnatin Nicolas Maduro.

translation.en: He has long worked with Soto producing web-based video and radio programs focused on politics and human rights in Venezuela.
translation.ha: Ya daɗe yana aiki da Soto yana samar da wasu bidiyoyi na intanet da shirye-shiryen rediyo waɗanda suke mayar da hankali a kan siyasa da 'yancin ɗan'adam a ɓenezuela.

translation.en: He has also worked as an educator and promoter of the creation of citizen media spaces and independent media projects.
translation.ha: Ya kuma yi aiki a matsayin mai bayar da ilimi kuma mai ƙoƙarin haɓaka damar 'yan ƙasa a aikin jarida da kuma shirye-shiryen kafafen yaɗa labarai masu zaman kansu.

translation.en: Díaz has also been part of the Global Voices community for more than a decade.
translation.ha: Diaz kuma ya zama daga cikin ma'aikatan Global ɓoices sama da shekaru goma.

translation.en: To me, Luis Carlos is a brilliant person, well versed in information and networks in this chaotic Venezuela of ours.
translation.ha: A wajena, Luis Carlos mutum ne mai basira, masani a bayanai da sadarwa a wannan rikirkitacciyar ɓenezuelan tamu.

translation.en: He has been able to make links with society (from criticism to cultural spaces) #WhereIsLuisCarlos.
translation.ha: Ya sami damar haɗa alaƙa da al'umma (daga suka zuwa ɓangarorin al'ada) #WhereIsLuisCarlos. (Ina Luis Carlos yake)

translation.en: Just a few days prior to his disappearance, the state-affiliated media program Con el Mazo Dando showed a video clip of a recent broadcast of Diaz.
translation.ha: Yan kwanaki kaɗan kafin ɓatana, wani shirin kafar yaɗa labarai mai alaƙa da gwamnati Con el Mazo Dando sun nuna wani bidiyo na wani labarai na baya-baya na Diaz.

translation.en: The program's host, politician Diosdado Cabello, insinuated that Diaz had helped to orchestrate the nationwide power outage that had Venezuelans living in the dark for more than 24 hours on March 7 and 8.
translation.ha: Mashiryin shirin, ɗan siyasa Diosdado Cabello, ya nuna cewa Diaz ya taimaka wajen kitsa ɗauke wutar duk gari wanda ya jawo mutanen ɓenezuela suke zama a duhu sama da awanni 24 a ranar 7 da 8 ga Maris.

translation.en: There is no evidence to support this.
translation.ha: Ba wani dalili da zai ƙarfafa wannan.

translation.en: It's been been seven hours since Luis Carlos Díaz has gone missing.
translation.ha: Yanzu awanni bakwai kenan da ɓatan Luis Carlos.

translation.en: [Díaz] is a journalist for Unión Radio Noticias and he's a human rights activist.
translation.ha: [Diaz] ɗan jarida ne na Rediyon Union Radio Noticias kuma ɗan gwagwarmayar kare haƙƙin al'umma ne.

translation.en: We're at the SEBIN headquarters and they deny having him [in custody there] #WhereIsLuisCarlos
translation.ha: Muna hedikwatar SEBIN kuma sun ƙaryata kama shi [a tsare a wajensu] #WhereIsLuisCarlos

translation.en: [Update: they later confirmed Diaz was in custody]
translation.ha: [Sabon bayani: daga baya sun tabbatar cewa Diaz yana tsare]

translation.en: Journalist Vladimir Villegas denounced that he had been detained by government forces:
translation.ha: ɗan jarida ɓladimir ɓillages ya ƙaryata cewa sojojin gwamnati sun kama shi:

translation.en: We've been informed that @Unionradionet journalist Luis Carlos Díaz, has been detained by State's security forces.
translation.ha: An bayyana mana cewa ɗan jaridar @Unionradionet Luis Carlos Diaz, yana tsare a hannun jami'an tsaro na ƙasa.

translation.en: We express our concern for his physical integrity.
translation.ha: Mun bayyana kulawarmu game da yanayin lafiyarsa.

translation.en: We demand any information of his whereabouts and respect for his human rights.
translation.ha: Muna neman bayanan inda yake da kuma mutumta ƙimar haƙƙinsa na ɗan'adam.

translation.en: The Global Voices community stands in solidarity with Luis Carlos, his family, and all other independent journalists working to hold power to account in Venezuela.
translation.ha: Al'ummar Muryoyin Duniya suna tare da Luis Carlos da iyalansa da kuma duk 'yan jaridu masu zaman kansu da suke aiki domin su faɗawa gwamnati gaskiya a ɓenezuwela.

translation.en: We wish for his safe and speedy return, and will continue to update this story as it develops.
translation.ha: Muna fatan kariyar lafiyarsa da kuma dawowarsa da wurwuri, kuma za mu cigaba da sabunta wannan labari a lokacin da yake cigaba.

translation.en: Nigeria's social media bill will obliterate online freedom of expression
translation.ha: ƙudurin dokar dandulan sadarwa na Najeriya zai hana 'yancin faɗar albarkacin baki a yanar gizo.

translation.en: The draconian bill will legalize internet shutdowns in Nigeria
translation.ha: Wanna ƙudurin na kama-karya zai bayar da damar kashe harkar intanet a Najeriya.

translation.en: Senator Mohammed Sani Musa is the sponsor of the social media bill. Screenshot from Channel Television You Tube video.
translation.ha: Sanata Mohammed Sani Musa ne ya ɗauki nauyin ƙudurin dokar dandulan sadarwa. Hoton waya daga Talabijin ɗin Channel da bidiyon Youtube.

translation.en: On November 20, the Protection from Internet Falsehoods and Manipulation of other Related Matters Bill 2019, known as the "social media bill", sponsored by Senator Mohammed Sani Musa, sailed through a second reading.
translation.ha: A 20 ga Nuwamba, kudirin kariya game da ƙarya da sauya bayanai da sauran abubuwa masu a alaƙa da wannan a intanet na 2019, wanda aka sani da "kudirin soshiya mediya" wanda sanata Mohammed Sani Musa ya kai, ya wuce karatu na biyu.

translation.en: The social media bill aims to curb online falsehoods and mis- and disinformation.
translation.ha: ƙudirin na soshiyal mediya yana da burin hana ƙarya da cakuɗa bayanai a intanet.

translation.en: However, the real intent is not regulation, but rather, the annihilation of online freedom of expression, criminalization of government criticism and legalization of internet shutdowns in Nigeria.
translation.ha: Amma a zahirin gaskiya manufar zahiri ba wai a gyara ba ne, kawai ana so a toshe dukkanin wani 'yan magana ne a kan intanet, wanda zai mayar da masu sukar gwamnati zuwa masu laifi kuma ya bayar da damar toshe kafafen intanet a Najeriya.

translation.en: A similar bill was beaten dead in its track in 2016.
translation.ha: An taɓa jefar da irin wannan ƙudirin a kan hanyarsa a 2016.

translation.en: Any form of government criticism is a crime
translation.ha: Duk wani nau'in suka ga gwamnati laifi ne

translation.en: This bill aims to "[prevent] the transmission of false statements or declaration of facts in Nigeria", according to Section 1a.
translation.ha: ƙudirin yana nufi ya"[hana] isar da bayanan ƙarya ko tabbatar da gaskiya a Najeriya", kamar yadda Sashe na 1a ya bayyana.

translation.en: Section 3a to b(i) of the social media bill states that:
translation.ha: Sashen 3a zuwa b(i) na dokar sociyal midiya ya bayyana cewa:

translation.en: The nebulous "national security" excuse is used to justify the trumping of free expression.
translation.ha: An yi amfani da hanzarin shiririta na "tsaron ƙasa" ne domin a samu hanyar da za a daƙile 'yancin bayyana ra'ayi.

translation.en: But it does not stop there, the Nigerian government is always right and cannot be criticized.
translation.ha: Amma abin bai tsaya a nan ba, gwamnatin Najeriya a koyaushe daidai take yi, kuma don haka ba za a soke ta ba.

translation.en: According to Section 3b(vi), any statement that diminishes “public confidence in the performance of any duty or function of, in the exercise of any power of the government” is prohibited.
translation.ha: Kamar yadda sashe na 3b(ɓi) ya bayyana, duk wani bayani da zai tauye ƙimar "goyon bayan jama'a game da kowane irin aiki a wajen tabbatar da kowane irin iko na gwamnati" haramtacce ne.

translation.en: According to Section 3b(v), this applies to any statement that: "incites feelings of enmity, hatred, directed at persons or ill-will between different groups of persons".
translation.ha: Kamar yadda sashe na 3b(ɓi) ya bayyana, duk wani bayani da: "ya jawo jin ƙiyayya ko tsana da aka yi wa wani ko mugun nufi a tsakanin rukunonin al'umma mabambanta".

translation.en: This is dangerous because it leaves regulators open to contradictory interpretations that could be abused by political actors.
translation.ha: Wannan na da haɗari saboda ya ba wa dokokin ma'anoni mabambamta da 'yan siyasa ka iya amfani da su ta hanyar da ba ta dace ba.

translation.en: Who defines and approves what incites feelings of hatred?
translation.ha: To waye ya ba da ma'ana ya kuma yarda meye yake janyo tsana?

translation.en: It means that seeking transparency or even daring to hold a politician accountable could be declared hateful.
translation.ha: Hakan na nufin cewa za a iya fassara neman bayyana gaskiya daga ɗan siyasa ko kuma buƙatar yin aiki a fili a matsayin tsanarsa.

translation.en: The punishment upon conviction for any provisions of the bill is a fine that ranges between 200,000 and 10 million naira [about $556 to $28,000 United States dollars], imprisonment for a term not exceeding three years or both.
translation.ha: Hukuncin duk wanda aka kama da laifin saɓawa dokar shi ne tara ta adadin kuɗi tsakanin naira 200,000 zuwa naira miliyan 10 [kimanin $556 zuwa $28,000 na dalar Amurka] ko kuma ɗauri na aƙalla shekaru uku ko kuma duka biyun.

translation.en: Police licensed to shut down the internet
translation.ha: An ba wa 'yan sanda umarnin da su rufe kafar sadarwa ta yanar gizon.

translation.en: The social media bill also grants the government unlimited power to switch off the internet, through the "Access Blocking Order" as contained in Section 12, number 3:
translation.ha: ƙudurin dokar kula da kafafen sada zumunta ya ba wa gwamnati cikakken ikon rufe kafar ta yanar gizo ta hanyar amfani da doka mai suna "Dokar Toshe Sadarwa" da ke ƙunshe a sashe na 12, lamba ta 3.

translation.en: The Law Enforcement Department may direct the NCC [Nigerian Communications Commission – the regulatory agency for the telecommunication industry] to order the internet access service provider to take reasonable steps to disable access by end-users in Nigeria.
translation.ha: Sashen da ke kula da tabbatar da doka ka'iya ba da umarni ga Hukumar NCC [Hukumar Kula da Harkokin Sadrwa ta ƙasa - wacce duk kamfanonin sadarwa ke ƙarƙashinta] a kan ta umarci kamfanonin sadarwar su shirya tsaf don toshewa 'yan Nijeriya hanyoyin sadarwa.

translation.en: Internet service providers must comply with this blocking order or risk upon conviction a fine within the range of 5 to 10 million naira [$14,000-28,000 USD].
translation.ha: Dole ne kamfanonin sadarwar su bi wannan doka ta toshe hanyoyin sadarwa ko kuma su fuskanci hukuncin tarar kuɗi daga naira miliyan 5 zuwa naira miliyan 10 [wato $14,000 zuwa $28,000 na dalar Amurka].

translation.en: In addition, the bill under consideration indemnifies the internet service providers from any "civil or criminal liability" incurred from a lawsuit brought against them for "complying to any access blocking order", according to section 12, number 5.
translation.ha: Bayan haka, sashe na 12, lamba ta 5 ya bayyana cewa ƙudurin ya wanke kamfanonin sadarwa daga duk wata ƙara da za a iya kai su game da "karya dokar mu'amala ko kuma kuma aikata laifi" sakamakon "bin dokar toshe hanyoyin sadarwa" da suka yi.

translation.en: The human rights violations get murkier because the law grants the police a legal license to command an access-blocking order at whim.
translation.ha: Akwai rashin tabbas game da zancen keta haƙƙin ɗan adam saboda doka ta ba wa 'yan sanda lasisin damar toshe hanyoyin sadarwa a duk lokacin da su ka ga dama.

translation.en: Section 15a states that only the "initiative" of the police in face of "overwhelming sufficing evidence" is needed to cancel an internet shutdown in the country.
translation.ha: Sashe na 15a ya bayyana cewa "yunƙurin" 'yan sanda kaɗai ake buƙata tare da "cikakkiyar hujja" don a soke ƙoƙarin rufe kafar yanar gizo a ƙasar.

translation.en: Consequently, "no appeal may be made to the High Court" [Section 13(2)] by any party to revoke such a ban without first applying to the police to revoke an existing blocking order.
translation.ha: Saboda haka, "babu wanda zai iya ɗaukaka ƙara a babbar kotu" [sashe na 13(2)]don a janye sokewar ba tare da ya fara neman 'yan sanda da su janye dokar toshe hanyoyin sadarwar ba.

translation.en: The implications of this are obvious — no one can resort to the courts for redress in the face of this violation while the blocking order persists.
translation.ha: Abin da zai faru sakamakon haka a bayyane yake - babu wanda zai iya tafiya kotu don neman haƙƙi sakamakon wannan karya doka ta ɗan adam a lokacin da aka toshe hanyoyin sadarwar.

translation.en: The lawmakers behind the social media bill
translation.ha: Yan majalisa da ke goyon bayan dokar kafafen sada zumunta

translation.en: Three lawmakers seem to be the arrowhead of the bill in the Senate, the upper house of Nigeria’s parliament: Mohammed Sani Musa (the sponsor of the bill), Abba Moro and Elisha Abbo.
translation.ha: "Yan majalisa guda uku waɗanda su ne ƙashin bayan ƙudurin dokar a babbar majalisar tarayya ta ƙasa sun haɗa da: Mohammed Sani Musa (wanda ya ƙirƙiri ƙudurin) da Abba Moro da Elisha Abbo

translation.en: Mohammed Sani Musa’s company, Activate Technologies Limited, supplied the Permanent Voter Cards (PVCs) machine used for the 2019 general elections, while he was the candidate of the ruling All Progressives Congress (APC) for Niger East Senatorial district, according to the investigate outlet, Premium Times.
translation.ha: Binciken gidan jaridar Premium Times ya gano cewa kamfanin Mohammed Sani Musa mai suna Actiɓate Technologies Limited shi ne ya samar da injin zura katin zaɓe na din-din-din a yayin zaɓuɓɓukan shekarar 2019, a lokacin yana matsayin ɗan takarar majalisar dattijai ta ƙasa a ƙarƙashin tutar jam'iyyar All Progressiɓe Congress (APC).

translation.en: This is an allegation that the Independent National Electoral Commission (INEC) admitted.
translation.ha: Wannan zargi ne da hukumar zaɓe ta ƙasa mai zaman kanta (INEC) ta amince da shi.

translation.en: Musa’s conflict of interest raised some doubts about the true independence of Nigeria’s election umpire in the last election.
translation.ha: Wannan halin tsaka mai wuya da Musa ke ciki ya sanya kokwanto a kan cin gashin kai da hukumomin zaɓe a Nijeriya ke da shi a zaɓen da ya gabata.

translation.en: Ishaku Elisha Abbo of the opposition People’s Democratic Party (PDP) is a senator representing the Adamawa North Senatorial District in Adamawa State, in northeast Nigerian.
translation.ha: Ishaku Elisha Abbo na jam'iyyar adawa ta People's Democratic Party (PDP) ɗan majalisar dattijai ne da ke wakiltar Adamawa ta Kudu a jihar Adamawa da ke arewa maso gabashin Nijeriya.

translation.en: In July 2019, in the presence of a police officer, Abbo assaulted a female staff member in an adult sex toy store in Abuja.
translation.ha: A watan Yuli na shekarar 2019 a gaban wani jami'in hukumar 'yan sanda, Abbo ya ci zarafin wata ma'aikaciya da ke aiki a shagon sayar da abubuwan bunƙasa saduwa a garin Abuja.

translation.en: After a video of the assault went viral on social media, Abbo offered a public apology.
translation.ha: Bayan da bidiyon cin zarafin ya karaɗe kafafen sada zumunta ne, Abbo ya ba da haƙuri.

translation.en: Abba Moro, also with the PDP, is the senator representing Benue South district, northcentral Nigeria.
translation.ha: Abba Moro shi ma daga jam'iyyar PDP ɗan majalisar dattijai ne da ke wakiltar Benue ta Kudu a Arewa maso tsakiyar Nijeriya.

translation.en: On March 15, 2014, Moro, as minister of interior, was responsible for the Nigerian Immigration Recruitment tragedy in which about 6 million Nigerian youths who applied for 4,000 vacant positions in Nigerian Immigration Service were forced to assemble in various recruitment locations in the country.
translation.ha: A lokacin da yake riƙe da muƙamin ministan harkokin cikin gida ne yayi sandiyyar matsalar da ta faru yayin ɗaukar aikin da Hukumar Shige da Fice ta ƙata ta yi, lokacin da aka tilastawa matasa 'yan Nijeriya kimanin miliyan 6 da suka nemi aiki a gurbin aiki guda 4000 a hukumar da su taru a wurare mabambamta a ƙasar don neman aikin.

translation.en: The resulting stampede due to overcrowding led to about 20 deaths and multiple injuries.
translation.ha: Turmutsutsun ya faru ne sakamakon dandazon jama'a yayi sanadin mutuwar mutane kimanin 20 da kuma jin raunika da wasu da yawa suka yi.

translation.en: Moro was a recipient of part of the application fees paid by the job-seekers amounting to 675 million naira [about $1.8 million USD].
translation.ha: Moro ya karɓi wani kaso kimanin adadin naira miliyan 675 [wato dalar Amurka $1.8] daga cikin kuɗin da masu neman aikin suka biya.

translation.en: Moro not only enriched himself but also bypassed the extant procurement laws for the Immigration Service.
translation.ha: Moro ba wai ya azurta kansa bane kawai, a'a ya kuma zagayewa dokar ɗaukar aiki ta Hukumar Shige da fice ta ƙasa.

translation.en: "No need for silence, fear or self-pity" – #SayNoToSocialMediaBill!
translation.ha: "Ba buƙatar yin shiru, jin tsoro ko tausayin kai" - #Cene ban yarda da ƙudurin dokar taƙaita amfani da kafafen sada zumunta ba!

translation.en: Using the hashtag #SayNoToSocialMediaBill, Nigerian netizens took to Twitter to express their collective indignation:
translation.ha: Ta hanyar amfani da hashtag #Cene ban yarda da ƙudurin dokar taƙaita amfani da kafafen sada zumunta ba!, 'yan Nijeriya masu bibiyar yanar gizo sun bayyana jin haushinsu a kafar sada zumunta ta tuwita.

translation.en: In a statement, Amnesty International condemned the use of "laws to justify human rights violations" because it will not only stop Nigerians "from speaking their minds" but will also "send them to jail for doing so".
translation.ha: A wani bayani, ƙungiyar kula da haƙƙin ɗan adam ta Amnesty International ta kushe yunƙurin na "yin amfani da doka don kare ƙoƙarin danne haƙƙin ɗan adam", saboda dokar ba wai kawai za ta hana 'yan Nijeriya "faɗar albarkacin bakinsu bane", za kuma ta "aika da su gidan yari sakamakon haka".

translation.en: The parliament, under the pretext of curbing mis- and disinformation, is considering the enactment of a draconian law.
translation.ha: A ƙoƙarinta na fakewa da yunƙurin daƙile yaɗuwar labarai na bogi, Majalisar na ƙoƙarin sanya hannu a kan azalumar dokar.

translation.en: Ironically, the greatest propagators of false information online are political actors.
translation.ha: Abin ban haushi, mutanen da suka fi kowa yaɗa bayanan ƙarya a yanar gizo su ne 'yan siyasa.

translation.en: Both Nigeria's ruling and main opposition parties turned Twitter into a minefield of ethnic hate speech, disinformation and propaganda during the 2019 presidential elections.
translation.ha: A lokacin zaɓen shugaban ƙasa a shekarar 2019, jam'iyya mai mulki da jam'iyyar adawa sai da suka mayar da shafukan tuwita wani fage na yaɗa kalaman ƙiyayya na ƙabilanci da labaran ƙanzon kurege da jita-jita.

translation.en: Read more:
translation.ha: Karanta cigaba

translation.en: Social media propelled ethnocentric disinformation and propaganda during the Nigerian elections
translation.ha: Kafafen sada zumunta sun zamo fagen yaɗa ƙabilanci da labaran ƙarya da jita-jita a lokacin zaɓukan Nijeriya.

translation.en: Twitter was a minefield of false information during the 2019 Nigerian elections
translation.ha: Tuwita ta kasance fage na yaɗa bayanan bogi a yayin zaɓukan shekarar 2019 a Nijeriya.

translation.en: In these troubling times of freedom of expression in Nigeria, the wise charge from American writer Toni Morrison evokes hope:
translation.ha: A wannan lokaci na rashin tabbas game da 'yancin faɗar albarkacin baki a Nijeriya, amfani da hikimar marubuciya 'yar ƙasar Amurka Toni Morrison ya ba da ƙwarin gwiwa.

translation.en: This is precisely the time when artists go to work. There is no time for despair, no place for self-pity, no need for silence, no room for fear.
translation.ha: Wannan shi ne lokacin da masu fasaha suke zuwa aiki. Babu lokacin ɓacin rai, babu tsayawa jin tausayin kai, babu buƙatar yin shiru, sannan babu jin tsoro.

translation.en: We speak, we write, we do language.
translation.ha: Za mu yi magana, za mu yi rubutu, za mu yi amfani da harshe.

translation.en: The bill is currently at its second reading in the Senate. To become law, it will need to move to committee stage where legislators will review it.
translation.ha: Yanzu haka ana zama na biyu a kan ƙudurin dokar a Majalisar Dattijai. Kafin ya zama doka, dole ne ƙudurin ya matsa gaba zuwa matakin kwamiti a inda 'yan majalisa za su yi bitarsa.

translation.en: The committee presents its report to Parliament, the bill is debated, a clean copy is re-presented to the Senate for a final vote and then, there's the presidential assent.
translation.ha: Sai kwamitin ya gabatar da rahotonsa ga 'yan majalisa, sannan an tattuna a kan ƙunshin dokar, sannan an gabatar da sabon kwafi na dokar ga Majalisar Dattijai don kaɗa ƙuri'a, kana kuma a sami amincewar shugaban ƙasa.

translation.en: The Parliament must be hard-pressed to throw out the social media bill in its entirety.
translation.ha: Za a kai-ruwa-rana kafin 'yan majalisar su yi watsi da dokar ta taƙaita amfani da kafafen sada zumunta gaba ɗayanta.

translation.en: This is because Africa’s most populous country will slide smoothly into full dictatorship once freedom of expression has been extinguished.
translation.ha: Sakamakon haka, ƙasar wacce take mafi yawan al'umma a nahiyar Afirka za ta faɗa cikin mulkin kama karya da zarar an daƙile 'yancin faɗar albarkacin baki.

translation.en: Tanzania high court upholds ruling to end child marriage despite attempts to repeal it
translation.ha: Kotun ƙoli a ƙasar Tanzaniya ta tabbatar da dokar hana auren wuri duk da yunƙurin da aka yi wajen daƙile dokar.

translation.en: "This is the best decision the court has ever made"
translation.ha: "Wannan shi ne hukunci mafi kyawu da kotun ta taɓa yankewa".

translation.en: Schoolgirls in Tanzania pose for a photo on July 10, 2007. Photo by Fanny Schertzer, used with permission via Wikimedia Commons, CC BY 2.0.
translation.ha: Yan makaranta mata a Tanzaniya sun tsaya ɗaukar hoto a 10 ga Yuli, 2007. Hoto daga Fanny Schertzer, an samu izinin amfani da shi ta hanyar Wikimedia Commons, CC BY 2.0.

translation.en: In October 2019, Tanzania's high court upheld the landmark 2016 ruling that increased the minimum age of marriage for girls and boys to 18.
translation.ha: A watan Oktoba na shekarar 2019 ne, kotun ƙoli a Tanzaniya ta tabbatar da dokar shekarar 2016 da ta ƙara adadin mafi ƙarancin shekarun aure ga yara mata da maza zuwa 18.

translation.en: The Tanzanian government attempted to repeal this decision, claiming that girls mature earlier and marriage is a form of protection for pregnant young women, and should, therefore, be allowed to marry earlier than 18.
translation.ha: Gwamnatin ta Tanzaniya ta yi ƙoƙarin daƙile wannan hukuncin, tana mai iƙirarin wai yara mata suna balaga da wuri kuma shi aure wata hanyar kariya ce ga yara masu juna biyu. Saboda haka a bar yara mata su dinga yin aure kafin su cika shekaru 18.

translation.en: But on October 23, 2019, the Tanzanian government lost its appeal and the high court ruling remains: The marriage age for both males and females is 18, reinforcing the ban on child marriage in Tanzania.
translation.ha: Amma a ranar 23 ga watan Oktoba na shekarar 2019, Gwmnatin Tanzaniyan ta yi rashin nasara a ƙarar da ta ɗaukaka ƙara, kuma hukuncin kotun ɗaukaka ƙara yana nan daram. Mafi ƙarancin shekarun aure ga yara maza da mata ita ce shekara 18, hakan ya tabbatar da soke auren wuri a Tanzaniyan.

translation.en: According to the United Nations Population Fund (UNFPA), Tanzania has one of the highest prevalence rates of child marriage in the world.
translation.ha: A ra'ayin ƙungiyar United Nations Population Fund, ƙasar ta Tanzaniya na gaba-gaba a cikin ƙasashe da ke fama da matsalar auren wuri a duniya.

translation.en: Netizens were quick to express their delight over the ruling.
translation.ha: Masu amfani da kafar yanar gizo sun bayyana farin cikinsu a kan hukuncin.

translation.en: Some congratulated Rebeca Z. Gyumi, the petitioner and respondent behind this case.
translation.ha: Wasu daga cikinsu sun aika saƙon taya murna ga Rebeca ɗ. Gyumi, wacce ita ce mai ɗaukaka ƙara kuma ita ce mai kare ta.

translation.en: Gyumi is the founder and executive director of Msichana Initiative (Young Woman Initiative), a Tanzanian nongovernmental organization that empowers girls through education.
translation.ha: Gyumi ita ce mai shugaba kuma mai kamfanin Msichana Inititiaɓe (Young Woman Initiatiɓe), wato wata ƙungiya wacce ba ta gwmnati ba a Tanzaniya da ke karfafawa mata gwiwa ta hanyar ba su ilimi.

translation.en: The fight to end child marriage in Tanzania
translation.ha: Yunƙurin kawo ƙarshen auren wuri a Tanzaniya.

translation.en: In 2016, Gyumi challenged the constitutionality of the Law of Marriage Act, 2002 (LMA) that allowed females under the age of 18 to get married.
translation.ha: A shekarar 2016, Gyumi ta ƙalubalanci dokar kundin tsarin mulki ta Law of Marriage Act. 2002 (LMA) wacce ta ba da damar yin aure ga mata 'yan ƙasa da shekaru 18.

translation.en: According to Tanzania Demographic and Health Survey (TDHS), 36 percent of women aged 25-49 get married before their 18th birthday compared to only 5 percent for men the same age.
translation.ha: Wani bayani da Hukumar da ke Binciken Alƙaluman Kiwon Lafiya ta ƙasar Tanzaniya ta fitar ya bayyana cewa kaso 36 cikin ɗari na mata 'yan shekara 25 zuwa 29 an yi musu aure ne kafin su cika shekaru 18, amma in an kwatanta da maza to kaso 5 cikin ɗari ne kawai masu irn wannan shekarun suke aure kafin su cika shekaru sha 18.

translation.en: The LMA allowed girls as young as 14 to get married with consent from a court and age 15 with the consent of the parents whereas 18 years was the minimum age for a male.
translation.ha: LMA ta bar yara mata 'yan shekara 14 su yi aure bisa ga amincewar kotu, ko a shekara 15 bia ga amincewar iyaye, amma maza kuwa shekara 18 ce mafi ƙaranci da za su iya yin aure.

translation.en: Through her attorneys, Gyumi argued that the LMA provisions were discriminatory for giving preferential treatment to males in the matter of eligible marriage age.
translation.ha: Ta hanyar lauyoyinta, Gyumi ta yi iƙirararin cewa akwai nuna wariya a cikin dokokin LMA waɗanda suka fifita maza a kan mata a ɓangaren shekarun da kowanne zai iya yin aure.

translation.en: They further argued that the provisions infringed the right to equality and they were too vague and too susceptible to arbitrary interpretation to deny female children their right to education.
translation.ha: Sun kuma yi iƙirarin cewa dokokin sun danne haƙƙin daidaito ga mata, sannan kuma dokokin ba a fayyace su sosai ba ta yadda akwai yiwuwar a yi musu mummunar fassara kawai don a hana yara mata haƙƙinsu na neman ilimi.

translation.en: Gyumi petitioned the High Court to find the provisions of LMA null and void.
translation.ha: Gyumi ta ɗaukaka ƙara inda ta nemi Babbar Kotu da ta yi watsi da dokokin LMA.

translation.en: The High Court never declared the provisions in the LMA null and void.
translation.ha: Babbar Kotun ba ta yi watsi da dokokin na LMA ba.

translation.en: But they found the provisions unconstitutional and gave the government one year to correct the anomalies in the LMA provisions.
translation.ha: Amma sun yarda cewa dokokin sun saɓawa kundin tsarin mulki, sannan suka ba wa gwamnatin tsawon shekara guda don ta gyara kure-kuran da saɓani da ke cikin dokokin na LMA.

translation.en: Through the attorney general, the government was directed to put 18 years as the eligible age of marriage for both females and males.
translation.ha: Ta ƙarƙashin babban lauya na ƙasa, an umarci gwamnati ta sanya shekaru 18 a matsayin shekarun yin aure ga mata da maza.

translation.en: However, then-Attorney General George Masaju was aggrieved by the ruling and immediately served a notice of appeal to the High Court:
translation.ha: Amma babban lauyan na ƙasa a lokacin wato George Masaju ya fusata da wannan hukuncin inda nan take ya ɗaukaka ƙara a Babbar Kotu.

translation.en: Official: I've been served government documents of appeal in the case of #childmarriage. Case number 204 of September 2017.
translation.ha: Jami'in Hukuma: An ba ni takardun gwamnati na ɗaukaka ƙara a game da #auren wuri. ƙara mai lamba 204 ta watan Satumba 2017.

translation.en: Read more: Mozambique criminalizes child marriage
translation.ha: Karanta cigaba: ƙasar Muzambiƙue ta bayyana auren wuri a matsayin laifi.

translation.en: Grounds for appeal
translation.ha: Dalilan ɗaukaka ƙara

translation.en: In four months of court proceedings, the government sought to appeal the 2016 ruling that required the revision of the provisions LMA that allowed girls to be married at the age of 15.
translation.ha: A tsawon watanni da aka shafe ana sauraron ƙarar, gwamnati ta roƙi kotu da yi watsi da dokar shekarar 2016 da ta buƙaci a yi bitar dokokin na LMA da suka ba da damar aurar da yara mata a shekara 15.

translation.en: The appellant, represented by principal state attorneys, Mark Mulwambo and Alesia Mbuya, provided biological differences and customary and Islamic laws as grounds for the appeal.
translation.ha: A cikin ƙunshin ɗaukaka ƙarar wanda lauyoyin gwamnati wato Mark Mulwambo da Alesia Mbuya suka gabatar, sun bayyana bambamce-bambamce na halitta da na al'ada da kuma wasu dokoki na addinin musulunci a mtsayin hujjojinsu na ɗaukaka ƙarar.

translation.en: Ms. Mbuya argued that biological differences put boys and girls in "different categories" and that therefore, the law treats them differently.
translation.ha: Ms Mbuya ta bayyana cewa bambamce-bambamce na halitta ya sanya yara maza da mata a "mabambamtan ajujuwa" don haka ya kamata doka ta kallesu da bambamci.

translation.en: She argued that because girls matured earlier, the law took that into consideration. She argued that marriage could protect unmarried girls who get pregnant at an early age.
translation.ha: Ta yi bayanin cewa kasancewar yara mata suna riga maza balaga shi ya sa doka ta yi la'akari da hakan. Ta kuma ce aure ne zai iya ba da kariya ga yaran da suke samun juna biyu da wuri.

translation.en: Further, she argued the court erred by “equating the age of the child and the age of marriage,” meaning that the court should consider male and female children differently when it comes to marriageable age.
translation.ha: Bugu da ƙari, ta kuma bayyana cewa kotu ta yi kuskure da ta "daidaita shekarun yaro da shekarun aure" kuma hakan na akwai buƙatar nufin kotu ta kalli yara maza da mata a bambamce idan ana maganar shekarun aure.

translation.en: Netizens were quick to criticize the grounds the appellant provided in court.
translation.ha: Masu amfani da kafar yanar gizo sun kushe dalilan da masu ɗaukaka ƙarar suka gabatar a kotu.

translation.en: Read more: Mozambique, Cote d'Ivoire make legal strides for women and children’s rights
translation.ha: Karanta cigaba: ƙasashen Muzambiƙue da Cote d'Iɓoire sun yi yunƙurin kafa dokokin kare haƙƙin mata da ƙananan yara.

translation.en: Gender equality
translation.ha: Daidaiton jinsi

translation.en: The court’s ruling is a step toward eliminating harmful practices and ending all forms of discrimination against girls in Tanzania.
translation.ha: Wannan hukunci na kotu wani mataki ne na kawo ƙarshen aiyuka da suke cutarwa da kuma nuna wariya ga yara mata a Tanzaniya.

translation.en: According to the United Nations, in order to achieve gender equality by 2030, governments need to change discriminatory laws and adopt legislation that proactively advances equality.
translation.ha: Majalisar ɗinkin Duniya ta bayyana cewa in har ana so a samar da daidaito a tsakanin jinsi nan da shekarar 2030, akwai buƙatar gwamnatoci su chanja dokoki da suke nuna wariya sannan su kafa dokokin da za su kawo daidaito.

translation.en: Data shows that the age of marriage is directly related to levels of education and wealth (TDHS 201).
translation.ha: Bayanai sun nuna cewa adadin shekarun yin aure su na da danganta da matakin ilimi da kuma dukiya (TDHS).

translation.en: In Tanzania, there is a 6-year difference between the age of marriage between girls with no education and girls with secondary or higher education.
translation.ha: A Tanzaniya akwai bambamcin shekaru 6 na yin aure a tsakanin yara mata da ba su yi karatun zamani ba da kuma yaran da su ka yi karatu har matakin sakandire ko fiye.

translation.en: In Tanzania, it is illegal to impregnate or marry schoolgirls with 30-year imprisonment as punishment.
translation.ha: A Tanzaniya doka ta haramta auren yara mata 'yan makaranta ko yi musu ciki tare da hukuncin ɗaurin shekaru talatin a gidan yari.

translation.en: Pregnant schoolgirls are not allowed to return to school even after they have given birth.
translation.ha: Ba a ƙyale yara 'yan makaranta da suka samu juna biyu su dawo makaranta ko da bayan sun haihu.

translation.en: The ban on child marriage will protect all girls, regardless of their school enrollment status.
translation.ha: Haramta auren wurin zai kare dukkan yara mata, ba tare da la'akari da matakinsu na zuwa makaranta ba.

translation.en: In Tanzania, child marriage bars girls from education and leads to school dropout, according to data from the Tanzania National Survey, 2017).
translation.ha: Auren wuri a Tanzaniya yana hana yara mata karatu kuma yana janyo mata su daina zuwa makaranta, a cewar wasu bayanai daga Hukumar Bincike ta ƙasar.

translation.en: This ban creates better conditions for schoolgirls to finish school without barriers.
translation.ha: Wannan haramci zai samar da yanayi mafi kyau ga yara mata 'yan makaranta su gama karatu ba tare da tangarɗa ba,

translation.en: Even so, impregnated schoolgirls are still faced with an unconstitutional ruling that prohibits them from returning to school.
translation.ha: Duk da haka, yara 'yan makaranta da aka yi wa ciki suna fuskantar hukuncin da ya saɓawa kundin tsarin mulki a inda ake hana su komawa makaranta.

translation.en: Kanye West's use of Jamaican symbols sparks national dialogue on ‘branding’
translation.ha: Amfani da Kanye West ya yi da kaya masu alamun ƙasar Jamaika ya janyo tattaunawa a kan "tallatawa".

translation.en: Jamaica-themed merchandise appeared in the online store
translation.ha: Kayayyaki masu alamun ƙasar Jamaika sun bayyana a kantinan sayar da kayayyaki da ke yanar gizo,

translation.en: Kanye West performs at The Museum of Modern Art's annual Party in the Garden benefit, New York City, May 10, 2011. Photo by Jason Persse, CC BY-SA 2.0.
translation.ha: Kanye West ya yi wasa a bikin shekara-shekara na The Museum of Modern Art's annual Party a Garden benefit da ke birnin New York City a ranar 10 ga watan Mayu na shekarar 2011. ɗaukar hoto: Jason Persse, CC BY-SA 2.0.

translation.en: American rapper Kanye West brought his "Sunday Service" pop-up concert to Kingston, Jamaica, at the start of its National Heroes Day holiday weekend (October 19-21, 2019).
translation.ha: Mawaƙi ɗan ƙasar Amurka Kanye West ya kai "Wasansa na Lahadi" garin Kingston da ke Jamaika a lokacin da aka fara bikin ƙarshen sati na Ranar Jarumai ta ƙasa. (Oktoba 19-21, 2019).

translation.en: This was the first time the rapper had taken his huge gospel choir outside the United States, reportedly at the request of a Jamaican member of his staff.
translation.ha: Wannan ne karo na farko da mawaƙin ya tafi tare da rukunin 'yan amshinsa masu waƙar addini zuwa wajen ƙasar Amurka, wai a bisa buƙatar wani daga cikin ma'aikatansa ɗan ƙasar ta Jamaika.

translation.en: However, the event was besieged with criticism from the outset, culminating with West's unapproved use of Jamaican emblems on merchandise being sold on his website.
translation.ha: Duk da haka, mutane sun yi ta kushe taron tun daga farko, wanda hakan ya sa West ya yi amfani da kayayyaki masu alamar ƙasar Jamaikan ba bisa ƙa'ida ba waɗanda aka sayar da su a shafinsa na yanar gizo.

translation.en: With just two days’ notice, the free concert took place at Emancipation Park in Kingston, the capital city — a location that jarred some commentators because of controversial comments West had made about slavery during a media interview in May 2018.
translation.ha: A cikin kwanaki biyu da sanarwa, mawaƙin ya yi wasan a Emancipation Park da ke babban birnin Kingston - zaɓin wannan waje ya fusata masu sharhi.

translation.en: The park was opened in 2002 in honour of the "full freedom" of 300,000 slaves in Jamaica on August 1, 1838.
translation.ha: Wannan waje an buɗe shi ne a shekarar 2002 don girmama samun "cikakken 'yanci" ga bayi guda 300,000 a ƙasar Jamaika a ranar I ga watan Agusta, 1838.

translation.en: That may have been the first bone of contention around the concert, but it was not the last.
translation.ha: Wataƙila wannan ce taƙaddama ta farko game da wasan, amma ba ita ce ta ƙarshe ba.

translation.en: Even as Culture Minister Olivia "Babsy" Grange responded to early criticism by saying the country was benefitting from the concert, one music promoter felt the show, which was livestreamed on the Sunday Service website, "upstaged" other cultural activities over Heroes Day weekend.
translation.ha: Duk da cewa Ministan Al'adu Oliɓia "Babsy" Grange ta ba da amsa ga masu kushen da cewa ƙasar ta amfanu da wasan, amma wani mai ra'ayin waƙe-waƙe ya bayyana cewa, wasan wanda aka haska kai tsaye a shafin yanar gizo na aiyukan ranar Lahadi, ya "shafe" sauran abubuwan al'adu da aka gabatar a bikin ƙarshen satin na Ranar Jarumai.

translation.en: In addition, Kingston residents, who suffered unusually heavy traffic flows throughout the week, predicted chaos and confusion during the evening rush hour.
translation.ha: Bugu da ƙari, mazauna garin Kingston, waɗanda suka sha wahalar jerin gwanon motoci a cikin satin, sun yi hasashen cewa za a sami hargitsi da ruɗani a yammacin ranar wasan.

translation.en: Nevertheless, the concert went smoothly, several thousand Jamaicans enjoyed the show and Jamaican media companies earned online kudos for their flawless production:
translation.ha: Duk da haka, an gabatar da wasan ba tare da wata matsala ba, kuma dubunnan mutanen ƙasar Jamaika sun ji daɗin wasan, sannan kuma gidajen jaridun Jamaika sun samu yabo a kafafen yanar gizo sakamakon yadda suka haska wasan ba tare da wata tangarɗa ba.

translation.en: I have done a fair amount of online searches for information to corroborate the claim without luck but have come across their online release of merchandise bearing these landmark symbols, which coincided with the concert...
translation.ha: Na yi bincike sosai a yanar gizo don neman bayanai da suka dace da wannan iƙirarin amma ban yi nasara ba, amma na ci karo da kayayyaki masu zauke da alamun waɗanda aka tallata a shafukan yanar gizo, kuma hakan ya yi daidai da gabatar da wasan...

translation.en: Jamaica’s reality is that successive political administrations have never fully appreciated the economic value of the brand "Jamaica" nor the symbols that [represent] that brand including its flag and its coat of arms.
translation.ha: Zancen gaskiya shi ne shugabannin siyasa a Jamaika ba su gano muhimmancin ƙimar haɓaka tattalin arziƙi ta hanyar tallata "Jamaika" ko kuma tallata wasu alamu da ke "wakiltar" ƙasar kamar tuta da tambarin ƙasar.

translation.en: The same is true for our music and its associated brand marks, Ska, Mento, Rock Steady, Reggae among others.
translation.ha: Abin haka yake ga abin da ya shafi fannin kaɗe-kaɗe da kuma rabe-rabensa kamar Ska da Mento da Rock Steady da Raggae da sauransu.

translation.en: That Jamaica was blindsided by the release of clothing bearing the island’s important symbols is a classic case of guerilla marketing.
translation.ha: Kasancewar jama'ar Jamaika sun gigita da yadda aka saki kayyakin sawan masu ɗauke da alamun ƙasar shi yake tabbatar da irin salon kasuwancin mamaki.

translation.en: Having a concert to promote the line at the historic Emancipation Park provides tacit assent of not only the line of garments by the government and people of Jamaica, but also of the use of the country’s national symbols in their creation.
translation.ha: Gabatar da wasan don inganta shi a Emancipation Park mai ɗumbin tarihi shi yake nuna amincewar gwamnati da mutanen Jamaika na yin amfani da alamomin ƙasar a kan tufafin da kayayyakin.

translation.en: I have noticed that there is now hurried pushback by the Ministry of Culture as well as from the Mayor of Kingston. Both should realize that this isn’t a bottle that will be easy to re-cork.
translation.ha: Na gano cewa akwai tirjiya daga ɓangaren Hukumar Al'adu da kuma Magajin Garin Kingston. Dukkansu ya kamata su fahimci cewa wannan wani abu ne da ba zai canju ba.

translation.en: I hope that the government has good lawyers.
translation.ha: Ina fatan gwamnati tana da lauyoyi ƙwararru.

translation.en: Indeed, lawyers may still have quite a bit of work to do to untangle the confusion surrounding the use of Jamaica's national symbols.
translation.ha: Tabbas akwai aiki a gaban lauyoyi wajen kau da ruɗani game da amfani da alamomin ƙasar ta Jamaika.

translation.en: Deadly police raids in Guinea as President Alpha Condé clings to power
translation.ha: Yan sanda sun kai hare-hare a ƙasar Gini a yayin da Shugaban ƙasa Alpha Conde ya cigaba da riƙe ikon shugabancin ƙasar.

translation.en: "Cities have been paralyzed"
translation.ha: "Abubuwa sun taɓarɓare a birane"

translation.en: Screenshot from a France 24 news flash about the situation in Guinea.
translation.ha: Hotonan allo da aka ɗauka a labaran tashar talabijin ta France 24 sun nuna halin da ake ciki a ƙasar Gini.

translation.en: Police violence erupted in Guinea on October 14, resulting in the death of several people and massive arrests, following demonstrations protesting against current president Alpha Condé's plans to modify the constitution to run for a third term.
translation.ha: A ƙasar ta Gini, 'yan sanda sun yi amfani da ƙarfin iko da zalinci, inda ya yi sanadiyyar mutuwar mutane da dama da kuma kamun wasu masu yawa, sakamakon zanga-zanga una rashin amincewa da shirin Shugaba Alpha Conde na juya kundin tsariin mulkin ƙasar don samun damar tsayawa takarar shugabanci a karo na uku.

translation.en: The streets of the capital, Conakry, and other cities have turned into battlefields between law enforcement forces and demonstrators.
translation.ha: Titina a babban birnin ƙasar wato Conakry da kuma ragowar birane sun zama tamkar fagen fama tsakanin jami'an gwamnati masu tabbatar da tsaro da kuma masu zanga-zanga.

translation.en: Police forces have the advantage of new legal privileges that allow them to use deadly force if they deem it necessary for security reasons.
translation.ha: Jami'an 'yan sanda su na da goyon bayan doka da ta ba su damar yin amfani da ƙarfin makami in har sun ga hakan ya dace wajen tabbatar da tsaro.

translation.en: The demonstrations have already killed six people, including one police officer, and wounded many.
translation.ha: Mutane shida ne ciki har da wani ɗan sanda suka rasu sakamakon zanga-zangar, sdai kuma mutane da dama da suka ji raunika.

translation.en: Read more: Security forces in Guinea now have the right to use deadly force
translation.ha: Karanta cigaba: Jami'an tsaro a Gini su na da damar yin amfani da ƙarfin makami.

translation.en: Demonstrators oppose any change to the constitution seen as an attempt by the president to run legally for a third mandate.
translation.ha: Masu zanga-zangar sun nuna rashin amincewa da duk wani sauyi ga kundin tasrin mulki, su na masu ganin hakan a matsayin yunƙurin shugaban ƙasar na cigaba da shuaganci a karo na uku ba bisa ƙa'ida ba.

translation.en: Indeed, the constitution limits the total number of presidential mandates to two in a row. Condé, now 81, should end his mandate in October 2020.
translation.ha: Tabbas kundin tsarin mulki ya taƙaita adadin wa;adin shugaban ƙasar zuwa sau biyu a jere. Ya kamata Code, mai shekaru 81, ya gama mulki a watan Oktoba 2020

translation.en: Demonstrators are particularly vulnerable as they operate in violation of the law, as Human Rights Watch reminds:
translation.ha: Masu zanga-zangar su na cikin haɗari sakamakon sun saɓawa doka, kamar yadda ƙungiyar Kare Haƙƙin ɗan adam ta tunatar.

translation.en: Translation Original Quote
translation.ha: Fassara Abin da aka faɗa na ainihi

translation.en: The government of Guinea has effectively banned street protests for more than a year, citing threats to public security, Human Rights Watch said today.
translation.ha: Fiye da shekara guda ne gwamnatin ƙasar ta Guinea ta haramta zanga-zanga a titina, a inda ta bayyana hakan a matsayin barazana ga tsaron al'umma, ƙungiyar Kare Haƙƙin ɗan Adam ce ta bayyana haka a yau,

translation.en: Local authorities have prohibited at least 20 political or other demonstrations.
translation.ha: Shugabannin al'umma sun haramta a ƙalla zanga-zanga guda 20 masu alaƙa da siyasa da sauransu.

translation.en: Security forces have tear gassed those who defy the ban, and arrested dozens of demonstrators.
translation.ha: Jami'an tsaro sun harba barkonon tsohuwa ga waɗanda suka karya dokar hana zanga-zangar sannan sun cafke da yawa daga cikinsu.

translation.en: Regarding the political situation, the government is delivering conflicting messages: On October 13, President Condé welcomed a dialogue:
translation.ha: Dangane da al'amuran siyasa kuwa, gwamnati tana fitar da saƙonni masu cin karo da juna: A ranar 13 ga watan Oktoba Shugaba Conde ya shirya a tattauna.

translation.en: Translation Original Quote
translation.ha: Fassara Abin da aka faɗa na ainihi

translation.en: Alpha Condé has reiterated his call for a responsible dialogue and for a permanent process of discussions in order to iron out differences and answer all the challenges the country is facing.
translation.ha: Alpha conde ya jaddada kira da a yi tattaunawa ta fahimtar juna don gano bambamce-bambamce da kuma nemo amsa ga ƙalubalen da ƙasar take fuskanta.

translation.en: Yet, Ahmed Tidiane Traoré, a presidential counselor, stated the following day on October 12, —two days before the demonstrations started, — to a crowd of RPG youth [ruling Reunion of the People of Guinea party]:
translation.ha: Duk da haka, kwana biyu kafin ɓarkewar zanga-zangar wato a ranar 12 ga watan Oktoba, Ahmed Tidiane, mai ba wa shugaban ƙasa shawara, ya bayyanawa taron matasan jam'iyyar RPG [ruling Reunion of the People of Guinea party]:

translation.en: Translation Original Quote
translation.ha: Fassara Abin da aka faɗa na ainihi

translation.en: We invite the party's youth to remain vigilant in the districts.
translation.ha: Muna gayyatar matasan jam'iyyar da su sanya idanu a cikin yankin.

translation.en: They [the opposition activists] have stocked use tires in wholes, we invite young people from the party to get those tires out, prevent them from acting, get those hidden tires, do not attack anyone, do not destroy anything, just defend yourselves.
translation.ha: Su ['yan adawa masu rajin kare haƙƙi] sun tara tsofaffin tayoyi a cikin ramuka, mun gayyaci matasa 'yan jam'iyya su fito da tayoyin waje, su hana mutane aikata komai, su kwashe tayoyin da aka ɓoye, kar su kai wa kowa hari, kar su lalata komai, kawai ku kare kawunanku.

translation.en: All evil-doers will be found and shown to the people.
translation.ha: Za a nemo duk masu baƙar aniya a nunawa jama'a su.

translation.en: This double talk amongst those in power has further angered the opposition and civil society, according to the site globalguinee.info:
translation.ha: Wannan baki biyun daga masu riƙe da madafun iko ya ƙara fusata "yan adawa da ƙungiyoyin kare haƙƙin ɗan adam, a cewar dandalin yanar gizo mai suna globalguinee.info:

translation.en: Translation Original Quote
translation.ha: Fassara Abin da aka faɗa na ainihi

translation.en: October 14, 2019, is a dark Monday, if not black, responding to the call made by the FNDC [National Front for the Defense of the Constitution], Guineans took massively to the streets to oppose the project of constitutional changes.
translation.ha: Ranar 14 ga watan Oktoba 2019 rana ce mai muni in ma ba a kira ta dsa baƙar rana ba, a ƙoƙarin amsa kiran FNDC [wato ƙungiyar Rajin Kare Kundin Tsarin Mulki] 'yan ƙasar ta Gini sun fito kan titina don nuna adawa ga ƙoƙarin sauyi a kundin tsarin mulkin ƙasar.

translation.en: Clashes were reported in different districts of the Guinean capital.
translation.ha: An samu rahotan rikice-rikice a unguwanni dabam-dabam a babban birnin na ƙasar Gini.

translation.en: Business in the administrative center of Kalou was almost entirely stopped.
translation.ha: Kasuwanci a tsakiyar yankin gudanarwa na Kalou ya tsaya cak.

translation.en: Inside the country, people also responded to the call in Middle and Lower Guinea.
translation.ha: Inside ƙasar kuwa, mutane sun amsa kira a tsakiya da ƙasan ƙasar ta Guinea.

translation.en: In the forest and in Higher Guinea, not so much.
translation.ha: Amma a yankunan kurmi da kuma saman Gini, mjutane ba su amsa kiran sosai ba.

translation.en: Yet, cities have been paralyzed.
translation.ha: Duk da haka, abubuwa sun taɓarɓare a birane.

translation.en: Expressing himself on benbere.org, a Malian platform for youth, Malian blogger Adam Thiam writes:
translation.ha: A yayin da yake bayyana ra'ayinsa a dandalin yanar gizo na matasan ƙasar Mali mai suna benbere.org, wani mamallakin shafin sada zumunci Adam Thiam ya rubuta:

translation.en: Translation Original Quote
translation.ha: Fassara Abin da aka faɗa na ainihi

translation.en: Serious things are now happening in Guinea, with incendiary escalation, almost random dead demonstrators riddles with bullets, blood trails on pavements with barricades and crossroads smoking with tires in flames and tear gas.
translation.ha: Al'amura sun yi tsamari a Gini, abubuwa sun ɗauki zafi sosai, ga gawawwakin masu zanga-zanga da harsasai a jikinsu da kuma jini a kwance a bakin titina, ga kuma shingaye da mararraba sai hayaƙin ƙonannun tayoyi ke tashi da barkonon tsohuwa.

translation.en: Netizens have denounced the violence on social media:
translation.ha: Masu amfani da dandalin yanar gizo sun yi tir da wannan aika-aika a shafukan sada zumunta.

translation.en: Just like Blaise Compaoré [Burkinabé politician] Alpha Condé is going straight to the abyss, Will he be able to hear the angry shouting of his compatriots?
translation.ha: Kamar dai Blaise Compaore [wani ɗan siyasa dan ƙasar Burkina Faso], Alpha Conde ya kama hanyar maras ɓullewa. Shin zai iya samun damar sauraron kiran jama'ar ƙasarsa

translation.en: The very near future will tell us. Meanwhile, the boat is sinking.
translation.ha: Nan gaba kaɗan za mu sani. Kafin sannan, rana na neman faɗuwa.

translation.en: On October 15, Guinean journalist Bhiye Bary wrote:
translation.ha: A ranar 15 ga watan Oktoba, ɗan jarida ɗan ƙasar ta Gini ya rubuta:

translation.en: Hamdallaye pharmacy (#Conakry): certain citizens woken up by the police forces early this morning.
translation.ha: Kantin magani na Hamdallaye (#Conakry): 'yan sanda ne suka tashi wasu 'yan ƙasar da sanyin safiya.

translation.en: According to a local citizen, the police forces are breaking down doors and looting houses.
translation.ha: A cewar wani ɗan ƙasar, 'yan sanda sun karya ƙofofin gidaje sannan sun kwashe kayayyaki daga gidajen mutane.

translation.en: S. Nkola Matamba, a writer and human rights activist from the Democratic Republic of Congo, shared his bitterness:
translation.ha: S, Nkola Matamba, marubuci mai rajin kare haƙƙin ɗan adam daga ƙasar Jamhuriyar Dimukraɗiyyar Kwango ya bayyana takaicinsa:

translation.en: A former member of the opposition, and now devoured by the desire to change the law to allow a third mandate, maybe to remain on the throne till the end, Alpha Condé embodies of of the dark sides of the kind of Africa that keeps taking us down!
translation.ha: Tsohon ɗan jam'iyyar adawa wanda a yanzu ke cike da kwaɗayin chanja doka don samun damar tsayawa takara a karo na uku ko ma ya yi ta mulkin har mutuwa, Alpha Conde shi ne baƙin misali na irin mutanen Afirka da suke kai nahiyar ƙasa

translation.en: People of Guinea, have courage!
translation.ha: Mutanen Guinea, ku sami ƙarfin guiwa!

translation.en: #GUINÉE – It's simply appalling. First day of demonstration against a third mandate for Condé and here we are with an outcome of victims and dead people.
translation.ha: GINI -- Abin akwai firgitarwa. Ranar farko da fara zanga-zanga a kan adawa da zango na uku ga shugaba Conde amma ga shi har an fara samun rashin rayukan mutane.

translation.en: This craziness of politicians who want to remain head of state for life Amoulanfe— Cheikh Fall™ (@cypher007) October 14, 2019
translation.ha: Wannan haukan na 'yan siyasa da suke so su yi ta shugabancin ƙasa har tsawon rayuwarsu Amoulanfe— Cheikh Fall™ (@cypher007) 14 ga Oktoba 2019

translation.en: Guinean activist Macky Darsalam noted attempts made to manipulate public opinion:
translation.ha: Mai rajin kare haƙƙin ɗan adam ɗan ƙasar Gini Macky Darsalam ya bayyana wani yunƙuri da ake yi na ganin an sarrafa ra'ayin jama'a.

translation.en: The Guinean opposition seems defenseless in the face of such attacks: the deputies of all opposition parties have stopped participating in parliamentary debates since October 11, 2019.
translation.ha: Yan adawa a ƙasar ta Gini sun kasa samun kariya daga hare-hare: wakilan dukkan jam'iyyun adawa sun daina shiga cikin tattaunawa da ake yi a majalisar ƙasa tun ranar 11 ga Oktoba 2019.

translation.en: Violence against these parties has taken on radical forms, as the site mediaguinee.org notes:
translation.ha: Rashin imani da ake nunawa waɗannan jam'iyyun ya ƙara tsauri in ji dandalin mediaguinee.org

translation.en: Translation Original Quote
translation.ha: Fassara Abin da aka faɗa na ainihi

translation.en: ...at the headquarter of the Union of Republican Forces (URF) of Sidya Touré district, clashes took place between certain members of the opposition and pro-government militants who had taken measures the day before to prevent any unauthorized demonstration in the stronghold of the ruling party.
translation.ha: …a hedkwatar Union of Republican Forces (URF) a unguwar Sidya Toure, rigingimu sun ɓarke tsakanin 'yan jam'iyyar adawa da kuma 'yan bangar gwamnati waɗanda suka ɗauki mataki tun kashegari don hana afkuwar zanga-zanga a wajen da gwamnatin mai mulki ke da rinjaye.

translation.en: The clashes ended with a ransacked office of the URF and the arrest of six people whose identity and party affiliation remain yet unknown to the public.
translation.ha: Rigingimun sun zo ƙarshe ne yayin da aka mamaye ofishin URF aka kama mutane shida waɗanda har zuwa yanzu jama'a ba su gano ko su waye su ba ko kuma jam'iyyarsu ba.

translation.en: #SexForGrades: A new documentary exposes sexual harassment at West African universities
translation.ha: #SaduwaDonMaki: Sabon bidiyon "documentary" ya fallasa yadda ake neman mata ba bisa yardarsu ba a jami'o'in Afirka ta Yamma.

translation.en: Victims fear a backlash and are often unwilling to talk
translation.ha: Waɗanda abin ya shafa ba sa son su magantu saboda tsoron ramuwa.

translation.en: This masked victim was repeatedly sexually abused by Boniface Igbeneghu, a professor in University of Lagos, Nigeria (Screenshot from BBC #SexForGrades video)
translation.ha: Farfesa Boniface Igbeneghu na Jam'iar Legas ya yi fyaɗe wa wannan wacce aka rufe fuskarta (Hoton allo daga shirin bidiyo na BBC #SaduwaDonMaki

translation.en: #SexForGrades, a BBC documentary on sexual harassment of female students by university professors in Nigeria and Ghana, has ignited heated online conversation and raises many questions about how to put an end to it:
translation.ha: #SaduwaDonMaki, shirin bidiyon 'documentary' na BBC wanda ya fallasa yadda farfesoshi a jami'o'in Nijeriya da Gana ke haikewa ɗalibai mata ya janyo cece-kuce a kafafen yanar gizo a kan yadda za a kawo ƙarshen matsalar.

translation.en: The groundbreaking investigation, released on October 7, 2019, was anchored by journalist Kiki Mordi, who was forced to abandon her own university degree because she refused to yield to the sexual advances by a university teacher who kept failing her:
translation.ha: Wannan bincike irinsa na farko da aka saki a ranar 7 ga watan Oktoba 2019, 'yar jarida Kiki Mordi ce ta gabatar da shi, wacce dole ta haƙura da karatun digirinta saboda ƙin amincewa wani malamin jam'ia wanda shi kuma ya yi ta kayar da ita.

translation.en: Boniface Igbeneghu, University of Lagos, is caught sexually harassing female students in an undercover investigation by the BBC.
translation.ha: An ga Boniface Igbeneghu na Jami'ar Legas yana ƙoƙarin haikewa ɗalibai mata a wani bincike na sirri da BBC ta yi.

translation.en: Screenshot from BBC #SexForGrades video.
translation.ha: Hoton waya daga BBC bidiyon #SeɗForGrades.

translation.en: The nearly one-year investigation revealed the scandal of “sex for grades” crises at two West African universities: Nigeria's University of Lagos (UNILAG) and the University of Ghana.
translation.ha: Binciken da aka yi kusan tsawon shekara guda ana dyudanar da shi ya fallasa abin kunyar "saduwa don maki" a jami'o'I guda biyu a Afirka ta Yamma: Jami'ar Legas (UNILAG) da Jami'ar Gana.

translation.en: Nigeria's Boniface Igbeneghu, a professor in UNILAG'S faculty of art and an evangelical pastor of local Foursquare Gospel Church, Lagos, was one of the teachers busted by the investigation.
translation.ha: ɗan ƙasar Nijeriya Boniface Igbeneghu, wanda yake a matsayin farfesa a tsangayar fasaha ta Jami'ar Legas kuma fasto a cocin Foursƙuare Gospel Church da ke garin Legas ya kasance ɗaya daga cikin waɗanda binciken ya tonawa asiri.

translation.en: Igbenegbu is seen in the BBC video sexually propositioning an undercover BBC reporter who pretended to be a 17-year-old seeking university admission. Igbenegu can be heard saying:
translation.ha: An ga Igbeneghu a faifan bidiyon na BBC yana ƙoƙarin haikewa ma'aikaciyar BBC mai ɗaukan rahoto wacce ta yi ɓadda kama a matsayin 'yar shekara 17 mai neman gurbin karatu a jami'a. Ana iya jin muryar Igbeneghu yana cewa:

translation.en: Don’t you know you are a beautiful girl?
translation.ha: Ba ki san cewa ke kyakkyawar yarinya ba ce?

translation.en: Do you know I am a pastor and I am in my 50's but if I want a girl of 17 years, all I need is a sweet tongue and put some money...
translation.ha: Kin san cewa ni fasto ne kuma ni ina da shekaru sama da 50 amma ina son yarinya 'yar shekaru 17, abin da nake so kawai shi ne harshe mai daɗi da saka wasu kuɗi…

translation.en: In a final meeting between the pair, Igbenegbu switched off the lights, asked her for a kiss and went ahead to hug her in his locked office.
translation.ha: A haɗuwarsu ta ƙarshe, Igbenegbu ya kashe wutar, ya nemi ta sumbace shi sannan ya rungume ta a rufaffen ofishin nasa.

translation.en: Foursquare Gospel Church has suspended Igbeneghu "from all ministerial assignments".
translation.ha: Cocin Foursƙuare Gospel Church ta dakatar da Igbeneghu "daga dukkan aiyukan addini".

translation.en: Similarly, the University of Lagos has barred Igbeneghu from the school and also ordered the shutdown of the staff club’s "cold room", used by senior staff to hold parties attended by young female students and staff.
translation.ha: Haka zalika, Jami'ar ta Legas ta haramtawa Igbeneghu shiga cikin harabar Jami'ar da kuma ba da umarnin rufe wani ɗaki mai suna "cold room" wanda malaman jami'ar suke amfani da shi don yin bukukuwa da ɗalibai mata da malamai ke halarta.

translation.en: Recounting the trauma of years past
translation.ha: Ba da labarin tashin hankalin shekarun da suka gabata

translation.en: This exposé ignited reactions of cataclysmic proportions from Nigerians online with the trending hashtag #SexForGrades on Twitter.
translation.ha: Wannan abin fallasa ya janyo mayar da martani daga 'yan Nijeriya dangane da wannan babban bala'in a shafukan yanar gizo tare da hashtag #SaduwaDonMaki a shafin tuwita.

translation.en: Many female Twitter users recount their own experiences of sexual harassment:
translation.ha: Yan mata da yawa masu amfani da kafar sadarwa ta tuwita sun bayar da nasu labarin na haikewa a jami'a.

translation.en: Lola Shoneyin, book festival curator and author, recounted the "terrible shame" she felt after she was touched inappropriately by a university Deputy Vice-Chancellor (DVC):
translation.ha: Lola Shoneyin marubuciya kuma mai kula da tattara litattafai ta ba da labarin "abin kunya" da ya faru da ita bayan da Mataimakin Shugaban Jami'a (DɓC) ya taɓa jikinta ba tare da amincewarta ba.

translation.en: Philandering university professors have for decades debased female students in Nigerian tertiary institutions.
translation.ha: Farfesoshin jami'a masu ƙawazuci sun ɗauki shekaru da yawa su na wulaƙanta ɗalibai mata a jami'o'in Nijeriya.

translation.en: However, it is usually difficult to prosecute perpetrators because victims are afraid of the backlash and unwilling to talk due to deep trauma associated with these abuses.
translation.ha: Amma yana da wuya a gurfanar da farfesoshin a gaban kotu saboda waɗanda ake haikewan su na tsoron mayar da martani kuma ba sa son su magantu sakamakon tashin hankalin da ke tattare da abin.

translation.en: In 2016, the "Sexual Harassment in Tertiary Education Institution Prohibition Bill", passed by the Nigerian Senate prescribed a 5-year jail term for lecturers and educators convicted of sexually harassing students.
translation.ha: A shakarar 2016 ne "ƙunshin Dokar Haramta Haikewa ɗalibai a Manyan Makarantu" wanda ya samu sahalewar Majalisar Dattijan Nijeriya ya yanke hukuncin ɗaurin shekaru 5 a gidan yari ga duk malamin jami'ar da aka samu da laifin haikewa ɗalibai.

translation.en: However, the Academic Staff Union of Nigerian Universities opposed the bill, claiming that it was discriminatory since it targeted teachers and that it undermined university autonomy.
translation.ha: Duk da haka, ƙungiyar Malaman Jami'o'i ta ƙasa ta yi Allah wadai da dokar, tana mai iƙirarin cewa dokar an yi ta ne kawai don malamai kuma sannan ta saɓawa 'yancin gudanarwa jami'o'I suke da shi.

translation.en: The opposition to the bill may have led to the death of that legislation — which did not get presidential assent.
translation.ha: Wannan adawa da dokar ta fuskanta wataƙila shi ya janyo mutuwarta gaba ɗaya - har ya zamo shugaban ƙasa bai sanya hannu a kan dokar ba.

translation.en: Is #SexForGrades another #ChurchToo movement?
translation.ha: Shin #SaduwaDonMaki wani sabon ra'ayi ne irin na #CociKumaDai?

translation.en: In July this year, Nigeria's celebrity photographer, Busola Dakolo, accused Biodun Fatoyinbo, the lead pastor of Commonwealth of Zion Assembly (COZA), of forcefully raping her when she was 16.
translation.ha: A watan Yuli na wannan shekarar ne, fitacciyar mai ɗaukar hoto "yar ƙasar Nijeriya wato Busola Dakolo, ta zargi Biodun Fatoyinbo, babban fasto a cocin Commonwealth of Zion Assembley (COZA) da laifin yi mata fyaɗe lokacin tana 'yar shekaru 16.

translation.en: Read more: Pastor or predator?
translation.ha: Karanta cigaba: Malamin coci ko kuma dai manemin mata?

translation.en: Nigerian Evangelical preacher embroiled in rape accusations
translation.ha: Malamin cocin Eɓanglical ta Nijeriya ya afka cikin zargin aikata laifin fyaɗe.

translation.en: Over the past six years, the flamboyant Fatoyinbo has been plagued by allegations of rape and sexual abuse.
translation.ha: A cikin shekaru shida da suka gabata, Fatoyinbo wanda ya kasance mai ƙwƙrin gwiwa ya faɗa cikin zarge-zargen laifin aikata fyaɗe.

translation.en: However, the emotional interview during which Dakolo accused Fatoyinbo ignited a national reaction online.
translation.ha: Duk da haka, tattaunawar mai ratsa zuciya wacce a cikinta ne Dakolo ta zargi Fatoyinbo ta haddasa mayar da martani a kafafen yanar gizo.

translation.en: For days, #ChurchToo — a national iteration of the global #MeToo movement — trended on social media in Nigeria.
translation.ha: A tsawon kwanaki da yawa, #CociKumaDai - wani alon maimaicin cikin gida na Nijeriya wanda aka kwaikwayi #NiMa na duniya - ya yi tashe a shafukan sada zumunta a Nijeriya.

translation.en: This agitation soon morphed from online to street protests in major Nigerian cities like Lagos and Abuja.
translation.ha: Wannan fafutuka ta rikiɗe daga kan shafukan yanar gizo zuwa zanga-zanga a titinan manyan biranen Nijeriya kamar Legas da Abuja.

translation.en: The #ChurchToo movement called on the government to take "the issue of violence against women and girls seriously".
translation.ha: Shi ra'ayin #CociKumaDai ya yi kira ga gwamnati da ta "ɗauki matsalar cin zarafin mata yara da manya da matuƙar muhimmanci".

translation.en: The #ChurchToo revealed the silent but "horrific thriving rape culture, especially within religious circles" in Nigeria.
translation.ha: Ra'ayin #CociKumaDai ya fallasa yadda "mummunar al'adar fyaɗe ke cigaba da afkuwa, musamman a ɓangaren abinda ya shafi addinai" a Nijeriya.

translation.en: It provided an opportunity for women to speak out.
translation.ha: Kuma ya ba da dama ga mata su faɗi abin da ya ke ransu.

translation.en: Like the #ChurchToo movement, the #SexForGrades outcry has again revealed the realities of sexual violence against women and the abuse of power that allows this sexual violence to thrive.
translation.ha: Kamar dai ra'ayin "CociKumaDai, shi ma #SaduwaDonMaki ya fallasa cin zarafin da haikewa da mata suke fuskanta da kuma yin amfani da iko da wasu ke yi wajen cigaba da cin zarafin matan.

translation.en: Will this hashtag lead to an offline advocacy movement that pushes for reforms to ensure that universities are safe places for women?
translation.ha: Shin wannan 'hashtag' ɗin zai jawo wata fafutuka da za ta kawo sauyi don tabbatar da cewa jami'o'i sun zama amintaccen waje ga mata?

translation.en: Time will tell.
translation.ha: Lokaci ne zai bayyana.

translation.en: Zanzibar's one and only music academy on the brink of closure
translation.ha: Makarantar kiɗa ɗaya tilo ta Zanzibar tana dab da kullewa.

translation.en: Dhow Countries Music Academy promotes Swahili culture through music
translation.ha: Makaratanr kiɗa ta Dhow Countries tana tallata al'adar Swahili ta hanyar kiɗa

translation.en: Students from the Dhow Countries Music Academy (DCMA) rehearse the qanun, flute, drum and piano at the Old Customs House, Stone Town, Zanzibar, 2019. Photo courtesy of the DCMA.
translation.ha: ɗaliban makarantar Dhow Countries Music Academy (DCMA) sun yi gwajin amfani da ƙanun da sarewa da ganga da fiyano a tsohon gidan kwastam da ke Stone Town a Zanzibar. An samo hoton daga DCMA.

translation.en: Thousands of visitors to the historic city of Stone Town, Zanzibar, have followed the sound of music to the Dhow Countries Music Academy (DCMA), a music school that promotes and preserves the islands’ musical traditions of the Swahili Coast along the Indian Ocean.
translation.ha: Dubunnan maziyarta zuwa garin Stone Town mai ɗimbin tarihi da ke Zanzibar sun bi sautin kiɗan har zuwa Dhow Countries Music Academy (DCMA), wata makarantar koyar da kaɗe-kaɗe da waƙe-waƙe da ke ƙoƙarin ciyar da kayayyakin kiɗan tsibirin gaba a bakin gaɓar Tekun Indiya da ke zauke da al'umma masu magana da harshen Swahili.

translation.en: Since 2002, the school has promoted and preserved the Zanzibar's unique mix of Arab, Indian and African cultures through music.
translation.ha: Tun shekarar 2002, makarantar ta killace tare da bunƙasa al'adar mutanen Zanzibar wacce ta haɗa da wani kaso na al'adun Larabawa da Indiyawa da kuma na mutanen nahiyar Afrika ta hanyar kaɗe-kaɗe da waƙe-waƙe.

translation.en: After 17 years, the school faces a financial crisis that threatens its closure.
translation.ha: Bayan shekarar 2017, makarantar ta fuskanta matsalar tattalin arziƙi wacce ta yi barazanar rufe ta.

translation.en: Nearly 70% of its 80 full-time students can't afford to pay their tuition, which comes to about $13 USD per month, according to an official DCMA press release.
translation.ha: Kusan kaso 70 cikin ɗari na cikakkun ɗalibai mutum 800 ba za su iya biyan kuɗin makaranta ba, wanda ya kai kimanin dalar Amurka $13 a wata, a cewar wani jawabin manemai labarai da DCMA ta fitar.

translation.en: While the school has received support over the years from international donors and diplomatic missions, they face a gap in funding that may force them to shut their doors at the historic Old Customs House.
translation.ha: Duk da kasancewar makarantar ta samu taimako daga ƙungiyoyin sa kai na ƙasa da ƙasa da kuma ƙungiyoyin diflomasiyya, har yanzu akwai matsalar rashin kuɗi da za ta iya sa wa dole a rufe makarantar da ke tsohon gidan kwastam mai ɗimbin tarihi.

translation.en: Without crucial funds to continue, DCMA students and staff fear that the soulful sounds that flow through the hallways of this iconic institution that make these islands sing — may cease.
translation.ha: Idan babu kuɗin da za a iya cigaba, ɗalibai da malaman na DCMA na cike da fargabar cewa wannan sautin mai ratsa zukata da ake jiyo shi a layika na wannan makaranta mai tarihi, sautin da ke sanya tsibirin ya dinga rausayawa zai zo ƙarshe.

translation.en: The school not only teaches and promotes traditional culture and heritage through music, but it's also home to a community of young musicians who seek alternatives to making a living as creatives.
translation.ha: Makarantar ba kawai tana koyar da al'adun gargajiya ta hanyar kaɗe-kaɗe da waƙe-waƙe da bunƙasa su bane, ita ɗin kuma gida ce ga matasa waɗanda ke da burin zama makaɗa da mawaƙa .

translation.en: A DCMA student learns the qanun, a featured instrument in classical taarab songs. Photo courtesy of the DCMA.
translation.ha: ɗalibin DCMA yana koyar kiɗan ƙanun, wani abin kiɗa da ake amfani da shi a waƙoƙin taarab. An samo hoton daga DCMA.

translation.en: "We [have started] to face a very challenging financial moment", said Alessia Lombardo, managing director of the DCMA, in an official DCMA video.
