translation.ha: Duk da haka, wani ɗan Nijeriya mai amfani da shafin tuwita ya gano cewa asalin hoton an wallafa shi ne a wani saƙon tuwita na harshen Larabci (Zane na 2) a farkon wannan watan dai.

translation.en: According to the tweet, the photo is from Lebanon.
translation.ha: Saƙon tuwitan ya nuna cewa an ɗauki hoton ne a ƙasar Lebanon.

translation.en: Keyamo's intention may have been to show that the Buhari government had surpassed previous administrations on the revamping of the morbid rail lines in the country.
translation.ha: Wataƙila niyyar Keyamo ya nuan cewa gwamnatin Buhari ta zarce wacce ta gabata wajen farfaɗo da layin dogo a ƙasar.

translation.en: However, the use of an image from a different country made the so-called "gains" questionable.
translation.ha: Duk da haka, yin amfani da hoton da aka ɗauka a wata ƙasar dabam ya sanya ayar tambaya a kan wannan "riba".

translation.en: Figure 3: Ethnic hate speech
translation.ha: Zane na 3: Kalaman tsana da ƙabilanci

translation.en: Figure 4: El-Rufai later apologized for the “insensitive” tweet shown in Figure 3.
translation.ha: Zane na 4: Daga baya El-Rufai ya ba da haƙuri sakamakon saƙon tuwita 'na rashin hankali" da aka nuna a Zane na 3.

translation.en: Online ethnic hate speech was also pronounced before, during and after the elections.
translation.ha: An furta kalaman tsana da ƙabilanci kafin zaɓen da lokacin zaɓen da kuma bayan zaɓen.

translation.en: In an ethnic slurred tweet (Figure 3) Bashir El-Rufai, son of the Kaduna State Governor, inferred that the Nigerian Civil War was ignited by the Igbo vengeance.
translation.ha: A wani saƙon tuwita mai ƙunshe da zagin ƙabilanci (Zane na 3), Bashir El-Rufai, ɗa ga gwamnan jihar Kaduna ya ɗauka cewa Inyamirai ne su ka kunna wutar yaƙin basasar Nijeriya don su yi ramuwa.

translation.en: Between 1967 and 1970, Nigeria fought a bitter civil war with the secessionist state of Biafra inhabited mostly by the Igbo in the southeastern part of the country.
translation.ha: Tsakanin shekarun 1967 da 1970, Nijeriya ta yi yaƙin basasa da masu ƙoƙarin ɓallewa daga ƙasar wato jam'ar ƙabilar Inyamirai 'yan yankin Biafra da ke kudu maso gabas na ƙasar.

translation.en: Hence, according to Bashir El-Rufai, the result of the 2019 elections which was won by his party, the APC, should also be taken as a sweet "revenge" from the Hausa, Fulani.
translation.ha: Saboda haka, Bashir El-Rufai sai ya ce sakamakon zaɓen shekarar 2019 wanda jam'iyyarsa ta APC ta samu nasara tamkar daddaɗar "ramuwa" daga ƙabilar Hausawa da Fulani.

translation.en: He later apologized, after a backlash, for his previous "insensitive" tweet as shown in Figure 4.
translation.ha: Daga baya ya ba da haƙuri, bayan da aka yi masa ca, a dangane saƙonsa na "rashin tunani" na baya kamar yadda Zane na 4 ya nuna.

translation.en: He also deleted the earlier tweet (Figure 3).
translation.ha: Kuma ya goge saƙon tuwita na farko (Zane na 3).

translation.en: Ethnic-motivated false information on social media during the elections falls into two categories: disinformation and propaganda.
translation.ha: Bayanan ƙarya da ake wallafawa a shafukan sada zumunta waɗanda ƙabilanci ke jawowa a lokutan zaɓe sun kasu gida biyu: labaran ƙarya da farfaganda.

translation.en: Miroslav Tudjman and Nives Mikelic, communication scholars at the University of Zagreb, Croatia, define disinformation as "intentionally deputed mistaken information with the purpose to mislead the user".
translation.ha: Miroslaɓ Tudjman da Niɓes Mikelic, malaman ilimin sadarwa a Jami'ar Zagreb da ke ƙasar Kuroshiya, sun bayyana ma'anar labarin ƙarya a matsayin "wani bayani da aka canja da gangan da niyyar a ɓatar da mai amfani da bayanin".

translation.en: Hence, the intention to pass across inaccurate, distorted and false evidence as true, distinguishes dis-information from misinformation.
translation.ha: Saboda haka, niyyar bayar da shaida ta ƙarya da aka ƙarawa gishiri a matsayin gaskiya shi ya bambamta labarin ƙarya da labarin da ba daidai ba.

translation.en: Tudjman and Mikelic assert that propaganda is much more than disinformation or misinformation.
translation.ha: Tudjman da Mikelic sun tabbatar da cewa farfaganda ta fi kama da labarin ƙarya fiye da labarin da ba daidai ba.

translation.en: This is because propaganda "aims to manipulate the attitudes of the user" through an "accidental or intentional handling with information in [the] communication process".
translation.ha: Wannan haka yake saboda a farfaganda akwai "niyyar mallake ɗabi'ar mai amfani da bayani" ta hanyar "juya bayanai da gangan ko ba da gangan ba a cikin hanyar sadarwa".

translation.en: Thus, propaganda weaponizes biased or inaccurate information for political interests and consequently manipulates perception.
translation.ha: Saboda haka, farfaganda kan yi amfani da bayanin da ba daidai ba na son zuciya a matsayin makamin kare ra'ayin siyasa da mallakar tunani.

translation.en: Justifiable fears emerged surrounding 2019 elections because online disinformation and propaganda incites electoral violence but also poses "a threat to reconciliation after the elections".
translation.ha: An samu fargaba ta gaske a lokacin zaɓukan 2019 saboda labaran ƙarya da farfaganda a shafukan yanar gizo sun hura hutar rikice-rikicen zaɓe hakan ya sanya "barazanar ga sulhu bayan zaɓe".

translation.en: Part II of this essay will examine how this played out online, especially on Twitter, with specific examples.
translation.ha: Kashi na II na wannan maƙala zai yi duba da yadda hakan ya faru a shafukan yanar gizo, musamman a tuwita, tare da misalai takamaimai.

translation.en: This article is part of a series of posts examining interference with digital rights through methods such as network shutdowns and disinformation during key political events in seven African countries: Algeria, Ethiopia, Mozambique, Nigeria, Tunisia, Uganda, and Zimbabwe.
translation.ha: Wannan maƙala wani ɓangare ce na saƙonni da suka yi duba ga kutse cikin haƙƙin amfani da kwamfuta ta hanyar dabaru kamar sun rufe hanyoyin sadarwa a ƙasashen nahiyar Afirka guda bakwai: Aljeriya da Habasha da Muzambik da Nijeriya da Tunusiya da Yuganda da Zimbabwe.

translation.en: The project is funded by the Africa Digital Rights Fund of The Collaboration on International ICT Policy for East and Southern Africa (CIPESA).
translation.ha: ƙungiyar Africa Digital Rights Fund ƙarƙashin haɗin kan ƙasashen gabas da kudancin Afirka a kan ilimin kwamfuta da yanar gizo su suka ɗauki nauyin binciken.

translation.en: From Kenya to Ethiopia, these men received divine dream ‘maps’ to carve caves
translation.ha: Daga Kenya har zuwa Habasha, waɗannan mutane sun yi mafarkin samun "taswira" daga ubangiji don su sassaƙa kogwanni.

translation.en: Both men say they received explicit instructions from God
translation.ha: Su biyun sun ce sun sami umarni dalla-dalla daga ubangiji.

translation.en: Dunbar caves in southern Ethiopia were dug by Mohammed Yiso Banatah with his bare hands.
translation.ha: Mohammed Yiso Bantah shi ya haƙa Kogwannin Dunbar da ke kudancin Habasha da hannayensa.

translation.en: He was instructed by Allah to create underground wedding chapels.
translation.ha: Allah ne ya ba shi umarnin ya ƙirƙiri ɗakin biki na ƙarƙashin ƙasa.

translation.en: Photo by Amanda Leigh Lichtenstein, used with permission.
translation.ha: Hoto daga Amand Leigh Lichtenstein, an samu izinin amfani da shi.

translation.en: On December 26, 2019, BBC Swahili released a video featuring Francisco Ouma, an elder from Busia, western Kenya, who received a message from God to carve a cave.
translation.ha: Ranar 26 ga watan Disamba na shekarar 2019, sashen Swahili na BBC sun saki wani faifan bidiyo da ya nuna Francisco Ouma, wani dattijo daga Busia a yammacin ƙasar Kenya, wanda ya sami saƙo daga ubangiji cewa ya haƙa kogo.

translation.en: The message came in the form of a map that he received through his dreams.
translation.ha: Saƙon ya zo ne a taswira da ya karɓa a mafarkinsa.

translation.en: Since February 1967, Ouma has followed the divine map delivered in his dream.
translation.ha: Tun watan Fabrairun shekarar 1967, Ouma ya bi wannan taswirar ta ubangiji da aka ba shi a mafarki.

translation.en: Today, his cave has 24 rooms and counting.
translation.ha: A yau, wannan kogon yana da ɗakuna 24 da ƙari.

translation.en: Screenshot of Francis Ouma, who received a message from God to carve a cave with 24 rooms via BBC Swahili / Instagram.
translation.ha: Hoton allo na Francis Ouma wanda ya karɓi saƙo daga Ubangiji cewa ya haƙa kogo mai ɗakuna 24 da aka samo daga BBC Swahili / Instagram.

translation.en: Throughout history, many have questioned the veracity of divine intervention through dreams, even casting doubt on one's mental health and stability.
translation.ha: A gaba ɗayan tarihi, mutane da yawa sun ƙalubalanci gaskiya magana da ubangiji ta mafarki, har ma da kokwanton lafiyar hankalin mutum.

translation.en: But prophets from Islam, Judaism and Christianity have all testified to messages from God sent through dreams for millennia.
translation.ha: Amma a tsahon shekaru dubunnai, annabawan addinin Musulunci da addinin Yahudanci da addinin Kiristanci duk sun tabbatar da karɓar saƙinni daga Ubangiji da yake turo usu ta mafarki.

translation.en: "God brought me something like a map", Ouma told BBC Swahili.
translation.ha: "Ubangiji ya ba ni wani abu mai kama da taswira", Ouma ya faɗawa BBC Swahili.

translation.en: Then, when I was digging, this map is what I followed.
translation.ha: Sannan na yi amfani da wannan taswira a lokacin da nake haƙa.

translation.en: It wasn't just that when I was digging, better to keep digging, no.
translation.ha: Ba wai kawai yayin da nake yin haƙar, gara in cigaba da haƙar, a'a.

translation.en: Using just a plow and his own two hands, Ouma faced trial and error as he hit on stones that prevented him from digging.
translation.ha: Ouma ya gwada dukan duwatsun da suka hana shi yin haƙa ta hanyar amfani da diga da kuma hannayesa guda biyu.

translation.en: He finally found the right spot to manifest God's cave map in his mind.
translation.ha: Daga ƙarshe ya gano wurin ta hanyar bayyanar tasawirar kogon Ubangiji a zuciyarsa.

translation.en: In one room, there's a stone with writing on it with the words of Jesus.
translation.ha: A wani ɗakin akwai dutsen da yake da rubutun kalmomin Yesu.

translation.en: Jesus Christ was the one who brought me this news, Ouma said, and then he explained it to me as it was with Moses.
translation.ha: Ouma ya ce, Yesu ne ya kawo min wannan labarin sannan kuma ya yi min bayani kamar yadda abun yake a wurin Musa.

translation.en: Ouma believes he is bringing back another covenant with God to the world.
translation.ha: Ouma ya yi imanin cewa, zai sake dawo da yarjejiniya da Ubangiji zuwa duniya.

translation.en: The second stage is coming.
translation.ha: Mataki na biyu yana zuwa.

translation.en: This is the first stage of the covenant.
translation.ha: Wannan shi ne matakin farko na yarjejeniyar.

translation.en: The second is coming.
translation.ha: Na biyu yana zuwa.

translation.en: I can't say for sure what it is now because if I announce it, I may be cheating humanity.
translation.ha: Ba zan iya faɗar tabbas me ye ba a yanzu domin idan na sanar, zai iya zama zaluntar al'umma.

translation.en: Therefore, I will wait for the report to be given at last, Ouma told BBC Swahili.
translation.ha: Don haka, zan saurari rahoton da za a bayar a ƙarshe, Ouma ya gaya wa BBC Swahili.

translation.en: The BBC Swahili video has been viewed nearly 50,000 times with over 100 comments and counting.
translation.ha: Kusan sau 50,000 aka kalli bidiyon BBC na Suwahili, inda fiye da mutane 100 ne suka yi tsokaci, yayin da wasu ma suke ci gaba da yi.

translation.en: While some have raised questions about the mental stability of those who claim to receive messages from God through dreams, including a professor quoted in the video, many comments supported people of faith who tune into messages shared through dreams.
translation.ha: Yayin da wasu suke nuna shakkunsa a kan lafiyar ƙwaƙwalen waɗanda suke da'awar samun saƙo daga Ubangiji ta hanyar mafarki, wanda ya haɗa da Farfesan da aka rawaito a cikin bidiyon, wasu kuwa kalamansu na ƙarfafar masu masu imanin da suke yaɗa saƙonnin da aka samu ta hanyar mafarki.

translation.en: One Instagram user wrote:
translation.ha: Wani mai amfani da Insitagiram ya rubuta:

translation.en: Translation Original Quote
translation.ha: Fassarar ƙaulin asali.

translation.en: For me, people like these, usually I believe them a lot, much more than those who fill us [up] from continuous contributions of words of hope from houses of worship, 52 years a person just digs — if he didn't have his mind, wouldn't his community or the government not recognize this?
translation.ha: Nakan yarda da waɗannan mutanen sosai fiye da waɗanda suka ci gaba da gaya mana kalmomin ƙarfafa gwiwa daga wuraren bauta, inda mutum ya shafe shekaru 52 yana bibiya, idan bai yanke shawara, shin al'ummarsa ko gwamnati ba za ta yarda da wannan ba?

translation.en: He hasn't even asked for the help of a tractor or money for his labor. We should not judge this person.
translation.ha: Bai kamata mu yanke wa wannan mutum hukunci ba, tun da bai nemi taikon tarakta ko kuɗi ba a wajen yi aikinsa.

translation.en: Mohammed Yiso Banatah in 2012 explains the ten dreams through which Allah instructed him to dig underground wedding chapels.
translation.ha: A shekarar 2012 ne Mohammed Yiso Banatah ya yi bayanin mafarkai guda goma da Allah Ya umarce shi da ya haƙa wuraren biki a ƙarƙashin ƙasa.

translation.en: Photo courtesy of Amanda Leigh Lichtenstein.
translation.ha: Hoton gudummar Amanda Liwigh Linchtenstein ne.

translation.en: Ethiopia's underground wedding chapels
translation.ha: Wuraren bikin Misira na ƙarƙashin ƙasa.

translation.en: In southern Ethiopia, a similar testimony exists from an elder named Mohammed Yiso Banatah, who said back in 2012 that he was visited by Allah 33 years ago in a series of ten dreams.
translation.ha: A kudancin Misira ma an samu makamanciyar wannan maganar daga wurin wani dattijo mai suna Muhammad Yiso Banatah, wanda a shekarar 2012 ya ce ya ga Allah a mafarkai goma mabambanta a shekaru 33 da suka shuɗe.

translation.en: Through the dreams, he received explicit instructions from Allah to ultimately create underground wedding chapel caves.
translation.ha: A mafarkin Allah Ya ba shi umarnin ya samar da kogunan gudanar da bukukuwa a ƙarƙashin ƙasa

translation.en: Known as Dunbar Caves, these elaborate chapels exist on Banatah's roadside property halfway between Hawassa and Shashamene.
translation.ha: An fi sanin su da Dunbar Caɓes, waɗanda wurare ne da suke daf da kadarar Bonatan ta gefen titi kusa da tsakanin Hawassa da Shashamene

translation.en: Banatah said it was in his third dream that the blueprint for these chapel caves was burned into his consciousness.
translation.ha: Bonatah ya ce a mafarki na uku ne ya fahimci taswirar waɗannan wurare.

translation.en: You can read my full narrative account of Banatah's dream sequence and what prompted him to start digging what would become his life's work here:
translation.ha: Za ka iya karanta cikakken bayanina game da mafarkan Banatah da kuma abin da ya sa shi ya fara haƙa abin da ya zama ayyukansa na rayuwa kamar haka:

translation.en: In his final dream, the tenth one in a series back in 1979, a man appeared in his dream who took Mohammed to a small tree on his property and pointed to its roots.
translation.ha: A mafarkinsa na goma a shekarar 1979, ya ga wani mutum wanda kai Mohammad zuwa wata ƙaramar bishiya a kusa da kadararsa, sannan sai ya yi nuni zuwa jijiyar bishiyar.

translation.en: The man showed him exactly where to start digging and told him that his life would depend on it.
translation.ha: Mutumin ya nuna masa ainihin wurin da zai fara haƙan, sannan ya gaya masa cewa rayuwarsa za ta dogara a kansa.

translation.en: At midnight, he saw visions of gold.
translation.ha: Ya yi mafarkin gwal tsakar dare.

translation.en: Surroundings up close appeared far away and objects farthest away were pulled up close to him.
translation.ha: Abubuwan da suke kewaye da shi da suke kusa, sun yi nesa da shi, abubuwan kuma da suke nesa da shi, sun yi kusa.

translation.en: He was told where, when, and how to begin digging.
translation.ha: Sai aka gaya masa inda zai fara haƙan da lokacin da kuma yadda zai yi haƙan.

translation.en: The next day, when he woke up, he began to dig into the earth with his bare hands.
translation.ha: Washe-gari sai ya tashi ya fara haƙa ƙasa da hannayensa.

translation.en: These sunlight-flooded caves have been somewhat of a tourist attraction where people stop, pay a modest fee, and tour the quiet stillness at least four meters underground.
translation.ha: Hasken ranar da ke shiga cikin kogunan ya zama wurin buɗe ido, inda mutane suke tsayawa, sun biya 'yan kuɗaɗe, sannan su zagaya wurin da yake shiru kuma yake aƙalla mita huɗu a ƙarƙashin ƙasa.

translation.en: Some couples have even arranged wedding ceremonies there.
translation.ha: Wasu ma'auratan sun yi bukukuwan aurensu a wurin.

translation.en: The architectural genius of these spaces reveals the finery and steadiness of Mohammed’s hand – he’s spent careful hours carving, smoothing, cutting, digging, and designing an intricate series of archways, cosy nooks and hidden rooms within rooms, some that have been furnished with soft mattresses and simple earth-slab shelves, while others are stark and cool with tiny, rounded windows flooding through with secret rays of sunlight appearing out of nowhere.
translation.ha: ƙwararren maƙerin na wannan wurin ya bayyana kyau da tsayuwar hannun Mohammed - ya ɗau awoyi na nutsuwa yana sassaƙawa da lailayewa da ƙwaƙulewa da kuma tsara dukkanin wasu hanyoyi da wasu kwane-kwane da wasu ɓoyayyun ɗakuna a cikin ɗakuna, wasu waɗanda aka yi musu kwalliya da lausasan katifu da wasu kantoci, wasu kuma an cika su ga wasu tagogi kewayayyu wani haske yana fitowa daga wani waje.

translation.en: Caves have carried deep spiritual and metaphorical significance throughout history.
translation.ha: Koguna wata alamomu ne kuma suna da mutuƙar muhimmanci ta fuskar addini a tarihi.

translation.en: A whole chapter called "Al Kahf" or "The Cave" appears in the Quran.
translation.ha: Akwai sura sukutum mai suna Kogo a ƙur'ani.

translation.en: It features a Christian folktale known as the "People of the Cave", in which youth, tortured for their beliefs, fled their city to find refuge in a cave and fell asleep.
translation.ha: Ta nuna irin zantukan hikima na Kiristoci da aka fi sani da 'mutanen Kogo', inda aka azabtar da wasu samari saboda imaninsu, sai suka gudu daga garinsu suka ɓuya a cikin kogo, sai bacci ya ɗauke su.

translation.en: When they awoke and returned, they realized the entire city had become believers.
translation.ha: A lokacin da suka farka, suka koma, sai suka ga gabaɗaya mutanen garin sun yi imani

translation.en: Why is Donald Trump so popular in Nigeria?
translation.ha: Me ya sa Donald Trump ya shahara sosai a Nijeriya?

translation.en: Trump has so many fans in southern Nigeria
translation.ha: Trump yana da masoya da dama a kudancin Nijeriya.

translation.en: President Donald Trump returns to the White House in Washington on August 19, 2018.
translation.ha: Shugaban ƙasa Donald Trump ya dawo 'White House' a birnin Washington ranar 19 ga Agusta shekarar 2018.

translation.en: United States President Donald Trump has received low ratings across the world for his handling of international affairs — but not in some African countries like Nigeria.
translation.ha: Shugaban Amurka Donald Trump ya samu ƙur'ar jin ra'ayi mafi ƙanƙanta a kan yadda yake gudanar da al'amuran duniya, sai dai kuma abun ba haka yake ba a ƙasashe irinsu Nijeriya.

translation.en: According to a recent survey by the Pew Research Centre most Nigerians "have confidence" that Trump "will do the right thing in world affairs".
translation.ha: Bisa binciken da Cibiyar Bincike ta Pew ta gudanar baya-bayan nan ya nuna cewa, mafi akasarin 'yan Nijeriya 'suna da yaƙinin cewa, Trump zai yi abin da ya dace a al'amuran duniya'.

translation.en: The Pew survey results were gathered from telephone and face-to-face interviews conducted under the direction of Gallup — a Washington, DC, based analytics and advisory company.
translation.ha: An tattara sakamakon binciken Cibiyar Pew ta hanyar waya da gaba-da-gaba da hirar da aka yi bisa umarnin Kamfanain Gallup wanda yake a birnin Washington, DC

translation.en: Tweepsmap analysis of on Trump’s total followers on Twitter shows that Nigerians ranked in the top five across the world:
translation.ha: Bisa bayanan Tweepsmap game da mabiyan Trump a dandalin tiwita ya nuna cewa,'yan Najeriya suna cikin mafiya daraja guda biyar a duniya:

translation.en: Nigerian writer Adaobi Tricia Nwaubani explained to The World, a public radio show co-produced by the BBC, that Trump's "tough guy image" strikes a chord in Africa's most populous country:
translation.ha: Marubucin nan ɗan Nijeriya Adaobi Tricia Nwaubani ya bayyana wa shirin gidan radiyon 'The World' da haɗin-gwiwar gidan rediyon BBC cewa, hoton Trump mara kyan gani ya cire soyayyarsa a ƙasa mafi yawan mutane a Afirka:

translation.en: People admire his tough guy image and his bluntness is entertaining.
translation.ha: Mutane suna son hotonsa mara kyan gani da kuma rashin kunya wajen nishaɗantarwa.

translation.en: He's weird to Americans.
translation.ha: An yi masa…

translation.en: He's strange.
translation.ha: Baƙo ne.

translation.en: He's different from what you've had.
translation.ha: Ya bambanta da naka.

translation.en: But we're used to leaders who speak without restraint, who are verbally abusive when they please.
translation.ha: Sai dai mun saba da shugabannin da suke sakin baki, kuma suke yasasshiyar magana idan aka faranta musu.

translation.en: And so, he's not as outlandish to us as he may appear to an American.
translation.ha: Haka kuma, ba kamar yadda yake baƙo a wurinmu haka yake a wurin ɗan Amurka ba.

translation.en: The other reason is religion.
translation.ha: Kiristocin Najeriya suna ƙaunar Trumph.

translation.en: Nigerian Christians love Trump.
translation.ha: Kiristocin Najeriya suna ƙaunar Trumph.

translation.en: Cheta Nwanze, Head of Research at SBM Intelligence told Global Voices:
translation.ha: Cheta Nwanze, Shugaban Sashen Bincike na 'SBM Intelligence' ya gaya wa 'Global ɓoicee cewa:

translation.en: I'd like to see exactly WHERE in Nigeria this survey was conducted.
translation.ha: Ina so in ga ainihin wurin da aka gudanar da bincike a kan son Trump a Nijeriya.

translation.en: I'm willing to bet that it was largely in southern Nigeria, which explains the love of Trump.
translation.ha: Zan saka kuɗi a kan cewa, a kudancin Nijeriya aka fi son Trumph.

translation.en: A lot of his base are evangelical Christians, from whom many Nigerians draw their inspiration.
translation.ha: Nijeriya da take da kimanin mutane miliyon 200, tana da manyan addinai guda biyu: Kiristanci da Musulunci.

translation.en: Nigeria, with an estimated population of 200 million people, has two major religions: Christianity and Islam.
translation.ha: Musulmai na da kaso 50 yayin da Kiristoci su suke da kaso 48 na adadin mutanen Nijeriya.

translation.en: Muslims and Christians make up 50 percent and 48 percent of the Nigerian population respectively.
translation.ha: Hanyar da aka bi wajen tattara ƙuri'ar baya-bayan nan ta nuna cewa, an gudanar da binciken a cikin mutane.

translation.en: The methodology of the recent poll states that the study was conducted in Nigerian "local government areas stratified by geopolitical region".
translation.ha: Hanyar da aka bi wajen tattara ƙuri'ar baya-bayan nan ta nuna cewa, an gudanar da binciken a "ƙananan hukumomin Nijeriya da aka rarraba bisa yankunan siyasa".

translation.en: However, Adamawa, Borno, and Yobe states in northwestern Nigeria were excluded from the study due to security concerns.
translation.ha: Sai dai , an cire Jihar Adamawa da Borno da kuma Yobe a Arewa-maso Yamma daga cikin binciken saboda dalilin tsaro

translation.en: Nigeria has 774 local government areas, the grassroots arm of executive governance structure in the country.
translation.ha: Nijeriya tana da ƙananan hukumomi 774, waɗanda su ne mafiya ƙanƙanta a tsarin gudanarwa a ƙasar.

translation.en: There are also six geopolitical regions: North Central, Northwest, Northeast, South-south, Southeast, and Southwest.
translation.ha: Haka kuma, akwai yankunan siyasa guda shida: Arewa ta Tsakiya da Arewa -Maso-Yamma da Arewa-Maso-Gabas da Kudu-Maso-Kudu da Kudu-Maso-Gabas da kuma Arewa-Maso-Yamma.

translation.en: Nwanze's position that Christians in southern Nigeria must have formed the core of the sample size for the Pew Research results are not unfounded.
translation.ha: Matsayar Nwanze cewa, dole Kiristoci a Kudancin Nijeriya su zama babban samfuri a sakamakon binciken Pew ba gaskiya ba ne.

translation.en: The survey also showed that Nigerian Christians also "have a more favorable opinion of the US (69 percent) than do Muslims (54 percent)".
translation.ha: Binciken kuma ya nuna cewa, Kiristocin Nijeriya sun fi tunani mai kyau a kan Amurka (kaso 69) fiye da Musulmai (kaso 54).

translation.en: After the killing of top Iranian General Qasem Soleimani, by the United States, Nigeria's police chief issued a national security alert to forestall any disturbances by “domestic interests.”
translation.ha: Bayan Amurka ta kashe babban Janar Sojin Iran ƙasem Soleimani, babban jami'in 'yan sandan Nijeriya ya bayar da bayanan sirri domin hana aukuwar hatsaniya.

translation.en: The Islamic movement in Nigeria described the US airstrike that killed Soleimani as a "declaration of war on Iran".
translation.ha: ƙungiyar Musulunci a Nijeriya ta bayyana harin da ya yi sanadiyar mutuwar Soleimani a matsayin 'shelar yaƙi da Iran'.

translation.en: Trump has been described as “one of the most controversial world leaders in modern times."
translation.ha: A bayyana Trump a matsayin 'wanda ya fi kowa wuyar sha'ani a tsakanin shugabannin duniya na yanzu'.

translation.en: Yet, he is clearly adored by many in Nigeria.
translation.ha: Duk da haka, mutane da dama suna girmama shi a Nijeriya

translation.en: Twitter was a minefield of false information during the 2019 Nigerian elections
translation.ha: Dandalin Tiwita ya zama kafar yaɗa labaran ƙarya a yayin zaɓen Nijeriya na shekarar 2019.

translation.en: Ethnic hate speech and disinformation were rife on Twitter
translation.ha: Kalaman ƙabilanci da na tunzira da kuma labaran ƙarya sun zama ruwan dare a dandalin Tiwita.

translation.en: Image remixed by Nwachukwu Egbunike
translation.ha: Nwachuku Egbunike ne ya sake gyara hoton

translation.en: This story is the second in a two-part series on online ethnic hate speech, disinformation and propaganda during the 2019 Nigeria elections.
translation.ha: Labarin kalaman ƙabilanci da labaran ƙarya da farfaganda lokacin zaɓen Nijeriya na shekarar 2019 su ne na biyu a cikin jerin sassa biyu na intanet

translation.en: You can read the first part here.
translation.ha: Za ka iya karanta sashe na farko a nan

translation.en: In Nigeria, social media has a history of enabling ethnocentric disinformation and propaganda during elections.
translation.ha: A Nijeriya, dandalin sadar ya yi ƙaurin suna wajen yaɗa labaran ƙarya na ƙabilanci da kuma farfaganda a lokacin zaɓe.

translation.en: During the 2015 elections, Twitter Nigeria descended into a bitter and binary sparring match between supporters of the then-two major contestants, Goodluck Jonathan (PDP, an Ijaw Christian) and Muhammadu Buhari (APC, a Hausa, Fulani Muslim).
translation.ha: A lokacin zaɓen shekarar 2015, magoya bayan manyan 'yan takarar guda biyu wato Goodluck Jonathan (na Jam'iyyar PDP kuma Kirista ɗan ƙabilar Ijaw) da Muhammadu Buhari (na Jamiyyar APC, Musulmi kuma Bafulatani) sun ta musayar yawu a dandalin Tiwita.

translation.en: Twitter became a tool for propagating ethnic hate and party politics.
translation.ha: Dandalin Tiwita ya zama kafar yaɗa farfagandar ƙabilanci da kuma siyasa.

translation.en: The 2019 elections were no exception.
translation.ha: Zaɓen shekarar 2019 bai zama na daban ba.

translation.en: On February 15, Reporters Without Borders (RSF) released a statement expressing its concerns over an election campaign "polluted by disinformation".
translation.ha: A ranar 15 ga watan Fabrairu, Tawagar Menema Labarai ta fitar da wasu kalamai da suke nuna damuwarta a kan yadda kamfen ɗin zaɓe ta hanyar yaɗa labaran ƙarya.

translation.en: Nigerians also expressed their concerns.
translation.ha: Yan Nijeriya ma sun nun damuwarsu.

translation.en: Journalist Abdulbaqi Jari tweeted:
translation.ha: ɗan jarida Abdulbaƙi Jari ya rubuta a shafinsa na tiwita cewa:

translation.en: Disinformation and politics in African countries
translation.ha: Yaɗa labaran ƙarya da kuma siyasa a ƙasashen Afirka.

translation.en: A 2019 study by Dani Madrid-Morales, University of Huston and Herman Wasserman, University of Cape Town concluded that "mis- and disinformation campaigns have been used to influence political agendas" in Nigeria, Kenya and South Africa.
translation.ha: Binciken da Dani Madrid-Morales da Jami'ar Huston da kuma Jami'ar Herman Wasserman da ke Cape Town suka gudanar a shekarar 2019 ya nuna cewa an yi amfani labaran ƙarya ya yi tasiri a ajandar siyasa a Nijeriya da Kenya da kuma Afirka ta Kudu.

translation.en: The high exposure to disinformation in social media especially during electoral campaigns, leads to a "distrust" among social media users "because that's where they find 'fake news' most often", Madrid-Morales asserted.
translation.ha: Madrid-Morales ya yi iƙirarin cewa,yawan yaɗa labaran ƙarya a dandalin sadarwa musamman ma lokutan kemfen ya haifar da rashin yadda a tsakanin masu amfani da dandalin, saboda a nan ne aka fi samun labaran ƙarya.

translation.en: My ethnographic study between October 28, 2018, and May 29, 2019, that covered the 2019 Nigerian elections held on February 23 (to elect a president and a national assembly), and March 9 (to elect governors and state houses of assembly) revealed two major categories of false information: ethnocentric driven disinformation and political propaganda.
translation.ha: Nazarina na binciken rayuwar al'umma tsakanin 28 ga Oktoba, 2018 da 29 ga Mayu, 2019, wanda ya game zaɓen Najeriya na 2019 wanda aka yi a 23 ga Fabarairu (domin zaɓen shugaban ƙasa da 'yan majalisu), da kuma 9 ga Maris.(don zaɓen gwamnoni da 'yan majalisun jahohi) ya samar da bayanai game da muhimman rabe-rabe na bayanan ƙarya: bayanan ƙarya da suka shafi ƙabilanci da farfaganadar siyasa.

translation.en: Ethnically charged disinformation
translation.ha: Labaran nuna ƙabilanci

translation.en: Peter Obi, the running mate of the opposition People's Democratic Party (PDP) presidential candidate Atiku Abubakar, was a victim of ethnocentric disinformation during the last elections.
translation.ha: Yaɗa labaran ƙarya ya shafi Peter Obi, mataimakin ɗan takarar shugaban ƙasa a tutar Jam'iyyar PDP, Atiku Abubakar a zaɓen da ya gabata.

translation.en: Obi was the former governor of Anambra State, in southeast Nigeria.
translation.ha: Obi tsohon gwamnan Jihar Anambra ne da ke Kudu-Maso-Gabashin Nijeriya.

translation.en: A Twitter account supporting the Buhari-Osinbajo campaign, Coalition of Buhari-Osibanjo Movement, shared a tweet (Figure 1) which accused Obi of "deporting" northerners from Anambra State as governor.
translation.ha: Shafin Tiwitana ƙungiyar da take goyon bayan takarar Buhari da Osinbanjo mai suna 'Coalition of Buhari-Osibanjo Moɓement' ta haɗa wasu bayanai, inda ta zargi Obi da tiso ƙeyar 'yan Arewa da suke zaune a Jihar Anambra lokacin da yake gwamna.

translation.en: Figure 1: Screenshot of a tweet by Coalition of Buhari-Osibanjo Movement accusing Obi of 'deporting' northerners.
translation.ha: Hoto 1: Hoton waya naTiwitar da 'Coalition of Buhari-Osibanjo Moɓement' ta zargi Obi da tiso ƙeyar 'yan Arewa.

translation.en: Figure 2: Screenshot of a tweet by Nasir El-Rufia
translation.ha: Hoto 2: Hoton waya na Tiwitar Nasir El-Rufa'i.

translation.en: This charge was amplified by Nasir El-Rufai, Governor of Kaduna State and member of the ruling APC, who tweeted (Figure 2) that Obi was "a tribal bigot".
translation.ha: Gwmamnan Jihar Kaduna Nasir El -Rufa'i na Jam'iyyar APC ya ƙara yayata zargin, inda ya yaɗa a shafinsa na Tiwita cewa, "Obi yana da ƙabilanci".

translation.en: This, according to El-Rufai, made Obi unfit to be a vice president of Nigeria.
translation.ha: Saboda haka, El-Rufa'i yana ganin bai kamata Obi ya zama Mataimakin Shugaban ƙasa ba.

translation.en: Read more: Nigerian governor warns foreign governments: Interfere in our elections and 'go back in body bags'
translation.ha: ƙarin bayani: Wani gwamna a Nijeriya ya gargaɗi ƙasashen waje da cewa, idan kuka saka mana baki a harkokin zaɓenmu, 'to za a mayar da ku gida a makara'.

translation.en: What really happened?
translation.ha: Mene ne ya faru?

translation.en: In July 2013, 67 Nigerians, mostly from the Igbo ethnic group, "were deported all the way from Lagos and dumped at almost the same spot at the popular Upper Iweka area" in Onitsha, Anambra State, reported the Nigerian Vanguard newspaper.
translation.ha: Jaridar Nigerian ɓenguard ta watan Yulin Shekarar 2013 ta rawai cewa, an tiso ƙeyar 'yan Najeriya 67 daga Lagos, waɗanda mafi akasarinsu 'yan ƙabilar Igbo, inda aka sauke su fitaccen wurin nan mai suna Iweka.

translation.en: Obi, who was then the governor of Anambra State, described this action by his Lagos State colleague, Tunde Fashola, as "illegal, unconstitutional, and a blatant violation of the human rights of the deportees".
translation.ha: Obi wanda shi ne GwamnaN Anambra a lokacin, ya bayyana abin da takwaransa na Jihar Lagos, Tunde Fashola da 'saɓa wa kundin tsarin mulki, sannan kuma keta 'yancin waɗanda aka tiso ƙeyarsu ne'.

translation.en: Following the public fury that this action generated, Premium Times reported that Obi was also guilty of the same action:
translation.ha: Bayan nuna ɓacin ran al'umma da ya biyo lamarin, Jaridar 'Premium Times' ta rawaito cewa, shi ma Obi yana da laifi:

translation.en: In 2011, he repatriated child beggars back to Ebonyi and Akwa Ibom states, both in southern Nigeria.
translation.ha: A shekarar 2011, ya mayar da yara mabarata zuwa Jihar Ebonyi da Akwa Ibon wato jihohinsu na asali duk a Kudancin Nijeriya.

translation.en: Figure 3: Screenshot of a tweet by Jubril A. Gawat
translation.ha: Hoto na 3: Hoton waya na shafin Tiwitar Jubrin A. Gawat.

translation.en: While Obi did indeed deport beggars back to states in Southern Nigeria, he did not deport northerners and the accusation tweeted (Figure 1) by the Coalition of Buhari-Osibanjo Movement Twitter account was inaccurate.
translation.ha: Duk da cewa Obi ya mayar da yara mabarata zuwa jihohinsu na asali a Kudancin Nijeriya, to amma bai tiso ƙeyar 'yan Arewa ba, inda zargin da 'Coalition of Buhari-Osibanjo Moɓement' ta yi masa a shafinta na Tiwita (hoto na 1) ba gaskiya ba ne.

translation.en: Rather it was APC's Tunde Fashola, who in December 2014, "deported 70 northerners, found publicly begging" back to Kano State, according to the online investigative newspaper Sahara Reporters.
translation.ha: Sai dai, a wani bincike da Jaridar 'Sahara Reporter' ta intanet a Disambar shekarar 2014 ta gano cewa, Tunde Fashola na Jam'iyyar APC ya tiso ƙeyar 'yan Arewa su 70 da aka kama su suna bara a gari zuwa Kano.

translation.en: However, this ethnically motivated disinformation was employed by APC supporters on Twitter to discredit their opponent.
translation.ha: sai dai kuma, magoya bayan Jam'iyyar APC ne suka yi amfani da dandalin Tiwita wajen yaɗa labaran ƙarya na ƙabilanci domin su yi wa 'yan adawarsu yarfen siyasa.

translation.en: For instance, Jubril A. Gawat recently appointed as Lagos State's senior special assistant on new media tweeted that (Figure 3) a vote for opposition candidate Atiku Abubakar "is a vote for Igbo".
translation.ha: Misali, Jibrin A. Gawat da aka naɗa a baya-bayan nan a matsayin mataimaki na musamman ga Gwamnan Jihar Lagos a kan kafafen watsa labarai ya rubuta a shafinsa na Tiwita (hoto na 3) cewa, zaɓar Atiku Abubakar na jam'iyyar adawa ''tamkar zaɓar ɗan ƙabilar Igbo ne''.

translation.en: Nigeria is a country where ethnic identities run deep.
translation.ha: Nijeriya ƙasa ce da ƙabilar da mutum ya fito take da muhimmanci.

translation.en: These divisions are usually exploited during elections by politicians because of the obvious need to pitch their opponents into opposing camps of "we" versus "them".
translation.ha: Ana amfani da waɗannan bambance-bambance ne a lokacin zaɓe domin nuwa wa 'yan adawa bambancin ''mu da su''.

translation.en: Hence, the allegations that Obi deported northerners was meant to re-ignite the ethnic animosities between the Igbo and Hausa, Fulani that led to the Nigerian Civil War.
translation.ha: Don haka, manufar zargin da aka yi wa Obi na tiso ƙeyar 'yan Arewa ita ce ƙara rura wutar ƙabilanci tsakanin Igbo da Hausawa da kuma Fulani, wanda shi ya yi sanadiyyar Yaƙin Basasar Nijeriya.

translation.en: The aim of these disinformation campaigns was to paint Obi as a Biafran ethnic irredentist.
translation.ha: Babbar manufar yaɗa labaran ƙarya yayin kamfe ita ce yi wa Obi yarfe da ɗan Biafra,

translation.en: Located in southeastern Nigeria, the breakaway Republic of Biafra, which lasted for three years through a bitter civil war between 1967 to 1970, is largely populated by the Igbo.
translation.ha: An cire Jamhuriyar Biafra daga Kudancin Nijeriya, inda aka yi matsanancin Yaƙin Basasa a tsakkanin shekarar 1967 zuwa 1970, wanda 'yan ƙabilar Igbo suka fi yawa a ciki.

translation.en: Thus, Figure 3 proclamation that "a vote for Atiku is a vote for Igbo..." was aimed to revive the ghost of the acrimonious ethnic hatred that pitched Hausa against Igbo.
translation.ha: Don haka, hoto na 3 mai iƙirarin cewa, ''tamkar zaɓar ɗan ƙabilar Igbo ne'' an yi shi ne da manufar ƙara ƙiyayya tsakanin Hausawa da Igbo.

translation.en: In 2019 elections, this meant that Atiku is a supporter of the Igbo who had once tried to break away from Nigeria.
translation.ha: Zaɓen shekarar 2019 ya nuna cewa Atiku yana gowan bayan ƙabilar Igbo da suka taɓa yunƙurin ɓallewa daga Nijeriya.

translation.en: Statements in Figures 1-3 convey strong emotions capable of reopening pent up memories, which in most cases have still not received closure, from both sides of the divide.
translation.ha: Kalaman da suke a hoto na 1-3 na ƙunshe da jin haushin juna wanda ka iya fama raunikan kowane ɓangare.

translation.en: The United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization (UNESCO) maintains that disinformation like this targets the "vulnerability or partisan potential of recipients" by turning them into "amplifiers and multipliers".
translation.ha: Hukumar Raya Ilimi da Al'adu da Kimiyya Ta Majalisar ɗinkin Duniya ta nuna cewa, labaran ƙarya irin wannan na ƙara rura wuta a tsakanin masu sauraronsu.

translation.en: Ethnically-charged electoral campaigns not only exploit deeply rooted prejudices but also morph recipients into disseminators of false information.
translation.ha: Kalaman ƙabilanci a yayin kamfen ba wai yanke hukunci yake sawa masu sauraro su yi ba, su ma suna yaɗa labaran ƙaryar.

translation.en: Fabricated claims of Yoruba burning Igbo shops in Lagos
translation.ha: ƙirƙirarren labari na cewa Yarabawa na ƙona shagunan Igbo a Lagos.

translation.en: Figure 4: Screenshot of a tweet [flagged and pulled down by Twitter] by Chioma spreading disinformation of Yoruba burning Igbo shops in Lagos
translation.ha: Hoto na 4: Hoton waya na shafin Chioma na Tiwita, wanda yake yaɗa labaran ƙarya a kan cewa Yarabawa suna ƙona shagunan Igbo a Lagos.

translation.en: Similarly, ethnocentrism was also used by PDP supporters on Twitter to drive votes against the APC in Lagos State.
translation.ha: Har ila yau, magoya bayan Jam'iyyar PDP sun yi amfani da ƙabilanci a dandalin Tiwita domin kada a zaɓi APC a Lagos.

translation.en: Figures 4 and 5 show tweets by a PDP sympathizer alleging that Yoruba had set Igbo shops in Lagos on fire.
translation.ha: Hoto na 4 da na 5 ya nuna yadda magoya bayan Jam'iyyar PDP suka yi amfani da dandalin Tiwita domin zargin Yarabawa da ƙona shagunan Igbo a Lagos.

translation.en: The stories were false and were quickly dispelled by the Lagos State Police.
translation.ha: Labaran na ƙarya ne, sannan kuma nan da nan Rundunar 'Yan sandan Jihar Lagos ta yi watsi da shi.

translation.en: A Facebook post, using nearly the same words from Figure 4, and a picture depicting roads blocked by burning tires, circulated the same false claims.
translation.ha: Haka ma wani shafin Fesbuk ya yi amfani kalamai kusan iri ɗaya da na hoto na 4, inda aka nuna yadda ƙona tayoyi a kan tituna domin a yaɗa iƙirarin ƙarya.

translation.en: The photo used was from a February 24, 2017 protest that took place in a province near Pretoria, South Africa, reported African Check.
translation.ha: African Check ta rawaito cewa, an yi amfani da hoton zangazangar da aka yi daga ranar 24 ga Fabrairun shekarar 2017 a wani lardi kusa da Pictoria, a Afirka ta Kudu.

translation.en: Figure 5: Screenshot of a tweet spreading disinformation of Yoruba burning Igbo shops in Lagos II
translation.ha: Hoto na 5: hoton wayar dandalin tiwita da aka yaɗa labaran ƙarya a kan Yarabawa sun ƙona shagunan Igbo a Lagos.

translation.en: Political propaganda
translation.ha: Farfagandar siyasa

translation.en: On February 13, Twitter user Souljah tweeted (Figure 6) that Ballard Partners, a PR firm based in Washington DC, which was allegedly hired as a publicist for the Abubakar presidential campaign, had conducted a poll which predicted a loss for the opposition PDP presidential candidate.
translation.ha: A ranar 13 ga watan Fabrairu, wani mai amfani da Tiwita mai suna Souljah (hoto na 6) ya zayyana cewa, kamfanin yaɗa labarai na Ballard Partners da ke birnin Washigton da aka yi haya domin yaɗa labaran kamfen ɗin Abubakar na takarar shugaban ƙasa, ya gudanar da ƙuri'ar nuna ra'ayi, inda sakamakon ya yi hasashen rashin nasarar ɗan takarar shugaban ƙasa na Jam'iyyar PDP.

translation.en: The result of the survey was conveyed in a letter signed by Brian Ballard, head of Ballard Partners, on February 5, and addressed to Olusola Saraki, the Director-General of Abubakar's campaign.
translation.ha: An sadar da sakamakon binciken ta hanyar wasiƙr da Brian Ballard Shugaban Kamfanin Ballard Partnerr ya rattaba wa hannu a ranar 5 ga watan Fabrairu, zuwa ga Olusola Saraki wanda shi ne Darkta Janar na Kamfe ɗin Abubakar.

translation.en: Souljah's tweet went viral with over 1 million likes and 1 million retweets for obvious reasons.
translation.ha: Bayanan da Souljah ya yaɗa a shafinsa na dandalin Tiwita ya karaɗe ko'ina a dandalin sada zumunta, inda fiye da miliyon 1 suka yi layikin, yayin da mutane miliyon 1 suka sake yaɗa shi saboda wasu dalilai da suke a bayyane.

translation.en: The presidential election was previously slated to hold on February 16 (later postponed to February 23) and, with this poll coming three days before the elections, would have been catastrophic for the opposition PDP.
translation.ha: A da an tsara gudanar da zaɓen Shugaban ƙasa a ranar 16 ga watan Fabrairu (an ɗaga daga bisani zuwa 23 ga watan Fabrairu), inda kuri'ar jin ra'ayin da aka gudanar kwanaki uku kafin zaɓen, wanda da bai yi wa Jam'iyyar adawa ta PDP daɗi ba,

translation.en: Read more: Nigeria postpones 2019 general elections hours before polls open, citing 'logistics and operations' concerns
translation.ha: ƙarin bayani: Nijeriya ta ɗage zaɓn shekarar 2019 'yan awanni kafin a fara kaɗa ƙuri'a, saboda wasu dalilai.

translation.en: Figure 6: Screenshot of a tweet by Souljah
translation.ha: Hoto na 6: Hoton waya na bayanin da Souljah ya yaɗa a shafinsa na Tiwita

translation.en: However, by the evening of February 13, Ballard Partners refuted the said survey (Figure 7) which they described as "fraudulent" and maintained that they had not "conducted any survey research on behalf of the People’s Democratic Party of Nigeria".
translation.ha: binciken (hoto na 7) da suka bayyana a matsayin ''na bogi'', sannan kuma sun ƙara da cewa ba su ''gudanar da binciken ba a madadin Jam'iyyar PDP ta Nijeriya''.

translation.en: Ose Anenih, a PDP supporter reported some of the APC Twitter sympathizers who circulated the fake poll to the Twitter handle of the Nigerian police and the Independent Electoral Commission, the electoral umpire, for "criminally and illegally" trying to "interfere with free and fair elections".
translation.ha: Ose Anenih, magoyin bayan Jam'iyyar PDP, ya kawo rahoton wasu masu goyon bayan Jam'iyyar APC da suke amfani da dandalin Tiwita da suke yaɗa sakamakon ƙuri'ar jin ra'ayi na ƙarya a shafin Rundunar 'Yan Sanda Ta ƙasa da Hukumar Zaɓe Mai Zaman Kanta Ta ƙasa, a matsayin masu ƙaƙarin hana gudanar da sashin zaɓe ta hanyar karya doka.

translation.en: But this was not the only case of weaponizing disinformation for political propaganda that was witnessed online during the elections.
translation.ha: wannan ba ita ce kawai yanya ba ta yaɗa labaran ƙarya soboda farfagandar siyasa a intanet da aka samu a lokacin zaɓe.

translation.en: Figure 7: Screenshot of a tweet by Ballard and Partners refuting a fake poll attributed to them.
translation.ha: Hoto na 7: Hoton waya na shafin Tiwita na Kamfanin Ballard and Partners da yake ƙaryata ƙuri'ar jin ra'ayi ta ƙarya da aka danganta su da ita.

translation.en: The many lies of a presidential aide
translation.ha: ƙarerayin mataimaki ga Shigaban ƙasa masu yawa.

translation.en: Figure 8: Screenshot of a tweet by Lauretta Onochie, aide to the Nigerian president
translation.ha: Hoto na 8: Hoton waya na shafin Tiwita na Lauretta Onochie, mataimakiya ga Shugaban ƙasar Nijeriya.

translation.en: On December 4, 2018, Lauretta Onochie, presidential aide to Buhari [then incumbent presidential candidate] tweeted (Figure 8) a picture with food and 500 naira notes that was purportedly shared with the crowd that attended Abubakar's presidential rally in Sokoto in northwest Nigeria, the previous day.
translation.ha: A ranar 4 ga watan Disamba Lauretta Onochie, mataimakiya ga Shugaba Buhari ( wanda ɗan takarar shugaban ƙasa ne a lokacin) ta yaɗa a shafinta na Tiwita (Hoto na 8) hoton abinci da 'yan 500 waɗanda aka ce an rarraba wa dandazon mutanen da suka halarcin kamfen ɗin Abubakar a Sokoto, Arewa-Maso-Yamma, a ranar da ta gabatana

translation.en: Onochie's allegations were completely false. In fact, the picture she shared "was taken in February 2017" at an event unrelated to "electioneering", Chuba Ugwu pointed out in a reply to her tweet.
translation.ha: Ugwu ya mayar mata da martani, inda ya nuna cewa, zargin na Onocie ba gaskiya a cikinsa. A taƙaice ma, an ɗauki hoton da ta yaɗa a Fabrairun shekarar 2017 a wajen wani taro da ba shi da nasaba da kamfen.

translation.en: Onochie appears to be a specialist in disseminating falsehoods. The International Centre for Investigative Reporting (ICIR), an online news portal, analysed over 1,000 images shared on Twitter by Onochie between August 1, 2018, and July 31, 2019. The analysis revealed that "in at least 12 cases" Onochie "had used inaccurate pictures".
translation.ha: Onocchie ta zama ƙwararriya wajen yaɗa labaran ƙarya. Cibiyar Binciken Rahota Ta Duniya wadda jaridar yaɗa labarai ce ta intanet ta tsattsefe hotuna fiye da 1000 waɗanda Onocchie ta yaɗa a Tiwita tsakanin 1 ga Agusta, 2018 zuwa 31 ga watan Yuli na shekarar 2019. Wannan ya nuna cewa, ''a ƙalla a wurare 12 Onocchie ta yi amfani da hotuna ba daidai ba''.

translation.en: Online hate speech: a crime in Nigeria
translation.ha: Amfani da kalaman ƙiyayya a intanen: laifi ne a Nijeriya.

translation.en: Section 26 of Nigeria's Cybercrime Act prohibits "use of threats of violence and insulting statements to persons based on race, religion, colour, descent or national or ethnic origin".
translation.ha: Sashe na 26 na Dokar Laifukan Intanet ta haramta '' amfani da barazana da kuma zagin mutum saboda jinsi ko addini ko kalar fata ko gidan da ya fito ko ƙasa ko ƙabila.

translation.en: Convicted persons risk a five-year jail term or a fine not less than 10 million nairas [about $28,000 United States dollars] or both.
translation.ha: Mutanen da aka samu da laifi, za a iya yi musu hukuncin gidan yari na shekaru biyar or tara ta ƙasa da Naira Miliyon 10 (kusan Dalar Amurka $28,000) ko duka biyun

translation.en: In March this year, Enough is Enough Nigeria (EIE), a youth-based movement and Paradigm Initiative (PI), a digital rights policy and advocacy group, instituted a court case in an Abuja court against Onochie and Gbenga Olorunpomi, an aide to Kogi State governor.
translation.ha: A watan Maris na wannan shekara ƙungiyar Enough is Enough Nigeria da ƙungiyar matasa ta Paradigm Initiatiɓe , wadda ƙungiya ce ta shafi amfanin da intanet ta shigar da ƙarar Onochie da Gbenga Olorunmi wanda mataimaki ne ga Gwamnan Jihar Kogi.

translation.en: The two organisations compiled instances of hate speech "gathered from online comments" made by Onochie and Olorunpomi which they deemed to be in violation of Nigeria’s Cybercrime Act of 2015.
translation.ha: ƙungiyoyin guda biyu sun tattara misalai na kalaman ƙiyayya daga kalaman Onochie da Olorunpomi waɗanda suke ganin sun saɓa wa Dokar Nijeriya ta Laifukan Intanet ta shekarar 2015.

translation.en: Read more: How will propaganda shape Nigeria's 2019 presidential elections?
translation.ha: ƙarin bayani: Ta yaya farfaganda za ta saita zaɓen Shugaban Nijeriya na shekarar 2019?

translation.en: An army of Twitter warriors propagating falsehoods
translation.ha: Sajojin dandalin Tiwita na yaɗa farfagandar ƙarya.

translation.en: Most of the instances highlighted above were not mere happenstance. Rather, there was a deliberate and systematic effort to pass off lies as true information.
translation.ha: Yawancin misalan da aka kawo a baya sun nuna cewa ba haka kawai suka faru ba. Da gayya aka shirya yaɗa ƙarerayi a matsayin gaskiya.

translation.en: This is not surprising considering that both APC and PDP engaged an army of online warriors to either "neutralize adverse" social media reports or “fend off” attacks during the campaign periods.
translation.ha: Wannan ba abun mamaki ba ne, idan aka yi la'akari da cewa gabaɗaya Jam'iyyun PDP da APC sun yi amfani da sojojin intanet ko dai don ''ƙaryata wasu labarai'' na dandalin sada zumunta ko kuma ''kare kai'' a lokacin kamfen.

translation.en: Each side engaged "cyber troops" — "government or political party actors tasked with manipulating public opinion online".
translation.ha: Kowane ɓangare sun ɗauki "sojojin intanet" - "ma'aikatan gwamnati ko 'yan jam'iyyar siyasa waɗanda aka ba wa aikin su juya ra'ashin mutane a intanet".

translation.en: This year's elections were a repeat of 2015, where both APC and PDP engaged in "disinformation, misinformation, propaganda" campaigns on social media that were "carefully designed to hoodwink the unsuspecting electorate", asserts Eshemokha Austin Maho, a Nigerian media scholar.
translation.ha: Zaɓen wannan shekarar tamakar na shekarar 2015 ne, inda gabaɗaya Jam'iyyar APC da PDP suka yi amfani labaran ƙarya da farfaganda a dandalin sada zumunta, waɗanda aka tsara domin a yaudari masu zaɓe.

translation.en: They achieved this through the creation of "bogus social media accounts" from which "smear campaigns" and "doubtful information and propaganda" were disseminated.
translation.ha: Sun samu nasarar haka ta hanyar ƙirƙirar shafiukan bogi wajen kamfe, inda suke yaɗa labaran ƙarya da kuma farfaganda.

translation.en: The resultant impact was that Twitter became a battleground of ethnocentric disinformation and political propaganda before, during and in the immediate aftermath of the 2019 elections in Nigeria.
translation.ha: Tasirin sakamakon shi ne, dandlin Tiwita ya zama tamkar fagen dama wajen amfani da labaran ƙarya na ƙabilanci da yaɗa farfagandar siyasa kafin zaɓe da lokacin zaɓe da kuma bayan zaɓen shekarar 2019 a Nijeriya.

translation.en: This article is part of a series of posts examining interference with digital rights through methods such as network shutdowns and disinformation during key political events in seven African countries: Algeria, Ethiopia, Mozambique, Nigeria, Tunisia, Uganda, and Zimbabwe.
translation.ha: Wannan muƙala ɗaya ce daga cikin abubuwan da aka duba domin gano yadda aka saɓa wa ƙa'idojin amfani da intanet, ta hanyar kashe sabis da yaɗa labaran ƙarya a yayin gudanar da muhimman al'amuran siyasa a ƙasashen Afirka kamar haka: Aljeriya da Habasha da Muzambik da Nijeriya da Tunusiya da Yuganda da kuma Zumbaguwe.

translation.en: The project is funded by the Africa Digital Rights Fund of The Collaboration on International ICT Policy for East and Southern Africa (CIPESA).
translation.ha: Wannan shirin ya samu tallafin asusun Africa Digital Right da haɗin gwiwar International ICT Policy a Gabashi da kuma Afirka ta Kudu.

translation.en: Africa's creative industries get a half-billion-dollar boost by big banks to reap the vast fortunes lying in wait'
translation.ha: Masanaantun ƙirƙire-ƙirƙire na Afirka sun samu tallafi na Dala miliyon ɗari biyar daga manyan bankuna domin amfani da damammakin da suke a ƙasa.

translation.en: Screenshot of Nigerian artist D'banj speaking at CAX Weekend in Cairo, Egypt, 2018.
translation.ha: Hoton waya na mawaƙin nan ɗan Nijeriya D'banj a lokacin da yake magana a wajen CAɗ na ƙarshen mako a Cairo, Masar a shekarar 2018.

translation.en: Dbanj told investors that "content is the next crude oil" and must be respected as much.
translation.ha: Dbanj ya gaya wa masu saka hannun-jari cewa, '' wannn ma'adanin shi zai zama tamkar man fetur nan gaba'', don haka dole a adana shi.

translation.en: In recent years, cultural and creative industries have played a growing role in developing economies, in terms of their economic contribution as well as their power to effect social change and cultural engagement.
translation.ha: A shekarun baya-bayan nan, masana'antun fasaha da al'ada sun taka muhimmiyar rawa wajen bunƙasar tattalin arziki, ta fuskar bayar da gudummawa da kuma irin tasirinsu wajen kawo sauyi a tsarin zamantakewa.

translation.en: In 2013, cultural and creative industries (CCI) generated $2,250 billion United States dollars worth of revenue and 29.5 million jobs worldwide [but] only 3 percent of these jobs came from Africa and the Middle East, according to a 2013 study by the United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization (UNESCO) called “Cultural time.”
translation.ha: Bisa wani bincike da Hukumar Raya Ilimi da Al'adu da Kimiyya Ta Majalisar ɗinkin Duniya a shekar 2013 mai suna ''Cultural time'' ya nuna cewa, a shekarar 2013, masana'antar fasaha da al'adu ta samar da Dalar Amurka biliyon 2,250 na ƙuɗin shiga da kuma ayyukan yi kimanin miliyon 29.5 a duniya bakiɗaya, amma kaso 3 na waɗannan ayyuka ne kawai suka samu daga Afirka da Gasar Ta Tsakiya.

translation.en: For this reason, African Export-Import Bank (Afreximbank) in collaboration with UNESCO and African Development Bank Group, developed the Creative Africa Exchange (CAX) as a "catalyst that brings together the identified assets and resources within the creative industry" to consolidate, monetize and impact African creative and cultural economies, according to the CAX website.
translation.ha: Saboda haka, bankin African Eɗport-Import Bank da haɗin gwiwar Hukumar Raya Ilimi da Al'adu da Kimiyya Ta Majalisar ɗinkin Duniya da kuma Bankin Raya Afirka suka ƙirƙiri kasuwar hannun jari ta al'adun Afirka 'Creatiɓe Africa Eɗhange' a matsayin wata mahaɗa da za ta tattara duk wasu ma'adanai a masana'antar domin haɗa da yi musu kuɗi da haɓaka fasaha da al'adu masu nasaba da tattalin arziki, kamar yadda yake a shafin Kasuwar Hannun Jari ta al'adun Afirka (CAɗ).

translation.en: CAX launched during the Intra Africa Trade Fair in Cairo, Egypt, in December 2018.
translation.ha: An ƙaddamar da Kasuwar Hannun Jari ta al'adun Afirka a lokacin gudanar da kasuwar baje koli ta Afirka a Cairo, Masar a Disambar shekarar 2018.

translation.en: African creative talents from the fields of music, arts, design, fashion, literature, publishing, film and television came together for a Creative Africa Exchange Weekend in Kigali, Rwanda, January 16-18, 2020.
translation.ha: A ranar 16 ga watan Junairun shekarar 2020 aka tattara fasahohin Afirka daga ɓangaren waƙa da zane da ɗinki da adabi da ɗab'i da wasan kwaikwayo domin baje kolin fasahohin Afirka a yayin ƙarshen makon Kasuwar Hannun Jari ta al'adun Afirka a Kigali na ƙasar Ruwanda.

translation.en: It advertises itself as the "first continental event dedicated to promoting exchange within the creative and cultural industry in Africa", with over 2,000 participants from 68 countries.
translation.ha: Tana tallata kanta a matsayin ''taron farko na nahiya wanda ya ƙudiri aniyar ci gaba da yaɗa al'adu a masana'antar fasaha da al'adu ta Afirka, inda aka samu mahalatta sama da 2000 daga ƙasashe 68.

translation.en: On the second day of the event in Kigali, professor Benedict Oramah, president of the African Export-Import Bank (Afreximbank) announced a $500 million USD fund "to support the production and trade of African cultural and creative products" over the next two years, New Times Rwanda reported.
translation.ha: Jaridar News Times Rwanda ta rawaito cewa, a rana ta biyu ta taron na Kigali, Farfesa Benedict Oramah, wanda shi ne Shugaban Bankin Shige da Fice na Afirka, ya sanar da asusun Dalar Amurka miliyon 500 ''domin tallafa da inganta kayayyakin da ake samarwa daga fasahohi da al'adun Afirka, daga nan zuwa shekaru biyu masu zuwa.

translation.en: Omarah told guests at the event that the funds, which would build on what the bank was already doing, would be accessible as lines of credit to banks, direct financing to operators and as guarantees.
translation.ha: Omarah ya gawa baƙi a wurin taron cewa, asusun zai ɗora ne daga inda bakin ya tsaya, inda za a riƙa baya wa bankuna bashi da ɗaukar nauyin masu sana'ar da kuma kasancewa garanto.

translation.en: He said that while Africa had a deep pool of talent, it lacked the infrastructure and capacity to commercialize its creative talent and reap the vast fortunes lying in wait, according to Afreximbank.
translation.ha: Ya ce, duk da cewa Afirka tana da fasahohi masu yawa, amma ba ta da hanyoyoyin da za ta mayar da fasahohin kasuwanci domin amfanar baiwar take da su, kamar yadda Bankin Shige da Fice na Afirka ya rawaito.

translation.en: He continued:
translation.ha: Ya ci gaba da cewa:

translation.en: Because of underinvestment in the creative and cultural industries, Africa is largely absent in the global market of ideas, values and aesthetics as conveyed through music, theater, literature, film and television.
translation.ha: Saboda ƙarancin hannun jari a masana'antar fasaha da al'dau, wannan ya sa ba a maganar Afirka a kasuwar fasaha da hikima ta hanyar waƙa da sinima da wasan kwaikwayo da talabijin.

translation.en: African countries import overwhelmingly more creative goods than they export or trade amongst themselves.
translation.ha: ƙasashe Afirka suna shigo da kayayyakin fasaha fiye da yadda suke fitar da su ko kuma suke kasuncinsu a tsakaninsu.

translation.en: He commended Egypt’s "astronomical growth in creative exports over the last decade".
translation.ha: Ya yaba wa ci-gaban da Masar ta samu wajen fitar fasahohin sararin samaniya a shekaru goma da suka wuce.

translation.en: In December 2019, Afreximbank was honored at the International Fashion Awards (IFA) in Cairo for its role in supporting Africa's creative industry.
translation.ha: A Disambar shekarar 2019 aka girma Bankin Shige da Fice na Afirka a wurin bayar da kyaututtuka na 'International Fashion Awards (IFA) ' a Cairo, saboda irin rawar da take takawa wajen tallafa wa Masana'antar Fasaha ta Afirka.

translation.en: Omarah also commended Nigeria's Nollywood industry.
translation.ha: Haka kuma, Omarah ya yaba wa masu finafinan Turanci na Nijeriya.

translation.en: On Twitter, artists who were attendance showed their appreciation for the gathering held at Intare conference center in Kigali:
translation.ha: A dandalin Tiwata kuwa, masu fasahar da suka halatta sun nuna godiyarsu bisa shirya taron a cibiyar 'Intare conference center' da ke Kigali.

translation.en: Speaking at the 2018 CAX Weekend in Cairo, Nigerian artist D'Banj told bankers and investors:
translation.ha: Da yake magana a wajen taro ƙarshen mako na CAɗ a Cairo, mawaƙin Nijeriya wato D'Banj ya gaya wa ma'aikatan banki da masu saka hannun jari cewa:

translation.en: What we need is for you guys to really understand is that content is the new crude oil and however well you respect the oil industry you have to respect the creative industry.
translation.ha: Abin da muke buƙatar ku fahinta shi ne abu shi ne zai zama tamkar man fetur, kuma na san kuna martaba masana'antar man fetur don haka ya kamata ku martaba masana'antar fasaha.

translation.en: The concluded CAX Weekend 2020 will be followed by CAX Week on the sidelines of the second Intra-African Trade Fair (IATF2020) from September 1-7, 2020, also in Kigali.
translation.ha: An ƙarƙare ƙarshen makon na CAɗ na shekarar 2020, inda za sake wani makon na CAɗ a yayin baje kolin ƙasashen Afirka daga ranar 1 ga watan Satumbar zuwa 7 , na shekarar 2020 a dai Kigali.

translation.en: Broadcasters from Nigeria join global celebration of World Radio Day 2020
translation.ha: Gidajen radiyo a Nijeriya sun bi sahu wajen murnar ranar radiyo ta duniya.

translation.en: Radio — the most affordable and portable tool for development
translation.ha: Radiyo ita ce mafi sauƙin mallaka kuma abu mai sauƙin rikewa da yake kawo ci gaba

translation.en: A man holds a portable short-wave radio in his hand. Photo by Muhammadtaha Ibrahim Ma'aji via CC BY 2.0.
translation.ha: Wani mutum riƙe da ƙaramar rediyo a hannunsa. Hoton da Muhammadtaha Ibrahim Ma'aji ya yaɗa ta hanyar CC BY 20.0.

translation.en: There is no doubt that the radio has had a profound impact on global development.
translation.ha: Babu tantama cewa, rediyo tana taka muhimmiyar rawa wajen ci-gban duniya.

translation.en: To honor the importance and unique value of radio, the United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization (UNESCO) has declared February 13 World Radio Day.
translation.ha: Saboda girmama muhimmnacin da daraja ta musamman da radiyo take da shi, Hukumar Raya Ilimi da Al'adu da Kimiyya Ta Majalisar ɗinkin Duniya ta ayyana ranar 13 ga watan Fabrairu a matsayin Ranar Radiyo ta Duniya.

translation.en: UNESCO set aside this day to draw attention to the power of radio — which remains the most affordable and portable medium to reach the widest audience.
translation.ha: Hukumar Raya Ilimi da Al'adu da Kimiyya Ta Majalisar ɗinkin Duniya ware wannan ranar ne domin ta nuna ƙarfin da radiyo take da shi, wadda ta fi komai sauƙin siya kuma hanya mafi sauƙi ta sadarwa.

translation.en: Nigerian broadcasters joined radio practitioners around the world to honor the powerful role that radio plays in global development.
translation.ha: Gidajen radiyo a Nijeriya sun bi sahu ragowar gidjen radiyo na duniya wajen girma irin rawar da radiyo take takawa wajen ci-gaban duniya.

translation.en: "Even though the new media is taking over the world with the way we do things, radio is still the most viable option for many people to get information, it remains the most powerful tool for journalists to reach people in the farthest and remote areas..." said Bishop George Bako, during his opening remarks at the World Radio Day Symposium. Bako is the former Director-General of the Federal Radio Corporation of Nigeria (FRCN).
translation.ha: Bishop Bako ya ce, "Duka da cewa kafofin watsa ladarai sun mamaye duniya dangane da yadda muke wasu abubuwa, to amma har yanzu radiyo ita ce hanyar da mutane da dama suke samun bayanai, sannan kuma ita ce hanya mafi ƙarfi da 'yan jaridu sadarwa da mutane a ƙauyuka..." Bishop George Bako ya bayyana hakan ne a lokacin da yake maraba a wajen taron Ranar Rediyo Ta Duniya. Bako shi ne tsohon Darakta Janar na Hukumar Radiyo Ta Nijeriya.

translation.en: Bishop George Bako speaks at the World Radio Day symposium in Lagos, Nigeria.
translation.ha: Bishop Bako ya yi magana a wurin taron Ranar Rediyo Ta Duniya, a Lagos Nijeriya,

translation.en: Photo by Ọmọ Yoòbá, used with permission.
translation.ha: Hoto daga Omo Yooba, an samu izinin amfani da shi.

translation.en: FRCN — popularly known as Radio Nigeria — is the foremost broadcast radio station in Nigeria, that serves a teeming population of listeners in the Lagos metropolis on three different stations, namely: Radio One 103.5 FM, Metro 97.7 FM and the multiple award-winning Bond 92.9 FM.
translation.ha: Hukumar Radiyo Ta Nijeriya, wadda aka fi sani Radiyo Najeriya ita ce babbar tashar radiyo a Najeriya, inda mutane da dama a garin Lagos suke sauraron ta a tashoshi mabambanta kamar haka: Radio One 103.5 FM da Metro 97.7 FM da kuma tasahar da ta samu kyaututtuka da dama wato Bond 92.9 FM.

translation.en: Each station — with its own unique audience and share of the market — broadcasts in English, Nigerian Pidgin, Hausa, Igbo and Yorùbá languages.
translation.ha: Kowace tasha ta keɓanta da da masu sauraron ta, sannan kuma tana yanaɗa shirye-shiryenta da Ingilishi da Buraka Ingilish da harshen Hausa da Igbo da kuma Yoruba.

translation.en: Radio remains the greatest means of news dissemination in Nigeria. FM (frequency modulation) is most common, followed closely by AM (amplitude modulation), according to Media Landscape of the European Journalism Centre — and online radio has also become quite popular.
translation.ha: Radiyo ita ce babbar hanyar yaɗa labarai a Nijeriya. Zangon FM ya fi zam ruwan dare, sai kuma zangon AM. Bisa ga Cibiyar 'Yan Jaridu Ta Turai, radiyon intanet ma ta zama gama-gari.

translation.en: As of 2019, Bond FM holds the number 1 position in Lagos State as the station with the largest audience, according to the Nigeria Diary Radio Stations Ratings of August 2019.
translation.ha: Bisa bayar da matsayin da 'Nigeria Diary Radio Stations ' ta gudanar a watan Agustan shekarar 2019, Gidan Radiyon Bond mai yaɗa shirye-shiryenta a zangon FM ita take riƙe da kambun na 1 a Jihar Lagos, a matsayin gidan radiyon da aka fi saurara.

translation.en: To celebrate, broadcasters from across Nigeria took to Twitter to show some love for radio:
translation.ha: Domin nuna murnarsu, gidajen radiyo a Nijeriya sun karaɗe dandalin Tiwita domin su nuna son da suke yi wa rediyo:

translation.en: Dan Manjang, the commissioner for information and communication of Plateau state, congratulated broadcasters everywhere for "all the sacrifice, resources and time" put into keeping citizens informed and entertained:
translation.ha: Kwamishinan Watsa Labarai da Sadarwa na Jihar Filato Dan Manjang ya yi wa gidajen radiyo a ko'ina murna, ''bisa sadaukarwa da ilimantarwa da kuma bayar da lokacinsu" wajen sanar da 'yan ƙasa da kuma nishaɗantar da su:

translation.en: Radio broadcasting in Nigeria started in 1933 with the British colonial government’s Radio Diffusion Service (RDS), whereby loudspeakers were installed in dedicated public places for people to listen to the British Broadcasting Corporation’s foreign radio service broadcasts.
translation.ha: An fara samar da gidajen radiyo a Nijeriya a shekarar 1933, ta hanyar Gidan rediyon Gwamnatin Mulkin Mallaka ta Burtaniya, inda aka sassaka lasifika a muhimman wurare domin mutane su saurari Gidan Rediyon Burtaniya.

translation.en: By 1950, the Radio Diffusion Service took on a new name — the Nigerian Broadcasting Service (NBS) — and later, the Nigerian Broadcasting Corporation (NBC), with broadcast stations in the different regions of the country. NBC later metamorphosed into the Federal Radio Corporation of Nigeria (FRCN) in 1978.
translation.ha: A shekarar 1950 aka sake wa wannan gidan rediyo suna Hukumar Kula da Gidajen Rediyo Ta Nijeriya, daga bisani kuma Hukumar Gidajen Radiyo Ta Nijeriya, inda take da gidajen rediyo a yankuna daban-daban na ƙasa. A shekarar 1978 sai ta zama Hukumar Gidan Radiyo ta Tarayya.

translation.en: "The first radio station in Nigeria was established in Ibadan in 1939.
translation.ha: Rediyon farko a Nijeriya shi ne wanda aka kafa a Ibadan a shekarar 1939.

translation.en: The next station was created in Kano in 1944," according to Legit media online.
translation.ha: Gidan rediyo na biyu shi ne wanda aka kafa a Kano a shekarar 1944, kamar yadda kafar 'Ligit Media online' ta bayyana.

translation.en: RayPower FM, the first private radio station in Nigeria, was established in 1994, and by 2007, the masses could get international transmission broadcast worldwide, according to Legit.
translation.ha: Gidan rediyon RayPower FM shi gidan Rediyo mai zaman kansa na farko a Nijeriya, wanda aka kafa shi a shekarar 1994, inda a shekarar 2007 talakawa suna iya kamo gidajen rediyo na duniya, kamar yadda Ligit ta bayyana.

translation.en: Radio has always served as a tool to check decision-makers, establish and provide access to information and motivate and inspire the people.
translation.ha: Gidan rediyo ya zama tamkar wata kafa ta ƙalubalantar mahunta da kuma samar wa mutane labarai da ƙarfa musu gwiwa da kuma ƙarfafa musu zuciya.

translation.en: In 2019, African Independent Television and RayPower FM were shut down by the National Broadcasting Commission (NBC) for incisive broadcast and propaganda against the government.
translation.ha: A shekarar 2019 ne Hukumar Kafafen Yaɗa Labarai Ta ƙasa ta rufe Gidan Talabijin na African Independent Teleɓision da Gidan Rediyon RayPower FM saboda yaɗa labara tayar da husuma da kuma yaɗa farfaganda a kan gwamnati.

translation.en: Also in 2019, Jay FM in Port Harcourt was shut down for allegedly making broadcasts against the government.
translation.ha: A dai shekarar 2019 aka sake rufe Gidan Rediyon Jay FM da ke Fatakwal saboda zargin yaɗa labaran ƙiyayya ga gwamnati.

translation.en: Radio Nigeria truck advertises itself as "the network for the millennium," and joins radio practitioners around the globe in celebrating World Radio Day 2020.
translation.ha: Gidan Rediyon Nijeriya yakan tallata kansa da " Gidan rediyo na zamani", sannan kuma ya haɗa masu aiki a gidajen rediyo na duniya a yayin murnar zagayowar Ranar Rediyo Ta Duniya na shekarar 2020.

translation.en: Photo by Muhammadtaha Ibrahim Ma'aji, used with permission via CC BY 2.0.
translation.ha: Hoto daga Muhammadtaha Ibrahim Ma'aji, an samu izinin amfani da shi ta hanyar CC BY 2.0.

translation.en: Radio that unites and uplifts
translation.ha: Rediyon da take haɗa kai da ɗaukakawa

translation.en: UNESCO implores all nations to celebrate World Radio Day through partnership activities that cut across boundaries by involving all broadcasting associations and organizations, media organizations, government-owned, private and non-governmental organizations.
translation.ha: Hukumar Raya Ilimi da Al'adu da Fasaha Ta Duniya (UNESCO) ta yi kira ga ƙasashen duniya da su yi murnar zagayowar Ranar Rediyo Ta Duniya ta hanyar aiwatar da shirye-shirye na haɗin-gwiwa a ɓangarori daban-daban da shigo da ƙungoyoyin gidajen rediyo da ƙungiyoyi kafofin watsa labarai na gwamnati da masu zaman kansu.

translation.en: The theme of the 14th edition of World Radio Day is "Radio and Diversity."
translation.ha: Taken Ranar Rediyo Ta Duniya karo na 14 shi ne '' Gidan rediyo da bambance-bamnace''.

translation.en: Radio Nigeria is living up to its own motto of uplifting the people and uniting the nation" by disseminating informative, educative and motivating content that empowers Nigerians to be patriotic citizens.
translation.ha: Gidan Rediyon Nijeriya yana nan akan takensa na ''ɗaukaka mutane da kuma haɗa kan 'yan ƙasa'' ta hanyar yaɗa labarai da ilmantarwa gudanar da shirye-shirye da su saka 'yan Nijeriya kishin ƙasa.

translation.en: This comes at a time when Nigeria has faced serious divisions over ethnic, political and cultural tensions throughout the country.
translation.ha: Wannan yana zuwa ne a lokacin da Nijeriya take fuskantar rabuwar kai a sakamakon ƙabilanci da siyasa a ƙasar.

translation.en: The 2019 Fragile States Index ranked Nigeria as the 14th most fragile state in the world and the ninth in Africa.
translation.ha: Bayanan kimanta ƙasashe da ka iya rushewa ya saka Nijeriya a matsayin ƙasa ta 14 a duniya da ka iya rushewa, sannan kuma ta tara a Afirka.

translation.en: Since 2011, Boko Haram, the Islamist jihadist militancy in northeast Nigeria, has created a climate of fear and division as their brutal attacks have led to thousands of deaths and millions of displacements.
translation.ha: Tun a shekarar 2011 ƙungiyar Boko Haram, wadda ƙungiya ce ta jihadin musulunci a Arewa-maso-yammacin Nijeriya ta jefa tsoro a zukatan mutane da kuma rarraba kan al'umma ta hanyar kai hare-hare da suka yi sanadiyyar mutuwar dubunan mutane da kuma tarwatsa miliyoyi.

translation.en: Read more: Nigeria: A failed state — reality or perception?
translation.ha: ƙarin bayani: Nijeriya ƙasa ce da ta gaza- shin da gaske ko kuma ra'ayi ne?

translation.en: To further continue to uplift Nigeria, the management of FRCN Lagos Operations put together a series of events to commemorate World Radio Day 2020.
translation.ha: Domin ci gaba da ƙara ɗaukaka Nijeriya, Hukumar Gudanarwa Ta Gidan Rediyon Tarayya reshen Jihar Lagos ya shirya shiye-shirye domin murnar Ranar Rediyo ta Duniya ta shekarar 2020.

translation.en: It kicked off with an essay contest calling for 1,200 words on "why I love listening to the radio" for secondary school students.
translation.ha: An fara da gasar kan rubutu ta ɗaliban sakandire mai kalmomin 1,200 a kan maudu'in ''me ya sa nake son saurar rediyo.

translation.en: Students of mass communications also submitted a 5-minute documentary on the importance of radio in achieving sustainable development goals. Two winners emerged from both entries.
translation.ha: ɗalibai masu nazarin aikin jarida sun miƙa wani rahoto a kan muhimmancin rediyo samun wajen nasarar ci-gaba mai ɗorewa. Mutummbiyu sun samu nasara daga cikin waɗanda suka shiga gasar.

translation.en: Essay winner Ìlọ̀rí Ayọ̀olúwa of Mater Christi Catholic Girls' High School, Igede Èkìtì, Èkìtì State, recalls the first time she encountered radio at the age 5:
translation.ha: Wadda ta ci gasar ita ce Ìlọ̀rí Ayọ̀olúwa ta makarantar 'yan mata ta Mater Christi Catholic Girls' High School da ke Igede, Jihar Ekiti, inda ta tuno lokacin da ta fara ganin rediyo a lokacin tana 'yar shekara 5:

translation.en: I think I was 5 years old when I got my first radio.
translation.ha: Ina jin ina 'yar shekara 5 i lokacin da na fara mallakar rediyo.

translation.en: I fiddled with a few buttons and it came on.
translation.ha: Na ta daddanna madannai kafin na iya kunna ta.

translation.en: Then I was astonished to hear voices resonating from this "box" and thought there were people trapped in it.
translation.ha: Na yi mamaki lokacin da na ji ƙara na fitowa daga cikin akwatin, sai na yi tunanin kamar akwai mutane a ciki.

translation.en: I got scared and asked my father what it was and he took his time to explain what a radio was to me.
translation.ha: Na ji tsoro, inda na tambayi babana, wanda ya yi min cikakken bayanin a kan mece ce rediyo.

translation.en: On February 12, secondary school pupils, students of mass communication, ace broadcasters and key personnel from the media industry as well as everyday radio fans converged on the Lekki Coliseum in Lagos for a symposium to talk about the importance of radio for development.
translation.ha: A ranar 12 ga watan 12, ɗaliban sakandire da ɗaliban nazarin aikin jarida da gidajen rediyo da manyan ma'aikata daga masanaantar watsa labarai da kuma masu sauraron rediyo suka ɗunguma zuwa sinimar Lekki a Lagos domin taro a kan muhimmancin rediyo wajen ci-gaba.

translation.en: On February 12, secondary school pupils, students of mass communication, ace broadcasters and key personnel from the media industry as well as everyday radio fans converged on the Lekki Coliseum in Lagos for a symposium to talk about the importance of radio for development.
translation.ha: A ranar 12 ga watan 12, ɗaliban sakandire da ɗaliban nazarin aikin jarida da gidajen rediyo da manyan ma'aikata daga masanaantar watsa labarai da kuma masu sauraron rediyo suka ɗunguma zuwa sinimar Lekki a Lagos domin taro a kan muhimmancin rediyo wajen ci-gaba.

translation.en: Photo by Ọmọ Yoòbá, used with permission.
translation.ha: Hoto daga Omo Yooba, an samu izinin amfani da shi.

translation.en: When the sun went down, veteran broadcasters, representatives of the Oba of Lagos, Ọ̀túnba Gani Adams, the Ààrẹ Ọ̀nà Kakanfò of Yorùbá-land and other guests and dignitaries mingled at the Lekki Coliseum for the World Radio Day award ceremony and dinner.
translation.ha: Da yamma ta yi, sai ƙwararrun masu watsa labarai da wakilan Oba na Lagos Ọ̀túnba Gani Adams da Ààrẹ Ọ̀nà Kakanfò na ƙasar Yarbawa da sauran manyan baƙi suka haɗu a sinimar Lekki domin murnar da walimar cin abinci na zagayowar Ranar Rediyo Ta Duniya.

translation.en: Top broadcast professionals like Cordelia Okpei and a host of others graced the event.
translation.ha: ƙwararrun masana watsa labarai irinsu Cordelia Okpei da sauransu suka albarkaci taron

translation.en: Some deserving persons were presented with awards of recognition for their contributions to the development of the broadcast industry and service to humanity.
translation.ha: A ba wa mutanen da suka cancanta kyauta saboda gudummawar da suka bayar wajen ci gaban masana'antar watsa labarai da kuma hidimta wa al'umma.

translation.en: The series of events culminated in an on-air phone-in programme, whereby listeners made phone calls to say “happy World Radio Day” in their diverse range of languages and tongues:
translation.ha: An gudanar da tararrukan ta hanyar shirin gidin rediyo ta waya, inda masu sauraro suka yiwo waya domin yi 'barka da Ranar Rediyo Ta Duniya'' da harasansu daban-daban.

translation.en: No one was left out of the celebration. Voices of some of the Global Voices Lingua teams were also broadcast on Metro 97.7FM. Some retired broadcasters were invited to read the news or anchor a segment.
translation.ha: Babu wa da aka bari a baya. An saka muryoyin wasu daga cikin manyan shugabanni na duniya a tashar Metro 97.7. Haka kuma an gayyaci wasu tsofaffin ma'aktan gidan rediyo domin su karanta labarai.

translation.en: Radio Nigeria World Radio Day 2020 is the maiden edition of such events but radio practitioners and advocates expect it to become an annual celebration.
translation.ha: Murnar zagayowar Ranar Rediyo na shekarar 2020 shi ne na farko da gidan rediyon Nijeriya ya gudanar da taro, sai dai kuma masu gidajen rediyo suna ganin ya kamata duk shekara a dinga yin murna da zagayowar ranar.

translation.en: This chief hopes Yorùbá speakers adopt his newly invented 'talking alphabet'
translation.ha: Wannan ba saraken yana fatan Yarbawa za su dinga amfani da sababbun baƙaƙen da ya ƙirƙiro wajen magana.

translation.en: Will the new Yorùbá orthography become mainstream in the future?
translation.ha: Shin sabuwar ƙa'idar rubutun harshe Yarbawa za ta zama gama-gari a nan gaba?
