translation.ha: Lalle a gare ni ganawa da ku din nan matasa masu girma, ‘ya'yana masu girma, wata gagarumar dama ce ta in gabatar muku da wadansu abubuwan da wajibi ne mu yi magana kansu a tsakaninmu.

translation.en: Historical occasions are often like a symbol.
translation.ha: A mafi yawan lokuta bukukuwa na tarihi suna a matsayin wata alama ce da take nuni da wani abu.

translation.en: In and of itself, the 13th of Aban is not different from the days before and after it, but it is a symbol. What is a symbol?
translation.ha: Ranar 13 ga watan Aban (4, Nuwamba), a matsayinta na wata rana, ba ta da wani bambanci da ranakun da suka gabace ta da kuma wadanda suka zo bayanta; to sai dai ita wata alama ce da take nuni da wani abu.

translation.en: A symbol is a code that contains many meanings.
translation.ha: Wata alama ce wacce a tattare da ita sannan kuma a cikin zuciyarta tana da wadansu ma'anoni masu yawa.

translation.en: This day is a symbol, and it contains a huge number of important points and issues, issues that are not at all historical.
translation.ha: Wannan rana wata alama ce wacce take tattare da batutuwa da lamurra masu muhimmanci; lamurran da ko da wasa ba na tarihi ba ne, face dai batutuwa ne da suka shafi yau din nan.

translation.en: Let us take a look at the occasions that the 13th of Aban represents.
translation.ha: Bari mu yi dubi cikin abubuwan da suka faru a wannan ranar.

translation.en: The first occasion that the 13th of Aban represents is the day when our magnanimous Imam (r.a.) was forced into exile in the year 1343.
translation.ha: Batu na farko da ya faru a wannan ranar shi ne cewa a shekarar 1343 (1964) a irin wannan ranar ce (tsohuwar gwamnatin Shah), ta tilasta wa Imaminmu mai girma gudun hijira.

translation.en: Why did they force him into exile?
translation.ha: Me ya sa suka tura shi gudun hijirar?

translation.en: Because the Imam (r.a.) had demanded a national right a few days before in a speech delivered in Qom, which was immediately distributed throughout the country on audio tape and in writing.
translation.ha: Saboda ‘yan wadansu ranaku kafin wancan ranar, ya gabatar da wani jawabi mai tsananin muhimmanci a garin Kum inda ba tare da bata lokaci ba ya yadu cikin kasar nan ta hanyar kasetocin radiyo da bugawa a takarda. A cikin jawabin Imam dai ya gabatar da wata bukata da kuma hakki na kasa ne.

translation.en: It is appropriate for our young generation to clearly understand what difficulties we have undergone to reach where we are now. Americans had tens of thousands of agents in Iran.
translation.ha: Wannan lamari ne da ya kamata matasanmu su fahimce shi da kyau; su san wace irin mashiga ce muka tsallake har muka iso ga wannan wajen da muke a halin yanzu.

translation.en: This was a bad thing that happened in our country.
translation.ha: Wannan wani mummunan aiki ne da ya kasance yana faruwa a kasar mu.

translation.en: Because it was dependent on America and acted as an American mercenary, the satanic Pahlavi regime had gradually allowed those agents to enter the country over a number of years. This was already bad enough, but what happened next was even worse: They approved a law in the parliament of that time, which granted immunity to American agents so that they could not be prosecuted by Iranian courts, judiciary and security organizations. This is called legal immunity.
translation.ha: Sakamakon dogaro da Amurkan da gwamnatin dagutu ta Shah take yi haka nan kuma sakamakon biyayya ido rufen da take yi wa gwamnatin Amurka, a saboda hakan ne ya sanya ta shigowa da wadannan Amurkawa cikin wannan kasar. Shi kansa wannan abu ne mai muni; to amma abin da ya faru (na kafa wannan doka) wani lamari ne da ya kara muni kan munin wannan lamarin. Wannan mummunan aikin kuwa shi ne majalisar shawara ta kasa da majalisar dokoki ta wancan lokaci ta amince ne da wata doka ta cewa jami'ai da ma'aikatan Amurka da suke kasar nan sun fi karfin dokokin kasar nan.

translation.en: When foreigners are allowed to enter a country and do whatever they like, when the courts and police force of a country are unable to do anything to stop foreigners, it shows that the country is suffering from an extreme form of weakness and dependence.
translation.ha: Wannan doka ita ce suka kira ta capitulation. Ku duba irin kolin biyayya da zama ‘yan amshin shatan da kasar nan ta kai, wato su aikata duk wani abin da zuciyarsu take so; kotuna da ‘yan sandan kasar nan ba su da ikon hukumta su.

translation.en: Legal immunity was what the Americans demanded from the satanic Pahlavi regime, and it was given to them on a silver platter.
translation.ha: Wannan shi ne abin da gwamnatin Amurka ta bukata daga wajen gwamnatin dagutu, sannan ita kuwa gwamnatin dagutun cikin ruwan sanyi ta amince musu.

translation.en: Before the 13th of Aban, in a speech delivered to the people and seminarians of Qom, Imam Khomeini (r.a.) voiced his objection to the legal immunity of American agents.
translation.ha: Ko da yake sun kasance suna aikata wannan aikin ne a boye, ba sa barin a fadi hakan cikin jaridu; to amma Imam ya sami labari ya kuma san me ke gudana.

translation.en: He said that if a low-ranking American agent insulted and stomped on an Iranian marja taqlid in the country and committed whatever crime he wished, the Iranian legal system would remain totally neutral and nobody would have the right to stop him.
translation.ha: Abin da Imam ya ke fadi shi ne cewa idan wani karamin ma'aikacin Amurka ya ci mutumcin wani marja'i a kasar nan, ya kade shi da mota da kuma aikata kowane irin mummunan aiki, to kuwa dokokin Iran da jami'an tsaron kasar ba su da ikon yin wani abu; babu wani wanda ya ke da hakkin hukumta shi; su kansu Amurkawan ne za su hukumta shi.

translation.en: It was only Americans who could have taken action against him, and it is clear what the action would have been.
translation.ha: To hukumcin da za su yanke masa dai a fili yake.

translation.en: The Imam (r.a.) raised his objection to that oppressive law.
translation.ha: Imam ya daga muryarsa sama wajen fada da wannan doka.

translation.en: He had just been released from prison at that time.
translation.ha: A wancan lokacin ma Imam bai jima daga fitowa daga gidan yari ba.

translation.en: He stood up and made the suppressed voice of the Iranian people heard. Of course many people did not even know that the Iranian people were being humiliated like that, but the Imam (r.a.) knew that.
translation.ha: Amma Imam ya tsaya kyam ya daga muryarsa da ta shiga kunnuwan dukkanin mutane. Ko da yake da dama daga cikin al'ummar Iran ba su ma san irin wannan kokarin kaskantar da al'ummar Iran da ake yi ba; to amma Imam ya fahimci hakan.

translation.en: At that time even yelling was considered dangerous. Therefore, they arrested the Imam (r.a.) immediately and transferred him to Tehran.
translation.ha: A wancan lokacin ma daga muryar lamari ne mai hatsarin gaske; a saboda haka ne ba tare da bata lokaci ba suka kama Imam suka tafi da shi Tehran.

translation.en: They did not even keep him in Iran. They exiled him to Turkey. This is the first occasions that the 13th of Aban represents.
translation.ha: Kai ba su ma ci gaba da tsare Imam a Iran ba; sai suka tura shi gudun hijira kasar Turkiyya. Wannan shi ne lamari na farko.

translation.en: Therefore, the 13th of Aban became the symbol of two great realities, two sensitive and momentous realities. One is the greed of the Americans: If a nation fails to defend its rights and honor, arrogant and colonial powers will even impose such oppressive laws as legal immunity on that nation.
translation.ha: A saboda haka ta haka ne ranar 13 ga watan Aban (4, Nuwamba) ta zamanto alama ta wadansu lamurra masu girma guda biyu; wasu lamurra masu muhimmanci da kuma hatsarin gaske guda biyu: daya shi ne kwadayin Amurka; wanda idan har wata al'umma ba ta tsaya kyam wajen kare hakkoki da mutumcinta ba, to a irin wannan lokaci ne 'yan mulkin mallaka da ma'abota girman kan za su so su tilasta wa wata al'umma wata doka ta zalunci irin wannan doka ta capitulation.

translation.en: This is the goal of the hegemony of the arrogant powers.
translation.ha: Wannan ita ce manufar ma'abota girman kan.

translation.en: The Americans think they have the right to do whatever they want in third world countries.
translation.ha: Suna da dukkani karfi a wadannan kasashe; su sace musu man fetur, su kwace musu iskar gas, su kwashe musu albarkatun kasa, su sace musu dukiyarsu, su lamunce manufar Amurka a can, sannan kuma su dinga wulakanta al'ummomin wadannan kasashen.

translation.en: In different garrisons of the country, when a low-ranking member of the American military faced a senior Iranian officer, he used to address the Iranian officer like a master.
translation.ha: A cikin wadannan barikokin soji daban-daban na kasar nan a kan sami wani karamin jami'i na can kasa-kasa na Amurka ya tsaya gaban wani janar na soji yana magana da shi cikin girman kai!

translation.en: The members of our army were dissatisfied with this situation, but they did not dare to do anything.
translation.ha: Ran sojojin zai baci; amma ba su da karfin gwuiwa aikata wani abu; babu wani abin da za su iya yi.

translation.en: The first point is that the 13th of Aban is the symbol of American arrogance. It is the symbol of the spirit of transgression of the arrogant powers against different nations, especially against the Iranian nation.
translation.ha: Wannan shi ne lamari na farko; wanda ke nuni da cewa ranar sha uku ga watan Aban wata alama ce da ke nuni da irin girman kan Amurka; alama ce da ke nuni da ruhin wuce gona da iri da girman kan Amurka a kan al'ummomin duniya ciki kuwa har da al'ummar Iran.

translation.en: After the victory of the Islamic Revolution, different American presidents tried to ingratiate themselves [with the Islamic Republic].
translation.ha: Shugabannin Amurka da suka zo a lokuta daban-daban bayan nasarar juyin juya halin Musulunci sun kasance masu baki biyu cikin magana.

translation.en: They flattered us a lot in the hope that they will manage to reopen the path that was closed to them.
translation.ha: A zahiri suna fadin maganganu, to amma badinin lamarin shi ne cewa sun boye wannan gatari mai tsini cikin wani kyalle kamar yadda na fadi (wato abin da suke fadi a zahiri daban abin da kuma ke cikin zuciyarsu daban) .

translation.en: Therefore, the 13th of Aban is reminiscent of a bitter and crucial truth - namely, the spirit of arrogance that is inherent in the arrogant powers and arrogant hegemony.
translation.ha: A saboda haka ranar sha uku ga watan Aban wata hakika ce mai sosa rai amma mai tsananin muhimmanci.

translation.en: The second thing that is represented by the 13th of Aban is the resonant yell of our magnanimous Imam (r.a.).
translation.ha: Lamari na biyu wanda ake ganinsa a matsayin abin da ranar sha uku ga watan Aban ta bayyanar da shi, shi ne nuna rashin amincewar da Imamin mu mai girma ya yi.

translation.en: Some people may make a criticism or raise an objection here and there, but the shout that spread the message of the 13th of Aban throughout the world in the year 1343 came out of one of the most immaculate throats.
translation.ha: Mai yiyuwa a samu wadansu mutane daga nan da can da za su fadi wata magana, su fadi wani abu, su nuna rashin amincewa; to amma makogoron da ya daga muryarsa sama da kuma nuna rashin amincewarsa a ranar 13 ga watan Aban a shekarar 1343 (1964) sannan kuma ta yadu dukkanin duniya, shi ne mafi tsarkin makogoro.

translation.en: As I said, although the people were unaware in the beginning, they supported the Imam (r.a.) when they heard his shout.
translation.ha: Na fadi cewa duk da cewa da farko dai mutane ba su san me ke gudana ba, to amma a lokacin da Imam ya daga murya, mutane sun goyi bayansa.

translation.en: It was that public support which led to the victory of the Islamic Revolution 14 years later.
translation.ha: Irin wannan goyon bayan ne ta samar da nasarar juyin juya halin Musulunci shekaru goma sha hudu bayan hakan.

translation.en: That immaculate shout was similar to the resonant shouts with which divine prophets used to call the people to God and attract their hearts.
translation.ha: Wannan daga murya mai tsarki ta zamanto tamkar kiran annabawan Allah a tsakanin mutane sannan kuma ta janyo zukatan mutane zuwa gare ta.

translation.en: The Imam (r.a.) carried out such a great movement in the country, and he paid the price for it.
translation.ha: Irin wannan gagarumin yunkuri ne marigayi Imam ya aiwatar a wannan kasar, sannan kuma ya jure wa dukkanin wahalhalun da suke ciki.

translation.en: They forced the Imam (r.a.) out of his home and separated him from his family, friends and relatives. They exiled him to another part of the world.
translation.ha: Gwmnatin wancan lokacin ta raba Imam da gidansa da rayuwarsa da iyalansa da na kurkusa da shi suka tilasta masa gudun hijira zuwa wani bangare na duniya.

translation.en: Therefore, the second point is that the 13th of Aban is the symbol of such a shout.
translation.ha: A saboda haka batu na biyu shi ne cewa ranar 13 ga watan Aban alama ce ta irin wannan daga murya da nuna rashin amincewa.

translation.en: Fourteen years after Imam Khomeini's (r.a.) resonant yell, our youth, adolescents and high school students - who were among the most pure-hearted people of our country - entered the arena in the year 1357 and laid down their lives.
translation.ha: Batu mai muhimmanci na uku da ke tattare da wannan alama shi ne lamarin nan da ya shafi daliban makarantu wanda ya faru a shekarar 1357 (1978). Shekaru goma sha hudu da faruwar wancan lamarin, a shekarar 1978 ne wadansu matasanmu da kuma daliban makarantun sakandarenmu suka shigo fage sannan kuma aka kashe su.

translation.en: The 13th of Aban is the day when students were massacred in the streets of Tehran.
translation.ha: Abin da ya faru shi ne cewa a ranar sha uku ga watan Aban (na shekarar 1978) wasu dalibai ‘yan makaranta sun fito kan wadannan tituna na Tehran.

translation.en: When these youth and adolescents entered the arena and reflected the message that had been yelled by the Imam (r.a.) 14 years earlier, the mercenary killers of America took revenge on them. They opened fire on the youth.
translation.ha: A lokacin da wadannan matasa suka shigo cikin fage da kuma daga taken da marigayi Imam ya daga shekaru goma sha hudun da suka gabata; nan take jami'an tsaro ‘yan amshin shata suka fada musu da daukan fansa a kansu; suka bude musu wuta a kan titunan birnin Tehran.

translation.en: This is also an important point, not just because a number of youth and adolescents were martyred - which is of course important - but because the great movement initiated by the Imam (r.a.) in the years 1342 and 1343 had remained so fresh and dynamic that a number of pure-hearted youth had been inspired to take to the streets, feel responsible and stand up against the bayonets of the oppressive and satanic Pahlavi regime.
translation.ha: Wannan ma wani lamari ne mai muhimmancin gaske; ba wai saboda cewa wadansu matasa sun yi shahada ba - tabbas hakan lamari ne mai muhimmanci - face dai saboda kasantuwar cewa wannan yunkuri mai girma na Imam da ya faro shi a shekarar 1342 da 1343 (1964-65) ya zamanto a raye ta yadda hatta wadansu matasa masu tsarkin zuciya za su fito da shi kan titi, su na jin cewa lalle akwai wani nauyi a wuyansu da kuma tsayawa kyam a gaban gwamnatin zalunci ta dagutu.

translation.en: Such things rarely happen in the world.
translation.ha: Da kyar ake samun irin wannan yanayi a duniya.

translation.en: The same is true of today.
translation.ha: A yau ma haka lamarin yake.

translation.en: Just like those times, today our high school students alongside our university students, Basij and other social groups are among the most pioneering social groups of our country.
translation.ha: A yau ma daliban makarantun sakandaren mu a gefen daliban jami'oin mu, a gefen bangarori daban-daban na al'umma, a gefen dakarun basiji da sauran bangarori daban na al'umma, sun kasance wani bangare na al'ummar mu.

translation.en: Similarly, during the Sacred Defense Era, our students played a pioneering role.
translation.ha: A lokacin kallafaffen yaki ma, daliban makarantun sakandaren mu sun kasance a sahun farko.

translation.en: I am in contact with many families of our martyrs and arrange meetings with them. If you speak with these families and ask them how old their children were when they were martyred, they will tell you that their children were martyred at the age of 16, 17, 14.
translation.ha: A lokacin da kuka buga wa iyalan shahidai waya - ni dai na yi alaka da magana da adadi mai yawa na wadannan mutane - idan kuka tambaye su wadannan matasa na ku shekarunsu nawa ne a lokacin da suka yi shahada, za su gaya muku cewa shekaru sha shida, sha bakwai, sha hudu.

translation.en: What does this mean?
translation.ha: Me hakan yake nufi?

translation.en: It means that commitment, revolutionary spirit and sense of responsibility - which was rooted in insight - have become so strong that even high school students of this country enter the arena and lay down their lives. It means that even high school students of our country are prepared to give up all their youthful wishes in order to achieve great ideals and Islamic and divine goals in society.
translation.ha: Yana nufin jin nauyi a wuya, ruhin juyi da kuma jin cewa lalle akwai wani nauyi a wuyansu wanda hakan ya samo asali ne daga masaniya da basira. Hakan ne ya ke sanya wani saurayi da matashi na wannan al'umma su fito cikin fage, su bude kirjinsu, su yi watsi da fata na samartaka da suke da shi don dai su ga cewa an cimma manufa mai girma ta Ubangiji da Musulunci cikin wannan al'umma.

translation.en: The capture of the den of espionage is the last thing that the 13th of Aban represents.
translation.ha: Lamari na karshe da ya faru a ranar sha uku ga watan Aban shi ne kama shekar leken asiri (ofishin jakadancin Amurka) a Iran.

translation.en: On the occasion of the anniversary of Imam Khomeini's (r.a.) exile and the massacre of students, once again our youth entered the arena in the year 1358 and did something that astonished the world and brought America to its knees. This is the truth. It is not just a slogan.
translation.ha: A shekarar 1358 (1979) a daidai lokacin da ake tunawa da zagayowar shekarar da aka tura Imam gudun hijira da kuma shahadar daliban makarantun da suka yi shahada a wannan rana, a wannan karon ma wasu matasa ne suka shigo cikin fage ta yanayin da ya ba wa duniya mamaki sannan ya dunkufar da Amurka a kan gwuiwoyinta. Wannan shi ne hakikanin lamarin; wadannan ba take ba ne kawai.

translation.en: You should know that the day the den of spies was captured, the American government was several times more formidable and prestigious than today.
translation.ha: Ya kamata ku din nan ku san cewa a ranar da aka kama ofishin jakadancin Amurka (ofishin leken asirin Amurka) a nan Tehran, irin mutumci da ikon da Amurka take da shi ya ninninka irin wanda take da shi yau.

translation.en: America has lost its prestige in the world today, and different peoples are openly insulting and cursing America. It was not like this at that time. America used to be regarded as the world's top superpower at that time.
translation.ha: Kada ku kalli yau din inda matsayin Amurka ya yi kasa sosai, a fili al'ummomi suke fitowa suna bayyana adawa da kyamarsu ga Amurka. A wancan lokacin ba haka lamarin ya kasance ba; a wancan lokacin Amurka ta kasance ne kasa mai karfi na farko a duniya.

translation.en: Our young students - who were acting as the first line of defense in the Iranian nation's camp of resistance - courageously captured America's embassy, and those who were in the embassy were taken hostage.
translation.ha: Amma haka matasanmu masu jaruntaka da karfin gwuiwa wanda suka kasance su ne a sahun gaban gwagwarmyar al'ummar Iran suka kama ofishin jakadancin irin wannan Amurkan; suka tsare mutanen da suke wajen.

translation.en: Of course Imam Khomeini (r.a.) was kind enough to let some of them - like women - return to America after a short period of time. However, the main elements of the embassy stayed here for a long time.
translation.ha: Ko da yake Imam ya nuna tausayawa ta yadda bayan wani dan lokaci ya ba da umurnin a sake wadansu daga cikinsu - a matsayin misali matan da suke cikinsu - suka koma Amurkan; to amma su wadancan manyan mutanen da suke da hannu cikin abubuwan da ake gudanarwa a wajen kan suka ci gaba da zama na tsawon lokaci.

translation.en: This was also a great movement which undermined America's power in the world. In spite of all that power, America suddenly lost its respect in the eyes of the peoples of the world.
translation.ha: Wannan wani gagarumin yunkuri ne wanda ya girgiza irin karfin da Amurka take da shi a duniya; Amurka da irin wannan karfi da iko da take da shi zai ga shi kwatsam ta fadi kasa warwas a idanuwan al'ummomin duniya.

translation.en: The situation got so bad that the American President [President Jimmy Carter] resorted to a covert military attack to rescue the hostages.
translation.ha: Lamarin ya kai inda shugaban Amurka (na wancan lokacin) ya shirya wani harin soji na sirri tsakar dare a kan Iran da nufin ‘yanto wadannan mutane da aka yi garkuwa da su.

translation.en: The plan was to regroup in Tabas, go to Tehran, rescue the hostages and take them to America. But the famous event happened in Tabas, and Allah the Exalted destroyed their prestige.
translation.ha: Ta haka ne wannan lamari da ya yi fice na Tabas ya faru, Allah Madaukakin Sarki ya kwance musu zani a kasuwa, jiragen samansu suka kama da wuta, abin da ya tilasta musu gudu daga wajen.

translation.en: These are the events that the 13th of Aban represents.
translation.ha: Wadannan su ne lamurran da suka faru a ranar sha uku ga watan Aban.

translation.en: The 13th of Aban is a symbol. It contains many meanings, and these meanings are all lessons for us. We must keep these things in mind: American greed, corruption of the satanic Pahlavi regime and its dependence on America, firm resistance of the faith that depended on the insight of our magnanimous Imam and the people, presence of the young generation on the scene and the valor and boldness of the young revolutionary generation against America whose face had been made up to look formidable.
translation.ha: A saboda haka ranar sha uku ga watan Aban wata alama ce; wace take tattare da ma'anoni masu yawa a tattare da ita; wanda wadannan ma'anoni dukkaninsu darasi ne a gare mu; wajibi ne mu dinga tunawa da su: wato irin kwadayin da Amurka take da shi, irin dogaro dari bisa dari da gwamnatin dagutu ta kasar Iran ta wancan lokacin take da shi ga Amurka da kuma lalacewar da wannan gwamnatin ta yi, haka nan kuma da irin tsayin dakan da ya samo asali daga basirar Imamin mu mai girma da kuma mutane, kasantuwar matasa a fage da kuma irin jaruntaka da rashin tsoron matasan farko na juyin juya halin Musulunci a gaban irin iko da karfin da Amurka take da shi.

translation.en: These are all meanings that are embodied by the 13th of Aban.
translation.ha: Dukkanin wadannan abubuwan suna cikin wannan lamari na ranar 13 ga watan Aban.

translation.en: Therefore, the 13th of Aban is not just an insignificant name.
translation.ha: A saboda haka sha uku ga watan Aban ba wani lamari ne karami ba.

translation.en: Just think about it. Last year - the year 1388 - a limited number of unfortunate people took to the streets on the 13th of Aban and shouted slogans against the 13th of Aban in the vain hope that they would manage to smear this great occasion.
translation.ha: To a halin yanzu ku dan yi tunani ku gani; a shekarar da ta gabata - shekarar 1388 (2009) - a ranar sha uku ga watan Aban wasu ‘yan tsirarun mutane da suka sha kashi sun fito kan titunan Tehran suna rera taken nuna adawa da wannan rana ta sha uku ga watan Aban, ko za su iya dushe hasken wannan ranar.

translation.en: Of course they failed, and it was obvious that they were going to fail. But try to see what was behind their movement.
translation.ha: Ko shakka babu sun sha kashi, a fili yake cewa lalle za su sha kashi - wannan lamari ne da ke a fili - to amma ku duba ku ga abin da ke tattare da wannan yunkuri na su?

translation.en: What was it that they were opposed to?
translation.ha: Wani abu ne wadannan mutane suke fada da shi?

translation.en: In fact they were expressing their opposition to these meanings.
translation.ha: A hakikanin gaskiya suna fada ne da wannan ma'anar.

translation.en: They wanted to restore the impressive power of America. They wanted to disguise the hegemony and interference of America.
translation.ha: Suna so ne su sake dawo da irin ikon da Amurka take da shi ne. Suna so ne su yaye irin mulkin mallaka da tsoma bakin Amurka.

translation.en: They wanted to question the great movement of the Iranian nation against that great oppression.
translation.ha: Su na so ne su sanya alamun tambaya kan irin wannan gagarumin yunkuri na al'ummar Iran na fada da wannan zalunci mai girma.

translation.en: When one understands the meaning of the 13th of Aban, one realizes who and what these people - namely, the people who were trying to smear the 13th of Aban - were and what their goal was.
translation.ha: A lokacin da mutum ya fahimci ma'anar sha uku ga watan Aban, to a nan ne mutum zai iya fahimtar mutanen da a tunaninsu suke son lalata wannan rana ta sha uku ga watan Aban, sannan kuma mece ce manufarsu.

translation.en: It is necessary to think carefully.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne a yi tunani, a sanya ido sosai.

translation.en: I wish to tell you dear youth that today you are the vanguard of the movement of the Iranian nation.
translation.ha: Ina son in sanar da ku Ya ku matasa abin kauna; a yau din nan ku ne kuke a sahun gaban wannan yunkuri.

translation.en: The Iranian nation has set its sights on the peaks, and it is moving towards those peaks.
translation.ha: Al'ummar Iran dai ta damfara idanuwanta ga kololuwar da take son kaiwa, sannan kuma tana ci gaba da tafiya a kan wannan hanya ta isa ga wannan kololuwar.

translation.en: Both enemies and friends admit that the Iranian nation is swiftly moving towards the peaks.
translation.ha: Makiya da masoya duk sun yarda da cewa Iran cikin sauri tana ci gaba da tafiya wajen isa ga wannan koluluwar.

translation.en: Of course there is still a long way to go. We should avoid simplistic thoughts.
translation.ha: Ko da yake har ya zuwa yanzu akwai doguwar hanyar da ta rage a gabanmu; bai kamata a dauki lamarin da sauki ba.

translation.en: The path that lies ahead of us is not one that can be completed in one or two years. It is a long path.
translation.ha: Hanyar da take gabanmu ba wai hanya ce ta shekara guda ko biyu ba; hanya ce ta tsawon shekaru; to amma dai ana nan ana ci gaba da tafiya.

translation.en: It is not possible to achieve one's goal as long as one does not move forward.
translation.ha: Idan dai aka tsaya waje guda, to kuwa ba za a iya isa ga manufa ba.

translation.en: Nobody can achieve their goal by sitting around, daydreaming and yawning.
translation.ha: Babu wani mutumin da zai iya isa ga manufarsa ta hanyar zaman dirshan; wajbi ne a motsa kafa, a sami ci gaba ta hanyar tsayayyiyar azama.

translation.en: In scientific areas, in technological areas, in political areas, in different service areas and in construction areas, we have made notable achievements.
translation.ha: A fagen ilimi, a fagen fasaha, a fagen siyasa, a fagagen lamurra daban-daban, a fagen gina kasa, lalle mun sami ci gaba na a zo a gani.

translation.en: Fortunately, today the entire country is like a huge factory, and people are working, rendering services and doing construction work in every part of this huge factory. Iranian laborers acquire skill and gain experience, the people benefit from this and we become independent of the others.
translation.ha: A yau abin farin cikin shi ne cewa kasar nan ta zama tamkar wani kamfani ne mai girma wanda a kowane lungu nasa ma'aikata ne suke ta gudanar da aiki, suna ta hidima, suna ta ayyukan ci gaban kasa; su kansu ma'aikatan suna ta samun kwarewa haka nan kuma suna ta amfanuwa, haka nan kuma muna ta kara zama wadanda ba su dogara da wasu ba.

translation.en: In the past, if we wanted to construct a bridge in a city, we had to invite a European expert. If we wanted to construct a dam, we had to ask a number of foreign governments to do us a favor and build a dam for us.
translation.ha: A shekarun baya idan har (gwamnatin wancan lokacin) tana son ta gina wata gada a wannan gari, wajibi ne su dauko wani masani daga waje; idan sun a son gina wata madatsar tuwa, wajibi ne su mika kansu ga wadansu gwamnatoci ‘yan kasashen waje; ba a ma maganar manyan ayyuka masu tsananin wahala kan.

translation.en: The Iranian nation is moving forward.
translation.ha: Kasa tana ci gaba.

translation.en: But who are the people who are at the forefront of this movement?
translation.ha: To amma su waye suke a sahun gaba na wannan yunkuri na ci gaba?

translation.en: They are our youth, students and young seminarians.
translation.ha: Su ne dai wadannan matasa, daliban jami'a, daliban makarantu da kuma daliban makarantun addini.

translation.en: It is our youth who are leading this movement.
translation.ha: Matasa ne suke gudanar da wannan yunkuri na ci gaba.

translation.en: It is the youth who are the driving force behind this great movement, this colossal train that is moving forward in a steady manner.
translation.ha: Matasa su ne suke motsa wannan inji na ci gaba da wannan jirgin sama mai girma. Ko da yake wajibi ne a samu shugabanni da daraktoci da suke da kwarewa.

translation.en: Emphasizing the important role of the youth does not mean that we are allowed to disrespect old and experienced people.
translation.ha: Dogaro da matasa ba yana nufin mu yi watsi da mutanen da suke da kwarewa ta shekara da shekaru ba ne; a'a, su ma dai kasantuwarsu wajibi ne; to sai dai ba za a samu irin wannan ci gaba ba matukar dai babu matasa cikinsa.

translation.en: By Allah's favor, today the youth are present on the scene. This is great and very important. You dear youth are the vanguard of this movement - in political arenas, in economic arenas and in scientific arenas.
translation.ha: A yau da yardar Allah da kuma taimakonsa matasanmu suna cikin shiri, suna cikin fage; wannan lamari ne mai muhimmancin gaske da kuma girma. Ku din nan matasa ku ne a sahun gaba-gaba na wannan yunkuri; shin a fagen siyasa ne ko kuma a fagen tattalin arziki ko kuma a fagen ilimi.

translation.en: In the political arena, it was our youth who put an end to the fitna of the year 1388.
translation.ha: A fagen siyasa, ma matasanmu su ne suka kashe wutar fitinar da ta faru a shekara ta 2009 (bayan zaben shugaban kasar da aka gudanar a Iran).

translation.en: I would inform you that after the passage of a few years, international experts will be free to begin writing [about the fitna].
translation.ha: Ina sanar da ku cewa ku bari wadansu ‘yan shekaru su gushe tukun, a wancan lokaci za ku ga yadda su kansu wadannan alkaluma na kasa da kasa za su dinga rubuta hakikanin abubuwan da suka faru.

translation.en: I may not live long enough to see that happen, but you will. You will hear and read what a great plot was behind the fitna of the year 1388.
translation.ha: Mai yiyuwa ne a wancan lokacin ba na nan, to amma ku din nan kuna nan, za ku ji, za ku karanta irin gagarumin makircin da aka kulla a wannan shekara ta 2009.

translation.en: This fitna is very important.
translation.ha: Wannan fitina wani lamari ne mai muhimmancin gaske, manufarsu manufa ce mai ban mamaki; a hakikanin gaskiya suna so ne su kame kasar Iran.

translation.en: My dear ones, maintain your presence on the scene.
translation.ha: Ku ci gaba da zama a cikin sahu Ya ku abin kaunata! Kasar nan ta ku ce.

translation.en: The peaks that I told you about belong to you.
translation.ha: Wadannan manufofi da na fadi na ku ne.

translation.en: By Allah's favor, when you grow up, you will see these peaks and you will be a source of pride for your nation.
translation.ha: A lokacin da kuka kai shekarun kamala, da yardar Allah za ku ga wadannan manufofi sannan kuma za ku samar wa al'ummar ku da abin alfahari.

translation.en: The important point is that a nation should learn and become determined to move towards perfection.
translation.ha: Abin da ke da muhimmanci shi ne cewa wata al'umma ta koya sannan kuma ta saba da tafiya a kan tafarkin isa ga kamala da daukaka da kuma samun tsayayyiyar azama.

translation.en: This determination should never be undermined.
translation.ha: Bai kamata a sami wani lokaci da wannan azama za ta yi rauni ba.

translation.en: Fortunately, today the Islamic Republic and the honorable people who are supporting and safeguarding it are stronger than ever before.
translation.ha: Abin farin cikin shi ne cewa a yau jamhuriyar Musulunci da al'ummar mu masu girma wadanda suke ba wa wannan jamhuriya goyon baya suna ci gaba da bin wannan tafarki, sama da shekarun baya sun kasance masu karfi haka nan kuma suna da kwarewa sama da shekarun da suka gabata.

translation.en: Today our path is clearer than ever before, and we know what we are doing.
translation.ha: A yau hanyar mu sama da kowane lokaci tafi zama cikin haske sannan kuma mun san me muke yi.

translation.en: We know where we are going. We know our friends, and we know our enemies as well.
translation.ha: Mun san ina muke tafiya; mun fahimci masoyanmu haka nan kuma mun fahimci makiyanmu.

translation.en: Today the enemies of the Iranian nation have grown weaker.
translation.ha: Su kuwa makiyan al'ummar Iran a yau suna fama da rauni sama da shekarun da suka gabata, sun fi zama abin kyama da kuma fuskantar matsaloli.

translation.en: They are suffering from economic, political and various other kinds of problems. Of course this does not mean that we can safely rest and forget about everything. No, the enemy must never be underestimated.
translation.ha: Suna fuskantar matsalolin tattalin arziki, suna fuskantar matsaloli na siyasa, suna da matsaloli daban-daban. Ko da yake hakan ba yana nufin shi kenan sai mu kwantar da hankalin, mu share waje mu kwanta mu mance da komai ba ne; a'a, bai kamata a dinga ganin makiya a matsayin wadanda suka yi rauni wanda ba za su iya yin komai ba; wajibi ne a ko da yaushe mu dinga jin cewa makiya suna nan a bakin kofar mu; to sai dai yana da kyau a san cewa makiya ba za su iya amfani da hanyar da a baya suke amfani da ita ba.

translation.en: Our youth are vigilant. They are aware. The major portion of the young population of this country is at the service of these goals - in academic environments, in marketplaces, in schools and in seminaries.
translation.ha: Mafi yawa daga cikin matasanmu suna gudanar da wannan aiki ne don cimma wannan manufar; shin a fagen jami'a ne ko kuma a kasuwa ko a makarantu ko kuma a wajaje na ibada; matasa suna nan a dukkanin fagage.

translation.en: Dear God, make benevolence prevalent in this country.
translation.ha: Ka sanya kyawawan halaye su zamanto su ne masu iko a wannan kasar.

translation.en: Dear God, educate us the way Islam wants.
translation.ha: Ka tarbiyantar da mu, da dukkanin bangarori daban-daban na kasar nan cikin abubuwan da Musulunci ya ke so sannan kuma ya yarda da su.

translation.en: Dear God, help the Iranian nation achieve many victories.
translation.ha: Ka taimaka wa al'ummar Iran cikin dukkanin nasarorin da suke samu.

translation.en: Dear God, accept the prayers of the Imam of the Age (may our souls be sacrificed for his sake) and turn them into support for this nation.
translation.ha: Ka sanya addu'oin Waliyul Asr (rayukanmu su zamanto fansa a gare shi) su zamanto garkuwa ga wannan al'umma da kuma kasancewa tare da wannan al'umma sannan kuma abin amincewar Ubangijin Madaukakin Sarki.

translation.en: Leader Meets with Iraqi Prime Minister - Khamenei.ir
translation.ha: Jagora Imam Khamenei Ya Gana Da Firayi Ministan Iraki Nuri Al-Maliki

translation.en: Ayatollah Khamenei the Leader of the Islamic Revolution met Thursday morning with the Iraqi Prime Minister, Nouri Maliki.
translation.ha: A yau Alhamis (05-12-2013) ne Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci Ayatullah Sayyid Ali Khamenei ya gana da firayi ministan kasar Iraki Nuri al-Maliki wanda yake ci gaba da ziyara a Jamhuriyar Musulunci ta Iran.

translation.en: Speaking at the meeting, His Eminence referred to the importance of strengthening political and economic relations between Iran and Iraq, stressing: "The arena of increasing cooperation between Iran and Iraq in different areas is vast and there is no obstacle in the way of developing relations with Iraq and promoting regional cooperation with this country."
translation.ha: A yayin wannan ganawar, Jagoran juyin juya halin Musuluncin ya yi ishara da muhimmancin karfafa alaka ta siyasa da tattalin arziki tsakanin kasashen Iran da Iraki inda ya ce: Lalle akwai fagage masu yawa da za a iya fadada alakar da ke tsakanin kasashen biyu. A saboda haka babu wani abin da zai iya hana fadada alaka da kasar Iraki da kuma karfafa aiki tare tsakanin kasashen wannan yankin.

translation.en: The Leader of the Islamic Revolution confirmed the statements of the Iraqi Prime Minister about negotiations between Iran and Iraq on strengthening economic, political and scientific relations between the two countries, further reiterating: "The scientific growth of Iran has been outstanding during the recent years and sharing these scientific experiences with Iraq can be an important step towards cooperation between the two countries."
translation.ha: Haka nan kuma yayin da yake kara jaddada abin da firayi ministan kasar Irakin ya fadi dangane da tattaunawar da suka yi da jami'an gwamnatin Iran musamman kan hanyoyin da za a karfafa alakar da ke tsakanin kasashen biyu a fagagen tattalin arziki, siyasa da ilimi, Ayatullah Khamenei cewa ya yi: A hakikanin gaskiya Iran ta samu gagarumin ci gaba a fagen ilimi cikin ‘yan shekarun bayan nan. A saboda fagen musayen irin wadannan kwarewar da Iran ta samu ga kasar Iraki, yana iya zama wani fage mai muhimmanci da kasashen biyu za su iya aiki tare.

translation.en: Ayatollah Khamenei stated that the performance of the Iraqi administration has been positive and added: "The measures that you have adopted for your country are valuable ones and Of course, the needs of Iraq are many."
translation.ha: Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci ya bayyana farin cikinsa da irin ayyukan da gwamnatin ta Iraki take aikatawa inda ya ce: Yunkurin da a yau ka yi wa kasarka, lalle wani yunkuri ne mai kimar gaske, duk kuwa da cewa bukatar kasar Iraki ta dara abin da aka yi din.

translation.en: Prime Minister Maliki thanked the government of the Islamic Republic of Iran for its cooperation and expressed hope that negotiations in Tehran will lead to more cooperation between Iran and Iraq in different areas.
translation.ha: Shi ma a nasa bangaren, firayi ministan kasar Irakin Nuri Al-Maliki ya nuna godiyarsa dangane da irin goyon bayan da Jamhuriyar Musulunci ta Iran take ba wa kasar Iraki yana mai fatan yarjejeniyoyin da za a cimma a yayin wannan ziyarar tasa za su share fagen karfafa alakar da ke tsakanin kasashen biyu a bangarori daban-daban.

translation.en: Ayatollah Khamenei’s Message to Hajj Pilgrims - 2011 - Khamenei.ir
translation.ha: Sakon Jagora Ga Maniyyata Hajjin Bana (1432-2011)

translation.en: In the Name of Allah, the All-Beneficent, the All-Merciful
translation.ha: Da Sunan Allah Mai Rahama Mai Jin Kai

translation.en: All praise belongs to Allah, the Lord of the Worlds, and blessings and greetings be upon the Master of the creatures, Muhammad al-Mustafa and his immaculate family and his chosen companions.
translation.ha: Dukkan godiya ta tabbata ga Allah Ubangijin talikai.

translation.en: The spiritual spring of Hajj has arrived with its freshness, purity and God-given grandeur and majesty, gathering again the faithful and eager hearts like butterflies encircling the Ka'bah of divine unity and Islamic solidarity. Camped at Makkah and Mina, Arafat and Mash'ar are the fortunate human beings who, having responded to the call of â€œproclaim the Hajj to all the peopleâ€, are being honored with the hospitality of the clement and munificent Lord.
translation.ha: A halin yanzu dai lokacin aikin hajji da dukkanin sabuntaka da tsarki da girma da daukaka da yake da shi ya yi, sannan kuma zukatan muminai masu tsananin shauki suna nan tamkar malam buda littafi suna ta zagaya Dakin Ka'aba, wannan daki na tauhidi da hadin kai. Garin Makka da Mina da Mash'ar da Arafa wajaje ne na mutanen da suka sami nasara amsa kiran-kur'ani da ke cewa: "Kuma ka yi yekuwa ga mutane da wajabcin Hajji..." sannan kuma suka sami shiga cikin bakuntaka ta Ubangiji Ma'abocin gafara da baiwa.

translation.en: Here is the blessed House and the source of guidance from which the manifest divine signs radiated and the canopy of safety was set up to cast its universal shade.
translation.ha: Wannan wajen shi ne dai dakin nan mai albarka kuma cibiyar shiriya wanda daga nan ne bayyanannun ayoyin Ubangiji suka sauka kuma suka baza lemar aminci akan kowa da kowa.

translation.en: Continuously refresh within your hearts the memory of that father who, in willing compliance, led his Ishmael to the scene of sacrifice, thus showing us the clear path of attaining the friendship of the Glorious Lord and the manner of traversing it with a resolve infused with faith and an intent imbued with sincerity.
translation.ha: Ku dinga tunatar da zukatanku wancan mahaifin wanda cikin biyayya da mika kai ya dauki dansa Isma'ila zuwa ga wajen yanka (wajen sadaukarwa), sannan kuma ku yi hanzari a tafiya cikin wannan tafarkin bayyananne wanda ya share mana fagensa domin kaiwa ga samun yardar Ubangiji mai daukaka, kuma ku ba da himma irin ta muminai da tsarkin niyya a wannan tafarkin.

translation.en: The station of Abraham is one among these manifest signs.
translation.ha: Makam Ibrahim daya ne daga cikin wadannan bayyanannun ayoyi.

translation.en: The footprint of Abraham, peace be upon him, by the side of Holy Ka'bah is only a symbol of the station of Abraham.
translation.ha: Gurbin kafafun Annabi Ibrahim (amincin Allah ya tabbata a gare shi) wanda ya ke kusa da Dakin Ka'aba mai girma, shi ne kadai abin da ya ke nuni da inda Ibrahim din ya tsaya.

translation.en: The station of Abraham is his station of dedication and self-sacrifice, his fortitude and resistance to personal desires and fatherly feelings as well as against the domination of kufr [lack of Islamic faith], polytheism and Nimrod, the tyrant of the time.
translation.ha: Makam Ibrahim, waje ne da ya ke nuni da tsarkin niyya da kuma sadaukar da kansa; waje ne da ya ke nuni da turjjiyar da ya yi wajen fada da son zuciya da kuma nuna kauna irin ta uba haka nan kuma wuri ne da ya ke nuni da tsayin dakarsa wajen fuskantar danniya da kafirci da shirka da kuma ikon Namarudun zamaninsa.

translation.en: Today these two paths of deliverance lie open before each of us, individuals belonging to the Muslim Ummah.
translation.ha: A halin yanzu dai dukkanin wadannan hanyoyi guda biyu na samun tsira a bude su ke a gaban dukkanin daidaikunmu al'ummar musulmi.

translation.en: Determination, courage and firmness of resolve on the part of each one of us, can advance us towards the same goals to which mankind has been invited by the divine messengers from Adam to the Seal of the Prophets, with the promise of dignity and felicity, in the world and the hereafter, for those who tread this path.
translation.ha: Himma da jaruntaka da jajurcewar da kowane daya daga cikin mu zai yi, suna iya kai mu ga wadannan manufofi da manzanninUbangiji tun daga kan (annabi) Adamu har zuwa ga Cikamakin Annabawa suke kiran mu zuwa gare su, da kuma alkawarin da suka yi na samun sa'ada a duniya da lahira ga wadanda suka riki wannan tafarkin.

translation.en: It would be appropriate for Hajj pilgrims at this great assembly of the Islamic Ummah to address the most important issues of the Islamic world.
translation.ha: A wajen wannan gagarumin taro na al'ummar musulmi, yana da kyau alhazai su maida hankali akan muhimman batutuwan da suka shafi duniyar musulmi.

translation.en: The uprisings and revolutions in some of the important Islamic countries are the most important among these issues.
translation.ha: A halin yanzu dai mafi muhimmancin wadannan lamurra shi ne yunkuri da juyin juya halin da suka faru a wasu daga cikin kasashen musulmi masu muhimmanci.

translation.en: The events that have taken place in the Islamic world in the interval between the previous and the current Hajj pilgrimage can transform the destiny of the Islamic Ummah and forebode a bright future rich with dignity as well as progress, material and spiritual.
translation.ha: Tsakanin hajjin bara da na bana, wasu lamurra sun faru a kasashen musulmi da za su iya haifar da sauyi cikin makomar al'ummar musulmi da kuma samar da makoma da take cike da daukaka da ci gaba na duniya da lahira a gare su.

translation.en: Dictators and corrupt taghut, allied with foreign powers, have been overthrown in Egypt, Tunisia and Libya, and the stormy waves of popular uprising in some other countries threaten to bring down and destroy the castles of wealth and power.
translation.ha: A kasashen Masar da Tunusiya da Libiya an kawar da manyan dawagitai kuma gurbatattu da su ke ‘yan amshin shata daga kan karagar mulki, sannan a wasu kasashen na daban guguwar yunkurin al'umma tana ci gaba da barazana da rugujewar fadojin-masu takama da- dukiya da karfi.

translation.en: This new chapter in the history of our Ummah reveals certain truths which are all manifest divine signs and teach us vital lessons.
translation.ha: Wannan sabon shafi da aka bude shi cikin tarihin al'ummar mu, yana bayanin wata hakika ce da ta ke a matsayin aya daga cikin bayyanannun ayoyin Ubangiji, sannan kuma da karantar da mu darussa masu rayarwa.

translation.en: These truths should be taken into account by Muslim nations in all their calculations.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne al'ummar musulmi su yi aiki da dukkanin wadannan abubuwa cikin dukkanin lissafinsu.

translation.en: First, a young generation has emerged from among these nations after decades of political subjugation to foreign powers, which with admirable self-confidence, welcomes danger, stands up to confront the dominant powers, and is determined to transform the status quo.
translation.ha: Na farko shi ne cewa ya samo asali ne daga zukatan al'ummomin da shekaru aru-aru suka kasance karkashin iko da mulkin baki ‘yan kasashen waje, amma a halin yanzu an sami bayyanar wasu matasa wadanda ta hanyar dogaro da kai da tarar aradu da ka da kuma tinkarar wadannan masu karfin sun yi himma da kuma sauya wannan yanayin.

translation.en: Second, despite the authority and efforts of secular rulers and their overt and covert measures to curtail the influence of religion in these countries, Islam â€“ with its evident and impressive presence â€“ has become the guiding principle of popular expression and sentiment.
translation.ha: Abu na biyu kuma shi ne, duk da danniya da kuma kokarin shugabannin da babu ruwansu da addini da kuma kokarinsu na fili da na boye na sanya kyamar addini a wadannan kasashen, to amma Musulunci ya sami gindin zama a cikin zukata da kuma shiryar da su sannan kuma ya zamanto abin ambato a bakunan miliyoyin al'ummomi da kuma sanya kumaji da fata cikin rayuwarsu.

translation.en: The mosques and minarets, Islamic slogans and calls of â€œAllahu Akbarâ€, all are clear indications of this fact and the recent Tunisian elections provide decisive evidence for this claim.
translation.ha: Masallatai da wajajen kiran salla da kabbarori da take irin na Musulunci, dukkanin wadannan abubuwa ne na fili da suke nuni da wannan hakika, sannan kuma zaben baya-bayan nan na kasar Tunusiya dalili ne da ke tabbatar da wannan batu da babu wanda zai yi musun hakan.

translation.en: Without doubt, free elections in any Islamic country will rarely result in anything other than what happened in Tunisia.
translation.ha: Ko shakka babu a duk wata kasa ta Musulunci da aka gudanar da 'yantaccen zabe, to babu wani sakamakon da za a gani in ba irin wanda ya faru a kasar Tunusiya ba.

translation.en: As this year's events have revealed to all, God Almighty has placed such a force in the resolve and determination of nations that no power whatsoever can withstand it.
translation.ha: Wani abu na daban shi ne cewa abubuwan da suka faru a wannan shekara gudar sun tabbatar wa kowa cewa Allah Ma'abocin karfi da daukaka Ya sanya wani irin karfi cikin azama da nufi na al'ummomi da babu wani karfi da ya isa ya yi fada da shi.

translation.en: With this God-given power nations can change their destiny and receive divine help. Furthermore, during the recent decades arrogant powers, led by the United States, had reduced the regional states to a condition of subjugation through their political and security tactics. They imagined that they had opened up an obstacle-free highway for their rising economic, cultural and political domination over this sensitive part of the world.
translation.ha: Al'ummar da Allah ya yi mata baiwa da irin wannan karfin za ta iya sauya makomarta da kuma tabbatar da taimakon Ubangiji a gare ta. Wani abu kuma shi ne cewa gwamnatoci ma'abota girman kai karkashin jagorancin Amurka, duk kuwa da cewa tsawon shekaru aru-aru sun yi amfani da yaudara ta siyasa da soji wajen tilasta wa gwamnatocin wannan yankin mika musu kai suna masu zaton cewa sun share fagen samun iko na tattalin arziki da al'adu da siyasa a wannan yanki mai matukar muhimmanci na duniya, sai ga shi a halin yanzu a karon farko sun zamanto abin kyama da kiyayyar al'ummomin wannan yankin.

translation.en: Certainly, the political orders to emerge from these revolutions will never submit to the disgraceful inequalities of the past, and the political geography of the region will be determined by the nations in pursuance of their dignity and complete independence.
translation.ha: Ko shakka babu cewa gwamnatocin da za a kafa sakamakon wadannan juyin ba za su taba mika kai ga irin wulakanci na shekarun baya ba, kuma wannan yankin a siyasance zai kasance ne a hannun al'ummomi wajen tabbatar da daukaka da 'yancinsu na gaba daya.

translation.en: In addition, the cunning nature of the hypocritical Western powers has become all too apparent for the people of these countries.
translation.ha: Wani abin kuma shi ne cewa halin murguda gaskiya da munafunci na kasashen yammaci ya fito fili ga al'ummomin wadannan kasashen.

translation.en: The United States and Europe made their utmost efforts to retain their pawns in Egypt, Tunisia and Libya, each one in a particular way. But when the resolve of the nations prevailed over their will, they gave an insincere smile of friendship to the triumphant people.
translation.ha: Amurka da kasashen Turai sun yi dukkanin abin da za su iya wajen tabbatar da 'yan korensu a kasashen Masar da Tunusiya da Libiya, to amma a lokacin da azamar al'ummomi ta yi galaba kan abin da suke so, sai suka koma ga shimfidar fuska ta karya ga wadannan mutane da suka yi nasara.

translation.en: There are other valuable facts and manifest divine signs embedded in the regional events of the past year, which are not hard to discern for reflective minds.
translation.ha: Akwai wadansu abubuwa masu kima da kuma ayoyi na Ubangiji bayyanannu da su ke kunshe a cikin abubuwan da suke faru a shekara guda a wannan yankin sama da wadanda aka ambata, wadanda ba abubuwa ne da za su gagari ma'abota tunani ganinsu da kuma fahimtarsu ba.

translation.en: The entire Islamic Ummah and especially the revolutionary nations nevertheless stand in need of two basic elements:
translation.ha: To amma duk da haka, dukkanin al'ummomin musulmi musamman ma al'ummomin da suka yi juyi suna bukatuwa da wasu abubuwa guda biyu na tushe:

translation.en: First is continuation of resistance and avoidance of weakness in resolve.
translation.ha: Na Farko: Shi ne su ci gaba da tsayin daka da kuma nesantar duk wani abin da zai raunana tsayayyiyar azamarsu.

translation.en: In the Qur'an, the divine summons to the greatest messenger, may God bless him and his family, is: â€œBe steadfast, just as you have been commandedâ€”[you] and whoever has turned [to God] with youâ€”and do not overstep the bounds (11:112)â€ and â€œBe steadfast, just as you have been commanded (42:15).â€ Prophet Moses, peace be upon him, is quoted as telling his people: â€˜Turn to God for help and be patient.
translation.ha: Allah Madaukakin Sarki cikin Alkur'ani mai girma ya yi wa Annabinsa (tsira da amincin Allah su tabbata a gare shi) umurni da cewa: "Sai ka daidaitu kamar yadda aka umurce ka, kai da wadanda suka tuba tare da kai, kuma kada ku yi shisshigi" (Suratu Hud 11:112) Da kuma cewa "Saboda wannan sai ka yi kira, kuma ka tsaya daidai kamar yadda aka umurce ka" (Suratush Shura 42:15) haka nan kuma a cikin Alkur'ani din ta bakin annabi Musa (amincin Allah ya tabbata a gare shi) yana cewa: "Musa ya ce wa mutanensa, 'Ku nemi taimakon Allah, ku kuma yi hakuri.

translation.en: The earth indeed belongs to God, and He gives its inheritance to whomever He wishes of His servants, and the outcome will be in favor of the God-fearing.'
translation.ha: Hakika kasa ta Allah ce, Yana gadar da ita ga wanda Ya so daga bayinsa. Kyakkyawan karshe kuwa yana ga masu tsoron Allah".
(Suratul A'araf 7:128)

translation.en: At present, the most significant example of fearing God for the nations that have risen up is to refrain from halting their auspicious movement and avoid being diverted by the achievements of this phase.
translation.ha: Hakika babbar alamar tsoron Allah ga al'ummomi masu yunkuri a wannan lokacin shi ne kada su dakatar da wannan yunkuri na su sannan kuma kada su shagaltar da kansu da irin nasarorin da aka samu din a halin yanzu.

translation.en: This is the important part of piety and fear of God whose possessors are rewarded with the favorable outcome.
translation.ha: Wannan shi ne bangare mai muhimmanci na wannan tsoron Allah wanda masu shi za su kai ga wannan alkawari na samun 'kyakkyawan karshe'.

translation.en: Second is vigilance with regard to the plots and tricks of the arrogant international powers who have suffered a setback from these uprisings and revolutions.
translation.ha: Na biyu: Yin taka tsantsan a gaban yaudara da makircin ma'abota girman kai na duniya da kuma manyan kasashen da suka cutu daga wadannan yunkuri da juyi.

translation.en: They will not sit by idly and they will re-enter the arena with all their political, financial and security capabilities in order to re-establish their influence and control over these countries.
translation.ha: Lalle ba za su zuba ido haka kawai suna kallo ba, sannan kuma za su yi amfani da dukkanin karfi na siyasa da soji da kudi don sake dawo da irin iko da karfin da suke da shi a wadannan kasashe.

translation.en: Their tools are bribery, threats and deceit.
translation.ha: Kayan aikin su shi ne kwadaitarwa da barazana da yaudara.

translation.en: The vigilant eyes of the youth, intellectuals and religious scholars should be very watchful.
translation.ha: Lalle wajibi ne farkakkun idanuwan matasa da masana da malaman addini su zamanto masu lura ainun.

translation.en: The biggest danger posed by the camp of kufr and the arrogant powers lies in its intervention and influence over the structures of the new political orders in these countries.
translation.ha: Babban hatsarin (da ke fuskantar wadannan yunkuri) shi ne tsoma baki da kuma yin tasirin sansanin kafirci da girman kan duniya cikin yanayin sabon tsarin siyasa a wadannan kasashen.

translation.en: They will do their utmost to see that the new systems do not take on an Islamic and democratic identity.
translation.ha: Za su yi amfani da dukkan karfin da suke da shi wajen ganin sabbin tsarin da za a kafa ba za su riki tsari na Musulunci da kuma ra'ayin mutane ba.

translation.en: All the concerned people in these countries and all those who cherish their homeland's honor, dignity and progress should strive to ensure that the Islamic and democratic character of the new order is completely secured.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne dukkanin masu kishi a wadannan kasashe da kuma wadanda suke fatan ganin kasarsu ta sami daukaka da mutunci da ci gaba, su ba da himma wajen ganin an tabbatar da tsarin Musulunci wanda kuma zai ginu bisa ra'ayin mutane, ta hanya mafi cika.

translation.en: In this regard, the role of the constitutions will be prominent.
translation.ha: Lalle rawar da kundin tsarin mulki zai taka a wannan fagen rawa ce mai girma.

translation.en: National unity and official recognition of sectarian, tribal and ethnic differences are a precondition for future success.
translation.ha: Hadin kai na kasa da kuma yarda da sabani na mazhaba da kabila, wani sharadi ne na nasarar da za a samu a gaba.

translation.en: The valiant revolutionary nations of Egypt, Tunisia and Libya, as well as other awakened and combatant nations, should know that the sole means of deliverance from the oppression and guile of the United States and other Western hubristic powers is to establish a global balance of power conducive to their interests.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne jaruman mutanen Masar da Tunusiya da Libiya da sauran al'ummomin da suka farka kuma masu gwagwarmaya su san da cewa hanya guda kawai ta samun 'yancinsu daga zalunci da makircin Amurka da sauran ma'abota girman kai na kasashen yammaci ita ce su sama wa kansu karfi da zai kare musu manufofinsu.

translation.en: Muslims must put themselves on equal footing with major world powers in order to be able to seriously resolve their problems with the world devourers.
translation.ha: Matukar dai al'ummar musulmi suna son su magance matsalar da suke fuskanta daga wajen mashaya jinin duniya, to wajibi ne su sama wa kansu karfin da zai yi gwagwagwa da na masu karfi na duniya.

translation.en: This cannot be achieved except with the cooperation, understanding and solidarity of Islamic countries.
translation.ha: Ba kuma za sa sami kaiwa ga hakan ba sai ta hanyar hadin kai da aiki kafada da kafada tsakanin kasashen musulmi.

translation.en: This was the unforgettable testament of the great Imam Khomeini.
translation.ha: Wannan kuwa ita ce wasiyyar da ba za a taba mancewa da ita ta marigayi mai girma Imam Khumaini.

translation.en: For months, the United States and NATO dropped bombs upon the heads of the Libyan people using Gaddafi, a vicious dictator, as an excuse.
translation.ha: Wata da watanni Amurka da kungiyar NATO suka yi suna ta ruwan bama-bamai a kan al'ummar kasar Libiya da sunan kokarin kifar da Gaddafi, wannan lalatacce dan mulkin kama-karya.

translation.en: Gaddafi was the same person who was considered as their close friend before the brave uprising of the Libyan people. They used to coddle him, steal the wealth of Libya through his hands and shake or kiss his hand in order to deceive him.
translation.ha: Alhali kuwa shi Gaddafi kafin wannan yunkuri na al'ummar kasar Libiya yana daga cikin abokansu na kurkusa, suna rungumarsa; da taimakonsa suke sace dukiyar kasar Libiya, sannan kuma suna sumbantar hannayensa a kokarin da suke yi na yaudararsa ...bayan mikewar mutane, sai suka mayar da shi a matsayin abin da za su fake da shi wajen lalata kasar Libiyan gaba daya.

translation.en: What government could stop the tragic massacre of the Libyan people and destruction of the country at the hands of NATO?
translation.ha: Shin wace gwamnati ce ta iya hana kungiyar NATO zubar da jinin mutanen Libiya da kuma lalata kasar?

translation.en: Until the claws and fangs of the bloodthirsty and barbaric Western powers are not broken, such dangers will remain conceivable for Islamic countries.
translation.ha: Matukar dai ba a raba manyan kasashe mashaya jini da rashin imani na yammaci da karfin da su ke da shi ba, to lalle kuwa wannan hatsari da zaluncin zai ci gaba da yawo a kan kasashen musulmi.

translation.en: Safety from such dangers is not possible except by turning the Islamic world into a powerful pole.
translation.ha: Babu wata hanyar tsira daga hakan kuwa da ta wuce kafa wani hadin gwuiwa mai karfi na duniyar musulmi.

translation.en: Today the West, the United States and Zionism are weaker than ever before.
translation.ha: A yau dai kasashen yammaci da Amurka da sahyoniyanci sun yi rauni sama da yadda suka kasance a baya.

translation.en: Economic troubles, successive failures in Afghanistan and Iraq, deep-running and widening public protests in America and other Western countries, the struggles and sacrifices of the people of Palestine and Lebanon, the daring popular uprisings in Yemen, Bahrain and some other countries under American influenceâ€”all these are significant signs for the Islamic Ummah, especially for the emergent revolutionary nations.
translation.ha: Suna cikin tsaka mai wuya na tattalin arziki, ga kashin da suke sha daya bayan daya a kasashen Afghanistan da Iraki, haka nan kuma nuna rashin amincewar al'umma mai tsanani a Amurka da sauran kasashen yammaci wanda a kullum sai dada karuwa suke yi, gwagwarmaya da kuma sadaukarwar mutanen Palastinu da Labanon, da yukurin mutanen Yamen da Bahrain mai cike da jarunta da kuma sauran kasashen da Amurka take da bakin fada cikinsu, dukkanin wadannan suna dauke da wata bishara mai girma ga al'ummar musulmi musamman ga al'ummomin kasashen da aka gudanar da juyi na baya-bayan nan.

translation.en: Faithful men and women throughout the Islamic world, particularly in Egypt, Tunisia and Libya should make the most of this opportunity in order to create an international Islamic power bloc.
translation.ha: Yana da kyau maza da mata muminai a duk fadin kasashen musulmi musamman a kasashen Masar da Tunusiya da Libiya su yi amfani da wannan dama wajen kafa wani karfi na Musulunci na kasa da kasa.

translation.en: The vanguard and the elite of the uprisings should place their trust in Almighty God and with reliance on His promise of help, adorn the new chapter in the history of the Islamic Ummah with their lasting achievements, thus earning God's approval and fulfilling the prerequisites of His help.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne zababbun cikin al'umma da jagororin wadannan yunkuri su dogara da Allah Madaukakin Sarki da kuma alkawarin taimakonsa, su kuma kawata sabon shafi na tarihin al'ummar musulmi da aka bude da dawwamammun ababen alfaharinsu, wanda zai sa a sami yardar Allah da share fagen taimakonsa.

translation.en: Peace be upon God's righteous servants.
translation.ha: Amincin Allah ya tabbata ga bayinsa salihai.

translation.en: 5 Aban, 1390
27 October, 2011
translation.ha: 27, Oktoba, 2011

translation.en: The following is the full text of an interview with Ayatollah Sayyid Ali Khamenei, the Leader of the Islamic Revolution, before being discharged from hospital following his operation on September 8, 2014.
translation.ha: Hirar Jagora Imam KhameneiBayan Sallamarsa Daga Asibiti

translation.en: Interviewer: Salamun alaykum
translation.ha: Dan Jarida: Salamun Alaikudm

translation.en: Leader: Salamun alaykum and wa rahmatullah
translation.ha: Jagora: Salamun alaikum wa rahmatullah.

translation.en: Interviewer: Thank God you are leaving hospital after a week since the operation.
translation.ha: Dan Jarida: Godiya ta tabbata ga Allah, bayan mako guda da aikin tiyata, a halin yanzu ga shi kana shirin barin asibiti.

translation.en: Our enthusiastic people and enthusiastic Muslim people throughout the world would like to hear about your condition and the last moments that you are in hospital.
translation.ha: Al'ummarmu da sauran al'ummomin kasashen musulmi da masoyanka a duk fadin duniya, za su so jin yanayin jikinka da kuma ranakun karshe-karshen na zamanka a asibiti.

translation.en: Leader: In the Name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful.
translation.ha: Jagora: Da Sunan Allah Mai Rahama Mai Jin Kai.

translation.en: Thankfully, the operation and the following procedures were conducted in the best possible way.
translation.ha: Alhamdu lillahi an gudanar da tiyatar da dukkanin ayyukan share fagen hakan da kuma abubuwan da suka biyo baya cikin mafi kyawun yanayi.

translation.en: Now, I am going home with complete health.
translation.ha: A zahiri dai ga shi zan koma gida cikin koshin lafiya.

translation.en: My body is healthy, but my heart and my soul feel a heavy burden because of the considerable amount of kindness and sympathy that was shown to me during this time.
translation.ha: Jiki na dai lafiya, to amma zuciya da ruhina, cike suke da nauyin irin gagarumar so da kauna da tausayawar da aka nuna min tsawon wannan lokaci.

translation.en: I really feel a heavy burden on my shoulders because of the all the kindness that people from different social backgrounds showed me.
translation.ha: A hakikanin gaskiya kafadar mutum ta yi nauyin gaske saboda irin wannan kaunar da mutane - bangarori daban-daban na mutane - suka nuna min.

translation.en: There was not a day when hundreds and thousands of kind and sympathetic messages from people were not showered on the heart and soul of this humble person like the life-giving drops of rain that breathe new life into the heart of a dead person or an infertile piece of land.
translation.ha: Babu wata rana da za ta gushe, ba tare da daruruwa ko kuma ma dubban sakonnin nuna kauna, tamkar ruwan saman da ke sake raya zuciyar duk wani matacce ko kuma wata kasa da ta bushe ba, sun iso gare ni ba.

translation.en: These messages were delivered by the honorable ulama, maraaje, outstanding personalities, the outstanding managers of the country and people from different social backgrounds.
translation.ha: (Wadannan sakonni dai sun fito ne daga wajen mutane daban-daban); kama daga malamai masu girma, maraja'ai masu girma, jami'an gwamnati, manyan daraktocin kasa, mutane daga bangarori daban-daban.

translation.en: In any case, I am physically healthy and, thankfully, I am in good spirits as well but I am humbled at all this kindness and sympathy that was shown to me during the past week by different sides and groups including politicians, guilds, people from different social backgrounds, artists and athletes.
translation.ha: Ala kulli hal, lalle na sami sauki, a bangaren ruhi ma alhamdu lillahi ina cikin nishadi, sai dai ina jin nauyin irin wannan so da kauna da aka nuna min tsawon wannan mako guda daga bangarori daban-daban, daga kungiyoyi daban-daban - na daga ‘yan siyasa, daga bangarori daban-daban na al'umma, daga wajen masu ayyukan fasaha da ‘yan wasa.

translation.en: A number of them showed their sympathy and kindness by writing to me or by delivering messages through electronic media.
translation.ha: Dukkaninsu suka nuna min so da kauna, ko suka rubuto ko kuma aka watsa a kafafen watsa labarai na internet.

translation.en: I hope that Allah the Exalted will reward all of them.
translation.ha: Ina rokon Allah Madaukakin Sarki da ya saka musu gaba daya da alheri.

translation.en: As for the issue of the medical process, one point is that I would like to thank the physicians and those who were involved in the medical process.
translation.ha: Amma dangane da batun likitoci da aikin likitanci; wani lamarin shi ne cewa lalle ina gode wa wadannan likitoci da dukkanin wadanda suke da hannu cikin lamarin maganin da aka min.

translation.en: However, what is more important than this word of thanks is that I am really proud of our physicians.
translation.ha: To wannan dai wani nauyi ne na wajibi da babu kokwanto cikinsa; lalle sun gudanar da aikinsu da kyau sosai; to amma sama da godiyar, shi ne cewa lalle ni ina alfahari da wadannan likitoci na mu.

translation.en: I am proud that our dear Iran is at this level of medical capability. It is necessary for our people to really feel proud of this large number of physicians - including surgeons, internists, all those who people who offer medical services and nurses.
translation.ha: Ina alfahari da cewa kasarmu mai girma Iran, a fagen aikin likitanci, ta kai wani matsayi da al'ummar Iran za su yi alfahari da hakan saboda irin yawan likitoci, malaman fida, da sauran nau'oi na likitoci na bangarori daban-daban, da malaman jiyya da ake da su.

translation.en: Thankfully, we have this great source of wealth: this great source of human wealth in one of the most fundamental and vital areas of the life of a society and individuals which is the area of health.
translation.ha: Lalle wajibi ne mu yi alfahari da cewa alhamdu lillahi muna da irin wannan gagarumin arzikin; gagarumin arziki na mutane a daya daga cikin mafi muhimmancin bangarori na rayuwar mutane wanda shi ne bangaren kiwon lafiya.

translation.en: That is to say, I have always had such an outlook towards our medical society. But when one is treated by these physicians, one's information about them becomes certainty. When we are treated by these people, we tangibly feel that we have a great source of wealth comprised of our dear physicians.
translation.ha: Lalle da man na san hakan, wato a koda yaushe wannan ita ce mahanga ta dangane da bangaren likitoci da kiwon lafiya; to amma a lokacin da mutum ya sami kansa a karkashin kulawarsu, sannan ya ga irin yanayin aikinsu, to a nan ne mutum zai kara samun tabbaci da sakankancewa. Mutum zai ji a jikinsa cewa lalle muna da gagarumin arziki na kasantuwar wadannan likitoci masu girman.

translation.en: And I hope that Allah the Exalted will reward all of them.
translation.ha: Ina rokon Allah Madaukakin Sarki da ya saka musu da alheri.

translation.en: Of course, as I said, our appreciation for them cannot be expressed with these few words of thanks.
translation.ha: Na'am, kamar yadda na fadi godiyarmu gare su ba za ta takaita kawai da wadannan kalmomi biyu zuwa uku ba ne.

translation.en: I told Dr. Marandi - he took the trouble and accepted the responsibility of leading the medical team - that he should thank them on my part with whatever ways and words he knows. I would like to raise a point which is not related to the issue of hospitalization and my health condition.
translation.ha: Na gaya wa Dakta (Ali Ridha) Marandi - wanda shi ne ya dauki nauyin jagorantar tawagar likitocin da suka yi min aiki; kamar yadda ya saba nuna mana kauna - na gaya masa cewa ya isar da sakon godiya ta, ta duk hanyar da ya ga ta dace ga wadannan likitoci abin kauna.

translation.en: During the past two, three days, I had a source of entertainment which was listening to the statements of the Americans on the issue of DAESH [ISIS] and fighting against it.
translation.ha: Wannan farin cikin kuwa saboda maganganun Amurkawa ne dangane da kungiyar Da'ish (ISIS) da kuma fada da ita; maganganu ne na holoko da wasa da hankali don cimma wata manufa kawai.

translation.en: One of the issues which was really a source of amusement for me was that the American secretary of state and the girl who stands there and talks, openly said, "We will not invite Iran to the coalition against DAESH".
translation.ha: Daga cikin abubuwan da suka faranta min rai shi ne yadda na ga sakataren wajen Amurka, haka nan ita ma wannan yarinyar - wato kakakinsu - a fili suke fadin cewa ba za mu gayyaci Iran cikin hadin gwiwan fada da Da'ish din ba!

translation.en: First, what honor is greater than the fact that America is disappointed with us and does not want us to participate in a wrong collective task.
translation.ha: Da farko dai lalle wannan babban abin alfahari ne a gare mu a ce Amurka ta yanke kauna sannan kuma ba ta so mu kasance cikin wani aiki da ya saba wa doka, wani aiki na kuskure da take son yi.

translation.en: This is a source of pride for us, not a source of regret.
translation.ha: Lalle wannan abin alfahari ne a gare mu, ba abin bakin ciki ba ne.

translation.en: Second, I witnessed that all of them are lying.
translation.ha: Na biyu na ga cewa dukkaninsu karya suke yi.

translation.en: Since the first days that the issue of DAESH arose, the Americans asked our ambassador in Iraq - through their ambassador - to organize a meeting and reach an agreement on the issue of DAESH.
translation.ha: Saboda tun a ranar farko da wannan batu na Da'ish ya kunno kai a kasar Iraki, Amurkawa ta hanyar jakadansu da ke Iraki, ya bukaci jakadanmu da ke Irakin cewa ku zo mu zauna mu hada kai dangane da batun Da'ish.

translation.en: Our ambassador relayed this inside the country and some of our officials were not against it. But I was against it and said, "On this issue, we will not cooperate with America particularly because their hands are dirty.
translation.ha: Jakadan na mu ya isar mana da wannan magana; wasu daga cikin jami'anmu ma dai ba sa adawa da hakan; ni ne na ki amincewa; don kuwa ba za mu hada kai da Amurka cikin wannan lamarin ba.

translation.en: How can we cooperate on this issue with those whose hands and intentions are dirty?"
translation.ha: Saboda hannayensu dumu-dumu suke (cikin wannan lamarin), ta ya ya za mu zo mu hada kai da mutumin da hannunsa a gurbace yake, sannan niyyarsu ma gurbatacciya ce?

translation.en: Later on, the same secretary of state - who had said in front of the camera and in front of the eyes of all the world that they do not want Iran to cooperate with them - requested Dr. Zarif that Iran cooperate with them on this issue, but Dr. Zarif turned this down.
translation.ha: Daga baya kuma shi kansa wannan ministan harkokin waje na Amurka (John Kerry), wanda ya fito gaban duniya yana fadin cewa: "Ba za mu gayyaci Iran ba", shi da kansa ya bukaci Dakta Zarif (ministan harkokin wajen Iran) da cewa ku zo mu hada kai cikin wannan lamarin; Dakta Zarif ya yi watsi da maganar.

translation.en: The secretary of states' deputy too - the woman whom you know - had requested Mr. Araghchi that Iran cooperate with them.
translation.ha: Mataimakiyarsa ma - wacce wata mace ce, kun san ta - ta bukaci malam Arakchi (mataimakin ministan harkokin wajen Iran) a tattaunawar da suke yi, ta ce masa ku zo mu yi aiki tare.

translation.en: After they turned down their requests and after we openly said that we will not cooperate with them, they said, "We do not want to involve Iran".
translation.ha: Bayan da suka yi watsi da wannan maganar sannan mu ma a fili muka fadi cewa ba za mu hada kai da su cikin wannan lamarin ba, to sai ga shi a halin yanzu suna cewa ba za mu shigo da Iran cikin wannan lamarin ba.

translation.en: Earlier they formed a so-called global coalition against Syria with great fuss and uproar. They gathered 30, 40, 50 countries, but they could not do a damn thing against Syria.
translation.ha: Kafin wannan lokacin sun taba hada hadin gwiwan kasashe a kan kasar Siriya - sun ta tada jijiyoyin wuya a duniya inda suka sami damar tattaro kasashe talatin, arba'in zuwa hamsin - amma babu wani abin da suka iya yi a Siriyan; haka lamarin zai kasance dangane da Iraki ma.

translation.en: The action that was taken against DAESH and that broke its back was not taken by the Americans.
translation.ha: Abin da aka yi a Iraki da kuma karya kashin bayan kungiyar Da'ish a Irakin, ba Amurkawa ne suka yi hakan ba.

translation.en: The Americans know that it was the people of Iraq, the Iraqi Armed Forces and the popular forces who perfectly understood how to fight against DAESH.
translation.ha: Sun san cewa aikin mutanen Iraki ne, aikin sojojin Iraki ne, aiki ne na mutane, wadanda suka fahimci yadda za su yi fada da Da'ish.

translation.en: They have fought it and they have dealt serious blows to it so far.
translation.ha: Sun yi fadar kuma sun musu bugun mummuke, a nan gaba ma za su sake yi musu.

translation.en: With this move, America wants to find an excuse to do the same thing to Iraq and Syria that it is doing to Pakistan.
translation.ha: Lalle za ku gani. Amurkawa suna son fakewa da hakan ne, wajen samun wata dama da za su aikata irin abin da suke aikatawa a Pakistan.

translation.en: They enter Pakistan without any permission despite the existence of a well-established government and a strong army - the Pakistani army is a strong army - and they bomb wherever they want.
translation.ha: Duk da kasantuwar tsayayyiyar gwamnati da kuma sojoji masu karfi a Pakistan - don kuwa sojojin Pakistan sojoji ne masu karfi - amma ba tare da izini ba suke shiga kasar su yi ruwan bama-bamai a duk inda suke so.

translation.en: If they do this, they will be faced with the same problems that they were faced with in Iraq for the last 10 years.
translation.ha: To amma ya kamata su san cewa idan har suka aikata hakan, to kuwa za su fuskanci irin matsalolin da suka fuskanta shekaru goman da suka gabata kan lamarin kasar Iraki.

translation.en: The point is that hearing these statements in my hospital bed was a source of entertainment.
translation.ha: Gaskiyar lamarin shi ne jin wannan lamarin, shi din ma a kan gadon asibiti, ya faranta min rai.

translation.en: Interviewer: Thank you very much.
translation.ha: Dan Jarida: Ina godiya.

translation.en: The hearts of millions of pure individuals are behind you and their prayers will always be with you.
translation.ha: Tsarkakan zukatan miliyoyin mutane a koda yaushe suna tare da kai da kuma yi maka addu'oin fatan alheri.

translation.en: Leader: Thank You.
translation.ha: Jagora: Na gode

translation.en: Interviewer: We ask for your prayer for us.
translation.ha: Dan Jarida: Muna bukatar addu'oinku.

translation.en: Leader's Speech to Olympic and Paralympic Medalists - Khamenei.ir
translation.ha: Jawabin Jagora Yayin Ganawa Da 'Yan Wasan Da Suka Sami Lambar Girma A Gasar Olympics

translation.en: The following is the full text of the speech delivered on March 11, 2013 by Ayatollah Khamenei the Leader of the Islamic Revolution in a meeting with Olympic and Paralympic Medalists.
translation.ha: Shimfida: Abin da ke biye fassarar jawabin da Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci Ayatullah Sayyid Ali Khamenei ya yi ne a lokacin ganawarsa da tsoffin 'yan wasa, 'yan wasan da suka sami lambobin girma a gasar Olympics ta masu lafiya da nakasassu da aka gudanar a birnin London a shekara ta 2012 da kuma masu horar da su. An gudanar da wannan ganawar ce a ranar 11, Maris, 2013:

translation.en: In the Name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful
translation.ha: Da Sunan Allah Mai Rahama Mai Jin Kai

translation.en: On the individual level, the youth who win competitions show and prove that they have outstanding qualities.
translation.ha: A lokacin da ya zamana matasa ne suka sami irin wannan nasara kuwa, to irin da hakan ya ke da ita ya kan karu.

translation.en: If an athlete does not have firm determination, he will not be a champion.
translation.ha: Dan wasan da ba shi da karfafaffiyar irada da kuma tsayayyiyar azama, ko shakka babu, ba zai kai ga zama zakara a wata gasa ba.

translation.en: This shows lack of determination.
translation.ha: To a lokacin da wani matashi ya ke wasan motsa jiki, sannan yake hakuri da wahalhalun da ke cikin motsa jikin, kuma ya ci gaba da wannan motsa jikin cikin so da kauna, hakan lamari ne da ke nuni da tsayayyiyar azama.

translation.en: Another point is the issue of intelligence.
translation.ha: Wani batun kuma na daban shi ne batun hazaka da basira.

translation.en: This is true of all sports.
translation.ha: Haka lamarin ya ke dangane da dukkanin wasanni.

translation.en: That is to say, it is not the case that a physically strong person can win competitions with his physical strength.
translation.ha: Lamarin ba shi ne cewa mutum yana da karfi, don haka zai yi amfani da wannan karfin da ya ke da shi wajen samun hakan ba.

translation.en: Physical strength is not enough. Having high intelligence is necessary.
translation.ha: A'a, karfi kawai bai wadatar ba, akwai bukatar hazaka.
