translation.en: First, you spend the valuable days of your youth on acquiring knowledge and engaging in jihad with sincere spirituality and faith.
translation.ha: Wannan girma da daukaka da kuke da ita ta samo asali saboda dalilai guda biyu: Na farko shi ne cewa kuna gudanar da rayuwarku ta samartaka ce a tafarkin neman ilimi da hanyar jihadi da kuma imani; hakan daukaka ce.

translation.en: This is power. â€œAnd to Allah belongs the might and to His Messenger and to the believers.â€ [The Holy Quran, 63: 8] Power belongs to God, His Messenger and believers.
translation.ha: Girma kuwa na Allah ne da Manzonsa da kuma muminai (Suratul Munafikun 63:8), wato daukaka ta Allah da Manzonsa da kuma muminai ce.

translation.en: So you are considered among believers.
translation.ha: Ku din nan ta wannan hanya da kuka rika kuna daga cikin muminan.

translation.en: The second reason is that you are a source of power for your country and your nation.
translation.ha: Dalili na biyu shi ne cewa ku din nan ku ne tushen karfi da daukaka ga kasarku da kuma al'ummar ku.

translation.en: A nation that can prove it is prepared to resist and defend itself in order to have independence, preserve its identity and fight for its ideals and existence â€“ such a nation is powerful.
translation.ha: Duk wata kasa da kuma wata al'ummar da ta iya tabbatar da cewa a shirye take wajen kare 'yancinta, wajen kare mutumcinta, wajen kare koyarwar da ta rika, wajen kare kasantuwarta da kuma tsayin dakanta, to madaukakiya ce.

translation.en: The power of such a nation is secretly acknowledged even by its enemies although they might not be prepared to announce this publicly because of being stubborn.
translation.ha: Hatta makiya dai suna jin irin wannan daukaka da wannan al'umma take da ita a jikinsu; duk kuwa da cewa ba za su fadi hakan da baki ba saboda kiyayyar da ke cikin zukatansu.

translation.en: You spearhead our national defense and today your power is acknowledged even by your enemies. Many of your enemies even acknowledge your power publicly.
translation.ha: A yau wannan daukakar da kuke da ita - a matsayinku na garkuwa ta kasa - hatta makiya sun gaskata hakan; wasu da dama daga cikin su ma suna fadin hakan a bakunansu.

translation.en: Allah the Exalted says, â€œAgainst them make ready your strength to the utmost of your power, including steeds of war, to strike terror into (the hearts of) the enemies of Allah.â€ [The Holy Quran, 8: 60] Your preparedness makes the enemy fearful: not fearful of your invasion because you are not aggressive, but fearful of your resistance and of attacking you.
translation.ha: Allah Madaukakin Sarki yana fadin cewa: "Kuma ku yi musu tanadi iyakar iyawarku na karfi (makami) da kuma tanadaddun dawakai, ku rika tsorata makiya Allah da kuma makiyanku da shi.." (Suratul Anfali 8:60). Irin shirin da kuke da shi yana tsoratar da makiya; ba wai suna tsoron wuce gona da irin ku ba ne - don kuwa ku din nan ba masu wuce gona da iri a kan kowa ba ne - suna tsoron irin tsayin dakan da kuke da shi ne, suna tsoron yin tunanin kawo muku hari ne.

translation.en: In a world in which reliance on the power of bayonets and weapons can unfortunately play a determining role in the relations between nations and countries, in a world in which there are bullies who decide to take control of the destiny of other nations with iron fists, in a world that is materialistic, only a nation that proves to be prepared for defense will be secure from harm.
translation.ha: A irin wannan duniya wacce abin bakin ciki dogaro da karfi na bakin bindiga ya ke taka gagarumar rawa wajen tsara irin alakar da ke tsakanin kasashe da kuma al'ummomi, a duniyar da masu takama da karfi sakamakon irin karfin da suke da shi suke son mallake makomar al'ummomi da karfin tuwo - wato a irin wannan duniya ta abin duniya - to kasar da za ta tsira daga wannan cutarwar ita ce kasar da ta tabbatar da irin shirin kare kanta da take da shi.

translation.en: Our Armed Forces and the Army of the Islamic Republic proved this.
translation.ha: Dakarun mu masu makami, dakarun sojin Jamhuriyar Musulunci masu girma sun tabbatar da hakan.

translation.en: This is power. This is a source of power for a country.
translation.ha: Wannan daukaka ce; hakan lamari ne mai haifar da daukaka ga wata kasa; lalle wajibi ne ku kiyaye hakan.

translation.en: It is necessary to preserve this preparedness. You should preserve all your material and spiritual assets. During your service and throughout your life, you should safeguard your piety, faith, motivation and spiritual purity as well as your firm determination to defend the country.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne ku kiyaye dukkanin jari da karfi na duniya da kuma na ruhi da kuke da shi; ku kiyaye addininku, imaninku, manufar da kuke da ita, tsoron Allah da tsarkin zuciyarku, daukaka da tsayin dakan da kuke da shi wajen ba da kariya tsawon wannan lokaci na hidima da kuma tsawon rayuwarku.

translation.en: We will never start a bloody war. The Iranian nation has proven this. But we are a nation that responds to all kinds of attack and even all kinds of threats with full force and determination.
translation.ha: Mu dai ba masu wuce gona da iri (hari) kan wata al'umma ko kuma wata kasa ba ce; mu dai har abada ba za mu taba tsokano fada ba - al'ummar Iran ta tabbatar da hakan - to amma mu din nan wata al'umma ce mai mayar da martani mai tsananin gaske da kuma dukkan karfinta ga duk wani wuce gona da iri, kai hatta ma barazana.

translation.en: We are not a nation that stands by and watches the fragile materialist powers â€“ which have been eaten by worms and termites from within â€“ threaten the steadfast and powerful Iranian nation.
translation.ha: Mu dai ba al'umma ce wacce za ta ci gaba da zama tana kallon masu karfi na abin duniya mai gushewa - wadanda tsutsa da gara ta cinye su daga ciki - suna ci gaba da yin barazana ga tsayayyiyar al'umma Iran ba.

translation.en: We will answer threats with threats.
translation.ha: Mu dai za mu mayar da martani ga barazana da barazana.

translation.en: Anybody who thinks of attacking the Islamic Republic of Iran should be prepared to receive strong slaps and iron fists from the Armed Forces, from the Army of the Islamic Republic of Iran, from the Islamic Revolution's Guards Corps and from Basij: all supported by the great Iranian nation.
translation.ha: Duk wani wanda ma ya fara tunanin kawo hari ga Jamhuriyar Musulunci ta Iran, to wajibi ne ya zamanto cikin shirin fuskantar gagarumin bugu daga wajen tsayayyiyar al'ummar Iran, daga wajen dakarun masu makami na Iran; daga sojojin Jamhuriyar Musulunci ta Iran, daga dakarun kare juyin juya halin Musulunci na Iran da kuma dakarun sa kai na Basij, a sama da dukkanin wadannan kuma daga wajen al'ummar Iran masu girma.

translation.en: And America, its regional puppets and its guard dog â€“ the Zionist regime â€“ should know that the response of the Iranian nation to any kind of aggression, attacks or even threats will be a response that will make them collapse from within.
translation.ha: Kuma wajibi ne su san cewa; Amurka ta sani, haka nan 'yan amshin shatanta haka nan kuma wannan kurar dajin ta su a wannan yanki wato haramtacciyar kasar Isra'ila su kwana da sanin cewa; martanin da al'ummar Iran za su mayar ga duk wani hari, duk wani wuce gona da iri, kai duk wata barazana ma, martani ne da zai ruguza su daga ciki da kuma kawo karshensu.

translation.en: Continue your preparedness to maintain this national and international power.
translation.ha: Lalle wajibi ne ku shirya kanku wajen kiyaye wannan daukaka ta kasa da kuma ta kasa da kasa.

translation.en: Everybody should remain prepared to preserve the high values which will be permanent throughout history. Everybody should remain prepared in the arena of knowledge, work, industry, management and politics.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne kowa ya zamanto cikin shiri a fagen ilimi, haka nan a fagen aiki, haka nan a fagen masana'antu da kuma a fagen gudanarwa da kuma siyasa.

translation.en: And the Armed Forces spearhead our national defense in the military arena.
translation.ha: Su kuwa sojoji su ne a kan gaban tsaron kasa a fagen soji.

translation.en: We are confident that the greatest kind of deterrence is the firm structure of the Islamic Republic, our national unity and the closeness of the hearts of the Iranian people to each other.
translation.ha: Mu dai muna da tabbacin cewa tabbatar da tsayayyen tsarin Jamhuriyar Musulunci da hadin kan kasa da kusato zukata waje guda tsakanin dukkanin al'ummar nan, su ne garkuwa da kuma gagarumar kariya.

translation.en: I pray to Allah the Exalted to bestow success, good fortune, dignity and glory on all you dear youth, your teachers, your commanders and all those who have played a role in creating this beautiful and glorious reality.
translation.ha: Muna rokon Allah Madaukakin Sarki da Ya ba da dacewarsa ga daidaikun ku matasa masu girma, 'ya'yana masu girma, ga malamanku, kwamandojinku da dukkanin wadanda suke da hannu cikin wannan gagarumin lamari da kuma karshe mai kyau da girma da kuma daukaka a gare ku.

translation.en: The following is the full text of the speech delivered on October 14, 2011 by Ayatollah Khamenei the Leader of the Islamic Revolution in a meeting with basijis of Kermanshah province.
translation.ha: Shimfida: Abin da ke biye fassarar jawabin da Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci ya yi ne a lokacin ganawa da dubun dubatan dakarun sa kai na Basij na lardin Kermanshah a rana ta uku ta ziyarar da ya kai can.

translation.en: In the Name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful
translation.ha: Da Sunan Allah Mai Rahama Mai Jin Kai

translation.en: All praise belongs to Allah, the Lord of the Two Worlds, and peace and greetings be upon our Master and Prophet, Ab-al-Qassem Muhammad, and upon his immaculate and pure household, especially the one remaining with Allah on earth.
translation.ha: Dukkan godiya ta tabbata ga Allah Ubangijin talikai.

translation.en: I have been familiar with Kermanshah and its people since a long time ago. But during the past two, three days, Allah the Exalted gave me another opportunity to meet you dear people of Kermanshah and observe your behavior, which made me respect Kermanshah and its people even more than before.
translation.ha: Duk da cewa tun da jimawa ina da masaniya kan wannan yanki na Kermanshah da kuma mutanen Kermanshah, to amma a cikin wadannan kwanaki biyu zuwa uku da Allah Madaukakin Sarki Ya ba ni dacewar ganawa da ku din nan mutanen wannan yanki masu girma daga bangarori daban-daban sannan da kuma ganin halayenku, hakan ya kara min irin kaunar da nake da ita ga garin Kermanshah da kuma mutanen Kermanshah.

translation.en: I am thankful to God who bestowed His grace and guidance on these pure-hearted, pious, sincere and magnanimous people.
translation.ha: Muna gode wa Allah Madaukakin Sarki da Ya sanya falalarsa da kuma shiriyarsa ga wadanan mutane mumina kuma masu gaskiya da shimfidar fuska.

translation.en: Thankfully, the young generation of this region and this province have inherited the same positive and outstanding characteristics that defined the social behavior of their forefathers. More importantly, the revolutionary thought, the revolutionary current, the revolutionary spirit, the revolutionary logic and the revolutionary discourse are alive in this region.
translation.ha: Alhamdu lillahi matasan wannan yanki da kuma wannan lardin sun gaji wadannan siffofi masu kyau daga wajen magabatansu, sannan kuma sama da hakan shi ne cewa a wannan yankin an ci gaba da rayar da tunani na juyi da kuma ruhinsa da hikima da kuma kalmomin wannan juyi a wannan lardin. Tsare-tsaren da aka gudanar a yau ma dai wasu tsare-tsare ne masu kyau.

translation.en: Today's programs were good programs. I would like to thank the esteemed people who planned this meeting.
translation.ha: Lalle ina mika godiya ta ga wadanda suka shirya wannan taron; irin wakoki na jama'a da aka yi da kuma wasannin gargajiyar da aka yi (su ma sun yi kyau).

translation.en: I seriously ask the youth who are interested in sports and are physically capable to take their skill seriously.
translation.ha: Ina kiran matasan da suke son wasanni sannan kuma suke da karfi na wasa da su riki hakan da kyau.

translation.en: Besides spiritual and intellectual progress and what the Revolution has brought for us - which I will explain briefly later on - our young generation should acquire physical capabilities as well.
translation.ha: Yana da kyau matasanmu, baya ga irin ci gaba na ruhi da na tunani da kuma abubuwan da wannan juyin ya ba mu kyautar su - wadanda a nan gaba zan yi bayanin su - yana da kyau su kiyaye irin karfi na jiki da suke da shi.

translation.en: Physical health and capabilities are absolutely necessary and beneficial for the men who pursue lofty goals in life and are interested in the spiritual and intellectual aspect of life.
translation.ha: Lafiya da karfi na jiki wani lamari ne da ya zama wajibi ga mutanen da suke ma'abota masaniya da tunani wadanda kuma suke da manyan manufofin da suke son cimmawa don kuwa suna da tsananin amfani sannan kuma suna taimakawa cikin aikinsu.

translation.en: The Islamic Revolution's Guards Corps should be considered a branch of the Revolution and the Islamic Republic. And Basij should be considered a unique event among the events of the Revolution.
translation.ha: Bahasin wannan taro shi ne batun dakarun kare juyi da kuma dakarun Basiji. Wajibi ne a kalli dakarun kare juyi a matsayin wata cibiya kana kuma wani reshe da ya samo asali daga tushen wannan juyin da wannan tsarin, sannan su kuma Basij a matsayin wani lamari maras tamka daga cikin abubuwan da suka faru a wannan juyin.

translation.en: One of the things that is necessary in every popular movement is to create the necessary terminology and systems on the basis of the fundamental principles of the movement.
translation.ha: Daya daga cikin abubuwan da suka zamanto wajibi a aikata su cikin duk wani yunkuri na jama'a da kuma duk wani juyi shi ne 'samar da sabbin kalmomi' da kuma 'sabbin cibiyoyi' da suka yi daidai da koyarwar wannan yunkuri da kuma juyin.

translation.en: When a new idea - such as the idea of Islamic rule or Islamic Awakening - is proposed, it introduces new concepts into society.
translation.ha: A lokacin da wani sabon tunani - a matsayin misali tunani na hukumar Musulunci da tsarin Musulunci da kuma farkawa ta Musulunci - ya kunno kai, to zai samar da wasu sabbin ma'anoni cikin al'umma.

translation.en: Therefore, this movement needs its own terminology.
translation.ha: A saboda haka wajibi ne wannan yunkurin da kuma wannan juyin ya zamanto yana da wasu kalmomi da suka dace da shi.

translation.en: If terms are borrowed from somewhere else, there will be confusion and it will be impossible to fully clarify the idea.
translation.ha: Idan kuwa har ya zamana ya aro wasu kalmomi ne daga wajen 'yan waje, to kuwa yanayi zai lalace, sannan kuma za a gagara bayanin wasu abubuwan.

translation.en: We believe in democracy and we also believe in freedom, but we do not believe in liberal democracy.
translation.ha: (A matsayin misali) mun yarda da tsarin demokradiyya, haka nan kuma mun yarda da 'yanci, to amma ba mu yarda da demokradiyyar sassauci ta kasashen yamma ba.

translation.en: We do not want to use the term for the immaculate, wholesome, righteous and pure concept that we have in mind.
translation.ha: Ba ma so mu yi amfani da wannan suna da sanya su ga ma'anoni masu tsarki da muke da su.

translation.en: Therefore, we need to select a new name for our favorite system: "Islamic democracy" or "Islamic Republic".
translation.ha: A saboda haka ne muka sanya wa tsarin da muke so wani suna na daban; muke kiran sa da tsarin demokradiyya na Musulunci ko kuma Jamhuriyar Musulunci. Wato muna zaban wani sabon suna.

translation.en: Similarly, we do not want to use the term "socialism" to refer to the concept of equitable distribution of wealth among people, which is one of the lofty and essential goals of Islam.
translation.ha: Ko kuma a wajen raba dukiya yadda ta dace da kuma isar da ita ga dukkanin al'umma, wanda hakan daya ne daga cikin manyan manufofin Musulunci, ba ma amfani da kalmar gurguzu ga hakan.

translation.en: Although the literal meaning of socialism is equitable distribution of wealth, it is associated with other concepts which we hate.
translation.ha: Duk kuwa da cewa ma'anar gurguzu a luggance tana da alaka da hakan, to amma tana da wata ma'ana ta daban wanda mu ba mu yarda da wannan ma'anar ba.

translation.en: Over time, socialism has come to be associated with certain things in society that are unacceptable to us.
translation.ha: An hada ta da wata hakika ta tarihi a cikin al'umma wanda mu ba mu yarda da hakan ba.

translation.en: Therefore, instead of the terms that are common among leftist, Marxist and similar elements, we introduced the terms "arrogance", "imposition of weakness" and "populism". What I mean by "we" is the Revolution and I am not suggesting that particular individuals played an undeniable role in this regard.
translation.ha: A saboda haka ne maimakon amfani da kalmomin da suka yi fice a tsakanin 'yan gurguzu, sai muka gabatar da kalmomi irin su '(ma'abota) girman kai' irin su 'raunanan (mutane)' da kuma ma'ana ta 'mutane' sannan kuma muka gabatar da su. Mun gabatar, wato juyin juya halin Musulunci ya gabatar da wadannan kalmomin ba tare da cewa wasu mutane na musamman sun yi tasiri cikin hakan ba.

translation.en: The same is true of building systems.
translation.ha: To haka lamarin yake dangane da batun samar da cibiyoyi ma.

translation.en: When a revolution or a movement achieves victory, it should create its own executive systems in order to pursue its goals.
translation.ha: A lokacin da wani juyi ko kuma wani yunkuri ya yi nasara, wajibi ne ya samar da cibiyoyin gudanarwarsa, wato wadannan cibiyoyin da za su bi diddigin manufofin da ake da su don tabbatar da su.

translation.en: One of the things that can be done is to adapt the existing systems in society. Another thing that can be done is to create a system that is appropriate for the new needs. Both are difficult.
translation.ha: Daya daga cikin ayyukan da ke gaba shi ne a samar da sauyi cikin cibiyoyin da ake da su, wani lamarin kuma shi ne a samar da wadansu cibiyoyi da hukumomin da ake bukata. Dukkanin wadannan abubuwa biyu gina wani abu ne, dukkanin su suna daga cikin ayyuka masu wahalar gaske.

translation.en: The Islamic Revolution did both of these things.
translation.ha: To juyin juya halin Musulunci ya aikata dukkanin wadannan abubuwa guda biyun.

translation.en: For example, the military which had been built by a different system and different individuals was transformed into a revolutionary and pious army. The structures were changed. The methods were changed.
translation.ha: A matsayin misali bangaren soji, wadannan sojojin da aka samar da su karkashin wata al'ada, karkashin wani tsari da kuma wata gwamati ta daban, an mayar da su suka zamanto wasu sojoji ma'abota juyin juya hali, wasu sojoji masu kishin addini kuma muminai; sannan kuma yanayinsu ma ya samu sauyi, taken da suke dagawa ma ya sauya.

translation.en: In the process, a new organization branched off from the military - namely, the Islamic Revolution's Guards Corps. If the Islamic Revolution's Guards Corps had not branched off from the military, it would have been impossible to transform the military.
translation.ha: A gefen su kuma aka samar da wasu sabbin cibiyoyin da suka samo asali daga juyi, wadanda suka hada da dakarun kare juyin juya halin Musulunci, ta yadda idan har da ba a samar da na biyun ba, to kuwa da na farko ma bai tabbata ba.

translation.en: These were the capacities of the Revolution which our magnanimous Imam utilized by relying on his accurate understanding of the existing and future needs of our society.
translation.ha: Wadannan wadansu abubuwa ne da wannan juyin ya samar da su wanda kuma Imaminmu mai girma shi ne ya aikata hakan sakamakon irin fahimtar da ya ke da ita dangane da abubuwan da ake bukata sannan kuma da dukkan karfinsa ya ci gaba da bin lamarin.

translation.en: It was Imam Khomeini (r.a.) who proposed the idea of establishing Basij and "an army of twenty million". This massive movement by Basij was one of the miraculous things that the Revolution achieved under the leadership of Imam Khomeini (r.a.).
translation.ha: Wannan gagarumin yunkuri na Basiji, wannan aiki da Imam yayi na kafa cibiyar Basiji - don kuwa Imam ne ya bukaci a kafa cibiyar Basij, ya gabatar da batun samar da sojoji miliyan ashirin - daya ne daga cikin irin wadannan ayyuka masu kama da mu'ujiza na wannan juyin da Imam ya yi.

translation.en: As I said the other day, when a government is established to achieve such lofty ideals as confronting global oppression, international hegemony of superpowers, imposed backwardness and arrogance - ideals which appear to be unattainable - it would naturally make big enemies, and great powers would step in to counter such a government.
translation.ha: A wancan ranar na fadi cewa a lokacin da wasu soji, wata kasa da kuma wata al'umma mai irin wannan manufa da koyarwa mai girma wanda a zahiri kamar ba mai yiyuwa ba - wato fada da zalunci na duniya, fada da masu karfi na kasa da kasa, fada da tsarin mulkin mallaka, fada da rauni da kuma girman kai gaba dayansu - to ko shakka babu tana da manyan makiya.

translation.en: Therefore, it is necessary for such a government to prepare itself.
translation.ha: Manyan masu takama da karfi na duniya za su nufo inda take don fada da ita; a saboda haka wajibi ne ta samar da wani shirin da take bukata wajen kare kanta.

translation.en: Basij is one of the pillars of such preparedness.
translation.ha: Daya daga cikin tushen wannan shirin su ne wadannan dakarun na Basiji.

translation.en: This was why Imam Khomeini (r.a.) said that when there are 20 million people in a country who are prepared to put up an armed resistance, no power in the world will think of conquering that country.
translation.ha: Da wannan manufar ce Imam ya fadi cewa idan aka sami wasu dakaru miliyan ashirin na mutane da suke cikin shirin fada a cikin wata al'umma, to kuwa babu wani karfi a duniyar nan da zai yi tunanin wuce gona da iri a kansu, don kuwa sun san irin abin da zai biyo baya a duk lokacin da suka kai wa wannan al'ummar hari.

translation.en: Of course, this does not mean that the entire society should be militarized and that everybody should be armed with guns.
translation.ha: Wannan shi ne hakikanin lamarin. Ko da yake ma'anar hakan ba shi ne dukkanin al'umma su zamanto sojoji ba, kowa ya rike bingida.

translation.en: It only means that everybody should be prepared for armed defense.
translation.ha: Ma'anar hakan ita ce kowa ya zamanto cikin shirin ba da kariya, ya zamanto cikin shirin fada.

translation.en: A country in which everybody is prepared for battle would never be defeated.
translation.ha: Al'ummar da kowa a cikinta ya zamanto cikin shirin fada, to kuwa wannan al'umma ba za ta sha kashi ba.

translation.en: It was Imam Khomeini (r.a.) who introduced this innovation. Therefore, in Azar 1358, he ordered the establishment of Basij in the country and he had the same serious attitude towards Basij until the end of his life.
translation.ha: Haka Imam ya samar da irin wannan abu. A saboda haka a watan Azar na shekarar 1358 (1979), Imam ya sanar da kafuwar Basij da kuma kafa ta; sannan kuma har karshen rayuwarsa ya kasance mai ba wa wannan lamari na Basij muhimmancin gaske.

translation.en: Basij is the school of humble witnesses and martyrs. "Basij is the pure army of God." These are quotations from our magnanimous Imam, which show that he had properly identified the existing and future needs of this country, this nation and this system.
translation.ha: Basij wata makaranta ce ta kauna, "makaranta ce ta shahidai wadanda ba a san su ba" "Basij wasu dakaru ne masu tsarkin zuciya ga Allah" dukkanin wadannan kalmomi ne da Imam (ya fadi dangane da Basij). Hakan lamari ne da ke nuni da asalin fahimtar bukatar da kasa take da ita da kuma wannan al'umma da kuma wannan tsari a lokacin da kuma a nan gaba.

translation.en: Preparedness for armed defense is something that we will always need, even after 50 years.
translation.ha: Wannan wani lamari ne da ake da bukatarsa a ko da yaushe; a nan da shekaru hamsin ma za a ci gaba da bukatar hakan.

translation.en: The issues that exist today did not exist at that time.
translation.ha: Batutuwan da suka kunno kai a yau, a wancan lokacin babu su.

translation.en: Today Basij is a pioneer in the area of knowledge and innovation.
translation.ha: A yau Basijin mu, suna a sahun gaba a fagen ilimi da kuma a fagen samar da sabbin abubuwa.

translation.en: Towards the end of his life, in a statement written in Azar 1367 - namely, around ten years after he ordered the establishment of Basij - Imam Khomeini (r.a.) demanded that students and seminarians should establish Basij for students of universities and Islamic seminaries.
translation.ha: A cikin wancan abin da Imam ya rubuta a watan Azar na shekarar 1367 (1988) - wato a karshen rayuwarsa, kimanin shekaru goma bayan wancan umurni na farkon da ya yi - ya bukaci daliban jami'a da na makarantun addini da su kafa dakarun Basij; wato Basijin daliban jami'a da kuma Basijin daliban addini.

translation.en: This shows that the need for the basiji spirit in the country is related to all areas, particularly areas that are related to universities and Islamic seminaries.
translation.ha: Hakan lamari ne da ke nuni da yadda kasar nan take da bukatar ruhi irin na Basiji, a dukkanin fagage, cikin su kuwa har da fagagen da suka shafi jami'a da kuma wadanda suka shafi makarantun addini.

translation.en: Today in our Islamic seminaries, there are great basiji scholars who are proud of being members of Basij.
translation.ha: A yau ma a makarantun hauzar mu akwai dalibai da manyan malamai da suke a matsayin dakarun Basiji, kuma suna alfahari da hakan.

translation.en: He used to say that he was proud of being a basiji.
translation.ha: Imam ma ya kasance yana alfahari da hakan.

translation.en: The same is true of universities.
translation.ha: A jami'a ma haka lamarin ya ke.

translation.en: Today in all areas, we have issues that did not exist at that time.
translation.ha: A yau din nan akwai batutuwa daban-daban da muke da su wadanda a wancan lokacin babu su.

translation.en: These scientific advances did not exist at that time.
translation.ha: A wancan lokacin ba mu da iri wannan ci gaba na ilimi da muke da shi a yanzu.

translation.en: At the beginning of the Revolution, Basij, the Islamic Revolution's Guards Corps and all government officials had focused their attention on safeguarding the existence of the Revolution. They had focused all their attention on protecting the sampling that had just germinated in this country.
translation.ha: A farkon nasarar juyi, dukkanin himmar gwamnati da Basij da dakarun kare juyi da dukkain jami'an kasar nan shi ne yadda za a kiyaye wannan sabon abu da aka samar; wato wannan sabuwar bishiryar da ba ta jima da tsirowa a wannan kasar ba, kada a bari a kawar da ita.

translation.en: In the western, southeastern, northwestern and southwestern parts of the country and in different other areas, the arrogant powers and the enemies of the Revolution, Islam and Iran had given rise to certain events.
translation.ha: Ma'abota girman kai, makiya wannan juyi da makiya Musulunci da Iran sun haifar da fitina a wannan yanki na yammacin kasar nan, a yanki kudu masu gabashin kasar nan, a yankin arewa maso gabas, a yankin kudu maso yamma na kasar nan, a yankuna daban-daban na kasar nan.

translation.en: At that time, pious and enthusiastic youth would enter the arena and lay down their life with a basiji spirit. Yesterday I mentioned examples of such youth from Kermanshah in the meeting with families of our martyrs.
translation.ha: A wancan lokacin matasa muminai, masu ruhi irin na Basiji sun shigo cikin fage sannan kuma suka sadaukar da rayukansu, wanda a ganawar da na yi jiya da iyalan shahidai na yi ishara da misalan hakan, haka nan ma a jawabin da na yi shekaran jiya.

translation.en: One month after the Revolution, one would see these popular movements being carried out by the youth of Kermanshah. This is what Basij is.
translation.ha: Wata guda bayan nasarar juyin nan mutum ya ga irin wannan yunkuri na mutane, wadannan matasa da suka fito daga wannan gari na Kermanshah. Wannan shi ne Basiji.

translation.en: Basij is a movement that originates from piety, love and self-confidence and it is accompanied by innovation.
translation.ha: Wato yunkuri da ya samo asali daga imani, daga kauna, daga dogaro da kai tare da samar da sabbin abubuwa.

translation.en: It is necessary to introduce innovations in all areas.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne a samar da sabbin abubuwa a dukkanin fagage.

translation.en: For example, I noticed that the performance of Varzesh-e Bastani at the beginning of this meeting was full of innovations. When I was young, I used to watch performances of Varzesh-e Bastani.
translation.ha: A yayin da na kalli wannan wasan gargajiyan (da aka yi), wannan abin da suka yi din cike yake da sabuntawa (an shigo da sabbin abubuwa cikinsa).

translation.en: Of course, it was not bad. It was actually good, but there were not so many innovations.
translation.ha: Ba wai ba shi da kyau ba ne, a'a da kyau sa, to amma dai babu irin wannan sabuntawa a cikinsa.

translation.en: It is possible to introduce such innovations in all areas.
translation.ha: A fagen aikin soji, ana iya kirkirar sabbin abubuwa cikin yadda ake jagorancin yaki, yadda ake yaki, kayayyakin yaki da kuma sabuntawa cikin tsare-tsare; wanan lamari ne da ya shafi dakaru masu makami. Haka nan a wani bangaren da ba bangaren sojin ba. Kirkiro sabbin abubuwa cikin nau'in diplomasiyya.

translation.en: There are different kinds of wicked acts in the vast arena of diplomacy.
translation.ha: Gagarumin fage na diplomasiyya yana cike da nau'oi na shaidancin a tattare da shi.

translation.en: You can see that diplomacy is the arena of wicked acts.
translation.ha: Fagen diplomasiyya dai fage ne na shaidana; kuna dai ganin abin da ke faruwa.

translation.en: Of course, thankfully our enemies do not know what to do.
translation.ha: Alhamdu lillahi makiyan mu suna daga cikin mutanen da ba su san me za su yi ba.

translation.en: They constantly repeat their mistakes: for example, in the statements that they make in their propaganda.
translation.ha: Suna ci gaba da yin abubuwa, sai kura-kurai suke ta tafkawa da sanya kafufunsu cikin ramin tsaka mai wuya.

translation.en: These things result from the revolutionary spirit which we call the basiji spirit and the spirit of youth, innovation, pioneering action and self-confidence.
translation.ha: Dukkanin wadannan abubuwa sun samo asali ne daga wannan ruhi na juyi wanda muke kiransa da ruhin basiji, ruhin samartaka da sabuntawa da kuma ci gaba tare da dogaro da kai.

translation.en: The same is true of the economic area, scientific progress and activities related to production.
translation.ha: Haka lamarin yake a fagen tattalin arziki, haka nan kuma a fagen samar da abubuwan da ake bukata, haka nan a fagen ci gaba na ilimi da bincike.

translation.en: Therefore, the activities of Basij and the basiji spirit are not limited to a particular area such as military areas. All sectors of the country can have a basiji spirit.
translation.ha: A saboda haka fagen Basij da kuma ruhin basij ba wani fage ne iyakantacce ba, ba kuma fage ne kawai na soji ba, dukkanin bangarori na kasar nan ana iya samun ruhi na Basij.

translation.en: Basiji acquisition of knowledge, basiji accumulation of wealth, basiji diplomacy, basiji politics, basiji management, basiji organization - the concept of Basij can be extended to all these areas. The concept includes innovation and sincerity. Sincerity is the main pillar of basiji work.
translation.ha: A fagen ilimi, a fagen dukiya, a fagen diplomasiyya, a fagen siyasa, a fagen shugabanci, a fagen tsare-tsare, dukkaninsu ana iya samun ruhi na Basiji a cikinsu. Ma'anar Basiji ta hada dukkanin wadannan fagage; tana nufin sabuntawa da samar da sabbin abubuwa da kuma tsarkin zuciya.

translation.en: Obscure is one of the words that our magnanimous Imam used: "The school of witnesses and obscure martyrs."
translation.ha: Wadanda ba a san su ba daya ne daga cikin sunan da Imam ya sanya wa Basiji inda ya ke cewa: 'Tafarkin shahidan da ba a san su ba'.

translation.en: Obscurity means refusing to go after fame. They worked for the sake of God, which is due to the spirit of trust in God.
translation.ha: Aiki saboda Allah, wanda hakan ya samo asali ne daga ruhin dogaro da Allah; mun yi imanin cewa lalle Allah ba zai yi watsi da mu ba.

translation.en: God's angels will not let your worship go unnoticed.
translation.ha: Mala'ikun Allah masu rubuta ayyukan mutane ba za su taba barin ayyukan da kuka aikata su tafi haka kawai ba.

translation.en: No, your worship will be recorded: "He who has done an atom's weight of good shall see it." [The Holy Quran, 99: 7] The same is true of social activities.
translation.ha: A'a, suna rubuta su, a nan ne "To, wanda ya aikata (wani aiki) gwargwadon nauyin zarra, na alheri, zan gan shi" (Suratuz Zalzala 99:7). Haka lamari ya ke cikin ayyuka na zamantakewa.

translation.en: Sometimes you do something or make a decision for the sake of God without anybody knowing. And you do not boast about your decision in front of anybody, but Allah the Exalted sees and records what you do.
translation.ha: Idan kuka yi wani yunkuri saboda Allah, kuka aikata wani abu don Allah, haka nan kuma idan kuka dau wata matsaya saboda Allah, babu wani ma da zai fahimta, amma Allah Madaukakin Sarki Ya san hakan kuma yana rubuta shi.

translation.en: When you trust Allah the Exalted, you do not care if other people find out about your good deeds or not.
translation.ha: Kun yarda da Allah sannan ku na da kyakkyawan zato ga Allah, ko da sauran mutane ba su fahimta ba.

translation.en: Compared with divine rewards, what is the value of this material compensation?
translation.ha: Shin wani girma wannan kyauta ta duniya take da ita?

translation.en: This is why a basiji works with sincerity for the sake of God.
translation.ha: Aiki saboda Allah daya ne daga cikin siffofi na musamman.

translation.en: All these things result from polytheism, covert polytheism.
translation.ha: Dukkanin wadannan abubuwa sun samo asali ne daga shirka; boyayyiyar shirka.

translation.en: When there is sincerity and monotheism, these things will be eliminated.
translation.ha: A lokacin da aka sami tsarkin zuciya, to kuwa shirka za ta kawu, za a kawar da ita gaba daya.

translation.en: This is the basiji spirit.
translation.ha: Wannan shi ne ruhin Basiji.

translation.en: When we say Basij is everywhere, this does not mean we should neglect "the army of twenty million" or "the army of tens of millions" which was introduced after Imam Khomeini (r.a.) had passed away. No, that basiji army is necessary.
translation.ha: A lokacin da muka ce a ko ina akwai (ruhin) Basiji, ma'anar hakan ba ita ce shi kenan sai mance da wannan batu na samar da dakarun Basiji miliyan ashiri da Imam ya fadi - ko kuma gomomin basiji da aka fadi bayan Imam ba - , a'a, ana da bukatar hakan ma.

translation.en: Considering the wishes, ideals and ambitions of our nation, it is necessary to be constantly prepared for defense: defense that is accompanied by innovation.
translation.ha: Da irin wannan fatan da kuma hangen nesa da al'ummar mu take da shi, lalle akwai bukatar shiri na kariya sannan kuma wajibi ne a sami hakan a ko da yaushe; a ko da yaushe cikin sabuntawa da samar da sabbin abubuwa.

translation.en: That is to say, our dear youth should be aware and they should move forward in a conscious way. They should know what they are looking for.
translation.ha: Wato matasan mu masu girma su san cewa wajibi ne su gudanar da yunkurin su cikin dukkanin masaniya da taka tsantsan, su fahimci me suke son cimmawa.

translation.en: In a situation in which truth has been mixed up with falsehood in the world, in a situation in which evil individuals have spread their oppressive and satanic hegemony over the life of human beings, in a situation in which the arrogant powers have dominated the world, there is a nation that speaks the truth, a nation that is after the truth, a nation that is after human rights, a nation that is after establishing justice in this confusion. And this nation is the Iranian nation - thanks to Islam and the Revolution.
translation.ha: Daga cikin abubuwan da ake da su a duniya; akwai wannan lamari na cakuda gaskiya da karya da ake yi, da kuma irin wannan iko na zalunci da shaidanci da wadannan shaidanu suka samu a kan rayuwar sauran mutane; a lokuta da dama mun sha fadin cewa a cikin irin wannan yanayi na karya da girman kai, wato wannan yanayi na 'yan mulkin mallaka, al'umma guda da aka samu da take fadin gaskiya, tana neman cimma gaskiya, tana neman tabbatar da hakkokin bil'adama da tabbatar da adalci, ita ce al'ummar Iran mai girma (wacce kuma ta sami hakan ne) albarkacin Musulunci da kuma juyin juya halin Musulunci.

translation.en: The Iranian nation has stood firm.
translation.ha: Al'ummar Iran dai ta tsaya kyam kan wannan magana.

translation.en: Because of the resistance of the Iranian nation, this thought has gradually gained ground in the region and in the world although we might only see the effects in the region only.
translation.ha: Sakamakon irin wannan tsayin dakan na al'ummar Iran ne ya sanya wannan tunanin ya fara yaduwa zuwa bangarori daban-daban na wannan yankin kai a ma duniya baki daya, kamar yadda a halin yanzu muke ganin hakan a wannan yankin.

translation.en: This is a fact.
translation.ha: Wannan dai wata hakika ce.

translation.en: It is obvious that the devils of the world will not leave us alone. They will not give up as long as they can fight.
translation.ha: To a fili yake dai cewa shaidanun duniya ba za su zauna haka kawai suna kallo ba, har zuwa lokacin da suke da karfi, ba za su ci gaba da zuba ido ba.

translation.en: As long as the corrupt and wicked government of the Soviet Union was in power, it was opposed to Islam and the Islamic system, just like the so-called system of liberal democracy. You know that they disagreed about many issues, but there were a few issues that they all agreed on. One of those issues - and the most important one - was confronting Islamic uprisings, Islamic progress and Islamic systems.
translation.ha: Wannan karkatacciyar hukumar ta tarayyar Sobiyeti, tamkar wannan hukumar ta 'yan jari hujja, ta ci gaba da adawa da Musulunci da Jamhuriyar Musulunci ta Iran har zuwa lokacin da ta fadi. Kun san cewa suna da sabani cikin daruruwan abubuwa (a tsakaninsu), to amma sun yi tarayya cikin wasu abubuwan, daya daga cikin wadannan abubuwan kuwa shi ne gaba da kuma fada da koyarwar Musulunci da ci gaban Musulunci da tsarin Jamhuriyar Musulunci.

translation.en: However, as long as they exist, they will try their best to counter the Islamic system.
translation.ha: Matukar dai daya bangaren (da suke fada das hi din) ya tsaya kyam, ya yi hakuri, bai bari ya rasa irin dogaro da kan da ya ke da shi ba, to ko shakka babu nasara tana tare da shi ne.

translation.en: Allah the Exalted is truthful.
translation.ha: Allah Madaukakin Sarki Ya yi gaskiya kuma shi ne mafi gaskiya cikin magana inda ya ke cewa: "Kuma lalle, hakika, Allah yana taimakon wanda yake taimakonsa" (Suratul Hajj 22:40) "Idan kun taimaki Allah, zai taimake ku" (Suratu Muhammad 47:7).

translation.en: One camp is after the truth and the opposing camp is after falsehood. If the righteous camp is afraid, it is clear that it will be defeated: it might be righteous, yet it will be defeated.
translation.ha: A kan sami wani lokacin da ya kan tsoratar da bangaren gaskiyar; a irin wannan yanayin ko shakka babu (bangaren gaskiyar) zai sha kashi, na'am ya riki gaskiya amma dai zai sha kashi.

translation.en: If the righteous camp grows impatient, it will be defeated.
translation.ha: A wani lokacin kuma (bangaren gaskiyar) zai nuna rashin hakuri, a nan ma zai sha kashi.

translation.en: Allah the Exalted has not guaranteed victory for the righteous side simply because it is righteous. No, you will achieve victory because you are righteous and because you resist.
translation.ha: Allah Madaukakin Sarki dai bai ba da lamunin cewa tun da dai kana kan gaskiya, shi kenan ko shakka babu za ka yi nasara ba; a'a, za ka yi nasara ne saboda kana kan gaskiya sannan kuma saboda ka yi tsayin daka da kuma hakuri.

translation.en: If you resist, you will achieve victory.
translation.ha: Idan har ka tsaya kyam, to kuwa za ka yi nasara.

translation.en: But until you achieve ultimate victory, the battle and the confrontation will go on.
translation.ha: To amma har zuwa ga samun wannan nasara ta karshe, to kuwa gwagwarmaya da fada da kalubale za su ci gaba da bayyana.

translation.en: The Army can have a basiji spirit. The Islamic Revolution's Guards Corps can have a basiji spirit. Basiji units, which have been established on this foundation, can have a basiji spirit.
translation.ha: Sojoji ma suna iya samun irin wannan ruhi na Basiji, su ma dakarun kare juyi suna iya samun wannan ruhi na Basiji, su ma dakarun Basijin wadanda bisa hakan ne aka samar da su suna iya samun wannan ruhi na Basijin.

translation.en: The diplomatic system of the country can have a basiji spirit.
translation.ha: Haka nan cibiyoyin gwamnati, haka nan cibiyoyin 'yan sanda, haka nan cibiyoyi na diplomasiyya ma suna iya samun wannan ruhi na Basiji.

translation.en: If these things happen, victory will be definite and swift. This is how we should look at basijis and the basiji spirit, and we should try to strengthen this spirit as much as we can.
translation.ha: Da irin wannan mahangar ce ya kamata mu dinga kallon dakarun Basij, da irin wannan mahangar ya kamata mu dinga kallon ruhin Basiji, sannan kuma mu yi kokarin karfafa wannan ruhin gwargwadon iyawarmu.

translation.en: In this case, the role of Basij is to rise above the situation and make sure the general path of the Revolution and the Islamic system does not deviate from the right path.
translation.ha: Basiji su duba su ga cewa lalle ba a kauce wa tafarkin juyin juya hali ba; su lura cewa ba a kauce wa hanya ba; a duk inda aka ga an kauce wa hanya, to Basiji su yi fada da hakan.

translation.en: One characteristic of Basij is that it follows a straight path towards the lofty goals of the Islamic Revolution without any deviations.
translation.ha: Ci gaba da tafiya a kan mikakken tafarkin juyin juya halin Musulunci ba tare da wuce gona da iri ko kauce wa hanya ba, hakan daya ne daga cikin kebantattun siffofin Basij.

translation.en: This is the basiji perspective.
translation.ha: Wannan ita ce mahanga da kuma kallo na Basiji.

translation.en: I deem it necessary to point out that Basij - with the characteristics that I mentioned earlier - is committed to the rules and values that were cohesively built into the framework of the Islamic system.
translation.ha: Wani lamarin kuma wanda wajibi ne in yi ishara da shi, shi ne cewa baya ga wadannan siffofi da aka ambata na Basiji, har ila yau kuma su din nan masu riko da kuma girmama dokoki da kuma koyarwar da aka tsara ne.

translation.en: There should be innovation, but not lack of discipline.
translation.ha: Na'am wajibi ne a samar da sabbin abubuwa, amma wajibi ne ya kasance bisa tsari ba wai cikin rashin tsari ba.

translation.en: Some people make a mistake in this regard.
translation.ha: Wasu suna kuskure, suna zaton cewa dan Basiji shi ne wanda ba ya girmama doka, ba ruwan sa da dukkanin dokoki da ka'idoji da aka kafa cikin al'umma. Ina, lalle ba haka lamarin ya ke ba, kuskure ne hakan.

translation.en: Of course, if the general identity of Basij - which reveals itself in the framework of the Islamic system, including the Leadership and legislative organizations - perceives a particular regulation as an obstacle, it will change that regulation.
translation.ha: Ko da yake a duk lokacin da jagorancin Basij wanda a wani lokaci ake ganinsa cikin jami'an wannan tsarin - da ya hada da jagora da masu kafa dokoki da makamantan hakan - suka ga cewa akwai wadansu dokoki da suke kawo cikas, to za su iya sauya wadannan dokoki.

translation.en: Basij will change that regulation, but this does not mean that Basij gives rise to chaos and lack of discipline. During the war, certain people used to say that Basij moves forward without any limits. They used to say that Basij does not have any brakes.
translation.ha: Za su sauya wannan dokar, ba wai a yi amfani da rashin tsari ba. Tun daga lokacin yaki, wasu su kan ce Basiji suna gudanar da ayyukansu ne ba tare da wani tsari ba - suna cewa Basiji ba su da birki - dalilin hakan kuma shi ne cewa a fagen yaki, a fagen kwamawa, haka ake ta kashe su, to amma kuma suna ci gaba da tsayin daka wajen sai sun kai hari; suna son su gaggauta kai hari.

translation.en: Their youthful enthusiasm and dynamism would attract them towards the battlefields.
translation.ha: Irin wannan ruhi na nishadi da kumaji na samartaka su ne suke kai su zuwa ga fagen daga.

translation.en: This kind of disagreement was always going on in different parts of the battlefields.
translation.ha: An ta samun irin wannan kace-nacen a bangarori daban-daban na fagen daga.

translation.en: They used to say that Basij does not have any brakes.
translation.ha: Suna cewa Basiji ba su da birki.

translation.en: This does not mean that Basij lacks discipline.
translation.ha: Hakan ba wai yana nufin Basiji ba su da tsari ba ne, ko kuma wajibi ne su zamanto marasa tsari, ko kuma rashin tsari wani abu ne mai kima.

translation.en: Discipline is a value. The Commander of the Faithful (a.s.) used to tell his children: "I advise you to fear God and organize your affairs."
translation.ha: Amirul Muminin (a.s) yana wasicci wa 'ya'yansa da cewa: "Ina muku wasicci da tsoron Allah da kuma tsara al'amurranku" (Nahjul Balaga, wasika ta 47).

translation.en: You should have discipline in your work.
translation.ha: Ku zamanto masu tsari cikin ayyukanku.

translation.en: It is discipline that prepares the ground for success.
translation.ha: Tsari shi ne abin da ke share fagen samun nasara.

translation.en: A military force that lacks discipline is totally useless. The rules that exist in the Armed Forces - the parades, the military formations, the badges, the uniforms and the discipline - are not just observed for the sake of appearances.
translation.ha: Idan har wasu gungun soji suka zamanto ba su da tsari, to kuwa za su zamanto ba su da amfani kwata-kwata. Irin wadannan tsarin da kuke gani a tattare da sojoji, irin wannan faretin da sanya tufafi masu tsafta da kuke gani tare da soji, lamarin ba wai shi ne suna son ne su fito tsaf (da nuna kansu ba ne), face dai hakan don a saba musu da tsari ne.

translation.en: This is discipline. Fortunately, today we see that these things are fully observed both in the Army and the Islamic Revolution's Guards Corps.
translation.ha: Abin farin cikin shi ne cewa a yau ana iya ganin hakan a tattare da dakarun kare juyi haka nan kuma a tattare da sojoji, za a ga cewa ana kula da hakan.

translation.en: Discipline is a necessity.
translation.ha: Tsari dai wani abu ne da ya zama wajibi.

translation.en: If you take discipline away from a military organization or unit, it becomes totally useless.
translation.ha: Idan har aka kwace tsari daga wajen sojoji, to kuwa ba su da wani amfani.

translation.en: For example, there are thousands of soldiers in a brigade.
translation.ha: A matsayin misali idan aka sami wasu gungun soji guda dubu a wani barikin soji, aka raba su zuwa gida-gida, kowace kungiya tana da yawan mutanenta sannan kuma karkashin wani kwamanda mai tsari da kuma umurni guda da za su aiwatar, to a irin wannan yanayi ne wadannan sojojin za su sami irin wannan karfi da ake bukata; idan kuwa ba haka ba, to mutane dubu ba tare da tsari ba, ba tare da wadannan tsare-tsare ba, ba tare da wannan umurnin ba, babu wani abin da za su iya.

translation.en: Therefore, discipline is a value and lack of discipline is not.
translation.ha: A saboda haka tsari wata kima ce, shi kuwa rashin tsari babu kima cikinsa.

translation.en: Anarchy is not a value. Acting according to the law is a value.
translation.ha: Aiki yadda doka ta tanadar wani abu ne mai kima, lalle ya kamata a kula da hakan.

translation.en: Pay attention to this point. This is one side of the issue. Another side of the issue is that it is wrong to resort to certain restrictive regulations in order to derail and isolate innovative movements that originate from the basiji spirit.
translation.ha: Wannan a wannan bangaren kenan, a daya bangaren kuma akwai wadansu mutane don su mai da wannan yunkuri na sabuntawa da yunkurin da ya samo asali daga ruhi na Basiji gefe da saniyar ware, sai suke yin karen tsare wa wasu daga cikin dokoki; wannan ma a daya bangaren kenan.

translation.en: On the one hand, it is necessary to avoid chaos and anarchy.
translation.ha: Saboda kada ya zamanto an fice daga da'irar doka, sannan a daya bangaren kuma a kawar da duk wani abin da ya ke kawo cikas ga dokokin daga kan hanya.

translation.en: This is part of our view of Basij.
translation.ha: Ala kulli hal wannan wani bangare ne na irin kallon da muke yi wa Basij.

translation.en: I would tell you that the future of the country is a very bright future.
translation.ha: Ina son in sanar da ku cewa, makomar wannan kasar wata makoma ce mai kyau.

translation.en: Contrary to what our enemies have constantly said - and their statements have been repeated by some spiteful and malevolent people inside the country - and contrary to all their propaganda which convinces some naÃ¯ve people, the movement of the Islamic Republic has been a successful movement. This is what our experience shows us.
translation.ha: Duk kuwa da irin abin da makiyanmu suke son ganin ya faru a kan mu, suna ta fadi sannan kuma wadansu bakuna masu mummunar manufa sai sake nanatawa suke yi, suna ta farfaganda sannan wasu mutane kuma masu karamar kwakwalwa sun yarda da hakan, lalle wannan yunkuri na juyi wani yunkuri ne da ke cike da nasara; kwarewar da muka samu ta tabbatar da hakan.

translation.en: No, we look at the realities on the ground and see that the Islamic Republic and the Iranian nation have made progress over the past 32 years thanks to this system: advances that are far more outstanding that the advances commonly achieved by other nations in the world.
translation.ha: Mu dai ba ma mafarki sannan kuma ba ma son mu gina abubuwa bisa zato sannan kuma mu faranta wa kawukanmu rai da irin wannan zaton; a'a, muna kallo hakika, muna ganin yadda tsarin Jamhuriyar Musulunci da al'ummar Iran da suke karkashin inuwar wannan tsari, muna ganin irin ci gaban da suka samu tsawon wadannan shekaru talatin da biyun. Shi ma gagarumin ci gaba wanda ya ketare irin ci gaban da aka saba da shi.

translation.en: Certain nations are good at management and they have made good achievements, but this movement by the Iranian nation has been more successful than the normal achievements that have been made throughout the world.
translation.ha: Akwai wadansu al'ummomi da suke da jagoranci mai kyau, suna gudanar da ayyuka masu kyau, to amma wannan yunkuri na al'ummar Iran ya fi zama cikin nasara da kuma cika sama da yadda aka saba gani a duniya.

translation.en: This is true of all areas. We have made progress in all areas.
translation.ha: Haka lamarin ya ke a dukkanin fagage; lalle mun ci gaba.

translation.en: There are certain problems in society.
translation.ha: Akwai wadansu matsaloli a cikin al'ummar mu.

translation.en: The fact that we have made progress does not mean there are no problems in the country.
translation.ha: Samun ci gaba ba yana nufin babu matsaloli ba ne; ma'anarsa ita ce yunkuri zuwa ga bangare cika da kamala; lalle akwai hakan.

translation.en: This is true of all areas - political areas, scientific areas and different other areas - which can be inspirational and helpful for the managers who are working for different sectors of the country and the people in charge of large-scale management throughout the country.
translation.ha: Haka lamarin ya ke a dukkanin fagage; a fagen siyasa, a fagen ilimi, a fagage daban-daban, wanda hakan yana iya zama mai sanya fata ga jami'ai a bangarori daban daban na kasar nan ko kuma ga manyan jami'an kasa.

translation.en: Commitment to the values is the most important factor.
translation.ha: Mafi muhimmanci daga dukkaninsu shi ne riko da manyan koyarwa.

translation.en: Commitment to the principles and values that form the foundation of the Revolution are very important.
translation.ha: Riko da koyarwa da tushen da aka gina juyin juya halin Musulunci a kansa, lamari ne mai matukar muhimmanci.

translation.en: It is a fact that at the beginning of the Revolution our youth were highly excited, which was due to the strong sentiments created by the Revolution.
translation.ha: To a farkon nasarar juyin juya halin Musulunci kumaji irin na samartaka yana da yawa - wanda ya samo asali ne sakamakon wannan kumaji na juyin - to amma ba a ko ina ba ne ake samun irin wannan zurfin tunanin ba.

translation.en: But the sentiments were not always deep. I was in contact with university students at that time, just as I am today.
translation.ha: A wacan lokacin na kasance mai mu'amala da daliban jami'a; a kowane mako na kan tafi jami'a sau daya don amsa tambayoyin da suke da su.

translation.en: In Tehran and everywhere else I went, I was faced with questions from our students.
translation.ha: A Tehran da kuma dukkanin wajajen da na ke tafiya haka lamarin ya kasance; na fuskanci irin tambayoyi da tunanin daliban jami'a.

translation.en: Today the views are far deeper and far more profound than those days and they are based on careful reflection on the principles. There was excitement at that time and there was also a valuable and successful movement in the country.
translation.ha: A wancan lokacin akwai kumaji, akwai yunkuri, yunkurin kuma wani yunkuri ne da ke cike da nasara da kuma kima, an kuma yi sadaukarwa da yawa; to amma matasan mu na yau sun fi kallon lamurra daga can cikinsa.

translation.en: But today's youth are deeper. Today that revolutionary excitement no longer exists and the enemies are broadcasting a lot of negative propaganda against us, yet this is how our youth are today.
translation.ha: A yau ma dai babu irin wadannan abubuwan da suke haifar da kumajin, irin farfagandar makiya ta yi yawa, to amma haka dai matasan yau suka kasance.

translation.en: There are some people who close their eyes to all these positive points and they focus their attention on problematic areas. They only see the problems. This is wrong.
translation.ha: To amma duk da irin wadannan abubuwa, wasu suna rufe idanuwansu, abin da kawai suke kallo shi ne wasu abubuwa marasa kyau; kawai abubuwa marasa kyau suke gani; hakan kuskure ne.

translation.en: What is important is to see whether we are moving towards resolution of these problems or not.
translation.ha: Akwai abubuwa marasa kyau, to amma wajibi ne mu duba mu ga shin wadannan abubuwa marasa kyau din sun kama hanyar gyaruwa ne ko kuma a'a; idan har muka ga sun kama hanyar magantuwa ne, an kama hanyar kyautata su ne, da kuma hanyar fahimta, to mu fahimci cewa lalle ayyukan da aka yi sun yi nasara.

translation.en: Dear youth, make this view the foundation of your movement.
translation.ha: Shi din ma a irin wannan duniyar wadda ake ta amfani da hanyoyin farfaganda wajen kautar da matasanmu muminai. Ya ku matasa abin kaunata!

translation.en: Try to influence the people around you.
translation.ha: Ku yi kokari wajen ganin kun yi tasiri a inda kuke.

translation.en: Try to increase this depth.
translation.ha: Ku yi kokarin kara irin wannan tunani na ku.

translation.en: Fortunately, today the necessary means have been prepared. The writings of Shahid Motahhari and the writings of our outstanding religious scholars and luminaries who are living in Qom, Tehran and other places - these writings contain good points and good teachings.
translation.ha: Su kansu wadannan rubuce-rubucen shahid Mutahari da sauran manyan malamai wadanda a yau suke a Kum da Tehran da sauran wajaje, abubuwa ne masu kyau, akwai masaniya masu kyau a ciki; akwai ababe masu karfafa ruhi, akwai abubuwa na hankali, akwai kula da kuma lura da makoma.

translation.en: Try to transform your mind with these teachings and try to promote them among the people around you.
translation.ha: Ku sauya kwakwalanku da wadannan masaniya da ilmummuka sannan ku yada su a inda kuke.

translation.en: Of course, there is also the spirit of relationship with God.
translation.ha: Ko da yake a nan akwai wani lamari wanda shi ne alaka da Ubangiji.

translation.en: Try to strengthen your spiritual relationship with Allah the Exalted as much as you can. This is very valuable.
translation.ha: Ku yi dukkanin abin da za ku iya wajen karfafa alakarku da Ubangiji Madaukakin Sarki; hakan lamari ne mai kimar gaske.

translation.en: Your youthful view, your sincere worship, your repentance, your divine remembrance, your appeal for divine assistance and your solemn praying are very effective.
translation.ha: Irin wannan mahanga ta samartaka da kuke da ita, duk wata magana ta zuci da za ku yi da Allah, duk wani istigfari da hailala da takbiri da neman taimako da kankan da kai a gaban Allah Madaukakin Sarki, wani lamari ne mai tasirin gaske a wajenku.

translation.en: Do not forget this.
translation.ha: Lalle kada ku mance da hakan.

translation.en: The gatherings that you arrange for divine remembrance and praying - try to imbue these gatherings with divine understanding.
translation.ha: Ku yi kokari wajen hada wadannan tarurruka da kuke da su - wato tarurruka na kyautata ruhi da addu'oi da sauransu - da masaniya.

translation.en: Dua Kumeyl coupled with an understanding of the relevant concepts, Dua Nudba and whatever else you engage in should be accompanied by divine understanding.
translation.ha: Ku hada Du'a Kumail tare da fahimtar ma'anoninta da irin ilimin da ke cikinta, haka nan ma Du'a Nudba, da kuma sauran ayyukan da kuke gudanarwa.

translation.en: It is necessary to benefit from the good, honorable and intellectual religious scholars of our country.
translation.ha: Ku yi kokarin amfanuwa da malamai masu girma kuma masu tunani - wadanda alhamdu lillahi akwai su.

translation.en: This movement is a successful movement and by Allah's favor, the Iranian nation will reach and conquer the peaks of global power thanks to the youthful, pious, basiji and innovative spirit that exists in the country. By Allah's favor, the Iranian nation will plant the flag of Islam at the peaks.
translation.ha: Wannan yunkuri, yunkuri ne da ke cike da nasara sannan kuma al'ummar Iran albarkacin wannan ruhi na samartaka da imani da basiji sannan kuma da akidar sabuntawa, da yardar Allah za a kai ga kololuwar nasara sannan kuma cikin ikon Allah za a daga tutar Musulunci a wannan kololuwa.

translation.en: Thirty years ago, nobody would have thought that Islamic and Quranic slogans would be shouted in countries such as Tunisia and Egypt.
translation.ha: Kamar yadda shekaru talatin da suka gabata babu wani da yake zaton cewa za a iya daga taken Musulunci da Alkur'ani da imani da koyarwar Musulunci a kasashe irin su Tunusiya ko kuma a kasa irin Masar.

translation.en: Today these slogans are heard in those countries and by Allah's favor, this wave is spreading throughout the world.
translation.ha: Amma a yau ana iya ganin irin wadannan taken. Da yardar Allah hakan zai ci gaba.

translation.en: Dear God, by the blessedness of Muhammad and his household, bestow Your mercy and blessings on these pure and enlightened hearts.
translation.ha: Don Muhammadu da Alayen Muhammadu, ka saukar da falala da rahama da karamarka a cikin wadannan tsarkakan zukata masu haske.

translation.en: Dear God, by the blessedness of Muhammad and his household, help those of us who are working for different sectors of the country to act the way that satisfies You.
translation.ha: Don Muhammadu da Alayen Muhammadu ka ba mu nasara a duk inda muke a wannan kasar don mu sami damar gudanar da ayyukanmu gwargwadon yardarka.

translation.en: Dear God, punish and suppress the enemies of this nation.
translation.ha: Ya Ubangiji Allah! Ka ruguza makiyan wannan al'umma.

translation.en: Dear God, prepare the means that are necessary for the Islamic glory, honor and pride of this nation.
translation.ha: Ya Ubangiji Allah! Ka kara irin abubuwan da suke tabbatar da daukaka da ci gaba irin na addini da na Musulunci a tsakanin wannan al'umma.

translation.en: Dear God, associate the immaculate soul of our magnanimous Imam with Your saints.
translation.ha: Ya Ubangiji Allah! Ka tayar da Imamin mu mai girma tare da waliyansa.

translation.en: Leader’s Speech to People of Isfahan - Khamenei.ir
translation.ha: Jawabin Jagora Yayin Ganawa Da Mutanen Isfahan Ranar Babbar Salla

translation.en: In the Name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful
translation.ha: Da Sunan Allah Mai Rahama Mai Jin Kai

translation.en: First of all, I would like to welcome you dear brothers and sisters who have traveled this long distance [from Isfahan to Tehran] to imbue the atmosphere of this Hussainiyyah with your faith and emotions on this auspicious Eid.
translation.ha: Da farko dai ina muku barka da zuwa Ya ku ‘yan'uwa maza da mata masu girma, wadanda kuka shafe wannan doguwar hanya sannan kuma kuka kawata yanayin wannan husainiya da wannan gagarumin imani da kumaji na ku a wannan rana ta babbar salla.

translation.en: I would also like to congratulate all you dear audience, the dear people of Isfahan, the entire Iranian nation and all Muslims throughout the world on Eid al-Adha.
translation.ha: Haka nan kuma ina taya ku da sauran mutanen garin Isfahan da dukkanin al'ummar Iran da sauran dukkanin al'ummar musulmi na duniya murnar wannan idi na babbar salla.

translation.en: The timing of this meeting is very appropriate. The 25th of Aban represents the sacrifices made by the people of Isfahan, and this occasion has coincided with Eid al-Adha this year.
translation.ha: Ranar 25, ga watan Aban (16, Nuwamba) daya ne daga cikin alamun sadaukarwar da mutanen Isfahan suka yi, wanda a wannan shekarar ta yi daidai da ranar babbar salla.

translation.en: If we pay attention to the philosophy inherent in Eid al-Adha, many paths will be opened up for us.
translation.ha: Idan har aka kalli irin hikimar da ke cikin ranar idin babbar salla, to kuwa da dama daga cikin kofofi za su budu mana.

translation.en: A select Messenger of the Righteous One, Prophet Ibrahim (a.s.), made a sacrifice on Eid al-Adha. In some cases, sacrificing your loved ones is beyond sacrificing your life. Prophet Ibrahim was about to sacrifice a loved one in the way of God - a young child whom Allah the Exalted had bestowed on him at an old age after a lifetime of waiting.
translation.ha: Sama da sadaukar da rai, a wani wajen ma sadaukarwa ce ta abin kauna. Shi din ya yi shirin sadaukar da wani abin kaunarsa ne saboda Allah; wanda shi ne wani dansa matashi wanda Allah Madaukakin Sarki Ya arzurta shi da shi bayan shekara da shekaru na jiran dako, a lokacin da ya tsufa; inda ya ke cewa: "Godiya ta tabbata ga Allah Wanda Yake Ya ba ni, ina a cikin tsufa, Isma'ila da Ishaka" (Suratu Ibrahim 14:39).

translation.en: [The Holy Quran, 14: 39] Allah the Exalted had bestowed these two sons on him at an old age, probably after a lifetime of impatient waiting. He had no hope of getting another child at that age.
translation.ha: Allah Madaukakin Sarki Ya ba wa wannan bawa na sa wadannan ‘ya'yaye guda biyu ne a lokacin tsufansa, wanda kuma ko shakka babu bayan shekara da shekaru na jiran dako da kauna ne; sannan kuma bayan hakan ba ya tunanin sake samun wani dan.

translation.en: The Master of the Martyrs of the entire world, Imam Hussein (a.s.), who is the symbol of sacrifice and martyrdom, remembers this event in the holy prayer of Arafah: "And Ibrahim decided to sacrifice his son at an old age after waiting a lifetime." This is part of a dua by Imam Hussein (a.s.) in Arafah, a dua that was recited by hajjis yesterday.
translation.ha: Shugaban shahidan dukkanin duniya, mai girma Abu Abdullah al-Husain (amincin Allah ya tabbata a gare shi) - wanda shi kansa ya zamanto wata alama ce ta sadaukarwa da shahada - cikin addu'ar nan ta ranar Arafa ya kawo wannan batu inda ya ke cewa: "Mai rike hannayen Ibrahim daga yanka dansa bayan tsufa da gushewar shekaru" wannan kalami ya zo ne cikin addu'ar Imam Husain a ranar arafa wanda a jiya muminai sun sami nasarar karanta wannan addu'ar.

translation.en: This sacrifice is a symbol for the faithful people who want to tread the path of truth, transcendence and perfection. This is impossible without a sacrifice.
translation.ha: Wannan sadaukarwa da wannan runtse ido, wata alama ce ga muminan da suke son bin tafarin gaskiya, tafarkin daukaka da kuma tafarkin kama hanyar isa zuwa madaukakin matsayi.

translation.en: In fact, all the tests that we go through involve one essential element - all tests involve a sacrifice.
translation.ha: Dukkanin jarabawan da muke ji, wannan shi ne yanayinsa na asali; ya kan sanya mana wani tafarki na sadaukarwa da kuma runtse idanuwa.

translation.en: If they go through this hardship, they will reach the desired destination.
translation.ha: Matukar mutum ya sami nasarar tsallakewa, zai isa ga wajen da yake son isa gare shi.

translation.en: And if they fail - if they fail to utilize the talent within them, if they fail to overcome their passions - they will fall by the wayside. This is what a test is. God does not put us through divine tests in order to get to know us and see at what level we are.
translation.ha: Idan kuwa bai sami nasarar ba - wato ya gagara bayyanar da irin karfin da ya ke da shi, ya gagara yin galaba a kan soyace-soyacen zuciyarsa - ya gagara tsallakewa; to wannan shi ne jarrabawa. Jarrabawa ba wai kawai don Allah ya fahimce mu ba ne, ya gano a wani matsayi mu ke; alal hakika ita kanta jarrabawa taka wani matsayi ne zuwa ga inda ake son kai wa.

translation.en: When we are tested and we manage to go through the hardships of tests, we enter a new situation, a new stage of life.
translation.ha: A kan jarrabe ni da kuma ku, ma'anar hakan ita ce idan har mun iya tsallake wannan tsanani da wahalar, to za mu sami wani sabon yanayi, wata sabuwar rayuwa da kuma sabon matsayi.

translation.en: A nation and an individual are not different from one another in this regard.
translation.ha: A irin wannan yanayin, babu wani bambanci tsakanin wata al'umma da wani mutum.

translation.en: Last year the Iranian nation went through a difficult test.
translation.ha: A shekarar da ta gabata al'ummar Iran ta tsallake wata jarrabawa, ta tsallake wata fitina.

translation.en: It went through a fitna. This does not just mean that everybody has realized the Iranian nation is powerful. Rather, what is more important is that our nation entered a new situation after this movement was carried out with this level of capability, the capability to deal with fitna and hardships.
translation.ha: Ma'anar hakan ba ita ce kawai cewa dukkanin duniya sun fahimci cewa al'ummar Iran al'umma ma'abociyar karfi ba; face ma'anar da ta fi wannan muhimmanci ita ce cewa ta hanyar wannan yunkurin, da irin wannan karfi da ta nuna na iya tsallake wannan fitinar, wannan al'umma ta kai ga wani sabon yanayi ne; ta sami wani sabon karfi ne a tattare da ita.

translation.en: Our nation has now obtained a new capability. During their lifetime, people are tested every step of the way. If we manage to overcome our passions, if we manage to utilize our insight, if we manage to detect the right time, and if we recognize the necessary measures to be taken, we will enter a new stage of life.
translation.ha: Idan har muka sami nasarar yin galaba a kan soyace-soyacen zuciyarmu, mu ka sami nasarar amfani da basirar da muke da ita, mu ka sami nasarar fahimtar yanayi, mu ka fahimci aikin da ya wajaba mu aikata sannan kuma muka aikata hakan, to hakan ya kan samar mana da wani sabon yanayi da wata sabuwar rayuwa ce; hakan wata daukaka da kuma ci gaba ne.

translation.en: Therefore, the 25th of Aban - which is a prominent day and a symbol - has this significance for the people of Isfahan.
translation.ha: A saboda haka, ranar 16 ga watan Nuwamba wata gagarumar rana ce sannan kuma wata alama ce da take nuni da cewa mutanen Isfahan suna da irin wannan yanayi (na cin jarrabawa)

translation.en: I deem it necessary to make a few points about the merits of the people of Isfahan. These things are considered to represent the identity of these faithful, honorable and persistent people.
translation.ha: A nan dai ina ganin ya zama wajibi a wannan fagen in fadi ‘yan wasu jumloli dangane da falalolin Isfahan da mutanen Isfahan; wanda hakan yana a matsayin wani katin shaida ne na mutanen wannan gari masu imani da tsayin daka.

translation.en: In one day the people of Isfahan held funeral ceremonies for 370 martyrs without batting an eye, and on the same day they sent soldiers to the battlefields. This is a very important point.
translation.ha: A rana guda (a lokacin kallafaffen yaki) mutanen Isfahan sun yi jana'izar shahidai dari uku da saba'in, amma babu abin da ya girgiza musu mutumcinsu; don kuwa a daidai wannan ranar ma sun sake tura wadansu mutane zuwa fagen daga, sun nuna goyon baya da kuma yunkurawa; lalle wannan lamari ne mai muhimmancin gaske.

translation.en: As the Friday prayer leader of Isfahan said, Imam Khomeini (r.a.) praised the people of Isfahan for this move.
translation.ha: Kamar yadda (Hujjatul Islam wa muslimin Tabataba'inajad, wakilin jagora kuma limamin juma'ar garin Isfahan) ya fadi, lalle Imam ya jinjina wa wannan aiki.

translation.en: In Aban of the year 1361, funeral ceremonies were held for 370 martyrs in one day, and they offered more than one thousand martyrs in the same month.
translation.ha: A dai wannan wata na Aban 1361 (1982) a rana guda an yi jana'izar shahidai dari uku da saba'in a Isfahan, a cikin wannan wata kawai adadin shahidan garin Isfahan sun ketare mutane dubu.

translation.en: Over one thousand martyrs!
translation.ha: Shahidai dubu da wani abu a wata guda!

translation.en: Who gets martyred?
translation.ha: Sannan kuma wasu mutane ne suke yi shahadar?

translation.en: Those who are in the arena and are exposed to danger - those who are pioneers. Before the Revolution, Isfahan had an outstanding presence in different events. The same is true of the events related to the Revolution as well as the imposed war.
translation.ha: Su ne mutanen da suka kasance a fagen daga, a fagen da ke cike da hatsari, sun kasance a sahun gaba. Kafin nasarar juyin juya halin Musulunci ma mutanen Isfahan sun kasance a fagage daban-daban, bayan nasarar juyin juya halin Musulunci ma haka lamarin ya kasance, haka nan a lokacin yaki ma, haka lamarin ya kasance.

translation.en: There were military units stationed in Isfahan, whether the units that belonged to the Army of the Guardians of the Revolution - including the Imam Hussein Army headquartered in Isfahan, the Najaf Army headquartered in Najafabad and the Ghamar-e Bani Hashem Brigade - or the units that belonged to the Army, or the artillery center in Isfahan. If you put all these things together, they will become very significant.
translation.ha: Bataliyoyin soji da suke garin Isfahan, shin wadanda suke da alaka da dakarun kare juyin juya halin Musulunci ne; wato bataliyar Imam Husain da helkwatarta take garin Isfahan ne, bataliyar Najaf da take da helkwata a garin Najaf'abad, sansanin Kamare Bani Hashim, ko kuma wadanda suke da alaka ta sojoji; wato bataliya ta takwas wanda wani gagarumin yunkuri ne wanda ni na kasance a wannan bataliyar da ke Isfahan - Allah ya yi rahama wa shahid Baba'iy - ko kuma bataliyar sojojin Igwa da take Isfahan; dukkanin wadannan abubuwa suna da wata ma'ana.

translation.en: You will conclude that in arenas that were important to the country, the people of Isfahan were considered among the pioneers during and after the eight-year imposed war. The same is true of their role in the growth and development of the country and in scientific issues.
translation.ha: Sakamakon hakan shi ne cewa bayan nasarar juyin juya halin Musulunci, haka nan a lokacin kallafaffen yaki na shekaru takwas, haka nan kuma bayan yaki a fagage daban-daban na ci gaban kasa da kuma fagage masu muhimmanci mutanen Isfahan sun kasance a sahun farko-farko; haka nan a fagagen ci gaban kasa da kuma ilimi.

translation.en: Some of the chronic problems of our Armed Forces were resolved in scientific and research centers of Isfahan.
translation.ha: A garin Isfahan ne aka sami nasarar kunce kullin wasu daga cikin matsalolin da sojoji da kuma cibiyoyin ilimi da bincikenmu suke fuskanta.

translation.en: These are sources of pride - not in the sense of self-importance, but in the sense of recognizing one's identity and innate talents and moving forward on the basis of this identity and these talents.
translation.ha: Wadannan abubuwa ne abin alfahari, ba wai saboda nuna kai ba, face dai da ma'anar bayyanar da irin matsayin da ake da shi da kuma irin karfin da ake da shi a wannan fagen da kuma yunkuri na ci gaba.

translation.en: Everybody knows that during the eight-year imposed war the people of Isfahan used to cooperate with different military units fighting at the first lines of defense. This is something that is clear to everybody.
translation.ha: A lokacin kallafaffen yakin shekaru takwas, kowa ya sani sannan kuma an yi ishara da hakan; mutanen Isfahan sun kasance a sahun gaba-gaba ne. To wannan dai lamari ne da ya ke a fili ga kowa.

translation.en: But what is not so clear to many people is the role of obscure and humble people who acted as backup for the soldiers fighting at the front lines all those years - women who used to help from homes, businessmen who used to work at the bazaar, people who were active in bureaucratic organizations and jihadists who used to provide different kinds of services for the war fronts.
translation.ha: Abin da ya buya ga da dama daga cikin mutane shi ne gagarumar gudummawar da wadansu mutane wadanda ba a sansu ba suka bayar tsawon wadannan shekaru a fagen ba da kariya; wato matan da suke cikin gida, ‘yan kasuwan da suke cikin kasuwa, mutanen da suka kasance a ma'aikatu na gwamnati suna ci gaba da gudanar da ayyukansu, masu jihadin da suke yin hidima daban-daban ga wadansu suke fagen daga.

translation.en: There were people among them who were even martyred. There were people among them who were martyred or offered martyrs, and they were humble people whose names have not been registered anywhere.
translation.ha: Daga cikinsu ma muna da wadanda suka sadaukar da shahidai; wato su kansu suka yi shahada ko kuma suka ba da shahidi, ba su taba yin wata kuka ko kuma nuna kansu ba, haka nan kuma babu ma inda aka rubuta sunayensu; to sai dai sun kasance sanannu a sama; Allah Madaukakin Sarki ya san da zamansu.

translation.en: Not even the smallest things go unaccounted for in divine calculations.
translation.ha: A lissafi na Ubangiji, babu wani abin da zai bace komai kashinsa kuwa.

translation.en: All those aid caravans from Isfahan, all those efforts and all that motivation, yet look at the families of those martyrs.
translation.ha: Dukkanin irin wadannan taimako da ya fito daga Isfahan, irin wannan himma, irin wannan kumaji, irin wadannan iyalai da wadannan shahidai.

translation.en: Surely the friends of God - they shall have no fear nor shall they grieve.
translation.ha: Shahidai dai wani dan lokaci na wahala ne kawai suka gani, daga nan kuma suka tashi sama; ba su wata wahala tattare da su: "babu tsoro a kansu, kuma ba za su kasance suna yin bakin ciki ba" (Suratu Yunus 10:62) damuwar tana ga iyalai ne; iyaye maza, iyaye mata, mataye da ‘ya'yaye, ‘yan'uwa maza da mata; su din nan sun yi hakuri, sun yi alfahari da su.

translation.en: No nation will ever achieve anything by sitting around, eating, sleeping, relying on foreigners and letting passions dominate its life.
translation.ha: Babu wata kasa da za ta cimma wani abu ta hanyar zama da ci da sha da kuma dogaro da 'yan kasashen waje.

translation.en: Some people spin negative yarns when there is a mention of the Sacred Defense, make sarcastic comments when there is a mention of martyrdom, distort their faces when there is a mention of disabled soldiers and war veterans and laugh scornfully when there is a mention of centrifuges for uranium enrichment. They simply shake their heads and say, "It is impossible." These people do not understand anything about the movement of a nation.
translation.ha: Mutanen da a lokacin da aka yi magana kan kallafaffen yaki suke wa lamarin kallo mara kyau, a lokacin da aka yi magana kan shahada sai su kama suka; a lokacin da aka yi magana kan wadanda suka sami rauni a wajen yaki da wadanda suka yi sadaukarwa, sai su turbune fuskokinsu, a lokacin da aka yi magana kan ci gaban ilimi da karya kan iyakar ilimi da aka yi, sai su dinga dariya ta isgili, a lokacin da aka yi maganar makwararan makamashin nukiliya, sai su dinga karkada kawukansu suna cewa haka ba abu ne mai yiyuwa ba, to lalle wadannan mutane ba su fahimci yunkurin wata al'umma ba.

translation.en: Those who have been trained in a wrong way and according to corrupt satanic ethics do not understand anything about the effect of faith and jihad.
translation.ha: Mutanen da suka sami tarbiyyar da take cike da kuskure da mummunar halaye na dagutu ba za su iya fahimtar tasiri na imani da yunkuri da jihadi ba.

translation.en: When a nation comes to believe in jihad, it becomes a pioneer in all arenas.
translation.ha: A lokacin da wata al'umma ta yi imani da jihadi, to kuwa za ta sami ci gaba a dukkanin fagage.

translation.en: Jihad is not just limited to holding a rifle in your hand. Jihad means that one should see oneself in the arena of action and fight against the obstacles and those who create them.
translation.ha: Jihadi ba shi ne kawai daukan bindiga ba; jihadi shi ne cewa mutum a koda yaushe ya dinga ganin kansa a matsayin yana fagen yunkuri da gwagwarmaya da abubuwan da suke kawo cikas ne, ya dinga jin cewa yana da wani nauyi a wuyansu; to wannan shi ne jihadi; wannan shi ne jihadi na Musulunci.

translation.en: This is Islamic jihad. Jihad may be carried out by laying down one's life. It may also be carried out through one's wealth, thought, shouting slogans, taking to the streets and going to the ballot boxes.
translation.ha: A wani lokaci jihadi ya kan kasance da rai ne, wani lokaci kuma da dukiya, wani lokaci kuma da tunani, wani lokaci kuma da daga murya da take ne, wani lokaci kuma da fitowa a kan tituna ne, wani lokaci kuma ta hanyar fitowa zabe ne; wannan shi ne jihadi saboda Allah.

translation.en: This is jihad in the way of Allah, and it is what helps a nation grow, make progress and become dynamic, revitalized and hopeful.
translation.ha: Hakan kuwa shi ne abin da yake ciyar da wata al'umma gaba, ya daukaka ta, ya ba ta sanon numfashi, ya sanya mata fata da kuma ciyar da wata al'umma gaba.

translation.en: How can it go about this fight?
translation.ha: To ta ya ya ne za a iya fada da wannan al'ummar?

translation.en: It is not possible to fight it through war - they tried this and saw the result. It is not possible to fight it through war and military threats.
