translation.ha: Ba za su iya yin hakan ta hanyar yaki - don kuwa sun gwada kuma sun gani - ba za su iya yin hakan ta hanyar barazana da yaki da kawo hari ba, haka nan ba za su iya ba ta hanyar sanya takunkumi ba.

translation.en: Those who think that they can bring the Iranian nation to its knees through sanctions are just wasting their time.
translation.ha: Duk wanda ya ke tunanin cewa zai iya dunkufar da al'ummar Iran ta hanyar sanya mata takunkumi lalle ya kama teku da yasa.

translation.en: When a nation has hope and faith and knows what it is doing, it cannot be forced to retreat through the use of threats.
translation.ha: Al'ummar da take da fata, take da imani, wacce ta san me ya kamata ta aikata, to lalle ba za a iya tilasta wa irin wannan al'umma ja da baya saboda barazana ba.

translation.en: In order to fight such a nation, they will pay attention to the point that you mentioned [refers to a slogan shouted by the audience], which is indicative of the vigilance of you dear people of Isfahan: Creating a rift in the nation, turning the people against one another, creating a gap between the people and government officials, and causing suspicion and disagreement over trivial issues.
translation.ha: Don fada da irin wannan al'umma, su ma suna lura da wannan lamari da kuke lura da shi sannan kuma kuke fadi (a nan Jagora yana ishara ne da taken da mahalarta taron suka ta rerawa na Allah Ya la'anci munafukai masu tayar da fitina) - lalle hakan yana nuni da irin sanin ya kamatan da mutanen Isfahan suke da shi ne -: wato su yi kokarin haifar da sabani tsakanin al'umma, su sanya mutane fada da junansu, haifar da gagarumar tazara tsakanin mutane da jami'an gwamnati, haifar da mummunan zato da haifar da kace-nace kan 'yan wadansu lamurran da ba su taka kara sun karya ba.

translation.en: This is one of the most important forms of enmity utilized by the enemies of the Islamic Revolution.
translation.ha: Wannan shi ne daya daga cikin hanyoyin kiyayyar makiya ga wannan juyi na Musulunci.

translation.en: Of course the people of Isfahan have been vigilant.
translation.ha: Ko da yake mutanen Isfahan sun lura.

translation.en: Everybody should guard against creation of division, fitna and suspicion of the system. You see some people leveling accusations against the Islamic Republic here and there with no regard for any considerations or principles. They act as the enemy's representatives and say whatever they like because if the propaganda machines of the anti-Islam, Zionist and American camp could not make themselves heard, they want to be able to make up for it and deliver their message to people.
translation.ha: Mutanen da haka kawai a nan da can ba tare da la'akari da wani kan iyaka ba, ba tare da la'akari da wasu abubuwa ba suke tuhumar cibiyoyin Jamhuriyar Musulunci; duk wani abin da ya fito bakinsu za su wakilci makiya wajen fadinsu; saboda idan har muryoyin farfagandar masu adawa da Musulunci da yahudawan sahyoniya da Amurka ba su iya isa ga kunnuwan mutane ba su kuwa sai su cike wannan gurbin wajen isar da wadannan abubuwan da makiya suke fadi ga mutane, to lalle suna ha'intar mutane ne; wannan wani ha'inci ne da yake a fili.

translation.en: These people are betraying the nation. This is in fact a clear betrayal. Making the people suspect each other and the hardworking government officials and creating an atmosphere of despair - these are one of the methods.
translation.ha: Daya daga cikin hanyoyin da makiya din suke bi shi ne haifar da sabani tsakanin mutane, tsakanin mutane da jami'ar, a dinga mummunan kallo ga masu yin hidima wa al'umma da kuma haifar da yanayin yanke kauna cikin zukatan al'umma.

translation.en: Another method is to promote moral corruption in society.
translation.ha: Daya daga cikin hanyoyi na daban din kuma ita ce yada fasadi da lalalta cikin al'umma.

translation.en: Everybody, especially our youth, should be extremely vigilant.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne kowa da kowa ya yi taka tsantsan musamman ma matasa.

translation.en: Unfortunately moral corruption and moral degeneration are used as a means to further the political goals of the arrogant powers. In order to weaken and annihilate a nation - and of course to obtain money in the process - they use drugs as means to further their political goals in many parts of the world.
translation.ha: Abin bakin cikin shi ne cewa ma'abota girman kai sun mai da lalata halaye da fasadi a matsayin kayan aikin cimma bakar siyasarsu; kamar yadda a mafi yawa daga cikin cibiyoyi na duniya an mayar da muggan kwayoyi a matsayin makamin lalata wata al'umma da kuma cimma manufofinsu na siyasa, duk kuwa da cewa akwai kuma manufa ta tara kudin.

translation.en: Our nation, our youth and our government officials should be extremely careful about these things.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne al'ummar mu, matasanmu da kuma jami'anmu su yi taka tsantsan sosai.

translation.en: Isfahan enjoys highly prominent capacities, just as it did in the past. You should appreciate these capacities.
translation.ha: Isfahan tana da fagage masu yawan gaske, a baya ma haka lamarin ya kasance; wajibi ne ku girmama wadannan fagage.

translation.en: Isfahan is the center of knowledge - religious knowledge and different other types of knowledge. It used to be the center of knowledge in the past as well.
translation.ha: Isfahan cibiya ce ta ilimi - ilimi na addini da sauran ilmummuka daban-daban - a baya ma haka lamarin ya kasance, a yau ma haka lamarin yake.

translation.en: Fortunately Isfahan has a good Islamic seminary today.
translation.ha: Alhamdu lillahi a yau ma garin Isfahan yana da makarantar hauza mai kyau; haka nan kuma akwai wadansu jami'oi masu girma na kasar nan a can.

translation.en: It behooves the ulama, scholars and researchers of Isfahan to set their sights on the glory that Isfahan used to enjoy during the past centuries.
translation.ha: Lalle akwai bukatar malamai da masana da masu bincike na garin Isfahan su yi dubi sosai cikin wadannan fagage masu girma na karnonin da suka gabata.

translation.en: One day Isfahan was the center of scientific brilliance in the entire country and even in the entire world of Islam. You should be after such a position.
translation.ha: A wata rana a baya Isfahan ta kasance cibiyar yada ilimi ga dukkanin kasar nan, kai ga dukkanin duniyar musulmi ma; wajibi ne ku yunkura don neman irin wannan matsayi.

translation.en: Isfahan is also prominent in artistic areas, fine arts and handicrafts.
translation.ha: Har zuwa yanzu garin Isfahan ya yi fice a fagen fasaha, a fagen masana'antu da sana'a ta hannu.

translation.en: Each of these things is an advantage.
translation.ha: Kowane guda daga cikin wadannan abubuwa abubuwa ne masu kyau.

translation.en: And the religious faith and beliefs of the people of Isfahan is the supporting foundation of all these things. This has been manifested in the behavior of the people of Isfahan since before the Revolution, but after the Revolution everything acquired new dimensions.
translation.ha: Imani da riko da addinin mutanen Isfahan ma shi ne ya ke gaba da sauran abubuwa; wanda irin wadannan halaye na mutane ya kasance tun ma kafin nasarar juyin juya halin Musulunci, to sai dai bayan nasarar juyin juya halin Musuluncin komai ya dau sabon yanayi da kuma fadaduwa.

translation.en: I used to visit Isfahan a lot at that time. I was witness to the religious situation of the people and their commitment to religious matters.
translation.ha: A wadancan lokuta na kasance ina yawan zuwa garin Isfahan; ina ganin irin yanayin riko da addinin mutane da koyarwa ta addini.

translation.en: Therefore, this religious faith is a great support.
translation.ha: Ko da yake a halin yanzu kan an sami ninkuwan haka ninkin ba ninkiya; hakan wata garkuwa ce mai girma.

translation.en: When a nation enjoys faith, it feels that nothing it does is ever futile.
translation.ha: A lokacin da wata al'umma ta zamanto mai imani, za ta ji cewa babu wani aiki na ta da yake a matsayin hasara.

translation.en: By Allah's favor, today the Iranian nation has managed to successfully confront different kinds of hostilities.
translation.ha: A yau al'ummar Iran cikin yardar Allah ta sami nasarar dunkufar da makiya daban-daban.

translation.en: In today's world, the basis of the enmity of the anti-Islam camp towards the Islamic Republic is the faith of this government, this Republic and this nation in divine values. Materialistic leaders cannot tolerate this.
translation.ha: Asasin kiyayyar da masu adawa da Musulunci da Jamhuriyar Musulunci shi ne imanin wannan tsari da wannan jamhuriya da wannan al'umma suka yi da koyarwa ta Ubangiji ne; ‘yan jari hujja na duniya ba za su taba amincewa da hakan ba.

translation.en: This is one side of the issue. The other side of the issue is that the progressive movement of the Iranian nation during the past 32 years was all because of divine faith and devotion to these values.
translation.ha: Wani bangare na lamarin shi ne cewa wannan yunkuri na ci gaba na al'ummar Iran tsawon wadannan shekaru talatin da biyu, ya samo asali ne sakamakon imani na Ubangiji da imani da wadannan koyarwa; ku ci gaba da kiyaye wadannan abubuwa da dukkan karfinku.

translation.en: You should know that this progress will continue.
translation.ha: Ku san cewa wannan ci gaba zai ci gaba da wanzuwa sannan kuma makiya babu wata nasarar da za su samu sannan kuma al'ummar Iran za su zamanto masu nasara a dukkanin fagage.

translation.en: Dear God, bestow Your mercy, grace and assistance on this nation and on the dear people of Isfahan.
translation.ha: Ka saukar da dukkanin rahama da falala da taimakonka a kan wannan al'umma da kuma al'ummar Isfahan masu girma.

translation.en: Make the holy heart of the Imam of the Age satisfied with us, and make us benefit from his prayers.
translation.ha: Ka sanya zuciyar Waliyul Asr mai tsarki ta yarda da mu sannan kuma ka sanya mu cikin addu'ar wannan mai girman.

translation.en: Leader's Speech to Exemplary Nurses - Khamenei.ir
translation.ha: Jawabin Jagora Yayin Ganawa Da Dubban Malaman Jiyya Na Iran

translation.en: The following is the full text of the speech delivered on April 21, 2010 by Ayatollah Khamenei the Leader of the Islamic Revolution to a large number of exemplary nurses from across the country.
translation.ha: Shimfida: A ranar laraba 21, Aprilun 2010 ne Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci Ayatullah Sayyid Ali Khamenei ya gana da dubun dubatan malaman jiyya da suka fito daga bangarori daban-daban na kasar Iran don tunawa da ranar da aka haifi Sayyida Zainab al-Kubra 'yar Imam Ali (a.s).

translation.en: In the Name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful
translation.ha: Da Sunan Allah Mai Rahama Mai Jin Kai

translation.en: First of all, I would like to congratulate all the dear brothers and sisters as well as all the esteemed nurses of the country on the occasion of Nurse Day and the birthday anniversary of Zeinab al-Kubra (s.a.).
translation.ha: Da farko dai ina taya dukkanin 'yan'uwa maza da mata malaman jiyya masu girma murnar zagayowar ranar haihuwar Zainab al-Kubra, wannan mace abar koyi cikin tarihin bil'adama.

translation.en: I hope as a reward for your great services and precious efforts, Allah the Exalted will bestow His grace and guidance on all you dear nurses and all health professionals of the country.
translation.ha: Muna fatan Allah Madaukakin Sarki da Ya ba ku ladar wannan gagarumar hidima, da wannan kokari na ku mai girma da kuke yi sannan kuma rahamarsa da shiryarwarsa da kuma falalarsa ta kasance ga dukkaninku da kuma dukkanin malaman jiyya na kasa da dukkanin jami'an bangaren kiwon lafiya na kasa.

translation.en: The main purpose of today's meeting is to thank our nurses for their efforts.
translation.ha: Tushen maganar mu ta yau da kuma wannan ganawarmu ta yau shi ne don nuna godiya kan irin hidimar da malaman jiyya suke yi.

translation.en: Health issues are among the most important issues in human communities.
translation.ha: Batun kiwon lafiya daya ne daga cikin batutuwa na farko masu muhimmanci na rayuwar al'umma.

translation.en: There are two blessings whose value is not appreciated: Health and security. There is indeed an essential point in this famous hadith.
translation.ha: Wannan sanannen hadisi da ke cewa: "Ni'imomi guda biyu da aka jahilce su, (su ne) lafiya da tsaro" alal hakika wani lamari ne da ke nuni da wannan batu mai muhimmanci wanda kuma yake da alaka da rayuwa.

translation.en: Both health and security are among the blessings that cannot be properly appreciated before they are taken away - just like the air we breathe.
translation.ha: Lafiya da kuma tsaro suna daga cikin manyan ni'imomin da mutum ba zai san irin muhimmancin da suke da shi ba har sai lokacin da ya rasa su; tamkar iskar da jan numfashi ne.

translation.en: As long as you can breathe easily, you will not understand the importance of this free and plentiful blessing. But when breathing becomes difficult, you will know what a great blessing you have lost.
translation.ha: Har ya zuwa lokacin da mutum yake numfashi ba zai iya fahimtar muhimmancin wannan ni'ima ta kyauta wacce ake samunta a ko ina ba; daga lokacin da aka samu matsalar numfashi, daga nan ne mutum zai iya fahimtar irin gagarumar ni'imar da ya rasa.

translation.en: In fact, this great blessing is provided for society by the health and nursing profession.
translation.ha: Alal hakika gungun likitoci da malaman jiyya da kuma jami'an kiwon lafiya su ne masu kiyaye wannan gagarumar ni'ima saboda al'umma.

translation.en: And nurses have a very prominent role in this regard.
translation.ha: Gudummawar malaman jiyya a wannan fagen kuwa, gudummawa ce mai girman gaske.

translation.en: Nurses are constantly faced with a spiritual and psychological challenge. They are not just faced with a physical challenge. It is very difficult to see the sufferings of patients and feel duty-bound to provide physical and spiritual treatment for them.
translation.ha: Malamin jiyya a ko da yaushe yana cikin kalubale da matsin lamba na ruhi da kwakwalwa ne; ba wai kawai lamari ne da ya shafi jikinsa ba. Gajiya ta ruhi, mu'amala da marasa lafiya da kuma jin nauyin cewa ya ya zan yi in magance wa wannan mara lafiya cutar da take damunsa, wato magani na jiki da kuma magani na ruhi, batu ne mai matukar muhimmanci, aiki ne mai wahalar gaske.

translation.en: I assure you that you will receive a reward from Allah the Exalted for every moment of your work and your sense of responsibility to the patients who are in pain.
translation.ha: Ku kwana da sanin cewa duk wani lokaci, duk wata dakika da kuka gudanar wajen aiwatar da wannan aiki alhali kuna jin cewa akwai wani nauyi da ke wuyanku dangane da wannan mara lafiyan, za ku sami wata lada daga wajen Allah Madaukakin Sarki.

translation.en: Not even a single moment will go unrewarded.
translation.ha: Babu wata dakika da take wucewa a wajen Allah.

translation.en: One should not think that the painful moments that a nurse spends at the bedside of a patient will not be noticed by God.
translation.ha: Bai kamata a yi zaton cewa a wajen hisabi na Ubangiji za a gafala daga duk wani lokaci mai tsanani da malamin jiyya ya kasance a gaban gadon mara lafiya ba; lalle lamarin ba haka yake ba.

translation.en: Every moment of your work and every effort you make deserve a divine reward. Every time you exercise patience in the face of the hardships will be recorded by Allah the Exalted.
translation.ha: Duk wani lokacin da kuka sarrafa sannan kuma duk wani kokari da kuka yi, duk wani kokari da kuka nuna a gaban wahalhalu, hakan wani aiki ne mai kyau, wata lada ce, kuma Allah Madaukakin Sarki zai rubuta hakan.

translation.en: It is necessary to appreciate these challenging duties which have crucial implications for society.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne a girmama irin wadannan ayyuka masu wahala da kuma tasiri mai girma da kuma muhimmanci.

translation.en: It is necessary to pay attention to these obligations as well.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne a lura da nauyin da ke wuya.

translation.en: Your patients have emotions and a soul, and they need compassion, especially when they are in pain. They need to be treated kindly.
translation.ha: Ruhin mutum, shu'uri na mutum da yanayi na mutum, musamman a lokacin da yake fama da rashin lafiya, suna bukatar tausayawa, suna bukatar kula.

translation.en: Sometimes a simple smile is more effective than the medicine you give them.
translation.ha: A wani lokaci dariyar da za ku yi wa wani mara lafiya, ta fi kima da muhimmanci a wajensa sama da maganin da za ku ba shi, tasirinta ya fi yawa.

translation.en: This is in the hands of nurses.
translation.ha: Wannan yana hannunku ne.

translation.en: They will receive great rewards for their work, but the duty they have to shoulder is very difficult.
translation.ha: Malamin jiyya dai yana dauke da wani aiki mai wahalar gaske a wuyansa, to amma yana da lada mai girma; to sai dai yana tare da aiki mai wahalar gaske.

translation.en: The balance between one's rights and obligations is one of the greatest tenets of Islamic thought.
translation.ha: Wannan daidaito tsakanin aiki da lada, tsakanin gaskiya da takalifi, daya ne daga cikin rukunai masu girma na ma'anoni na Musulunci da kuma koyarwar Musulunci.

translation.en: The esteemed Minister spoke about in-service training, which is a very valuable thing to do. It would be appropriate if in-service courses could provide professional as well as ethical training for our nurses. It is indeed necessary to prepare a charter of ethics for our nurses, and it should be taught to them so that they realize the importance of their work and do their job appropriately.
translation.ha: Alal hakika wajibi ne a samar da wani kundi na halayen malaman jiyya, wajibi ne a koyar da dokokin aikin jiyya, wajibi ne malamin jiyya ya san irin girman aikin da yake yi - wanda ko shakka babu girman aiki, wani wajibi ne da ke tafiya tare da muhimmancin shi kansa mutum - su gudanar da aikinsu yadda ya dace da shi.

translation.en: I wish you success. In the Islamic Republic, Nurse Day has been chosen to coincide with Zeinab al-Kubra's (s.a.) birthday anniversary.
translation.ha: To a Jamhuriyar Musulunci ta Iran an sanya ranar haihuwar Sayyida Zainab al-Kubra (amincin Allah ya tabbata a gare ta) ne ya zamanto ranar malaman jiyya (ta kasa); hakan yana da ma'ana mai girman gaske.

translation.en: Zeinab al-Kubra (s.a.) is a prominent role model in history and shows the significance of a woman's presence in one of the most important events in human history.
translation.ha: Zainab al-Kubra (a.s.) ta kasance wata abar koyi a cikin tarihi wanda hakan yana nuni da irin girman da wata mace take da shi cikin lamari mai matukar muhimmanci cikin tarihi.

translation.en: Blood gained a victory over the sword on the day of Ashura, and Zeinab al-Kubra (s.a.) was the cause of that victory.
translation.ha: Abin da ake fadi na cewa jini ya yi nasara a kan takobi a lokacin waki'ar Ashura, cikin abin da ya faru a Karbala - wanda kuma a hakikanin gaskiya haka lamarin yake - ummul aba'isin din wannan nasarar ita ce Sayyida Zainab; don kuwa idan ba haka ba, ai jini ya riga da ya kare a filin Karbala.

translation.en: This was because the forces of righteousness were apparently defeated in a military fight in Karbala, but Zeinab al-Kubra's (s.a.) behavior was the factor that turned this apparent defeat into a permanent and decisive victory. That victory was due to the role she played after the day of Ashura. That is a very important point.
translation.ha: Yaki ne na soji wanda ya kawo karshe da shan kashi na zahiri na rundunar gaskiya a ranar ashura, to sai dai abin da ya mai da wannan shan kashi na zahiri na soji zuwa ga wata nasara ta har abada, shi ne irin halaye na Zainab al-Kubra; irin nauyin da Sayyida Zainab ta dauka a wuyanta; wannan wani lamari ne mai matukar muhimmancin gaske.

translation.en: The event proved that women are not on the periphery of history. It proved that women can have a central role in important historical events.
translation.ha: Wannan lamari ne dake nuni da cewa mace dai ba a bar ta a bayan fage na tarihi ba, mace tana cikin abubuwa masu muhimmanci na tarihi.

translation.en: She proved that it is possible to turn feminine morality and modesty into glory and a great jihad.
translation.ha: Zainab (amincin Allah ya tabbata a gare ta) ta tabbatar da cewa ana iya sauya hijabi da mutumci na mace zuwa ga daukaka da wani kokari; zuwa ga wani gagarumin jihadi.

translation.en: The greatness of Zeinab al-Kubra's (s.a.) movement is reflected in what is left of her sermons.
translation.ha: Abin da ya rage daga cikin jawaban Zainab al-Kubra wanda kuma a yau yake hannunmu yana nuni da irin girman wannan yunkuri na Zainab al-Kubra ne.

translation.en: It was not just the personal opinion of an important figure.
translation.ha: Wadansu suna farin ciki, wasu kuma suna kuka; a irin wannan yanayi ne kwatsam sai wannan rana mai haske ta bayyana.

translation.en: O plotters and pretenders, maybe you yourselves were starting to believe that you were following Islam and the Holy Prophet's household, but you failed miserably in the test. 0.237595 18.txt 1300-Leader-s-Speech-to-Exemplary-Nurses.txt Kuna jiji da kanku, kuna zaton cewa kuna da imani, kuna zaton cewa har ya zuwa yanzu ku ma'abota juyi ne, har ya zuwa yanzu kuna zaton ku din nan mabiya Amirul Muminin ne; alhali kuwa lamarin ba haka yake ba. You became arrogant and wrongly thought that you were pious. 0.022264 18.txt 1300-Leader-s-Speech-to-Exemplary-Nurses.txt Ta hanyar rashin basirarku, ta hanyar rashin sanin yanayin da ake ciki, ta hanyar rashin fahimtar gaskiya da karya, kun lalata abubuwan da kuka aikata a baya, kun bata tarihinku. Because of your lack of insight, your lack of knowledge of the situation, and your inability to distinguish right from wrong, you ruined everything you had built. 0.245389 18.txt 1300-Leader-s-Speech-to-Exemplary-Nurses.txt Ta kasance mace ce ta tarihi; wannan mace, ba mace ce mai rauni ba. She was not speaking the way an orator would speak to his audience. 0.128806 18.txt 1300-Leader-s-Speech-to-Exemplary-Nurses.txt Bai kamata a dauka cewa mace tana da rauni ba. Such women cannot be considered weak. 0.463138 18.txt 1300-Leader-s-Speech-to-Exemplary-Nurses.txt Wannan ita ce mace da ta zamanto abar koyi; abar koyi ga dukkan manyan mazaje na duniya haka nan kuma ga manyan mata na duniya. This faithful feminine nature may reveal itself in difficult conditions. She is a role model for all great men and women in the world. 0.309650 18.txt 1300-Leader-s-Speech-to-Exemplary-Nurses.txt Ta haka ne take gano wadanda suke rike da yunkurin Annabi da na Imam Ali ne (da kuma wadanda suke karyar riko da su); tana ce musu ku din nan kun gagara gane gaskiya a lokacin da ake cikin fitina; kun gagara sauke nauyin da ke wuyanku; sakamakon hakan shi ne ya sanya aka tsire kan hantar Ma'aikin Allah (Imam Husain) a kan mashi. She said, You could not distinguish between right and wrong in the fitna. You were unable to fulfill your duty. As a result, they severed the head of the Holy Prophet's (s.w.a.) grandson and put it on a spear."
translation.ha: Me yiyuwa ne kun yarda cewa ku din nan mabiya Musulunci da Ahlulbaiti ne; to amma ku duba yadda kuka nuna gazawa a gaban wannan jarrabawar, kun nuna rashin damuwarku a lokacin fitina.

translation.en: This is a warning to our women to identify their role. They should understand the greatness of being a woman by combining feminine modesty and morality with pious dignity.
translation.ha: Ku fahimci irin girman da mace take da ita wajen sanya hijabi da kunya da kiyaye mutumci irin na mace da kuma daukaka ta mace musulma kuma mumina.

translation.en: That is how faithful Muslim women are. The corrupt western world tried to impose its wrong and misguided redefinition of women on the people of the world - which was degrading to women.
translation.ha: Haka matayenmu musulmi suke. Lalatacciyar duniyar yammaci tana son ta bayyanar da mace da kuma mutumci mace ta karkatacciyar hanyar da take cike da kaskantar da mace da kuma wulakanta jinsin mace a cikin kwakwalan duniya: idan har mace tana son ta bayyanar da kanta, to wajibi ne ta zamanto abar kashe kwarkwatan idanuwan mazaje.

translation.en: They tried to convince the world that in order to develop a personality, women have to look attractive to men.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne ta yi watsi da hijabi da kuma mutumcinta, ta yi watsi da su don ta janyo hankulan mazaje.

translation.en: Is this humiliation or respect?
translation.ha: Shin wannan girmama mace ne ko kuma kaskantar da ita?

translation.en: And some people were taken in. The greatness of women does not depend on their ability to attract the attention of immoral men.
translation.ha: Girma da daukakar mace ba su ne sai ta iya janyo hankula da idanuwan makwadaitan mazaje zuwa kanta ba, hakan ba abin alfahari ba ne ga wata mace; wannan ba girmama mace ba ne; wannan kaskantar da mace ne.

translation.en: Therefore, the Holy Quran mentions the names of two women as examples of religious faith for both men and women. "And God sets forth, as an example to those who believe, the wife of Pharaoh" [The Holy Quran, 66: 11]. "And Mary the daughter of Imran" [The Holy Quran, 66: 12].God mentions the wife of Pharaoh and Mary as two examples of faith.
translation.ha: Irin wannan hadi mai ban mamaki kuwa lamari ne kawai da ya kebanci mata; wannan wata kyauta ce da Allah Madaukakin Sarki Ya ba wa mata; a saboda haka a cikin Alkur'ani a ka kafa misalin imani da wasu mata biyu - ba wai kawai misali ne na imani ga mata ba, face ga dukkanin bil'adama; maza da mata - "Kuma Allah Ya buga wani misali domin wadanda suka yi imani: matar Fir'auna" (Suratut Tahrim 66: 11) da "Da Maryama diyar Imrana" (Suratut Tahrim 66: 12) wato daya daga cikinsu ita ce matar Fir'auna, ta biyu kuma ita ce mai girma Maryam.

translation.en: These are some signs that point to an underlying Islamic ideology.
translation.ha: Wadannan wasu alamu ne da ke nuni da hikimar Musulunci.

translation.en: Our Revolution is based on the characteristics of Zeinab al-Kubra.
translation.ha: Juyin juya halin mu, juyi ne irin na Zainab.

translation.en: Since the beginning of the Revolution, women have played a very prominent role in the course of the Revolution.
translation.ha: Tun daga farkon juyin nan mata sun taka gagarumar rawa.

translation.en: A mother - who has spent about 20 years of her life to raise a child with her motherly love - sends her young child to the battlefield, and she is not even sure whether the body will be returned to her.
translation.ha: Matar da ta mika wani matashinta, wani abin kaunanta, wanda ta yi tarbiyansa na tsawon shekaru sha takwas, ko shekaru ashirin - kasa da haka ko kuma sama da haka - sannan kuma duk da irin wannan so da kauna ta uwa, amma ta mika shi zuwa ga fagen daga ba tare da ta san cewa mai yiyuwa ko ma gawarsa ba za a dawo mata da shi ba.

translation.en: Is this comparable to the sacrifice made by her young child who volunteers to go to the battlefield?
translation.ha: Ta haka wannan matashi da dukkanin kumaji irin na matashi, tare da imani da irin wannan ruhi na juyi, ya ke tafiya fagen dagan.

translation.en: And when her child's body is returned to her, she feels proud that her child has been martyred.
translation.ha: Daga baya kuma a lokacin da aka dawo mata da gawarsa, tana alfaharin cewa da na yayi shahada.

translation.en: Is this something insignificant?
translation.ha: Shin wannan karamin lamari ne?

translation.en: There were many such cases during our Revolution.
translation.ha: Akwai irin wannan yunkuri na mace, irin wannan yunkuri na Zainab a cikin juyin juya halin mu.

translation.en: Dear brothers and sisters, this was how our Revolution continued.
translation.ha: Ya ku abin kaunata, 'yan'uwa maza da mata! Da haka ne juyin juya halinmu ya ci gaba.

translation.en: The power and glory of this Revolution is due to fascination with spirituality and divine blessings.
translation.ha: Karfi da daukakar wannan juyin yana cikin wadannan abubuwa ne; ga mika zukata ga ababen da suke karfafa ruhi, mika kai a gaban tausayawa ta Ubangiji.

translation.en: When the enemy triumphantly asked Zeinab al-Kubra (s.a.) to describe what she had seen, she said, "I did not see anything but beauty."
translation.ha: A lokacin da makiya suke son tsokanan Zainab al-Kubra sakamakon abin da ya faru da ita, nan take sai ta ce musu: "Ba abin da na gani in ba abu mai kyau ba".

translation.en: Her brothers, her children, her dear ones, her closest companions, and many others had been violently killed in front of her eyes. She had seen the enemy put their heads on spears, but she said, "I did not see anything but beauty."
translation.ha: A gaban idanuwanta aka yi gunduwa-gunduwa da 'yan'uwanta, 'ya'yanta, ababen kaunarta, na kurkusa da ita, aka kashe su, aka zubar da jininsu sannan kuma aka tsire kawunansu a kan mashi; amma ba abin da tace sai abu mai kyau.

translation.en: Now try to combine this beauty with the narration according to which Zeinab al-Kubra (s.a.) did not fail to say her midnight prayers even on the eleventh day of Muharram [the day after Ashura].
translation.ha: Ku hada wannan abu mai kyau da abin da aka nakalto na cewa hatta a daren sha daya ga watan Muharram (wato dare da aka kashe Imam Husaini da mabiyansa a Karbala) ba ta bar sallar dare ba.

translation.en: Her relationship with Allah the Exalted was not undermined during her captivity. On the contrary, her relationship with God was strengthened.
translation.ha: A tsawon lokacin da ta kasance a matsayin fursunan yaki, alakarta da Allah Madaukakin Sarki ba ta kawu ba, ba ta ragu ba, face ma dai ta karu ne.

translation.en: She is a role model.
translation.ha: Lalle wannan macen, abar koyi ce.

translation.en: Today the Iranian nation is known as an inspiring nation among Muslim nations.
translation.ha: A yau al'ummar Iran ta zamanto wata al'umma mai karfafa gwuiwa a tsakanin al'ummomin musulmi.

translation.en: Of course the enemies do not like this, and they try to deny this fact. But that is the truth.
translation.ha: Ko da yake makiya ba za su amince da hakan ba, suna ta iyakacin kokarinsu wajen rufe hakan, to sai dai hakikanin lamarin shi ne wannan.

translation.en: The power of this nation does not depend on missiles, cannons, tanks, warplanes, and other military weapons. Of course these weapons are also necessary, and we thankfully have them, but the power of this nation is due to its faith.
translation.ha: Karfin wannan al'umma ba yana cikin makamai masu linzami, bindigogi, tankunan yaki, jirage da sauran kayayyakin yaki ba ne; wadannan ma dai abubuwa ne da wajibi ne ya zamana ana da su, kuma alhamdu lillahi muna da su; to sai dai karfin wannan al'umma yana cikin imanin da take da shi ne.

translation.en: Thanks to God's grace, guidance, and assistance, our nation has managed to make quantum leaps in various fields.
translation.ha: Al'ummar mu bisa yardar Allah, bisa shiryarwa ta Ubangiji, bisa taimakon Ubangiji, sun sami gagarumin ci gaba a fagagen kayayyakin aiki.

translation.en: And the facilities that we currently have at our disposal are not comparable to the facilities we used to have at the beginning of the Revolution - or before the Revolution for that matter. Nor are our facilities comparable to many of the countries that did not have to deal with the difficulties we have faced - the countries that have pinned their hopes on the assistance of foreigners and their enemies.
translation.ha: Irin karfin da muke da shi a yau, ba abu ne da za a iya kwatanta shi da irin karfin da muke da shi a farko-farkon juyin juya halin Musulunci ba - ko kuma kafin nasarar juyin juya halin Musuluncin ba - ba abu ne da za a iya kwatanta shi da ma na wasu kasashe da dama ba wadanda shekara da shekaru ma ba su da irin wadannan matsaloli; sun rmika zukatansu ne suna jiran taimakon 'yan kasashen waje da kuma makiya.

translation.en: By Allah's favor, the Iranian nation has made a lot of progress in these areas as well, but these factors are not the source of our power.
translation.ha: Alhamdu lillahi al'ummar Iran a wannan bangaren kan tana gaba ainun; to sai dai wadannan ba su ne ababen da suka ba mu karfi ba.

translation.en: The existence or lack of material facilities does not make a difference for an Islamic nation.
translation.ha: A wajensu babu bambanci shin tana da irin wannan karfi na abin duniya ko kuma a'a.

translation.en: But our nation has been making increasing progress on a daily basis.
translation.ha: Shekaru talatin kenan wannan al'umma take tsaye.

translation.en: Therefore, the greatness of the Iranian nation is due to its faith.
translation.ha: A saboda haka daukakar da al'ummar Iran ta samu ta samo asali daga hakan.

translation.en: Now there are some dim-witted people who are threatening the Iranian nation!
translation.ha: To a halin yanzu dai wadannan mahaukata suna yi wa al'ummar Iran barazana!

translation.en: The US President implicitly threatened us with a nuclear attack last week.
translation.ha: Shugaban kasar Amurka a makon da ya gabata ta hanyar ishara ya yi barazanar amfani da makaman nukiliya.

translation.en: Such threats will not affect the Iranian nation.
translation.ha: Wannan barazanar dai ba za ta yi wani tasiri a kan al'ummar Iran ba, to sai dai hakan zai zamanto abin bakanta fuska ga tarihin siyasar Amurka; wannan lamarin ya zamanto wata bakar alama cikin ayyukan gwamnatin Amurka.

translation.en: It revealed what lies behind the hand of friendship extended towards the Iranian nation. Their fox-like rhetoric became wolfish. Until now they were saying that they were willing to extend a hand of friendship.
translation.ha: Ya zuwa yanzu dai suna cewa mu dai muna mika hannayen abokantaka, mu dai kaza da kaza; to amma a halin yanzu lamarin ya fito fili dangane da abin da ke boye a bayan wadannan maganganu.

translation.en: It revealed the intentions of their bloodthirsty and domineering nature.
translation.ha: Dabi'ar shan jini da neman mulkin mallkan (da wadannan mutane suke da ita) ta fito fili.

translation.en: They want to use their nuclear power as a means to dominate the world.
translation.ha: Wadannan mutane suna so ne su mayar da fasaha da kuma karfi na nukiliya zuwa ga wata hanya ta mulkan duniya.

translation.en: This is true of all nuclear powers.
translation.ha: Haka dukkanin kasashen da suka mallaki fasahar nukiliya suke; dukkanin su suna daukan hakan a matsayin wata hanya ta tabbatar da karfinsu don su sami damar mulkin mallaka a kan al'ummomi, su mulki duniya.

translation.en: They are blatant liars.
translation.ha: Wadannan mutane makaryata ne na fili.

translation.en: But then they start finding fault with other nations and complain that they have failed to conform to a particular part of the treaties.
translation.ha: To amma kuma sai ga shi suna bude bakunansu suna magana kan wasu kasashe, suna cewa kasa kaza ba ta yi aiki da bangare kaza na wannan yarjejeniya ba.

translation.en: That is the problem.
translation.ha: Wannan shi ne kawai lamarin.

translation.en: We have transparent nuclear policies. We have repeatedly said before that we are not the kind of people to use destructive nuclear weapons.
translation.ha: Siyasar nukiliyarmu a fili take; a lokuta da dama mun sha fadi kuma mun nanata cewa: mu dai ba ma'abota amfani da makaman kare dangi ba ne; to amma dai ya kamata su san cewa wajen fada da al'umma, irin wadannan barazana babu wani abin da za su yi.

translation.en: The Iranian nation will bring them to their knees in spite of their claims. International communities must not pass over the American President's threat.
translation.ha: Al'ummar Iran, duk kuwa da irin da'awar da (makiyan) suke yi, za su kaskantar da su matukar suka fuskance su, sannan kuma za su durkufar da su a kan gwuiwoyinsu.

translation.en: Why are they threatening another country with a nuclear attack?
translation.ha: Me ya sa kake barazanar amfani da makaman nukiliya?

translation.en: Why are they threatening the world with destruction?
translation.ha: Me ya sa kake barazanar ruguza duniya?

translation.en: No one should be allowed to make such threats against humanity.
translation.ha: Babu wani wanda ya ke da karfin gwuiwa yin wannan barazanar.

translation.en: Even uttering such threats is unacceptable - even if they announce they did not mean it, even if they admit it was a mistake.
translation.ha: Fadin hakan ma kawai kuskure ne; ko da kuwa ya ce ba haka yake nufi ba, mu ba mu da irin wannan niyyar; kuskure ne muka yi muka fadi hakan.

translation.en: The world cannot afford to pass over the statements that pose a threat to global peace and security.
translation.ha: Bai kamata cikin sauki a rufe ido kan irin wannan maganar da take barazana ga zaman lafiyan bil'adama, wadda barazana ce ga tsaron duniya.

translation.en: Of course the Iranian nation will not be affected by such statements.
translation.ha: Tabbas al'ummar Iran ba za ta taba mika wuya ga irin wadannan maganganu ba.

translation.en: They cannot force the Iranian nation to retreat through such things.
translation.ha: Ba za a iya sanya al'ummar Iran ja da baya saboda irin wadannan abubuwa ba.

translation.en: We will not allow the Americans to re-establish their infernal hegemony over our country through such means.
translation.ha: Mu dai ba za mu taba bari Amurkawa ta hanyar wadannan abubuwa su sake dawo da bakin mulkinsu a wannan kasar ba; lalle al'ummar Iran ba za su taba barin haka ta faru ba.

translation.en: The Iranian nation will not allow this.
translation.ha: Lalle al'ummar Iran ba za su taba barin hakan ta faru ba.

translation.en: The Iranian nation will not allow such things. By Allah's grace, we will make progress in all areas despite the enemies' will.
translation.ha: Mu dai sabanin abin da makiya suke son gani, a dukkanin fagage, cikin yardar Allah, da taimakon Allah, da falalar Ubangiji za mu ci gaba; wajibi ne ku san wannan.

translation.en: Our youth are making efforts.
translation.ha: Matasan mu suna nan suna kokari.

translation.en: By Allah's favor, the increasing faith of our youth and the increasing insight of our nation will overcome these threats as well as the plots that are hatched with the aim of creating chaos in the country - including the plots similar to what we saw in the year 1388.
translation.ha: Da yardar Allah imanin matasanmu da basirar al'ummarmu za su yi nasara a kan wadannan barazana, haka nan kuma za su yi nasara kan kokarin haifar da fitina a cikin kasar nan - irin abubuwan da suka faru a shekarar bara (1388) -.

translation.en: Our nation has insight. Our nation is faithful.
translation.ha: Al'ummar mu al'umma ce ma'abociyar basira, al'umma ce ma'abociyar imani.

translation.en: I hope Allah the Exalted will increase this insight on a daily basis because of the pure prayers of the Imam of the Age (may our souls be sacrificed for his sake).
translation.ha: Muna fatan Allah Madaukakin Sarki sakamakon albarkacin addu'oin mai girma Bakiyatullah (rayukanmu su zamanto fansa a gare shi) za su ci gaba da karfafuwa a kowace rana sannan kuma al'ummar mu a kowace rana insha Allah za ta samu nasara da daukaka.

translation.en: Hopefully, you dear youth will see the glory and development of your country in the near future.
translation.ha: Haka kuma da yardar Allah nan gaba kadan ku din nan matasa za ku ga daukaka da ci gaban wannan kasar ta ku.

translation.en: Allah's grace be upon the immaculate souls of our magnanimous Imam and our martyrs.
translation.ha: Rahamar Allah ta tabbata ga ruhin mai tsarki na Imaminmu mai girma (Imam Khumaini) da kuma ruhin shahidai.

translation.en: I hope Allah the Exalted will bestow success on all of you.
translation.ha: Ina rokon Allah Madaukakin Sarki da Ya ba wa dukkaninku dacewa da kuma taimaka muku.

translation.en: The following is the full text of the speech delivered on October 13, 2011 by Ayatollah Khamenei the Leader of the Islamic Revolution in a meeting with the Armed Forces of Kermanshah province.
translation.ha: Shimfida: Abin da ke biye fassarar jawabin da Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci Ayatullah Sayyid Ali Khamenei yayi ne a wajen bikin hadin gwuiwan dakarun sojin lardin Kermanshah da aka gudanar a sansanin soji na 81 a ranar 13, Oktoba, 2011.

translation.en: In the Name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful
translation.ha: Da Sunan Allah Mai Rahama Mai Jin Kai

translation.en: I salute all the dear commanders, every one of the military units that are present on this parade ground and all selfless and brave members of the Armed Forces of Kermanshah province - including the Army, the Islamic Revolution's Guards Corps, Basij and the Police. I pray to Allah the Exalted to bestow increasing blessings on all of you.
translation.ha: Ina sallama ga dukkanin kwamandoji masu girma da dukkanin dakarun da suke wajen nan da kuma dukkanin jaruman dakaru masu sadaukarwa na lardin Kermanshah kama daga soji, dakarun kare juyin juya halin Musulunci, Basiji, 'yan sanda da dakaru na kabilu, sannan kuma ina rokon Allah Madaukakin Sarki da Ya ba wa dukkaninku dacewa.

translation.en: This military base and this region evoke extraordinary memories for me.
translation.ha: Wannan sansani (na soji) da kuma wannan yankin, abubuwa ne da suke tunatar da (mu) abubuwa masu kyaun gaske.

translation.en: Brave and selfless men and the people whose hearts were full of love for Islam and dear Iran, made many sacrifices in this region.
translation.ha: A wannan yankin akwai jaruman mutane, masu sadaukarwa, mutanen da zukatansu suke cike da kaunar Musulunci da kuma kasar Iran mai girma, da suka yi gagarumar sadaukarwa ga wannan kasar.

translation.en: Relying on divine blessings and assistance, they managed to defeat the armed enemy - who had been approved by the satans - and they managed to bring about pride, honor, dignity and immunity for their country.
translation.ha: Albarkacin tausayawa ta Ubangiji da kuma saukowar mala'ikun Allah sun sami nasara a kan makiyan da suke da dukkanin nau'oi na makamai da kuma goyon bayan Shaidan, sannan kuma suka samar wa kasar su mutumci, daukaka da garkuwa.

translation.en: We will not forget the memory of those days.
translation.ha: Ba za mu taba mancewa da wadancan ranakun ba.

translation.en: Those days are a lesson for us and we have always been hopeful that in different organizations the preparedness, faith and determination of our dear youth and Armed Forces will increase.
translation.ha: Wadannan ranakun a wajen mu darasi ne sannan kuma yana yi mana wannan alkawarin na cewa matasan mu da dakarun mu da suke cibiyoyi daban-daban a kowace rana za su ci gaba da samun karin shiri, imani, azama da kuma himma.

translation.en: Among those who serve Islam and the country, the Armed Forces enjoy certain advantages. First of all, they safeguard our security.
translation.ha: Dakarun mu masu makami suna da wannan siffa da ta kebanta da su a tsakanin dukkanin masu hidima wa Musulunci da kuma kasar nan ta cewa da farko dai su masu tabbatar da tsaro ne.

translation.en: If security was taken away from a nation, all paths of progress would be closed to that nation.
translation.ha: Idan har aka kawar da tsaron da wata kasa da wata al'umma suke da shi, to kuwa za a rufe mata dukkanin kofofi na ci gaba.

translation.en: Security is an essential and vital requirement for all affairs.
translation.ha: Tsaro tushe ne na dukkanin ayyuka.

translation.en: Knowledge, progress, technology, wealth and spirituality will only be achieved under the shade of security.
translation.ha: Ana iya samun ilimi, ci gaba, fasaha, dukiya da kusaci da Ubangiji ne karkashin inuwar tsaro.

translation.en: The Armed Forces of the Islamic Republic of Iran are the guardians of security. They believe it is the duty to safeguard the security at our borders and inside the country and this is a great advantage.
translation.ha: Dakaru masu makami na Jamhuriyar Musulunci ta Iran, su ne masu tabbatar da tsaro; aikin su shi ne kiyaye tsaron kan iyakokin kasar nan da kuma cikin gida; hakan kuwa wata siffa ce ta fifiko mai girma.

translation.en: The second advantage that the Armed Forces enjoy is that they lay down their lives in the arena of rendering services.
translation.ha: Siffa ta biyu da dakarun soji suka kebanta da ita, ita ce cewa a lokacin gudanar da ayyukansu, suna sadaukar da rayukansu ne a fage.

translation.en: Our youth and the commanders and members of the Armed Forces prepare themselves for self-sacrifice with enthusiasm and they enter the arena of rendering services.
translation.ha: Matasa da kwamandoji da sauran sojoji, a yayin gudanar da aikinsu, suna shirya kansu ne don sadaukarwa kuma da hakan ne suke shiga cikin fage.

translation.en: This is the nature of their Islamic faith.
translation.ha: Wannan ita ce siffa ta imani da Musulunci da suke da ita.

translation.en: In our Armed Forces, there is no imposition. There is no pressure.
translation.ha: A nan babu wata magana ta tilastci da tursasawa; abin da ake gani a wannan wajen shi ne kumaji da ke tattare da su.

translation.en: Materialistic powers have to deal with the problem that their soldiers are a nervous wreck in different parts of the world, but the Armed Forces of the Islamic Republic of Iran enjoy the advantage that their members enter the arena motivated by religious faith.
translation.ha: Idan har manyan kasashe masu karfi na duniya sun baza sojojinsu a yankuna daban-daban na duniya, to amma dakarun Jamhuriyar Musulunci kan suna da wannan siffa ta cewa su din nan suna kasancewa ne a fage cikin kumaji da imani (ba tare da an tilasta musu ba).

translation.en: This is a great advantage.
translation.ha: Hakan kuwa wata siffa ce mai girma.

translation.en: My dear ones, the Islamic Republic, the great Iranian nation, our dear country has proven over the past three decades that its power is increasing on a daily basis.
translation.ha: Ya ku abin kaunata! Tsawon wadannan shekaru talatin din tsarin Jamhuriyar Musulunci da al'umma masu girma na Iran da kuma kasar mu mai girma sun tabbatar da cewa suna da tsayin daka da tsayuwa kyam.

translation.en: The eight-year war that was imposed on our country and our people showed everybody that attacking the Islamic Republic is expensive.
translation.ha: Kallafaffen yaki na shekaru takwas da aka kallafa wa kasar mu da al'ummar mu ya tabbatar wa kowa da cewa kawo wa Jamhuriyar Musulunci ta Iran hari ba lamari ne mai sauki ba.

translation.en: The defeat of the army that had attacked our country was in fact a major defeat for the armed forces of the global powers and their satanic policies.
translation.ha: Alal hakika shan kashin da sojojin da suka kawo mana hari suka yi, babban shan kashi ne ga sojojin manyan kasashen duniya da siyasar su ta shaidanci.

translation.en: They realized who they were fighting: the Islamic Republic.
translation.ha: Sun fahimci da wa suke fada; da gwamnatin Musulunci.

translation.en: The brave people of our country have always supported our Armed Forces.
translation.ha: Jaruman al'ummar kasar mu sun kasance masu goyon bayan sojoji kuma a yanzu ma suna yin hakan.

translation.en: Allah the Exalted is helping you: He has made the hearts of the people kind towards you.
translation.ha: Allah Madaukakin Sarki yana taimaka muku; ya sanya zukatan mutane suka zamanto masu rahama da kaunar ku.

translation.en: Today the Armed Forces are regarded with respect among the people.
translation.ha: A yau sojoji suna da girma a idon mutane.

translation.en: These are great advantages.
translation.ha: Lalle hakan wadansu siffofi ne masu kayu da kuma girma.

translation.en: Dear brothers, dear youth and honorable commanders, the duty that our nation is shouldering today is a great and sensitive duty.
translation.ha: Matasa masu girma! Da kuma kwamandoji abin girmamamawa! Nauyin da ke wuyan al'ummar mu a yau wani nauyi ne mai girma da kuma muhimmanci.

translation.en: Today there are many opportunities lying in front of us.
translation.ha: A yau dai akwai dama da yawa a gaban mu.

translation.en: The arrogant powers are trying to promote Iranophobia and Islamophobia in the world through different policies.
translation.ha: Ma'abota girman kai na duniya suna ta kokari ta hanyar amfani da siyasar su daban-daban wajen yada tsoron Iran da kuma tsoron Musulunci a duniya.

translation.en: You see the different actions that they take.
translation.ha: Kuna ganin abubuwa daban-daban da suke yi.

translation.en: They have repeatedly used silly and idiotic methods to promote Iranophobia and Islamophobia and the futility of these methods have been proven, but desperate western politicians continue using these methods.
translation.ha: Sun yi amfani da hanyoyi daban-daban na wauta da rashin hankali wajen yada tsoron Iran da kuma tsoron Musulunci sannan kuma rashin hankalinsu ya tabbata, a hain yanzu ma suna ci gaba da sake maimaita hakan.

translation.en: They have not been able to realize their satanic goal.
translation.ha: Sun gagara aiwatar da wannan manufa ta su ta shaidanci.

translation.en: Yet they repeat these policies and they will be kicked in the mouth again.
translation.ha: Amma har ya zuwa yanzu suna sake maimaita wannan siyasar, to za su sake shan kashi kuwa.

translation.en: They continue trying old methods and they will continue experiencing the bitter taste of defeat.
translation.ha: Za su sake gwada wadannan siyasar, kuma har ila yau za su sake shan kashi.

translation.en: Today the arrogant US regime is faced with serious problems.
translation.ha: A yau gwamnatin girman kai ta Amurka tana cikin tsaka mai wuya.

translation.en: The American regime cannot get out of the quagmire that it has created in Afghanistan because it does not know how to do so.
translation.ha: Gwamnatin Amurka dai ba za ta iya tsamar da kanta daga ramin da ita da kanta ta tona shi a kasar Afghanistan ba; don kuwa ba su san hanyar cimma hakan ba.

translation.en: They cannot save themselves.
translation.ha: Ba za su iya tseratar da kansu ba.

translation.en: In a world in which people have awakened, it is not possible to solve one's problems with materialistic methods and perspectives. It is not possible to solve one's problems with an aggressive spirit and behaving as if that the world owes you. It is possible to do so only through logic, rationality and spirituality and this is the same method that the Islamic Republic of Iran has adopted.
translation.ha: Ba za a iya yin komai ta hanyar kallo irin na abin duniya da kallo na girman kai da kokarin wuce gona da iri a irin wannan duniyar da al'ummominta suka farka ba. Za a iya cimma wani abu ne kawai ta hanyar amfani da hankali da kuma ababen da suke kyautata ruhi. Wannan dai ita ce hanyar da tsarin Jamhuriyar Musulunci ya rika.

translation.en: Allah the Exalted will help you.
translation.ha: Allah Madaukakin Sarki yana taimaka muku.

translation.en: According to the Quranic verses which were recited at the beginning of this meeting, "(As for) those who say: Our Lord is Allah, then continue in the right way, the angels descend upon them, saying: Fear not, nor be grieved." [The Holy Quran, 41: 30] Do not fear and do not be sad because God is with you.
translation.ha: Wannan ayar da aka karanto ta a farkon wannan bikin ta cewa: "Lalle wadannan da suka ce, Ubangijinmu, Shi ne Allah, sa'an nan suka daidaitu, mala'iku na sassauka a kansu (suna ce musu) "kada ku ji tsoro, kuma kada ku yi bakin ciki" (Suratu Fussilat 41:30), kada ku tsorata kada ku damu, Allah yana tare da ku.

translation.en: We are your guardians in this world's life and in the hereafter. [The Holy Quran, 41: 30] God's angels are your guardians even in this world.
translation.ha: Mu ne majibintanku a cikin rayuwar duniya da kuma a cikin Lahira (Suratu Fussilat 41:31), a bisa umurnin Allah Madaukakin Sarki a nan duniya ma mala'iku za su zamanto masu goya muku baya da kuma ba ku kariya.

translation.en: Dear God, associate the souls of our martyrs with Your saints and with the Holy Prophet (s.w.a.) and the martyrs of Karbala.
translation.ha: Sannan kuma ka tayar da ruhin shahidan mu tare da waliyanka da kuma annabi da shahidan Karbala. Wassalamu alaikum wa rahamatullah wa barakatuhu.

translation.en: Leader's Speech in Meeting with MPs of Religious Minorities - Khamenei.ir
translation.ha: Jawabin Jagora Yayin Ganawa Da Wakilan Mabiya Sauran Addinai Na Majalisar Shawarar Musulunci Ta Iran

translation.en: In the Name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful
translation.ha: Da Sunan Allah Mai Rahama Mai Jin Kai

translation.en: We have learned from Islam that we should behave in a fair way towards the followers of other religions. This is Islam's command to us.
translation.ha: Musulunci ya koyar da mu cewa wajibi ne mu yi mu'amala da mabiya sauran addinai cikin adalci; wannan shi ne umurnin da Musulunci yayi mana.

translation.en: Today, what is witnessed in the world is that powers and those governments which claim to support justice do not at all behave in a fair way except in the inner circle of their narrow, limited and oppressive polices.
translation.ha: Abin da a halin yanzu yake faruwa a duniya, shi ne cewa masu takama da karfi da gwamnatocin da suke ikirarin kiyaye adalci, babu wata maganar girmama adalci da suke yi face sai adalcin da yayi daidai da kuntatacciyar siyasarsu ta zalunci.

translation.en: Today, you can see that in Europe and America, they use massive propaganda against Muslims.
translation.ha: A yau din nan kuna ganin irin bakar farfagandar da ake yadawa kan musulmi a Turai da Amurka.

translation.en: The issue is not why Muslims do not have any freedom in many of these countries. Rather, the issue is why they do not have any security.
translation.ha: Maganar ba ita ce cewa me ya sa musulmi ba su da ‘yancin da ya zama wajibi su kasance suna da shi a mafi yawa daga cikin wadannan kasashen ba; face dai maganar ita ce me ya ba a ba su tsaron da ya kamata.

translation.en: This is really the case.
translation.ha: Wannan shi ne abin da wannan fim din yake kwadaitarwa.

translation.en: The movie "American Sniper", which has produced some reactions and which has been made by Hollywood, encourages a Christian or non-Muslim to harass Muslims as much as he can.
translation.ha: Kamar yadda dai aka gaya min, don ni dai ban ga fim din ba.

translation.en: This is not at all accepted by Islam.
translation.ha: To wannan ba abu ne wanda Musulunci ya amince da shi ba.

translation.en: Islam believes in justice.
translation.ha: Musulunci yayi amanna da yin adalci.

translation.en: On the issue of that attack [on the city of al-Anbar] the Commander of the Faithful (peace and greetings be upon him) said, "I have come to know that every one of them entered upon Muslim women and muahida women" [Nahjul Balaghah, Sermon 27]. In this sermon, he says that some people have entered the houses of Muslim and muahida women - muahid means Jewish and Christian individuals who have formed an alliance with Muslims and who live under the protection of Islam - to take away their ornaments and harass them.
translation.ha: Amirul Muminin (a.s), dangane da harin nan da aka kai garin Anbar(2), yana fadin cewa: "Labari ya zo min cewa wani mutum daga cikinsu ya shiga wajen wata mace musulma da kuma wata da take karkashin kulawar Musulunci"; wato na sami labarin cewa mutanen da suka kai wa wannan garin harin, sun shiga gidajen mata musulmi da ma wadanda ba musulmi ba - kafiran amana yana nufin yahudu da nasara da suka kulla yarjejeniyar amana da musulmi, za su zauna karkashin inuwar hukumar Musulunci - "Suna kwace kayayyakin adonsu" suna cutar da su da kuma zaluntarsu.

translation.en: Then, Hazrat says, "If any Muslim dies of grief after all this, he is not to be blamed".
translation.ha: Daga nan sai Imam Ali (a.s) ya ce idan har wani musulmi ya mutu saboda bakin cikin wannan yanayin ba abin zargi ba ne.

translation.en: This is the Commander of the Faithful (a.s.).
translation.ha: Ku duba ku gani wannan shi ne Amirul Muminin.

translation.en: If a Muslim dies of grief at the harassment of non-Muslim women by the army of the enemies and looters - they entered their houses and took away their ornaments - he is not to be blamed.
translation.ha: (Yana fadin cewa) Idan har wani musulmi ya mutu saboda bakin cikin cewa sojojin makiya da ‘yan fashi, sun shigo gidan wata mace wacce ba musulma, suka cutar da ita da kwace mata kayan adonta, to bai kamata a zarge shi ba.

translation.en: This is the viewpoint of Islam.
translation.ha: Wannan ita ce mahangar Musulunci.

translation.en: We hope that by Allah's favor, we move forward in this direction.
translation.ha: Muna fatan Allah ya taimake wajen kamawa da kuma riko da wannan tafarkin.

translation.en: And we have good memories in this regard.
translation.ha: Akwai ababen tunawa masu kyau da na ke da su.

translation.en: Whenever I go to the houses of Armenian and Assyrian martyrs - this year too, I fortunately managed to visit the houses of a number of Armenian martyrs - I see that they are committed to their country. They have really behaved in a committed way.
translation.ha: A mafi yawan lokutan da nake kai ziyara gidajen shahidan Kiristocin (Armaniyawa) - wanda alhamdu lillahi a wannan shekarar ma na sami dacewar ziyartar gidajen wasu shahidan kiristocin - na kan ga irin yadda wadannan mutane suke kaunar kasarsu. Wato a hakikanin gaskiya suna jin cewa akwai wani nauyi a kansu dangane da kasarsu.

translation.en: I remember that during the time of war, a number of Armenian Christians went to Ahwaz. I saw that a number of people were sitting inside the airport.
translation.ha: A lokacin yaki ma, ina iya tunawa, wasu daga cikin wadannan kiristocin sun tafi Ahwaz; a filin jirgin sama na ga wasu mutane suna zaune.

translation.en: I asked, "Who are these people?" they said, "They are Armenians and they are going to the front lines for industrial affairs. They have come to render services".
translation.ha: Na tambaya su waye wadancan? Aka ce min Kiristoci ne. Za su tafi fagen daga ne don gudanar da ayyukan kula da injuna - don sun kware wajen wadannan ayyukan na masana'antu da kere-kere da sauransu - sun zo ne don ba da ta su gudummawar.

translation.en: The late Chamran employed them.
translation.ha: Marigayi Chamran ne ya dauke su aiki.

translation.en: They made efforts, they rendered services and some of them were martyred.
translation.ha: Sun ba da ta su gudummawar, wasu ma daga cikinsu sun yi shahada.

translation.en: One of the members of an Armenian family whom I visited last week had a son in the army. He said, "When his military service was over, he was unhappy because the war was continuing.
translation.ha: Daya daga cikin iyalan Kiristocin da a makon da ya wuce na je gidansu, dansa ya kasance dan bautar kasa ne; ya ce yana cikin fushi don kuwa bautar kasarsa ta kare amma yaki bai kare ba.

translation.en: He said, 'My military service is over. What should I do now?'
translation.ha: Yana cewa to yanzu me zan yi tun da dai lokacin bautar kasa na ya kare.

translation.en: Later on, it was announced that those who have done their military service for a few months should join the army again.
translation.ha: Daga nan sai ya ce, daga baya an sanar da cewa mutanen da suka kare bautar kasarsu, za su yi iya sake dawowa fagen daga su ci gaba da yin hidima na wasu watanni.

translation.en: He became happy at this call-up and he joined the front lines.
translation.ha: Hakan ya faranta masa rai, ya yi farin cikin cewa an sake kiransa zuwa fagen daga.

translation.en: Later on, he was martyred and his body was brought to us".
translation.ha: Don haka sai ya tafi fagen, sannan daga baya kuma yayi shahada, aka kawo gawarsa.

translation.en: We can witness such nationalistic feelings among our non-Muslim compatriots.
translation.ha: Wato mutum yana iya ganin irin wannan kumajin a tattare da ‘yan'uwanmu wadanda ba musulmi ba a kasar nan.

translation.en: Well, they made efforts and we hope that the Islamic government can carry out its responsibility in this regard.
translation.ha: To sun yi kokarinsu. Don haka ina fatan gwamnatin Musulunci za ta sauke nauyin da ke wuyanta a wannan bangaren.

translation.en: They really behaved in a committed - in the real sense of the word - way towards the country. You should reflect - outside the country - the courses of action that the Islamic Republic takes in this regard.
translation.ha: A hakikanin gaskiya wadannan mutane sun nuna irin kauna da kuma jin nauyin da ke wuyansu dangane da wannan kasar. Lalle ya kamata ku bayyanar da wadannan halaye na Jamhuriyar Musulunci a fili.

translation.en: People and the world of Christianity should know that in our Islamic country, there is a lot of tolerance and respect for non-Muslims. This is while such tolerance does not exist in the Christian world.
translation.ha: Wato wajibi ne ku sanar, ku fahimtar da duniya da kasashen Kiristoci irin kauna da kyawawan halayen da ake nuna wa wadanda ba musulmi ba a wannan kasa ta musulunci; irin wannan mu'amalar da babu ita a wajensu.

translation.en: You have heard a lot that in western countries such as Germany, neo-Nazi youth - they are proud of being Nazis and they have called themselves, "neo-Nazis" - attack Muslims and their mosques.
translation.ha: Ku dai ji irin abubuwan da ke faruwa, ga misali a kasar Jamus yadda matasa sabbin ‘yan Nazi - wadanda suke alfaharin cewa su din nan ‘yan Nazi ne, sun ma sanya wa kansu suna ‘sabbin ‘yan Nazi' - suna kai hari ga musulmi da masallacin musulmi.

translation.en: They kill Muslims in a brutal way and there is no legal prosecution.
translation.ha: Suna bugu da kisa, sannan kuma babu wani abin a zo a gani da ake yin a hukunta su.

translation.en: Another example is that they killed a young Arab woman who was wearing maqna'a or pooshiah [veil] because of her hijab and no one arrests them.
translation.ha: Ko kuma matashiyar nan da aka mata duka da kuma kashe ta saboda kawai ga misali ta sanya hijabi ko lullubi, saboda hijabinta. Babu wani da yake bin lamarin.

translation.en: The same is true of other places. The same crimes are unfortunately being committed in America and other places and countries.
translation.ha: Haka lamarin yake a wasu wajajen ma na daban; a Amurka da sauran wajaje da sauran kasashe na daban, abin bakin cikin haka lamarin yake.

translation.en: This is while they claim to support human rights.
translation.ha: Ga shi kuwa suna ikirarin kare hakkokin bil'adama.

translation.en: They should compare these with what is happening in Iran.
translation.ha: Ku kwatanta abin da ke faruwa a can da abubuwan da ke faruwa a Iran.

translation.en: Such acts are unheard of in Iran. In the Islamic era and in the Islamic Republic, harassing non-Muslims by Muslims is unheard of.
translation.ha: A Iran dai ba mu da irin wannan yanayin; wato a lokacin Jamhuriyar Musulunci ba a taba samun lokacin da wasu musulmi suka kai hari ga wadanda ba musulmi ba.

translation.en: Even those hezbollahi youth who are very zealous and enthusiastic do not allow themselves to attack a non-Muslim.
translation.ha: Su kansu wadannan matasa ‘yan Hizbullah masu kumaji, ba su taba yarda su kai wa wani wanda ba musulmi ba hari da makamantan hakan.

translation.en: I hope that Allah the Exalted gives you and us the blessing to carry out our responsibilities.
translation.ha: Ina rokon Allah Madaukakin Sarki da Ya ba ku da kuma mu dacewar sauke nauyin da ke wuyanmu.

translation.en: Leader’s Message of Condolence on Kurdistan Terrorist Attacks - Khamenei.ir
translation.ha: Sakon Ta'aziyyar Jagora Sakamakon Ta'addacin Lardin Kurdestan

translation.en: In the Name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful
translation.ha: Da Sunan Allah Mai Rahama Mai Jin Kai

translation.en: And whoever is slain unjustly, We have indeed given to his heir authority [The Holy Quran, 17: 33].
translation.ha: Kuma wanda aka kashe yana wanda aka zalunta, to hakika, Mun sanya hujja ga waliyinsa (Suratul Isra' 17:33)

translation.en: I received the sad news that the criminal and sinful hands of the arrogant powers' mercenaries have shed the blood of the Mujahid Islamic scholar and the committed clergyman, Mr. Mamousta Sheikholeslam - who was a member of the Assembly of Experts - and that this honorable and obliging man has been martyred at the hands of the soldiers of injustice after decades of unequivocal support for justice.
translation.ha: Cikin bakin ciki da alhini mai tsanani na samu labarin cewa hannayen ‘yan ta'adda masu aikata laifi ‘yan amshin shatan ma'abota girman kai da masu ra'ayin ci baya ya dulmuya cikin jinin babban malamin nan mujahidi kuma mai hidima mai girma Mamousta Sheikh al-Islam wakili a majalisar kwararru ta zaban Jagora sannan kuma sakamakon hakan wannan madaukakin bawan Allah mai tsananin hidima bayan shekara da shekaru na kare gaskiya ya samu nasarar yin shahada ta hannun wadannan dakarun bata.

translation.en: During the past few days, some other important clergymen, particularly the interim Friday prayer leader of Sanandaj and two honorable judiciary officials of Kurdistan province, were martyred or wounded before the martyrdom of this honorable man.
translation.ha: Cikin ‘yan kwanakin nan wasu malamai masu girma na daban ciki kuwa har da limamin juma'an garin Sanandaj na wucin gadi da kuma wasu jami'an hukumar shari'a ta wannan lardi guda biyu, su ma sun yi shahada kafin shahadar wannan babban bawan Allah.

translation.en: This series of cruelty and bloodshed in the holy month of Ramadan and on the eve of Quds Day shows that in spite of their claims of religious fervor, these criminals not only desecrate Allah's city but also target what the arrogant powers and some disgraceful governments of the region are determined to attack.
translation.ha: Irin wannan shakiyanci da zubar da jini a watan Ramalana mai albarka sannan kuma a daidai lokacin da ake kokarin gudanar da ranar nuna goyon baya ga al'ummar Palastinu (Ranar Kudus ta Duniya), lamari ne da ke nuni da cewa wadannan ‘yan ta'adda, duk kuwa da irin da'awar riko da addini da tsaurin ra'ayi na mazhaba da suke yi, ba wai kawai suna keta hurumin watan Ubangiji ba ne, face dai irin wadannan hare-hare na su tun asali ma ya yi daidai ne da abin da cibiyoyin girman kai na duniya da wasu wulakantattun gwamnatocin wannan yanki suka daura na nuna kiyayya da gaba.

translation.en: From the perspective of these criminal mercenaries and their Pharaoh-like and Korah-like masters, the unpardonable crime of those who were wounded and martyred in Kurdistan was their commitment to the Islamic Republic, their support for Islamic ideals, and their stance on the issue of the holy city of Jerusalem.
translation.ha: Nuna goyon baya ga tsarin Jamhuriyar Musulunci, kariya ga koyarwa ta Musulunci da kuma batun masallacin Kudus mai alfarma shi ne babban laifin wadannan shahidai da wadanda suka sami raunuka masu girma da ba za a taba yafe musu shi ba a wajen wadannan ‘yan amshin shata ‘yan ta'adda da iyayengijinsu masu siffofin Fir'auna da Karuna.

translation.en: In the month of Ordibehesht, after the mellifluous sound of Islamic unity resonated more than ever before in Kurdistan province, the camp of arrogance and tyranny was determined to take revenge on the noble and oppressed people of that province.
translation.ha: Bayan watan Ordebehesht (wata na biyu na hijira shamsiyya) na wannan shekarar da a cikinsa aka samun gagarumin hadin kai na Musulunci sama da na shekarun baya a wannan yanki na Kurdestan, a halin yanzu ma'abota girman kai da gwamnatocin kama-karya suna ta kokarin daukan fansa ne daga wajen wadannan madaukakan al'umma da aka zalunta na wannan lardi.

translation.en: For those brutal enemies, Kurds, Persians, Shias, and Sunnis are not different. Their spiteful and evil hearts would even let them cruelly oppress an old clergyman like the innocent martyr, Mamousta Sheikholeslam.
translation.ha: A wajen wannan makiyin, babu wani bambanci tsakanin (‘yan kabilar) Sangdel, Kurdawa da Farisawa ko kuma Shi'a da Sunna. Zuciyarsu da take cike da kiyayya tana jansu zuwa ga aikata ayyukan ta'addanci da rashin imani hatta ga dattijon malami irin shahid Mamousta Sheik al-Islam.

translation.en: May the curses of God, the Prophet, and believers be upon those bloodthirsty people and the main centers that support and organize them.
translation.ha: La'anar Allah da ManzonSa da muminai ta tabbata a kan wadannan mashaya jinni da cibiyoyi na asali da suke goyon bayansu da kuma ba su umurni.

translation.en: The dear people of Kurdistan should identify their enemies perceptively, and the security officials of the province should place cracking down on these muharib murderers at the top of their agenda.
translation.ha: Al'ummar lardin Kurdestan dai da kyau sun san makiyansu, sannan kuma (wajibi ne) jami'an tsaron wannan lardin su sanya fada da wadannan masu zubar da jinin mutane a matsayin babban aikin da suka sa a gaba.

translation.en: I express my condolences to the people of Kurdistan province, especially the bereaved families and also congratulate them on the martyrdom of these people. I also pay homage to the memory of those honorable martyrs, especially the dear martyr Mr. Mamousta Sheikholeslam.
translation.ha: A daidai lokacin da nake isar da sakon ta'aziyya ta da kuma taya murnar (samun shahada) ga al'ummar lardin Kurdestan musamman ma dai iyalan wadanda wannan lamari ya shafa, ina jinjinawa ambaton wadannan manyan shahidai musamman ma dai babban shahidi abin kauna mai girma Mamousta Sheikk al-Islam, sannan kuma ina rokon Allah da Ya yarda da su da kuma gafarta musu da kara musu matsayi da daukaka.

translation.en: Sayyid Ali Khamenei
translation.ha: Sayyid Ali Khamene'i

translation.en: Leader’s Speech to Army Commanders - Khamenei.ir
translation.ha: Jawabin Jagora Yayin Ganawa Da Kwamandojin Sojin Kasa Na Iran

translation.en: The following is the full text of the speech delivered on April 22, 2012 by Ayatollah Khamenei the Leader of the Islamic Revolution in a meeting with Ground Force commanders of the Islamic Republic of Iran's Army.
translation.ha: Shimfida: A ranar lahadi 22, Aprilun 2012 ne Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci Ayatullah Sayyid Ali Khamenei ya kai ziyara helkwatar dakarun sojin kasa na Iran don gane wa idanuwansa irin nasarorin da suka samu a bangarori daban-daban. Abin da ke biye fassarar jawabin da Jagoran yayi ne a ganawar da ya yi da manyan kwamandoji da sauran jami'an sojin:

translation.en: In the Name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful
translation.ha: Da Sunan Allah Mai Rahama Mai Jin Kai

translation.en: Today has been an enjoyable and pleasant day for me: being in the company of you dear brothers and youth from the Armed Forces, speaking to you in person and benefiting from the manifestations of your motivation and dynamism and from your pure and enlightened hearts.
translation.ha: Rana ce mai kyau da faranta rai a gare ni saboda damar da na samu na kasancewa a cikinku, 'yan'uwa masu girma, matasa da dakaru masu makami, ganawa da tattaunawa da ku daga kurkusa sannan da kuma amfanuwa da irin alama da kumaji na irin wannan yunkuri na ku da kuma wannan zuciya taku mai haske.

translation.en: I extend my congratulations to you on the occasion of Army Day.
translation.ha: Ina taya ku murnar ranar sojoji (ta kasa).

translation.en: I hope that each and every one of you - who are mostly young and are going through the good part of your life - will protect the future, dignity, glory and power of our nation in a perfect way.
translation.ha: Ina fatan kowane guda daga cikinku - wanda ana iya cewa mafi yawanku matasa ne sannan kuma kuna cikin mafi kyawun rayuwarku - za ku zamanto wani misali da tushe na kyautata makomar wannan kasar, daukakar kasar nan da tsayin dakan wannan al'umma.

translation.en: I hope Allah the Exalted makes this happen.
translation.ha: Ina rokon Allah Madaukakin Sarki da ya sanya hakan ta faru.

translation.en: Thankfully the Ground Forces of the Army have been thriving. One can feel this.
translation.ha: To, alhamdu lillahi dakarun sojin kasa sun sami nasara da ci gaba; lalle mutum yana iya ganin hakan.

translation.en: This movement and this auspicious trend started from the victory of the Islamic Revolution and the establishment of the Islamic Republic.
translation.ha: Wannan yunkuri da wannan tsari mai cike da albarka ya faro ne tun bayan nasarar juyin juya halin Musulunci da kafa tsarin Jamhuriyar Musulunci.

translation.en: It is wrong to think that during the time of the taghuti regime, there were no pious people in the Army or that there were few such people.
translation.ha: Bai kamata wani ya yi zaton cewa a lokacin gwamnatin dagutu babu muminai cikin sojoji ba ne ko kuma su din nan 'yan kadan ba ne.

translation.en: No, this was not the case.
translation.ha: A'a, lalle ba haka lamarin yake ba.

translation.en: I had seen them on different occasions and in different places.
translation.ha: Na ga hakan a lokuta da wajaje daban-daban.

translation.en: However, individual orientations and organizational orientations have different meanings. When the orientation of a society or organization is wrong, individual efforts will not be effective in that society, no matter how strenuous they are.
translation.ha: A lokacin da mahanga ta gaba daya ta wata hukuma da wata al'umma ta zamanto bisa kuskure, to kuwa mahanga ta daidaiku komai yawansu a cikin wannan gungun ko hukumar, ba za ta zamanto mai wata sakamako mai kyau ba.

translation.en: This was the case at that time too.
translation.ha: To haka lamarin ya kasance a wancan lokacin.

translation.en: There is a narration - which I think is from Imam Sadiq (a.s.) - and it contains a qudsi narration: "I will punish any group of Muslims who follow an oppressive ruler who has not been sanctioned by God even if they are pious and do good deeds."
translation.ha: Akwai wani hadisi da a bisa zahiri daga wajen Imam Sadik (amincin Allah ya tabbata a gare shi) ne aka ruwaito shi wanda hadisi ne na Kudusi - yana cewa: "Lalle zan azabtar da duk wani daga cikin musulmi da ya yi biyayya ga wani ja'irin shugaba wanda ba daga wajen Allah yake ba, ko da kuwa ya kasance mai kyautatawa da tsantsaini cikin ayyukansa".

translation.en: This is what the narration means: if a society is ruled by corrupt and oppressive individuals, pious deeds of the members of that society will not get them anywhere and if some people surrender to those oppressive individuals and follow them, God will punish them. The opposite situation has also been mentioned in the same narration: "And I will forgive any group of Muslims who follow a ruler who guides them under God's order even if they are oppressive and commit sins."
translation.ha: Wato abin da hadisin yake nuni da shi shi ne cewa matukar dai jagorancin wani tsari na al'umma ya kasance a hannun wasu mutane lalatattu kuma azzalumai sannan kuma batattu, to kuwa kokari da yunkurin muminan mutanen da suke cikin wannan al'umma babu inda zai je; sannan kuma idan aka samu wasu mutane a cikin wannan al'umma da suka mika wuya ga wadannan azzaluman da kuma yi musu biyayya, to kuwa Allah zai azabtar da su. Ko da yake a cikin shi kansa wannan hadisin an yi magana kan kishiyar hakan inda yake cewa: "Sannan kuma zan yafe wa duk wani daga musulmin da ya yi biyayya ga wani shugaba mai shiryarwa daga wajen Allah, ko da kuwa a cikin ayyukansu sun zamanto masu zalunci da sabo".

translation.en: Of course, the narration needs explanation and one should not limit oneself to the apparent meaning, but it essentially means: if in a system, a community, a country or a society, the system of government is divine and just, those who follow the government will be forgiven by God even if they make certain mistakes.
translation.ha: A takaice dai abin da ake nufi shi ne cewa idan har a wani tsari, ko cikin wata al'umma, ko wata kasa ko wata kungiya, idan ya zamanto tsarin da ke iko tsari ne na Ubangiji, tsari ne da ake gudanar da adalci a cikinsa, to mutanen da suke biyayya ga wannan tsarin za su sami afuwa ta Ubangiji, ko da kuwa sun aikata wasu 'yan kura-kurai.

translation.en: This can be applied to a country, Ummah or society.
translation.ha: Kuna iya kwatanta hakan da wata kasa ko wata al'umma ko wata hukuma kamar hukumar soji.

translation.en: Similarly it can be applied to an organization such as the Army. At that time the Army was in the wrong hands. But when the popular movement started, the pious members - and the few high-ranking commanders who were pious - found their path.
translation.ha: A wancan lokacin sojoji suna karkashin iko wadansu mutane ne da ba su cancanta ba; to amma a lokacin da yunkurin mutane ya faro, wadannan mutane muminai da wasu manyan jami'ai 'yan tsirarru sun riga da sun fahimci tafarkinsu don haka sai suka gano inda ya kamata su kasance.

translation.en: Since the early days after the victory of the Revolution, certain people stepped in and helped the revolutionary elements to find a way to speak to the Army.
translation.ha: Tun daga wadannan ranaku na farkon nasarar juyin juya halin Musulunci an samu wadansu mutane da suka shigo fage da taimaka wa 'yan gwagwarmaya wajen samun hanyar magana da sojojin.

translation.en: After all, they were not familiar with each other. Neither our officials, nor the revolutionaries, nor the activists, nor the clergy, nor our academia were familiar with the Army.
translation.ha: Don kuwa ba su san junansu ba; ba jami'an ba, haka nan ba 'yan gwagwarmayar ba, ba malaman ba, sannan kuma ba sauran daliban jami'a ba, babu guda daga cikinsu da ke da alaka da sojoji; bakinsu bai zo daya ba.

translation.en: This common language was created thanks to the Revolution.
translation.ha: To amma albarkacin wannan juyi sai ya zamanto bakinsu ya zo daya.

translation.en: Today the Army is one of the most populist organizations in the country.
translation.ha: A yau dai sojoji sun zamanto daya daga cikin cibiyoyin kasar mu da suka fi kusaci da mutane.

translation.en: Among the different organizations that make up the government, we see that the Army is one of the organizations that has come closest to the people and their tendencies and feelings and that it has contributed most to the popular movement in our society.
translation.ha: A lokacin da muka kalli cibiyoyi daban-daban na wannan kasa da wannan tsari, za mu ga cewa sojoji sun kasance daya daga cikin cibiyoyin da suka fi kusaci da mutane, suka fi kaunar mutane da girmama irin abin da suke ji da kuma taimakonsu.

translation.en: This is a very valuable and precious thing.
translation.ha: Lalle wannan wani lamari ne mai kimar gaske.

translation.en: It is a fact that throughout the world, armies are established and deployed with the slogan of safeguarding national interests, but is this really the case?
translation.ha: Na'am a duniya ana ikirarin cewa an kafa sojoji ne da manufar kare manufofi na kasa, to amma shin a hakikanin gaskiya haka lamarin ya ke?

translation.en: Did the US Army safeguard the interests of the American people in Iraq and Afghanistan?
translation.ha: Shin sojojin Amurka a Iraki da sojojin Amurka a Afghanistan suna kiyaye manufofin al'ummar Amurka ne?

translation.en: Did the people of America benefit from the occupation of Afghanistan?
translation.ha: Shin al'ummar Amurka sun sami wani amfani daga mamayan da aka yi wa Afghanistan?

translation.en: Were they happy about killing the people of Afghanistan?
translation.ha: Shin suna cikin farin ciki da kuma amincewa da irin kisan gillan da ake yi wa al'ummar Afghanistan?

translation.en: Were the interests of America served by the mercenary soldiers who shot the people, dismembered their bodies and took pictures with the body parts?
