translation.ha: Na biyu shi ne ci gaba da gudanar da ayyuka da kuma bin sahunsu (ba tare da dakatawa ba), wanda a wannan wajen ina kiran Malam Kara'ati da abokan aikinsa da cewa kada su saki wannan aiki da suka faro shi; su ci gaba da bin diddigin sa.

translation.en: I hope Allah the Exalted will help Mr. Qara'ati and all you dear brothers and sisters. I hope God will bestow health and a long life on all of you so that you can follow up what you have started.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne a ci gaba da bin diddigin aiki. Ina rokon Allah Madaukakin Sarki da ya taimake shi da kuma ku din nan gaba daya 'yan'uwa maza da mata masu girma, ya kara muku tsawon rai da kuma koshin lafiya ta yadda za ku ci gaba da gudanar da wannan aikin.

translation.en: These are important points. These days are close to the birthday anniversary of Imam Mahdi (a.s.), which is a great Eid for the Muslim world and even all of humanity.
translation.ha: Amma wannan lamari na akidar Mahdi, wanda gabatar da shi a cikin wadannan ranaku na kusa da ranar sha biyar ga watan Sha'aban da wannan idi mai girma na Musulunci kai na ma dukkanin bil'adama baki daya, lamari ne da ya dace a gabatar da shi sannan kuma wajibi ne a ba shi muhimmancin gaske kamar yadda ake ba wa sauran lamurra irin su annabci muhimmanci.

translation.en: Why?
translation.ha: Saboda me?

translation.en: Because Mahdaviat represents what all prophets were sent for - namely, building a monotheistic world on the basis of justice using all the capacities that Allah the Exalted has bestowed on humanity. This is the era that will come after the re-appearance of Imam Mahdi (God's greetings be upon him and may God hasten his re-appearance): the era in which monotheism and genuine spirituality will be dominant over the entire life of human beings, the era in which justice will be established in the real sense of the word.
translation.ha: Saboda kuwa abin da akidar Mahdi take bishara da shi, shi ne dai abin da aka turo dukkanin annabawa da manzanni da shi wanda shi ne samar da wata duniya ta tauhidi (kadaita Ubangiji) sannan kuma wacce aka gina ta bisa asasi na adalci da kuma amfanuwa da dukkanin dama da Allah Madaukakin Sarki Ya arzurta dan'adam da shi. Shi ne dai irin wannan yanayi na lokacin bayyanar Imam Mahdi (amincin allah ya tabbata a gare shi sannan kuma allah ya gaggauta bayyanarsa).

translation.en: I have repeatedly said that the movement carried out over many centuries by humanity in the shade of the teachings of divine prophets is a movement towards the wide road which will be built after the re-appearance of Imam Mahdi (may God hasten his re-appearance), the road that will lead humanity to lofty goals.
translation.ha: A lokuta da dama dai mun sha fadin cewa dukkanin ayyukan da bil'adama suka aiwatar karkashin inuwar koyarwar annabi, wani yunkuri ne zuwa ga mikakkiyar titin da babu gargada a kanta wanda a lokacin Imam Mahdi (Allah ya gaggauta bayyanarsa) ne dan'adam zai kai ga kololuwar manufarsa da kuma tafiya a kan wannan hanyar.

translation.en: It is as if a group of people are guided by certain people through mountains, valleys, marshes and thorny bushes in order to reach the main road.
translation.ha: A lokacin da suka isa ga wannan hanya ta asali, to hanya a bude take a gare su; madaidaiciyar hanya a fili take; tafiya kuwa a kanta zai zamanto da sauki, mutum cikin sauki zai iya tafiya a kan wannan hanyar. To amma lamarin ba shi ne daga mutum ya isa ga asalin hanyar shi kenan sai ya dakatar da wanann tafiyar tasa ba; a'a, a nan ne ma mutum zai fara tafiyarsa zuwa ga manufa mai girma ta Ubangiji.

translation.en: Humanity has moved through difficult paths and has cleared various obstacles in order to reach this main road. This main road is the road that will be built after the re-appearance of the Imam of the Age (a.s.). It is the world that will be built after the re-appearance of Imam Mahdi (a.s.).
translation.ha: Tsawon wadannan karnoni masu yawa, dan'adam ya fuskanci matsaloli da hanyoyi masu tsananin wahala da abubuwa masu kawo masa cikas a kan hanya, a kokarin da ya ke yi na isa ga wannan hanya ta asali. Wannan hanya ta asali kuwa ita ce dai wannan hanya ta lokacin bayyanar Imam Mahdi; ita ce wannan duniya ta lokacin bayyanar Mahdi wanda alal hakika yunkurin bil'adama ta wani bangaren daga nan take farowa.

translation.en: In a sense, the movement of humanity will start from that point.
translation.ha: Idan har aka rasa akidar Mahdi, ma'anar hakan ita ce dukkanin kokarin annabawa, dukkanin wadannan kiraye-kiraye (na annabawa), dukkanin wadannan aiko manzanni da aka yi, dukkanin wannan kokari ba kama hannun yaro, dukkanin su za su zamanto ba su da fa'ida kenan, ba su da amfani. A saboda haka, batun akidar Mahdi wani lamari ne na asali; yana daga cikin tushen masaniya ta Ubangiji.

translation.en: For this reason, as far as I know, in all divine religions there are teachings which are essentially the same as Mahdaviat.
translation.ha: A saboda haka ne a cikin dukkanin addinan Ubangiji - gwargwadon ilimin da muke da shi - akwai wani abu da wannan ma'ana ta hakika ta akidar Mahdi, sai dai kawai a yanayi da aka gurbata shi, ta yanayi da ke tattare da rudu ba tare da abin da suke son fadi ya fito fili ba.

translation.en: The issue of Mahdaviat is among the undeniable Islamic realities. That is to say, Mahdaviat is not limited to Shia Islam. All Islamic denominations accept that the end of the world will come when Imam Mahdi (may God hasten his re-appearance) establishes ultimate justice in the world.
translation.ha: Haka nan kuma batun akidar Mahdi a Musulunci wani lamari ne da aka sallama masa; wato ba lamari ne da ya kebanci mabiya tafarkin Shi'a ba. Dukkanin mazhabobin Musulunci sun yi amanna da cewa a karshen duniya za a tabbatar da hukuma ta gaskiya da adalci ta hannun Mahdi (amincin Allah ya tabbata a gare shi sannan kuma Allah ya gaggaunta bayyanarsa).

translation.en: There are valid narrations by the Holy Prophet (s.w.a.) and Islamic luminaries in different denominations of Islam.
translation.ha: Akwai riwayoyi ingantattun da aka ruwaito su a mazhabobi daban-daban na Musulunci daga wajen Manzon Allah (s.a.w.a) da kuma sauran manyan mutane dangane da hakan.

translation.en: Therefore, there is no doubt in this regard.
translation.ha: A saboda haka, babu wani batun shakka cikin wannan lamari.

translation.en: However, Shia Islam has an advantage among other denominations because the issue of Mahdaviat is not an ambiguous issue in Shia Islam. The issue of Mahdaviat is not a convoluted and unintelligible issue in Shia Islam. It is clear.
translation.ha: Sai dai kawai abin da Shia' a ta bambanta da sauran mazhabobin shi ne cewa a Shi'a kan lamarin Mahdi ba wani lamari ne da ke da rudu wanda ba a fayyace shi sosai ba; ba wai wani lamari ne wanda mutane ba za su iya fahimtarsa ba.

translation.en: And this familiarity is not based on Shia narrations alone. There are non-Shia narrations that clarify the details for us.
translation.ha: Haka nan kuma ba wai kawai riwayoyin Shi'a ne suka yi wannan bayanin ba; hatta riwayoyin da ake da su wadanda ba na 'yan Shi'a ba, akwai su da suke mana irin wadannan bayanai.

translation.en: Followers of other Islamic denominations should pay careful attention in order to understand this clear truth.
translation.ha: Yana da kyau sauran mabiya mazhabobi su yi dubi sosai da kuma sanya idanuwa kan wadannan riwayoyi don gaskiya ta bayyana musu.

translation.en: This is the kind of importance that should be attached to the issue of Mahdaviat and we are better qualified to work on this issue.
translation.ha: A saboda haka wannan lamari ya ke a fili kuma mu din nan mu ne muka fi dacewar da mu yi magana kan wannan lamari; mu gudanar da ayyuka na ilimi da suke cike da hujjoji kan wannan batu.

translation.en: The issue of waiting [for the re-appearance of Imam Mahdi (a.s.)] is an integral part of Mahdaviat. It is one of the key concepts for understanding religion and the general movement of the Islamic Ummah towards the lofty goals of Islam.
translation.ha: Haka nan shi ma batun jiran dakon (bayyanar Mahdi) wanda wani bangare ne na wannan akida ta Mahdi da ba za a taba raba ta da shi ba, shi ma yana daga cikin mabudi na asali na fahimtar addini da yunkuri na asasi na gaba daya da kuma na zamantakewa na al'ummar musulmi zuwa ga babbar manufa ta Musulunci.

translation.en: Waiting means expecting an event that will definitely happen.
translation.ha: Jiran dako yana nufin sanya ido da ci gaba da bin diddigin wata hakika da wani lamari wanda babu kokwanto cikinsa.

translation.en: This is the meaning of waiting.
translation.ha: Wannan ita ce ma'anar jiran dako.

translation.en: Waiting means that this future is definite.
translation.ha: Jiran dako yana nufin wannan makoma wacce babu kokwanto cikinta, musamman ma jiran dakon wata halitta (wani mutum) wacce take raye kuma take tare da mu; wannan dai lamari ne mai matukar muhimmanci.

translation.en: There are certain narrations according to which people can see him, but they do not recognize him.
translation.ha: Ya zo cikin riwaya cewa mutane suna ganinsa, kamar yadda shi ma yake ganin mutanen, sai dai kawai ba su san shi ba ne.

translation.en: In certain narrations he has been likened to Prophet Joseph whose brothers used to see him.
translation.ha: A wasu daga cikin riwayoyin ma an kamanta shi (Imam Mahdi) da Annabi Yusuf wanda 'yan'uwansa suna ganinsa, yana tare da su, suna tafiya wajensa, to amma ba su san shi ba.

translation.en: Humanity needs this waiting and the Islamic Ummah needs it even more.
translation.ha: Mutane dai suna bukatar wannan jiran dako, al'ummar musulmi ma su ne suka fi bukatar hakan.

translation.en: When a person is sure that there is such a future, he must expect it and be prepared for it.
translation.ha: A lokacin da mutum ya ke da yakinin cewa akwai irin wannan makomar; kamar yadda ya zo cikin ayoyin Alkur'ani mai girma: "Kuma lalle, hakika, Mun rubuta a cikin Littafi baicin Ambato cewa bayina salihai su ne masu gadon kasa.

translation.en: Most surely in this is a message to people who are devout."
translation.ha: Lalle ne a cikin wannan, hakika, akwai iyarwa ga wadansu mutane masu ibada" (Suratul Anbiya 21:105-106).

translation.en: We should know that a great event will happen and we should always expect this event.
translation.ha: Mu san cewa lalle akwai wani lamari mai girman gaske da zai faru, don haka mu kasance cikin jiran dako.

translation.en: We can never say that the event will not happen in a few years and we can never say that the event will happen in the near future. We should always wait for it.
translation.ha: Ba za a iya cewa a halin yanzu dai akwai shekaru masu yawa da suka rage kafin hakan ta faru, haka nan kuma ba za a iya cewa yanzu-yanzu ne lamarin zai faru ba. Wajibi a ko da yaushe a zamanto cikin shiri, wajibi a ko da yaushe mu zamanto cikin jiran dako.

translation.en: Those who are waiting should get closer to the characteristics that will be expected in the era that is being awaited.
translation.ha: Jiran dako ya kan sanya mutum ya kusata kansa zuwa ga halaye da kuma dabi'u da sauran lamurran da ake fatan gani daga wajen mutumin da ya ke jiran dako.

translation.en: This is the requirement for waiting.
translation.ha: Wannan shi ne abin da ake bukata a yayin jiran dako.

translation.en: If there is supposed to be justice, truth, monotheism, purity and worship in the era which we are awaiting, then as the people who are waiting, we should get closer to these things.
translation.ha: A lokacin da ya zamana ake fatan ganin adalci, da gaskiya da kadaita Ubangiji da tsarkin zuciya da kuma bautan Allah - da makaman hakan - a lokacin da Imam Mahdi ya bayyana, to mu din nan a matsayin mu na masu jiran dako, wajibi ne mu kusata kanmu da wadannan siffofi.

translation.en: We should prepare ourselves for justice.
translation.ha: Mu fahimtar da kan mu ma'anar adalci sannan kuma mu shirya kan mu wajen aiwatar da shi haka nan kuma mu zamanto masu shirin karbar gaskiya.

translation.en: These are the requirements of waiting. One of the things that the essence of waiting requires is that we should not be satisfied with the status quo and with the level of progress we have made so far.
translation.ha: Daya daga cikin siffofin da aka tabbatar da su cikin hakikanin jiran dako, shi ne cewa bai kamata mutum ya ji ya wadatu da yanayin da ake ciki na irin ci gaban da aka samu a halin yanzu ba; mutum ya ji cewa a ko da yaushe ya ji cewa yana son ganin an sami irin wannan ci gaban a cikin al'umma.

translation.en: These are the requirements of waiting.
translation.ha: Wadannan lamurra ne na wajibi na jiran dakon (bayyanar Mahdi).

translation.en: As Mr. Qara'ati said in his report, thankfully there are certain people who are doing scholarly work on the issue of waiting.
translation.ha: Alhamdu lillahi, a yau dai akwai wadansu mutane da suke gudanar da ayyuka na ilimi a wannan fage na jiran dako; kamar yadda ya zo cikin rahoton da Malam Kara'ati ya gabatar sannan kuma a baya ma na karanta wannan rahoton, to a halin yanzu ma dai ga shi nan ya yi ishara da hakan kuma ya fadi.

translation.en: It is necessary to pay careful attention to scholarly and accurate work on the issue of waiting and on the era after the re-appearance of Imam Mahdi (a.s.). It is also necessary to clearly avoid unscholarly and ignorant work in this regard.
translation.ha: A saboda haka bai kamata a gafala daga gudanar da ayyuka da suke cike da ilimi dangane da batun jiran dako a lokacin bayyanar Mahdin ba. Lalle wajibi ne a nesanci ayyuka na jahilci a wannan bangaren.

translation.en: Unscholarly and ignorant work - the kind of work that is not based on knowledge and valid documents and sources about the Imam of the Age (may God hasten his re-appearance) - is among the things that can be highly dangerous and it can prepare the ground for false claimants.
translation.ha: Daya daga cikin lamuran da za su iya zama masu hatsarin gaske shi ne gudanar da ayyukan da suke cike da jahilci wadanda ba su da wata alaka da ilimi sannan kuma wadanda ba su dogara da wasu ingantattun hujoji ba cikin lamurran da suka shafi Imam al-Zaman (Allah ya gaggauta bayyanarsa), wanda hakan lamari ne da ke share fage ga masu da'awar karya.

translation.en: Unscholarly and undocumented work that is based on fantasies and illusions, rather than valid sources and documents, pushes people away from the state of waiting and prepares the ground for false claimants. It is necessary to seriously avoid such things.
translation.ha: Ayyukan da babu ilimi a cikinsu wadanda kuma ba su dogara da wani tushe na ilimi da inganci ba, abubuwa da suka ginu bisa zato kawai, irin wadannan abubuwa suna nesanta mutane daga hakikanin jiran dako, sannan kuma da samar da fage da kuma dama ga masu da'awar karya; lalle wajibi ne a nesanci hakan.

translation.en: There have been false claimants throughout history. As was mentioned in this meeting, certain claimants try to make a sign apply to themselves or other people.
translation.ha: Tsawon tarihi an samu masu da'awa; wasu daga cikin su ma kamar yadda aka yi ishara su kan jingina wani abu ga kansu ko kuma ga wasu mutane na daban; dukkanin wadannan abubuwa kuskure ne.

translation.en: Some of the things that are said about the signs of Imam Mahdi's (a.s.) re-appearance are not definite and they have not been mentioned in valid and documented narrations either.
translation.ha: Wasu daga cikin abubuwan da ake fadi na daga cikin alamomin bayyanar Imam Mahdi ba wasu abubuwa ne da za a iya cewa haka suke dari bisa dari ba; wasu ma ba abubuwa ne da za a iya tabbatar da su cikin ingantattun riwayoyi ba; riwayoyi ne masu rauni, ba za a iya dogaro da su ba.

translation.en: They are based on narrations that are not solid and we cannot rely on them.
translation.ha: Wasu abubuwan da ma suke da tushe din, amma ba abubuwa ne da cikin sauki za a iya tabbatar da su ba.

translation.en: There have always been certain people who have tried to apply the poems of Shah Nimatullah Wali to different people in different centuries and I have seen some of these people.
translation.ha: A ko da yaushe an sami wasu mutane da suke jingina wakokin Shah Ni'imatullah Wali - tsawon lokaci sannan kuma a lokuta da dama - ga wasu mutane daban-daban a karnoni daban-daban da suka gabata, wanda ni na ga hakan.

translation.en: His descriptions have been applied to a particular person and after a century or so the same descriptions have been applied to another person. These things are wrong and misleading. When there is deviation, the truth will be sidelined and it will be a tool to mislead people.
translation.ha: A loakcin da aka samu bayyanar kauce wa hanya da kuma kuskure, to a irin wannan lokaci zai zama an mai da gaskiya gefe, gaskiyar za ta buya wa mutane, hakan zai samar da hanyoyin batar da mutane.

translation.en: Therefore, it is necessary to seriously avoid unscholarly work and surrendering to rumors. Scholarly, firm and documented work is something that experts should do.
translation.ha: A saboda haka wajibi ne a nesanci dukkanin ayyuka da suke cike da jahilci da kuma yarda da jita-jitan da ake yadawa.

translation.en: It is necessary to take this issue as seriously as possible so that the path is opened up for ordinary people.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne a yi dukkanin abin da za'a iya wajen daukan wannan aikin da dukkanin karfi saboda cikin yardar Allah hanya ta zamanto ta budu wa mutane; gwargwadon yadda zukata suka fahimci lamarin Mahdi sannan kuma suka debe kewa hakan al'amarin wannan ma'abocin girma zai dada fito mana fili da kuma jinsa a jiki a matsayin mu na mutanen da mu ke zamanin fakuwarsa da kuma samun alaka sosai da shi.

translation.en: Some of the duas that we have are very valuable and in certain cases they are good documents.
translation.ha: Wannan tawassulin da ke cikin ziyarori daban-daban wanda wasu daga cikin su ma suna da tushe mai kyau, lamurra ne masu kima sosai.

translation.en: Tawwasul [seeking spiritual intercession and connection] to Imam Mahdi (a.s.) is done from a distance.
translation.ha: Wadannan tawassuli da kula da kuma debe kewa da wannan ma'abocin girma (da ake yi) daga nesa.

translation.en: This tawwasul and this spiritual closeness are very good and necessary.
translation.ha: Irin wadannan tawassuli da irin wadannan kauna lamurra ne masu kyaun gaske sannan kuma na wajibi.

translation.en: I hope Allah the Exalted will hasten the re-appearance of Imam Mahdi (a.s.).
translation.ha: Muna rokon Allah Madaukakin Sarki da ya gaggauta bayyanar wannan ma'abocin girma, sannan kuma ya sanya mu cikin mabiyansa a lokacin fakuwarsa, haka nan kuma a lokacin da ya bayyana, haka nan kuma insha Allahu ya sanya mu cikin mujahidai masu jihadi tare da shi sannan kuma mu yi shahada a karkashin tutarsa.

translation.en: Biography of Ayatollah Khamenei the Leader of the Islamic Revolution - Khamenei.ir
translation.ha: Takaitaccen Tarihin Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci Ayatullah Sayyid Ali Khamene'i

translation.en: On the 16th of July 1939, the future Leader of Islamic Iran was born in the holy city of Mashhad, in the province of Khorasan.
translation.ha: An haifi mai girma Jagora juyin juya halin Musulunci Ayatullah Sayyid Ali Khamene'i dan marigayi Hujjatul Islam wal Muslimin Hajj Sayyid Jawad al-Husaini al-Khamene'i ne a ranar 24 ga watan Tir 1318 (hijira shamsiyya) wacce ta yi daidai da 28 ga watan Safar 1358 (hijira kamariyya) 15 ga Yuli 1939 (miladiyya) a garin Mashhad mai tsarki.

translation.en: Sayyed Ali was the second son of Sayyed Javad Khamenei, a humble and poor Islamic scholar who taught all members of his family how to lead a simple, humble way of life.
translation.ha: Shi ne na biyu cikin ‘ya’yan mahaifinsa. Rayuwar Sayyid Jawad Khamene'i (mahaifin Jagora) kamar ta sauran malaman addini rayuwa ce wacce ba ta a zo a gani ba. Don haka ne ma mai dakinsa da ‘ya’yansa suka koyi rayuwa mai sauki da yarda da dan abin da ake da shi.

translation.en: My father, though a well-known religious figure, was a bit of an ascetic. 0.135094 154.txt 2130-2130.txt Ina iya tunawa wasu ranakun ma ko abin da za mu ci da dare ma ba mu da shi a gidan. Da kyar mahaifiyarmu take dan shirya mana abin da za mu sa a baki, shi din ma biredi ne da zabibi kawai. Sometimes for supper we had nothing but bread with some raisins, which our mother had somehow improvised.... our house, some sixty-five square meters, consisted of a single room and a gloomy basement. 0.123310 154.txt 2130-2130.txt Har lokacin da wasu masoyan mahaifinmu suka saya masa dan wani waje a kusa da gidanmu a nan ne fa aka samu damar gina wasu dakuna biyu muka zamanto muna da dakuna uku kenan”. Years later some charitable persons bought the small, empty lot adjacent to our house, so we were able to build two more rooms.
translation.ha: “Babana dai fitaccen malamin addini ne amma mai tsananin tsantsaini da rayuwa ta kadaici…mun yi fama da rayuwa ta rashi.

translation.en: At the age of four Sayyed Ali and his older brother Mohammad, were sent to maktab, the traditional primary-schools of that time, in order to learn the alphabet and the Holy Quran. Later, he was transferred to a newly established Islamic school to continue his learning.
translation.ha: Lokacin da ya kai shekaru hudu a duniya ne aka tura su makaranta shi da yayansa Sayyid Muhammad don su karanci bakake da kuma yadda ake karatun Alkur’ani. Ta haka wadannan ‘yan’uwa biyu suka shiga sabuwar makarantar primare da aka bude mai suna “Darut Ta’alimi Diyanati” A Makarantar Hauza (Makarantar Addini)

translation.en: The main encouraging factors for this enlightened decision were my parents, especially my father says Ayatollah Khamenei today.
translation.ha: “Babban wanda ya kwadaitar da ni zaban wannan tafarki mai haske da haskakawa ta malamanta shi ne mahaifina, mahaifiyata ma ta taimaka sosai”.

translation.en: At Soleiman Khan and Nawwab religious schools and under the supervision of his father and the tutorships of some great religious scholars, he studied all the 'intermediate level ' curriculum including logic, philosophy and Islamic jurisprudence in the exceptionally short time of five years.
translation.ha: A daidai wannan lokacin ne kuma ya karanci littafin ‘Mu’alim’. Daga nan kuma ya karanci littafin ‘Shara’iy al-Islam’ da ‘Sharh al-Lum’a’ wajen mahaifinsa da kuma marigayi Agha Mirza Mudarris Yazdi, littafan Rasa’il da Makasib kuma a wajen marigayi Hajj Sheikh Hashim Kazwini.

translation.en: He then started his advanced level studies called darse kharij with such eminent scholars and instructors as Grand Ayatollah Milani.
translation.ha: Ayatullah Khamene'i ya fara karatun mai zurfi da ake kira (Bahasul Kharij) ne a wajen babban marja’in nan marigayi Ayatullah al-Uzma Milani a birnin Mashhad a lokacin yana da shekaru sha takwas a duniya.

translation.en: He was fascinated by the theological and academic instructions of such eminent scholars such as Ayatollah Hakim and Ayatollah Shahrudi. He attended their lessons and was willing to stay there and continue his studies in order to profit from these excellent teachers. However his father made it known that he preferred his son continue his advanced studies in the holy city of Qum.
translation.ha: A shekarar 1336 hijira shamsiyya (1957) ne Ayatullah Khamene'i ya tafi birnin Najaf al-Ashraf da nufin ziyarar wajaje masu tsarki, bayan isarsa da halartar darussan Bahasul Kharij na manyan malaman hauzar birnin Najaf din irin su marigayi Sayyid Muhsin Hakim, Sayyid Mahmud Shahrudi, Mirza bakir Zanjani, Sayyid Yahya Yazdi da Mirza Hasan Bujunurdi sai ya ji zuciyarsa ta nitsu da yadda ake karantarwa don haka ya kuduri aniyar zama da ci gaba da karatunsa a wajen. Sai dai mahaifinsa ya ki amincewa.

translation.en: Thus, respecting his father's wish, he returned to Iran in 1958.
translation.ha: Don haka bayan wani lokaci sai ya dawo birnin Mashhad. A Makarantar Hauzar Kum

translation.en: Diligently and enthusiastically he followed his advanced studies in Qum from 1958 to 1964 and benefited from the teachings of great scholars and grand ayatollahs such as Ayat. Borujerdi, Imam Khomeini, Ayat. Haeri Yazdi and Allamah Tabatabai.
translation.ha: Daga shekarar 1337-1343 (1958-1964) Ayatullah Khamene'i ya ci gaba da karatunsa mai zurfi na fikihu, Usul da Falsafa a wajen malamai irin su marigayi Ayatullah al-Uzma Burujerdi, Imam Khumaini, Sheikh Murtadha Ha’iri Yazdi da Allamah Tabataba'i.

translation.en: He received the bad news that his father had lost his sight in one eye and was not able to read properly. This prompted him to return to Mashhad and while being at the service of his father, seek further knowledge from him, from Ayatollah Milani and other important scholars residing in Mashhad.
translation.ha: A shekarar 1343 (1964) Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci, cikin wasikar da ya samu daga wajen mahaifinsa, ya fahimci cewa daya daga cikin idanuwan mahaifin nasa ya makance, wannan labari ya sosa masa rai, don haka ya shiga cikin damuwa ko dai ya zauna ya ci gaba da karatunsa a Kum ko kuma ya koma Mashhad don kula da mahaifinsa. Daga karshe dai Ayatullah Khamene'i ya yanke shawawar yin hijira don Allah daga Kum zuwa Mashhad don ya kula da mahaifinsa.

translation.en: Recalling this important point of departure in his life, the Leader says, "If there have been any successes in my life, they all go back to God's blessings favored upon me because of my dutiful caring for parents." POLITICAL ACTIVITIES "In the areas of political and revolutionary ideas and Islamic jurisprudence, I am certainly a disciple of Imam Khomeini" says Ayatollah Khamenei.
translation.ha: Dangane da hakan yana cewa: “Na koma garin Mashhad kuma Allah Ya arzurta mu da nasarori masu yawa. Ala kulli hal na tafi can na ci gaba da sauke nauyin dake kaina. Idan har ina da wata nasara da na samu a rayuwa, na yi imani da cewa na same ta ne sakamakon wannan biyayya da na yi wa mahaifina kai har ma da mahaifiyata”.

translation.en: He adds: "Yet the very first sparks of consciousness concerning Islamic, revolutionary ideas and the duty to fight the Shah's despotism and his British supporters, was kindled in my soul at the age of 13 when the brave cleric, Nawwab Safavi, later martyred by the Shah's regime, came to our school in Mashhad in 1952 and delivered a fiery speech against the Shah's anti-Islamic and devious policies."
translation.ha: Hakan kuwa ya faru ne lokacin da Shahid Nawwab Safawi da wasu daga cikin ‘yan kungiyar ‘Fida’iyane Islam’ (masu sadaukarwa ga Musulunci) suka kai musu ziyara a makarantar Sulaiman Khan na garin Mashhad a shekarar 1331 (1952) inda suka gudanar da wani jawabi mai motsa rai kan batun raya Musulunci da gudanar da tsarin mulki na Ubangiji da kuma irin yaudara da karyar da Shah da turawan Ingili masu daure masa gindi suka yi wa al’ummar Iran.

translation.en: In May of 1963 (corresponding to the holy month of Muharram), Imam Khomeini honored the young, brave cleric Sayyed Ali, with the mission of taking a secret message to Ayatollah Milani and other clergymen in Mashhad, on the ways and tactics of exposing the true nature of the Shah's regime.
translation.ha: A shekarar 1338 (1959) ne marigayi Imam Khumaini (r.a) a karon farko ya aike shi da sako zuwa ga Ayatullah Milani da sauran malaman lardin Khorasan kan yadda tsare-tsare da wa’azuzzukan malamai za su kasance a watan Muharram don tona asirin bakar siyasar gwamnatin Shah da kuma halin da kasar Iran take ciki bugu da kari kan yadda waki’ar birnin Kum ta kasance.

translation.en: Here he was arrested for the first time and spent one night in jail. The following the authorities ordered him not to speak at the pulpit again. From that moment he knew that he would be under police surveillance all the time.
translation.ha: Sakamakon ayyukan da yake gudanarwa, jami’an tsaron Shah sun kama shi da tare shi na tsawon dare guda a ranar 9 ga watan Muharram (12 ga watan Khordad 1342 = 2/6/1963). Washegari dai sun sake shi amma da sharadin ba zai sake wa’azi ba kuma zai ci gaba da zama karkashin sanya idon jami’an tsaron.

translation.en: Of course he did not submit to police threats, and as a result of his activities relating to the bloody June 1963 Uprising (15th of Khordad ), he was again arrested and transferred to Mashhad to spend ten days in prison under severe conditions.
translation.ha: Bayan waki’ar 15 ga watan Khordad (4/6/1963) jami’an tsaron sun sake kama shi a garin Berjan din da tura shi zuwa birnin Mashhad inda aka tsare shi a gidan yari cikin mafi mawuyacin yanayi da azabtarwa mai tsanani. Tsarewa Ta Biyu

translation.en: In January 1964 (Ramadhan 1383), according to a well-organized plan, Ayatollah Khamenei and a few close friends traveled to Kirman and Zahedan in southern Iran, to expose the phony referendum the Shah was holding for his so-called reforms. There in the course of many public speeches, he exposed the satanic American policies of the Pahlavi regime. This time, the Shah's feared intelligence agency, SAVAK, stepped in and arrested him one late evening.
translation.ha: A watan Bahman 1342 (Ramadhan 1383=1964) Ayatullah Khamene'i da wasu daga cikin abokansa suka tafi birnin Kerman don gudanar da wasu ayyuka. Sun zauna na tsawon kwanaki biyu zuwa uku a garin suna wa’azi da ganawa da malamai da daliban garin, daga nan sai suka wuce zuwa garin Zahedan. Mutane sun yi maraba sosai da irin jawaban da ya dinga yi na tona asirin bakar siyasar Shah musamman a ranar shida ga watan Bahman ranar da aka gabatar da jabun zaben jin ra’ayin jama’a da gwamnatin Shah din ta gudanar.

translation.en: He was taken to Tehran by an airplane to spend two months in solitary confinement during which time he was tortured.
translation.ha: Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci ya zauna na tsawon kimanin watanni biyu a gidan yarin Kazal Kul’eh a dakin ihunka banza da gana masa nau’oi kala-kala na azaba da cin mutumci.

translation.en: Once freed, he started holding lessons on the exegeses of the Holy Quran, the Prophetic Traditions and Islamic ideology in Mashhad and Tehran.
translation.ha: Darasin tafsirin (Alkur’ani) da hadisi da akidun Musulunci da yake bayarwa a garuruwan Mashhad da Tehran sun sabi karbuwar gaske a wajen matasa da masoya Juyin juya halin Musulunci.

translation.en: They thought that there must be links between these revolutionaries and people like me because of my intellectual and diligent activities.
translation.ha: Saboda imanin da suke da shi cewa babu yadda za a ce ba ni da hannu cikin irin wadannan ayyuka.

translation.en: LAST ARREST AND EXILE Throughout the years 1972-1975, Ayatollah Khamenei was holding classes on the Holy Quran and Islamic ideology in three different mosques in Mashhad. These classes together with his lectures on Imam Ali's (as) Nahjul Balagha attracted thousands of conscious, politically-minded youth and students.
translation.ha: Irin azabtarwa da ‘yan Sabak suke yi a gidajen yari a fili yana nuni ne da cewa jami’an tsaron ba za su taba amincewa da gwagwarmaya na makami shi ma karkashin tunani irin na Musulunci ba, sannan kuma babu yadda za su iya yarda da cewa ba ni da hannu cikin hakan sakamakon irin ayyukan da nake gudanarwa a Mashhad da Tehran. Bayan an sako ni na ci gaba da darussan da nake bayarwa na tafsirin Alkur’ani da akidu a boye”.

translation.en: The lectures were circulated among the people in hand-written or typed forms, in most towns and cities.
translation.ha: Shi kuwa darasin Nahjul Balaga da yake bayarwa yana da irin nasa nau'i na karbuwa a wajen mutane inda ake buga su a ‘yan takardu ana raba su wa al’umma.

translation.en: His students traveled to distant cities to spread his lessons and ideas. All this frightened the Shah's SAVAK agents and so, in the winter of 1975, they broke into his home in Mashhad and arrested him for the 6th time and confiscated all his books and notes.
translation.ha: Su ma a nasu bangaren daliban da suka yi karatu a wajensa a kan tura su sauran garuruwa na kusa da na nesa don isar da wannan sako da share fagen gagarumin juyin juya halin Musulunci. Hakan ne ya sanya a watan goma (Dey) na shekarar 1353 (1975) jami’a tsaron Sabak suka fada wa gidansa inda suka kama shi cikin yanayi na rashin tausayi sannan kuma suka tafi da rubuce-rubucen da yayi.

translation.en: In the autumn of 1975, he was freed and sent back to Mashhad and he was now completely banned from delivering lectures or holding classes.
translation.ha: Wannan shi ne karo na shida da aka kama shi kuma mafi munin cikinsu inda aka ci gaba da tsare shi har zuwa shekarar 1354 a gidan yarin hadin gwuiwa tsakanin ‘yan sanda da ‘yan Sabak. A wannan lokacin an tsare shi ne a dakin ihunka banza shi kadai.

translation.en: His clandestine activities, however, prompted SAVAK to apprehend him in the winter of 1976 and sentence him to exile for three years.
translation.ha: A Gudun Hijira A shekarar 1356 (1978) gwamnatin kama-karya ta Shah ta kama Ayatullah Khamene'i inda ta tura shi gudun hijira na tilas na shekaru uku zuwa garin Iranshahr.

translation.en: Thus, after nearly 15 years of bearing all sorts of torture and maltreatment at the hands of the agents of the Shah's bloodthirsty regime, he could now witness the fall of the tyrannical Pahlavi regime and the rise of an Islamic Republic in Iran. THE VICTORY OF THE ISLAMIC REVOLUTION
translation.ha: A tsakiyar 1357 (1978) sakamakon fadaduwar gwagwarmayar al’ummar Iran, ya tilasta wa jami’an tsaron sako shi daga inda suka tura shi gudun hijira inda ya dawo garin Mashhad ya ci gaba da zama a sahun farko-farko na masu gwagwarmaya da gwamnatin zalunci da kama-karya ta Shah.

translation.en: Shortly before the triumph of the Islamic Revolution (February 11, 1979) and before Imam Khomeini's victorious return to Iran from Paris, an Islamic Revolutionary Council was formed at the behest of the Imam.
translation.ha: Bayan gwagwarmaya da hakurin azabtarwa na sama da shekaru goma sha biyar daga karshe dai wannan gwagwarmaya ta yi nasara da nasarar juyin juya halin Musulunci ya yi nasara, aka kawar da mulkin kama-karya ta ‘ya’yan gidan Pahlawi da kafa gwamnatin Musulunci a duk fadin kasar Iran.

translation.en: 1980- Founding member of the Islamic Republic Party, together with such religious scholars and Mujahids as Shahid Beheshti, Rafsanjani, Shahid Bahonar, and Musavi-Ardebili.
translation.ha: § Assasa ‘Jam’iyyar Jamhuriyar Musulunci’ tare da taimakon abokansa irin su: Shahid Beheshti, Shahid Bahonar, Hashemi Rafsanjani da sauransu a watan Esfand 1357 (1979).

translation.en: • Deputy-Minister of Defence • Supervisor of the Islamic Revolutionary Guards
translation.ha: § Mai kula da dakarun kare juyin juya halin Musulunci a shekarar 1358 (1979).

translation.en: • Imam of Tehran's Friday Congregational Prayers, per Imam Khomeini's decree.
translation.ha: § Limamin juma’ar birnin Tehran a shekarar 1358 (1979).

translation.en: • Elected Tehran MP in the Majlis (Consultative Assembly)
translation.ha: § Wakilin al’ummar Tehran a majalisar shawarar Musulunci a 1358 (1979).

translation.en: 1982- Elected President of the Islamic Republic of Iran following the martyrdom of President Mohammad Ali Rajai (Ayatollah Khamenei was himself the target of an assassination attempt at Abu Dhar mosque in Tehran after which he was hospitalized for a few months).
translation.ha: § Shugaban kasar Iran bayan shahadar Muhammad Ali Raja'i shugaban kasar Iran na biyu. Ayatullah Khamene'i ya zama shugaban kasar Iran ne bayan ya samu kuri’un kimanin mutane miliyan sha shida a zaben da aka gudanar a watan Mehr 1360 (Oktoban 1981) da kuma amincewar marigayi Imam Khumaini (r.a).

translation.en: • Appointed Chairman of the Revolution's Cultural Council.
translation.ha: § Shugabancin majalisar juyin juya hali da al’adu a shekarar 1360 (1981).

translation.en: 1989- Elected as the Leader of the Islamic Republic of Iran by the Assembly of Experts after the demise of Imam Khomeini.
translation.ha: § Shugabancin majalisar fayyace maslahar tsarin Musulunci a 1366 (1987).

translation.en: 1990- Chairman of the Committee for Revision of the Constitution.
translation.ha: § Shugabancin majalisar sake duba tsarin mulki a 1368 (1989).

translation.en: Leader’s Speech to Families of Martyrs and War Veterans of Kermanshah - Khamenei.ir
translation.ha: Jawabin Jagora Yayin Ganawa Da Iyalan Shahidan Lardin Kermanshah

translation.en: The following is the full text of the speech delivered on October 13, 2011 by Ayatollah Khamenei the Leader of the Islamic Revolution in a meeting with the families of martyrs and war veterans of Kermanshah province.
translation.ha: Shimfida: A ranar alhamis 13, Oktoban 2011 ne Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci Ayatullah Sayyid Ali Khamenei ya gana da iyalan shahidai, masu sadaukarwa da wadanda suka sami raunuka na lardin Kermanshah.

translation.en: In the Name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful
translation.ha: Da Sunan Allah Mai Rahama Mai Jin Kai

translation.en: I am thankful to Allah the Exalted who gave me this opportunity today to be present in this great meeting.
translation.ha: Ina gode wa Allah Madaukakin Sarki da a yau Ya ba ni wannan damar ta kasantuwa a wannan taro mai girma.

translation.en: On my trips to different cities, as far as I am concerned one of the greatest and most important meetings is the meetings that are arranged with the honorable families of our martyrs and war veterans.
translation.ha: A wajena daya daga cikin mafiya muhimmancin ganawa a dukkanin ziyarar da na ke kai wa garuruwa daban-daban, ita ce ganawa da iyalan shahidai, masu sadaukarwa da kuma wadanda suka sami raunuka.

translation.en: The reason is that there is such greatness in self-sacrifice that no society can achieve glory and dignity in the absence of it. We usually fail to see all the aspects and dimensions of the martyrdom of our martyrs and the self-sacrifices of our war veterans. This is while engaging in self-sacrifice in society, which might lead to martyrdom or physical disabilities, has many different meanings and dimensions.
translation.ha: Dalilin hakan shi ne cewa batun sadaukar da kai yana da girman gaske don kuwa babu wata al'umma da za ta kai ga daukaka da matsayi mai girma da take son kai wa gare shi ba tare da wadannan abubuwa ba. A mafi yawan lokuta abin da muka fi ba shi muhimmanci cikin lamarin shahadar shahidai da kokarin masu sadaukarwa da kuma wadanda suka sami raunuka shi ne takaitacccen bangaren lamarin; alhali kuwa shi kansa aiki da kuma yunkuri na sadaukarwa a cikin al'umma wanda ya ke kai wa ga shahada ko kuma samun rauni yana da ma'anoni daban-daban wanda kowane guda daga cikin su yana bukatar bincike.

translation.en: One of these aspects is identifying the opportunities that present themselves and responding to the needs of the moment.
translation.ha: Daya daga cikin wadannan bangarori shi ne fahimtar damar da ake da ita da kuma biyan bukatar da ake da ita a kan lokaci.

translation.en: The brave, proud, pious and selfless youth who identified the needs of the country and welcomed the dangers, those youth had an outstanding characteristic: they identified the needs at the right time and they responded to those needs.
translation.ha: Jaruman matasa masu kishi, muminai kuma masu sadaukarwa da suka fahimci irin bukatar da kasar nan take da ita don haka suka tarbi aradu da ka wajen ganin an biya wannan bukatar, suna da wannan siffa ta cewa sun fahimci bukatar da ake da ita a zamaninsu sannan kuma suka biya ta.

translation.en: This is a crucial aspect and a lesson for us.
translation.ha: Wannan wani bangare ne mai muhimmanci, hakan kuma darasi ne a gare mu.

translation.en: Yesterday I mentioned that one month after the victory of the Revolution the youth of Kermanshah felt that they were needed in the battlefields.
translation.ha: A jiya na yi ishara da cewa wata guda bayan nasarar juyin juya halin Musulunci matasan Kermanshah sun ji cewa lalle akwai bukatar da ake da ita don haka suka kama hanya.

translation.en: Shahid Sayyid Mohammad Ja'fari - the pioneering and outstanding martyr - and his friends prepared themselves to go and defend the military base of Sanandaj Army. They understood the significance of this defense.
translation.ha: Shahid Sayyid Muhammad Sa'id Ja'afari - shahidin da ya kasance a sahun gaba - shi da abokansa sun tafi sansanin soji don ba da kariya; don sun fahimci mece ce ma'anar kariya; sun fahimci ma'anar a sami wasu masu adawa da juyi su kame wani sansani na soji.

translation.en: This ability to identify the needs quickly and to take action to address them at the right time is the important point that must not be ignored.
translation.ha: Cikin sauri suka fahimci hakan, cikin lokaci suka fahimta kuma suka yi aiki a daidai lokacin da ya dace da kuma biyan bukatar da ake da ita. Wannan wani lamari ne da yake a fili wanda bai kamata a gafala da shi ba.

translation.en: All of our dear martyrs across the country had this characteristic.
translation.ha: Shahidan mu masu girma a duk fadin kasar nan suna da irin wannan siffar.

translation.en: The dear friends and brothers mentioned the names of certain cities and recounted memories of the defense lines that had been formed in this province.
translation.ha: Yan'uwa sun ambaci sunayen wasu garuruwa, da kuma bayanin irin tsayin daka da gwagwarmayar da aka yi a wannan lardin.

translation.en: Of course, there were people from all parts of the country. There were prominent people from other parts of the country who were martyred in this province. However, we must not ignore the role of the people of this province, the role of the pious youth of Kermanshah, the role of the exceptional and valuable characteristics that those youth had: their vigilance and their ability to identify the opportunities.
translation.ha: Tabbas mutane daga duk fadin kasar nan sun zo wajen nan, akwai wasu fitattun shahidai da suka zo wannan yankin daga yankuna daban-daban kuma suka yi shahada; to amma bai kamata a mance da irin rawar da mutane da matasa masu imani na wannan lardin suka taka da kuma irin gagarumin yunkuri da kumajin da suka nuna ba.

translation.en: And these characteristics are exactly what we have always needed and what will always need.
translation.ha: Hakan kuwa shi ne dai wannan abin da a ko da yaushe muke da bukatarsa.

translation.en: Different countries and societies are often harmed because they fail to identify the opportunities. When the enemies lie in ambush and we fail to notice this or fail to take action to deal with the situation at the right time, we get harmed.
translation.ha: A mafi yawan lokuta kasashe da kuma al'umma suna shan kashi ne sakamakon rashin fahimtar irin matsayin da suke da shi da kuma damar da suke da ita. A lokacin da wani makiyi ya dana tarko, sannan kuma ba mu san cewa ya dana wannan tarkon ba ko kuma mun fahimci hakan amma ba mu dau matakan da suka dace cikin sauri da gaggawa ba; to a nan ne za mu sha kashi.

translation.en: The dear brother who spoke in this meeting made a good point.
translation.ha: Wannan dan'uwa mai girma ya fadi wata jumla a wannan wajen.

translation.en: He said that Iranian families believed that if they failed to send their youth to the battlefield, they would have to fight against the enemies in the streets.
translation.ha: Ya ce iyalai suna fadin cewa idan da a ce ba mu turo wannan mayaki waje ba, to kuwa gobe makiya za su zo har bakin gidajen mu, a saboda haka wajibi ne mu yi yaki.

translation.en: This is a very important point: it is the same point that has also been mentioned by the Commander of the Faithful (a.s.): any community of people who fail to take action while the enemy is coming and are forced to push the enemy out of their homes, will be defeated.
translation.ha: Lalle wannan wani lamari ne mai muhimmancin gaske; wannan shi ne dai wannan abin da Amirul Muminin (amincin Allah ya tabbata a gare shi) ya ke fadi: duk wata al'ummar da makiya suka kawo mata hari cikin gidanta, sun gafala da cewa makiyan suna kan hanyar zuwa, to kuwa za su sha kashi, za a yi nasara a kansu.

translation.en: It is necessary to identify enemy attacks from a distance.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne a hango makiya tun daga nesa, wajibi ne a fahimce su tun daga nesa.

translation.en: In Tehran, there were constant reports that the enemy forces were being deployed in Kermanshah and Ilam and those activities were mostly in Kermanshah.
translation.ha: Haka labari ya dinga zuwa Tehran cewa makiya suna nan suna ta nuna karfi na soji a Kermanshah da yankin Ilam - wato a wadannan yankuna ne aka fi yin hakan -.

translation.en: Our politicians used to dismiss those reports, saying that there were no such military activities in the country.
translation.ha: Jami'an da alhakin kula da wadannan yankunan da ake magana kan su suna ta inkarin haka, suna fadin ina, babu wani labari makamancin hakan.

translation.en: This continued until the enemy dropped bombs on Tehran.
translation.ha: Har sai lokacin da suka yi ruwan bama-bamai a birnin Tehran.

translation.en: In fact, the war did not break out on Shahrivar 31, 1359: that was the time when Tehran was bombarded and the war had already started.
translation.ha: A hakikanin gaskiya ba a ranar 31 ga watan Shahribar 1359 (22/9/1980) - wato da aka yi ruwan bama-bamai a Tehran - ne aka fara wannan yakin ba, tun kafin nan aka fara yakin.

translation.en: If the officials who were in charge of the affairs of our country at that time - the same people who proved later on that they were not competent enough to run the country - had identified the threat and prepared the country for the war, those things would not have happened to Khorramshahr, Qasr-e Shirin and certain other border cities.
translation.ha: Idan da jami'an da suke lura da al'amurra a wancan lokacin - wato wadannan mutanen da daga baya suka tabbatar da cewa ba su dace da gudanar da kasar nan - sun fahimta, sun ayyana sannan kuma sun karfafa irin shirin da suke da shi, to da garin Khoramshahr bai fuskanci abin da ya fuskanta ba haka nan Kasr Shirin da kuma sauran yankunan da suke kan iyaka.

translation.en: That initial lack of vigilance caused such a tragic atmosphere in this region and the Khuzestan region. I witnessed some of the events up close and they were so tragic that I cannot erase them from my memory.
translation.ha: Irin wannan gafala ta farko da aka yi ce ta haifar da irin mummunan yanayin da ya faru a wannan yankin da kuma yankin Khuzistan cikin dan karamin lokaci wanda ni da idona na gani kuma ba zan taba mantawa da hakan ba.

translation.en: When the people are in charge, when the people are given the opportunity to enter the arena with their capacities, such lack of vigilance would not happen.
translation.ha: A lokacin da ayyuka suka kasance a hannun mutane, haka nan kuma a lokacin da mutane suka kasance a fage, to kuwa ba za a sami irin wannan gafalar ba.

translation.en: But they would not allow this at that time.
translation.ha: Hakan shi ne abin da ya hana faruwar hakan a wancan lokacin.

translation.en: In these areas, groups of people would come together here and there and they would start defending the country after going through a lot of trouble to gather weapons.
translation.ha: A wadancan yankuna, nan da can kungiyoyi na mutane sun taru, cikin wahala suka sama wa kansu makamai da kuma hanyar kare kai.

translation.en: This is a lesson for us.
translation.ha: Lalle hakan darasi ne a wajen mu.

translation.en: As I pointed out yesterday, a government like the Islamic Republic - with such ideals, with such goals, with such great claims - which is opposed to oppression, arrogance and the arrogant greed of the international powers, would naturally face different kinds of challenges. Therefore, it is necessary to be prepared.
translation.ha: A jiya na fadi cewa tsarin Jamhuriyar Musulunci, da irin wadannan koyarwa da yake da su, da irin wadannan manufofi da irin wadannan ra'ayi da yake da su - na cewa azzalumai, ma'abota girman kai da masu son wuce gona da iri na kasa da kasa su ne makiya - da kuma irin kalubalen da ya ke fuskanta ta hanyoyi da kuma ta salo daban-daban, a saboda haka wajibi ne a zamanto cikin shiri.

translation.en: This preparedness depends on religious faith of the people more than anything else.
translation.ha: Shi kuwa wannan zama cikin shirin, sama da komai ya dogara ne da imanin mutane.

translation.en: Awareness of the people is a great protective wall that helps a nation defend its identity and dignity and protects it against the machinations of Satan.
translation.ha: Fahimta da sanin ya kamatan da mutane suke da shi, su ne babbar kariya ga matsayin wata al'umma da daukakarta da kuma 'yantar da wata al'umma daga kaidin makiya.

translation.en: We experienced this during the war.
translation.ha: Lalle mun ga hakan a lokacin yaki.

translation.en: Today the same thing will happen in every sector and in every field of endeavor where there are vigilant officials who are prepared to give the people a role to play.
translation.ha: A yanzu ma dai a kowane bangare, a duk inda aka sami fahimta da sanin ya kamata cikin ayyukan jami'ai sannan kuma aka ba wa mutane damar taka rawarsu, to kuwa wannan shi ne abin da zai faru.

translation.en: Our government is an Islamic republic: it is a democracy, an Islamic democracy.
translation.ha: Jamhuriyar Musulunci ce, tsari ne na demoradiyya na Musulunci.

translation.en: Our martyrs and disabled war veterans as well as their families passed the most difficult test on this path.
translation.ha: Lalle shahidai, sojojin da suka sami raunuka, fursunonin yakin da aka sako su da kuma iyalansu sun ba da gagarumar jarrabawa a wannan tafarkin.

translation.en: The great patience, which was shown by the families of our martyrs, is very valuable.
translation.ha: Irin wannan gagarumin hakuri da iyalan shahidai suka nuna, lamari ne mai kimar gaske.

translation.en: If the families of our martyrs and soldiers had not shown patience and understanding and if they had displayed a lack of insight, the atmosphere of self-sacrifice would not have lasted.
translation.ha: Idan da a ce wadannan iyalai sun nuna rashin hakuri, to da kuwa fagen jihadi ya yi sanyi da kuma ba a ci gaba da ganin wannan ruhi da kuma zuciya ta sadaukarwa ba.

translation.en: The families of our martyrs and soldiers showed patience.
translation.ha: Tabbas iyalai sun nuna hakuri.

translation.en: Many years have passed since the Sacred Defense Era, but the door of martyrdom is not yet closed. We still see certain families whose dear ones are martyred for different reasons.
translation.ha: Shekara da shekaru kenan da kare wannan kallafaffen yaki, to amma ba a rufe kofar shahada ba; har ya zuwa yanzu muna iya ganin yadda iyalai suke daukar wahalhalun mutanen da aka bude musu kofofin shahadar, suna tafiya da shigarta.

translation.en: If a nation enjoys such insight and such patience, it will definitely reach the peaks.
translation.ha: Idan har aka sami irin wannan basirar da kuma irin wannan hakurin cikin al'umma, to ko shakka babu wannan al'umma za ta kai ga kololuwar da take son kai wa gare ta.

translation.en: We never wavered in identifying our goals and determining the path to reach them. We never wavered in our faith in the path we had chosen and we are thankful to Allah the Exalted for this.
translation.ha: Babu wani lokacin da muka fuskanci matsalar shakku cikin ayyana manufofinmu da kuma hanyar isa gare su; ba mu yi shakkun hanyar da muke bi ba; lalle muna gode wa Allah.

translation.en: Allah the Exalted never let our hearts lose the light of hope and we saw with our own eyes that our hope was not false hope.
translation.ha: Allah Madaukakin Sarki bai taba cire hasken fata daga zukatanmu ba. A hakikanin gaskiya mun ga cewa wadannan fatan, ba wai fata ne da ake zato ba, fata ne da suka dace.

translation.en: There was a day when it appeared to certain individuals that there was no hope for us, but there were insightful people - and our magnanimous Imam (r.a.) was the distinguished person among them - who would give us hope.
translation.ha: A wani lokaci a baya an sami lokacin da idan har mutum ya kalli fage, a zahiri babu wani abin da ke sanya fata da zai gani; to amma haka al'ummar mu masu hakuri - wanda marigayi Imam Khumaini shi ne a kan gaba - suka ci gaba da sanya mana fata a cikin zukatanmu da kuma karfafa mana gwuiwa.

translation.en: Sometimes we would listen to them obediently, but we were not able to analyze the situation properly.
translation.ha: A wani loakci mu kan saurari hakan ne kawai don biyayya, to amma dai ba za mu iya yin sharhi da bayaninsa ba.

translation.en: And today when we take a look at our 32-year experience after the Revolution, we constantly see the achievements that the Islamic Republic has accomplished.
translation.ha: Haka nan a yau a lokacin da muka kalli irin kwarewar da muka samu cikin wadannan shekaru talatin da biyu na nasarar juyin juya halin Musulunci, to kuwa daya bayan daya za mu ga irin nasarorin da tsarin Jamhuriyar Musulunci ya samu.

translation.en: In my meetings with the honorable families of our martyrs and war veterans, after expressing my appreciation and respect, I primarily try to tell our dear people that the spirit of self-sacrifice can save a country.
translation.ha: A dukkanin ganawar da na ke yi da iyalan shahidai da wadanda aka raunana masu girma, babban abin da na ke ba shi muhimmanci a matakin farko, baya ga girmamawa da jinjinawa da kuma nuna godiya ga iyalai masu girma, shi ne cewa mutanen mu masu girma su lura da cewa ruhin sadaukarwa wani lamari ne mai 'yantar da wata kasa da kuma wata al'umma.

translation.en: The spirit of self-sacrifice and identifying the right time to fulfill one's duty can deliver a nation.
translation.ha: Ruhin yafuwa, wannan ruhi na sadaukarwa, haka nan a lokacin da aka fahimci irin nauyin da ke wuya, sannan kuma aka aiwatar da aiki a lokacin da ya dace, hakan lamari ne mai 'yantarwa.

translation.en: Fortunately today we can see the signs of progress and success in our country. We can see that we are moving forward. Of course, we need to make efforts.
translation.ha: Abin farin cikin shi ne cewa a yau muna iya ganin alamar ci gaba da kuma samun dacewa a kasar mu; muna ganin cewa lalle muna ci gaba; ko da yake tabbas akwai bukatar kokari da kuma aiki.

translation.en: Our people are far more vigilant than they used to be in the past.
translation.ha: Haka nan kuma irin sanin ya kamatan da mutanen mu suka nuna ya fi na shekarun baya.

translation.en: Thankfully there are many people in our society who are faithful, pious and committed to the ideals, which is the case with the honorable people of this province as well.
translation.ha: Alhamdu lillahi, mutane muminai masu riko da Musulunci da koyarwar juyi suna da yawa cikin al'ummar mu; a wannan lardin ma haka lamarin ya ke.

translation.en: As I said yesterday, all I have seen in this province is heroic characteristics among both men and women.
translation.ha: A wannan lardin, abin da muka gani da kuma abin da muka ji abubuwa ne masu dadi wadanda suke nuni da jaruntaka - kamar yadda na fadi jiya - tsarkin zuciya da taimako.

translation.en: It was mentioned in the meeting that a lady - a faithful and brave woman - had captured an enemy soldier during the war.
translation.ha: An yi ishara da cewa makiya sun kama wata mace a garin Gilan ta yamma a matsayin fursunan yaki; wata mace mai imani kuma jaruma.

translation.en: There are so many manifestations of bravery in this province that one cannot mention all of them.
translation.ha: Akwai irin wadannan alamu na jaruntaka a wannan lardin da yawa da mutum ba zai iya kirgawa ba.

translation.en: Since the first day, the people of this region made sacrifices together with our military forces. We had brave and competent commanders from this province, Air Force commanders who would offer facilities and tactical support to Shahid Shiroudi and others in order to carry out those amazing operations, both in Army 81 and elsewhere.
translation.ha: Akwai jami'an soji jarumai a wannan wajen; a kurkusa mun ga kwamandan dakarun sama da irin su shahid Shirudi da sauransu suka amfana da irin kwarewarsa wajen aiwatar da irin kwarewa ta kai hari da jiragen yaki mai ban mamaki, shin a bataliya ta 81 ne ko kuma a bangarori daban-daban wadanda wasu daga cikin su ma an ambace su a wannan wajen.

translation.en: They used to work so sincerely and so selflessly that they had filled the atmosphere of this region with the signs of sincerity, self-sacrifice, heroism and selflessness. And this is among the things that your province should feel proud of: it will remain for you.
translation.ha: Sun kasance masu gudanar da ayyukansu cikin tsarkin zuciya da kuma sadaukarwa ta yadda suka cika wannan yankin da irin wadannan alamu na tsarkin zuciya da sadaukarwa. Wadannan wasu ne daga cikin abubuwan alfahari na wannan lardi na ku, kuma zai ci gaba da zama tare da ku.

translation.en: You were at the vanguard of the Sacred Defense.
translation.ha: Ku din nan kun kasance a sahun gaba-gaba na kallafaffen yaki.

translation.en: I hope our government officials will manage to do what is necessary in this province.
translation.ha: Abubuwan alfahari na lokacin kallafaffen yaki suna da alaka ne da wannan lardin.

translation.en: There are many things that have to be done in this province. Kermanshah province has a lot of potential.
translation.ha: Ina fatan insha Allahu jami'ai za su gudanar da ayyukan da ya wajaba a aiwatar da su a wannan yankin, wanda lalle wajibi ne a gudanar da ayyuka masu yawa a wannan lardin.

translation.en: There are also certain shortcomings and these shortcomings should be followed up and eliminated through the efforts of our government officials. Greetings be upon you and Allah's mercy and blessings
translation.ha: Lardi ne da ke da fagen aiki da yawa sannan kuma akwai abubuwan da ya rasa; wajibi ne a magance wadannan abubuwan da aka rasa din insha Allahu, ta hanyar kokari da bin diddigi na jami'ai.

translation.en: The following is the full text of the speech delivered on October 26, 2009 by Ayatollah Khamenei the Leader of the Islamic Revolution in a meeting with the officials in charge of hajj affairs.
translation.ha: Jawabin Jagora Yayin Ganawa Da Jami'an Hajjin Bana (1430)

translation.en: In the Name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful
translation.ha: Da Sunan Allah Mai Rahama Mai Jin Kai

translation.en: The hajj should be viewed as a blessing and a great divine opportunity.
translation.ha: Kallon da za a yi wa aikin hajji wajibi ne ya zamanto kallo ne ga wata ni'ima da kuma wata babbar dama ta Ubangiji.

translation.en: This is true of all kinds of worshiping. Daily prayers are also an opportunity and a blessing.
translation.ha: Dukkanin ibadu ma haka suka kasance; salla ma wata dama ce, wata ni'ima ce.

translation.en: If daily prayers had not been declared as obligatory, we might have sunk into the sea of pure unawareness.
translation.ha: Idan da a ce ba a wajabta mana salla ba, tsoron da ake da shi shi ne cewa akwai yiyuwa mu fada kogin gafala.

translation.en: Praying is a great blessing that provides us with the opportunity to talk to God and humbly prostrate before him several times a day. The same is true of the hajj.
translation.ha: Wannan wata babbar ni'ima ce da a kowace rana za mu kama hanyar ganawa da Allah Madaukakin Sarki a lokuta daban-daban, tattaunawa da Allah Madaukakin Sarki, tawali'u da kankan da kai a gaban Allah Madaukakin Sarki, lalle wannan ni'ima ce mai girman gaske; wannan wata dama ce mai girman gaske; to shi ma aikin hajji haka yake.

translation.en: Being international is the advantage of the hajj over other Islamic obligations.
translation.ha: Irin fifikon da aikin hajji ya ke da shi kan sauran wajibai da farillai shi ne kasantuwarsa na kasa da kasa ne.

translation.en: In spite of all their racial, linguistic, and cultural differences, all Muslims engage in solemn and humble praying during the hajj ceremonies.
translation.ha: Dukkanin musulmi gaba dayansu duk kuwa da irin bambanci na harshe da bambancin kabila da bambancin al'adu da suke da su, to amma a wannan wajen gwargwadon yadda za su iya dukkaninsu suna kankan da kai (a gaban Allah Madaukakin Sarki).

translation.en: This is an extraordinary phenomenon, but we fail to realize its greatness and importance appropriately because we are used to it.
translation.ha: Lalle wannan lamari ne mai ban mamaki da muka saba da shi sannan kuma ba ma iya fahimtar irin muhimmanci da girman da hakan yake da shi.

translation.en: During the hajj, all Muslims assemble in one place, focus their attention on the same thing, and prostrate before the same center. That is how we should view the hajj. We should view it as an opportunity.
translation.ha: Dukkanin musulmi su taru waje guda, su fuskanci wata cibiya guda, wani waje guda, suna masu kankan da kai a gaban wannan waje; to da irin wannan kallo ne ya kamata mu kalli hajji; a matsayin wata dama.

translation.en: If we consider the hajj as an opportunity, then we will have a better view of our obligations and will pay more attention to them.
translation.ha: Idan muka kalli hakan da kallo na wata dama, to a irin wannan yanayin ne idanuwanmu za su budu, sannan kuma za mu ba wa nauyin da ke kanmu muhimmancin (da ya dace).

translation.en: This is the first opportunity.
translation.ha: Wannan shi ne batu na farko.

translation.en: Every minute and every hour of the hajj is an extremely valuable opportunity, and we should not spend them on the petty everyday activities and untimely entertainment that we engage in at our own marketplaces and in different other places. In Mecca and Medina, we should think of increasing our faith, our spiritual qualities, and our humility before God.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne mu kasance cikin tunanin taro guzuri (guzuri na imani da tsoron Allah) a Makka da Madina, tunanin hanyoyin da za mu kara irin jari na imani da muke da shi, da irin ababe masu kyautata ruhi da ambatonmu da kuma kankan da kanmu a gaban Allah Madaukakin Sarki.

translation.en: This is the first step we should take.
translation.ha: Wannan shi ne mataki na farko.

translation.en: The opportunity to establish a relationship with the world of Islam is another manifestation of this great opportunity.
translation.ha: Wani lamari kuma na daban da za a iya amfanuwa da shi cikin wannan gagarumar dama, shi ne damar haduwa da sauran al'ummar musulmi.

translation.en: It is ordinary citizens who make up the world, not politicians, not bullying commanders, and not the arrogant powers of the world.
translation.ha: Duniya dai mutane ne, ba wai 'yan siyasa ba, ba wai kwamandoji masu son amfani da karfi ba, ba kuma ma'abota girman kai na duniya ba ne.

translation.en: Sometimes you hear the arrogant powers attribute the output of their corrupt minds to the global community. They say the global community wants this or that!
translation.ha: A wasu lokuta ku kan ji cewa wadannan ma'abota girman kai na duniya suna jingina mummunan abubuwan da suke cikin tunaninsu ga duniya; suna cewa wannan shi ne abin da al'ummar duniya take so!

translation.en: The same is true of the Islamic Ummah.
translation.ha: Haka lamarin yake dangane da al'ummar musulmi.

translation.en: The Islamic Ummah is not the individuals who have used various means to dominate a portion of the world of Islam.
translation.ha: Al'ummar musulmi ba su ne Zaidu da Amru da ta kowace hanya suke son samun iko a kan wannan gagarumar al'umma ba da kuma mulkansu ba.

translation.en: It is the willpower of these ordinary members that can cause great changes.
translation.ha: Al'umma, ita ce dai wannan gungun na al'umma.

translation.en: It is the movement of these ordinary citizens that can promote Islamic values in the world.
translation.ha: Albarkoki da alherori suna cikin wannan gungun ne mai girma sannan kuma iradarsu ce za ta iya motsa dutse daga inda yake zuwa wani waje na daban; haka nan kuma yunkurinsu ne zai iya tabbatar da kima da daukaka ta Musulunci a duk fadin duniya.

translation.en: Each year during the hajj, hajj pilgrims encounter a large number of these ordinary members of the Islamic Ummah as well as the glory of the world of Islam.
translation.ha: To hakan yana hannunku ne. A lokacin aikin hajjin kowace shekara, mahajjaci zai hadu da wadannan gungun al'umma mai yawan gaske na al'ummar musulmi daga kasashen musulmi.

translation.en: This is an opportunity, and it should be appreciated.
translation.ha: Wannan wata dama ce da wajibi ne a yi amfani da ita.

translation.en: How should we appreciate this opportunity?
translation.ha: Ta ya ya ne za a iya amfanuwa da wannan damar?

translation.en: There are various ways to do that.
translation.ha: To, akwai hanyoyi daban-daban wajen cimma hakan.

translation.en: For example, through their behavior and actions, the Iranian Muslims - who live under the flag of Islam and the Islamic Republic - should introduce the kind of Islam promoted by the Islamic Republic. They should show how Islamic education has affected them.
translation.ha: Daya daga cikin mafi saukin hanyar da kowa zai iya binta, ita ce cewa Ba'iraniye musulmi wanda yake rayuwa karkashin inuwar jamhuriyar Musulunci, ta hanyar dabi'unsa, yunkurinsa, halayensa zai iya gabatar da kuma bayyanar da Musuluncin Jamhuriyar Musulunci; zai iya bayyanar da kansa, sannan kuma ya nuna irin tasirin tarbiyya ta Musulunci da ya samu.

translation.en: This is one of the easiest ways to appreciate this opportunity.
translation.ha: Wannan daya ne daga cikin hanyoyi mafi sauki na hakan.

translation.en: In Masjid al-Haram, in Masjid al-Nabawi, in Baqi', and at the shrines of the martyrs of the Battle of Uhud as well as in Mena and Arafat, hajj pilgrims should show their Islamic education through their behavior. They should show their Quranic education. They should show that they are humble and kind, and that they are not the kind of people to insult other people.
translation.ha: Alhajin da ya kasance a Masjid al-Haram (masallacin Ka'aba) ko masallacin Annabi, ko kuma makabartar Baki'a ko kuma a wajen ziyarar shahidan Uhudu da makamantan hakan - a Mina, a Arafa - sannan kuma halaye da dabi'unsa suka zamanto cikin tsari da tarbiyya ta Musulunci; halaye da dabi'unsa suka zamanto sun yi daidai da tarbiyya irin ta Alkur'ani; ya zamanto ma'abocin kankan da kai, mai tawali'u, ya zamanto ma'abocin kauna, bai zamanto mai cin mutumcin wannan da wancan ba, ya kasance na kowa da kowa, ba ma'abocin son rarraba kan al'umma ba.

translation.en: Obviously, Imam Sadiq would not have compared the prayers led by an ordinary prayer leader with the prayers led by the Prophet (s.w.a.).
translation.ha: A fili yake cewa Imam Sadik (a.s) ba zai kwatanta sallar wancan limamin da sallar Annabi (s.a.w.a) ba.

translation.en: It highlights the importance of unity.
translation.ha: A aikace ku nuna alamu na hadin kai.

translation.en: You should show unity in practice. For the same reason, our magnanimous Imam (r.a.) advised all of us and all Iranian hajj pilgrims to participate in the congregational prayers held in Masjid al-Haram and Masjid al-Nabawi.
translation.ha: Bisa wannan tunanin ne ya sanya Imaminmu mai girma (yardar Allah ta tabbata a gare shi) - wannan mutum masanin ya kamata - ya kasance yana wa dukkaninmu da kuma dukkanin alhazan Iran wasicci da yin sallar jam'i a Masjid al-Haram da masallacin Annabi; ku kasance a irin wadannan wajajen taro, wanda daya daga cikin misdakin hakan shi ne halartar irin wadannan salloli na jam'i.

translation.en: When other people are saying their prayers in congregational prayers, Iranian pilgrims should not be carrying their luggage to their hotel rooms.
translation.ha: Bai kamata lamarin ya zamanto cewa a lokacin da kowa da kowa ya shagaltu da sallar jam'i, sai a ga wani alhaji ba Iraniye ya shagaltu da daukan kaya ba - taro guzuri - zuwa ga masaukinsa ba.

translation.en: Such things are harmful.
translation.ha: Wadannan su ne abubuwa masu cutarwa.

translation.en: Behavior that shows one's Islamic education is one of the most important things [during the hajj].
translation.ha: Dabi'u na kwarai da suka dace da koyarwa ta Musulunci, daya ne daga cikin irin wadannan lamurra masu girma.

translation.en: Even if you do not know Arabic and do not speak to other pilgrims, the mere fact that you behave politely, observe the standards of hygiene, and engage in dhikr and dua as an Iranian pilgrim is like a great effort to promote Islam, which is more important than many kinds of publicity efforts. This great congregation of believers engage in solemn praying, repentance, and weeping.
translation.ha: Ko da ma a ce ba ka iya yare (harshen larabci) ba, ba ka ma buga waya ba, shi kansa a fahimci cewa kai din nan alhaji ne daga Iran sannan kuma kana da irin wadannan halaye; kana da kyawawan dabi'u, kana cikin tsafta, ma'abocin addu'a kake, ma'abocin zikiri ka ke - ita kanta wadannan tarurruka na Du'a Kumail wanda alhamdu lillahi a kowace shekara ake gudanarwa - shi kansa hakan babban isar da sako ne.

translation.en: This is itself a kind of publicity for Islam.
translation.ha: Hakan ya fi da dama daga cikin hanyoyin isar da sakon da ake bi muhimmanci.

translation.en: Participating in the ceremonies to express your hatred towards polytheism is itself great publicity for Islam, which shows that you have accepted the hajj in its totality.
translation.ha: Ita kanta wannan halartar, isar da sako ne. Hakan lamari ne da ke nuni da cewa kun amince da aikin hajji da dukkanin bangarorinsa.

translation.en: The hajj is the manifestation of monotheism.
translation.ha: Aikin hajji alama ce da take nuni da tauhidi; wato tabbatar da wilayar Allah da kuma kore wilayar wanin Allah.

translation.en: Regarding the hajj, there is another point that I would like to discuss: The great caravan of the Iranian pilgrims - which is a source of honor for the Islamic Republic - should try to address the current needs of the Islamic Ummah.
translation.ha: Wani batu kuma dangane da lamarin aikin hajji shi ne cewa tawagar mahajjatan Iran - wanda cikin godiyar Allah ababen alfahari ne na Jamhuriyar Musulunci - su yi kokarin gudanar da ayyukan da suka dace da zamani da kuma bukatar al'ummar musulmi.

translation.en: We should identify the needs of the Islamic Ummah each year.
translation.ha: A kowace shekara a duba a gani me a ke bukata.

translation.en: Islamic unity has been one of the important needs of the Islamic Ummah throughout the past few years. One can feel that unity among different Islamic denominations is one of the current needs.
translation.ha: A halin yanzu dai mutum ya kan ji cewa, cikin ‘yan shekarun da suka gabata din nan ciki kuwa har da wannan shekarar, alal akalla dai daya daga cikin bukatu masu muhimmanci, shi ne dai wannan batu na hadin kai na Musulunci; hadin kai tsakanin kungiyoyi da mazhabobi na Musulunci.

translation.en: You should consider what the enemies of the world of Islam are doing in order to create a split in the Islamic Ummah.
translation.ha: Ku duba ku ga me makiya Musulunci suke aikatawa; makiya al'ummar musulmi me suke aikatawa wajen rarraba kan musulmi da haifar da sabani a tsakaninsu, wani irin karfi da aiki ne suke yi wajen ganin sun hada su fada da junansu.

translation.en: You should consider how much money they are spending in order to line up different groups of Muslims against one another.
translation.ha: Daya daga cikin manufar da ko shakka babu cikinta cikin irin hare-hare da zubar da jini na baya-bayan nan wanda misalinsa shi ne abin da kuka ji ya faru jiya a kasar Iraki (wato harin da aka kai birnin Bagadaza da ya yi sanadiyyar mutuwar sama da mutane 140) da kuma sauran misalai masu yawa, a Pakistan da kuma sauran yankuna na daban, ita ce a dinga zubar da jinin wani adadi na musulmi, a kawar da su, ko kuma a raunana su da yanke musu gababu.

translation.en: For many consecutive centuries, Shia and Sunni Muslims have lived together peacefully in Iraq.
translation.ha: A kasar Iraki, tsawon karnoni masu yawa ‘yan Shi'a suke rayuwa a kasar, sannan kuma suna rayuwa tare da ‘yan Sunna a wajen.

translation.en: They had the same beliefs in the past as they do today, but such events were unprecedented in the past centuries.
translation.ha: Wadannan littafa da irin wadannan akidu da ake da su a yau, a wadancan lokutan ma akwai su, watakila ma sun fi na yau din tsauri da tsanani.

translation.en: The same is true of the bloody events that have occasionally taken place in our country as well as the events that happen in Pakistan.
translation.ha: To amma irin wadannan abubuwa da suke faruwa, tsawon wadancan karnoni, ba su taba faruwa ba; wato irin wadannan hare-hare da ake kai wa juna, irin wadannan kashe-kashe da ake yi.

translation.en: Who are the people who insult what Shia and Iranian pilgrims hold sacred?
translation.ha: Su wane ne masu kai irin wadannan hare-hare?

translation.en: Sometimes they even harass the female family members of the pilgrims. Who are these people?
translation.ha: Wadannan mutane (masu aikata irin wannan danyen aiki) ba ‘yan Shi'a ne ba kuma ‘yan Sunna ba ne.

translation.en: Everybody should be vigilant in this regard. The Saudi government is responsible for safeguarding the pilgrims of the House of God and the shrines of the infallible Imams (a.s.) and the Prophet (s.w.a.).
translation.ha: Gwamnatoci suna da nauyi a wuyansu; gwamnatin kasar Saudiyya tana da nauyi a wuyanta; bai kamata su bari masu ziyarar dakin Allah, alhazan dakin Allah mai tsarki, masu ziyarar hubbaren Annabi da Imamai masu tsarki (amincin Allah ya tabbata a gare su) su zamanto ana ci musu mutumci ba.

translation.en: When a person insults or hurts a Shia pilgrim or clergyman, it is not appropriate for Saudi officers to stand by and watch or help the attacker. These things work against unity.
translation.ha: A samu wani mutum ya zo ya aikata wani abu na cutarwa ga wani alhaji ko kuma a kan wani malamin Shi'a ko kuma a kan wannan da wancan, sannan kuma wannan jami'in tsaro na kasar Saudiyya ya zuba ido kawai yana kallo ko kuma a wasu lokuta ma ya goyi bayan wancan mai neman tsokanan.

translation.en: The pilgrims of the Ka'bah cannot afford to be unaware of the developments of the Muslim world.
translation.ha: Babu yadda za su iya wofantar da mahajjata dakin Allah mai tsarki daga abubuwan da suke faruwa a duniyar musulmi.

translation.en: Today Iraq, Afghanistan, Palestine, and some parts of Pakistan are under the pressure of foreign soldiers - they are under the pressure of the measures taken by the arrogant powers.
translation.ha: A halin yanzu kasar Iraki, kasar Afghanistan, kasar Palastinu da ake zalunta, wani bangare na kasar Pakistan suna cikin matsin lambar sojojin kasashen waje, suna cikin matsin lambar ma'abota girman kai.

translation.en: These are the things that we should pay attention to during the hajj.
translation.ha: Wadannan abubuwa ne da ya kamata a lura da su a lokacin aikin hajji.

translation.en: The hajj should be the manifestation of the willpower and strong determination of the Islamic Ummah against the measures that are aimed at undermining Islamic unity or thwarting the progress of the Islamic Ummah - the measures that are aimed at undermining the flag of Islam, which is thankfully being carried by the Islamic Republic today. We should be alert.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne aikin hajji ya zamanto wata alama ta bayyanar da irin irada da tsayayyiyar azama da al'ummar musulmi suke da ita wajen fuskantar irin wadannan ayyuka wadanda suke cutar da hadin kai tsakanin musulmi, ko kuma suke cutar da irin ci gaban kasashen musulmi, ko kuma suke son su cutar da tutar Musulunci da aka daga ta a tsakanin musulmi wanda a yau alhamdu lillahi Jamhuriyar Musulunci ta Iran ita ce ta daga wannan tutar sama sosai.

translation.en: These are our duties. Our management of the caravans, our publicity, and other such affairs should be based on these needs. Our cultural and political planning and our choices should be based on these needs.
translation.ha: Wadannan wasu nauyi ne da suke wuyan mutum; wadannan abubuwa ne da wajibi ne mu lura da su a lokacin da muke shirya tsare-tsarenmu wajen shirya tawagar alhazai da kuma wajen isar da sakonni da makamantan hakan. Wajibi ne dukkanin tsare-tsarenmu na ala'du, na siyasa, na gudanar da tawagar alhazanmu da kuma dukkanin alhazanmu su zamanto suna bin wadannan bukatu ne, sannan kuma wadannan bukatun su zamanto su ne a kan gaba.

translation.en: I would like to express my gratitude to all the esteemed officials in charge of the hajj and all those who have made efforts during the past years to carry out this great duty. I would like to thank Mr. Reyshahri, Mr. Khaksar, and other government officials as well as the esteemed ministers of Culture and Islamic Guidance. I also thank the heads of the caravans, the esteemed clergymen who accompany the caravans, and all the dear officials who have attended this meeting.
translation.ha: Alal hakika ni dai ina godewa dukkanin jami'ai da ma'aikatan da suke gudanar da ayyukan hajji da kuma dukkanin wadanda cikin wadannan shekaru suka wahala wajen gudanar da wannan aiki mai girma da muhimmanci; haka nan kuma ina mika godiya ta ga mai girma Malam Ri Shahri (wakilin Jagora kan ayyukan hajji, kuma Amirul Hajjin Iran), Malam Khaksar (shugaban hukumar alhazai ta kasar Iran) da sauran jami'an gwammati da ministocin ma'aikatar shiryarwa wadanda suka ba da ta su gudummawar cikin wadannan shekaru da kuma sauran bangarori; da wadannan shugabannin tawagogin alhazai, da kuma malamai masu girma da kuma dukkaninku.

translation.en: Your goal is a great goal, and your responsibility is extremely heavy.
translation.ha: Aiki ne mai girma, manufa ce mai girman gaske, sannan kuma nauyi ne mai tsananin girma.

translation.en: I hope Allah the Exalted will bestow success on all of you.
translation.ha: Ina rokon Allah Madaukakin Sarki da Ya ba wa dukkaninku dacewa sannan kuma addu'oin mai girma Bakiyatullah (rayukanmu su zamanto fansa a gare shi) su kasance tare da dukkaninku.

translation.en: Imam Khamenei’s Hajj Message - 2016
translation.ha: Sakon Jagora Imam Khamenei Ga Maniyyata Hajjin Bana (1437-2016)

translation.en: In the Name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful
translation.ha: Da Sunan Allah Mai Rahama Mai Jin Kai

translation.en: And all praise belongs to Allah, the Lord of the Worlds, and Allah’s greetings be upon our Master, Muhammad, and upon his immaculate household and chosen companions and upon those who follow them rightfully until the Day of Judgment.
translation.ha: Dukkan godiya ta tabbata ga Allah Ubangijin talikai. Tsira da amincinsa su tabbata ga shugabanmu Muhammad tare da Alayensa tsarkaka da zababbun sahabbansa, da mabiyansu cikin kyautatawa har zuwa ranar Kiyama.

translation.en: Muslim brothers and sisters across the world!
translation.ha: Ya 'yan'uwa musulmi maza da mata a duk fadin duniya.

translation.en: For Muslims, the season of hajj is the season of pride and glory in the eyes of God’s servants, the season of enlightening hearts, the season of humility before the Creator and of solemn prayer.
translation.ha: Aikin Hajji a wajen musulmi wani lokaci ne abin alfahari da daukaka a idanuwan halittun Allah, haka nan wani lokaci ne mai haskaka zukata da kuma kankantar da kai a gaban Allah Madaukakin Sarki.

translation.en: Hajj is a heavenly, earthly, divine and communal obligation.
translation.ha: Hajji dai wata farilla ce saukakka daga Ubangiji kana kuma ta al'umma.
