translation.en: The Leader of the Islamic Republic referred to the wrath of different groups of people following the recent insult to Imam Khomeini (r.a.) and described the reaction of the people as appropriate.
translation.ha: Yayin da yake ishara da bakin cikin da al'ummomi daban-daban suka nuna dangane da cin mutumcin marigayi Imam Khumaini (r.a) da aka yi, Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci ya bayyana hakan da kuma nuna barranta daga wannan mummunan aiki da jama'an suka yi a matsayin abin da ya dace kuma yayi daidai.

translation.en: He further stressed: "Everyone should stay calm and know that those who are opposed to the nation have no roots and will be wiped out by the grandeur of the Iranian nation and the Islamic Revolution."
translation.ha: Daga nan ya ci gaba da cewa: Wajibi ne kowa da koya ya kiyaye kame zuciyarsa, sannan kuma su san cewa mutanen da suka tsaya a gaban al'umma mutane ne marasa tushe sannan kuma ba za su iya tsayawa a gaban al'ummar Iran ba.

translation.en: Ayatollah Khamenei said that the law enforcement officials of the country will fulfill their duties when necessary and added: "Of course students have to identify the sources of corruption and introduce them to others. But everything has to be done in a peaceful atmosphere."
translation.ha: Yayin da yake jaddada cewar idan har ya zamanto wajibi jami'ai da masu kiyaye doka za su gudanar da aikinsu Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci ya ce: Tabbas daliban jami'a suna da nauyi a wuyansu, su gano mutanen da su ne tushen fasadi sannan kuma su sanar da su ga mutane, to sai dai wajibi ne a gudanar da dukkanin komai cikin nitsuwa da kwanciyar hankali.

translation.en: The Leader of the Islamic Revolution said that the enemies of the Iranian nation are like "bubbles on water" which will finally fade away. "And what will remain at the end is the Islamic Republic," he noted.
translation.ha: Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci ya ci gaba da cewa: Makiyan al'ummar Iran da tsarin Musulunci tamkar kumfa ne a kan ruwa wacce za ta gushe, abin da zai tabbata shi ne asalin tsarin Musulunci.

translation.en: He added: "On the basis of which law is the US government continuing its occupation of Iraq and increasing the number of its troops in Afghanistan every day?"
translation.ha: Ayatullah Khamene'i ya ci gaba da cewa: Bisa wace dokar ce kasar Amurka take ci gaba da mamaye kasar Iraki, sannan kuma da wace doka ne suka kara sojojinsu a Afghanistan sannan kuma a kowace rana suke zubar da jinin mutane.

translation.en: Leader Meets Khaled Meshaal - Khamenei.ir
translation.ha: Ganawar Jagora Da Khalid Mash'al Da ‘Yan Tawagarsa

translation.en: Ayatollah Khamenei the Leader of the Islamic Revolution met this afternoon with Khaled Meshaal, the political leader of Hamas, and his accompanying delegation. Speaking at the meeting, Ayatollah Khamenei said that Iran will not change its stance on the Palestinian issue. The Leader expressed his appreciation for the resistance of the Palestinian people and Palestinian resistance groups, including Hamas.
translation.ha: Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci Ayatullah Sayyid Ali Khamene'i, a wata ganawa da ya yi a yammacin yau talata (15-12-2009) da shugaban ofishin siyasa na kungiyar gwagwarmayar Musulunci ta Hamas da ‘yan tawagarsa da suka kai masa ziyarar ban girma, ya jinjinawa gwagwarmayar al'ummar Palastinu da kuma irin tsayin dakan da kungiyoyin gwagwarmayar Palastinu ciki kuwa har da Hamas suke yi.

translation.en: He further reiterated that resistance, reliance on God, and taking action are the three factors which can help Palestinians achieve victory. His Eminence said that the future is promising for the Palestinian people despite all the hardships and the crimes and atrocities which are committed against them.
translation.ha: Jagoran ya ci gaba da cewa: Hanya guda kawai ta ‘yantar da Palastinu, ita ce gwagwarmaya da tsayin daka, dogaro da Allah tare da aiki a kas. Jagoran ya bayyana makomar matsalar Palastinu da cewa makoma ce mai kyau duk kuwa da irin wahalhalu da zalunci da munanan ayyukan ta'addancin da ake yi wa Palastinawan a kasar Palastinun.

translation.en: He added: "God has promised that the ultimate victory belongs to those who believe in Him and engage in jihad on His path."
translation.ha: Jagoran ya ci gaba da cewa: Wannan dai wani alkawari ne na Ubangiji da ba zai saba shi ba na cewa nasara da taimakon Ubangiji suna tare ne da mutanen da suka yi imani da Allah sannan kuma suka ci gaba da yin jihadi a tafarkinsa.

translation.en: Ayatollah Khamenei further stated that there are two aspects to the events happening in Palestine and referred to these events as one of the greatest events of history. He further added: "One aspect of these events is the resistance of the Palestinian people in the face of the greatest pressures, and the other aspect is the betrayal of some so-called Arab Muslims towards the Palestinian people."
translation.ha: Yayin da yake ishara da irin abubuwan da suka faru a kan Palastinu a matsayin lamurra mafi girma cikin tarihin, Jagoran juyin juya halin Musuluncin ya kara da cewa: Wani bangare na wannan lamari shi ne tsayin dakan mutanen Gaza wajen fuskantar mafi tsananin matsin lamba, sannan bangare na biyu kuma shi ne ha'incin da wasu larabawa wadanda a zahiri musulmi ne suke yi wa al'ummar Palastinu.

translation.en: The Leader of the Islamic Revolution described the resistance of Hamas leaders against pressures, threats, and political games as very valuable and stated: "The Islamic Republic of Iran considers the issue of Palestine as a domestic issue and views supporting the Palestinian people as a religious and Islamic duty."
translation.ha: Jagoran juyin juya halin Musuluncin ya bayyana irin tsayin dakan da jagororin Hamas suka yi wajen fuskantar matsin lamba, barazana da wasa na siyasa a matsayin wani lamari mai girma da kimar gaske yana mai cewa: Jamhuriyar Musulunci ta Iran, tana ganin matsalar Palastinu a matsayin matsalarta ce, sannan kuma goyon bayan al'ummar Palastinu a matsayin wani nauyi na shari'a da Musulunci da ke wuyanta.

translation.en: His Eminence referred to the efforts of the enemies to lead the Islamic Republic of Iran towards adopting an indifferent stance on the issue of Palestine and added: "They have made every effort to achieve this goal, but their efforts have proven futile."
translation.ha: Yayin da ya ke ishara da kokari ba kama hannun yaro da makiya suke yi wajen sanya Iran ta yi watsi da matsalar Palastinun, Jagoran ya bayyana cewar: Makiya sun shigo ta dukkan hanyoyi sai dai kuma sun ci kasa.

translation.en: Ayatollah Khamenei said that the issue of Palestine is one of the main reasons for the enmity of the global arrogant powers towards the Islamic Republic. He further stated that such enmity would have been greatly reduced if the Islamic Republic had changed its stance on the Palestinian issue.
translation.ha: Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci ya kara jaddada cewar: Daya daga cikin manyan dalilan da ya sanya ma'abota girman kai suke adawa da kuma kiyayya da Jamhuriyar Musulunci ta Iran shi ne batun Palastinu, matukar Iran ta nuna gazawarta dangane da wannan lamari na Palastinu, to da dama daga cikin irin wadannan kiyayya za su ragu.

translation.en: But the Islamic Republic will stand firm in this regard and will never change its current position, he noted.
translation.ha: To sai dai mu kan mun tsaya kyam kuma ba za mu nuna wata gazawa ba.

translation.en: His Eminence said that finding an appropriate solution for the issue of Palestine will help solve many of the problems of the Islamic Ummah.
translation.ha: Jagoran juyin juya halin Musuluncin bayyana cewar idan har aka magance matsalar Palastinu da kyau, za a magance da dama daga cikin matsalolin da al'ummar musulmi suke fuskanta.

translation.en: He further referred to the recent threats of the Zionist regime against the Palestinian people and added: "If the Zionist regime starts another war against the people of Gaza, it will receive an even harder blow in the mouth this time.
translation.ha: Haka nan kuma yayin da yake magana kan barazanar baya-bayan nan da haramtacciyar kasar Isra'ila take yi wa al'ummar Palastinu ya bayyana cewar: Matukar dai haramtacciyar kasar Isra'ila ta kaddamar da wani sabon yaki a kan al'ummar Gaza, to a wannan karon ma (yahudawan sahyoniyan) za su fuskanci mafi girman shan kashi sama da kashin da suka sha a baya.

translation.en: In this meeting, Khaled Meshaal expressed his appreciation for the supportive stance of the Leader and the Iranian nation and government towards the Palestinian people.
translation.ha: Shi ma a nasa bangaren, Malam Khalid Mash'al, shugaban ofishin siyasa na kungiyar Hamas din, ya jinjinawa irin matsayar da Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci, gwamnati da al'ummar Iran suke dauka wajen goyon bayan al'ummar Palastinu.

translation.en: He also presented a report on the latest conditions of Gaza and the West Bank, further adding: "Resistance is a strategic decision which has been made by Hamas, the resistance forces, and the Palestinian people.
translation.ha: Khalid Mash'al ya bayyana cewar: Gwagwarmaya wata siyasa ce da kungiyar Hamas, sauran kungiyoyin gwagwarmaya da al'ummar Palastinu suka zaba, sannan kuma ko da wasa ba za su taba mika wuya ga matsin lamba na siyasa da soji na makiya ba.

translation.en: The following is the full text of the speech delivered on May 1, 2013 by Ayatollah Khamenei, the Leader of the Islamic Revolution, in a meeting with a group of panegyrists on the occasion of the birthday anniversary of Fatima Zahra (s.a.).
translation.ha: Shimfida: Abin da ke biye fassarar jawabin da Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci Ayatullah Sayyid Ali Khamenei ya yi ne a lokacin ganawarsa da mawaka da sauran masu yabon Ahlulbaiti (a.s) a ranar haihuwar Sayyida Fatima al-Zahra (a.s) a ranar 01, Mayu, 2013:

translation.en: In the Name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful
translation.ha: Da Sunan Allah Mai Rahama Mai Jin Kai

translation.en: I congratulate all of you dear people and dear brothers and sisters, who are the nightingales of the garden of the Holy Prophet's (s.w.a.) household and who eulogize the best people in the world, on the occasion of this noble Eid, this auspicious birthday anniversary and this day of happiness and joy of the hearts of all Shia Muslims throughout history.
translation.ha: Ina taya dukkaninku, Ya ku ‘yan'uwa maza da mata masu girma, masu yabon Iyalan Annabi, wadanda su ne mafiya girman bayin Allah a bayan kasa, murnar wannan ranar idi mai girma da wannan rana ta haihuwa, ranar farin ciki da faranta zukatan ‘yan Shi'a tsawon tarihi.

translation.en: I hope that Allah the Exalted will thoroughly approve of the program that was presented by you dear people including vocalists, presenters and all of you dear people.
translation.ha: Ina rokon Allah Madaukakin Sarki da Ya karbi irin wadannan tawassuli da dukkaninku ‘yan'uwa masu girma - mawaka da wadanda suka shirya wannan taron - suka yi.

translation.en: Perhaps, it is around 30 years or more that we have been holding these meetings on such a day and we can, thankfully, see the flourishing, the magnificence and the spiritual growth of concepts in these meetings.
translation.ha: Lalle ina gode wa Allah Madaukakin Sarki da ya arzurta ni da cewa kimanin shekaru talatin ko sama da haka nake samun damar halartar irin wannan taron a irin wannan rana. Alhamdu lillahi cikin wadannan shekarun mutum yana iya ganin irin ci gaba na fahimta da ruhi da ake samu.

translation.en: This year, the program that you presented was very good both in terms of content and form.
translation.ha: Batun na farko dangane da wakokin yabon iyalan gidan Annabin ne; wato wannan nauyin da kuka dauka a wuyanku.

translation.en: Today the network of the Holy Prophet's (s.w.a.) panegyrists and eulogists has, thankfully, developed in the entire country.
translation.ha: Alhamdu lillahi a yau a kasar nan an samu karuwar mawaka da masu yabon Iyalan gidan Annabi.

translation.en: Thankfully, a large number of panegyrists - who are comprised of our youth, our experienced panegyrists and our professors - with many capabilities and with enthusiastic hearts go among the people and help them get close to God and benefit from the blessings of the Holy Prophet's (s.w.a.) household.
translation.ha: Akwai adadi mai yawa na mawaka da masu yabo - na daga matasa da kuma malamai - da sannan kuma ga kwarewa da kuma zukatan da suke cike da so da kaunar Ahlulbaiti wadanda cikin yardar Allah suke tafiya cikin al'umma da taimaka musu wajen karfafa kusaci da Allah da kuma amfana da albarkokin Ahlulbaiti.

translation.en: This is an opportunity for our country, just like many other opportunities that we have.
translation.ha: Lalle wannan wata dama ce ga kasarmu; tamkar sauran irin wadannan dama masu yawa da muke da su.

translation.en: Our Muslim brothers in other countries do not have many of these opportunities.
translation.ha: ‘Yan'uwanmu musulmi da suke wasu kasashen, da damansu ba su da irin wannan damar da muke da ita.

translation.en: This is one of them. This movement and this network, through which we get close to the Holy Prophet's (s.w.a.) household and their kindness and through which we inspire feelings, are great opportunities. For any reason, other people in other areas in the world do not benefit from this great blessing, which is for all people, in such a way.
translation.ha: Daya daga cikin irin wadannan damar ita ce wannan damar. Irin wannan silsilar da tushe na tawassuli da Ahlulbaiti da nuna kaunar a gare su, lalle wata dama ce mai matukar muhimmanci. Saboda wasu dalilai, mutanen wasu yankunan, ba su da irin wannan babbar ni'ima da irin wannan abubuwa da suke cike da albarkoki na gaba daya; to amma mu muna da su.

translation.en: The prophets and divine messengers did not use philosophical language with the people although adopting a philosophical approach was and still is necessary for fully understanding their words.
translation.ha: Annabawa da manzannin Ubangiji ba suka kasance suna magana da mutane da kalmomi na falsafa ba ne; duk kuwa da cewa akwai bukatar falsafar wajen fahimtar hakikanin abubuwan da suke fadi.

translation.en: Great philosophers obtained the maximum benefit from the widely shared blessings of the divine prophets.
translation.ha: Wato manyan masanan falsafa sun amfana daga tabarmar da Annabawan Ubangiji suka baza; to amma wannan tabarmar ba wata tabarma ce ta wasu ‘yan tsirarun mutane na musamman ba ne.

translation.en: However, these blessings are not particular to specific people.
translation.ha: A saboda haka maganganunsu ba wai maganganu ne na kafa hujjoji ta hankali da fadi in fadi irin wannan ba.

translation.en: This language was a combination of reason and feelings.
translation.ha: Maganganu ne da suka kumshi tunani da hankali da kuma tausayawa.

translation.en: We naturally benefit from such a process both in mourning ceremonies, festive occasions and in meetings in which eulogies, mouloodis and duas are performed.
translation.ha: A dabi'ance muna da irin wannan yunkurin; shin a tarurruka na yabo da juyayi da farin cikin da bakin ciki ne, ko kuma a tarurruka na karanta addu'oi.

translation.en: Thankfully, these are privileges which the followers of the Holy Prophet's (s.w.a.) household benefit from.
translation.ha: Wannan yana daga cikin siffofin da mabiya Ahlulbaiti (a.s) suka kebanta da su.

translation.en: These things have combined reason with feelings in the mind of humanity throughout history.
translation.ha: Dukkanin wadannan abubuwa ne da suke hada hankali da tausayawa waje guda da kuma aiwatar da su a cikin zukata da kwakwalan mutane tsawon tarihi.

translation.en: This is the role of a panegyrist.
translation.ha: A saboda haka wannan shi ne matsayin mawaka da masu yabo.

translation.en: The role of a panegyrist and a eulogist - a profession which is thankfully popular in our country today - is that he should promote knowledge and understanding among the people through artistic methods and means of expression.
translation.ha: Matsayi da ayyukan mawaka da masu yabo - wato irin wadannan maganganu da alhamdu lillahi a yau ake ganinsu a kasar nan - shi ne cewa ta hanyar amfani da wannan fasahar za su iya yada ilmummuka da koyarwa ta addini a tsakanin al'umma.

translation.en: This is the main factor. The poetry and tone that you choose and the way you speak with the people should be orientated towards increasing people's knowledge and deepening their understanding of religion and life.
translation.ha: To wannan shi ne batu na asali. Wakokin da za ku zaba, irin zuben waken da za ku zaba da irin hanyar da za ku bayyanar da su ga mutane wajibi ne su zamanto sun yi daidai da wannan tafarkin.

translation.en: I have said many times - and this is a fact - that when you recite a ghazal or qasida which contains important points, this sometimes has a deeper effect than when a person delivers a speech for many hours in an articulate and eloquent way.
translation.ha: To wannan shi ne aikin da mawaka suke yi ta mafi kyawun hanya. A lokuta da dama na sha fadi sannan hakan kuma wata hakika ce, cewa a lokacin da kuka rera wata waka da take dauke da wata masaniya ko ilimi, mai yiyuwa tasirin hakan ya fi sa'oi na wa'azi.

translation.en: This is an opportunity.
translation.ha: A saboda haka wannan wata dama ce.

translation.en: You should use this opportunity.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne a amfana da wannan damar.

translation.en: This opportunity should not be wasted.
translation.ha: Bai kamata a bari ta kubuce ba.

translation.en: If your performance is delivered in a way that it oversteps the boundaries of sharia, then this opportunity will be wasted. If it ignores the fundamental things which the people need to know today, this opportunity will be wasted. Imagine that during the Sacred Defense Era when the country was in need of enthusiastic valor in jihad and in practical arenas, somebody attends a meeting and he recites a poem in a good way in the presence of youth and fathers and mothers, but if he does not mention the needs of the time, he has wasted the opportunity.
translation.ha: Ko kuma ya zamana ba a lura da bukatun mutane ba, shi ma yana lalata wannan damar. A matsayin misali a lokacin kallafaffen yaki, a lokacin da kasar nan take bukatar wani kumaji na jihadi a aikace sannan kuma a fage, sannan kuma ga irin shirin da matasa da iyaye maza da mata suke ciki. Shi kenan sai a sami wani mawaki ya tafi wajen irin tarurrukan da ake gudanar ya rera waka, wakar ma mai dadi, amma sai bai tabo wannan bukatar da ake da ita ba a lokacin (wato irin wannan kumajin), to ka ga wannan lalata damar da aka samu ne.

translation.en: In those days, panegyrists played a very good role.
translation.ha: A wannan lokacin mawaka sun taka gagarumar rawa.

translation.en: During the Sacred Defense Era, the things which our panegyrists did and the influence that they exerted on the hearts and souls of our soldiers were exceptional.
translation.ha: Abubuwan da mawakanmu suka aikata a wancan fagen, irin tasirin da suka yi cikin zukata da rayukan dakarunmu, lalle ba shi da tamka.

translation.en: Today when I take a look at you, I see that you paid attention to fundamental things in the poems that you recited in this meeting.
translation.ha: A yau ma a lokacin da na duba, ina iya ganin a tsakanin wakokin da aka rera, lalle an yi la'akari da bukatar da ake da ita.

translation.en: An example of this is the poem that Mr. Sazegar recited. It is the same every year.
translation.ha: Misalin hakan shi ne waken da Malam Sazgar ya rera, wanda haka lamarin ya kasance a kowace shekara.

translation.en: He slowly and artistically begins from spiritual concepts until he reaches the needs of the time.
translation.ha: A cikin wakokin nasa ya tabo irin bukatun da ake da su a yau.

translation.en: Notice that what he does is an artistic combination. The poems that he recites are also good. You use your throats which are a divine blessing.
translation.ha: Kuna amfani ne da makogwaronku, wanda hakan wata ni'ima ce ta Ubangiji. Kuna amfani da karin waka da kuma kade-kade, su ma ni'ima ce ta Ubangiji.

translation.en: You use poetry and the capability to compose poetry is a divine blessing.
translation.ha: Kuna amfani da wake, wanda shi ma wata ni'ima ce ta Ubangiji.

translation.en: These blessings are available to you. How do you use these blessings?
translation.ha: Allah ya arzurta ku da wadannan ni'imomi; to a ina ya kamata ku yi amfani da su?

translation.en: You use them in order to increase knowledge and understanding.
translation.ha: Wajen yada masaniya da ilimi.

translation.en: As a result of these conflicts, biased and obstinate people in certain areas in the world behead other people in large numbers. You should be careful about this. Considering the fact that today there is video, Internet and different other means of communication, you should take care not to recite a kind of poem which provokes some biased and dim-witted people - after they hear about your poem - into shedding the blood of a group of innocent women and children.
translation.ha: Idan har aka yi amfani da wake wajen rarraba kan al'umma da yada kabilanci wanda ya sanya a halin yanzu ake samun wasu mutane masu tsananin kabilanci suna kashe mutane a bangarori daban-daban na duniya..., lalle hakan amfani ne mai muni. A saboda haka wajibi ne ku yi taka tsantsan. Kuna iya rera wata waka a nan, to amma a halin yanzu da ake da hanyoyin isar da sakonni irin su bidiyo, internet da sauran kafafen isar da sakon cikin gaggawa, nan take wannan wakar za ta yadu, sai wasu jahilai masu tsaurin ra'ayi su tunzura, jama'a su fada wa junansu, a zubar da jini a nan da can.

translation.en: This is the reason why I insist and stress so much that you should avoid sectarian and tribal conflicts.
translation.ha: Dalilin da ya sanya na ke ta magana da jaddada wajibcin rage irin sabani na mazhaba da kabilanci, saboda wannan dalilin ne.

translation.en: Nobody should imagine that this is the way to express their gratitude for the blessed love of the Holy Prophet's (s.w.a.) household which has, thankfully, filled the hearts of our people. Nobody should imagine that this is the way to engender feelings in the heart of the people. This is wrong.
translation.ha: Kada wani ya yi zaton cewa za mu iya nuna godiyarmu ga wannan ni'imar, wato ni'imar so da kaunar Ahlulbaiti (a.s), wanda alhamdu lillahi ana iya ganin hakan cikin zukatanmu, ta hanyar motsa irin wadannan kumaji da tunzura mutane, lalle hakan kuskure ne. Lalle babu maslaha cikin tunzura mutane da haifar da sabani a tsakanin mutane.

translation.en: Creating discord or provoking conflicts which will result in discord are not to the benefit of our country. Neither today nor during the time of Imam Sadiq (a.s.) was it a proper move.
translation.ha: Ba maslaha ba ce a yau, haka nan a lokacin Imam Sadik (a.s), don kuwa Imamai (a.s) sun kasance suna hani da hakan.

translation.en: However, some superficial people do not pay attention to this issue.
translation.ha: Wasu mutane masu karamin tunani ba sa lura da wannan lamarin.

translation.en: The same is true of domestic conflicts.
translation.ha: Haka lamarin ya ke dangane da sabani na cikin gida da kuma na waje.

translation.en: Today our people should have hopes.
translation.ha: A yau wajibi ne mutanenmu su zamanto suna da fata mai kyau.

translation.en: If there is hope, there will be valor.
translation.ha: Idan har ya zamana akwai fata, to kuwa za a sami kumaji.

translation.en: It is not the case that we should order the people to achieve valor.
translation.ha: Maganar da na ke yi dangane da samar da yanayi na kumaji, to kumaji dai ba wani lamari ne da zaka ba da umurnin yinsa.

translation.en: Is this possible?
translation.ha: Shin hakan mai yiyuwa ne?

translation.en: Valor originates from the heart.
translation.ha: Kumaji dai yana motsawa ne daga cikin zuciya.

translation.en: It is guided by reason and it is reinforced with faith.
translation.ha: Ana shiryar da shi ne ta hanyar amfani da hankali sannan kuma a karfafa shi da imani.

translation.en: Will valor be achieved if we create doubts in the minds of the people and inject despair into their hearts? It is obvious that it will not be achieved in such a way.
translation.ha: Idan har muka sanya shakku cikin kwakwale, muka sanya yanke fata da kauna cikin zukata, shin za mu iya samar da wani kumaji? A fili yake cewa koda wasa.

translation.en: For example, 30 years ago in the early years of the 1360s if we had said that the future will be bright, perhaps some people would have said that we were fixing these ideas in the minds of the people.
translation.ha: A misali a farko-farkon shekarun 1360 (hijira shamsiyya) - shekaru talatin da suka gabata - idan da za mu ce ga yadda makomarmu za ta kasance, mai yiyuwa ne a samu wadanda za su ce wadannan suna fadin fatan da suke da shi ne kawai.

translation.en: But today nobody says such things. Today we can see the widespread and ongoing movement of the Revolution and the country towards goals - including material, spiritual, political, social, domestic and international goals.
translation.ha: To a yau kan ba za a fadi hakan ba. Don kuwa a yau ga shi nan muna ganin irin yunkurin da aka yi na ciyar da kasar nan da kuma wannan juyi gaba zuwa ga manufarsa; manufofinsa na duniya da na lahira; haka nan da manufofinsa na siyasa da zamantakewa; haka nan manufa ta cikin gida da kuma ta kasa da kasa.

translation.en: These goals are being achieved in front of our eyes. Can anybody deny this?
translation.ha: Wadannan abubuwa ne da muke ganinsu da idanuwanmu. Shin akwai wanda zai iya inkarin hakan?

translation.en: Continuous jihad does not mean suffering. Jihad causes excitement.
translation.ha: Ma'anar ci gaba da kokari ba ita ce shan wahala a koda yaushe ba.

translation.en: If today that we need jihad somebody guides the people towards laziness, isolation and inaction, they have behaved in a blasphemous way towards divine blessings.
translation.ha: Wani kokari ne da ke cike da kwadaitarwa da nishadi da farin ciki. A yau muna da bukatar wannan kokarin.

translation.en: Have you not seen those who have changed Allah's favor for ungratefulness and made their people to alight into the abode of perdition [The Holy Quran, 14: 28].
translation.ha: To amma sai a sami wani mutum ya zo yana kira zuwa da ragwantaka da kasala da rashin aikin yi, to wannan shi ne kafirce wa ni'imar Ubangiji "Shin ba ku lura ba da wadanda suka musanya ni'imar Allah da kafirci kuma suka saukar da mutanensu a gidan halaka?

translation.en: Among you dear people there are, thankfully, both experienced and young panegyrists. You have good capacities.
translation.ha: Alhamdu lillahi a cikinku akwai tsoffin mawaka, akwai kuma matasa sannan kuma ga irin kwarewar da ake da ita.

translation.en: Among you I can see fresh and newly-budded flowers who have managed to successfully enter the arena.
translation.ha: Kun sami damar bayyanar da kanku a cikin fage da kuma cike gibin da magabata suka bari.

translation.en: Not only have you managed to replace previous panegyrists - we have seen many of the panegyrists who were active in the past - but you have also moved forward better than they did.
translation.ha: Kai ba wai ma kawai cikewa ba, face dai da irin abubuwan da ya fi na su kyau. Mu dai mun ga da yawa daga cikin magabatan.

translation.en: What I want to tell you is that eulogy increases knowledge and understanding.
translation.ha: Abin da nake son gaya muku, shi ne cewa: Yabon Ahlulbaiti wani lamari ne da ke kara masaniya.

translation.en: Eulogy sows the seeds of knowledge and understanding, acumen, hope and firm beliefs.
translation.ha: Yabon Ahlulbaiti wani lamari ne da ke yada hikima da fata da tsayayyiyar akida.

translation.en: Eulogy engenders feelings in the hearts of the people with the art of poetry and performance.
translation.ha: Haka nan yabon Ahlulbaiti wani lamari ne da ke motsa zukata da tausayin da ke cikin zukata ta hanyar amfani da fasaha ta al'adu da wake.

translation.en: Of course, my dear ones, there is a basic principle.
translation.ha: Koda yake tabbas akwai tushe na asasi da aka tafi a kan su, Ya ku ‘yan'uwana!

translation.en: If you win praise from the people by behaving in a moral, religious and modest way, all the things that I spoke about will deeply influence the people.
translation.ha: Idan har kuka kasance masu kyawawan halaye da riko da addini, to dukkanin wadannan abubuwan da na ambata za su yi tasiri cikin zukatan mutane.

translation.en: But if, God forbid, the opposite happens, if the people witness signs of moral instability, moral backwardness and, God forbid, immorality and other such things, then the effect of the art and the beauties which exist in your work will be minimized. You should be careful about this. All of us should be careful.
translation.ha: Amma idan abin Allah ya kiyaye aka sami akasin hakan; wato mutane suka ga munanan halaye da koma baya cikin dabi'u da kuma munanan halaye a tattare da ku, to kuwa dukkanin wadannan tasiri mai kyau da ke cikin wannan aiki na ku, za su kawu. A saboda haka ku kula da kyau. Wajibi ne dukkaninmu mu yi taka tsantsan, musamman mu din nan masu rawani, wajibi ne mu yi taka tsantsan, ku ma haka lamarin yake a gare ku.

translation.en: Everybody, including you, should be careful. You who are involved in the arena of religion and religious understanding should be very careful.
translation.ha: Ku din nan mutane ne da kuke gudana da ayyukanku a fagen addini da masaniya da lamurra na Ubangiji, a saboda haka wajibi ne ku kara yin taka tsantsan sosai.

translation.en: You should be careful about your morality and your purity of tongue, heart and hands.
translation.ha: Taka tsantsan na kyawawan halaye, taka tsantsan cikin maganganunmu da kuma tsarkake zuciyarmu.

translation.en: May Allah the Exalted help you.
translation.ha: Allah Madaukakin Sarki zai taimake ku.

translation.en: When a panegyrist of Fatima Zahra (s.a.) achieves such a position, he is an outstanding man.
translation.ha: A lokacin da mtuum ya sami kai wa matsayin mawakin yabon Fatima (a.s), to ya zamanto wani babban mutum.

translation.en: As we have known, understood and believed, those who tread the path of eulogizing the Imams (a.s.), expressing love for Fatima Zahra (s.a.) and attracting hearts to these great personalities are dear to Allah the Exalted.
translation.ha: Kamar yadda a tsakaninmu akwai wadansu mutane da suka yi fice da kuma samun matsayi, haka su ma masu waken yabon Ahlulbaiti (a.s) da kuma nuna kaunar wadannan manyan bayin Allah da kuma janyo zukatan mutane zuwa gare su, lalle suna da matsayi a wajen Allah.

translation.en: Today, there was an outstanding point in our meeting which is praiseworthy.
translation.ha: Na'am akwai wani batu da ya faru a wannan zama tamu ta yau, wanda kuma batu ne mai kyau.

translation.en: They used to perform rowza and make the people shed tears.
translation.ha: Su kan zo su rera wakoki na juyayi a zubar da hawaye.

translation.en: What does panegyrist mean?
translation.ha: Me masu waken yabo yake nufi?

translation.en: Your main characteristic is praising, not performing rowza. You can perform rowza.
translation.ha: Babbar siffarku ita ce waken yabo ba wai waken juyayi ba.

translation.en: When a mouloodi is performed for the Imams (a.s.), it should not be mixed with a rowza to make the people shed tears. This is not at all necessary.
translation.ha: Lamarin ba shi ne cewa wajibi ne sai a karanta wakoki na juyayi a wajen bikin haihuwar Imamai (a.s) ba; a karanta wakokin juyayi a ta zubar da hawaye ba. Babu bukatar hakan.

translation.en: You should not do something to make outsiders promote the idea that our people's emotions towards the Imams (a.s.) are only centered around shedding tears and mourning.
translation.ha: Kada ku bari a dauka cewa ta hanyar kuka da juyayi ne kawai za a iya bayyanar da irin so da kaunar Imamai (a.s) da ke cikin zukatan mutane.

translation.en: They should not be mixed.
translation.ha: Bai kamata a hada su tare ba.

translation.en: And the second point which should be discussed today is the issue of women.
translation.ha: Batu na biyu da ya kamata in yi magana kansa a yau shi ne batun mace.

translation.en: One of the sins that western civilization committed is the movement that they launched on the issue of women.
translation.ha: Daya daga cikin mafi munin ci gaban yammaci da kuma al'adun ‘yan jari hujja, shi ne yadda suke mu'amala da mace.

translation.en: We have many things to say in this regard.
translation.ha: Lalle muna da abin fadi da yawa a wannan bangaren.

translation.en: Like everything else, they give this movement different names. They commit crimes, but they refer to it as measures to defend human rights.
translation.ha: Suna sanya wa hakan sunaye daban-daban - tamkar dukkanin ayyukansu - su kan aikata laifi su kira shi kare hakkokin bil'adama.

translation.en: They launch attacks, but they call it defense.
translation.ha: Su kan yi zalunci su kira shi goyon bayan al'ummomi.

translation.en: The characteristics of western civilization are deceitfulness, hypocrisy, dishonesty and contradiction between words and actions.
translation.ha: Daya daga cikin siffofin da wayewar kasashen yammaci ta kebanta da ita ita ce yaudara, munafunci, karya da karo da juna cikin halaye da maganganunsu.

translation.en: Unfortunately, they have established their culture throughout the world.
translation.ha: Abin bakin cikin shi ne cewa sun watsa al'adunsu a duk fadin duniya.

translation.en: They have acted in a way that today one of the most important responsibilities or the most important responsibility of women is to put themselves on display and put their beauty at the service of men's pleasure.
translation.ha: A yau sun yi wani abin da ya sanya daya daga cikin mafi muhimmancin aikin mace - in ma ba mu ce shi ne mafi muhimmanci din ba - shi ne su dinga bayyanar da kyaunsu a gaban maza don biya musu bukatarsu ta sha'awa.

translation.en: Unfortunately, the world has become like this.
translation.ha: Abin bakin cikin shi ne cewa a halin yanzu haka lamarin yake a duniya.

translation.en: In the most formal meetings, such as political meetings and different other meetings, men should wear long pants and modest clothes, but if women appear as nude as they can, it is alright. Is this normal? Is this natural?
translation.ha: A taro na siyasa da sauransu, wajibi ne maza su zo da dogayen wanduna, wajibi ne su sanya cikakken tufafi mai rufe jiki. Amma ita kuwa mace komai fitowar da ta yi tsirarra da bayyanar da jikinta a wajen babu matsala, shi ne ma abin so.

translation.en: Women should put themselves on display and they should become objects of pleasure for men. Is there a kind of oppression which is worse than this?
translation.ha: Wannan shi ne abin da suka yi. Wajibi ne mace ta bayyanar da jikinta, don ta biya wa maza bukatarsu. Shin akwai zaluncin da ya wuce wannan?

translation.en: They call this freedom and they call the opposite behavior restriction.
translation.ha: Don haka suka karya wannan garkuwar kana kuma suna ci gaba da karyawar.

translation.en: The first consequence or perhaps one of the first consequences of this behavior was that the family was destroyed and undermined.
translation.ha: Suna kiran hakan da sunaye daban-daban. Mummunan sakamako na farko na hakan, shi ne ruguza iyali.

translation.en: When the family is undermined and destroyed in a society, corruption will be established in that society.
translation.ha: A lokacin da aka sami rugujewar iyali a cikin wata al'umma, to kuwa fasadi zai yadu cikin wannan al'umma.

translation.en: The problems that exist in the west today and the dim-witted and malevolent laws that they pass on sexual issues will push them off the precipice.
translation.ha: Matsalar da a yau kasashen yammaci suke fuskanta, su ne wadannan dokoki na hauka da rashin mafadi da suke kafawa dangane da abin da ya shafi saduwa tsakanin mace da namiji.

translation.en: This fall is not preventable. They are condemned to destruction.
translation.ha: Wannan lalacewar dai ba abu ne da za a iya hana faruwarsa ba. Lalle za su fadi kasa warwas.

translation.en: Whether they like it or not, western civilization cannot prevent this fall.
translation.ha: Ko sun so ko sun ki, ba za su iya hana faduwar al'adu da wayewar kasashen yammaci faduwa kasa warwas ba.

translation.en: The brakes of the vehicle of western civilization have failed and the path which it is treading is slippery.
translation.ha: Sun kwance birkin wannan abin hawa na su, ga shi kuma hanyar da suke bi ta lalace.

translation.en: They committed a sin when they caused this brake failure and when they stood at the edge of the precipice. They are condemned to failure. The fall of civilizations as well as their rise happens gradually.
translation.ha: Sun aikata zunubin da ya kai matsayin da ko sun taka birkin, lalle ba zai yi amfani ba, sannan kuma sun kai gaci, don haka wajibi ne za su sha kasa. Gushewar wayewa da al'adun wata al'umma, tamkar yadda ake samar da su ne, wani lamari ne da ya ke faruwa a hankali a hankali.

translation.en: And this gradual fall of western civilization is taking place. I do not think that this generation or the next generation will miss witnessing this.
translation.ha: To hakan kuwa shi ne abin da ke faruwa, kuma ba na zaton abu ne da ya buya daga idanuwan wadannan zuriya ta al'umma zuwa wancan.

translation.en: They will see what will happen.
translation.ha: Lalle za ku ga abin da zai faru.

translation.en: In the Holy Quran, Allah the Exalted has mentioned how much women should be respected.
translation.ha: Allah Madaukakin Sarki cikin Alkur'ani mai girma ya shata wasu haddi na girmama mace.

translation.en: There is no difference between men and women in terms of spiritual and divine position.
translation.ha: A bangaren abubuwa masu kyautata ruhi, babu wani bambanci tsakanin wadannan jinsuna guda biyu.

translation.en: This path has been created for human beings, not only for men or for women.
translation.ha: Wannan wata hanya ce da aka tsara wa dan'adam, ba wai namiji ko mace ba.

translation.en: Allah the Exalted has created a woman like Fatima Zahra (s.a.) about whom Imam Askari (a.s.) or Imam Hadi (a.s.) say, "We are the representatives of Allah among the people and Fatima is representative of Allah among us."
translation.ha: Tsawon tarihi Allah Madaukakin Sarki ya halicci mace irin Fatima al-Zahra (amincin Allah ya tabbata a gare ta) ta yadda har aka ruwaito Imam Askari ko Imam Hadi (amincin Allah ya tabbata a gare su) yana cewa: "Mu hujjojin Allah ne a kan halittunsa, Fatima kuma hujjar Allah ce a kanmu".

translation.en: She was infallible.
translation.ha: Ita Ma'asumiya ce.

translation.en: And such a person was a woman.
translation.ha: Sannan irin wannan halitta kuwa mace ce.

translation.en: Great women such as Mary, Sara, Asiya and many other great women are the outstanding personalities of the world.
translation.ha: Akwai wasu manyan matan da suka yi fice cikin tarihi irin su Maryam, Sarah da Asiya da sauransu.

translation.en: There is no difference between men and women in terms of social rights.
translation.ha: Babu wani bambanci tsakanin namiji da mace a bangaren hakkoki na zamantakewa.

translation.en: There is no difference between men and women in terms of individual rights.
translation.ha: Haka nan babu bambanci tsakanin namiji da mace a bangaren hakkoki na daidaiku.

translation.en: This is Islam. It has the most reasonable, the most dignified and the most practical laws that one can ever imagine regarding the issue of gender.
translation.ha: To wannan shi ne Musulunci...wanda ya ke da dokokin da suka shafi saduwa da alaka tsakanin mace da namiji da suka fi dacewa da kuma daidai da hankali sama da sauran dokokin da mutum zai iya tunaninsu.

translation.en: We should follow this path.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne a yi tafi a bisa wannan tafarkin.

translation.en: One of the major ways to do this is to raise a family, safeguard the family environment and preserve love in the family.
translation.ha: Haka nan kuma daga cikin mafi muhimmancin hakan shi ne yadda za a kiyaye iyali da tabbatar da so da kauna cikin iyali.

translation.en: And this is the responsibility of the lady of the house.
translation.ha: Hakan kuwa lamari ne da ke wuyan uwar gida (ko kuma uwa).

translation.en: The mother can raise children in the best way possible.
translation.ha: Uwa za ta iya yin kyakkyawar tarbiyya ga ‘ya'yanta.

translation.en: She raises and teaches them with her behavior, with her words and with her feelings. She teaches them by stroking, by singing lullabies and by living with them.
translation.ha: Tarbiyyar ‘ya'ya ta hannun uwa, ba irin tarbiyya da ake yi a aji ba ne; ana yin hakan ne ta hanyar halaye da tausayawa da kulawa da karanto musu kissoshi sannan da kuma rayuwa da su.

translation.en: Mothers teach children by living with them.
translation.ha: Uwaye za su tarbiyyartar da ‘ya'yansu ta hanyar rayuwa da su nw.

translation.en: The more righteous, the more intelligent and the wiser women are, the better children will be raised and taught.
translation.ha: Gwargwadon yadda mace ta zamanto saliha da kuma amfani da hankali da taka tsantsan, gwargwadon yadda tarbiyyar da za ta yi za ta yi kyau.

translation.en: Therefore, there should be careful planning in our country to improve women's level of faith, literacy and intelligence.
translation.ha: A saboda haka wajibi ne a tsara wani shiri a kasar nan don daga irin imani da ilimi da amfani da hankalin da mata suke da su.

translation.en: One of the most important responsibilities of women is being a homemaker.
translation.ha: Kula da gida yana daga cikin mafi muhimmancin aikin mace.

translation.en: As everybody knows, I do not believe that women should not have social and political roles.
translation.ha: Kowa ya san cewa ni dai ba na adawa da aikin mace a fagen ayyukan zamantakewa da siyasa.

translation.en: But if this means that we should look down on homemaker, then we have committed a sin. Homemaking is a job.
translation.ha: Amma idan har ya zamanto da ma'anar cewa za mu kaskantar da yanayin kula da gida da mace take yi, to a nan kan ya kan zama laifi.

translation.en: It is a great, important and sensitive job which builds the future.
translation.ha: Kula da gida, wani aiki ne, aikin ma kuma mai girma da muhimmanci sannan kuma mai ayyana makoma.

translation.en: I have said to our people many times that the consequences of aging and a reduction in the number of young people in our country will show themselves later on.
translation.ha: A lokuta da dama na sha fadin hakan.

translation.en: But today, it can be cured.
translation.ha: To amma a yau ana iya maganin hakan.

translation.en: Giving birth is one of the feminine efforts and responsibilities.
translation.ha: Haihuwa da kula da ‘ya'ya har zuwa girmansu yana daga cikin manyan ayyukan mata.

translation.en: Giving birth to children is, in fact, the art of women.
translation.ha: A hakikanin gaskiya mace ce take da fasahar hakan.

translation.en: It is they whom Allah the Exalted has offered the means for raising children.
translation.ha: Allah Madaukakin Sarki ya ba wa mata kayan aikin tarbiyya da girmar da yara.

translation.en: Allah the Exalted has not provided men with the means for raising children.
translation.ha: Allah Madaukakin Sarki bai ba wa maza hakan ba, mata ya ba wa.

translation.en: He has given them the patience, the feelings, the emotions and the body which are necessary to raise children.
translation.ha: Ya ba su hakurin hakan, da kuma tausayi da yanayin jikin gudanar da hakan.

translation.en: This is, in fact, the art of women.
translation.ha: A hakikanin gaskiya hakan wata fasaha ce ta mace.

translation.en: If we do not let these things pass into oblivion, then we will make progress.
translation.ha: Matukar dai ba mu mance da hakan cikin al'ummarmu ba, to kuwa za mu sami ci gaba.

translation.en: One issue is that we should respect women and this issue should receive careful attention.
translation.ha: Girmama mace da karrama ta wani lamari ne da wajibi ne a ba shi kulawa ta musamman.

translation.en: The behavior of women in the family environment, in the workplace and in political and social environments is also an important issue. The way we should behave towards women is another issue.
translation.ha: Halaye da dabi'un mace a cikin iyali, a wajen aiki, ko a fage na siyasa da kuma zamantakewa wani batun ne na daban, haka nan kuma mu'amala da mata shi ma wani bangare ne na daban.

translation.en: It is men who are addressed by this statement, whether men in the family - including fathers, brothers and husbands - or men in work environments.
translation.ha: Shin maza ne na cikin iyali - kamar uba, ‘yan'uwa ko kuma miji - ko kuma mazan da matan suke haduwa da su a wajen aiki.

translation.en: It is necessary to behave towards women in a respectful, loving, noble and moral way.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne mu'amala da mace ta kasance cikin girmamawa, nuna kauna tare kuma da nuna kunya da mutumci.

translation.en: Therefore, respect for women, the responsibility of women and our responsibility towards women are issues which should be considered separately and we should develop separate plans for them.
translation.ha: A saboda haka wajibi ne a lura da kuma girmama yanayin mace da kuma tsara cikakken tsari kan hakan.

translation.en: Mother's Day and Women's Day - which have, fortunately, coincided with the birthday anniversary of Fatima Zahra (s.a.), the chosen woman in the entire creation - should draw everybody's attention to these points.
translation.ha: Ranar mace da kuma ranar uwa wanda alhamdu lillahi a Jamhuriyar Musulunci ta Iran shi ne ranar hauhuwar Fatima al-Zahra (amincin allah ya tabbata a gare ta), lalle wajibi ne a lura da hakan.

translation.en: If we manage to think , decide and act in the right way on the issue of family and women - as mothers and wives - then you should know that the future of the country will be guaranteed.
translation.ha: Idan har muka yi tunani mai kyau dangane da mace da iyali da kuma uwa, sannan kuma muka dau matakan da suka dace, to mu san cewa za a iya lamunce makomar kasar nan.

translation.en: In the Name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful
translation.ha: Da Sunan Allah Mai Rahama Mai Jin Kai

translation.en: Change our condition to the best of conditions.
translation.ha: Ka sauya yanayinmu zuwa ga mafi kyawun yanayi.

translation.en: Greetings be upon Siddiqat al-Tahirah, Fatimah al-Marziah, the Holy Prophet’s (God’s greetings be upon him and his household) daughter.
translation.ha: Amincin Allah ya tabbata ga Siddiqatut Tahira, Fatima al-Mardhiyyah, ‘yar Manzon Allah, tsira da amincin Allah su tabbata a gare shi da Alayensa.

translation.en: And greetings be upon Allah’s Great Representative (may our souls be sacrificed for his sake and may God hasten his reappearance)
translation.ha: Haka nan amincin Allah ya tabbata ga Waliyin Allah mai girma, rayukanmu su zamanto fansa a gare shi sannan kuma Ya gaggauta bayyanarsa.

translation.en: I would like to congratulate all Iranian families and each and every Iranian - wherever they are in the world - on the occasion of Norouz.
translation.ha: Ina mika sakon taya murnar Idin Nourouz ga dukkanin al'ummar Iran da sauran Iraniyawa da suke sauran yankuna na duniya.

translation.en: In particular, I would like to congratulate the dear families of the martyrs, the dear disabled war veterans, their honorable families and all self-sacrificing individuals, and I commemorate the memory of our great martyrs and our magnanimous Imam (r.a.).
translation.ha: Ina taya ku murnar wannan idi, Ya Ku ‘yan'uwana ‘yan kasa, musamman iyalan shahidai masu girma da daukaka, da sojojin da suka sami raunuka a wajajen yaki da iyalansu masu girma, haka nan ga dukkanin sojoji masu sadaukarwa. Kamar yadda kuma muke jinjinawa shahidanmu masu girma da kuma marigayi Imam Khumaini abin kaunarmu.

translation.en: The year that has just begun – the year 1395 – is blessed with the auspicious name of Hazrat Zahra (s.a.) both in its beginning and in its end.
translation.ha: Wannan sabuwar shekarar dai - wato shekarar 1395- farkonta haka nan karshenta, dukkaninsu sun sami albarkacin sunan mai grima Nana Fatima al-Zahra (amincin Allah ya tabbata a gare ta).

translation.en: Both the beginning and the end of this year are marked by the birthday anniversary of that great personality – corresponding with the lunar months.
translation.ha: Farkon shekarar yayi daidai da ranakun haihuwar wannan babbar baiwar Allah a watannin hijira kamariyya, haka ma karshen shekarar.

translation.en: Therefore, I hope that God willing, the year 1395 will be an auspicious year for the people of Iran by the blessedness of Hazrat Zahra (s.a.) and that we will learn lessons and benefit from the spirituality, instructions and life of that great personality.
translation.ha: A saboda haka muna fatan insha Allahu wannan shekara ta 1395, albarkacin Nata Fatima, za ta zamanto shekara mai cike da albarkoki ga al'ummar Iran sannan kuma za mu dau darussa daga irin kusaci da Allah da take da shi da kuma irin maganganu da kuma rayuwarta da kuma amfanuwa da hakan.

translation.en: All years and days of one’s life include opportunities and threats.
translation.ha: Shekaru da kuma ranakun rayuwar dan'adam cike suke da dama da kuma barazana da kalubale.

translation.en: Our skill lies in benefiting from opportunities and turning threats into opportunities.
translation.ha: A saboda haka wajibi ne mu zamanto masu amfanuwa da damar da muka samu, sannan mu kuma mayar da barazanar da muke fuskanta zuwa ga wata dama.

translation.en: The year 1395 is ahead of us.
translation.ha: Yanzu dai ga shekarar 1395 a gabanmu.

translation.en: In this year as always, there are both opportunities and threats.
translation.ha: A wannan shekarar ma kamar yadda aka saba, akwai dama da kuma barazana da kalubale.

translation.en: Everyone should make efforts so that we can benefit from the opportunities of this year in the real sense of the word and so that at the end of the year, the country will witness a tangible difference compared to the beginning of the year.
translation.ha: A saboda haka wajibi ne kowanenmu yayi kokarinsa wajen ganin mun amfana da damar da muke da su amfanuwa ta hakika, don kasar nan ta samu ci gaba tsawon wannan shekarar, tun daga farkonta har zuwa karshe.

translation.en: There are certain hopes for the year 1395.
translation.ha: Lalle akwai kyakkyawar fata a wannan shekara ta 1395.

translation.en: When one looks at the prospects and the circumstances, one witnesses certain hopes.
translation.ha: Idan mutum ya kalli yanayin kasar nan a yanayi na gaba daya, to lalle zai ga cewa akwai fata da yawa.

translation.en: We should work day and night and try hard in a ceaseless manner.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne a yi aiki ba dare ba rana, a yi aiki ba kama hannun yaro.

translation.en: The main point is that the people of Iran should do something to liberate themselves from vulnerabilities in the face of the enemies’ threats and enmities.
translation.ha: Asalin lamarin dai shi ne cewa wajibi ne al'ummar Iran su yi aiki wajen ganin sun fitar da kansu daga da'irar barazanar makiya da kuma cutarwarsu.

translation.en: We should do something to avoid being vulnerable in the face of the enemies’ threats. We should reduce our vulnerability to zero. I believe that the issue of the economy is the first priority.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne mu yunkura da tinkarar barazanar makiya ta yadda za mu tseratar da kanmu daga cutarwarsu. Mu kawar da dukkanin cutarwarsu daga kawukanmu. A tunanina batun karfafa tattalin arziki shi ne a kan gaban komai.

translation.en: When we take a look at priorities, we see that the issue of the economy is the most urgent and essential one.
translation.ha: Wato a yayin da mutum ya kalli matsalolin da ake da su, zai ga cewa matsalar tattalin arzikin ita ce babbar matsalar da take kan gaba wacce take bukatar a magance ta cikin gaggawa.

translation.en: If the people, the administration and different officials can – by Allah’s favor – adopt correct, timely and proper measures, then we can hope that this will influence other issues – such as social maladies and moral and cultural issues – as well.
translation.ha: Idan har cikin yarda da taimakon Ubangiji, al'umma da kuma gwamnati da sauran jami'an bangarori daban-daban suka samu nasarar aikata ayyukan da suka dace a fagen tattalin arziki sannan kuma a daidai lokacin da ake bukata, to fatan da muke da shi shi ne cewa za a samu damar yin tasiri da magance sauran matsalolin da ake da su irin su matsalar zamantakewa, matsalar kyawawan halaye da matsalar al'adu da sauransu.

translation.en: On the issue of the economy, what is important and fundamental is the issue of domestic production, the issue of employment and eliminating unemployment, the issue of economic dynamism and the issue of combating recession. These are the issues that people are faced with.
translation.ha: Dangane da batun tattalin arziki, abin da ke da muhimmanci kuma na asali shi ne batun samar da kayayyakin da ake bukata a cikin gida; batun samar da aikin yi da kawar da rashin aikin yi; batun yunkuri da karfafa tattalin arziki da fada da koma bayan tattalin arziki; wadannan matsaloli ne da al'ummarmu suke fuskanta.

translation.en: These are the things that people feel and demand.
translation.ha: Wadannan matsaloli ne da al'ummarmu suke ji a jikinsu kuma suke bukatar a magance musu su.

translation.en: The statistics and statements of the officials themselves show that these demands and requests of the people are legitimate and sensible.
translation.ha: Kuma kididdiga da maganganun su kansu jami'an gwamnati suna nuni da cewa lalle haka lamarin yake.

translation.en: If we want to resolve the problem of recession, domestic production and unemployment and if we want to manage the issue of inflation, the cure for all these things lie in the framework of economic resistance and the economy of resistance. The economy of resistance includes all these problems.
translation.ha: Matukar muna son magance matsalar koma bayan da ake fuskanta, matsalar kayayyakin da ake samarwa a cikin gida, matukar muna son magance matsalar rashin aikin yi, matukar muna son kawar da matsalar tsadar kayayyaki, to kuwa maganin dukkanin wadannan matsalolin suna cikin tsarin siyasar tattalin arziki na gwagwarmaya da dogaro da kai ne.

translation.en: With the economy of resistance, we can fight against unemployment, we can fight against recession, we can manage inflation, we can stand up against the enemy’s threats and we can create and benefit from many opportunities for the country. The condition is that effort is made on the path of the economy of resistance.
translation.ha: Ana iya kawar da matsalar rashin aikin yi ta hanyar riko da tattalin arzikin dogaro da kai, ana iya magance matsalar koma baya, haka nan da matsalar tsadar rayuwa, haka nan ana iya tsayin daka da tinkarar barazanar makiya; ana iya samar da dama masu yawa ga kasar nan da kuma amfanuwa da wadannan damar; to amma da sharadin za a yi aiki tukuru wajen tabbatar da wannan siyasa ta tattalin arziki na dogaro da kai.

translation.en: This is what constitutes our responsibility. By Allah’s favor, I will discuss this issue in detail with our dear people during the [Mashhad] speech.
translation.ha: Wannan shi ne nauyin da ke wuyanmu; wanda insha Allah a jawabin da zan yi zan yi karin bayani sosai ga al'ummarmu.

translation.en: Thus, the name that I want to choose for this year is, “The Economy of Resistance: Action and Implementation”.
translation.ha: A saboda haka taken da na zaba wa wannan shekarar shi ne "Daukar Mataki Da Aiki A Fagen Tattalin Arzikin Dogaro Da Kai".

translation.en: The economy of resistance, action and implementation- this is a straight and enlightened path and the road towards what we need.
translation.ha: Wannan ita ce mikakkiyar hanya kuma fitacciya zuwa ga abubuwan da muke bukata.

translation.en: Of course, we do not expect that this action and implementation will solve all the problems in the course of one year, but we are sure that if action and implementation is carried out in a systematic and correct manner, we will be able to witness the results at the end of the year.
translation.ha: Tabbas ba wai muna cewa wadannan daukar matakai da kuma aiki a aikace za su magance dukkanin matsalolin da ake da su cikin shekara guda ba ne; to amma ko shakka babu matukar aka aikata hakan yadda ya dace, to kuwa a karshen shekarar nan za mu ga tasiri da kuma alamun hakan.

translation.en: I thank all those people who worked and continue to work hard on this path.
translation.ha: A saboda haka ina mika godiya ta ga dukkanin mutanen da suka yi kokari a wannan fagen.

translation.en: And I ask God to bestow His peace and blessings on Muhammad (s.a.w.a.), on his household and on the Imam of the Age (God’s greetings be upon him and may our souls be sacrificed for his sake).
translation.ha: Ina sake mika gaisuwa ta da kuma taya murna ga al'ummarmu masu girma, sannan kuma ina rokon Allah Madaukakin Sarki da yayi salati da tabbatar da aminci ga Annabi Muhammadu da Alayen Muhammadu haka nan kuma ga mai girma Baqiyatullah (Imam Mahdi), rayukanmu su zamanto fansa a gare shi.

translation.en: Imam Khamenei Meets with Family of Shahid Rajab Mohammadzade - Khamenei.ir
translation.ha: Jagora Imam Khamenei Ya Gana Da Iyalan Shahid Rajab Muhammad Zadeh

translation.en: Ayatollah Khamenei, the Supreme Leader of the Islamic Revolution, met Sunday morning with the family of Shahid Rajab Mohammadzade - a disabled war veteran [with severe facial disfiguration due to war injuries] who recently achieved martyrdom.
translation.ha: Da ranar yau Lahadi (28-08-2016) ne Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci Ayatullah Sayyid Ali Khamenei ya gana da iyalan sojan da ya sami rauni a wajen yaki shahid Haj Rajab Muhammad Zadeh.

translation.en: Speaking at the meeting, His Eminence praised the lofty and desirable station of Shahid Mohammadzade, saying: “Over the course of these years, every moment and every hour during which this dear shahid endured pain and difficulties resulting from his disability will be recorded and rewarded by Allah the Exalted.
translation.ha: A yayin wannan ganawar, Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci ya jinjinawa shahid Muhammad Zadeh yana mai cewa: tsawon wadannan shekarun duk wani hakurin da wannan shahidi mai girman matsayi yayi sakamakon wahalhalu irin na raunukan da ya samu a wajen yaki, lalle ladan hakan na nan a wajen Allah Madaukakin Sarki.

translation.en: Praising the high morale, self-sacrifice and patience of Shahid Mohammadzade’s family- particularly his spouse- the Supreme Leader of the Islamic Revolution said: “You families of martyrs are the embodiment of the Islamic Revolution and our morale is boosted when we see you dear ones.” Ayatollah Khamenei also stressed the necessity of promoting the biographies of resistant and great men like Shahid Mohammadzade.
translation.ha: Har ila yau kuma Ayatullah Khamenei ya jinjinawa irin hakuri da ruhi na sadaukarwa da iyalan Shahid Muhammad Zadeh din suka nuna musamman matarsa inda ya ce: Ku din nan iyalan shahidai ku ne alama ta juyin juya halin Musulunci, ko shakka babu ganinku yana kara mana karfin gwiwa. Haka nan kuma Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci ya bayyana wajibcin ci gaba da bayani da karin haske kan rayuwa mai tsananin wahala amma cike da gwagwarmaya ta manyan mutane irin su shahid Muhammad Zadeh.

translation.en: In the year 1366, he was severely injured in the area of the head and face following a mortar attack.
translation.ha: Shahid Haj Rajab Muhammad Zadeh dai yana daga cikin dakarun kasar Iran da suka sami raunuka a yakin kallafaffen yaki a yankin Hur na kasar Iraki inda ya sami raunuka a kai da kuma fuskarsa sakamakon fashewar wata nakiya da aka dana.

translation.en: He met with Ayatollah Khamenei in the month of Farvardin of the year 1394 during the Supreme Leader’s visit to the Holy Shrine of Imam Ridha (a.s.) where he was warmly received by His Eminence.
translation.ha: A shekarar bara ma ya samu damar ganawa da Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci Ayatullah Sayyid Ali Khamenei a wata ziyara da jagoran ya kai haramin Imam Ridha (a.s) da ke birnin Mashhad.

translation.en: Leader’s Speech to Government Officials on Mab’ath - Khamenei.ir  The following is the full text of the speech delivered on June 30, 2011 by Ayatollah Khamenei the Leader of the Islamic Revolution.
translation.ha: Shimfida: A ranar Alhamis 30, Yunin 2011 ce Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci Ayatullah Sayyid Ali Khamenei ya gana da jami'an kasar Iran da sauran al'ummar kasar don gudanar da bukukuwan murnar ranar da aka aiko Manzon Allah (s.a.w.a) a matsayin manzo.

translation.en: In the name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful
translation.ha: Da Sunan Allah Mai Rahama Mai Jin Kai

translation.en: I would like to congratulate the honorable audience, our esteemed government officials, the honorable ambassadors of Islamic countries, all dear Iranian people, the great Islamic Ummah and the entire humanity on this great Eid and this holy day.
translation.ha: Ina taya dukkanin mahalarta wannan taron, jami'an gwamnati masu girma, jakadun kasashen musulmi masu girma da dukkanin al'ummar Iran da al'ummomin kasashen musulmi da kuma dukkanin bil'adama murnar wannan ranar idi mai girma da wannan madaukakiyar rana.

translation.en: If the importance of a particular day depends on whether or not Allah the Exalted has bestowed a blessing on humanity on that day, then Mab'ath is definitely the greatest and the most important day of the year.
translation.ha: Idan har girma da daukakar ranaku suna da alaka ne da wata ni'ima da Allah Madaukakin Sarki Ya saukar a wannan ranar, to ko shakka babu ranar aiko Manzon Allah (s.a.w.a) ita ce mafi girma da muhimmancin ranakun shekara.

translation.en: This is because sending down the Holy Prophet (s.w.a.) for humanity was greater than all divine blessings throughout history.
translation.ha: Don kuwa ni'imar da ke cikin aiko Annabi da kuma samar da manzo mafi girma ga bil'adama ita ce mafi girman ni'imar Ubangiji tsawon tarihi.

translation.en: Therefore, one can say with certainty that Mab'ath is the best, the greatest and the most auspicious day of the year.
translation.ha: A saboda haka a fili ana iya fadin cewa ranar aiko annabi, ita ce mafi daukaka da kuma girma cikin ranakun shekara.

translation.en: The Commander of the Faithful (a.s.) said, "God sent the Prophet when the mission of other Prophets had stopped and the peoples were in slumber for a long time." Be'that happened at a time when humanity had been deprived of the presence of divine prophets for a long time. It was about 600 years after Jesus Christ.
translation.ha: Amirul Muminin (amincin Allah ya tabbata a gare shi) yana fadin cewa: "An aiko shi (Manzon Allah) ne a lokacin da sakonnin manzanni suka tsaya sannan kuma mutane suke cikin damuwa na tsawon lokaci", wato an aiko Manzon Allah (s.a.w.a) ne a daidai lokacin da bil'adama suka dau wani lokaci mai tsawo ba tare da wani annabi daga cikin annabawan Allah ba. Kimanin shekaru dari shida ne tsakanin aiko Annabi Isa (a.s.) da kuma aiko Manzon Allah (s.a.w.a).

translation.en: Humanity had not seen a divine messenger for hundreds of years.
translation.ha: Daruruwan shekaru kenan babu wani ma'aiki na Ubangiji a tsakankanin mutane.

translation.en: What was the result?
translation.ha: Mene ne sakamakon hakan?

translation.en: Allah the Exalted sent the Holy Prophet (s.w.a.) in such a situation.
translation.ha: A irin wannan yanayi ne, Allah Madaukakin Sarki ya aiko da annabi (s.a.w.a.).

translation.en: The Holy Prophet (s.w.a.) was the person who had been prepared by Allah the Exalted for such a great mission in the entire history of mankind.
translation.ha: Annabi (s.a.w.a.) dai ya kasance mutumin da ya dace da wannan yunkuri, wanda Allah Madaukakin Sarki ya shirya shi tsawon lokaci don wannan aiki.

translation.en: Therefore, the Holy Prophet (s.w.a.) managed to start a movement in 23 years, and this movement has pushed human history forward in spite of all the problems.
translation.ha: A saboda haka ne cikin shekaru talatin da biyu (na aiko shi) ya sami damar samar da irin wannan yunkuri wanda har ya zuwa yanzu din nan ake ganinsa kuma ya ci gaba da bunkasa duk kuwa da irin cikas da matsalolin da aka haifar masa.

translation.en: Twenty three years is a short time, and 13 years of it were spent in unfair battles.
translation.ha: Shekaru ashirin da uku dai wani dan karamin lokaci ne.

translation.en: Later on Allah the Exalted prepared the way for the immigration of the Holy Prophet (s.w.a.) to Medina, and he managed to establish this Islamic system and this civilization in Medina.
translation.ha: Daga baya kuma Allah Madaukakin Sarki ya samar da wani yanayi da ya ba wa Manzon Allah (s.a.w.a) damar yin hijira zuwa garin Madina da kuma samar da irin wannan al'umma da irin wannan ci gaba mai girman gaske.

translation.en: The Holy Prophet (s.w.a.) organized, built and managed this system in only ten years. It was a short time.
translation.ha: Shekaru goma kacal Manzon Allah (s.a.w.a) ya dauka wajen gina irin wannan tsari mai karfi da kuma haske; wato wani dan karamin lokaci ne.

translation.en: Such events usually disappear in the flood of other important events, and they are usually forgotten.
translation.ha: A mafi yawan lokuta irin wannan yunkuri ya kan bace da kuma mantawa da shi cikin guguwar da take kunno kai a duniya.

translation.en: Ten years is a very short time. But the Holy Prophet managed to plant, water and nurture this sapling in that period of time. He managed to start a movement that led to a civilization, and this civilization stood at the peak of human civilization during a certain period.
translation.ha: Shekaru goma dai wani dan karamin lokaci ne; to amma a cikin wannan dan lokaci ne Manzon Allah (s.a.w.a) ya sami damar dasa wannan itaciyar, ya ba ta ruwa, ya samar da yanayin da za ta ci gaba da bunkasa, ya samar da wani irin yunkuri wanda ya samar da irin wannan gagarumin ci gaba da isar da dan'adam zuwa ga wani matsayi na koli.

translation.en: That is to say, during the 3rd and 4th centuries of the Hijri calendar, Islamic civilization was greater than all earlier civilizations.
translation.ha: Wato a cikin karnoni na uku da hudu na hijira, a dukkanin fadin duniya na wancan lokacin babu wani ci gaba da kuma hukuma da aka same ta da take da irin wannan ci gaba da kuma daukaka ta Musulunci.

translation.en: This is one of the miracles of Islam.
translation.ha: Wannan ita ce irin fasaha ta Musulunci.

translation.en: In spite of all these things, in spite of the deviations that emerged over time, in spite of the impurities that appeared and grew, the Holy Prophet of Islam and the message of Be'that managed to give rise to that greatness in 3, 4 centuries, and the modern world and all civilizations of the modern world are indebted to Islamic civilization of the 3rd and 4th Hijri centuries.
translation.ha: Duk da irin wadannan abubuwa, wato irin kaucewa hanya da aka yi, da kuma gurbata yanayi da koyarwar Musulunci da aka yi, amma sakon annabi da kuma sakon da ke cikin aiko shi a matsayin manzo ya sami damar samar da irin wannan daukaka cikin karnoni uku zuwa hudu ga dukkanin duniya wanda dukkanin irin ci gaban da ake da shi a duniya ya samo asali ne daga irin wadannan ci gaban da aka samu a karnoni na uku da hudu na hijira.

translation.en: If humanity considered the issue in a fair way, it would acknowledge that human beings' salvation and their movement towards perfection will be possible only through Islam.
translation.ha: Idan har bil'adama suka yi tunani, sannan kuma suka kalli lamurra da mahanga ta adalci, to kuwa za su gaskata cewa lalle za a iya ‘yantar da bil'adama da kuma kai shi ga kamala ne ta hanyar riko da Musulunci.

translation.en: We were ungrateful, and we paid the price. Islam has the capacity to help humanity achieve prosperity and perfection.
translation.ha: Addinin Musulunci yana da irin wannan karfin na isar da bil'adama zuwa ga sa'ada, zuwa ga kamala sannan kuma ya ciyar da shi gaba a fagen abin duniya da kuma na lahira.

translation.en: The foundations that were established by the Holy Prophet (s.w.a.) - faith, rationality, struggle and dignity - are the main foundations of an Islamic community.
translation.ha: Wadannan tushe da Manzon Allah (s.a.w.a) ya gina, wato tushe na imani, tushe na amfani da hankali, tushe na gwagwarmaya, tushe na daukaka, su ne asalin tushen al'ummar musulmi.

translation.en: When these things are revived in a society, that society will definitely follow the path of Islam and the path of the Holy Prophet of Islam (s.w.a.).
translation.ha: A lokacin da aka rayar da wadannan abubuwa a cikin al'umma, to kuwa ko shakka babu mutane za su yi riko da wannan tafarki na Manzon Musulunci mai girma.

translation.en: Thanks to the message of Islam and thanks to the call of our magnanimous Imam, we Iranian people managed to practice part of these things in our life, and we can see the positive results. Today the world of Islam has awakened.
translation.ha: Albarkacin wannan sako na Musulunci, albarkacin wannan kira na mai girma Imam (Khumaini), mu al'ummar Iran mun sami damar aiwatar da wani bangare na (wannan sako) cikin rayuwar mu; kuma a halin yanzu mu na ci gaba da ganin tasirin haka a duniyar musulmi.

translation.en: The movements that we see today in certain North African and Middle Eastern countries are the result of using the light of Islam and following the guidance of the Holy Prophet (s.w.a.).
translation.ha: Wannan yunkuri da a halin yanzu a ke ganin yana faruwa a wasu daga cikin kasashen arewacin Afirka da kuma yankin Gabas ta tsakiya, shi ne dai wannan amfani da aka yi da haske na Musulunci da kuma riko da mahangar annabi Musulunci (s.a.w.a.).

translation.en: Therefore, by Allah's grace, the future of this region and these countries is bright.
translation.ha: A saboda haka cikin yardar Allah da kuma ikonsa makomar wadannan kasashe, makoma ce mai kyau.

translation.en: What we see today in Egypt, Tunisia and certain other countries tell us that a new chapter has begun in the history of this region.
translation.ha: Ma'anar abubuwan da a halin yanzu suke faruwa a kasashen Masar, Tunusiya da sauran kasashe na daban, ita ce cewa tarihin wannan yankin ya sauya sannan kuma an bude wani sabon shafi.

translation.en: The wrong and oppressive balance that western arrogant and colonial powers established in this region 100-150 years ago and imposed it on the destiny of this great and strategic region, has been upset. A new chapter has begun.
translation.ha: Wannan lissafi na zalunci da ke cike da kuskure da ma'abota girman kai da ‘yan mulkin mallaka na kasashen yammaci suka samar da shi a wannan yankin tsawon shekaru dari zuwa dari da hamsin din da suka gabata sannan kuma suke son ya ci gaba da iko a wannan yankin ya dagule, wani sabon yanayi ne ya kunno kai.

translation.en: Of course today western arrogant powers are resisting. They do not want to accept the great and undeniable fact that the regional nations have awakened.
translation.ha: Ko da ya ke kasashen yammaci ma'abota girman kai suna ta amfani da dukkanin karfin da suke da shi; ba sa son su yarda da wannan hakika mai girma da babu wanda ya isa ya yi inkarinsa na cewa al'ummar wannan yankin dai sun farka, kuma suna riko da Musulunci; wannan dai shi ne hakikanin lamarin.

translation.en: The Islamic spirit has been revived in Muslim countries.
translation.ha: Ana iya ganin kishin Musulunci a kasashen musulmi.

translation.en: The puppets of America and the west did something that these nations had no option but to rise up, start an impressive popular movement and carry out a revolution. Therefore, they started following this path. These movements will definitely achieve the desired outcome.
translation.ha: Sarakuna da shugabanni ‘yan amshin shatan Amurka da kasashen yammaci sun yi abubuwan da al'ummomin wadannan kasashen suka ji cewa ba su da wata mafita da kuma hanyar fada da su in ban da yunkuri da juyin juya hali; a saboda haka suka kama wannan hanyar sannan kuma suna ci gaba da tafiya a kanta.

translation.en: Of course westerners are making a lot of efforts.
translation.ha: Tabbas ‘yan kasashen yammaci suna tsananin kokarin su.

translation.en: Today all propaganda, political and economic organizations of America and some of its mercenaries in the region are trying to derail these popular revolutions and these great uprisings. They are trying to hide and deny the Islamic aspect of these movements. They are trying to deceive the people and install individuals who would help them change all the equations in favor of the west again.
translation.ha: A yau dukkanin cibiyoyin farfaganda da siyasa da tattalin arziki na Amurka da wasu daga cikin ‘yan amshin shatansu na wannan yankin suna ci gaba da gudanar da ayyukansu wajen karkatar da wannan yunkuri na mutane, wannan gagarumin juyin juya hali daga asalin hanyarsa; su boye bangarensa na Musulunci, su boye hakan, su yi inkarin hakan; su samar da wasu da za su yaudari mutane da mai da dukkanin wadannan abubuwan da suka faru ta yadda za su zamanto masu amfani ga kasashen yammacin.

translation.en: They are trying to do these things, but their efforts are futile. Nations have awakened.
translation.ha: Suna nan suna ci gaba da wannan kokarin, to amma ba za su kai ga gaci ba; saboda al'umma dai sun farka.

translation.en: When a nation awakens, when a nation enters the arena in a courageous way, it is not possible to dissuade or deceive it.
translation.ha: A lokacin da al'umma suka farka, a lokacin da al'umma suka shigo fage, suka sadaukar da rayukansu, to kuwa babu yadda za'a yi a mayar da su baya, ba za a iya yaudararsu ba.

translation.en: We hope that the path of the Muslim nations that have revolted - and those nations that have the potential to revolt - will be continued and that this path will become as short as possible.
translation.ha: Muna fatan wannan tafarki da ke cike da wahalhalu da kuma wadanda suke tafiya a kansa, zai ci gaba sannan da kuma samun nasarar isa ga inda yake son isa cikin gaggawa.

translation.en: The end result is certain although the path might be long or short. Today the Americans are trying to derail these revolutions with the help of the Zionists and some of their allies and mercenaries in the region.
translation.ha: A yau Amurkawa bisa taimakon yahudawan sahyoniya da kuma wasu ‘yan amshin shatansu na wannan yankin suna ta kokarin su wajen ganin sun karkatar da wannan yunkurin, su sami iko a kansa, to amma babu wata fa'ida cikin hakan.

translation.en: These problems are natural.
translation.ha: A saboda haka wadannan matsaloli suna nan.

translation.en: Therefore, these problems exist. Today you see that they create internal disputes in Egypt and other places.
translation.ha: A yau ana iya ganin yadda suka haifar da sabani na cikin gida a kasar Masar da sauran wajaje na daban, suna haifar da rikici kuma ko shakka babu ma za su yi kashe-kashe.

translation.en: The solution is to awaken the people and prominent figures - scientific and political figures and empathetic government officials who care about the destiny of their country. They should be vigilant.
translation.ha: Maganin hakan shi ne wannan farkawa ta al'umma, farkawa ta masana; kwararru a fagen ilimi, a fagen siyasa da kuma jami'ai masu kishi da suka damu da makomar al'umma.

translation.en: They should be careful, and by Allah's favor, the work will be continued in the best possible way.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne su farka, su lura, sannan kuma insha Allahu su ci gaba da gudanar da ayyukansu ta hanyar da ta fi dacewa.

translation.en: This is the manifestation of the continuation of the Holy Prophet's (s.w.a.) be'that and the prophetic movement.
translation.ha: Hakan shi ne wannan ci gaba na sakon aiko annabi da kuma wannan yunkuri na annabi wanda a yau ake ganinsa da irin wannan yanayi.

translation.en: Oppressed nations are after their dignity, the same dignity that was one of the pillars of the Holy Prophet's (s.w.a.) call to Islam.
translation.ha: Al'ummomin da ake zalunta suna neman tabbatar da karamar su ne; wannan daukaka da karama dai daya ne daga cikin tushen wannan sako na Annabi.

translation.en: Enemies, arrogant powers, occupiers and interferers exploited Muslim nations for many years. They also humiliated Muslim nations.
translation.ha: Tsawon shekaru masu yawa, makiya da ma'abota girman kai da ‘yan mulkin mallaka sun amfana da al'ummar mu; sun wulakanta su da kaskantar da su.

translation.en: When a nation enjoys the blessing of Islam, it will be after dignity.
translation.ha: To sai dai a lokacin da al'umma suka riki Musulunci, za su zamanto masu neman daukaka da kuma karama.

translation.en: This is the Islamic movement.
translation.ha: Hakan shi ne dai wannan yunkuri na Musulunci.

translation.en: This is what the Islamic movement means.
translation.ha: Wannan ita ce ma'anar yunkurin Musuluncin.

translation.en: They should not keep themselves busy with pointless and unimportant disputes.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne masanan kasashen musulmi su farka; kada su shagaltar da kawukansu da kananan abubuwa; su nesanci sabani na mazhaba, sabani na kabilanci, sabani na zauki da bahasi na gefe.

translation.en: We Iranian people are happy to see that Muslim nations are after their freedom and dignity.
translation.ha: Mu al'ummar Iran muna farin ciki da kuma jin dadin cewa al'ummar musulmi sun yunkura sannan kuma sun dawo da ‘yanci da kuma karamarsu.

translation.en: Since the victory of the Islamic Revolution in Iran, the positions of the Revolution have been clear on regional issues, regional movements and regional uprisings.
translation.ha: Tun farkon nasarar juyin juya halin Musulunci a kasar Iran, matsayar wannan juyi dangane da abubuwan da ke faruwa a wannan yanki da kuma yunkurin da suke yi a fili take.

translation.en: Wherever a movement is opposed to the arrogant powers, Zionism and the usurping Zionist regime, we support that movement.
translation.ha: A duk inda aka sami wani yunkuri na tinkarar ma'abota girman kai, wajen tinkarar yahudawan sahyoniya, wajen tinkarar gwamnatin ‘yan fashi ta yahudawan sahyoniya a kasar Palastinu abar kauna, to kuwa za mu goyi bayan wannan yunkurin.

translation.en: Wherever a movement is against America, against America's international dictatorship - against domestic dictators, wherever a movement seeks to claim national rights, we support that movement. Everybody should be vigilant. We should be vigilant, and other nations should also be vigilant.
translation.ha: A duk inda aka sami wani yunkuri na fada da Amurka, na fada da wannan ‘yar kama-karya ta kasa da kasa - wanda a yau kasar Amurka ita ce babbar ‘yar mulkin kama-karya ta kasa da kasa- a duk inda aka sami wani yunkuri na fada da ‘yan mulkin kama-karya na cikin gida wajen tabbatar da hakkokin al'ummomi, to lalle mu za mu goyi bayan wannan yunkurin.

translation.en: They should know that the plots of the enemies are diverse and complex.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne kowa ya yi taka tsantsan; mu din nan mu yi taka tsantsan, haka nan al'ummomi; su san cewa dasisa da makirce-makircen makiya suna da yawa da kuma rudun gaske.

translation.en: We should consider insight as the criterion for our work.
translation.ha: A saboda haka wajibi ne mu dauki basira a matsayin ma'aunin ayyukan mu.
