translation.en: Nations should pay attention to the fact that the Americans, the Zionists and their allies and mercenaries are trying to derail the revolutions. They focus their attention on the countries that have awakened. They do whatever they can to derail the movement of these nations.
translation.ha: Ya kamata al'ummomi su lura, Amurkawa da yahudawan sahyoniya da ‘yan amshin shatansu suna ta kokari wajen ganin sun karkatar da wadannan yunkurin; suna sanya idanuwansu kan kasashen da aka sami irin wannan farkawa ta Musulunci a cikinsu; duk wani abin da za su iya suna yi wajen ganin sun karkatar da wannan yunkuri da kuma wadannan al'ummomi.

translation.en: The oppressed Bahraini nation is like the Egyptian nation, the Tunisian nation and the Yemeni nation. They are all in the same situation. It is meaningless to distinguish between the movements of these nations.
translation.ha: Al'ummar kasar Bahrain da ake zalunta tamkar mutanen Masar da Tunusiya suke; abin da (mutanen Masar da Tunusiya) suke so shi ne abin da (mutanen Bahrain) suke nema; babu wata ma'ana cikin bambanta tsakaninsu.

translation.en: Unfortunately we see that instead of paying attention to what nations want, some people follow the path and make the move that the enemies of these nations want.
translation.ha: Abin bakin cikin shi ne cewa muna ganin wasu mutane wadanda maimakon su lura da abubuwan da suke cikin zukatan mutane, amma sai suka kama hanyar da makiya suke tafiya a kanta.

translation.en: Today in order to simulate what was done in Egypt, Tunisia, Yemen, Libya and other such countries, America has realized that it should create problems for Syria - which is moving on the path of resistance.
translation.ha: A yau kasar Amurka ta hanyar kokarin kwatanta abubuwan da ke faruwa a kasashen Masar, Tunusiya da Yemen da Libiya da makamantansu da abin da ke faruwa a kasar Siriya - wacce kasa ce da take sahun gaba na gwagwarmaya - suna ta kokarin haifar mata da matsala.

translation.en: The nature of the issue in Syria is different from the nature of the issue in these countries.
translation.ha: Akwai bambanci tsakanin abin da ke faruwa a kasar Siriya da abin da ke faruwa a sauran kasashen.

translation.en: In these countries, the movements were anti-America and anti-Zionism, but America is clearly involved in Syria. The Zionists are following up the issue.
translation.ha: A wadannan kasashen yunkuri ne na fada da Amurka da yahudawan sahyoniya, amma a kasar Siriya kan a fili a ke iya ganin hannayen Amurka da kuma yahudawan sahyoniya (cikin abubuwan da ke faruwa).

translation.en: We should not make a mistake.
translation.ha: Bai kamata mu yi kuskure ba.

translation.en: We should not forget our standard.
translation.ha: Bai kamata mu mance da ma'aunin mu ba.

translation.en: We will preserve this logic and this insight.
translation.ha: Lalle za mu kiyaye wannan mahangar da kuma wannan mizanin.

translation.en: Of course we know that the enemies of the Islamic Republic will get angry and will increase their machinations against us.
translation.ha: Ko da ya ke mun san cewa makiya tsarin Jamhuriyar Musulunci za su yi fushi sannan kuma za su kara irin makircin da suke kulla mana.

translation.en: We have resisted in the face of these machinations.
translation.ha: To mu dai a tsaye mu ke kyam wajen tinkarar wannan makirci na su.

translation.en: The Iranian nation has resisted in the face of different kinds of machinations over the past 30 years.
translation.ha: Tsawon wadannan shekaru talatin din al'ummar mu ta tsaya kyam wajen tinkarar wadannan makirce-makirce na makiya daban-daban.

translation.en: They pin their hopes on certain events that happen in the country. Fortunately different organizations are doing their duty with hope and enthusiasm today. You see how much work has been done in the country during the recent years.
translation.ha: (Na'am) suna jin dadin wasu abubuwan da suke faruwa a cikin gida sannan kuma rayukansu suna farin ciki. To amma abin farin cikin shi ne cewa a yau cibiyoyi daban-daban na kasar nan suna ci gaba da gudanar da ayyukan su cikin fata da shauki.

translation.en: We used to import oil products, but we turned into a country that exports these products. Thankfully the country is active in different areas.
translation.ha: Mu dai mun kasance kasa ce da take shigo da albarkatun man fetur amma a yanzu mun zamanto masu fitar da su waje. Alhamdu lillahi a fagage daban-daban ana ci gaba da gudanar da ayyuka daban-daban.

translation.en: The mutual attempt by the administration and the Majlis to downsize the government is a very important and great measure. These things should be followed up, and by Allah's favor, they will be.
translation.ha: Shi kansa wannan lamari na rage ma'aikatun gwamnati - wato ayyukan da gwamnati da majalisa suka aiwatar da su - aiki ne mai matukar muhimmanci da kuma girma; wajibi ne a ci gaba da shi kuma da yardar Allah za a ci gaba din.

translation.en: By Allah's favor, the Iranian nation and government officials will manage to turn the hope of the enemies of the Iranian nation into despair through their resistance, unity, inexhaustible faith in divine assistance and cooperation. I pray to Allah the Exalted to increase His blessings on this nation.
translation.ha: Al'ummar Iran ta hanyar wannan tsayin daka na ta, da wannan gwagwarmaya nata, da wannan hadin kai da take da shi, da kuma irin fatan da take da shi na taimakon Ubangiji, haka nan kuma jami'an gwamnati ta hanyar hadin kan da suke da shi da kuma aiki kafada da kafada da junansu, da yardar Allah a wannan karon ma za mu iya mayar da fatan da makiya suke da shi a kan al'ummar Iran zuwa ga yanke kauna da kuma shan kashi.

translation.en: By the blessedness of this holy day, this auspicious Eid and the soul of the Last Prophet (s.w.a.), I hope God will bestow His blessings and assistance on the Iranian nation and other Muslim nations.
translation.ha: Muna rokon Allah Madaukakin Sarki da Ya kara albarkokinsa ga wannan al'umma; sannan kuma (muna rokonSa) da ya shigar da al'ummar Iran da sauran al'ummar musulmi cikin falala da taimakonsa albarkacin wannan rana mai girma da wannan idi mai albarka da kuma samuwar Cikamakin Annabawa.

translation.en: I hope He will make the holy heart of the Imam of the Age (may our souls be sacrificed for his sake) satisfied with us.
translation.ha: Haka nan kuma muna fatan ran mai girma Bakiyatullah (rayukanmu su zamanto fansa a gare shi) zai yi farin cikin da kuma yarda da mu.

translation.en: Leader's Message Condemning Insult to the Holy Quran - Khamenei.ir
translation.ha: Sakon Jagora Sakamakon Cin Mutumcin Alkur'ani Mai Girma

translation.en: In the Name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful
translation.ha: Da Sunan Allah Mai Rahama Mai Jin Kai

translation.en: Surely We have revealed the Reminder, and surely We are its Guardian. [The Holy Quran, 15:9]
translation.ha: Allah Madaukakin Sarki Yana fadin cewa: "Lalle mu ne muka saukar da ambato (Alkur'ani mai girma) kuma lalle mu masu kare shi ne" (Suratul Hijr;9).

translation.en: Dear Iranian nation, Great Islamic Ummah,
translation.ha: Al'ummar Iran madaukaka da kuma al'ummar musulmi masu girma

translation.en: The insane, hateful, and disgusting insult to the Holy Quran in the United States which took place under police protection is a bitter and important event which cannot be considered as only an insane move by a number of worthless mercenaries.
translation.ha: Hakika cin mutum rashin hankali sannan kuma abin kyama da aka yi a Alkur'ani mai girma a kasar Amurka sannan kuma a karkashin tsaron 'yan sandan kasar Amurkan, lalle lamari ne mai sosa rai sannan kuma mai girma wanda ba za a iya kallonsa kawai a matsayin wani yunkuri na wadansu marasa hankali sannan kuma 'yan amshin shata ba.

translation.en: This is a calculated move by centers which have pursued the policy of Islamophobia and anti-Islamism for many years. And they have fought against Islam and the Holy Quran by using hundreds of methods and thousands of propaganda and operational tools.
translation.ha: A'a, wannan wani yunkuri ne da wasu cibiyoyin da shekara da shekaru suke gudanar da siyasar adawa da Musulunci suka tsara shi wadanda kuma suke amfani da daruruwan hanyoyi da kayan aiki na farfaganda wajen fada da addinin Musulunci da kuma Alkur'ani mai girma.

translation.en: This is another link in the disgraceful chain that was formed by the treachery of the apostate Salman Rushdie and was continued by the hundreds of anti-Islam Hollywood movies and the move by the wicked Danish caricaturist. These moves have now led to this hateful theatre. Who and what is behind these evil moves?
translation.ha: Wannan silsila ce ta ayyukan ban haushi da kunya wadanda suka faro daga ha'incin da Salman Rushdie wanda ya bar Musulunci sannan kuma ya ci gaba ta hanyar zanen batanci da wani mai zanen kasar Denmark har zuwa ga gomomin fina-finan kamfanin shirya fina-finai na Hollywood don bata sunan Musulunci sannan a halin yanzu kuma ya kai ga wannan danyen aiki abin kyama.

translation.en: Analyzing this evil process - which was accompanied during the recent years by criminal operations in Afghanistan, Iraq, Palestine, Lebanon, and Pakistan - leaves no doubt about the fact that the process is planned and controlled by the heads of the domineering powers and Zionist think tanks which wield the greatest influence on the US government, its military and security organizations, the British government and some European governments.
translation.ha: Binciken irin wadannan ayyuka na ashararanci wadanda suke gudana cikin wadannan shekaru sakamakon ayyukan ta'addancin da suke faruwa a kasar Afghanistan da Iraki da Palastinu da Labanon da Pakistan, ko shakka babu zai tabbatar da cewa masu shiryawa da kuma aiwatar da irin wannan danyen aiki suna hannun shugabannin gwamnatocin 'yan mulkin mallaka da cibiyoyin tunani na yahudawan sahyoniya wadanda suka sami kutsawa da bakin magana cikin gwamnatin Amurka da hukumomin tsaro da leken asirinsu sannan da kuma gwamnatin Ingila da wasu gwamnatocin kasashen Turai.

translation.en: The purpose of the recent disgusting action is on the one hand to extend opposition against Islam and Muslims to all levels of Christian communities, to put a religious façade on such opposition, and to gain support from religious biases and concerns through the use of churches and priests. On the other hand, they intend to divert the attention of Muslim nations from the issues and developments of the Muslim world and the Middle East by causing them to be enraged and offended by this great offence.
translation.ha: Manufar wannan danyen aiki abin kyama na baya-bayan nan ita ce a shigo da wannan fada Musulunci da musulmi cikin al'ummar kirista sannan kuma ta hanyar shigo da coci da malaman coci a ba shi wata siffa ta addini da kuma goyon baya na addini sannan a bangare guda kuma a mantar da al'ummar musulmi wadanda wanda lamari zai sosa musu rai daga muhimman lamurran da suke faruwa a kasashen musulmi da kuma yankin gabas ta tsakiya.

translation.en: This spiteful action is not simply the beginning of a movement. Rather, it is one of the stages of the long process of anti-Islamism that is led by the Zionist regime and the US.
translation.ha: Hakika wannan danyen aiki ba wai wani mafari ne na wani yunkuri ba, face dai wata marhala ce ta tsohuwar adawa da Musulunci da yahudawan sahyoniya da gwamnatin Amurka suke da ita.

translation.en: All the heads of the arrogant powers and Aimmatul Kufr [leaders of Kufr] have now stood against Islam. Islam is the religion of human freedom and morality and the Holy Quran is the book of mercy, wisdom, and justice. It is the duty of all freedom seekers of the world and followers of Abrahamic religions to stand by Muslims and oppose the evil policy of Islamophobia which is being carried out through such disgusting methods.
translation.ha: A halin yanzu dukkanin ma'abota girman kan duniya da shugabannin kafirci sun tsaya kyam wajen fuskantar Musulunci, Musulunci wannan addini na 'yanci da kyautata ruhin bil'adama da kuma Alkur'ani wannan littafi na rahama da hikima da adalci; a saboda haka nauyin da ke wuyan dukkanin ma'abota 'yanci na duniya da kuma dukkanin mabiya saukakkun addinai na duniya shi ne su hada hannu waje guda tare da musulmi wajen fada da wannan bakar siyasa ta adawa da Musulunci ta wannan mummunar hanya.

translation.en: The heads of the US government will not be acquitted of complicity in this hideous event through their use of hollow and deceiving remarks.
translation.ha: Shugabannin Amurka ba za su iya tsamar da hannayensu daga tuhumar da ake yi musu na hannu cikin wannan danyen aiki ta hanyar maganganu na fatar baki da yaudara ba.

translation.en: All the rights and honor of millions of innocent Muslims in Afghanistan, Pakistan, Iraq, Lebanon, and Pakistan as well as what they hold sacred have been trampled underfoot for many years.
translation.ha: Shekara da shekaru kenan ake take cin mutumci da take hakkokin miliyoyin musulmin da ake zalunta na kasashen Afghaninstan da Pakistan, Iraki da Labanon da Palastinu.

translation.en: Hundreds of thousands of people have been killed, tens of thousands of men and women have been enslaved and tortured, thousands of children and women have been abducted, and millions of people have been paralyzed and disabled.
translation.ha: An kashe dubban daruruwa, dubban gomomin maza da mata ne ake tsare da su da kuma ci gaba da gana musu azaba, dubban kananan yara da matan da aka sace sannan kuma miliyoyin da aka raunana su da sanya su zama 'yan gudun hijira marasa matsuguni, dukkanin wadannan abubuwa ayyukan su wane ne?

translation.en: Why do western media introduce Muslims as the symbol of violence and Islam and the Holy Quran as a danger for humanity despite all such innocence?
translation.ha: Duk da irin wannan zalunci da aka yi musu, me ya sa a cikin kafafen watsa labarai da jaridun kasashen yammaci ake bayyana musulmi a matsayin alamar ta'addanci sannan Alkur'ani kuma a matsayin babban hatsari ga bil'adama?

translation.en: Who can believe that this vast plot is probable and practical without the assistance of the Zionist circles operating within the US government?
translation.ha: Wane ne zai yarda cewa dukkanin wadannan abubuwa masu yiyuwa ne ba tare da hannun yahudawan sahyoniya wadanda suke kewaye da gwamnatin Amurka ba?

translation.en: Muslim brothers and sisters from Iran and all parts of the world,
translation.ha: Ya ku 'yan'uwa musulmi na Iran da sauran kasashen duniya!

translation.en: I deem it necessary to mention a few points to everyone.
translation.ha: Lalle ina ganin wajibi ne in yi ishara da kuma tunatarwa kan wadansu batutuwa:

translation.en: First, this event and the preceding events clearly show that what is being targeted by the global arrogant powers is the essence of Islam and the Holy Quran.
translation.ha: Na farko: Wannan lamari da sauran lamurran da suka gabata a fili suna nuni da cewa wanda ake nufi cikin wadannan hare-hare na soji shi ne Musulunci abin kauna da kuma Alkur'ani mai girma.

translation.en: The blatant opposition of the arrogant powers against the Islamic Republic is a result of the clear opposition of the Islamic Republic against the global arrogance.
translation.ha: Fitowa fili da ma'abota girman kai na duniya suke yi wajen fada da jamhuriyar Musulunci ta Iran ya samo asali ne sakamakon irin fitowa filin da jamhuriyar Musulunci ta Iran wajen fada da ma'abota girman kai.

translation.en: And pretending not to be hostile towards Islam and other Muslims is a great lie and evil deception.
translation.ha: Sannan kuma bayyanar da cewa ba sa adawa da Musulunci da kuma musulmi karya ce tsagoronta da kuma yaudara ta shaidanci.

translation.en: They are opposed to Islam and everyone who is committed to it.
translation.ha: Lalle wadannan mutane suka adawa da kuma gaba da Musulunci da kuma duk wanda ya yi riko da shi da kuma duk wani abin da ke nuni da Musulunci.

translation.en: Second, this chain of spiteful actions against Islam and Muslims is the result of the fact that the light of Islam has been brighter than ever before during the past few decades and that the influence of Islam on the hearts has been increased more than ever before both in the Muslim world and even in the west.
translation.ha: Na biyu: Wannan adawa da Musulunci da musulmi ya samo asali ne sakamakon irin hasken da tauraruwar Musulunci ta ke yi ne sama da dukkanin shekarun da suka gabata da kuma irin gindin zaman da (Musulunci) ya samu cikin zukatan al'ummar musulmi a kasashen musulmi kai hatta ma a kasashen yammacin.

translation.en: These actions are the result of the fact that the Muslim world is more aware than ever before and that Muslims are determined to break the chain of two centuries of domination and invasion by the arrogant powers.
translation.ha: Ya samo asali ne sakamakon irin farkawar da al'ummar musulmi suke samu sama da shekarun baya sannan kuma al'ummar musulmin sun yi azamar kawo karshen sarkar mulkin mallaka na karnoni biyu da kuma girman kan ma'abota girman kai.

translation.en: The insult to the Holy Quran and the Holy Prophet (s.w.a.) is an event which represents a great promise despite its bitter nature.
translation.ha: Wannan lamari na batanci ga Alkur'ani mai girma da kuma Manzon Allah, tsira da amincin Allah su tabbata a gare shi da Alayensa, duk kuwa da irin sosa ran da ke cikin hakan, amma dai yana dauke da wata bishara mai girma.

translation.en: The brilliant rays of the Holy Quran will become brighter on a daily basis.
translation.ha: Lalle hasken Alkur'ani mai girma zai kara bayyana.

translation.en: Third, we should all know that the recent event has nothing to do with churches and Christianity. And the puppet-like moves of some insane priests and mercenaries should not be written down in the record of Christians and their religious men.
translation.ha: Na Uku: Wajibi ne kowa da kowa ya san cewa wannan lamari na baya-bayan nan ba shi da wata alaka da coci da kuma addinin kirista, sannan kuma bai kamata a dora ayyukan wauta da rashin mafadi na wani malamin coci dan amshin shata ga kiristoci da ma'abota addini ba.

translation.en: Muslims will never do similar actions with regard to what is held sacred in other religions.
translation.ha: Lalle mu musulmi ba za mu taba aikata irin wannan aiki ga ababe masu tsarki na sauran addinai ba.

translation.en: Fourth, it is now the US government and its policymakers that all Muslims hold responsible. If they are honest in claiming that they are not involved in the events, they should properly penalize the main elements behind this great crime and the perpetrators of this crime who caused pain in the hearts of one and half billion Muslims.
translation.ha: Na hudu: Abokan hamayyar musulmi dukkanin musulmi a yau ita ce gwamnatin Amurka da 'yan siyasarta, idan har da gaske suke yi cewa ba su da hannu cikin wannan danyen aiki, to wajibi ne su hukumta asalin wadanda suka tsara da kuma wadanda suka aiwatar da wannan danyen aikin da ya sosa zukatan musulmi biliyan daya da rabi na duniya, hukumcin da ya dace.

translation.en: Greetings be upon Allah's pious servants
translation.ha: Amincin Allah ya tabbata ga bayinSa salihai.

translation.en: Sayyid Ali Khamenei
translation.ha: Sayyid Ali Khamenei

translation.en: Shahrivar 22, 1389
translation.ha: 22, Shahrivar 1389

translation.en: Leader’s New Year Address - Khamenei.ir
translation.ha: Sakon Jagora Na Sabuwar Shekarar 1390 Hijira Shamsiyya

translation.en: I would like to congratulate my dear countrymen across the country, all Iranians living in different parts of the world and all nations that value Norouz [Iranian New Year] on the auspicious occasion of Norouz and the beginning of spring and the new year.
translation.ha: A daidai lokacin da sabuwar shekara ta hijira shamsiyya ta 1390 ta shigo ne Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci Ayatullah Sayyid Ali Khamenei ya fitar da wani sako na taya murna ga al'ummar Iran da sauran al'ummomin da suke gudanar da wannan bukin a ranar 21, Maris 2009. Abin da ke biye fassara wannan sako ne:

translation.en: I would like to congratulate my dear countrymen across the country, all Iranians living in different parts of the world and all nations that value Norouz [Iranian New Year] on the auspicious occasion of Norouz and the beginning of spring and the new year.
translation.ha: Ina isar da sakon taya murnar Idin Norouz da shigowar bazara da kuma sabuwar shekara ga dukkanin 'yan'uwanmu 'yan kasar Iran masu girma a duk fadin kasar nan haka nan kuma ga dukkanin Iraniyawa da suke wasu kasashe na daban a duk fadin duniya da kuma sauran al'ummomin da suke girmama Idin Norouz.

translation.en: In particular I would like to extend my congratulations to the individuals and families who are rendering services to the country, the Revolution and the Islamic system, the families of our dear martyrs, our disabled war veterans and their families and the families of those who have sensitive and important duties and cannot be with their families during these holidays.
translation.ha: Har ila yau ina mika sakon taya murna na musamman ga mutane da iyalan da suke hidima wa wannan kasa da wannan juyin juya hali da kuma wannan tsari (na Musulunci); iyalan shahidai masu girma, wadanda suka sami raunuka da kuma iyalansu, da iyalan ma'aikata da jami'an da a wadannan ranaku suke ci gaba da gudanar da ayyukansu a daidai lokacin da sauran mutane suke tare da iyalansu su kuwa an hana su kasancewa tare da na su iyalan.

translation.en: I hope, by Allah's grace and favor, the people of Iran will have a happy year full of divine blessings. I hope the Iranian people will be successful in all arenas.
translation.ha: Ina rokon Allah Madaukakin Sarki cikin falala da rahamarSa Ya sanya wannan shekara ta zamanto shekarar da take cike da ababen farin ciki da albarkoki da ni'imomi ga al'ummar Iran sannan da kuma samun nasara a dukkanin fagage.

translation.en: Of course the bitter tragedies that are being imposed on the people of certain countries - such as Bahrain, Yemen and Libya - prevent us from fully enjoying the New Year celebrations.
translation.ha: Ko shakka babu ababe masu sosa rai da suke faruwa a wasu kasashe - abubuwan da ake yi wa mutanen Bahrain, Yemen da Libya - abubuwa ne da suka rage mana jin dadin wannan idi na mu da kuma hana mu jin dadi da farin cikin cikinsa.

translation.en: I hope Allah the Exalted will soon bestow deliverance on the people of these countries - the people of Bahrain, the people of Yemen and the people of Libya. I hope Allah the Exalted will punish the enemies of these nations.
translation.ha: Ina rokon Allah Madaukakin Sarki da ya gaggauta samar da mafita ga wadannan al'ummomi - wato al'ummar Bahrain, al'ummar Yemen da al'ummar Libya - sannan kuma ya azabtar da makiyan al'ummomi da azabar da ta dace da su.

translation.en: Eid shows the natural progression of man through the year, month, day and night.
translation.ha: Idi wata alama ce ta yunkuri ta dabi'a ta mutum tsawon shekara da wata da kuma dare da rana.

translation.en: And because this progression should be towards perfection and transcendence, each Eid enables man to enter a new stage in life.
translation.ha: To da yake wajibi ne wannan yunkuri ya zamanto yunkuri ne zuwa ga kamala da daukaka, don haka kowace ranar idi wani lokaci ne da ya kamata mutum ya yi amfani da shi wajen fara taka wani sabon mataki (cikin rayuwarsa).

translation.en: By Allah's grace and favor, we Iranian people managed to make great accomplishments in the year 1389.
translation.ha: Cikin yardar Allah da kuma taimakonSa mu din nan al'ummar Iran mun sami nasarar aiwatar da manyan ayyuka a shekarar (bara) ta 1389.

translation.en: I named the year 1389 as "The Year of Intensified Effort and Labor".
translation.ha: Mun sanya wa shekarar 1389 sunan "Shekarar Rubanya Himma Da Kuma Aiki Tukuru".

translation.en: Fortunately this slogan was practiced throughout the year. I can claim that over the past years "Intensified Effort and Labor" was the most successful slogan in terms of attracting the attention of the people and government officials, and it closely corresponded to the situation of the country.
translation.ha: Lalle muna iya ikirarin cewa daya daga cikin taken da mutane da jami'ai suka ba su muhimmanci da kuma aiwatar da su cikin yanayi na kasar nan shi ne dai wannan take na " Rubanya Himma Da Kuma Aiki Tukuru", wanda alal hakika tsawon wannan shekarar mutane da gwamnati sun nuna yi tukuru da kuma himma ba kama hannun yaro cikin ayyuka da yunkurinsu.

translation.en: Fortunately the people and the government truly showed intensified effort and labor throughout the year.
translation.ha: Lalle mu din nan a fagagen tattalin arziki, a fagen siyasa, a fagen shigowar mutane fage daban-daban na siyasa da juyin juya hali, a fagen ilimi da fasaha da fagen siyasar waje, a bangarori daban-daban, lalle mun shaidi faruwar manyan ayyukan da jami'an gwamnati, bangaren gudanarwa ne, ko bangaren majalisar da ma'aikatar shari'a, lalle sun aikata manyan ayyuka; musamman ma bangaren gudanarwa na gwamnati (shugaban kasa da 'yan majalisar ministoci) wanda ta gudanar da ayyuka masu girman gaske tsawon wannan shekarar wanda daya daga cikinsu shi ne wannan lamari na mai girma da wahala na manufantar da irin rangwamin da gwamnati take bayarwa kayayyakin bukatun yau da kullum, wanda sun fara wannan aiki mai girma.

translation.en: In general I feel that thankfully our nation is moving well on the path of progress and transcendence.
translation.ha: Abin da a yanayi na gaba daya nake ji a jikina, shi ne cewa alhamdu lillahi kasar mu ta kama hanyar ci gaba da kuma daukaka.

translation.en: Of course this movement, which has gained further momentum on a daily basis, is the result of many years of efforts by our people and government officials. But this movement has gained further momentum with the passage of time.
translation.ha: Ko da yake wannan yunkuri a kowace rana yana kara girma ne wanda hakan ya samo asali ne sakamakon wahala da kuma kokarin jami'ai da al'umma tsawon shekara da shekaru; amma abin farin cikin shi ne cewa gwargwadon yadda wannan yunkuri yake ci gaba, gwargwadon yadda yake kara girma da samun ci gaba.

translation.en: For example, in the arena of production of knowledge, according to the figures presented by global and international centers, the contribution of our country to global scientific progress and production of knowledge is more than 11 percent. This is while our people make up only one percent of the population of the world.
translation.ha: A matsayin misali a fagen samar da ilimi, bisa ga bayanan cibiyoyi na duniya da kasa da kasa sun bayyana cewar irin ci gaban da kasar mu ta samu a fagen ci gaban ilimi da samar da ilimi yana a matsayin kashi 11 cikin dari ne na duniya; alhali kuwa mu din nan kashi daya cikin dari ne na al'ummomin duniya sannan kuma kasar da take biye mana a wannan yankin tana kasa da kashi shida cikin dari.

translation.en: Therefore, our country has thankfully made good progress in different areas.
translation.ha: A saboda haka ci gaban da kasar nan take samu a fagage daban-daban, alhamdu lillahi, ci gaba ne mai kyaun gaske.

translation.en: Among the national issues - which should be the focus of our determined efforts in the year 1390 - economic matters are one of the most essential tools which are used by the enemies of our people to counter our nation.
translation.ha: Abin da ake iya ganinsa cikin batutuwa daban-daban na kasar nan wanda wajibi ne a wannan shekara ta 1390 a ba su muhimmanci da kuma himma sosai shi ne irin makircin da makiyan al'ummar mu da kasar mu suke aikatawa don cutar da mu a fagen tattalin arziki.

translation.en: Of course they are active in cultural, political and scientific arenas as well, but they are much more active in the arena of economic matters.
translation.ha: Ko da yake a fagen al'adu ma dai suna gudanar da ayyukansu, a fagen siyasa ma suna gudanar da ayyukansu, a fagen takaita ilimi ga kansu ma suna gudanar da ayyukansu, to sai dai abubuwan da suke gudanarwa a fagen tattalin arziki ya fi yawa.

translation.en: The sanctions which were imposed on us by the enemies of our nation were an attempt to thwart the accelerated progress of our country.
translation.ha: Shi kansa wannan takunkumin da makiyan al'ummar Iran suka share fagensa ko kuma suka aiwatar da shi a kan al'ummar Iran, manufar hakan ita ce cutar da irin ci gaban da kasar nan take samu da kuma dakatar da shi.

translation.en: Of course their wishes were not fulfilled, and they did not manage to get the results they wanted. The measures adopted by our government officials and the cooperation of the people foiled the enemies' plot. But they will not give up.
translation.ha: Ko da yake ba su cimma wannan manufa ta su, wato sun gagara samun sakamakon da suke fatan samu ta hanyar wannan takunkumi; hikimar jami'ai tare da al'umma sun hana su cimma wannan manufa ta su; to sai dai duk da haka ba su hakura ba.

translation.en: Therefore, in the new year, which starts from now, we must pay attention to the most essential issues of the country, and I believe economic matters are the pivot of these issues.
translation.ha: A saboda haka wannan shekarar da cikin hakan ne za mu faro ta, wajibi ne mu ba da himma ga batutuwa na asasi na kasar nan sannan kuma mu ba da dukkanin karfin mu ga batutuwan da suka shafi tattalin arziki.

translation.en: Thus, I hereby name this year as "The Year of Economic Jihad", and I expect our officials - who work for the executive branch, the legislative branch and economic sectors of the country - and our dear people to make selfless efforts in the economic arena.
translation.ha: A saboda haka na sanya wa wannan shekara ta bana sunan "Shekarar Kokarin Bunkasa Tattalin Arziki", sannan kuma ina kiran jami'an kasa, shin na bangaren gwamnati ne, ko kuma 'yan majalisa ko kuma na bangarori daban-daban da suke da alaka da bangaren tattalin arziki, haka nan kuma al'ummar mu masu girma da su ba da himma da kuma yin aiki tukuru a fagen tattalin arziki.

translation.en: It is not enough to move forward at an ordinary pace.
translation.ha: Yunkuri dai wanda aka saba da shi bai wadatar ba; wajibi ne a yi aiki tukuru a wannan fagen.

translation.en: As you know, we are entering the third year of the decade of justice and progress.
translation.ha: Kun san cewa a halin yanzu dai mun shiga shekara ta uku ce cikin shekaru goma na ci gaba da kuma tabbatar da adalci.

translation.en: Of course good achievements have been made both in the arena of progress and to a large extent in the arena of justice, but our movement must be such that we can call this decade the genuine manifestation of progress and establishment of justice.
translation.ha: Tabbas an gudanar da ayyuka masu kyau a fagen ci gaban haka nan kuma ya zuwa wani haddi a fagen tabbatar da adalci, to sai dai wajibi ne ayyukan mu su zamanto ta yadda za mu iya sanya wadannan shekaru goma su zamanto shekaru na samar da ci gaba da kuma tabbatar da adalci na hakika a kasar mu.

translation.en: Fortunately with the movement that has started in the world of Islam, one feels that by Allah's favor this decade will be the decade of progress and justice for the region as well.
translation.ha: Alhamdu lillahi sakamakon wannan yunkuri da aka samar da shi a duniyar musulmi, lalle mutum yana iya jin cewa cikin yardar Allah wadannan shekaru za su zamanto shekaru ne na ci gaba da kuma tabbatar da adalci a wannan yankin.

translation.en: I hope Allah the Exalted will bestow His blessings on you dear people of Iran, on you dear government officials and on you faithful, spirited, active and talented youth. I hope God will help you benefit from the prayers of the Imam of the Age (may our souls be sacrificed for his sake).
translation.ha: Ina rokon Allah Madaukakin Sarki da Ya sanya ku, ku din nan al'ummar Iran, jami'an gwamnati masu girma, ku din nan matasa masu imani da kyakkyawar ruhi da kuma kwarewa cikin tausayawa ta Ubangiji da kuma addu'oin mai girma Bakiyatullah (rayukanmu su zamanto fansa a gare shi).

translation.en: I commemorate our dear martyrs and our magnanimous Imam (r.a.), and I hope that by the blessedness of their souls, Allah the Exalted will bestow His mercy, grace and blessings on the Iranian nation.
translation.ha: Muna jinjinawa shahidanmu masu girma da kuma Imamin mu mai girma (Imam Khumaini) sannan kuma muna rokon Allah Madaukakin Sarki albarkacin ruhi mai tsarki na wadannan manyan bayin Allah da ya tabbatar da rahama da falala da albarkoki da yarda da kuma gafararsa ga al'ummar mu.

translation.en: Leader Meets Navy Officers - Khamenei.ir
translation.ha: Jagora Ya Gana Da Sojojin Ruwa Na Iran A Bandar Abbas

translation.en: He added: "During their long domination over Iran, satanic governments prevented the presence of Iran's Navy in regional and international waters, but today you should make up for the past backwardness by making intensified efforts."
translation.ha: Jagoran ya ci gaba da cewa: Tsawon shekarun da hukumomin dagutu suka yi suna iko da kasar Iran sun hana sojojin ruwan Iran samun ci gaba da kuma kasantuwa a cikin Tekunan wannan yanki da ma na kasa da kasa, to amma a yau kan wajibi ne ku kara himma wajen cike gibin da aka samar tsawon wadannan shekaru.

translation.en: Ayatollah Khamenei referred to the history of the presence of the bullying powers in the Persian Gulf and the Gulf of Oman and said: "Today the conditions are different from the past. And the long coast of this region is being controlled by an independent government and a proud and vigilant nation that knows its national power and determination, a nation that will impose its will on any political and military power and will force it to retreat by relying on God."
translation.ha: Haka nan kuma yayin da ya ke ishara da shekaru aru-aru din da masu tinkaho da karfi suka yi a wannan yanki mai matukar muhimmanci na Tekun Fasha da Tekun Oman kuwa, Ayatullah Khamenei cewa ya yi: Yanayin da ake ciki a yau ya sha bamban da na da nesa ba kusa ba, don kuwa yankunan da ke bakin ruwan wannan yankin yana hannun 'yantacciyar gwamnati da kuma madaukakiyar al'ummar da ta farka ne wacce ta san irin karfi da kuma daukakar da al'ummarta take da su, sannan kuma ta hanyar dogaro da Allah za ta tabbatar da ikonta a kan dukkanin wani karfi na siyasa da soji da kuma tilasta masa ja da baya.

translation.en: The Leader of the Islamic Revolution added: "Thanks to the powerful presence of Islamic Iran, today the Persian Gulf and the Gulf of Oman are free and independent."
translation.ha: Jagoran juyin juya halin Musuluncin wanda kuma shi ne babban kwamandan dakarun kasar Iran ya ci gaba da cewa: A yau Tekun Fasha da Tekun Oman, albarkacin kasantuwar Jamhuriyar Musulunci ta Iran, sun zamanto wani yanki mai cin gashin kansa.

translation.en: Ayatollah Khamenei described the presence of US and European fleets in the region as detrimental and unpleasant and stressed: "The era in which the arrogant powers used to determine the destiny of other nations through their military presence has come to an end. Even if certain regional governments still have a tendency to follow the orders of the arrogant powers, nations of the region are vigilant and they consider foreigners' military presence in the region as a source of insecurity."
translation.ha: Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci ya bayyana kasantuwar jiragen yaki na ruwa na Amurka da wasu kasashen Turai a wannan yanki a matsayin lamari mai cutarwa wanda kuma ba a maraba da shi yana mai cewa: Lokacin da ma'abota girman kan duniya za su tilasta wa al'ummomi abin da suke so ta hanyar amfani da karfin soji ya wuce sannan kuma idan ma har akwai wadansu gwamnatoci na wannan yankin da suke son yin biyayya wa ma'abota girman kan, to al'ummomin wannan yankin dai sun farka sannan kuma suna ganin kasantuwar sojojin bakin haure a matsayin barazana ga wannan yankin.

translation.en: The Commander-in-Chief of the Iranian Armed Forces stressed: "We have not encouraged any country to cause confrontation and war and we will not do so.
translation.ha: Babban kwamandan dakarun kasar Iran din ya ci gaba da cewa: Mu dai ba mu taba tsokanar wata kasa don mu yi yaki da ita ba kuma ba za mu taba yin hakan ba, sannan kuma gwargwadon yadda za mu iya za mu yi kokarin mu wajen ganin mun guje wa duk wani yaki da aka tsara shi ko kuma ya kunno kai haka nan kawai.

translation.en: We will avoid any accidental or calculated confrontation as much as we can, but those who rely on bulling to bring about progress for themselves should feel that they are faced with a powerful nation." His Eminence said that the Navy is the manifestation of the Iranian nation's power at sea.
translation.ha: To amma mutanen da suke ganin za su iya tabbatar da ci gaban su ne kawai ta hanyar amfani da karfi da tursasawa, to wajibi ne su ji cewa lalle akwai wata tsayayyiyar al'umma a gaban su. Jagoran ya bayyana sojojin ruwa a matsayin alama ta tsayin dakan al'ummar Iran a cikin ruwa, don haka ne ya kirayi dakaru masu makamai da suke yankin kudancin Iran din da cewa: Wajibi ne ku ci gaba da wannan kokari da kuke yi cikin gaskiya, tsarkin zuciya da kuma dukkanin karfin da kuke da shi.

translation.en: He urged the Iranian Armed Forces to continue making efforts in a sincere and determined way and added that the Islamic Republic of Iran is indebted to the youth who show the power of the Iranian nation.
translation.ha: Jagoran ya ci gaba da cewa: Kasar Iran da kuma tsarin Jamhuriyar Musulunci na Iran yana da wani nauyi na matasan da suka tabbatar da tsayin dakan wannan al'umma a wuyansa (da wajibi ne ya sauke shi).

translation.en: Leader’s Speech to Army Cadets - Khamenei.ir  The following is the full text of the speech delivered by Ayatollah Khamenei on November 10, 2010 at the graduation ceremony held at Shahid Sattari University.
translation.ha: Shimfida: A ranar laraba (10-11-2010) ce Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci Ayatullah Sayyid Ali Khamenei ya halarci bikin yaye daliban jami'oin soji na Jamhuriyar Musulunci ta Iran da aka gudanar da shi a jami'ar sojin sama ta Shahid Sattari.

translation.en: In the Name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful
translation.ha: Da Sunan Allah Mai Rahama Mai Jin Kai

translation.en: I would like to extend my congratulations to the dear graduates and the faithful youth who have finished their dignified studies and will start their services as members of the Islamic Republic of Iran's Armed Forces and the honorable Army of the Islamic Republic.
translation.ha: Ina taya dalibai masu girma da matasa muminai wadanda suka gama karatunsu sannan kuma daga yau za su fara yin hidimarsu cikin dakaru masu makami da sojojin jamhuriyar Musulunci murnar wannan nasara da suka samu.

translation.en: I would also like to extend my congratulations to the dear youth who received epaulets, and I hope they will continue their education successfully.
translation.ha: Haka nan kuma ina taya matasa masu girma da suka shigo wannan fage sannan kuma cikin yardar Allah za su fara karatunsu a wannan jami'ar.

translation.en: When looking at the issue objectively, our Armed Forces and the Islamic Republic of Iran's Army are at a very favorable level.
translation.ha: Alal hakika a yau din nan dakarun mu masu makami da sojoin Jamhuriyar Musulunci ta Iran suna cikin wani irin yanayi ne mai kyau kuma abin faranta rai.

translation.en: You are superior to other armies in terms of two things. First, your goal is a divine and human goal.
translation.ha: Ta bangarori biyu ku din nan kuna da fifiko a kan sauran sojoji (na duniya): na farko shi ne cewa manufarku wata manufa ce ta Ubangiji da kuma bil'adama.

translation.en: Second, there is a strong heartfelt bond between you and the people.
translation.ha: Na biyu kuma shi ne cewa akwai alaka ta so da kauna a tsakaninku da sauran mutane.

translation.en: In order to provide security, tread the path of glory and achieve material and spiritual well-being, all societies and countries throughout the world are in need of power, and one important part of this power is provided by the armed forces in all societies and countries.
translation.ha: Dukkanin al'ummomin duniya da kasashen duniya a duk lokacin da suke son tabbatar da tsaro da amincinsu da kuma tabbatar da tafarkinsu na daukaka da kuma sama wa al'ummarsu jin dadi na duniya da lahira, lalle suna bukatar tsayin daka; wannan tsayin dakan wanda dakarun kasa masu makami ne suke tabbatar da wani bangare na sa mai muhimmanci.

translation.en: The main difference lies in the fact that the paradigm of power in material systems - which is prevalent in today's world - is different from the paradigm of power in the Islamic system.
translation.ha: Akwai bambanci na asali tsakanin ababen da suke tabbatar da tsayin daka cikin tsari na abin duniya da ke mulkin duniya a yau da kuma abubuwan da suke tabbatar da tsayin daka a tsarin Musulunci.

translation.en: This does not mean that we should ignore weapons. This does not mean that we should view discipline, weapons and training as insignificant. All these things are necessary, but the spirit of these things is the divine sense of responsibility, the feeling of reliance on Allah the Exalted.
translation.ha: Ba wai muna cewa ne mu yi watsi da batun makami ba ne; ko kuma mu yi watsi da tara kayayyakin aiki da horarwa irin ta soji ba ne; dukkanin wadannan abubuwa wajbi ne; to amma ruhinsu - wadanda wadancan abubuwa suna a matsayin jikinsa ne - shi ne jin shu'uri na takalifi na Ubangiji, da jin dogaro da Allah Madaukakin Sarki.

translation.en: This is the factor which makes an army and a nation so strong that material powers become unable to bring them to their knees, and ultimate divine assistance and ultimate victory belong to that nation and army.
translation.ha: Irin wadannan abubuwa su ne suke sanya wasu sojoji, wasu dakaru masu makami da kuma wata al'umma yin irin wannan gwagwarmaya da tsayin dakan da manyan masu karfi na duniya suka gagara durkufar da ita sannan kuma nasara ta karshe tana tare da ita.

translation.en: This is not just at the level of theory. This is not just an expression of our ambitious dreams.
translation.ha: Hakan ba wai kawai a fagen nazariyya ba ne, hakan kuma ba wai wani zato da fata ne da ake da shi ba; wannan wata tajruba ce da aka gwada kuma aka gani.

translation.en: You dear youth can study these realties carefully in the recent history of the country.
translation.ha: Ku din nan kuna iya ganin hakan cikin tarihin kasar ku na ‘yan shekarun baya-bayan nan.

translation.en: The victory of the Iranian nation in the face of the taghuti system is a perfect example of the triumph of spiritual factors over material factors.
translation.ha: Nasarar da al'ummar Iran ta samu a gwagwarmayar da ta yi da tsarin dagutu na kasar nan wani lamari ne da ke nuni da galabar ababe masu kusaci da Ubangiji a kan abubuwan duniya.

translation.en: In this beloved and oppressed homeland, the taghuti, dependent and corrupt regime depended on different means of material power provided by international powers, but it was defeated by an unarmed nation that was equipped with faith and self-confidence.
translation.ha: Tsarin dagutu, tsarin da ya dogara da ‘yan kasashen waje, lalataccen tsari da ya yi mulki a wannan kasar ya dogara ne da abubuwa daban-daban na duniya; to amma kuma duk da hakan ya sha kashi a gaban al'umma da suka fito hannun rabbana wadanda ba su da wani makami in ba makami na imani da dogaro da kai ba.

translation.en: The second experience is the one that the Iranian nation went through during the Sacred Defense Era.
translation.ha: Lamari na biyu da muka gwada muka kuma gani shi ne irin kwarewar da al'ummar Iran suka samu a lokacin kallafaffen yaki.

translation.en: They were doing all of these things in order to defeat the Islamic Republic and the Iranian nation. But amid comprehensive sanctions, especially sanctions on weapons and military equipment, the Iranian nation managed to defeat the enemy that had a mountain of weapons and military equipment at its disposal by relying on its faith, the faith of its youth and the valor of its Armed Forces.
translation.ha: To amma al'ummar Iran, duk da irin takunkumin da take ciki daga dukkanin bangarori, musamman ma takunkumin sayen makamai da sauran kayayyakin yaki, cikin rashi dari bisa dari, amma ta sami nasara a kan wannan makiyi da yake samun taimako na makami da sauransu sakamakon dogaro da imanin da suke da shi, sakamakon dogaro da matasa da jaruntakar sojojinta masu kishi.

translation.en: The same is still true today.
translation.ha: A yau ma haka lamarin ya ke.

translation.en: Just see how much modern weaponry is exported to this region, how much money the countries of the region are spending on this weaponry and how much this profits the owners of military industries of America and the west.
translation.ha: Dogaro da karfi irin na abin duniya, da makaman da abokai da na kurkusa su ke bayarwa - ku din nan kuna ganin irin makamai na zamanin da ake shigo da su wannan yankin, ku duba irin kudin da ake kashewa wajen sayen irin wadannan makamai da kuma cika aljihun kamfanonin makamai na Amurka da kasashen yammaci - to amma duk hakan ya zamanto aikin baban giwa; "...to za su ciyar da ita, sa'an nan kuma ta kasance nadama a kansu" (Suratul Anfal 8:36), wato za su ta kashe wadannan kudade, to amma ba za su amfane su da kuma fitar da su daga matsalar da suke ciki ba.

translation.en: Of course the Air Force of the Islamic Republic of Iran's Army and its honorable martyrs - such as Shahid Sattari, Shahid Babai, Shahid Khazrai, Shahid Doran and many others - were pioneers on this path.
translation.ha: Ko shakka babu dakarun sama na sojin Jamhuriyar Musulunci ta Iran da shahidai masu girma irin su shahid Sattari da shahid Babayi da shahid Khazra'iy da shahid Duran da sauransu da sauransu su ne suka kasance a sahun gaba-gaba na wannan fagen.

translation.en: The first institute for self-sufficiency jihad of the Armed Forces was established in the Air Force. Both flight crew and technical support crew created values in one way or another.
translation.ha: Cibiyar farko ta jihadin dogaro da kai a cikin sojojin an faro ta ne daga cikin sojojin sama; ta bangaren matuka jiragen sama da kuma bangaren gyara da kere-kere ta wani bangaren; lalle hakan yana da kima sosai.

translation.en: The Islamic Republic will never forget these services.
translation.ha: Ko shakka babu tsarin Jamhuriyar Musulunci ba zai taba mancewa da wannan hidima ba.

translation.en: Universities helped, and scientists of the country cooperated. Today besides relying on its faith and spiritual values, the Iranian nation is relying on the material means that it has built on its own.
translation.ha: A yau al'ummar Iran baya ga wannan karfi na imani da ababen da suke kusata mutum da Ubangiji, har ila yau kuma suna da karfi irin na abin duniya; hakan lamari ne abin alfahari.

translation.en: We want them to feel that they can be independent of the arrogant powers of the world and that they can build Armed Forces that are equipped with the products of indigenous ideas and innovations. Look at everything from this perspective.
translation.ha: Mu muna so ne matasanmu su ji cewa lalle za su iya dogaro da kansu da kuma taimako na Allah Madaukakin Sarki; za su iya wadatuwa daga ma'abota girman kan duniya; za su iya samar da dakaru masu makami da kuma makamai da ake bukata a cikin gidansu.

translation.en: Continue your research with this orientation. Rely on yourselves. This is the experience gained by you, your country and veteran members of the Islamic Republic of Iran's Army and the entire Armed Forces.
translation.ha: Ku kalli dukkanin lamurra da wannan mahanga, ku yi karatunku da irin wannan mahanga, ku ci gaba da gudanar da binciken da karatunku ta hanyar wannan mahanga, ku dogara da kanku; wannan shi ne kwarewar da kuka samu, kwarewar da kasar ku ta samu; wannan ita ce kwarewar da wadanda suka gabace ku suka samu a cikin soji da sauran dakaru masu makami.

translation.en: When you rely on yourselves, your talents flow like an inexhaustible spring and offer their outcomes to you, your organization and your nation.
translation.ha: Idan kuka dogara da kanku, karfin da kuke da shi da kuma irin shirin da kuke da shi zai ci gaba da ba ku abubuwan da kuke bukata tamkar wata mabubbugar ruwa da take da fitar da ruwan ne.

translation.en: The report that was presented by the commander of this university was a good report.
translation.ha: Rahoton da kwamandan wannan jami'a ya gabatar rahoto ne mai kyau.

translation.en: What he reported has been done in different areas, and this is good. But you should not be complacent about these things.
translation.ha: Abubuwan da aka aikata a bangarori daban-daban da aka yi bayaninsu cikin rahoto, ayyuka ne masu kyau; to sai dai kada ku wadatu kawai da wadannan abubuwa.

translation.en: The path of perfection is an endless path. The more you move ahead, the more you will experience the pleasure of perfection.
translation.ha: Hanyar isa ga kamala, wata hanya ce maras karshe; gwargwadon yadda kuka ci gaba da tafiya, to kuwa za ku ci gaba da samun dadi na kamala.

translation.en: This is true of material issues as well as spiritual virtues - such as closeness to God, attention to God, love for God and spirituality, and treading the divine path. The more you move ahead, the more powerful and delighted you will feel. This path is the path of you dear youth.
translation.ha: Haka lamarin ya ke a kamala ta lahira - cikin samun kusaci da Ubangiji, cikin komawa ga Allah, cikin kaunar Ubangiji da ababen da suke tabbatar da kusaci ga Allah, da shiga cikin haramin Ubangiji - haka nan kuma cikin lamurra na abin duniya; gwargwadon yadda kuka ci gaba, to kuwa irin daukakar da kuke samu za ta karu, haka nan jin dadi na daukaka da kuma tsayin daka sosai. Wannan tafarki, shi ne tafarkin ku.

translation.en: Allah the Exalted has promised that He will assist you if you promote His religion, tread His path and seek divine goals.
translation.ha: Allah Madaukakin Sarki ya yi muku alkawarin cewa matukar kuka taimaka wa addini da tafarkinsa da kuma manufa ta Ubangiji, to ku ma zai taimaka muku.

translation.en: God's assistance means the assistance of the forces of nature - all of them will help you. Even supernatural forces will come to your aid. You will be assisted, and you will move ahead - just as you have up until today.
translation.ha: Taimakon Ubangiji yana nufin taimakon dukkanin karfin da suke duniyar nan; dukkanin su za su taimaka muku; karfin da ba a iya ganinsa ma zai taimaka muku; za a taimaka muku, za ku sami ci gaba; kamar yadda a yau din nan kuka ci gaban.

translation.en: You should know that today your country is very different from 10 years ago and that it has made a lot of progress. It has made more progress compared to 20 years ago. It has made even more progress compared to the early years of the Revolution - thirty years ago.
translation.ha: Ku sani cewa kasar ku a yau ta bambanta sosai da shekaru goman da suka gabata, ta sami gagarumin ci gaba; ta ci gaba nesa ba kusa ba idan aka kwatanta da shekaru ashirin din da suka gabata; haka nan ma ta ci gaba sosai sama da shekarun farko-farko na nasarar juyin juya halin Musulunci, wato shekaru talatin din da suka gabata.

translation.en: This progress is the result of the determined efforts of our nation, our people, our youth, their reliance on Allah the Exalted and their efforts on this holy path. Continue these efforts.
translation.ha: Hakan ya samo asali ne sakamakon himmar al'ummar mu, himmar mutanen kasar nan, himmar matasan mu, dogaronsu da Allah Madaukakin Sarki da kuma kokarinsu a wannan tafarki mai tsarki.

translation.en: Universities affiliated to the Armed Forces are among the most promising social and scientific centers of this country.
translation.ha: Jami'oin dakaru masu makami suna daga cikin cibiyoyi da hukumomi na zamantakewa da ilmin mu da suke sanya fata cikin zuciya.

translation.en: This university was named after Shahid Sattari - the honorable, hardworking, active, innovative, faithful and mujahid martyr.
translation.ha: Haka nan kuma an sanya wa wannan jami'ar sunan Shahid Sattari; wannan shahidi mai girma da daukaka, mai aiki ba kama hannun yaro, mumini kuma mujahidi.

translation.en: During the Sacred Defense Era, before he was appointed as an Air Force commander, Shahid Sattari made many valuable efforts without many people knowing. He also rendered a lot of services as a commander.
translation.ha: A lokacin kallafaffen yaki, kafin a ba shi matsayin kwamandan soji, ya gudanar da gagarumin kokari ba kama hannun yaro sannan kuma a lokacin da aka ba shi shugabannin sojoji ma ya gudanar da gagarumar hidima.

translation.en: Similarly, the rest of our dear martyrs - from the Ground Force, the Navy, the Air Force and different other parts of the Armed Forces - rendered great services. You should appreciate this university.
translation.ha: Haka nan sauran shahidanmu masu girma, na sojojin kasa, sojojin ruwa da sojojin sama, haka nan kuma na bangarori daban-daban na soji, sun gudanar da hidima mai girman gaske. Wajibi ne ku girmama wadannan jami'oi.

translation.en: The plans should always be up-to-date and forward-looking, and they should be clearly formulated.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne dukkanin tsare-tsaren da za a gudanar su zamanto sun yi daidai da zamanin da ake ciki da kuma lura da shekaru masu zuwa.

translation.en: The honorable teachers should make as many efforts as they can.
translation.ha: Haka nan su ma malamai masu girma su gudanar da ayyuka da kokarinsu.

translation.en: The dear students should try their hardest. The senior commanders should visit such universities and speak with these dear youth in person.
translation.ha: Su ma manyan kwamandoji su dinga kawo ziyara jami'oin, su tattauna da wadannan matasa masu girma; haka lamari ne da zai taimake su da kuma su kansu wadannan matasan, dukkaninsu biyu.

translation.en: We become dynamic when we look at you dear youth, and you can benefit from the experience of the veterans.
translation.ha: Lalle mu muna jin dadin kallonku; ku din nan ma za ku iya amfanuwa da darasi da kwarewar da na gaba da ku suke da su.

translation.en: Dear God, by the blessedness of Muhammad (s.w.a.) and his household, bestow Your grace and blessings on these dear youth.
translation.ha: Ya Ubangiji Allah! Saboda annabi Muhammadu da Alayen Muhammadu Ka sanya rahama da tausayarka su hada da dukkan wadannan matasa masu girma.

translation.en: Dear God, bestow Your support and assistance on our Armed Forces, the Army of the Guardians of the Islamic Revolution, the Islamic Republic of Iran's Army, the Police and the Basij.
translation.ha: Ya Ubangiji Allah! Ka sanya dukkanin dakarun mu masu makami, dakarun kare juyin juya halin Musulunci, sojojin Jamhuriyar Musulunci ta Iran, ‘yan sanda, dakarun sa kai na Basij cikin rahama da kariyarka.

translation.en: Leader: Leader Intervenes Only When Important National Interests Ignored - Khamenei.ir  Ayatollah Khamenei said that insistence of the Iranian nation on its righteous positions and its efforts to become a role model for the regional nations is the main reason behind the pressures and the hostile propaganda broadcast against the Islamic Republic.
translation.ha: Ayatullah Khamenei ya bayyana cewar tsayin dakan da al'ummar Iran suka yi wajen kare hakkokinsu da kuma zama abin koyi ga sauran al'ummomin wannan yankin shi ne babban dalilin matsin lamba da bakar farfagandar da ake yadawa a kan tsarin Musulunci na Iran, daga nan sai ya ce: Duk da irin wadannan matsin lamba, to amma tsarin Jamhuriyar Musulunci ya tsaya kyam kuma bai yi kasa a gwuiwa ba.

translation.en: And this firm position of the Islamic Republic has made their sword blunt."
translation.ha: Sannan kuma wannan tsayin dakan tsarin Musuluncin shi ne lamarin da ya dusar da kaifin takobinsu sannan kuma suka gagara yin wani abu.

translation.en: The Leader referred to the recent events in the Ministry of Intelligence and added: "Take a look at the propaganda broadcast by foreign media about these events - which are not very important. See what uproar they have caused. They are saying in their analyses that there is a rift in the ruling system of the Islamic Republic and that the President is not listening to the Leader."
translation.ha: Yayin da ya ke magana kan batun da ya shafi batun sauya ministan tsaron cikin gida da tattaro bayanan sirri na Iran da kuma abubuwan da suka biyo baya kuwa, Jagoran juyin juya halin Musuluncin ya bayyana cewar: Ku dubi irin farfagandar da kafafen watsa labaran ‘yan kasashen waje suka dinga yi dangane da wannan lamari wanda ba shi da wani muhimmancin gaske, ku ga irin tada jijiyoyin wuyan da suka yi, suna cewa an sami rikici cikin tsarin Musulunci ta yadda shugaban kasa ya ki jin maganar Jagora.

translation.en: Ayatollah Khamenei added: "The propaganda broadcast by the enemies over the past few days showed once again how they are looking for an excuse to ambush the Islamic Republic like a wolf."
translation.ha: Ayatullah Khamenei ya ci gaba da cewa: Farfagandar makiya cikin ‘yan kwanakin nan ta sake bayyanar da kanta da kuma irin jiran tsammanin da suke yi na samun wata kafa da za su cutar.

translation.en: The Leader of the Islamic Revolution said that the responsibilities have been clearly specified in the Constitution. He added that the Leader does not want to interfere in the decisions and actions of the administration, but that he will intervene whenever he feels an important national interest has been ignored. Ayatollah Khamenei stressed: "Regarding the recent event, which is not very important, I felt that an important interest has been ignored."
translation.ha: Har ila yau yayin da ya ke ishara da yadda kundin tsarin mulki ya tsara wa kowa aiki da nauyin da ke wuyansa, Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci ya bayyana cewar: Jagora dai ba shi da niyyar tsoma baki cikin ayyukan gwamnati, face dai a wajen da ya fahimci cewa an gafala daga maslaha (ta kasa). Jagoran ya ci gaba da cewa: Dangane da abin da ya faru na baya-bayan nan ma dai, mun ji cewa an gafala ne daga maslaha mai girma ta kasa.

translation.en: Ayatollah Khamenei added: "As long as I am alive and as long as I have this responsibility, I will not allow the slightest deviation in the great movement of the Iranian nation towards the ideals."
translation.ha: Ayatullah Khamenei ya ci gaba da cewa: Har zuwa lokacin da na ke raye sannan kuma ina da wannan nauyin a wuyana, to kuwa ba zan taba bari a kautar da wannan tafarki da al'ummar Iran suka rika ba.

translation.en: His Eminence stressed that as long as the people are present on the scene and enjoy wisdom, insight and strong determination, they will continue benefiting from God's blessings. "God's assistance will decrease if government officials go after their personal interests and forget the goals."
translation.ha: A bangare guda kuma yayin da yake ishara da cewa matukar dai al'umma suka ci gaba da kiyaye irin wannan basira da kuma kishi da suke da shi da kuma kasantuwa a fage, to kuwa taimako da tausayawa ta Ubangiji tana tare da su, Jagoran ya ce: Idan har jami'an gwamnati suka kama hanyar neman biyan bukatun kansu kawai sannan kuma suka yi watsi da manyan manufofi, to irin wannan taimakon ma zai ragu.

translation.en: The Leader of the Islamic Revolution added: "Today the officials of the three branches of the government as well as the people are carrying out their heavy responsibilities in the arena of hard work and selfless efforts."
translation.ha: Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci ya ci gaba da cewa: A yau dai baya ga mutane, jami'an gwamnati ma dai suna iyakacin kokarinsu a fagen aiki da hidima ga al'umma.

translation.en: Ayatollah Khamenei referred to the name of the current Iranian year - "The Year of Economic Jihad" - and stressed: "All our people and government officials should join hands to start this movement because the purpose of choosing a name for each year is to start a movement towards the selected goal and slogan."
translation.ha: Haka nan kuma Jagoran ya kirayi dukkanin al'umma da jami'an gwamnati da suka hada hannayensu waje guda wajen ganin an cimma manufar da aka tsara a wannan sabuwar shekarar da aka ba ta sunan "Shekarar Kokarin Bunkasa Tattalin Arziki".

translation.en: Elsewhere in his speech, the Leader of Islamic Revolution referred to the current regional developments and added: "Thanks to Islam and the Islamic Revolution, today Islamic Awakening has already taken place in the region, and this movement will definitely produce results, just as it has in certain parts of the region."
translation.ha: A wani bangare na jawabin nasa kuwa, yayin da yake ishara da lamurran da suke faruwa a wannan yankin na irin sauye-sauyen da ake samu kuwa, Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci ya bayyana cewar: A yau dai albarkacin Musulunci da juyin juya halin Musulunci, ana iya ganin irin yadda farkawa da kuma wayewa ta Musulunci ta mamaye dukkanin wannan yankin, wanda kuma ko shakka babu za ta kai ga gaci, kamar yadda ya zuwa yanzu ta gai ga gacin a wasu kasashen.

translation.en: Ayatollah Khamenei added: "The more the determination, faith and preparedness of the people for self-sacrifice, the more the possibility of victory."
translation.ha: Ayatullah Khamenei ya ci gaba da cewa: A duk inda aka sami azama, imani da kuma shirin sadaukarwa a wajen al'umma, to kuwa yiyuwar nasara za ta karu.

translation.en: His Eminence said that America, Europe and the Zionists were surprised by the regional developments. "All efforts of the arrogant powers are focused on gaining control over the regional developments. But this Islamic Awakening will not stop, and this progressive movement is irrevocable."
translation.ha: Haka nan kuma yayin da yake ishara da irin damuwar da Amurka, Turai da yahudawan sahyoniya suke ciki sakamakon wadannan sauye-sauyen da ake samu kuwa, Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci cewa ya yi: Dukkanin kokarin ma'abota girman kai shi ne mallakewa da kuma samun iko kan wannan yunkuri na sauyi da ke faruwa, to sai dai wannan farkawa ta Musulunci da ke faruwa ba lamari ne mai karewa ba. Lamari ne da ke cin gaba, kuma babu wani lokaci da zai dawo da baya.

translation.en: The Leader of the Islamic Revolution added: "This movement will finally benefit the people of the region, but they must be fully vigilant because the enemy is looking for an opportunity to derail this movement."
translation.ha: Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci ya kara da cewa: Karshe da makomar wannan yunkuri lamari ne da zai amfani al'ummar yankin nan, to sai dai wajibi ne su yi taka tsantsan da fahimtar cewa makiya suna nan sun dana tarkonsu don kautar da wannan yunkuri daga tafarkinsa na asali.

translation.en: Ayatollah Khamenei referred to the clear oppression against the people of Bahrain, Yemen and Libya and stressed: "Impartial analysis of the current regional developments, especially the events happening in these three countries, shows that western powers have oppressed the people and that they are the obvious criminal and culprit."
translation.ha: Yayin da yake magana kan zaluncin da ake yi wa al'ummar Bahrain, Yemen da Libiya kuwa, Ayatullah Khamenei ya bayyana cewar: Alkalanci na hakika kuma na adalci yana nuni da cewa kasashen yammaci suna zaluntar al'ummomin wannan yankin musamman na wadannan kasashe uku, sannan kuma su ne asalin masu laifin da ba za a taba rufe ido kansu ba.

translation.en: His Eminence said that the fake Zionist regime is the main reason why America and the west are oppressing the people of the region. He reiterated: "The people of Bahrain have been oppressed more than any other nation during the recent events."
translation.ha: Jagoran ya bayyana cewar dalili na asali na irin zaluncin da Amurka da kasashen yammaci suke yi wa al'ummomin wannan yanki shi ne (saboda ba da kariya ga) haramtacciyar kasar Isra'ila yana mai cewa: Mutanen da aka fi zalunta cikin lamarin da ke faruwa a wannan yankin su ne mutanen Bahrain.

translation.en: The Leader of the Islamic Revolution referred to the widespread propaganda of the west against Iran and added: "Because the Islamic Republic of Iran has adopted a righteous position and has announced it explicitly, western powers have focused their propaganda attacks on Iran."
translation.ha: Haka nan kuma yayin da yake ishara da gagarumar farfagandar karya da kasashen yammaci suke yi a kan Jamhuriyar Musulunci ta Iran kuwa, Jagoran juyin juya halin Musuluncin cewa ya yi: Daga lokacin da Jamhuriyar Musulunci ta Iran ta fito fili ta bayyana matsayarta da kuma kare hakkokin da take da shi, tun daga nan kasashen yammaci suka fara yada bakar farfagandarsu a kanta.

translation.en: Ayatollah Khamenei reiterated: "Despite what the arrogant powers want, the Islamic Republic of Iran is not an indifferent bystander, and the people, government and political figures of Iran will not stand by and watch the oppressive actions of the arrogant powers."
translation.ha: Ayatullah Khamenei ya ce: Jamhuriyar Musulunci ta Iran dai, sabanin abin da ma'abota girman kai suke so, ba ta zamanto ‘yar kallo ba dangane da abubuwan da ke faruwa a wannan yankin, kuma a nan gaba ma al'umma, gwamnati, masana da ‘yan siyasar Iran ba za su zama ‘yan kallo ba dangane da wannan danyen aiki da ma'abota girman kan suke yi ba.

translation.en: His Eminence rejected the allegations that Iran is interfering in the affairs of the regional countries and said that these allegations are baseless. He further added that the Islamic Republic of Iran has only explicitly announced its position on the events happening in Bahrain, Yemen and Libya.
translation.ha: Jagoran ya yi watsi da ikirarin tsoma baki cikin harkokin cikin gidan kasashen wannan yanki da wasu kasashe suke yi yana mai cewa: Idan dai ba bayyanar da matsayarta a fili ba, shin wani tsoma baki ne ta yi cikin lamurran Bahrain, Yemen da kuma Libiya.

translation.en: The Leader of the Islamic Revolution reiterated that the Islamic Republic of Iran has never been afraid of the disapproval of the superpowers when announcing its righteous and explicit positions.
translation.ha: Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci ya ci gaba da cewa: Jamhuriyar Musulunci ta Iran dai ba ta taba jin tsoron masu takama da karfi na duniya wajen bayyanar da matsayarta ba, kuma a nan gaba ma ba za ta ji tsoron hakan ba, haka nan kuma ba za ta taba damuwa da su ba.

translation.en: Ayatollah Khamenei reiterated: "The protests of the Bahraini people are completely appropriate and righteous.
translation.ha: Ayatullah Khamenei ya ci gaba da cewa: Mutanen Bahrain dai suna da hakkin nuna rashin amincewar da suke yi kuma suna kan gaskiya.

translation.en: He added: "The Bahraini government is treating its people in the wrong way because such actions will produce no results other than increasing the anger of the people, and it may not be able to do anything if the people's anger erupts again."
translation.ha: Jagoran ya ci gaba da cewa: Lalle mu'amalar da hukumar Bahrain take yi wa mutanen kasar kuskure ne, don kuwa irin wannan mu'amalar babu wani abin da za ta haifar in ban da kara fushin mutanen wanda mai yiyuwa ne babu wani abin da gwamnati za ta iya yi wajen kashe wutar wannan fushin.

translation.en: The Leader of the Islamic Revolution reiterated that the Bahraini government and the countries which have deployed their forces in Bahrain have made a mistake. Ayatollah Khamenei said that events in Libya are another example of the oppression of the arrogant powers against the people of other countries. "Westerners do not want a populist and Islamic government in Libya, a country which is close to Europe and is full of oil resources.
translation.ha: Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci ya ci gaba da cewa: Baya ga hukumar Bahrain din, su ma wadanda suka zo kasar daga waje sun yi kuskure. Har ila yau kuma Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci ya bayyana abin da ke faruwa a kasar Libiya a matsayin wani bangare na zaluncin da manyan kasashen duniyan ma'abota girman kai suke yi wa al'umma inda ya ce: Kasashen yammaci dai ba sa son ganin an kafa wata hukuma ta musulmi a kasar Libya wacce take kusa da kasashen Turai, a saboda haka ne suka dau siyasar wasa da hankalin al'ummar Libiya.

translation.en: Therefore, they have decided to start a political game with the people of Libya, but the people of Libya have uncovered this western policy." His Eminence said that the international Zionist network is the main culprit in the recent events in the region. He reiterated: "By taking advantage of the current situation, they are trying to exert pressure on the people of Gaza and kill them on a daily basis.
translation.ha: Jagoran dai ya bayyana ma'abota girman kai da yahudawan sahyoniya na kasa da kasa a matsayin manyan masu laifi cikin zaluncin da ke faruwa a wadannan kasashe yana mai cewa: Suna amfani da wannan yanayi da ake ciki wajen matsin lamba a kan al'ummar Gaza da kuma ci gaba da zubar da jinin mutanen (Gazan), a saboda haka bai kamata al'ummomi da gwamnatocin wannan yankin su gafala daga ayyukan yahudawan sahyoniya ba. Tun da farko dai sai da Hujjatul Islam Imani wakilin Jagora sannan kuma limamin juma'ar Shiraz ya gabatar da jawabinsa. Kamar yadda kuma kwamandan dakarun kare juyin juya halin Musulunci na lardin Fars Kanar Gaibfurur shi ma ya gabatar da jawabinsa da kuma rahoto kan irin ayyukan da dakarun nasa suka gudanar.

translation.en: Leader Tours 25th Tehran International Book Fair - Khamenei.ir
translation.ha: Jagora Ya Ziyarci Kasuwar Baje Kolin Littafa Na Tehran

translation.en: Ayatollah Khamenei the Leader of the Islamic Revolution visited the 25th Tehran International Book Fair on Sunday.
translation.ha: A safiyar yau lahadi (6-5-2012) ne Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci Ayatullah Sayyid Ali Khamenei ya kai ziyarar gani da ido na tsawon sa'oi biyu da rabi zuwa kasuwar baje kolin littafa na Tehran karo na ashirin da biyar.

translation.en: Speaking to a group of publishers during the visit, His Eminence said that it is necessary to promote reading books in the country through appropriate planning. Ayatollah Khamenei the Leader of the Islamic Revolution visited the 25th Tehran International Book Fair on Sunday.
translation.ha: A yayin wannan ziyarar, Jagoran juyin juya halin Musuluncin wanda ministan al'adu da shiryawa ta Musulunci ta Iran ya ke rufa masa baya, ya ziyarci shaguna daban-daban na kasuwar inda masu shi suke masa bayani kan littafan da suka kumsa da kuma sabbin littafan da aka buga a shekarar nan.

translation.en: Speaking to a group of publishers during the visit, His Eminence said that it is necessary to promote reading books in the country through appropriate planning.
translation.ha: A dan gajeren jawabin da ya gabatar a gaban wasu daga cikin masu buga littafan jin kadan bayan rangadin nasa Jagoran ya yi ishara da irin yadda ya ga jama'a sun cika kasuwar inda ya ce: wajibi ne a gudanar da tsare-tsare ta yadda za a kara karfafa irin alakar da mutane suke da shi da littafi da kuma karatu a duk fadin kasar Iran.

translation.en: Ayatollah Khamenei stressed the need to conduct quality assessment of the annual book fair in Tehran and added that such assessment would reveal whether there has been improvement or not.
translation.ha: Kamar yadda kuma ya yi kiran da a gudanar da bincike na ilimi a duk lokacin da aka gudanar da irin wannan kasuwar baje kolin littafin don ganin shin an samu ci gaba ne a fagen irin abubuwan da littafan suka kumsa ko kuma a'a.

translation.en: The Leader of the Islamic Revolution stated that it is necessary to remove the obstacles that lie in the way of publishing books, further stressing: "With the help of the government, the Ministry of Culture and Islamic Guidance should remove these obstacles, especially the inflated price of paper."
translation.ha: Yayin da ya ke magana kan matsalolin da ake fuskanta wajen samar da littafa da watsa su tsakanin jama'a kuwa, Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci ya bayyana cewar: wajibi ne ma'aikatar al'adu da shiryarwa ta Musulunci ta hanyar taimakon gwamnati su yi abin da za su iya wajen kawar da irin wadannan matsaloli musamman batun tsadar takardu.

translation.en: Elsewhere in his statements, His Eminence stressed that translation is not a one-way road and added: "The government should prepare the way for translating the good books that are published in the country - especially in the area of religious studies, history, literature and sciences - and for presenting them to the world."
translation.ha: Haka nan kuma yayin da ya ke magana kan muhimmancin tarjama littafa da ake yi, Jagoran cewa ya yi: Wajibi ne gwamnatin ta share fagen samar da littafa masu kyau a fagage daban-daban da suka hada da na addini, tarihi, adabi da sauran ilmummuka da kuma tarjama su zuwa yarurruka daban-daban da gabatar da su ga duniya.

translation.en: Leader’s New Year Message - Khamenei.ir
translation.ha: Sakon Jagora Na Sabuwar Shekarar 1389 (Hijira Shamsiyya)

translation.en: In the Name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful
translation.ha: Da Sunan Allah Mai Rahama Mai Jin Kai

translation.en: I congratulate all my honorable countrymen who live across our dear and vast country, all Iranians who live in different parts of the world and have pinned their hopes on their beloved homeland, the self-sacrificing youth, men, and women who have made great sacrifices for the lofty goals of the Revolution and the country and who have laid down their lives and offered their youth to the Revolution and the glory of the country, the honorable families of our martyrs, our disabled war veterans and their self-sacrificing families, all those who made sacrifices during the war, and those who work and make efforts for the glory of the country on the auspicious occasion of Norouz and the beginning of the new year - which is the beginning of spring and revitalization of nature.
translation.ha: Ina isar da sakon tayar murnar wannan babban idi da kuma sabuwar shekara - wanda mafari ne na wannan lokaci mai kyawun dabi'a - ga dukkanin al'ummar mu masu girma a duk inda suke rayuwa a duk fadin wannan kasar, haka nan kuma ga dukkanin Iraniyawa a duk inda suke a duk fadin duniya wadanda kuma suke da idanuwan fata ga kasarsu mai girma, musamman ma ga matasa, maza da mata daga cikin wadanda suka sadaukar da rayukansu wajen cimma manyan manufofi na juyin juya halin Musulunci da kuma wannan kasar; suka gabatar da rayuwarsu da rayukansu saboda wannan juyi da kuma daukakar kasar nan; haka nan ga iyalan shahidai masu girma, da wadanda suka sami raunuka a wajen yaki da iyalansu masu sadaukarwa, haka nan ga dukkanin masu sadaukarwa da kuma dukkanin wadanda suka ba da himma wajen daukakar wannan kasa da kuma gudanar da ayyukansu.

translation.en: And I offer my greetings to the immaculate soul of our magnanimous Imam who was the founder of this great public movement and the source of progress and improvement of great Islamic Iran.
translation.ha: Sannan kuma muna isar da sakon gaisuwa da sallamarmu ga ruhin Imaminmu mai girma wanda shi ne ya samar da wannan gagarumin yunkuri na al'umma sannan kuma mabubbugar ci gaba da kuma daukakar wannan kasa ta Musulunci mai girma.

translation.en: Norouz is the beginning of growth.
translation.ha: Idin Nurooz, mafari ne na ci gaba da kuma girma.

translation.en: Just as this growth is tangible in nature, it can also be manifested in our hearts and souls and in our movement towards progress.
translation.ha: Irin wannan ci gaba da kuma girman da ake ganinsu a jikin dabi'u, haka nan yana iya tabbatuwa da kuma bayyana a cikin zukata da rayuka da kuma yunkurinmu zuwa gaba.

translation.en: Let us have a look at the year 1388 which has ended now.
translation.ha: Mu dan yi dubi ga shekarar 1388 (hijira shamsiyya) wacce a halin yanzu ta kawo karshe mu gani.

translation.en: If the year 1388 were to be described in a sentence, I think the description would be, the year of the Iranian nation, the year of this great nation's glory and victory, the year of this nation's historic and significant presence in the arenas that determined the fate of our great Revolution and our country.
translation.ha: Idan har za mu iya bayanin shekarar 1388 da ta gabata cikin wata jumla guda, to ni ina ganin muna iya cewa: shekara ce ta al'ummar Iran, shekara ce ta daukaka da nasarar al'ummar Iran mai girma, shekara ce ta kasantuwar al'umma Iran a fage da kuma tasirin wannan al'umma a fagage masu tasiri wajen ayyana makomar wannan juyi na mu mai girma da kuma makomar kasar nan.

translation.en: In the beginning of the year 1388, through their unprecedented presence the people gave rise to an election that was unprecedented in the history of our Revolution - and of course in the long history of our country -and was considered a prominent peak.
translation.ha: A farkon shekarar 1388 al'ummarmu sun shirya kansu wajen fitowa maras tamka a cikin zaben da aka gudanar wanda a tarihin wannan juyi na mu - kai ana iya cewa tsawon tarihin wannan kasa ta mu - ba a taba ganin irinsa ba kuma ana iya kirga shi a matsayin wani koli na fitowar al'umma.

translation.en: During the months following the election, the people demonstrated their presence, determination, resistance, national determination, and insight in a great test and in a great and fateful movement.
translation.ha: Tsawon watannin da suka biyo bayan zaben (shugaban kasar da aka gudanar din) mutane sun kasance cikin jarrabawa mai girma, sannan kuma sun nuna irin gagarumin yunkuri mai ayyana makomarsu, kasantuwarsu a fage, iradarsu, tsayin dakansu, azama ta kasar da suke da ita da kuma basirarsu.

translation.en: A short analysis of the post-election events which lasted several months is that after the passage of 30 years the enemies of the country and the enemies of the Islamic Republic have focused all their efforts and power on defeating this Revolution from within.
translation.ha: Takaitaccen sharhin da za a iya yi dangane da abubuwan da suka faru bayan zaben shugaban kasar tsawon wadannan watanni, shi ne cewa makiyan wannan kasa da kuma makiyan tsarin Jamhuriyar Musulunci, bayan gushewar shekaru talatin, sun hada karfinsu waje guda da kuma aikata duk abin da za su iya wajen ganin ko za su iya kawar da wannan juyi daga cikinsa.

translation.en: Faced with this great conspiracy and this hostile movement, the nation managed to bring the enemies to their knees through its unique awareness, insight, determination, and resistance.
translation.ha: To amma al'ummar mu sakamakon masaniya da basira da tsayin dakansu maras tamka sun sami nasarar tsayawa a gaban wannan makirci da kuma samun nasara a kan makiya.

translation.en: The eight-month experience - from the presidential election to the 22nd of Bahman - that the nation and the country went through was full of lessons and was indeed a source of honor for the Iranian nation. In the year 1388, the nation had a brilliant performance.
translation.ha: Irin kwarewar da wannan al'umma (ta mu) ta samu tsawon wadannan watanni takwas da suka biyo bayan zaben har zuwa ranar ashirin da biyu ga watan Bahman (11, Fabrairu 2010 ranar tunawa da lokacin da aka samu nasarar juyin juya halin Musulunci a kasar Iran), lalle jarrabawa ce da ke cike da darussa a cikinta, wanda kuma a hakikanin gaskiya ta zamanto wani lamari na ci gaba da kuma samun daukakar al'ummar Iran.

translation.en: Government officials made valuable and great efforts. These efforts are comparatively valuable.
translation.ha: A shekarar 1388 al'ummar mu ta samu nasarori da jin dadi; su ma jami'an gwamnati sun gudanar da kokari mai girman gaske.

translation.en: All fair observers have a religious obligation to appreciate the efforts which were made in different arenas for the reconstruction, prosperity, and progress of the country.
