translation.ha: Wajibi ne a kan dukkanin adilan masu sanya ido su jinjinawa irin wannan kokarin, irin wannan wahalar da aka sha da kuma ayyuka da himma da aka yi wajen gina wannan kasar da kuma ciyar da ita gaba a bangarori daban-daban.

translation.en: In scientific arenas, in industrial arenas, in social activities, in foreign policy, and in many different areas, government officials have made great achievements.
translation.ha: A fagen ilimi, a fagen masana'antu, a fagen ayyuka na zamantakewa, a fagen siyasar waje, a bangarori daban-daban, jami'an gwamnati sun aikata ayyuka masu girman gaske.

translation.en: Observing the current situation of the country and the great potentialities that lie in the heart of this great country and nation, one may conclude that what we have done and what government officials and the people have done are not a great achievement compared with the great potentials of this country for achieving progress and justice.
translation.ha: Abin da za a iya fahimta daga yanayin da kasar nan take ciki da kuma irin gagarumar dama da ke cikin zukatan wannan kasa da wannan al'umma mai girma shi ne cewa abin da muka aikata, abin da jami'an gwamnati da mutane suka aikata a gaban irin damar da wannan kasar take da shi wajen ciyar da ita gabata da tabbatar da adalci, to lalle ba wani aiki ne mai girma ba.

translation.en: Everyone should make more efforts than before, and they should consider themselves responsible. This prayer, which we recite every New Year, contains a very interesting point. It says: "...transform our condition into the best condition."
translation.ha: Wajibi ne kowa ya ji cewa akwai wani nauyi a wuyansa. A cikin wannan addu'ar da kowa da kowa yake karantawa ta a farko kowace shekara, a daidai lokacin da shekara take shigowa, wannan bangare yana da muhimmanci a ba shi muhimmanci, shi ne kuwa fadin cewa: "Ka sauya yanayinmu zuwa ga mafi kyawun yanayi".

translation.en: It does not say transform us to a better state or better condition. It asks the Almighty to transform our condition to the best of conditions.
translation.ha: Ba ana cewa ne ka isar da mu zuwa ga rana mai kyau ko kuma yanayi mai kyau ba; ana bukata ne daga wajen Allah da Ya isar da mu zuwa ga mafi kyaun yanayi, mafi kyawun ranaku sannan da kuma mafi kyawun yanayi.

translation.en: The sincere and dedicated effort of Muslim individuals is that which allows them to reach the best in all areas and affairs.
translation.ha: Wannan dai ita ce gagarumar himma da abin da mutum musulmi yake hankoron cimmawa na cewa ya samu isa ga mafi kyawun yanayi a dukkanin fagage.

translation.en: This year in order to attain that which this noble prayer teaches us and that which is our duty, in order to fulfill the needs and potentials of our nation, we need to multiply our efforts and increase our labor.
translation.ha: A wannan shekarar saboda mu sami damar aikata abin da aka koyar da mu cikin wannan addu'a mai girma da kuma sauke nauyin da ke wuyanmu, saboda mu yunkura gwargwadon irin karfi da bukatar wannan kasar, akwai bukatar mu kara ninninka irin himmar da muke da ita; mu kara nishadi da kumaji cikin ayyukan da muke gudanarwa.

translation.en: I name this year "The Year of Intensified Effort and Labor" with the hope that government officials together with the dear people of our country will make great strides in all affairs - in economic affairs, in cultural matters, in politics, in infrastructure and social matters.
translation.ha: A saboda haka ne na sanya wa wannan shekarar sunan "Shekarar Karin Himma Da Aiki Tukuru".

translation.en: We all are in need of this intensified effort.
translation.ha: Lalle mu muna bukatar wannan karin himmar.

translation.en: We should know that there is a lot of work to be done in different areas.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne a dogara da Allah; mu nemi taimakon Allah sannan kuma mu san cewa akwai fagage masu yawa na yin aiki.

translation.en: Our enemies are the enemies of knowledge and faith in our society.
translation.ha: Makiya, makiyan ilimi da imani na al'ummar mu ne.

translation.en: We should double our effort to strengthen our knowledge and faith.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne mu karfafa fagen ilimi da imani a tsakaninmu.

translation.en: By Allah's favor, our path will become smooth. The obstacles will become insignificant, and divine assistance will be with our people, our country, and our officials.
translation.ha: Da yardar Allah hanyoyi za su kasance a gabanmu, ababen da suke kawo cikas za su ragu sannan kuma taimakon Ubangiji zai kasance inuwa ga al'ummar mu da kuma wannan kasa ta mu da kuma jami'an gwamnatinmu.

translation.en: On the occasion of Eid al-Ghadir, Ayatollah Khamenei the Leader of the Islamic Revolution met with thousands of people from various social backgrounds.
translation.ha: A daidai lokacin da ake gudanar da bukukuwan ranar idin Ghadir, a safiyar yau lahadi (6-12-2009) ne Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci Ayatullah Sayyid Ali Khamene'i ya gana da dubban mutanen da suka fito daga bangarori daban-daban na kasar Iran don tunawa da wannan rana mai girma da muhimmanci.

translation.en: Ayatollah Khamenei described Ghadir as a beacon that shows the path of the Islamic Ummah.
translation.ha: Ayatullah Khamene'i ya bayyana batun Ghadir a matsayin wani mizani na Ubangiji na auna ingantaccen tafarki al'ummar musulmi.

translation.en: Referring to the disappointment of the infidels after Ghadir, he added: "Introducing the issue of Wilayat and appointing the Commander of the Faithful (a.s.) as the successor of the Holy Prophet (s.w.a.) was in fact a decision made by Allah the Exalted.
translation.ha: Jagoran juyin juya halin Musuluncin ya bayyana lokacin samartakan Amirul Muminin (a.s) da ke cike da tsarki a matsayin cikakken abin koyi ga matasa, don haka ya kirayi dukkanin matasa da kuma sauran al'umma da su yi riko da rayuwar Amirul Muminin (a.s) a matsayin abin koyi cikin rayuwarsu.

translation.en: The Leader of the Islamic Revolution cited Quranic verses and reliable Islamic narrations and said that Imam Ali (a.s.) is the exemplary figure of the history of Islam.
translation.ha: Jagoran juyin juya halin Musuluncin ya bayyana Shi'anci a matsayin akidar da ta samo asali daga ingantacciyar akida kuma lafiyayyiya daga wahayi na Ubangiji da kuma ma'auni na Alkur'ani.

translation.en: He touched on the propaganda and accusations that dismiss Shia Islam as a political fabrication and reiterated: "The issue of Ghadir, which is an indisputable reality in the history of Islam, refutes all these accusations and clarifies the roots and nature of Shia Islam."
translation.ha: Sannan kuma yayin da yake ishara da bakar farfagandar da ake yadawa dangane da shi'anci da kasantuwarsa wani lamari na siyasa kawai ya bayyana cewar: Batun Ghadir dai wanda ya ke daga cikin batutuwan da aka sallama musu na tarihin Musulunci ya bata dukkanin wadannan farfaganda da tuhumce-tuhumce sannan kuma ya yi bayanin tushen Shi'anci a fili.

translation.en: Ayatollah Khamenei touched on the reasons behind the propaganda broadcast against Shia Muslims and said: "The arrogant powers of the world are well aware that the Iranian nation has helped all sympathetic Muslims and intellectuals of the world fulfill their wishes by relying on the spirit of Wilayat and establishment of an Islamic system.
translation.ha: A ci gaba da bayanin dalilin da ya sanya ake irin wannan bakar farfaganda a kan Shi'anci kuwa Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci cewa ya yi: Ma'abota girman kan duniya a fili sun san cewa al'ummar Iran sakamakon riko da ruhin wilaya da kuma samar da tsarin Musulunci ta tabbatar da fatan da dukkanin musulmai masu kishi da kuma dukkanin masanan da suka damu da yanayin da duniyar musulmi take ciki.

translation.en: Therefore, they are making efforts to portray Shia Muslims as a group that does not belong to the Muslim world."
translation.ha: A saboda haka ne suke iyakacin kokarinsu wajen fitar da miliyoyin ‘yan Shi'a daga cikin duniyar musulmi.

translation.en: Ayatollah Khamenei referred to the US and Britain as the greatest and most evil enemies of the Iranian nation and stated that the Zionist regime, the US, and other arrogant powers of the world are afraid of the vigilance of the Islamic Ummah.
translation.ha: Jagoran ya bayyana Amurka a matsayin jagorar makiya al'umma sannan Ingila kuma a matsayin mafi munin makiyan Iran yana cewa: yahudawan sahyoniya, Amurkawa da sauran ma'abota girman kai suna cikin damuwa dangane da zaman al'ummar Iran abin koyi ga al'ummu da kuma irin farkawar da al'ummar musulmi suke yi.

translation.en: By Allah's favor, these enemies have not managed to achieve their goals so far, and they will not do so in the future either."
translation.ha: A saboda haka cikin wadanann shekaru talatin din babu wani abin da ba su yi ba wajen ganin sun mai da wannan al'umma da kuma wannan kasar saniyar ware, to sai dai sun gagara, sannan kuma a nan gaba ma da yardar Allah ba za su iya ba.

translation.en: Elsewhere in his speech, Ayatollah Khamenei referred to the false claims made by the Zionist regime and other foreign countries about the Islamic Republic's nuclear activities and added: "The enemies of the Iranian nation have reached a stage where they are trying to mislead global public opinion by spreading lies about the Islamic Republic's nuclear activities. But the truth will ultimately be revealed, and these lies will not benefit them and will disgrace them even further."
translation.ha: A wani bangare na jawabin nasa, yayin da yake ishara da kararrakin da yahudawan sahyoniya da sauran ‘yan kasashen waje (kasashen yammaci) suke yadawa dangane da shirin makamashin nukiliya na Iran kuwa, Ayatullah Khamene'i cewa ya yi: Ayyukan makiyan al'umma ya kai matsayin da suke son kawar da kwakwalan mutane ta hanyar yada kararraki da kuma yaudara, to sai dai daga karshe wadannan kararraki za su zamanto abubuwa ne masu cutarwa a gare su bayan bayyana hakikanin lamarin, haka nan kuma ta hanyar bayyanar wasu abubuwan da suka shiga duhu a baya ma mutumcinsu zai kara zubewa.

translation.en: His Eminence advised the heads of the US, British, and other European governments to avoid spreading lies and added: "Regarding the nuclear issue, as I have repeatedly said, the Iranian nation is after gaining the knowledge which the country needs. And we believe that if the Iranian nation fails to acquire this knowledge today, it will not have enough time to do so in the future when the wheels of the world economy will be spinning around nuclear power."
translation.ha: Ayatullah Khamene'i ya kirayi shugabannin kasashen Amurka, Ingila da wasu na kasashen Turai da su nesanci yada kararraki yana mai cewa: Kamar yadda a lokuta da dama muka sha fadin cewa dangane da batun makamashin nukiliya al'ummar Iran tana neman ilimi da fasahar da take bukata ne, sannan kuma ta yi amanna da cewa matukar a halin yanzu ba ta samar da irin wadannan ilimi da fasaha ba to kuwa lokaci zai kure mata a gobe lokacin da dukkanin tattalin arzikin duniya zai koma ne ga batun makamashin nukiliya.

translation.en: He added: "Today the Iranian nation is making efforts to acquire knowledge in the field of nuclear energy so that the country's future generation will not be dependent on western countries in this regard.
translation.ha: Jagoran ya ci gaba da cewa: A yau al'ummar Iran tana ta kokarinta ne wajen samun ilimin makamashin nukiliya ta yadda a shekaru ashirin zuwa talatin masu zuwa al'ummar Iran ba za su mika hannunsu na roko zuwa ga kasashen yammaci ba.

translation.en: But western countries are trying to prevent us from achieving this national goal by spreading lies and accusations as well as causing uproar."
translation.ha: Don haka ne suke ta kokari wajen hana al'ummar Iran samun wannan ilimi ta hanyar yada kararraki da tuhumce-tuhumce.

translation.en: His Eminence also urged the Iranian people to maintain their vigilance in the face of the arrogant powers of the world that are making use of all their political and propaganda tools to deny the Iranian nation its indisputable right.
translation.ha: Yayin da yake karin haske da dangane da taken da mutane suka dinga rerawa na cewa makamashin nukiliyan hakki ne na al'ummar Iran da babu wanda ya isa ya kwace Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci ya bayyana cewar: Ku kasance cikin taka tsantsan da kuma basira don kuwa ma'abota girman kan duniya sun kulla dukkanin makircinsu na siyasa da farfaganda wajen ganin sun kwace wannan hakki daga wajen al'ummar Iran.

translation.en: The Leader of the Islamic Revolution further touched on the current policies of the world's arrogant powers and said that these powers usually try to cause enmity and discord among nations when they cannot achieve their goals through threats, military attacks, or sanctions.
translation.ha: Har ila yau kuma yayin da ya ke ci gaba da magana kan siyasar da ma'abota girman kan suke bi a halin yanzu Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci ya ci gaba da cewa: Masu takama da karfi na duniya a lokacin da suka ga cewa barazana, amfani da karfin soji da kuma sanya takunkumi ba su sami nasara a kan wata al'umma ba, za su koma ga kokarin amfani da duk wata dama da suka samu wajen haifar da rarrabuwa da kiyayya tsakanin al'umma.

translation.en: Ayatollah Khamenei said that the Iranian people are patient and steadfast, further adding: "In their propaganda, the leaders of the arrogant camp are saying that their patience is running out, but everybody knows that they have never been patient with Iran.
translation.ha: Ayatullah Khamene'i ya bayyana al'ummar Iran a matsayin al'umma masu hakuri, kishi da kuma tsayin daka yana mai cewa: Ma'abota girman kan duniya cikin farfagandarsu suna fadin cewa hakuri da juriyarsu sun kai gaci, to sai dai ya kamata kowa da kowa ya san cewa babu wani lokaci da suka taba yin hakuri a wajen fuskantar al'ummar Iran.

translation.en: And they have used every opportunity to hatch all types of political, economic, military, and propaganda plots in order to defeat our nation."
translation.ha: Tsawon wadannan shekaru talatin din a duk lokacin da suka sami dama sun aiwatar da dukkanin makircinsu na siyasa, tattalin arziki, farfaganda da kuma amfani da karfin soji wajen kawar da al'ummar Iran.

translation.en: In the Name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful
translation.ha: Da Sunan Allah Mai Rahama Mai Jin Kai

translation.en: By Allah's grace, the arrival of the New Year will be auspicious for you dear brothers and sisters.
translation.ha: Ina fatan sabuwar shekara za ta kasance mai albarka ga dukkanin 'yan'uwa maza da mata masu girma.

translation.en: The prayer "O Transformer of power and circumstances" transforms the year. This transformation is not just limited to transforming winter to spring. After all, all seasons of the year are transformed.
translation.ha: Ana fadin cewa: "Ya Mai sauya shekara"; Shi ne ya ke sauya shekara. Sauya shekara ba wai kawai ta takaita ne ga sauya lokacin zafi zuwa lokacin damina ba; alal hakika dukkanin lokuta ne suke sauyawa.

translation.en: Winter is apparently tough, but it is in fact a preface to the beginning of spring.
translation.ha: Shi kansa lokacin hunturu da sanyi mai tsanani wanda zahirinsa lokaci ne mai wahala, amma badininsa a hakikanin gaskiya yanayi ne mai samar da rayuwa.

translation.en: These are all divine signs. We are used to these things, so we fail to appreciate their importance. Otherwise, if we were not used to these natural transformations, we would be surprised to found out how amazing they were.
translation.ha: Wadannan abubuwa dai sun zame mana jiki, ba ma fahimtar muhimmancin da suke da shi; don kuwa idan ba haka ba idan da a ce mutum bai saba da irin wadannan sauye-sauye da suke faruwa ba, sannan kuma a karon farko kenan ya ke ganin hakan, to da zai ga cewa hakan wani lamari ne mai ban mamaki.

translation.en: Germination of plants, revitalization of nature and trees growing leaves - these are all signs of divine power, which we tend to ignore just because our eyes are used to them.
translation.ha: Shi kansa wannan sauyi na tsirrai, sabunta dabi'a, fitar da furan bishiyoyi, dukkanin wadannan abubuwa ne da suke nuni da kudura ta Ubangiji wadanda haka nan muke wuce su da idanuwanmu.

translation.en: The same is true of our existence.
translation.ha: A cikin ran mu ma haka lamarin yake, samuwar mu ma haka take.

translation.en: Different changes take place while we do not even notice them.
translation.ha: Ba ma fahimtar irin sauyin da ake samu.

translation.en: The longer he travels in that direction, the bigger the gap grows - the gap between the right direction and the direction in which he is walking.
translation.ha: Tamkar mutumin da yake tafiya ne a kan titi idan ya gafala zai ga cewa a hankali a hankali ya bar hanya, kafin ya Ankara sai ya ga cewa ya yi nisa da barin hanyar.

translation.en: When he finds out about the mistake, he suddenly realizes how big the gap has grown.
translation.ha: Amma a lokacin da mutum ya dawo cikin hayacinsa, sai ya ga cewa wace irin tazara mai girma ce ta samu.

translation.en: Daily prayers which must be said five times a day are indeed one of the greatest blessings of God.
translation.ha: Wannan sallar da aka ayyana mana ita sau biyar a rana, a hakikanin gaskiya daya ne daga cikin manyan ni'imomin Ubangiji.

translation.en: If it were not for these daily prayers, we would be submerged in lack of vigilance.
translation.ha: Idan da a ce babu wannan sallar, da mun kasance cikin tsananin gafala.

translation.en: Therefore, it becomes necessary to perform our daily prayers in an attentive and appropriate manner. If daily prayers are performed in an attentive manner, they will help us pay attention to our actions.
translation.ha: Wannan sallar ita ce take tunatar da mu kanmu. A saboda haka ne ya zama wajibi ne mu yi salla da kyau. Matukar aka yi salla da dukkanin kulawa, hakan zai taimaka mana wajen mutum ya dawo cikin hayacinsa da lura da kansa.

translation.en: Therefore, if we are careless when the year 1388 ends and the year 1389 begins at a pre-specified point in time, we will not pay attention to the change in nature. And this point in time is identical to any other moment of our lives. From a natural and mathematical point of view, the last hour of the year 1388 is not at all different from the first hour of the year 1389.
translation.ha: Don haka ku duba ku gani cikin sauyawar shekarar 1388 (hijira shamsiyya) zuwa 1389 wanda sa'a guda ne muke ajiye mata - wannan sa'ar kuwa tamkar sauran sa'oi ne na rayuwa; a bangaren dabi'a, a bangaren yawa, wannan sa'a ta karshen shekarar 1388 ba ta da wani bambanci da sa'ar farko ta shekarar 1389; wani haddi na lokaci ne ya ke ayyanawa - idan har muka gafala, ba za mu iya fahimtar wannan gushewar dabi'a da kuma sauyi na dabi'a ba; amma idan har muka kula da wannan sauyi, to lalle za mu fahimci hakan da kuma jinsa a jiki.

translation.en: In fact, we can add this to the capacities and features of Norouz.
translation.ha: A hakikanin gaskiya muna iya kara hakan cikin irin damar da ake da ita a lokacin Noruz.

translation.en: Norouz, which is a seemingly non-religious Eid, is a national occasion for celebration. It does not have religious content, and it is not associated with religion. Although some narrations say "Norouz is among our days", I do not know how valid they are.
translation.ha: Idin Noruz wanda a zahiri ba idi ne na addini ba, idi ne na kasa, ba shi da wani bangare na addini; duk kuwa da cewa a cikin wasu ruwayoyin akwai fadin cewa "Noruz na daga cikin ranakun mu" to ba mu san irin ingancin da wannan hadisin yake da shi ba - to amma akwai bangare na addini cikin dukkanin abubuwan da suke faruwa cikin rayuwa; ciki kuwa har da wannan idin.

translation.en: They pray, they engage in dhikr and they go to holy places. Even those who travel to another city - in which there are no famous holy places - spend the first hours of the New Year at the shrine of a descendant of an infallible Imam if they find one.
translation.ha: Abin farin cikin shi ne cewa al'ummar mu suna lura, suna karanta addu'oi, suna ambaton Allah, suna halartar wajaje masu tsarki na addini; hatta mutanen da suke tafiya garuruwan da a zahiri ba su da fitattun wajaje masu tsarki, to amma idan har aka gano wani hubbare na 'ya'yan Imamai, to su kan tafi wannan wajen don gudanar da lokacin da sabuwar shekara take shigowa a wajen.

translation.en: For example, if they travel to Shiraz, they spend the first hours of the New Year in Shahcheragh. This is a very good tradition that our people observe.
translation.ha: A matsayin misali idan har sun tafi garin Shiraz ne a lokacin idin, su kan kasance a hubbaren Shah Cherag a lokacin shigowar sabuwar shekarar; wannan wata al'ada ce abar so kwarai a tsakanin al'ummar mu.

translation.en: The more we can increase religious content of different events, the more we will benefit from them.
translation.ha: Duk kokarin da muka yi wajen shigo da addini cikin lamurra na rayuwa, lamari ne da zai amfane mu.

translation.en: Man would be in a dire situation in the absence of religion.
translation.ha: Addini, imani da addini, lura da addini, abubuwa ne da suke lamunce sa'adar mutum.

translation.en: This has always been the case in different eras.
translation.ha: Dukkanin zamunna ma haka suka kasance, a halin yanzu ma haka lamarin yake.

translation.en: In the modern world those who decided to manage the world in the absence of religion are now suffering from difficulties that are strangely severe.
translation.ha: A halin yanzu ma dai mutanen da suka cire addini cikin rayuwarsu ta duniya sannan kuma suke son gudanar da duniya ba tare da (tsoma bakin) addini ba, suna fuskantar matsaloli masu wahalar magancewa.

translation.en: These difficulties are not like physical problems that people suffer from in their daily lives, and they do not appear immediately. No, they appear only when it is too late for a solution.
translation.ha: Wadannan matsaloli ba kamar sauran matsaloli na jiki da kuma na yau da kullum na dan'adam ba ne wadanda cikin sauki za su nuna kansu; a'a, su kan nuna kansu ne a lokacin da magance su ba abu ne mai yiyuwa ba.

translation.en: When carnal desires are unleashed and when such policies and cultural norms are adopted, the situation becomes so grave that you see a government official, a minister, hold a formal wedding to celebrate his same-sex marriage without feeling ashamed of the people of the world. This will result in incest later on.
translation.ha: A lokacin da aka sanya batun biyan bukata ta sha'awa a gaba, a lokacin da siyasa ta zamanto haka, al'adu suka zamanto haka, yanayi ya kai matsayin da a yau idan kuka duba za ku ga yadda wani jami'in gwamnati, wani minista(1) zai auri wani wani dan daudu ba tare da ya ji kunyar duniya ba!

translation.en: This is a problem in the modern world, but they are not prepared to accept it. However, they will undoubtedly reach the same conclusion. That is to say, this is the natural consequence of this trend.
translation.ha: Wannan aibi ne, a yau ba su yarda da hakan ba; to amma ko shakka babu a nan gaba za su kai ga wannan matsayin; wato abin da irin wannan yanayi yake haifarwa shi ne wannan.

translation.en: This is the result that an irreligious world would produce.
translation.ha: Wannan shi ne sakamakon duniyar da ta yi watsi da addini a cikin rayuwarta.

translation.en: People should and will turn back to religion. They have already started to do so. This will happen whether they want it or not.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne dan'adam ya dawo ga addini, a halin yanzu sun fara komawa din; shin suna so ko kuma ba sa so, hakan shi ne abin da zai faru.

translation.en: And in this great movement, Islam is the brilliant point, the focus of attention among different faiths.
translation.ha: A cikin irin wannan gagarumin yunkuri, Musulunci shi ne wannan matsayi mai haske da haskakawa. Wannan shi ne bakin zaren komawa zuwa ga addini.

translation.en: Islam is shining.
translation.ha: Musulunci dai yana haskaka.

translation.en: They want to stop Islam, but they cannot.
translation.ha: Don haka suke son su hana shi ci gaban, amma ba za su iya ba.

translation.en: Their enmity towards the Islamic Republic is mainly due to this reason. They know that this is a religious movement. They know that it is religious faith that has encouraged the people to start this movement and remain on the scene.
translation.ha: Daya daga cikin mafiya girman dalilan da ya sanya suke adawa da Jamhuriyar Musulunci shi ne saboda wannan lamarin; saboda sun riga da sun san cewa wannan yunkuri na addini, wannan imani da addini ne yake motsa al'umma, yake rike su a fage; shi ne ya ke shiryar da su da kuma fitar da su daga matsaloli, daga kulle-kulle masu tsananin hatsarin da suke shiga; suna ganin hakan da kuma fahimtar hakan.

translation.en: Of course many of these politicians are not really involved in policy-making. They only enforce policies formulated by other people, and they only see the appearances. But those who develop international policies - those who really lead this world - have no choice but to understand that this is the case.
translation.ha: Ko da yake da dama daga cikin wadannan 'yan siyasa, ba wai masu tsara siyasa na hakika ba ne; masu gudanar da siyasa ne kawai, suna ganin zahirin lamurra ne kawai; amma wadanda su ne suke tsara siyasar kasa da kasa, wadanda da shiryarwarsu ce ake gudanar da duniya, lalle sun san cewa haka lamarin yake; ba su da wata mafita.

translation.en: Of course they try to keep the world of Islam busy.
translation.ha: Koda yake suna iyakacin kokarinsu wajen ganin sun shagaltar da duniyar musulmi.

translation.en: Today the events that are taking place in Palestine are due to the side issues that the world of Islam is busy with.
translation.ha: A yau irin abubuwan da ke faruwa a Palastinu suna gudana ne karkashin inuwar wannan shagaltar da duniyar musulmi da aka yi da batutuwa 'yan kanana ne.

translation.en: Today real tragedies are happening in Palestine, Gaza and the West Bank. The events that happened in Mecca should not be underestimated.
translation.ha: A hakikanin gaskiya abin da ke faruwa a Palastinu bala'i ne mai tada hankali, a Gaza ma (abin da ke faruwa) bala'i ne yake gudanar, a yammacin Kogin Jordan ma haka lamarin yake.

translation.en: Purging Islamic works from their Islamic qualities is one of the dangerous things that is happening in front of Muslims' eyes in the world.
translation.ha: Nuna kiyayya ga Musulunci ta hanyar ababe masu tsarki na Musulunci, suna daga cikin wadannan ayyuka masu hatsarin gaske da suke ci gaba da faruwa a gaban idanuwan musulmi.

translation.en: Everybody is so busy with side issues and trivial matters that they do not realize what is happening in the world of Islam.
translation.ha: Sun shagaltar da kowa da kowa, (musulmi) sun shagaltu da wasu ‘yan kananan abubuwa kuma na gefe, ba su san me ke faruwa ba a duniyar musulmi.

translation.en: This is a plot hatched by the enemies against the world of Islam.
translation.ha: Wannan shi ne makirci a kan duniyar musulmi.

translation.en: Today the Organization of the Islamic Conference - which was basically established to defend the people of Palestine - has a responsibility to resist. It has a duty to mobilize the world of Islam against this cunning move by the Zionists and their supporters. In spite of their disagreements, the arrogant western powers generally cooperate in supporting the Zionists.
translation.ha: A yau kungiyar hadin kan kasashen musulmi, wacce asasin aikinta da kuma dalilin da suka sanya aka kafa ta shi ne ba ta kariya ga Palastinu ne, alal hakika tana da nauyi a wuyanta na tsayawa kyam; ta motsa duniyar musulmi wajen fuskantar irin wannan ayyuka masu cutarwa na yahudawan sahyoniya da masu daure musu gindi - wadanda mafi yawa daga cikin manyan gwamnatocin ma'abota girman kai na kasashen yammaci duk kuwa da irin bambancin da suke da shi, suna da hannu cikin hakan.

translation.en: The world of Islam should stand up to resist, and it is able to do so. The world of Islam has great capacities to resist against the greed and evil plots of the Zionists. All attention is suddenly attracted to oil, but it is not a matter of oil.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne duniyar musulmi ta tsaya kyam, kuma za ta iya. Irin karfi da damar da duniyar musulmi take da shi wajen fuskantar irin wannan danyen aiki na kwadayi na yahudawan sahyoniya yana da girman gaske. (daga lokacin da aka yi magana kan wannan karfi) tunanin mutane su kan koma ne ga batun man fetur; lamarin ba wai kawai na man fetur ba ne.

translation.en: Their reputation depends on this region. The most important passageways of the world are under the control of Muslim countries. These things are what the world depends on, and they are under the control of Muslims.
translation.ha: Wannan yanki shi ne cibiyar duniya, mafi girman kasuwar kayayyakin kasashen yammaci tana wannan yankin ne, mutumcinsu yana da alaka ne da wannan yanki, mafi muhimmancin mashigar wucewa da kayayyakin duniya tana hannun kasashen musulmi ne; wadannan abubuwa ne da su ne hanyoyin jinin duniya, suna hannun musulmi ne; yana da kyau musulmi su yi amfani da wadannan abubuwa, kuma suna iya yin hakan. Idan ma har muka ajiye wadannan a gefe, hikima ta siyasa da maganganu na siyasa a duniya a yau su ne kayan aiki.

translation.en: Being determined is itself a great means to influence the events that happen in the world.
translation.ha: Ita kanta wannan bukata ta gwamnatoci da al'ummomi, suna da gagarumin tasiri cikin lamurran da suke faruwa a duniya.

translation.en: Unfortunately this means is not utilized, and it is carelessly ignored.
translation.ha: Abin bakin ciki shi ne cewa ba a amfani da hakan, ana gafala da hakan.

translation.en: In any case, we should learn lessons.
translation.ha: Ala kulli hal, yana da kyau mu kanmu mu dau darasi.

translation.en: We should divide our issues into primary and secondary issues, and we should focus on the primary issues.
translation.ha: Mu dinga tunanin shiryar da wannan al'umma da kuma wannan tsarin, sannan kuma mu yi aiki don hakan.

translation.en: We should focus on guiding our people and helping our government make progress. I hope Allah the Exalted will awaken us so that we can identify and fulfill our responsibilities appropriately.
translation.ha: Muna rokon Allah da Ya farkar da mu daga barci na gafala, don mu sami damar ayyana nauyin da ke wuyanmu da kyau, mu fahimci hakan sannan kuma da yardar Allah mu yi aiki daidai da hakan.

translation.en: By Allah's favor, the New Year will be auspicious for all of you, and I hope you will benefit from the prayers of the Imam of the Age (may our souls be sacrificed for his sake).
translation.ha: Ina rokon Allah da Ya sanya wannan shekarar da ta zamanto mai albarka a gare ku gaba daya sannan kuma ku kasance cikin addu'oin mai girma Bakiyatullah (rayukanmu su zamanto fansa a gare shi).

translation.en: Leader’s Speech to Assembly of Experts - Khamenei.ir
translation.ha: Jawabin Jagora Yayin Ganawa 'Yan Majalisar Kwararru

translation.en: The following is the full text of the speech delivered on March 10, 2011 by Ayatollah Khamenei the Leader of the Islamic Revolution in a meeting with members of the Assembly of Experts.
translation.ha: Shimfida: A ranar alhamis 10, Maris 2011 ne Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci Ayatullah Sayyid Ali Khamenei ya gana da shugaba da sauran membobin majalisar kwararru ta jagoranci ta Iran bayan gudanar da taronsu na kwanaki biyu.

translation.en: In Name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful
translation.ha: Da Sunan Allah Mai Rahama Mai Jin Kai

translation.en: Honorable gentlemen and esteemed members of the Assembly of Experts, welcome.
translation.ha: Barkanku da zuwa malamai masu girma sannan kuma 'yan majalisar kwararru.

translation.en: I would like to thank the dear brothers and the esteemed gentlemen for their efforts - both the efforts which have been made during this meeting and the efforts which have been made in different commissions. I will pray for you.
translation.ha: Sannan kuma ina godiya dangane da irin wahalhalun da 'yan'uwa masu girma suka sha, shin a yayin taron ('yan majalisar na wannan lokaci ne) ko kuma tsawon shekara cikin kwamitocin da suke ciki inda a nan ma dai akwai ayyukan da suke gudanarwa.

translation.en: I hope Allah the Exalted will accept your efforts and reward them.
translation.ha: Lalle ina muku addu'a da cewa Allah Madaukakin Sarki ya karbi wannan aiki na ku ya kuma ba ku dacewa.

translation.en: I would like to thank all the gentlemen, especially Mr. Hashemi Rafsanjani who acted against the expectation of the spiteful enemies in this meeting. They expected to see discord grow among the members of the Assembly of Experts. They expected the competition for rendering services to turn into the commonplace competition of the material world, a negative competition to occupy centers and positions of power.
translation.ha: Lalle ina mika godiya ga dukkanin malamai; musamman ma Sheikh Hashemi Rafsangani sakamakon yadda ya kashe wutar da makiya suka yi kokarin kunnawa da kuma fatan da suke da shi a yayin wannan taron. Su (makiyan) din nan sun yi fatan ganin an sami sabani tsakanin 'yan majalisar kwararrun; a samu gasa irin wadda aka santa a wannan duniyar, wato a mai da wannan gasa ta neman yin hidima ta zamanto wata mummunar gasa da neman iko; wanda alhamdu lillahi hakan ba ta faru ba.

translation.en: Well, this was what Mr. Hashemi was expected to do, considering the wisdom and sense of responsibility that I have always noticed in him.
translation.ha: To wannan dai shi ne daman abin da ake fatan gani daga wajen Sheikh Hashemi (Rafsanjani); bisa la'akari da irin dattaku da kuma jin nauyin da ke wuyansa da a ko da yaushe muka saba gani a tattare da shi.

translation.en: Gentlemen, you elected the right person [as head of the Assembly of Experts].
translation.ha: Sannan kuma wannan abin da kuka yi (na zaben Ayatullah Mahdawi Kani a matsayin shugaban majalisar kwararrun), ku din nan malamai masu girma!

translation.en: Mr. Mahdavi has been a prominent figure since the beginning of the Revolution up until today as far as the world of the clergy, the world of politics, the current issues of the country and the issues of our Islamic seminaries and universities are concerned.
translation.ha: Mai girma Sheikh Mahdawi sanannen mutum ne wanda kuma ya yi fice; shin a duniyar malanta ne ko kuma a duniyar siyasa, haka nan kuma cikin lamurran da suke faruwa a kasar nan, haka nan cikin batutuwan da suka shafi makarantar hauza da jami'a, tun daga farkon nasarar juyin juya halin Musulunci har zuwa yau din nan.

translation.en: Thanks to the sincerity and wisdom of the gentlemen which can be noticed in their words and actions, what happened will benefit Islam and Muslims, and this is what is expected from the gentlemen.
translation.ha: Abin da ya faru, da yardar Allah kuma sakamakon tsarkin zuciya ta 'yan'uwa da kuma irin dattaku da amfani da hankali da mutum yake iya gani cikin dabi'u da maganganunku, zai zamanto mai amfani ga Musulunci da kuma musulmi.

translation.en: Considering the issues of the region, the current conditions of the country are extremely important and sensitive.
translation.ha: Yanayin da kasar nan take ciki a halin yanzu, bisa la'akari da lamurran da suke gudana a wannan yankin, lalle yanayi ne mai matukar muhimmancin gaske.

translation.en: There are great aspects to what is happening.
translation.ha: Abin da a halin yanzu yake ci gaba da faruwa, yana da bangarori daban-daban.

translation.en: What the enemies, the international opportunists and arrogant powers want and what they are planning is a different issue.
translation.ha: To shin makiya, masu mumman fata da kuma masu jiran tsammani na kasa da kasa da kuma ma'abota girman kai sun so ko ba su so ba, wannan wani lamari ne na daban.

translation.en: What happened enjoys two crucial characteristics, and these two characteristics have been the wishes of sincere Muslims and those who cherish lofty ideals in the Islamic Republic and other parts of the world.
translation.ha: Abin da ya faru, yana da wasu siffofi guda biyu masu muhimmancin gaske, wadannan abubuwa guda biyu kuwa fata ne da dukkanin musulmi masu gaskiya da tunani sosai cikin juyin Musulunci, cikin Jamhuriyar Musulunci da kuma sauran bangarori daban-daban na duniya.

translation.en: These two characteristics are very important.
translation.ha: Wadannan abubuwa guda biyu lamurra ne masu muhimmancin gaske.

translation.en: Presence of the people means stepping into the battlefield and facing the dangers, just like what happened in Iran.
translation.ha: Ma'anar kasantuwar mutane ita ce shigowar mutane cikin fagen gwagwarmaya da dukkanin abin da suka mallaka da kuma jure wa dukkanin wahalhalu da hatsarin da ke cikin hakan; tamkar abin da ya faru a baya a kasar Iran.

translation.en: When this happens, no power can stand up against a nation, let alone powers like America.
translation.ha: A lokacin da aka sami haka, to kuwa babu wani karfin da zai iya tinkarar wannan karfi (na mutane); to Amurka da makamantanta kan wani karamin alhaki ne.

translation.en: Even if all powers of the world join hands, they cannot stand up against a nation that has entered the arena with all its power.
translation.ha: Ko da a ce dukkanin masu karfi na duniya za su hada hannayensu waje guda, to kuwa ba za su iya fada da al'ummar da ta kasance a fage ba.

translation.en: Of course they wage wars, kill people and shed blood, but they are defeated in the end.
translation.ha: Na'am za su iya kai hari, za su iya kashewa, za su iya zubar da jini, to amma kuma za a yi nasara a kansu.

translation.en: As the Imam (r.a.) said at that time, blood will overcome the sword.
translation.ha: Kamar yadda Imam (Khumaini) a wancan lokacin ya fadi, cewa jini zai yi nasara a kan takobi.

translation.en: This is one point which is very important.
translation.ha: Wannan wani lamari ne mai muhimmancin gaske.

translation.en: It is Allah the Exalted who bestows determination on hearts and deploys them.
translation.ha: Allah Madaukakin Sarki shi ne ya ke karfafa zukata da tattaro irada sannan sai wannan lamari ya faru.

translation.en: The divine hand of power is noticeable in such events and because the divine hand of power is involved in these events, victory is ensured.
translation.ha: To da yake karfi na Ubangiji yana cikin wannan lamarin, don haka nasara dai mai tabbatuwa ce babu kokwanto cikin hakan.

translation.en: The second point is the issue of Islamic slogans.
translation.ha: Batu na biyu cikin hakan, shi ne batun taken Musulunci (da ake rerawa).

translation.en: In Islamic countries, the people are part of the Islamic Ummah.
translation.ha: To a wadannan kasashe da kuma sauran kasashen musulmi, mutanen wadannan kasashe dai musulmi ne, su din nan wani bangare ne na al'ummar musulmi.

translation.en: Islam has set its roots even in countries where the manifestation of Islam was limited and where the people have been pressured.
translation.ha: Hatta a wajajen da ake takaita shiga irin ta Musulunci, hakan ta faru ne sakamakon matsin lambar da ake musu, amma dai mutanen wajen muminai ne, musulmi ne sannan kuma suna da tushe na Musulunci.

translation.en: And this is a characteristic of Islam.
translation.ha: Wannan kuwa yana daga cikin siffofin da Musulunci ya kebanta da su ne.

translation.en: The same is true of regional countries.
translation.ha: To a wadancan wajajen ma haka lamarin ya kasance.

translation.en: Of course there have always been other motives as well: liberal, socialist, ethnic and other such motives.
translation.ha: Ko da yake akwai wadansu manufofi na daban, a yanzu ma akwai hakan - manufofi na sassaucin ra'ayi, mai yiyuwa ma a sami manufa ta kwaminisanci, kabilanci da makamantan hakan - to amma dai asalin tushen da mutane (suka rika) shi ne Musulunci sannan kuma taken da ake rerawa take ne na Musulunci; musamman a kasashe irin su Masar wanda Musulunci ya samu zama sosai, Alkur'ani yana da matsayi a can, haka nan kaunar Ahlulbaiti.

translation.en: Therefore, the event that is happening is an extraordinary event, and it is in its early stages. As government officials of the Islamic Republic, we have responsibilities to fulfill. We should pay attention to these responsibilities and not let this historical stage pass us by.
translation.ha: Har ya zuwa yanzu dai lamarin yana matakinsa na farko-farko ne. To mu din nan a matsayin mu na Jamhuriyar Musulunci, sannan kuma mu 'yan wannan adadi da muka taru a nan a matsayin mu na jami'an Jamhuriyar Musulunci haka nan kuma sauran jami'ai, lalle muna da wani nauyi a wuyanmu. Wajibi ne mu lura da wadannan nauyin sannan kuma kada mu yi watsi da wannan yanayi da ake ciki cikin sauki.

translation.en: The Islamic Revolution created a role model and a discourse, and this is one of the things that definitely affected these events.
translation.ha: Daya daga cikin lamurran da ko shakka babu suna da tasiri cikin wadannan abubuwan da suke faruwa, shi ne yadda juyin juya halin Musulunci ya zamanto abin koyi.

translation.en: The Islamic Revolution became a model for Muslims.
translation.ha: Juyin juya halin Musulunci ya zamanto abin koyi ga musulmi; da farko dai saboda samuwarsa, na biyu kuma saboda nasarorin da tsarin Jamhuriyar Musulunci yake samu ta yadda ya sami damar gabatar da wani tsari da wani cikakken kundin tsarin mulki da kuma tabbatar da shi a aikace.

translation.en: The construction projects which have been carried out in the country have in some cases put the country among the top countries in the world.
translation.ha: Irin ci gaban kasa da aka samu a kasar nan, hakan ya sanya kasar nan ta zamanto daga cikin 'yan kasashe kadan na duniya da suka sami irin wannan ci gaban.

translation.en: These are the things which have already taken place.
translation.ha: Wadannan lamurra ne da suka faru.

translation.en: They can see these things. The Revolution came and established a system of government, and this system prevailed and achieved increasing power and progress on a daily basis.
translation.ha: Wannan juyi ya zo, ya kafa wani tsari, tsarin kuma ya ci gaba da wanzuwa, ya ci gaba da samun karfi a kowace rana; a saboda haka ne wannan tsarin ya zamanto abin koyi.

translation.en: Today the sense of Islamic identity among Muslim countries is not comparable to 30 years ago. Today the sense of Islamic dignity and the demand for this Islamic dignity is not comparable to the past.
translation.ha: Wannan zama abin koyin ya haifar da wani tafarki wanda hakan shi ne akida ta Musulunci da kuma daukaka ta Musulunci. A yau al'ummomin duniya suna jin mutumci da daukaka ta Musulunci a tattare da su, ba za a iya kwatanta hakan da shekaru talatin din da suka gabata ba; lalle ba za iya kwatantawa ba.

translation.en: This has already happened.
translation.ha: Hakan lamari ne da ya faru.

translation.en: Naturally, as a consequence, the opposing camp is defeated.
translation.ha: To a fili yake cewa sakamakon hakan shi ne cewa sansanin 'yan adawa zai sha kashi.

translation.en: Corrupt and dependent autocrats were in power in some countries.
translation.ha: A wasu wajajen lalatattun shugabanni 'yan amshin shata su ne suke mulki.

translation.en: This is a modern example, and it is very valuable.
translation.ha: Wannan dai daya ne daga cikin lamurran da muka ga ayoyin Allah da idanuwanmu a tattare da su; hakan lamari ne da ya faru a lokacin mu, hakan lamari ne mai muhimmancin gaske.

translation.en: This is the direction of an important portion of the propaganda that is broadcast against the Islamic Republic: they want to prevent creation of role models. They want to prevent the Islamic Republic from becoming a successful role model in the eyes of Muslim nations.
translation.ha: Bangare mafi girma na irin farfagandar da ake yadawa kan Jamhuriyar Musulunci ta Iran (da nufin bakanta ta) suna da alaka ne da wadannan abubuwa; saboda a hana ta zama abar koyi; wato kada Jamhuriyar Musulunci ta zamanto abar koyi a idanuwan al'ummomin musulmi.

translation.en: I believe this is a very important point which deserves our attention.
translation.ha: A ra'ayi na wannan lamari ne mai muhimmancin gaske wanda wajibi ne dukkanin mu mu ba shi muhimmanci.

translation.en: The enemies are trying to prevent the Islamic Republic from presenting itself as a successful role model to other nations. This is because when a role model appears, people move towards it.
translation.ha: Dukkanin kokarin makiya shi ne hana al'ummomi daukar Jamhuriyar Musulunci a matsayin wata abar koyi da ta samu nasara; saboda a lokacin da aka sami abin koyi, to kuwa mutane za su tafi wajensa.

translation.en: When the success of this role model is recognized, people are encouraged to follow it.
translation.ha: Idan har suka fahimci irin nasarorin da wannan abin koyi ya samu, to kuwa hakan zai karfafa musu gwuiwa.

translation.en: About fifty or sixty years ago, an Egyptian writer wrote in his book that if Muslims manage to establish an Islamic government in a part of the world, it is more effective in spreading Islam than thousands of books and efforts to promote Islam.
translation.ha: Daya daga cikin marubutan kasar Masar a shekaru hamsin zuwa sittin din da suka gabata ya taba rubuta cewa idan har muka sami damar gudanar da hukumar Musulunci a wata kasa ta duniya, to kuwa hakan zai fi dubban littafa da farfaganda tasiri cikin ci gaban Musulunci.

translation.en: He was right. Unfortunately we are far away from practicing Islam in a perfect way. Although the model we have presented does not correspond to Islam as much as we want, our current level of success in infusing Islam into our society has revealed its positive effects.
translation.ha: Lalle gaskiya yake fadi. Duk kuwa da cewa abin koyin na mu bai yi daidai da Musulunci yadda muke so ba - don kuwa abin bakin cikin shi ne cewa akwai gagarumar tazara tsakanin mu da yanayi na Musulunci na sosai - to amma dai wannan gwargwadon da muka samu damar kafawa din mun sami damar shigar da Musulunci cikin rayuwar mu.

translation.en: We can see the resulting glory, power, progress and independence. The people can see these effects. Therefore, they want to prevent the presentation of role models.
translation.ha: A halin yanzu muna garin alamar tasirin hakan, mutane suna ci gaba da ganin hakan. To abin da wadannan (makiyan) suke adawa da shi shi ne kar mu zamanto abin koyin.

translation.en: As a result, they try to undermine this role model in the eyes of those who want to follow it.
translation.ha: A saboda haka ne suke kokarin bata irin wannan zama abin koyi din a idanuwan mutane.

translation.en: This is one of the things that has been done since the beginning of the Revolution.
translation.ha: Wannan shi ne daya daga cikin ayyukan da suka aikata tun farko nasarar wannan juyi na Musulunci ya zuwa yau din nan.

translation.en: This is one of the essential things that the enemy follows in his propaganda, and all their efforts are in this direction.
translation.ha: Daya daga cikin ayyuka na asasi na makiya cikin farfagandar da suke yadawa a kan Jamhuriyar Musulunci sun shafi wannan bangare ne sannan dukkanin kokarinsu ma saboda hakan ne.

translation.en: One is the domestic factor: the shortcomings that we are suffering from.
translation.ha: Mu ne muke samar da irin wadannan nakasa.

translation.en: The domestic factor harms this role model. The other factor is related to the enemy. They magnify our flaws a hundred times and make others notice them.
translation.ha: Wadannan dalilai na cikin gida, suna cutar da wannan abin koyin. Dalili na gaba yana da alaka ne da makiya; wadanda suke kambama irin raunin da muke da shi da rubanya su kashi dari da kuma nuna wa mutane; nakasin da ma ba mu da su, ta hanyar jingina su gare mu.

translation.en: What should we do?
translation.ha: To me ya kamata mu yi?

translation.en: First of all, we should take care of the domestic factor.
translation.ha: Da farko dai wajibi ne mu yi kokarin magance wadannan abubuwa da suke tattare da mu.

translation.en: If we take care of the domestic factor, Allah the Exalted will take care of the other factor.
translation.ha: Idan har muka magance hakan, to kuwa Allah Madaukakin Sarki zai yi maganin wannan na biyun; wato Allah Madaukakin Sarki zai lalata wannan farfaganda ta makiya.

translation.en: We should first criticize ourselves, and then the enemy.
translation.ha: Kukan farko a kan kanmu ne daga nan kuma sai mu kai kukan makiyi.

translation.en: How should it be practiced? Primarily it is government officials, elites, prominent figures, intellectuals, scholars, ulama and influential people who should watch their behavior.
translation.ha: Amsar hakan ita cewa a matakin farko jami'an gwamnati, fitattun cikin al'umma, 'yan boko, masana, malamai da sauran mutanen da suke da tasirin cikin al'umma, wajibi ne su kula da halaye da dabi'unsu.

translation.en: The atmosphere of insult and disrespect in society is one of the things that Islam is opposed to. We must not let this happen.
translation.ha: Yanayin cin mutumci da keta hurumi cikin al'umma, daya ne daga cikin abubuwan da Musulunci ya hana su; a saboda haka bai kamata a bar hakan ta faru ba.

translation.en: And everybody is responsible in this regard.
translation.ha: Kowa da kowa yana da wani nauyi a wuyansa dangane da hakan.

translation.en: I would like to address this message to all those who make public statements or write in newspapers or weblogs.
translation.ha: Ni ina son wannan ya zamanto sako ga dukkanin mutanen da ko dai suna magana ko kuma suna rubutu; shin cikin jaridu ne ko kuma cikin shafukan internet.

translation.en: All of them should know that they are not doing the right thing.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne dukkaninsu su san cewa abubuwan da suke yi, lalle ba aiki ne mai kyau ba.

translation.en: It is one thing to raise objections, present reasons or condemn a wrong political or religious idea, but it is quite another thing to do something that goes against ethical principles, sharia and political common sense. I reject the latter completely and decisively. It must not be done.
translation.ha: Nuna rashin amincewa, kafa hujjoji, yin Allah wadai da wani tunani na siyasa ko na addini mara kyau wani lamari ne na daban, sannan kuma fadawa cikin tarkon wadannan ayyuka da suka saba wa kyawawan halaye da shari'a da kuma hankali na siyasa, wani abu ne na daban; to mu dai a fili muna Allah wadai da wannan na biyun, ba mu yarda da shi ba, bai kamata a aikata hakan ba. Abin bakin cikin shi ne cewa wasu suna aikata irin wadannan ayyuka.

translation.en: I would like to address this advice to our youth in particular. Some of our youth - who are undoubtedly sincere, faithful and good people - believe that what they are doing is a duty.
translation.ha: Don kuwa ko shakka babu wasu daga cikin wadannan matasan mutane ne masu ikhlasi, muminai sannan kuma mutanen kirki ne, to amma suna tunanin hakan abu ne mai kyau; a'a, ni dai ina gaya musu cewa hakan ya saba wa nauyin da ke wuyansu.

translation.en: No, I would say what they are doing works against their duty.
translation.ha: Sabanin nauyin da ke wuyan na su ne ma.

translation.en: Of course we should not ignore the enemy's attempts at infiltration, evil deception and interference. As the Imam (r.a.) used to say, sometimes the enemy infiltrates enthusiastic and faithful groups and attracts them towards a certain direction or move. It is necessary to be cautious in this regard and not fall into the trap of lack of vigilance resulting from becoming emotional and failing to see the hands of the enemy.
translation.ha: Ko da yake bai kamata mu mance da irin tasiri da yaudara ta shaidanci irin ta makiya da kuma tasiri iri na makiyan ba. Kamar yadda a lokuta da dama Imam ya sha fadi, a wasu lokuta irin wadannan mutane sukan shiga cikin taron jama'a mai yawa alhali suna a matsayin muminai da muminai da kuma tsarkin zuciya, to amma sai a ja su zuwa ga wani karkataccen tafarki, to bai kamata ma a mance da wannan ba; wato gafalar da ta samo asali daga shu'uri sannan da kuma rashin lura da makircin makiya.

translation.en: Therefore, I ask our youth in particular to put an end to this atmosphere of insult, backbiting, leveling accusations, cursing and disrespect.
translation.ha: A saboda haka lalle ina kiran (mutane) musamman matasa da kada su bari wannan yanayi na cin nama da tuhuma da zage-zage da keta hurumi da cin mutumci su shige su.

translation.en: If this atmosphere prevails, it will spread like a contagious disease.
translation.ha: Idan har suka bar hakan ya ci gaba da wanzuwa, to ko shakka babu zai ci gaba da yaduwa - tamkar cuta mai yaduwa - hakan ne ya sanya kwatsam ake ganin irin wadannan abubuwa suna faruwa hatta a wajen sallar juma'a wanda waje ne na kaskantar da kai ga Allah da kuma zikiri.

translation.en: And this is totally wrong.
translation.ha: Idan ma har mutum bai yarda da wannan limamin juma'ar ba, shi kenan kar ma ya tafi can din, kada ya bi wannan limamin salla, ya fito daga wajen. Kai hatta ma a wasu lokutan a wajen karatu, a wajajen neman ilimi a na iya ganin irin wadannan abubuwa suna faruwa; wanda hakan kuskure ne, abu ne mai cutarwa kuma lamari ne da ya saba wa maslahar juyin juya halin Musulunci; wadannan abubuwa ne masu cutarwa da haifar da gibi da irin girma da daukakar tsarin Musulunci wanda yake ci gaba da tafiya da dukkan karfinsa.

translation.en: My previous advice was addressed to the youth, but elderly people also need advice. They should be cautious as well.
translation.ha: Wannan nasiha ce ga matasa, to su ma tsofi suna bukatar nasiha; lalle su ma wajibi ne su lura sosai.

translation.en: Adopting appropriate positions, saying the right thing, refusing to be influenced by false news - these are a duty as well.
translation.ha: Daukan matakan da suka dace, fadin maganganun da suka dace, rashin mika kai ga labaran karya, dukkanin wadannan abubuwa nauyi ne da ke wuyan mutane.

translation.en: They spend day and night trying to do something that is in line with the Islamic movement.
translation.ha: Akwai dubban mutanen da suke hidima tsakani da Allah a wannan tsari na Musulunci dare da rana, suna ta kokari da shan wahala wajen gudanar da wannan tsarin, suna sauke gagarumin nauyi da ke wuyansa; to amma daga lokacin da wani mutum ya ji wani labari na karya, shi kenan sai ya yi wa dukkanin wadannan ayyukan bugun goro da sanya musu alamun tambaya, to wannan dai ya saba wa maslaha, lalle hakan ya saba.

translation.en: All our people should be vigilant in this regard, young and old. We are always in need of advice, both when we are young and when we are old.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne su kansu matasa su kula, haka nan su ma tsoffi. Mu ma dai a lokacin samartakanmu mun kasance muna da bukatar nasiha, to a halin yanzu ma dai da muka tsufa, muna bukatar nasiha.

translation.en: I hope Allah the Exalted will help all of us to preserve this successful and impressive role model - namely, the Islamic Republic. By Allah's favor, we will manage to pass on this role model to future generations, and we will be able to hold up our heads before Allah the Exalted.
translation.ha: Muna rokon Allah Madaukakin Sarki da Ya taimaka wa dukkanin mu wajen samun damar kiyaye wannan abin koyi mai girma da daukaka - wato Jamhuriyar Musulunci - sannan kuma mu mika ta ga zuriya masu zuwa don ta hakan mu sami matsayi a wajen Allah Madaukakin Sarki. Wassalamu alaikum wa rahamatullah wa barakatuhu.

translation.en: Leader Meets People of Isfahan - Khamenei.ir
translation.ha: Jagora Ya Gana Da Dubban Mutanen Isfahan Ranar Babbar Salla

translation.en: In a meeting with thousands of people of Isfahan, Ayatollah Khamenei the Leader of the Islamic Revolution referred to religious faith and commitment to divine values as the secret behind the achievements of the Iranian nation.
translation.ha: A yau laraba (17-11-2010) ne Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci Ayatullah Sayyid Ali Khamenei ya gana da dubun dubatan mutane garin Isfahan wadanda suka kawo masa ziyarar barka da salla a ranar babbar salla.

translation.en: Thanks to the strength of this auspicious commitment, the Iranian nation will be pioneering and victorious in all arenas, and the enemy will continue being unsuccessful and hopeless. The Leader of the Islamic Revolution congratulated the faithful and selfless people of Iran and all Muslims throughout the world on Eid al-Adha.
translation.ha: A yayin da yake gabatar da jawabi a wajen wannan ganawar Jagoran ya bayyana imani da riko da ababe masu kima na Ubangiji a matsayin alamar nasarorin da al'ummar Iran suka samu, daga nan sai ya ce: Ta hanyar ci gaba da riko da wadannan abubuwa al'umma za ta ci gaba da samun nasarori a dukkanin bangarori, sannan makiya kuma za su ci gaba da shan kashi.

translation.en: He said that understanding the philosophy behind Eid al-Adha will help open up different paths in individual and national life, adding: "The great sacrifice by Prophet Ibrahim (a.s.) and the great divine appreciation that righteous prophet received for his sacrifice are indicative of the fact that it is not possible to tread the path of transcendence and progress in the absence of self-sacrifice."
translation.ha: Yayin da yake isar da sakon taya murnar idin babbar salla ga al'ummar Iran masu imani da sadaukarwa da kuma sauran al'ummomin duniya, Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci ya bayyana cewar fahimtar hikimar da ke cikin idin babbar salla lamari ne da zai share fagage daban-daban na rayuwar daidaiku da ta jama'a yana mai cewa: Sadaukarwa mai girma da Annabi Ibrahim (a.s.) ya yi da kuma irin girmamawar da Ubangiji yake yi wa wannan annabi mai girma, lamari ne da ke nuni da hakikanin hikimar da ke cikin wannan lamari na riko da tafarkin Allah Madaukakin Sarki da samun ci gaba da kuma matsayi mai girma.

translation.en: His Eminence stated that the philosophy behind continued divine tests is to help individuals and nations achieve a higher level of growth and transcendence. He reiterated that any individual and people who go through divine tests and hardships will get one step closer to their ultimate destination.
translation.ha: Jagoran ya bayyana cewa falsafar da ke cikin jarrabawa daban-daban na Ubangiji ita ce mutane da kuma al'ummomi su sami nasarar isa ga sabin matsayi na shiriya ta Ubangiji da kuma daukaka yana mai cewa: Duk wani mutum ko kuma al'ummar da ta sami nasarar tsallake ramukan jarrabawa da wahalhalu masu tsanani, to kuwa cikin yardar Allah ta sami nasarar kai wag a wani matsayi na samun daukakarka da kuma kusatan hakan.

translation.en: Regarding the philosophy behind divine tests, the Leader of the Islamic Revolution referred to the Iranian nation's success in dealing with the fitna of the year 1388 as an example. He reiterated that the Iranian nation's success was not just indicative of its power.
translation.ha: Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci ya bayyanar cewar nasarar da al'ummar Iran ta samu wajen tsallake tarkon fitinar da ta faru a shekarar 2009 (bayan zaben shugaban kasar da aka gudanar a Iran) daya ne daga cikin alamun da suke nuni da wannan falsafa da ke cikin jarrabawa ta Ubangiji.

translation.en: Rather, the most important meaning of the powerful weathering of last year's test and hardship was that the Iranian nation reached a new stage of its life by relying on its faith and insight, understanding the requirements of time and taking the necessary measures. And it gained new strength to achieve its ultimate goal.
translation.ha: Ayatullah Khamenei ya ci gaba da cewa: Ba za a iya takaita ma'anar nasarar da al'ummar Iran ta samu wajen tsallake ramin wannan fitina cikin irin karfin da take da shi ba ne kawai, face dai ma'ana ta asali ta tsallake tarkon wannan fitina da ta faru a shekarar da ta gabata ita ce cewa al'ummar Iran sakamakon dogaro da imani, basira, sanin ya kamata da fahimtar yanayin da ake ciki da kuma yin abin da ya dace ta samu nasarar isa ga wani sabon matsayi ne cikin wannan rayuwa tata da ke cike da haske.

translation.en: Elsewhere in his statements, the Leader of the Islamic Revolution referred to the self-sacrifice of the people of Isfahan on the 25th of Aban in the year 1361 as another example of success in divine tests. "On that great day, the people of Isfahan sent thousands of their valorous youth to the battlefields while holding a funeral ceremony for 370 martyrs."
translation.ha: A wani bangare na jawabin nasa, Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci ya bayyana irin gagarumin yunkurin da al'ummar garin Isfahan suka yi a ranar 25, Aban 1361 (16/11/1982) a matsayin wani lamari da ke nuni da nasarar da aka samu cikin jarrabawa ta Ubangiji, daga nan sai ya ce: A wancan rana mai girma, mutanen Isfahan a daidai lokacin da suke gudanar da jana'izar shahidansu su 370, a daidai wannan lokacin ne kuma suka tura wasu dubban mutanen garin da suka hada da matasa zuwa fagen daga, sannan kuma suka tabbatar da gagarumar alama ta sadaukarwa da daukaka.

translation.en: Ayatollah Khamenei said that the presence of the faithful and revolutionary people of Isfahan in different events before and after the Revolution is a manifestation of the spirit of faith, self-sacrifice and jihad among the people of Isfahan province.
translation.ha: Ayatullah Khamenei ya bayyana kasantuwar da mutanen garin Isfahan masu imani suka yi a fagage daban-daban ‘kafin nasarar juyin juya halin Musulunci, a lokacin juyin juya halin Musuluncin, a lokacin kallafaffen yaki da sauran fagage daban-daban na ci gaban kasa' lamari ne da ke nuni da irin imani da sadaukarwa da jihadin mutanen wannan lardi ne.

translation.en: He reiterated: "Reflecting on these achievements will help us understand the identity and potential of the people of Isfahan, and it will show the people of Isfahan how to continue their progress, glory and pioneering role."
translation.ha: Daga nan sai ya ce: Tuntuni cikin wadannan ababen alfahari lamari ne da ke nuni da karfi da kwarewar da ke tattare da mutanen Isfahan, sannan kuma lamari ne da ke nuni da tafarkin ci gaba da kuma daukaka da wadannan al'umma suke kai.

translation.en: The Leader of the Islamic Revolution said that the enemy has pinned its hopes on causing a rift between the people, creating a gap between the people and government officials and causing suspicion and disagreement over trivial issues. "Everybody should carefully watch these activities of the enemy."
translation.ha: Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci ya bayyana kokarin haifar da rikici tsakanin al'ummomi, haifar da tazara tsakanin mutane da jami'an gwamnati da kuma haifar da mummunar fahimta tsakanin mutane a matsayin daya daga cikin hanyoyin da makiya suke amfani da su, don haka sai ya kirayi dukkanin al'umma da su yi taka tsantsan dangane da wannan makirci na makiya.

translation.en: His Eminence criticized the individuals who accuse the Islamic Republic of what foreigners desire by creating pessimism, despair and discord across the country.
translation.ha: Har ila yau kuma Jagoran ya yi kakkausar suka ga masu kananan maganganu da kokarin sanya yanke kauna cikin zukata da kuma rarrabuwa tsakanin al'umma da kuma tuhumar tsarin Musulunci da cewa yana gudanar da siyasar da za ta tsokano makiya yana mai cewa: Ko shakka babu wadannan mutane suna gudanar da abin makiya suke so ne sannan kuma ko shakka babu suna taimaka wa Amurka da yahudawan sahyoniya ne cikin farfagandar da suke yi, to sai dai al'ummar mu sun san cewa hakan wani ha'inci ne da yake a fili.

translation.en: Ayatollah Khamenei said that promoting moral corruption and use of drugs is a means that is used by the enemies to further their political goals. He called on the people, government officials and the youth to be vigilant in this regard. Referring to Isfahan's Islamic seminary and prestigious universities, the Leader of the Islamic Revolution described Isfahan as a center of religious and scientific studies.
translation.ha: Jagoran juyin juya halin Musuluncin har ila yau ya kirayi jami'an gwamnati da su taka tsantsan da kuma yin duk abin da za su iya wajen fada da kokarin yada fasadi da muggan kwayoyi da makiya suke yi. Tun da farko dai said a Ayatullah Tabataba'i Najad, wakilin Jagora kuma limamin juma'ar garin Isfahan ya gabatar da jawabinsa a wajen wannan taro.

translation.en: Leader: Progress Is Destiny of Iranian Nation - Khamenei.ir
translation.ha: Ganawar Jagora Da Dubban Ma'aikatan Kasar Iran

translation.en: In a meeting with thousands of laborers from across the country on the eve of International Labor Day, Ayatollah Khamenei the Leader of the Islamic Revolution said this morning that progress is the definite destiny of the Iranian nation.
translation.ha: Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci Ayatullah Sayyid Ali Khamenei, a wata ganawa da ya yi a safiyar yau laraba (27-4-2011) da dubun dubatan ma'aikatan kasar Iran don tunawa da ranar ma'aikata ta duniya ya bayyana cewar ci gaba wata makoma ce mai kyau kuma ta tabbas ga al'ummar Iran.

translation.en: Ayatollah Khamenei said that that labor and laborers are an irreplaceable link in the chain of fulfilling vital needs of the country.
translation.ha: Haka nan kuma yayin da yake ci gaba da karin haske kan matsayin 'aiki da kuma ma'aikaci' ya bayyana cewar: A Musulunci da kuma a hankalce matsayin ma'aikaci matsayi ne mai girman gaske don kuwa Musulunci yana ganin aikin ma'aikaci (lebura) a matsayin ibada da kuma aiki na kwarai, sannan kuma Manzon Allah (s.a.w.a) ya kasance yana sumbantar hannun lebura a matsayin hannun da wuta ba ta ci.

translation.en: He further added that during the early years of the Islamic Revolution leftist elements made many efforts to pitch the Iranian labor community against Islam and the Islamic Republic, but that laborers foiled their plots. The Leader of the Islamic Revolution said that the presence of laborers in the Sacred Defense and in the arenas of hard work and progress were the signs of the deep commitment of the Iranian labor community to Islam, the Revolution and Iran.
translation.ha: Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci ya bayyana irin gagarumar shigowa fagen yaki a lokacin kallafaffen yaki da ma'aikata da leburori suka yi sannan daga baya kuma a fage gudanar da ayyuka da ci gaban kasa a matsayin alamu da ke nuni da riko da Musulunci, juyin juya halin Musulunci da kuma kasar Iran da ma'aikatan suke da shi yana mai cewa: Sakamakon kishi da daukakar kasar Iran da ke cikin zukatan ma'aikata, suna ganin aikin da suke yi a matsayin wata gwagwarmaya ce sannan kuma fada ne da ma'abota girman kai da mutanen da suke kokari wajen cutar da tattalin arziki kasar Iran da kuma dunkufar da kasar.

translation.en: His Eminence stated that the general policy of the Islamic Republic is to create solidarity among the elements that affect labor.
translation.ha: Jagoran ya bayyana cewa siyasa ta gaba daya ta wannan tsari da kuma jami'an gwamnati ita ce samar da hadin kai da aiki kafada da kafada tsakanin masu gudanar da aiki inda ya ce: Ko da yake akwai wadansu mutane a cikin kasar nan da suke zaluntar ma'aikata da leburori da kuma take musu hakkokinsu, to amma siyasa ta gaba daya ta tsarin Musulunci ita ce haifar da fahimtar juna da girmamawa tsakanin ma'aikata da wadanda suka dauke su aiki ne.

translation.en: Elsewhere in his speech, His Eminence referred to "The Year of Economic Jihad" and added: "The enemies are continuing their efforts in cultural, security, political and other areas. Moreover, they have focused their attack against Islam and the Islamic Republic on economy in order to create a rift between the people and the government. Therefore, it is necessary to fight the enemy with all our power, relying on our sincerity, understanding and insight."
translation.ha: A wani bangare na jawabin nasa sannan kuma yayin da yake ishara da shekarar kokarin bunkasa tattalin arziki (sunan da aka ba wa shekara ta bana a Iran), Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci ya bayyana cewar: A ci gaba da kokarin da makiya suke yi (na cutar da Iran) a fagagen al'adu, tsaro, siyasa da sauran fagage, sun ba da himma kan batun (takunkumin) tattalin arziki a fadan da suke yi da Musulunci da Jamhuriyar Musulunci, da nufin haifar da rikici tsakanin mutane da gwamnati. A saboda haka wajibi a ci gaba da fada da makiyan cikin dogaro da tsarkin zuciya, fahimta da kuma basira.

translation.en: Ayatollah Khamenei said that combining Iranian art and capabilities will prepare the ground for improving the quality of domestic products and added: "Certain domestic products can rival similar foreign products, and certain other domestic products are far better than similar foreign products. It is necessary to achieve this quality in all domestic products."
translation.ha: Ayatullah Khamenei ya kara da cewa: Wasu daga cikin kayayyakin da ake yi na cikin gida suna da karfin yin gasa da na kasashen waje a wasu lokutan ma sun fi na wajen kyau, wanda wajibi ne a samar da wannan siffa ga sauran kayayyakin da ake da su a cikin gidan.

translation.en: Being dependent on foreign products and ignoring the efforts of Iranian laborers is a kind of disease and a bad habit which direct our national wealth into the pockets of foreign laborers. The Leader of the Islamic Revolution said that consuming domestic products is one of the necessities of "The Year of Economic Jihad" and added: "It is also necessary to raise the quality of these products to an acceptable level."
translation.ha: Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci ya ci gaba da cewa: Damfara da kayayyakin da ake samarwa a waje da kuma yin watsi da kokarin da ma'aikata suke yi a cikin gida wata cuta ce mai muni da ke tura dukiyar kasar nan zuwa aljihun 'yan kasashen waje. A bangaren karshe na jawabin nasa a yayin ganawa da ma'aikata da leburorin, Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci ya yi karin haske kan batutuwan da suke faruwa a wannan yankin da kuma irin kashin da makiya suke sha a fadan da suke yi da Iran.

translation.en: The Leader of the Islamic Revolution said that the anti-human organizations of the arrogant powers have been making constant efforts in order to harm the Islamic Republic. "By isolating Iran, they wanted to prevent our Islamic system - which is the representation of Islamic and human glory and honor - from becoming an inspirational role model for other nations, but in the impressive uprisings of the people of the region, the Iranian nation and the Islamic Republic have won more respect and attention than ever before.
translation.ha: Yayin da yake magana kan kokarin da cibiyoyin ma'abota girman kai na duniya suke yi wajen cutar da Jamhuriyar Musulunci ta Iran Jagoran cewa ya yi: Abin da suke son cimmawa ta hanyar mai da kasar Iran saniyar ware shi ne kada wannan tsari na Musulunci ya zamanto abin koyi da kuma karfafawa ga sauran al'ummomi, to amma al'ummar Iran da kuma Jamhuriyar Musulunci ta Iran sun zamanto abin da al'ummomin wannan yanki da suka yunkura suke komawa gare su da kuma girmama su, sannan gwamnatin Amurka kuma ta zamanto babbar abar kyama a zukatan al'ummomin.

translation.en: His Eminence stressed: "Thanks to the fact that nations are moving on the path of Islam, the future of the region will be far better than its current situation."
translation.ha: Jagoran ya ci gaba da cewa: Makomar wannan yankin, albarkacin himma da yunkuri na al'ummomin bisa tafarkin Musulunci, za ta fi yau din wannan yankin kyau.

translation.en: Leader Visits Tehran's International Book Fair - Khamenei.ir
translation.ha: Jagora Ya Ziyarci Kasuwar Baje Kolin Littafa Na Tehran

translation.en: The Leader of the Islamic Revolution Ayatollah Khamenei paid a 3 hour visit to Tehran's 21st international book fair which has been held at Tehran's Grand Prayer ground (Mosalla) today.
translation.ha: A safiyar yau lahadi (6-5-2012) ne Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci Ayatullah Sayyid Ali Khamenei ya kai ziyarar gani da ido na tsawon sa'oi biyu da rabi zuwa kasuwar baje kolin littafa na Tehran karo na ashirin da biyar.

translation.en: The Leader of the Islamic Revolution Ayatollah Khamenei paid a 3 hour visit to Tehran's 21st international book fair which has been held at Tehran's Grand Prayer ground (Mosalla) today.
translation.ha: A yayin wannan ziyarar, Jagoran juyin juya halin Musuluncin wanda ministan al'adu da shiryawa ta Musulunci ta Iran ya ke rufa masa baya, ya ziyarci shaguna daban-daban na kasuwar inda masu shi suke masa bayani kan littafan da suka kumsa da kuma sabbin littafan da aka buga a shekarar nan.

translation.en: During his visit, Ayatollah Khamenei spoke to various publishers who had participated in the book fair and closely inspected publication issues as well as the latest publications on different fields.
translation.ha: Kamar yadda kuma ya yi kiran da a gudanar da bincike na ilimi a duk lokacin da aka gudanar da irin wannan kasuwar baje kolin littafin don ganin shin an samu ci gaba ne a fagen irin abubuwan da littafan suka kumsa ko kuma a'a.

translation.en: During the visit, the minister of Culture and Islamic Guidance Mr. Saffar Harrandi briefed the Leader on public attendance in the book fair, the number and titles of new books in the book fair, and the number of the publisher participating in the fair.
translation.ha: Yayin da ya ke magana kan matsalolin da ake fuskanta wajen samar da littafa da watsa su tsakanin jama'a kuwa, Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci ya bayyana cewar: wajibi ne ma'aikatar al'adu da shiryarwa ta Musulunci ta hanyar taimakon gwamnati su yi abin da za su iya wajen kawar da irin wadannan matsaloli musamman batun tsadar takardu.

translation.en: Leader's Address to Teachers - Khamenei.ir  The following is the full text of the speech delivered on May 5, 2010 by Ayatollah Khamenei the Leader of the Islamic Revolution to a large group of teachers from across the country.
translation.ha: Shimfida: A ranar laraba (5, Mayu, 2010) ne Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci Ayatullah Sayyid Ali Khamenei ya gana da dubban malaman makarantu na kasar Iran wadanda suka kawo masa ziyarar ban girma don tunawa da Ranar Malamai Ta Kasar Iran (ranar shahadar Ayatullah Shahid Murtaza Mutahhari).

translation.en: In the Name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful
translation.ha: Da Sunan Allah Mai Rahama Mai Jin Kai

translation.en: Dear brothers and sisters, welcome!
translation.ha: Ina muku barka da zuwa ‘yan'uwa maza da mata masu girma!

translation.en: I would like to congratulate all of you and all the teachers across the country as well as the Iranian nation on Teachers' Day.
translation.ha: Ina rokon Allah da Ya sanya ranar malamai ta kasance mai albarka a gare ku da kuma dukkanin malaman kasar nan sannan da kuma dukkanin al'ummar Iran.

translation.en: There is a lesson in the fact that Teachers' Day was chosen to coincide with the day a great teacher was martyred. That was a symbolic decision. That is to say, the greatness of teaching is so much that this praiseworthy and great job requires a combination of intellectual and scholarly work as well as presence in essential arenas of life - as was evident in Shahid Motahhari's life.
translation.ha: Sanya ranar malamai ta zamanto ta yi daidai da ranar shahadar wani malami mai girma, hakan darasi ne a gare mu; wannan wani yunkuri ne da ke nuni da wani abu; wanda shi ne cewa girman aikin koyarwa da tarbiyya ya kai irin wannan matsayi mai girma inda ya samo asali daga aiki na tunani da ilimi da kasantuwa a fagage na asasi na rayuwa - abin da aka gan shi cikin rayuwar shahid Mutahhari (yardar Allah ta tabbata a gare shi) - hakan shi ne abin da ake son gani cikin wannan aiki mai girma da daukaka.

translation.en: One essential point is that the teaching community of our country should always keep the greatness of their job in mind.
translation.ha: Wani batu na asasi shi ne cewa malaman wannan kasar su dinga sanya jin irin girman wannan aiki da suka dauka sannan kuma suke ci gaba da gudanar da shi a cikin zukatansu.

translation.en: If you know what a great job you are doing, your motivation, efforts, and faith will be doubled - just like a courageous soldier who is doing his job and making selfless efforts in a sensitive part of the front, and the role of his selfless efforts is so great that it can affect and benefit the entire friendly front.
translation.ha: Idan har mutum ya fahimci irin girman aikin da ya ke gudanarwa, kumajinsa, yunkurinsa, imani da kokarinsa cikin wannan aiki, za su rubanya. Tamkar wani jarumin soja ne wanda yake gudanar da aiki da kuma kokarinsa a wani yanki daga cikin yankunan fagen dagansa; irin girma da gudummawar da wannan kokari nasa yake da ita da za ta iya zama mai tasiri da kuma fa'ida ga dukkanin wadanda suke cikin wannan fagen dagan da yake wajen.

translation.en: If the soldier is aware of this, he will never get tired or bored, and nothing will undermine the hope in his heart.
translation.ha: Matukar wannan soja ya fahimci hakan, ko da wasa ba zai gaji ba; ba zai ji gajiyawa ba; babu komai kashin yanke kauna da zai shigo cikin zuciyarsa.

translation.en: Teachers play a vital role in society, and their role is not comparable to other important roles in society. Our teachers should always keep this point in mind.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne wannan batu ya zamanto a gaban malamanmu a ko da yaushe su dinga jin cewa tasirin malami cikin kowace irin al'umma, tasiri ne na rayuwa; ba abu ne da za a iya kwatanta shi da mafi yawa daga cikin gudummawa masu muhimmanci cikin al'umma da zamantakewa ba.

translation.en: This has been scientifically proven. Just as the effect of genetic factors involved in some physical disorders can be offset through treatment and prevention, it is also possible to change inherited moral and spiritual factors.
translation.ha: Kamar yadda ake iya kawar da abubuwan da aka gada na cututtuka na jiki da ababen da suke bayyana a jiki ta hanyar tunani daban-daban, ta hanyar shiga tsakani da kuma ayyuka daban-daban, to su ma abubuwan da aka gada na halaye da ruhi haka suke.

translation.en: Conversely, they can make them bad-natured and malevolent. They can train their students to be optimistic, self-confident, hopeful, and hardworking, or they can make them hopeless and isolated.
translation.ha: Sannan kuma yana iya mai she shi kishiyar hakan, yana iya mai she shi wani ashararin mutum, mai bakar zuciya da neman sharri; yana iya mai she shi mutum mai kyakkyawan fata, mai dogaro da kansa, mai fata, mai kaunar gudanar da aiki da kazar-kazar.

translation.en: This shows the importance of teachers' role. Society needs faithful, motivated, patient, hopeful, optimistic, innovative, thoughtful, and scholarly individuals who are committed to pursuing public interests and reaching the peaks of individual and social perfection.
translation.ha: To, wata al'umma tana bukatar mutane muminai, masu kumaji, masu hakuri, kyakkyawan fata, kyakkyawan mahanga, kaunar ababen amfani da manufa ta gaba daya, kaunar isa ga koluluwar kamala ta dan'adam da al'umma, mutane masu son samar da sabbin abubuwa, masu tunani, ma'abotan bincike, ma'abotan ci gaba.

translation.en: That is where the role of teachers becomes clear.
translation.ha: A nan ne rawar da malami zai iya takawa take fitowa fili.

translation.en: Of course many different things have been said about educational issues and the role of teachers.
translation.ha: Ko da yake an fadi maganganu da dama dangane da lamarin ilimi da tarbiyya da kuma gudummawar malami.

translation.en: Today we do not have the luxury of limiting ourselves to words only. We need action.
translation.ha: Mu dai a halin yanzu ba muna cikin yanayi ne wanda kawai za mu takaita da magana ba; a yau muna bukatar aiki.

translation.en: The education system can determine the future of this country.
