translation.en: In order to bring Islam to its knees, the hypocritical fiend of colonialism is currently making use of all its capabilities - anything ranging from military coercion, iron-hand policy, and outright occupation to the evil chain of propaganda and to utilization of thousands of slandering centers; from organizing terrorist groups and brutal murders to preparing the ground for corruption, to distributing and promoting drugs, and to destroying the determination, spirits, and morality of the youth; and from all-out political attacks against the centers of resistance to provoking ethnic conceit and sectarian prejudice as well as enmity among brothers.
translation.ha: Amma a yau fuskar shaidanci na mulkin mallaka, sun shigo fage da dukkan karfinsu domin dunkufar da Musulunci; kama daga amfani da karfin soji da bugu mai karfi da mamaya ta fili har zuwa ga bakaken hanyoyin farfagandarsu da kuma sauran dubban hanyoyi na yada kararraki da jita-jita, haka nan kuma kama daga shirya ayyukan ta'addanci da kisan gillan rashin imani har zuwa ga yada kayayyakin aiki na yada fasadi da yadawa da kwadaitar da (amfani) da muggan kwayoyi da lalata azama da ruhin kyawawan halaye na matasa, haka kuma kama daga kai hare-hare daga dukkan bangarori na siyasa a kan ciboyoyin gwagwarmaya har zuwa ga takalo fushi na kabilanci da kuma tsaurin ra'ayi na kungiyanci da haifar da kiyayya tsakanin ‘yan'uwa.

translation.en: If suspicion - which is what enemies desire - is replaced with kindness, trust, and unanimity among Muslim nations and Islamic denominations and ethnicities, a large part of the ill-wishers' plots will be foiled and their evil plot of establishing domination over the Islamic Ummah will be thwarted.
translation.ha: Matukar dai a tsakanin al'ummar musulmi da kuma tsakanin kungiyoyi da mazhabobi na Musulunci da kabilun musulmi suka samar da yanayin kauna da kyakkyawan zato da hadin kai a tsakaninsu da maye gurbin mummunan zato da mugun kallo wanda shi ne abin da makiya suke son gani da wadannan abubuwa, to kuwa za a iya magance wani bangare mai yawa na makirce-makirce da mummunan kulli (na makiya) sannan kuma mummunan makirci da kullinsu na gudanar da mulkin mallaka a kan al'ummar musulmi zai zamanto da mara ido.

translation.en: The hajj is one of the best opportunities to achieve this lofty goal.
translation.ha: Aikin hajji daya ne daga cikin mafi girman dama wajen cimma wannan manufa mai girma.

translation.en: Through cooperation and relying on the common principles discussed in the Quran and Sunnah, Muslims will be able to stand against this hypocritical fiend and defeat it through their willpower and determination.
translation.ha: Al'ummar musulmi ta hanyar hadin kai da dogaro da tushe da asasin da suka yi tarayya a kansu da suka fito daga cikin Alkur'ani da sunnar (Ma'aiki) za su iya samun karfin da za su iya tsayin daka a gaban irin wannan shaidanci mai fuskoki daban-daban sannan su yi nasara a kansa da kuma tabbatar da imaninsu.

translation.en: By following the lessons of the great Imam Khomeini, Islamic Iran has become a prime example of this successful resistance.
translation.ha: Kasar Musulunci ta Iran ta hanyar koyi da darussan (Imam) Khumaini mai girma, (ta kasance) babbar misali ce da take a fili na irin wannan gwagwarmaya da ta yi nasara.

translation.en: They have been defeated in Iran.
translation.ha: Wadancan mutane sun sha kashi a kasar Musulunci ta Iran.

translation.en: Thirty years of machinations, conspiracy, and enmity - anything ranging from staging a coup d'état and causing the eight-year imposed war to imposing sanctions and freezing our assets; from psychological and propaganda warfare and media confrontation to efforts to thwart our scientific growth and acquisition of knowledge- especially nuclear knowledge- to engaging in open provocation and interference in the impressive and significant presidential election - all these turned into scenes of the enemy's defeat, disgrace, and confusion. And the ayah "surely the machinations of the devil is weak" [the Holy Quran, Sura al-Nisa (4), Ayah 76] was once again realized in front of the eyes of the Iranian people.
translation.ha: Shekaru talatin na kafar ungulu da makirce-makirce da kiyayya kama daga kokarin juyin mulki da kallafaffen yaki na shekaru takwas, har zuwa ga takunkumi da kwace dukiya, haka nan kuma kama daga yaki irin na kwakwalwa da bakar farfaganda da amfani da kafafen watsa labarai (wajen yada kararraki) har zuwa ga kokari wajen hana ci gaba na ilimi da kuma samun ilmummuka na zamani ciki kuwa har da ilimi da fasahar nukiliya, kai hatta ma da tunzurawa da tsoma baki na fili cikin gagarumin zaben (shugaban kasa) na baya-bayan nan da aka gudanar, amma dukkanin wadannan abubuwa sun zamanto wani fage ne na shan kashin makiya, sannan kuma a wani karon ma wannan aya ta "Hakika kaidin Shaidan ya kasance mai rauni" ta sake bayyana a gaban idanun al'ummar Iran.

translation.en: In any other part of the world, where resistance that was rooted in determination and religious faith deployed the people against the boastful arrogant powers, the ultimate victory was for Muslims and the oppressors were doomed to suffer defeat and disgrace.
translation.ha: A duk wani yanki na daban da aka samu irin wannan gwagwarmaya wacce ta ginu bisa asasin azama da imani wajen fuskantar ma'abota girman kai, to nasara tana tare da muminai sannan kuma rashin nasara da shan kashi wani sakamako ne da babu makawa cikinsa na azzalumai.

translation.en: The prominent victory gained in the 33-day war on Lebanon as well as the proud and victorious jihad of the people of Gaza during the past 3 years are the living proof of this reality.
translation.ha: Irin nasarar da aka samu a kasar Labanon cikin kwanaki 33 da kuma irin daukaka da nasarar Gaza cikin shekaru uku da suka gabata wata rayayyiyar shaida ce da take tabbatar da wannan hakika (ta taimakon muminai da shan kashin ma'abota girman kai).

translation.en: I strongly recommend that the hajjis who were graced to make this pilgrimage - especially the ulama and orators of Islamic countries who have attended this divine appointment as well as Friday prayer leaders of the holy shrines [of Mecca and Medina] - identify the urgent duty which they shoulder today through appropriate understanding of the issues.
translation.ha: Wasiyyar da nake jaddadawa (a ko da yaushe) ga dukkanin alhazan da suka sami wannan dacewa musamman ga malamai da masu wa'azin kasashen musulmi wadanda suka kasance a wannan waje na Ubangiji da kuma limaman juma'a na wadannan haramomi guda biyu masu girma (Makka da Madina); ita ce cewa su san irin nauyin da ke wuyansu a yau wanda kuma ake bukatarsa cikin gaggawa ta hanyar kyakkyawar fahimtar wannan lamari.

translation.en: With all their power, they should explain the plots of the enemies of Islam to their audience and call the people to friendship and unity.
translation.ha: Su sanar da masu saurarensu da dukkan karfinsu irin makircin makiya Musulunci sannan kuma su kirayi al'umma zuwa ga hadin kai da kaunar juna.

translation.en: They should seriously avoid whatever causes suspicion among Muslims, and they should inundate their shouts on the arrogant powers and the enemies of the Islamic Ummah, especially America and the Zionists who lead all fitnas.
translation.ha: Lalle su nesanci duk wani abin da zai haifar da mummunan zato tsakanin musulmi a tsakaninsu sannan kuma duk wani take (da la'ana) da suke da ita su watsa ta a kan ma'abota girman kai da makiya al'ummar musulmi da iyayengijin dukkanin fitina wato yahudawan sahyoniya da kasar Amurka.

translation.en: They should demonstrate expressing hatred towards polytheists in words and action.
translation.ha: Sannan kuma su bayyanar da barranta daga mushirikai cikin maganganu da ayyukansu.

translation.en: I solemnly pray to Allah the Exalted to bestow His guidance, grace, assistance, and mercy on all of us.
translation.ha: Cikin kaskantar da kai na ke rokon shiriya da nasara da taimako da rahamar Allah Madaukakin Sarki a gare ni da kuma dukkaninku baki daya.

translation.en: Sayyid Ali Khamenei
translation.ha: Sayyid Ali Husaini Khamene'i

translation.en: Leader Visits Naval Base in Southern Iran - Khamenei.ir
translation.ha: Jagora Ya Kai Rangadi Sansanin Sojin Ruwa Na Iran

translation.en: Addressing a group of senior Navy commanders at the base, Ayatollah Khamenei said that there are many capacities and areas for further progress of the Navy.
translation.ha: Jin kadan bayan isowar Jagoran kwamandojin sansani na biyu da na uku na yankin sun yi wa Jagoran bayani kan yanayin yankunan.

translation.en: He stressed that the increased presence and activities of the Navy in international waters will prepare the ground for the Navy to become a genuinely strategic force.
translation.ha: Daga cikin bayanan da aka yi wa Jagoran har da irin ayyukan da dakarun ruwan suke yi na ba da kariya ga jiragen kasuwanci da masu safarar man fetur daga 'yan fashin jiragen ruwa.

translation.en: His Eminence said that the presence of Iran's Navy in the Bab-el-Mandeb strait, the Gulf of Aden, the Red Sea and the Suez Canal brought about glory for Iran.
translation.ha: Haka nan kuma yayin da ya ke ishara da tasiri na kasa da kasa da kasantuwar dakarun Iran a Tekun Aden, Tekun Maliya da kuma mashigar Suez, Jagoran ya bayyana cewar: Wannan kasantuwar dai tana bata wa makiya rai don kuwa kasantuwar sojojin ruwan Jamhuriyar Musulunci ta Iran a wadannan tekuna wani lamari ne mai karfafa gwuiwan al'ummomi da sanya musu kyakkyawan fata.

translation.en: He added: "This presence really frightened the enemy because the powerful presence of the Islamic Republic of Iran's naval units in international waters is a source of hope and inspiration for other nations."
translation.ha: Jagoran juyin juya halin Musuluncin ya ci gaba da cewa: Jamhuriyar Musulunci ta Iran dai ba ma'abociyar wuce gona da iri ba ce, to amma dai za ta ci gaba da zama a Tekun kasa da kasa, don kuwa wadannan Teku mallaka ce ta dukkanin al'ummomi wajen musayen al'adu.

translation.en: The Leader of the Islamic Revolution stated that the Islamic Republic of Iran is not an aggressive country.
translation.ha: Jagoran juyin juya halin Musuluncin ya bayyana dakaru ruwa na soji da na dakarun kare juyi a matsayin masu taimaka wa juna inda ya ce: Sojojin ruwa guda biyu ne da suke da ayyuka masu kyau, a saboda haka za su iya musayen irin kwarewar da suke da ita da junansu.

translation.en: Ayatollah Khamenei stressed that executive organizations should cooperate with the Armed Forces in order to address the needs of the Army personnel and their families.
translation.ha: Har ila yau kuma Jagoran juyin juya halin Musuluncin ya sake jaddada wajibcin aiki kafada da kafada tsakanin cibiyoyi da hukumomi na gwamnati da dakaru masu makamin da kuma ba su dukkanin hadin kai da kuma taimakon da suke bukata.

translation.en: The following is the full text of the speech delivered on April 11, 2010 by Ayatollah Khamenei the Leader of the Islamic Revolution in a meeting with a group of high-ranking military and police officials in Tehran.
translation.ha: Shimfida: A ranar lahadi, 11, Aprilun 2010 ne Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci Ayatullah Sayyid Ali Khamene'i ya gana da manyan kwamandojin soji, dakarun kare juyin juya halin Musulunci da kuma na ‘yan sandan Jamhuriyar Musulunci ta Iran.

translation.en: In the Name of God, the Beneficent, the Merciful
translation.ha: Da Sunan Allah Mai Rahama Mai Jin Kai

translation.en: I would like to congratulate all you dear brothers who are shouldering heavy responsibilities on the occasion of Norouz and the arrival of the spring - the season of vitality, freshness, and revitalization. I have been witness to your efforts in different areas. Hopefully, God will accept these efforts from all of you, and He will provide you with the opportunity to enter and succeed in other vast arenas through intensified labor and efforts.
translation.ha: Ina taya murnar idin Nuroz (sabuwar shekarar hijira shamsiyya) da kuma shigowar kaka - wanda lokaci ne na farin ciki da sabunta rayuwa - ga dukkaninku 'yan'uwa masu girma, wanda kuke da gagarumin nauyi a kafadunku, sannan kuma muna ganin irin gagarumin kokari da wahalhalun da kuke sha a bangarori daban-daban da suka shafe ku.

translation.en: God willing, He will give you the opportunity to help the Armed Forces reach a position that this government and faithful, sincere, and hardworking elements like you deserve.
translation.ha: Muna rokon Allah Madaukakin Sarki da Ya karbi irin wadannan wahalhalu da kokarin da kuke yi, sannan kuma Ya ba ku dacewa - wajen samun gagarumar nasara a fagagen daban-daban ta hanyar rubanya himma da kuma aiki tukuru - kamar yadda na sanar da sunan wannan shekara ta bana ga al'ummar Iran (a matsayin shekarar rubanya himma da kuma aiki tukuru) - sannan dakaru masu makami na Jamhuriyar Musulunci ta Iran su sami nasarar isa ga wajen da ya dace da wannan tsari (na Musulunci), wanda ya dace da wadannan muminan mutane masu gaskiya da hidima irin ku.

translation.en: The existence of sincere and friendly officials is indeed one of the greatest divine blessings for the Armed Forces in this era. One must consider this a truly great blessing and thank God for it.
translation.ha: Alal hakika daya daga cikin manyan ni'imomin Ubangiji a wannan lokacin ga dakarunmu masu makami, ita ce samuwar jami'ai masu gaskiya da kuma kokari; wannan lamari ne da ke sanya mutum ya girmama irin wannan ni'ima mai girma sannan kuma ya gode.

translation.en: But this is the general attitude. When I look at you dear commanders, I really thank God for being generous to this nation and assigning such faithful and sincere elements to these great positions of responsibility.
translation.ha: Ni dai a duk lokacin da na kalli kwamandojinmu masu girma - wadanda ku din nan ne - alal hakika na kan gode wa Allah Madaukakin Sarki saboda falalar da Ya yi wa wannan al'umma da kuma sanya irin wadannan muminan jami'ai masu ikhalsi a kan wadannan ayyuka masu girma.

translation.en: Therefore, you need to be thankful for having a position that gives you the opportunity to play an important role.
translation.ha: A saboda haka, wannan lamarin yana bukatar godiya na cewa kun sami wannan dama ta yin tasiri da kuma taka gagarumar rawa.

translation.en: Your presence, determination, knowledge, and sincerity can affect the fate and history of the country as well as the future of this nation.
translation.ha: Kasantuwarku, irin iradar da kuke da ita, masaniyarku, da kuma darajar irin ikhlasin da kuke da shi dukkaninsu suna iya taka gagarumar rawa cikin makomar wannan kasar, cikin tarihin kasar nan, cikin makomar wannan al'umma, ba wai kawai makoma ta shekaru goma ko shekaru ashirin ba, makomar shekaru dari da dari biyu na wannan kasar da kuma yin tasiri.

translation.en: And if this effect is positive, then it will be superior to everything else and nothing will be equivalent to it.
translation.ha: Idan har wannan tasirin tasiri ne mai kyau, to a nan zai zamanto sadaka mai gudana (sadakatut jariya, wato sadakar da take bin mutum har zuwa kabarinsa), wanda shi ne ke sama da komai, babu wani abin da za a kwatanta shi da shi.

translation.en: If you can establish a trend or do something that prepares the ground for the prosperity of a nation and brings about religious and material benefits for the nation, your work will be incomparable to all kinds of worshiping, praying, or ordinary services to God's servants. Your work will be superior.
translation.ha: Ku din nan kuna iya zama wani tafarki (wata hanya), ku aikata wani aiki wanda sakamakon wannan aiki wata al'umma za ta samu sa'ada ta shekara da shekaru, ta samu duniya da lahira, hakan kuwa ba lamari ne da ba za a taba kwatanta shi da wata ibada ba, ko wata sallar dare ba ko kuma wata hidima da aka saba da ita ba ga bayin Allah; lamari ne mai girman gaske.

translation.en: God has provided you and me with this opportunity. Therefore, we need to be thankful for it.
translation.ha: Allah Madaukakin Sarki Ya ba mu ni da ku wannan damar; a saboda haka wajibi ne mu gode.

translation.en: However, just like all great achievements that bring about great benefits, this opportunity necessitates heavy costs and dangerous requirements. "Whoever reaps the benefits should pay the costs."
translation.ha: To sai dai tamkar sauran manyan ayyuka, kamar yadda ganimar da ke cikinsu take da yawa, haka nan hatsarin da ke cikinsu yake da yawa da kuma girma; "wanda yake da tumaki wajibi ne ya biya wani abu" abubuwa ne na musaye a tsakaninsu; tamkar hawa sama ne a wasan hawa dutse.

translation.en: The higher one's position is, the more serious the dangers are.
translation.ha: Gwargwadon yadda matsayi ya yi sama gwargwadon yadda hatsarin da ke tattare da shi yake karuwa.

translation.en: And the way to counter these dangers is to fulfill our obligations and fight our illegitimate passions.
translation.ha: Hanyar kawar da wannan hatsarin ita ce kula da nauyin da ke wuya da kuma fada da soyace-soyacen zuciya.

translation.en: If you tread this path - which is not of course an easy task - it will become clear what you should do.
translation.ha: Matukar kuka riki wannan tafarki - wanda tabbas ba lamari ne mai sauki ba, akwai matsaloli a cikinsa - to a fili za ku san abin da ya kamata ku aikata.

translation.en: Therefore, we should ask Allah the Exalted not to turn His blessing - that is to say, the opportunity to be in a position where we can play a role in the fate of the country and the people - into retribution for us.
translation.ha: Wannan ni'ima da Ka ba mu - wato damar kasantuwa a wani waje mai tasiri, cikin makomar kasar nan da al'ummar nan - kada ka mayar da shi abin fushi; wannan lamari wanda zai iya zama hanyar lada, har ila yau kuma zai iya zama abin tuhuma.

translation.en: This depends on our own efforts.
translation.ha: Na'am, hakan yana da alaka ne da kokarinmu.

translation.en: And if we ask God for assistance and try hard, it will become possible. As the Commander of the Faithful (a.s.) said, the armed forces of a country act like ramparts.
translation.ha: Dakaru masu makami - kamar yadda ya zo cikin jawabin Amirul Muminin (tsira da amincin Allah su tabbata a gare shi) - garkuwa ce, katanga da kuma garkuwa ce ga wata al'umma da kuma wata kasa.

translation.en: For this reason, the Armed Forces must always maintain their solidity.
translation.ha: A saboda haka wajibi ne dakaru masu makami su zamanto a ko da yaushe a tsaye kuma cikin shiri.

translation.en: You should consider the Armed Forces from this prospective.
translation.ha: Da irin wannan kallon ne ya kamata ku dinga kallon dakaru masu makami.

translation.en: They must always maintain their solidity. If they remain solid, if the sentries on the walls stay constantly vigilant and watch the enemy movements, and if they do not allow any security breaches, the security inside the walls will be safeguarded.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne a kiyaye wannan tsayin dakan. Idan har aka samu wannan karfi, matukar dai masu gadin da suke kan wannan garkuwar da kula da ita suka zamanto cikin fadaka a ko da yaushe, suna sanya ido, suna kula da motsin makiya, ba su gafala ba, to kuwa za a iya tabbatar da tsaron cikin wannan garkuwar; sannan kuma mutane za su samu duniya da lahirarsu karkashin inuwar wannan tsaro.

translation.en: Therefore, strengthening the Armed Forces is a religious principle that cannot be ignored.
translation.ha: A saboda haka karfafa dakaru masu makami, wani tushe ne na addini da ba za a iya rufe ido kansa ba.

translation.en: The government should pay attention to this point, and the people should support it. The ramparts must remain solid. In all circumstances and regardless of what happens inside the walls, the Armed Forces must continue protecting the country.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne kowa da kowa ya lura, su kansu dakaru masu makamin wajibi ne su yi taka tsantsan, ita ma gwamnati wajibi ne ta ba da himma, su ma mutane wajibi ne su ba da goyon baya; wajibi ne wannan garkuwar ta zamanto tana da karfi. A dukkan yanayi, duk wani abin da zai faru a cikinta, wajibi ne a kiyaye garkuwar dakaru masu makami.

translation.en: This is an analogy, and ramparts mean different things. You are like ramparts. The Army, the Army of the Guardians of the Islamic Revolution, the Basij Forces, the Police, and the Intelligence Agency are all different kinds of ramparts.
translation.ha: Ku din nan garkuwa ce; sojoji ta wani yanayi garkuwa ce, dakarun kare juyi ta wani yanayi garkuwa ce, dakarun Basij (dakarun sa kai) ta wani yanayi garkuwa ce, 'yan sanda ta wani yanayi garkuwa ce, masu kula da bayanan sirri da ba da kariya ta wani yanayin garkuwa ce; wajibi ne kowane guda daga cikin wadannan bangarori ya kiyaye wannan kasantuwa ta sa a matsayin garkuwa a fagen da ya dace da shi.

translation.en: One should be very cautious in such a situation and act in a vigilant, prudent, and courageous manner.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne a yi taka tsantsan cikin irin wannan duniyar, wajibi ne a yi aiki cikin taka tsantsan da fadaka, a yi aiki cikin tunani da kuma jaruntaka.

translation.en: You can see how the heads of governments behave across the world.
translation.ha: Kuna ganin irin abubuwan da wadannan shugabanni na duniya suke aikatawa; don biyan bukatun zukatansu, don ba da kariya ga kamfanonin da suke goyon bayansu, don cike aljihunan masu kamfanoni da manyan 'yan kasuwa, kuna ganin irin bala'in da suke haifarwa a duniya; ko da yake suna yin hakan ne ta hanyar fakewa da take marasa tushe da suke cike kararraki.

translation.en: The modern world is like this. It is based on lies, deception, oppression, and masked coercion - though they sometimes remove their masks.
translation.ha: Duniya dai ta zamanto irin wannan duniyar, duniyar da ta ginu bisa karya, bisa yaudara, bisa zalunci da lullube fuska; duk kuwa da cewa ana iya magance hakan.

translation.en: As you saw, a few days ago the US President implicitly threatened to use atomic weapons.
translation.ha: Kun ga hakan dai; 'yan kwanakin da suka gabata din nan, shugaban kasar Amurka ta hanyar ishara ya yi barazanar amfani da makaman nukiliya.

translation.en: That was a very strange remark. The world must not at all pass over this remark.
translation.ha: Lalle wannan magana ce mai ban mamaki; bai kamata duniya ta rufe ido kan wannan maganar ba.

translation.en: In the 21st century, which is filled with all those claims in support of peace, human rights, global organizations, fighting terrorism, and other such things, the president of a country stands up and threatens to launch nuclear attacks!
translation.ha: A karni na ashirin da daya, karnin da ake dukkanin irin wannan ikirarin sulhu da hakkokin bil'adama da fada da ta'addanci da sauransu, amma a sami shugaban wata kasa ya zo ya tsaya yana barazanar amfani da makaman nukiiya!

translation.en: This is a very strange remark in the world.
translation.ha: Lalle wannan magana ce mai ban mamaki a duniya.

translation.en: This will work against their interests. They do not understand.
translation.ha: Wannan lamari ne mai cutarwa a gare su, ba su fahimci hakan ba.

translation.en: The clear message that this remark conveys is that the US government is an evil and unreliable government.
translation.ha: Ma'ana ta sarari ta wannan magana ita ce cewa gwamnatin Amurka, wata gwamnati ce ta ashararanci wacce kuma ba abar yarda ba.

translation.en: They have been trying for years to prove that the Islamic Republic cannot be trusted regarding the nuclear issue.
translation.ha: Shekaru kenan wadannan mutane suke kokari wajen nuna cewa Jamhuriyar Musulunci ta Iran ba abar yarda ba ce cikin shirin makamashin nukiliyanmu.

translation.en: This is while the Islamic Republic has neither started a war against a country during the past 30 years, nor has it trained terrorists.
translation.ha: Alhali kuwa cikin wadannan shekaru talatin Jamhuriyar Musulunci ba ta taba kai hari ga wata kasa ba, haka nan kuma ba ta tarbiyyantar da 'yan ta'adda ba.

translation.en: They want to say that the Islamic Republic is not trustworthy.
translation.ha: Wadannan mutane suna so ne su ce Jamhuriyar Musulunci ba abar yarda ba ce.

translation.en: Who cannot be trusted in the world?
translation.ha: To waye ya zamanto ba abin yarda ba a duniya?

translation.en: That is a very strange remark. That is a source of disgrace for them.
translation.ha: Lalle wannan magana ce mai ban mamaki, wannan lamari ne abin kunya a gare su.

translation.en: It is necessary to be extremely cautious in such a world.
translation.ha: Wajibi ne a yi taka tsantsan cikin wannan duniyar.

translation.en: National determination is more important. National resistance against these storms is more important than military preparedness. Storms come and go, no matter how strong they are.
translation.ha: Guguwa ta kan zo ta kuma wuce; duk irin karfin da take da shi kuwa, za ta zo ta kuma wuce; abin da yake da muhimmanci shi ne mu sami karfi ko da tsayin dakan fada da wannan guguwa da kuma rashin hakan.

translation.en: The problem with the buildings that collapse is that they are not firm enough to withstand the storm long enough. Otherwise storms are not permanent.
translation.ha: Matsalar ginin da ba shi da karfi, ita cewa ba zai iya tsayawa da kafafunsa ba; idan kuwa ba haka ba ai guguwa ba mai dawwama ba ce.

translation.en: If a nation stands firm and maintains its resistance, it will be able to withstand the storms, which come and go. Storms will go away, but a strong nation will stay.
translation.ha: Idan har wata al'umma ta karfafa gwuiwanta, ta ba wa kanta karfin tsayin dakan da take da shi, ta karfafa irin tsayin daka da take da shi, to babu wani abin da wannan guguwar za ta yi mata; za ta zo ta wuce, za su zo su wuce amma wannan al'umma za ta ci gaba da zama.

translation.en: The strength of a government depends on religious faith, the power of resistance, strong determination, and not being deceived by the compliments that are sometimes easily exchanged in many political interactions. But these compliments are there to mask the violent and furious face of people with evil intentions.
translation.ha: Da wadannan abubuwa ne ake iya karfafa wani tsari: da imani, da karfin tsayin daka, da tsayayyiyar azama, rashin fadawa tarkon yaudara daga maganganu masu dadi da wadansu suke fadinsu cikin sauki; alhali kuwa a karkashin wadannan maganganu ana iya ganin bakaken fuskoki da suke cike da gaba da fushi da bakar aniya a tattare da su.

translation.en: The examples abound in our own time, and many such things have happened to us as well as various other countries over the past few decades.
translation.ha: Misalan hakan ba su da iyaka a wannan zamani na mu da kuma cikin shekaru goma na baya-bayan nan; mun ga misali da yawa dangane da sauran mutane, dangane da kasashe daban-daban, dangane da mu kanmu.

translation.en: We have been witness to many such things.
translation.ha: Abin farin cikin shi ne cewa muna da dukkanin wadannan abubuwa.

translation.en: It is 30 years now that the Iranian nation has been resisting in the face of various storms, and this Revolution has become stronger.
translation.ha: Shekaru talatin kenan da guguwa daban-daban suke zuwa su kuma wuce, amma wannan al'umma tana nan tsaye kyam, wannan juyi kuma ya kara karfi.

translation.en: Today we are far stronger than we used to be 10, 20, or 30 years ago.
translation.ha: A yau karfin da muke da shi ya fi na shekaru goman da suka gabata, shekaru ashirin din da suka gabata, shekaru talatin din da suka gabata.

translation.en: We are far more powerful in all areas. We have proven this in the face of various kinds of hostilities.
translation.ha: Karfin da muke da shi a bangarori daban-daban yana da yawan gaske a yau din nan; mun tabbatar da hakan cikin fuskantar makiyanmu a lokuta daban-daban da muka yi, cikin yardar Allah da kuma dacewa ta Ubangiji al'ummar mu ta nuna hakan.

translation.en: But as I said, these protective walls must not be vulnerable to any breaches of security.
translation.ha: To amma kamar yadda muka fadi, bai kamata ku bari wannan garkuwa ta huje ba.

translation.en: It is a fact that the people living inside these walls are standing firm, but the walls - that is, the Armed Forces - must be kept strong.
translation.ha: Na'am cikin wannan garkuwa, mutane suna nan sun tsaya kyam, to amma wannan garkuwar - wato dakaru masu makami - wajibi ne su rike ta da dukkan karfinsu.

translation.en: First of all, the Armed Forces must take the threats seriously - I have repeated this several times before.
translation.ha: Da farko dai wajibi ne dakaru masu makami su dauki barazana da ake yi da dukkan karfinsu; a lokuta da dama na sha fadin haka.

translation.en: Your evaluations should not be like political evaluations of threat. Political evaluations say that, for example, the possibility of an enemy attack is weak - 20 or 30 percent.
translation.ha: Hisabi irin na ‘yan siyasa shi ne cewa a matsayin misali yiyuwar kawo harin makiya kadan ne; kashi ashirin cikin dari ne, kashi talatin cikin dari ne; ku din nan wajibi ne ku ce yiyuwar kawo harin dari bisa dari ne.

translation.en: It is necessary to be constantly vigilant.
translation.ha: A ra'ayina wajibi ne a dau lamarin samar da sabbin abubuwa da dukkan karfi.

translation.en: Fortunately, this is already the case with the Armed Forces.
translation.ha: Abin farin cikin shi ne cewa dakaru masu makaminmu suna da wannan.

translation.en: One can see that in the beginning of the Revolution only a small portion of these talents used to be utilized in different areas.
translation.ha: Alal hakika mutum yana ji a jikinsa sannan kuma yana gani yadda a farkon nasarar juyin juya halin Musulunci, an yi amfani da wani bangare ne kawai na irin wadannan abubuwa da ake da su a bangarori daba-daban.

translation.en: This experience shows us that our capacities are very high. You should go after innovative activities. You should go after the ideas that have not been explored in the world - regarding warfare and intelligence strategies as well as the methods of dealing with the enemy.
translation.ha: Ku kama hanyar sabbin ayyuka, ku kama hanyar neman ayyukan da ake bukata wadanda kuma ba a riga da an gwada su ba; a cikin ayyukanku na soji, cikin ayyukanku na taro bayanan sirri, cikin ayyukan fuskantar makiya; ku gudanar da ayyukanku da kyau; wadannan ayyuka ne masu muhimmancin gaske.

translation.en: I would especially emphasize the way the Armed Forces are organized.
translation.ha: Musamman ni ina sake jaddadawa dangane da batun karfafa dakaru masu makami.

translation.en: Fortunately, both the Army and the Army of the Guardians of the Islamic Revolution are heading in this direction.
translation.ha: Alhamdu lillahi dakarun kare juyin juya halin Musulunci da kuma na soji duk sun taka wani mataki a wannan fagen, suna nan suna tunani da kuma gudanar da ayyukansu.

translation.en: There have been several innovations in traditional military organization, which have been realized in different ways in the Army and the Army of the Guardians of the Islamic Revolution. Go after innovative ideas.
translation.ha: Akwai samar da sabbin abubuwa a yanayin da aka saba da shi - cikin dakarun kare juyi ta wani yanayi, ta wani yanayin kuma a cikin soji - ku ba da himma ga ayyukan samar da sabbin abubuwa.

translation.en: Of course not every innovation is good.
translation.ha: Ko da yake ba kowane sabon abu ne ake bukatarsa ba.

translation.en: This has been the case in different parts of the Armed Forces so far. The movement towards self-sufficiency of the Army is one of those innovations, and great achievements have been made since thirty years ago.
translation.ha: Sabon aikin da aka yi kyakkyawan dubi cikinsa, shi ne abin da ake bukata. Ku kama hanyar aiwatar da wadannan sabbin ayyuka kamar yadda ya zuwa yanzu dakaru masu makamin suka gudanar da hakan a bangarori daban-daban; daya daga cikin misalin hakan shi ne jihadin wadatuwa da kai da sojoji suke da shi, wanda tun daga shekaru da yawa da suka gabata suka sami aiwatar da ayyuka masu girma.

translation.en: In the Army of the Guardians of the Islamic Revolution there have been numerous activities in this regard.
translation.ha: A bangaren dakarun kare juyi ma akwai ayyuka masu yawa da aka gudanar a wannan fagen.

translation.en: Thankfully, we are not short of promising experiences.
translation.ha: Alhamdu lillahi hannayenmu ba haka suke rabbana ba a wannan fagen.

translation.en: Great achievements can be made now. That is almost all I wanted to say today.
translation.ha: Mutum yana iya ganin cewa ana iya aiwatar da manyan ayyuka. Wadannan su ne abubuwan da muke son fadi.

translation.en: All of these things have a spirit as well - that is to say, spirituality, religious insight, and strengthening of religious beliefs which manifest themselves in different ways through the efforts of our active and hardworking brothers in charge of ideological matters in Sepah and elsewhere.
translation.ha: Dukkanin wadannan abubuwa suna da wani ruhi wanda shi ne basira ta addini da kuma riko da shi da kuma karfafa akida ta addini, wanda ana iya ganin hakan cikin ayyukan da 'yan'uwanmu da suke cibiyar akida da siyasa ta soji da kuma wakilan Waliyul fakih a cikin dakarun kare juyin juya halin Musulunci da sauran wajaje daban-daban.

translation.en: These brothers should pay attention to the issue of priorities, innovations, and intensified labor so that religious practices and ideological commitment are promoted on a daily basis in our Armed Forces. Greetings be upon you and Allah's mercy and blessings
translation.ha: Su ma wadannan 'yan'uwa wajibi ne su sanya ayyukansu su zamanto shi ne samar da irin wadannan sabbin abubuwa da kuma irin wannan rubanya himmar da kuma aiki ta yadda da yardar Allah a kowace rana za a ci gaba da samun ci gaba a bangarori na adini da kuma ilimi da akida na dakaru masu makami.

translation.en: Leader’s Message on Martyrdom of Mostafa Ahmadi-Roshan - Khamenei.ir
translation.ha: Sakon Jagora Sakamakon Shahadar Shahid Mustafa Ahmadi Roshan

translation.en: In the Name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful
translation.ha: Da sunan Allah Mai Rahama Mai Jin Kai

translation.en: The Martyrdom of the scholarly and outstanding youth, Shahid Mostafa Ahmadi-Roshan, imposed another grief on the heart of those who love knowledge and those who are committed to the progress of the Islamic Republic.
translation.ha: Ko shakka babu shahadar wannan matashi masani, Shahid Mustafa Ahmadi Roshan ta sake sanya bakin ciki cikin zukatan masoya ilimi wadanda kuma suke riko da tafarkin ci gaban Jamhuriyar Musulunci.

translation.en: All of us share in the grief of the father, mother, wife and child of this innocent, outstanding and proud youth.This cowardly assassination - whose perpetrators and plotters will never dare confess to their evil crime and accept responsibility for it, just like the other crimes committed by the international network of state terrorism - has been planned or helped by the intelligence services of CIA and Mossad and it is a sign that the arrogant powers of the world, led by America and Zionism, have reached a dead end in the face of the determined, pious and progressive people of Islamic Iran.
translation.ha: Lalle mu ma dai mun yi tarayya cikin wannan bakin ciki da damuwa tare da iyaye, mata da dan wannan madaukakin matashi da aka zalunta, a bangare guda kuma da jin daukaka a tare da mu. Wannan kisan gillan na ragwantaka wanda har abada wadanda suka aikata da kuma tsara shi ba za su taba yin jaruntakar fitowa fili su ce su suka aikata da kuma daukan alhakin hakan ba, tamkar sauran ayyukan ta'addancin cibiyoyin ta'addancin kasa da kasa da na gwamnatoci, wani makirci ne da aka kulla shi ko dai da hannun kungiyoyin leken asirin CIA (na Amurka) ko kuma MOSSAD (na haramtacciyar kasar Isra'ila) kai tsaye ko kuma da taimakonsu wanda hakan kuma wata alama ce da take nuni da irin tsaka mai wuyan da ma'abota girman kan duniya karkashin jagorancin Amurka da yahudawan sahyoniya suke ciki a fadar da suke yi da muminai kuma tsayayyun al'ummar kasar Musulunci ta Iran.

translation.en: This outrageous and brutal behavior will fail as well and they will not achieve their evil and malevolent goals.
translation.ha: Ko shakka babu za su sha kashi cikin wannan mummunan aiki na su kuma abin kyama sannan kuma ba za su kai ga munanan manufofinsu ba.

translation.en: The accelerated scientific progress and the conquering of the peaks of knowledge - which has been promoted by the determination of pious, proud and competent youth such as Shahid Ahmadi-Roshan - is independent of individuals. This is a historic movement that is rooted in an unbreakable national will.
translation.ha: Irin gagarumin ci gaba na ilimi (da Iran take samu) albarkacin irin gagarumar himmar matasanmu muminai kuma masu kishi irin su Shahid Mustafa, ba wani lamari ne da ya dogara da mutum guda ba, hakan wani lamari ne da ya samo asali daga wani yunkuri na tarihi da kuma azama ta wata al'umma.

translation.en: We will continue this path powerfully and with a firm determination to the disappointment of the leaders of the camp of arrogance and hegemony and we will keep showing the progress of our great nation to the spiteful and envious enemies.
translation.ha: Za mu ci gaba da bin wannan tafarki da dukkan karfin mu ko da kuwa ma'abota girman duniya ba sa so, sannan kuma a gaban idanuwan wadannan makiya masu tsananin adawa da kuma hassada za mu kai ga kololuwar ci gaba, a daidai lokacin da kuma har abada ba za mu taba rufe ido wajen ganin an hukumta wadanda suka aikata wannan danyen aikin da kuma wadanda suke goyon bayansu ta bayan fage ba.

translation.en: Of course, we will never neglect punishing the perpetrators of this crime and those behind it.I extend my condolences to the parents, wife and child of this honorable martyr, to the scientific and academic community of the country and to all those who love our comprehensive scientific movement and are committed to it and I pray to God to bestow patience and divine calm on them.
translation.ha: Ina mika sakon juyayi da kuma taya murna ta sakamakon shahadar wannan abin kaunar ga iyayensa, matarsa da dansa, haka nan ga cibiyoyin ilimi da jami'oin kasar nan da kuma dukkanin masoya ilimi wadanda suka yi riko da tafarkin yunkuri na ilimi, sannan kuma ina rokon Allah Madaukakin Sarki da Ya kara musu hakuri da kwanciyar hankali sannan shi kuma wannan shahidi na mu abin kauna ina roka masa daukakar matsayi na lahira a wajen Allah Madaukakin Sarki.

translation.en: I also pray to Allah the Exalted to bestow the highest position on this honorable martyr in the hereafter and I pay tribute to the memory of Shahid Ali-Mohammadi, Shahid Shahriari and Shahid Rezaeinejad.
translation.ha: Har ila yau kuma ina sake girmama ambaton shahidai Ali Muhammadi da Shahriyari da Ridha'iy Nejad (wadanda aka kashe su cikin shekarun nan saboda ayyukansu na ilimi).

translation.en: Sayyid Ali Khamenei
translation.ha: Sayyid Ali Khamenei

translation.en: Outstanding reciters and memorizers of the Holy Qur'an and ritual choruses held a spiritual meeting in the presence of the supreme leader of the Islamic Revolution yesterday afternoon.
translation.ha: Jagoran juyin juya halin Musuluncin ya bayyana irin kwarewar da al'umma Iran suke da shi a matsayin gagarumin jari wanda hukumomin dagutu a lokutan ‘ya'yan gidan sarautar Pahlawi da Kajar suka hana su ci gaba.

translation.en: The Mehr News Agency reported that Ayatollah Khamenei stated that the Qur'an is the best remedy for the ailments that beset the Muslim world.
translation.ha: Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci ya bayyana farin ciki da jin dadinsa dangane da irin yadda ake samun ci gaban take da kuma bukatu na Musulunci a tsakanin al'ummomin musulmi.

translation.en: Expressing satisfaction over the youth's reception of the Qur'an, he said, "Instructors of the Qur'an should strive to promote familiarity with the Qur'anic concepts along with their sweet recitation.
translation.ha: A karshen jawabin nasa Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci ya yi fatan cewa irin wannan yunkuri na ci gaban Alkur'ani da ake da shi a kasar Iran zai ci gaba da girma da daukaka.

translation.en: At the end of this spiritual ceremony, evening prayers were led by Ayatollah Khamenei.
translation.ha: A karshen wannan taro dai da ya dauki sa'oi hudu ana gudanar da shi, Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci ya jagoranci mahalarta taron sallar magariba da lisha sannan kuma suka sha ruwa tare.

translation.en: Leader's Response to President Rouhani's Letter on Nuclear Negotiations - Khamenei.ir
translation.ha: Jagora Ya Jinjinawa Tawagar Iran A Tattaunawar Nukiliya Da Jaddada Wajibcin Ci Gaba Da Tsayin Daka

translation.en: The following is the full text of the letters written on November 24, 2013 by President Rouhani and Ayatollah Khamenei, the Leader of the Islamic Revolution.
translation.ha: Abin da ke biye fassarar wasikar shugaban kasar na Iran ne da kuma amsar da Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci ya ba shi.

translation.en: In the Name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful
translation.ha: Da Sunan Allah Mai Rahama Mai Jin Kai

translation.en: To the blessed presence of the Leader of the Islamic Revolution- Hazrat Ayatollah Khamenei (may his achievements continue),
translation.ha: Mai Girma Jagoran Juyin Juya Halin Musulunci Ayatullah Khamenei (Allah Ya kara masa tsawon kwana)

translation.en: With peace and abundant greetings, I thank God Almighty because in the first months of the administration of wisdom and hope, your revolutionary children managed to prove - during difficult and complicated negotiations in international arenas - that the people of Iran have the right to follow their nuclear activities.
translation.ha: Muna gode wa Allah Madaukakin Sarki da ya sanya cikin watannin farko-farko na wannan gwamnatin (ta hikima da fata), ‘ya'yanka masu riko da koyarwar juyin juya halin Musulunci sun sami nasarar tabbatar da wa duniya gaskiya da hakkin al'ummar Iran a fagen fasahar nukiliya a yayin wannan tattaunawa mai wahala da rikitarwa, sannan kuma sun sami nasarar kawar da batu na farko ta yadda manyan kasashen duniya sun yarda da hakkin al'ummar Iran na tace sinadarin uranium - wanda tsawon shekaru sun yi ta kokarin inkarin hakan - da kuma share fagen mataki na gaba na tabbatar da ci gaban kasar nan a fagagen fasaha da tattalin arziki.

translation.en: Therefore, the path for future lofty steps towards preserving the technological and economic progress of the country has opened up.
translation.ha: Nasarar da aka samu a yayin wannan tattaunawar ta tabbatar da cewa ana iya kiyaye mahangar al'ummar Iran da tabbatar da hujja ga al'ummomin duniya da kuma kiran manyan kasashen duniya zuwa ga girmama hakkokin al'ummar Iran tare da kiyaye dukkanin koyarwa da kuma jan layin da wannan juyin ba zai taba amincewa a tsallake su ba da kuma bayyanar da matsayar al'ummar Iran cikin hikima.

translation.en: These negotiations showed that we can take future steps towards resolving all disagreements in a determined way. Without a doubt, this success is the result of the attention of God, the guidance of the Leadership of the government and the complete support of the Iranian nation.
translation.ha: Ko shakka babu, an sami wannan nasarar ne albarkacin taimako na Ubangiji da kuma irin shiryarwa ta Jagoran wannan tsari mai girma da kuma goyon bayan al'ummar Iran, haka nan kuma sauran nasarorin da za a samu a gaba wajen kunce wannan kulli ma za su kasance ne albarkacin irin wannan shiryarwar taka da kuma taimako da goyon bayan al'ummar Iran ma'abota daukaka da hakuri.

translation.en: The final success on this path depends on the continuation of your guidance and on the support and assistance of the noble and patient people of Iran. The clear results of this initial agreement include the formal recognition of the nuclear rights of Iran and the preservation of the nuclear achievements of our country.
translation.ha: A matakin farko, nasarar da aka samu cikin wannan yarjejeniyar, ita ce amincewa da hakkokin al'ummar Iran a fagen fasahar nukiliya da kuma kare irin nasarorin da ‘ya'yan wannan kasa suka samu a fagen nukiliyan.

translation.en: Besides, the process of imposing oppressive sanctions being halted, part of the illegal pressures that were exerted through these unilateral sanctions have been lifted and the collapse of this system - which is based on imposing sanctions - has already begun.
translation.ha: Haka nan kuma ta hanyar dakatar da takunkumin zalunci, za a sami nasarar kawar da wani bangare na matsin lamba da ya saba wa doka da kuma takunkumin bangare guda (da aka sanya wa Iran) sannan kuma hakan zai zamanto mafari na kawar da irin wadannan takunkumin.

translation.en: As a result of this innovation of Islamic Iran and this resistance of the great people of Iran, superpowers have reached the conclusion that sanctions and pressures will get them nowhere.
translation.ha: Karfin kasar Musulunci ta Iran da kuma tsayin dakan al'ummar Iran ma'abota girma ne ya sanya manyan kasashen duniya fahimtar cewa takunkumi da matsin lamba ba za su haifar da da mai ido ba.

translation.en: As Iran had announced from the beginning, superpowers came to the conclusion that there is no way to reach an agreement except with mutual respect and with honorable negotiations. This is an issue which, unfortunately, the other party noticed late.
translation.ha: Sannan kuma kamar yadda tun da farko Iran ta sanar cewa hanya guda kawai ta cimma yarjejeniya ita ce girmama juna da kuma tattaunawa cikin girmamawa, lamarin da abin bakin cikin daya bangaren yayi jinkiri wajen fahimtarsa.

translation.en: Without a doubt, this agreement is to the advantage of all regional countries, it will further peace and global progress and it is in line with the principle of win-win.
translation.ha: Ko shakka babu, cimma wannan yarjejeniyar, nasara ce ga dukkanin kasashen yankin nan da kuma tabbatar da sulhu da ci gaba na duniya.

translation.en: I would like to congratulate you, the Leader of the Revolution, on this divine blessing and I express my gratitude to you for your guidance and support. Also, I would like to thank the great people of Iran for their complete support.
translation.ha: A saboda haka a daidai lokacin da nake taya Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci murnar wannan nasara ta Ubangiji da aka samu, ina kuma mika godiya ta a gare ka saboda irin shiryarwa da kuma goyon bayan da ka nuna, haka nan kuma ga al'ummar Iran saboda irin goyon bayan da suka bayar, kamar yadda kuma nake jinjinawa shahidan nukiliyan kasar nan.

translation.en: Commemorating the memory of our nuclear martyrs, I would like to renew the sincere pledge of this administration to render services to the people and I ask you and all the people to continue praying for this administration.
translation.ha: Ina sake jaddada alkawarin wanann gwamnatin na yin hidima ga wannan al'umma ma'abociyar sanin ya kamata, sannan kuma ina ci gaba da bukatar addu'oin fatan alheri daga gare ka da kuma sauran al'ummar Iran. Hasan Ruhani 3/watan Azar/1392

translation.en: In the Name of Allah the Exalted, Mr. President, Such achievements [as written by you in your letter], deserve appreciation and we express our gratitude to the negotiating team and other officials.
translation.ha: Mai Girma Shugaban Kasa Wadannan nasarorin da ka ambata, abin jinjinawa da kuma godiya ne ga tawagar (Iran) a wajen wannan tattaunawar ta nukiliya da sauran jami'an da suke da hannu cikin hakan, sannan kuma za ta iya zama tushen matakan da za a dauka nan gaba cikin hikima.

translation.en: Undoubtedly, divine blessings and the prayers and the support of the Iranian nation have brought about this achievement, and God willing, it will be the same in the future.
translation.ha: Ko shakka babu taimakon Ubangiji da addu'oi da kuma goyon bayan al'umma su ne suka haifar da wannan nasara da aka samu sannan kuma a nan gaba, cikin yardar Allah, haka lamarin zai kasance.

translation.en: Resistance against avarice should always be the main standard in the forward movement for the officials in charge of this sector and so it shall remain, God willing.
translation.ha: A koda yaushe wajibi ne tsayin daka wajen tinkarar wuce gona da iri, ya zamanto shi ne tafarkin da jami'an wannan bangaren za su rika, kuma da yardar Allah haka lamarin zai kasance.

translation.en: Sayyid Ali Khamenei
translation.ha: Sayyid Ali Khamenei

translation.en: Leader's Message on Ayatollah Rezvani's Demise - Khamenei.ir  The following is the full text of the message issued on April 20, 2013 by Ayatollah Khamenei the Leader of the Islamic Revolution on Ayatollah Rezvani's demise.
translation.ha: Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci Ayatullah Sayyid Ali Khamenei ya fitar da wani sako na ta'aziyya biyo bayan rasuwar Ayatullah Hajj Sheik Muslim Malakuti, daya daga cikin manyan daliban marigayi Imam Khumaini (r.a) sannan kuma wakilin Jagora a lardin Azarbaijan kuma limamin Tabriz.

translation.en: In the Name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful
translation.ha: Da Sunan Allah Mai Rahama Mai Jin Kai

translation.en: I would like to express my condolences to the honorable family of Ayatollah Rezvani, on the demise of Ayatollah Hajj Sheikh Gholam Reza Rezvani (may God bestow paradise on him) who was a great Islamic jurisprudent. I extend my condolences to all those who respect him and to his students.
translation.ha: Ina isar da sakon juyayi da ta'aziyyata dangane da rasuwar marigayi Ayatullah Hajj Sheikh Muslim Malakuti, yardar Allah ta tabbata a gare shi, wanda ya kasance daga cikin manyan malaman makarantar hauzar Qum sannan kuma wanda ya ke da tsohon tarihin jihadi da hidima ga juyin juya halin Musulunci da tsarin Jamhuriyar Musulunci, ga iyalansa da dalibai da masoyansa haka nan kuma ga dukkanin al'ummar Azarbaijan, haka nan kuma ga manyan maraja'ai da malaman hauzar Qum.

translation.en: That great scholar was among the trustworthy students of Imam Khomeini (r.a.). He had certain responsibilities such as his responsibility in the Guardian Council. By Allah's favor, his services - which included cooperation with different organizations in illustrating fiqhi views of the Guardian Council - will be accepted by Allah the Exalted who will bestow paradise on him.
translation.ha: Irin gagarumar rawar da wannan babban malami ya taka a fagen ayyukan siyasa na majalisar malaman makarantar hauza ta Qum a lokacin mulkin kama-karya (ta Shah) sannan daga baya kuma da hidimar da ya yi a matsayinsa na limamin Juma'ar Tabriz, haka da kuma kasancewa tare da sojoji a lokacin kallafaffen yaki, dukkanin wadannan abubuwa ne da ba za a taba share su daga shafin tarihin juyin juya halin Musulunci da kuma littafin Mala'iku masu rubuta ayyukan mutane ba, insha Allah.

translation.en: I ask Allah the Exalted to raise the position of this outstanding cleric.
translation.ha: Ina rokon Allah Madaukakin Sarki da ya yi masa rahama da gafara da kuma kara masa daukakar matsayi.

translation.en: Sayyid Ali Khamenei
translation.ha: Sayyid Ali Khamenei

translation.en: Leader Meets Teachers - Khamenei.ir
translation.ha: Jagora Ya Gana Da Dubban Malaman Kasar Iran

translation.en: In a meeting with thousands of teachers from across the country, Ayatollah Khamenei the Leader of the Islamic Revolution said that teachers have a key role in educating innovative and pious individuals in the country.
translation.ha: Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci Ayatullah Sayyid Ali Khamene'i, a wata ganawa da ya yi yau din nan laraba (5, Mayu 2010) da dubun dubatan malaman da suka fito daga yankuna daban-daban na kasar Iran, ya yi karin bayani kan irin gagarumar gudummawar malamai wajen ginawa da kuma tarbiyyar bil'adama ma'abota tunani da kyawawan halaye da kuma dogaro da kai wajen ci gaba da tafarkin ci gaban kasa.

translation.en: The Iranian nation should achieve such progress that it can turn into an unquestioned authority for Muslim nations and intellectuals regarding various intellectual, scientific, political, and social matters. 0.189346 82.txt 1290-Leader-Meets-Teachers.txt Wannan wani nauyi ne na tarihi na al'ummar Iran. And this is the historical responsibility of the Iranian nation.
translation.ha: Jagoran ya ci gaba da cewa: Wajibi ne al'ummar Iran su kai ga matsayi na ci gaba da kuma daukaka a fagen tunani, ilimi da sauran fagage daban-daban na siyasa da zamantakewa don su zamanto abin koyi ga al'ummomi da kuma masu tunani na duniyar musulmi.

translation.en: Ayatollah Khamenei reiterated: "Unlike some so-called religious intellectuals who used to present non-religious concepts as religion, Shahid Motahhari used to present genuine religious concepts to his audience on the basis of their immediate needs and questions."
translation.ha: Ayatullah Khamenei ya ci gaba da cewa: Sabanin wasu daga cikin masu da'awar wayayyen tunani na addini wadanda suke gabatar da wadansu ma'anoni da babu kamshin fahimta ta addini a cikinsu, Shahid Mutahhari ya kasance yana gabatar da ma'anoni na addini yadda suka dace da bukatar zamani da kuma kokarin fahimtar da wadanda yake magana da su.

translation.en: He stressed that Shahid Motahhari was not after fame or an academic and religious position. "During his life, he fought misguided and heretic thoughts as vigorously as he fought reactionary attitudes and dogmatism, and this was one of the prominent characteristics of Shahid Motahhari," he noted.
translation.ha: Haka nan kuma yayin da yake ishara da cewa Shahid Mutahhari bai taba kasancewa mutum mai neman suna ko matsayi ba, Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci cewa ya yi: Wannan shahidin a lokacin rayuwarsa ya kasance mai fada da tunani na koma baya kamar yadda kuma yake fada da bidi'oi da karkatattun tunani, hakan kuwa daya ne daga cikin fitattun siffofin shahid Mutahhari.

translation.en: The Leader of the Islamic Revolution said that Shahid Motahhari's works have withstood the test of time and reiterated: "The sincerity of that great man is the reason why after the passage of 30 years since his martyrdom and in spite of various advances made ever since his works can still be used to address many of today's needs."
translation.ha: Har ila yau Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci ya kara da cewa wata siffar kuma da rubuce-rubucen shahid Mutahharin suka kebanta da ita ita ce kasantuwarsu rayayyu sannan kuma sabbi yana cewa: Dalilin da ya sanya littafan da shahid Mutahhari ya bari suke biyan bukatun da dama daga cikin bukatun da ake da su yau duk kuwa da gushewar shekaru talatin da shahadar wannan malami mai girma shi ne ikhlasin da wannan babban bawan Allah yake da shi.

translation.en: Ayatollah Khamenei added: "Whenever a profound thought is accompanied by sincerity, Allah the Exalted bestows such blessing on the thought that it turns into an inexhaustible resource for the people of society, and Shahid Motahhari's works are like that."
translation.ha: Ayatullah Khamenei ya ci gaba da cewa: A duk inda wani tunani ya zamanto tare da ikhalasi, Allah ya kan sanya albarka cikin wannan tunanin ta yadda zai ci gaba da zamantowa wata ajiya maras karshe ga al'umma. Haka ababen da shahid Mutahhari ya bari suka kasance.

translation.en: His Eminence said that the greatness of education is exemplified by the effect of Shahid Motahhari's scholarly and cultural works.
translation.ha: Jagoran ya bayyana irin tasirin da ayyuka na ilimi da al'adu na shahid Mutahhari a matsayin misali na irin daukakar da aikin ilimi da tarbiyya yake da ita.

translation.en: He referred to the key role of teachers and reiterated: "If teachers constantly take the greatness of their role into consideration, their faith, motivation, and efforts will be doubled."
translation.ha: Sannan kuma yayin da yake ishara da irin rawar da malamai suke takawa cikin rayuwar al'umma ya bayyana cewar: Idan har malamai suka ci gaba da ganin irin girma da daukakar da aikinsu yake da ita, to kuwa imani da kokarinsu zai rubanya.

translation.en: The Leader of the Islamic Revolution said that the effect of teachers on the individual and social characteristics of children and adolescents is far beyond the effect of parents, media, social factors, genetic inheritance, morality, and spirituality. "Having such a prominent role, teachers can educate faithful, motivated, patient, hopeful, innovative, thoughtful, and scholarly individuals who are committed to pursuing public interests and reaching the peaks of individual and social perfection."
translation.ha: Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci ya bayyana cewa gudummawa da tasirin malami wajen gina shaksiyyar yara da matasa ta daidaiku da ta al'umma ta ketare irin wadda iyaye da kafafen watsa labarai da sauran hanyoyi na zamantakewa da gado yana mai cewa: Malami da irin wannan gudummawar da yake bayarwa zai iya tarbiyantar da wani mutum mumini mai kumaji, ma'abocin hakuri, mai kyakkyawan fata ga gobe, mai kokarin tabbatar da ababen amfanin al'umma, mai kaunar isa ga kolin kamala ta daidaiku da ta al'ummance, mai kirkiran sabbin abubuwa, mai tunani sannan kuma ma'abocin bincike.

translation.en: Ayatollah Khamenei stressed that if teachers fail to realize the importance of their role, they may educate students who are not useful to society.
translation.ha: Ayatullah Khamenei ya ci gaba da cewa: Idan har malami bai riki irin matsayi da gudummawar da yake bayarwa da hannu bibbiyu ba, mai yiyuwa ne ya tarbiyartar da mutanen da ba za su zama masu amfani ga al'umma ba.

translation.en: His Eminence emphatically called on teachers to develop faith in the importance of their role and added: "It is essential to plan fundamental changes in the education system, and this must be carried out considering the needs, lofty ideals, and human capacities of the country. But this does not mean that we should stand by and wait until these fundamental changes are made."
translation.ha: Jagoran ya kirayi dukkanin malamai da su dogara da irin gagarumar gudummawar da suke bayarwa da kuma rashin mantawa da su yana mai cewa: Wajibi ne irin sauyin da ake samarwa a ma'aikatar ilimi da tarbiyya su zamanto sun dace da bukatun da ake da su da kuma irin karfin da 'yan kasa suke da shi, ko da yake hakan ba yana nufin a dakatar da komai ba ne har sai lokacin da al'umma suka kai ga wannan matsayi ba.

translation.en: The Leader of the Islamic Revolution referred to the backwardness of the country, and said that compensating for this shortcoming necessitates great action.
translation.ha: Har ila yau kuma yayin da yake ishara da koma bayan da Iran ta fuskanta cikin shekarun baya ya bayyana cewar cike gurbin irin wannan koma bayan yana bukatar gagarumin aiki.

translation.en: Iran should achieve the position it deserves, and it should turn into a perfect role model for the world of Islam.
translation.ha: Jagoran ya ci gaba da cewa: Wajibi ne kasar Iran da kuma al'ummar kasar su kai ga matsayin da ya dace da su sannan kuma a mai da su su zamanto cikakken abin koyi ga duniyar musulmi.

translation.en: Ayatollah Khamenei reiterated: "In order to achieve this great goal, the Iranian nation should make use of all its power, human and intellectual capacities, and God-given talents."
translation.ha: Ayatullah Khamene'i ya kara da cewa: Domin isa ga wannan gagarumar manufa, wajibi ne a yi amfani da dukkanin karfi da kwarewa ta dan'adam da tunani da kuma kyauta ta Ubangiji da al'ummar Iran suke da su.

translation.en: The Leader of the Islamic Revolution described the moral condition of the modern world as extremely bad and reiterated: "It is possible to change this appalling fate of humanity, but the first prerequisite is to make great changes in the country and turn it into a material and spiritual role model."
translation.ha: Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci ya bayyana yanayin da duniya take ciki a halin yanzu a bangaren kyawawan dabi'u da cewa yanayi mai munin gaske inda ya kara da cewa: Bil'adama suna iya sauya wannan mummunan yanayi, to sai dai sharadin hakan na farko shi ne samar da gagarumin sauyi a cikin kasa da kuma mai she ta ta zamanto abar koyi na abin duniya da abubuwan da suke karfafa ruhi.

translation.en: Ayatollah Khamenei further reiterated: "Education is the basis of all kinds of change in the country.
translation.ha: Ayatullah Khamenei ya ci gaba da cewa: Tushen kowane irin sauyi a kasar nan shi ne ilimi da tarbiyya, sannan kuma bisa la'akari da irin tushen da aka dasa a kasar nan tsawon shekaru talatin din da suka gabata, makomar wannan kasar dai makoma ce mai kyau duk kuwa da cewa hanya ce mai nisar gaske da kuma wahala.

translation.en: And the Iranian nation will continue treading its path in a firm manner."
translation.ha: Don haka al'ummar Iran za su ci gaba da bin wannan tafarki da dukkan karfinsu.

translation.en: The Leader of the Islamic Revolution reiterated: "On the path to progress, the most important matter is that everybody should identify and fulfill their responsibility appropriately."
translation.ha: Jagoran juyin juya halin Musuluncin ya ci gaba da cewa: Mafi muhimmancin lamari a kan tafarkin yunkurin ci gaban al'ummar Iran shi ne cewa kowa ya fahimci irin nauyi da aikin da ke wuansa da kyau sannan kuma ya aiwatar da hakan.

translation.en: Leader Urges Fulfillment of Bilateral Agreements - Khamenei.ir  The Leader of the Islamic Revolution Ayatollah Khamenei met today with Iraqi President Jalal Talabani and his accompanying delegation.
translation.ha: A yau Alhamis (05-12-2013) ne Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci Ayatullah Sayyid Ali Khamenei ya gana da firayi ministan kasar Iraki Nuri al-Maliki wanda yake ci gaba da ziyara a Jamhuriyar Musulunci ta Iran.

translation.en: Ayatollah Khamenei said that the foreigners are opposed to the progress of Iraq and are against the close ties between the Islamic Republic and Iraq.
translation.ha: A yayin wannan ganawar, Jagoran juyin juya halin Musuluncin ya yi ishara da muhimmancin karfafa alaka ta siyasa da tattalin arziki tsakanin kasashen Iran da Iraki inda ya ce: Lalle akwai fagage masu yawa da za a iya fadada alakar da ke tsakanin kasashen biyu.

translation.en: Elsewhere in his speech, Ayatollah Khamenei said it is expected that the bilateral agreements between the two counties are seriously pursued by the Iraqi officials.
translation.ha: A saboda fagen musayen irin wadannan kwarewar da Iran ta samu ga kasar Iraki, yana iya zama wani fage mai muhimmanci da kasashen biyu za su iya aiki tare. Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci ya bayyana farin cikinsa da irin ayyukan da gwamnatin ta Iraki take aikatawa inda ya ce: Yunkurin da a yau ka yi wa kasarka, lalle wani yunkuri ne mai kimar gaske, duk kuwa da cewa bukatar kasar Iraki ta dara abin da aka yi din.

translation.en: The Leader of the Islamic Revolution referred to the bilateral agreement between Iran and Iraq to expel the members of the Munafeqeen grouplet from Iraq and said that the Islamic Republic expects that the agreement be fulfilled soon.
translation.ha: Har ila yau Jagoran juyin juya halin Musuluncin ya bayyana shugaban kasar Iraki Jalal Talibani a matsayin aboki na kwarai ga Jamhuriyar Musulunci ta Iran, don haka ya yi masa addu'ar samun sauki cikin gaggawa.

translation.en: Mr. Talabani said that the development of the ties between the two countries will bring about peace and stability in the region and added that despite the concerns about the expansion of ties between the two countries, we consider the strengthening of our relations with the Islamic Republic as useful for our country and the region as well.
translation.ha: Shi ma a nasa bangaren, firayi ministan kasar Irakin Nuri Al-Maliki ya nuna godiyarsa dangane da irin goyon bayan da Jamhuriyar Musulunci ta Iran take ba wa kasar Iraki yana mai fatan yarjejeniyoyin da za a cimma a yayin wannan ziyarar tasa za su share fagen karfafa alakar da ke tsakanin kasashen biyu a bangarori daban-daban.

translation.en: Leader Meets with Teachers - Khamenei.ir
translation.ha: Jagora Ya Gana Da Dubu-Dubatan Malaman Kasar Iran

translation.en: Ayatollah Khamenei the Leader of the Islamic Revolution met this morning with thousands of teachers from across the country. Speaking at the meeting, His Eminence said that the most important characteristic of teachers is that they can turn their students into outstanding scholars and righteous, knowledgeable and capable individuals.
translation.ha: A safiyar yau laraba (2-5-2012) ne Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci Ayatullah Sayyid Ali Khamenei ya gana da dubun dubatan malaman makarantu da suka fito daga dukkanin bangarori na kasar Iran don tunawa da ranar malamai ta kasar Iran wacce ta yi daidai da ranar shahadar Ayatullah Shahid Mutahari.

translation.en: Ayatollah Khamenei called on the people, the educational system and teachers to appreciate the role and position of teachers and reiterated: "Correct, wise and caring actions of teachers can definitely lay a firm foundation in society in order to solve many of the cultural, ethical and behavioral problems."
translation.ha: A saboda haka Ayatullah ya kirayi dukkanin al'umma, ma'aikatar ilimi da tarbiyya da kuma su kansu malaman da su fahimci irin matsayin da malami yake da shi yana mai cewa: Ko shakka babu ingantaccen aiki, tunani da kuma nuna ya kamatan malamai zai taimaka wajen gina karfafaffen tushe a cikin al'umma wanda za a iya magance mafi yawa daga cikin matsaloli na al'adu da kyawawan halaye da ake fuskanta.

translation.en: His Eminence referred to the spread of public education to the remotest parts of the country and added: "In recent years praiseworthy measures have been adopted in the educational system and the most important measure among them was preparing the document for transforming the educational system, and the main mission is to implement the document."
translation.ha: Har ila yau kuma yayin da ya ke ishara da irin ayyukan da sauye-sauyen da aka samar a bangaren koyarwa da tarbiyya a dukkanin fadin kasar Iran Jagoran ya bayyana cewar hakan yana rubanya irin aikin da ke wuyan ma'aikatar ilimi da tarbiyya din ne.

translation.en: Ayatollah Khamenei referred to the important role of the educational system in training the youth and promoting moral virtues in society, further stating: "The educational system should create role models for our youth and teenagers, and the best role models are our martyred youth and teenagers."
translation.ha: Haka nan kuma yayin da ya ke ishara da matsayi mai girman gaske da koyarwa da tarbiyya suke da shi a kasar Iran da kuma rawar da suke takawa wajen ba wa matasa ingantacciyar tarbiyyar da ta dace da kuma kwadaitar da kyawawan halaye, Ayatullah Khamenei cewa ya yi: Wajibi ne ma'aikatar ilimi da tarbiyya ta zamanto abar koyi ga matasa da samaruka, wanda mafiya kyawun abin koyinmu su ne matasa da samaruka da suka yi shahada.

translation.en: The Leader of the Islamic Revolution reiterated: "Besides the educational system, the organizations in charge of public relations, the IRIB, governmental organizations and the clergy have an important role to play in presenting role models in society."
translation.ha: Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci ya ci gaba da cewa: A ranar juma'a mai zuwa nan ma al'ummar Iran za su fito da dukkan karfinsu wajen kada kuri'arsu da kuma nuna wa duniya irin sanin ya kamatan da suke da shi.

translation.en: He added: "By Allah's favor, the Iranian nation is present on the scene and it is insightful and aware of the conditions. The Iranian nation knows its enemy well and will not be deceived by his hypocritical pretense of friendship."
translation.ha: Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci ya ci gaba da cewa: Da yardar Allah, al'ummar Iran suna nan a fage cikin basira da fahimtar lokacin da suke ciki kamar yadda kuma sun san makiyansu da kyau don haka ba za su taba fadawa tarkon yaudarar su ba.

translation.en: Ayatollah Khamenei said that election is a manifestation of being present on the scene and reiterated: "With the conflict going on among the materialistic powers, the Iranian nation should always be present on the scene and maintain its vigilance in order to be able to defend its rights and the rights of its future generations."
translation.ha: Ayatullah Khamenei ya bayyana cewar zabe dai daya ne daga cikin alamun da ke tabbatar da kasantuwar mutane a fagen don haka sai ya ce: A yayin da ake ci gaba da rikici da ja-in-ja tsakanin masu takama da karfi na abin duniya, wajibi ne al'ummar Iran su kiyaye kasantuwarsu a fage da kuma nuna sanin ya kamata don ta hakan ne za su sami damar tabbatar da hakkokinsu da kuma kiyaye su ga zuriya masu zuwa.

translation.en: At the end of his statements, Ayatollah Khamenei said that there are bright prospects for the Iranian nation and added: "By Allah's grace, the future of Islamic Iran will definitely be better than its current conditions."
translation.ha: Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci ya ci gaba da cewa: Cikin yardar Allah, goben al'ummar Iran zai fi yau dinsu kyau. Tun da farko dai sai da ministan ilimi da tarbiyya na Iran Haji Babayi ya gabatar da jawabinsa inda ya yi karin haske kan irin ayyukan da aka gudanar a ma'aikatar tasa.

translation.en: Imam Khamenei's message of condolences to the President - Khamenei.ir
translation.ha: A yammacin yau Asabar (9-3-2013) ne Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci Ayatullah Sayyid Ali Khamenei ya fitar da sakon ta'aziyyar rasuwar babban malami, marubuci sannan kuma wakilin Jagoran a garin Lorestan, Hujjatul Islam wal Muslimin Hajj Sayyid Mujtaba Musawi Lari:

translation.en: In the Name of God, the Most Beneficent, the Most Merciful,
translation.ha: Da Sunan Allah Mai Rahama Mai Jin Kai.

translation.en: Dear Hujjatul Islam Rouhani, Respected President,
translation.ha: Cikin tsananin bakin ciki na sami labarin rasuwar babban malami kuma marubuci mujahidi, marigayi Hujjatul Islam wal muslimin Hajj Sayyid Mujtaba Musawi Lari.

translation.en: I would like to express condolences on the passing of your respectable sister.
translation.ha: Ina isar da sakon ta'aziyyar rasuwar wannan malami mai tsarkin zuciya ga mutane Lorestan masu girma da lardin Fars sannan kuma ga dukkanin masoya da dalibai da kuma wadanda suka amfana da littafansa musamman iyalansa masu girma.

translation.en: I ask Allah, the Exalted, to bestow His forgiveness and blessings on her.
translation.ha: Ina rokon Allah Madaukakin Sarki da Ya yi masa rahama da gafara da kuma kara daukaka matsayinsa.

translation.en: Sayyid Ali Khamenei
translation.ha: Sayyid Ali Khamenei

translation.en: Leader Meets with Officials of Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Ambassadors - Khamenei.ir
translation.ha: Jagora Yayin Ganawa Da Jami'an Diplomasiyyar Iran: Amurka Na Da Hannu Cikin Abin Da Ke Faruwa A Gaza

translation.en: Ayatollah Khamenei, the Leader of the Islamic Revolution, met Wednesday morning with the Minister of Foreign Affairs, Iranian ambassadors and charge d'affairs. Speaking at the meeting, His Eminence described the diplomatic apparatus of the country as the fighter in the front lines of defending the goals and the national interests and resources of the people of Iran.
translation.ha: A safiyar yau Laraba (13-8-2014) ne Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci Ayatullah Sayyid Ali Khamenei ya gana da ministan harkokin waje, jakadu da manyan jami'an ofisoshin jakadancin Jamhuriyar Musulunci ta Iran da suke wajen kasar inda ya bayyana cibiyar diplomasiyyar ta Iran a matsayin a matsayin wata garkuwa ta kare manufofi da muradun al'ummar Iran, kamar yadda kuma yayi karin haske kan batun tattaunawar da ke gudana tsakanin Iran din da Amurka.

translation.en: Referring to the significance of diplomacy, the Leader of the Islamic Revolution said: "Intelligent and active diplomacy can bring about many important political, economic, human and social achievements.
translation.ha: Yayin da yake karin haske kan muhimmancin da ke cikin ayyukan diplomasiyya, Jagoran juyin juya halin Musuluncin cewa ya yi: Diplomasiyyar da ke tafiya bisa hikima da aiki tukuru, tana iya samar da nasarori masu muhimmanci na siyasa, tattalin arziki da zamantakewa masu muhimmancin gaske da sauran ayyuka ciki kuwa har da yaki ba za su iya samar da su ba.

translation.en: This truth indicates the weight and position of diplomacy in the management of a country."
translation.ha: Hakan wani lamari ne da ke nuni da muhimmanci da kuma matsayin da ayyukan diplomasiyya suke da shi cikin gudanar da wata kasa.

translation.en: Ayatollah Khamenei stated that the recent events in the region are a manifestation of this truth, reiterating: "Certain powers tried to safeguard their interests with bullying and weapons, but they failed.
translation.ha: Ayatullah Khamenei ya bayyana abubuwan da ke ci gaba da faruwa a yankin Gabas ta tsakiya cikin ‘yan shekarun baya-bayan nan a matsayin abubuwan da ke tabbatar da abubuwan da ya fadi a bayan inda ya ce: Manyan kasashen duniya suna ta kokari ta hanyar amfani da tilasci da kuma makamai wajen tabbatar da manufofinsu wanda sun gaza cimma hakan.

translation.en: His Eminence described the present era as the period of transition to a new global order, stressing: "As well as the traditional actors, new actors have entered the arena in Asia, Africa and Latin America and they are trying to strengthen their position in the upcoming new order."
translation.ha: A ci gaba da jawabin nasa, a yayin wannan ganawar, Ayatullah Khamenei ya yi karin haske kan abubuwan da suka faru a baya a fagagen siyasa na duniya da kuma irin abubuwan da a halin yanzu ke faruwa a duniyar inda ya ce: baya ga siyasar da aka jima ana gudanarwa, a halin yanzu wasu sabbin ‘yan siyasar sun shigo fage a kasashen Asiya, Afirka da Latin Amurka, sannan kuma suna ci gaba da kokarinsu wajen tabbatar da matsayinsu a wannan fagen.

translation.en: Otherwise, we will not benefit from the necessary position in the new world."
translation.ha: Jagoran ya ci gaba da cewa: A irin wannan yanayin, akwai bukatar karin ayyukan diplomasiyya.

translation.en: Expressing his agreement with the statements that the President had made two days ago about interaction with the whole world, the Leader of the Islamic Revolution said: "There are two exceptions in this regard: the Zionist regime and America."
translation.ha: Yayin da yake magana kan jawabin da shugaban kasar Iran ya yi kwanaki biyun da suka gabata a ganawar da yayi da jami'an diplomasiyya dangane da alaka da kuma mu'amalar Iran da sauran kasashen duniya, Jagoran juyin juya halin Musuluncin cewa ya yi: A nan dai akwai wasu bangarori biyu da aka cire su, su ne kuwa haramtacciyar kasar Isra'ila da Amurka.

translation.en: He stressed: "Not only will establishing relations and negotiating with America not bring the Islamic Republic any advantage - except for a few special cases - but it will also be harmful for it.
translation.ha: Yayin da yake bayani da kuma kafa hujja dangane da rashin ingancin mu'amala da Amurkan, Ayatullah Khamenei cewa ya yi: Babu wani amfani cikin alaka da Amurka da kuma tattaunawa da ita, in ban da cikin ‘yan wasu lamurra na musamman, face ma dai sai cutarwa.

translation.en: Some people used to pretend that if we sit at the negotiating table with the Americans, many of our problems will be solved.
translation.ha: Jagoran ya ci gaba da cewa: Wasu mutane suna ganin idan har muka zauna teburin tattaunawa da Amurkawa, lalle za a iya magance da dama daga cikin matsaloli.

translation.en: Of course, we knew that this was not the case, but last year's events proved this truth again and again."
translation.ha: Tabbas mu dai mun san ba haka ba ne. Abubuwan da suka faru tsawon shekara gudan da ta gabata sun tabbatar da hakan.

translation.en: His Eminence reiterated: "In the past, there were no relations between our officials and American officials, but last year, it was decided that officials in the Ministry of Foreign Affairs make contacts and negotiate with American officials because of the sensitive nuclear issue and the issue of making an experience that we referred to previously.
translation.ha: Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci ya ci gaba da cewa: A baya babu wata alaka tsakanin jami'anmu da jami'an Amurka. To amma tsawon shekarar gudar da ta gabata, sakamakon batun nukiliyan, an tsara cewa jami'an ma'aikatar harkokin waje za su zauna da kuma tattaunawa da Amurka.

translation.en: However, not only did these contacts not bring us any benefit, but the Americans' tone also became harsher and more insulting and they expressed more unreasonable expectations during negotiations and in public podiums.
translation.ha: To amma ba wai kawai ba a ga amfanin hakan ba ne, face ma dai maganganun Amurkawa zai kara tsanani suke yi da kuma kara gabatar da wasu bukatu da abubuwa suke yi a yayin wadannan tattaunawar da kuma ma bayaninsu a fili.

translation.en: Of course, in these negotiations, our officials gave them sharper rejoinders in response to their unreasonable expectations.
translation.ha: Jagoran ya ci gaba da cewa: Ko shakka babu jami'anmu sun mayar musu da martani a wasu lokuta ma masu kaushi.

translation.en: But in general, it became clear that unlike what some people think, negotiations are not helpful at all."
translation.ha: To amma a takaice dai wannan tattaunawar, sababin yadda wasu suke tunani, babu wani amfani cikinta.

translation.en: He touched on the issue of increasing sanctions against Iran, saying: "Not only did the Americans not decrease enmities, but they also increased sanctions.
translation.ha: Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci ya yi ishara da karin takunkumin da Amurkan ta sanya wa Iran a daidai lokacin da ake ci gaba da tattaunawa inda ya ce: Amurkawa, ba wai ma kawai ba su rage irin kiyayyar da suke nunawa ba ne, face ma dai sun kara irin takunkumin da suka sanya mana ne.

translation.en: Of course, they say that that these sanctions are not new, but in fact, they are new.
translation.ha: Koda yake suna fadin cewa wadannan ba wai wasu sabbin takunkumi ba ne, to amma a hakikanin gaskiya sabbi ne.

translation.en: Therefore, negotiations in the area of sanctions have not been helpful either."
translation.ha: A saboda haka babu wani amfani da wannan tattaunawar ta yi wajen dage takunkumin.

translation.en: The task that Dr. Zarif and his friends have started and in which they have made good achievements will continue.
translation.ha: Aikin da Dakta Zarif da abokan aikinsa suka faro, kuma ya zuwa yanzu sun gudanar da ayyuka masu kyau, za a ci gaba da su.

translation.en: But this was another precious experience for everyone so that we understand that establishing relations and speaking to the Americans will not have any effect on reducing their enmity."
translation.ha: To amma dai hakan wata kwarewa ce mai matukar muhimmanci da aka samu.

translation.en: His Eminence stressed that the Islamic Republic will not establish any relation with the Zionist regime at all.
translation.ha: Yayin da ya koma kan haramtacciyar kasar Isra'ila kuwa, Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci ya kore yiyuwar kulla kowace irin alaka da gwamnatin sahyoniyawan, kamar yadda dangane da Amurka kuma ya ce: Har zuwa lokacin irin wannan yanayi na kiyayyar da Amurka take nunawa Iran ya ci gaba da sannan kuma jami'an Amurka suka ci gaba da fadin maganganu da nuna kiyayya ga Iran, to kuwa babu wani amfani cikin mu'amala da su.

translation.en: The Leader of the Islamic Revolution highlighted the events in Gaza, adding: "The Palestinians' logic on the issue of the truce is cogent.
translation.ha: A ci gaba da bayanin irin mawuyacin halin da mutanen Gaza suke ciki a halin yanzu, Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci ya goyi bayan sharuddan da Palastinawa suka gabatar dangane da batun tsagaita wuta.

translation.en: As the Palestinians say, there should be a punishment for all these crimes which is an end to the siege of Gaza and no fair-minded individual can deny this legitimate request."
